Wɑɑ tuu dɔkt doi nɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kul ɑ ni, k niib bonciɑnn diɑ b bɑɑtb k bil’m dɑi ni, k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun ŋɑɑn k bin lek sii u tiɑt mɔgbɑnɑ, k bin nbɑ siin nɑ kul tuu lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
Tɔn, k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn *senniwɑntieb din tɑn nyii Selusɑɑlenm k bɑɑl Yiesu buol,
k b lɑ k u *puolpoweitesiɑb jɑk jiet di, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k nit b nii.
(Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn *Suifnbɑ nilieb kul tuu k gbiɑ b di jiet sie k b nit b nii fɑnu nɑn b yejɑnm kɑɑl nbɑ din wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
L i tie k b nyii dɑɑk ni, b tuu k di sie k b tɑn wul sinsinn. B biɑ din tuu diɑ kɑɑ bonciɑnn k pukn l po. B din tuu diɑ kɑɑl nbɑ senn nyun-nyuŋmɑni soklu nɑn b bobɑ soklu nɑn b dunduɑni wuulu po e.)
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn senniwɑntieb mɑnŋ boi Yiesu ɑ: «Bee k ɑ puolpoweitieb nɑ k diɑ t yejɑnm kɑɑl, ŋɑɑn kpɑn gbiɑ b di jiet k k nit b nii?»

K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: « *Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din pɑk i po fɑnu, ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: ‹Niib nɑ tien’n nibɑɑkl b mɔi ni kuukuɑ e, ŋɑɑn b pɑlɑ set fɔk nɑn’n bonciɑnn.
B jiɑntl’n yɑnn e, k mɑɑn b jii nisɑɑlk kɑɑ k wɑnn niib, k l nɑɑn nɑn min Yennu *senni nɑ.› »
K Yiesu ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «I bɑkn Yennu senni e k bil siɑl po wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑk nisɑɑli kɑɑl nbɑ wɑnt lin nbɑ nɑ.
Yinm, i lek yet Yennu senni weiu ɑ yin diɑ i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ kɑɑl e,
k mɑɑn Muois din senn k yet ɑ: ‹Suɑ kul n tien u bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ nibɑɑkl, k wun nbɑ sukl u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ, bin kpɑn kpi’u.›
Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ nilɔ i yet u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ ɑ: ‹Mɑɑ bo sɑɑ tul’i sonml nbɑ nɑ tie Kolbɑnn k l wɑnt nɑn l tie Yennu yɑl e,›
ɑ u ji mɔk yiikuo k kɑn sonm u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ.
Kɑɑl nbɑ k i din gɑɑl nɑ te Yennu mɑɑn tie yɑnn. I biɑ tie bonsiɑ bonciɑnn k l nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ buolu.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ŋɑnm din yiin nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ u buol ni, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Yinm nbɑ kul be nnɑ nɑ, gbiintl mɑn k bɑnn mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
Bonsiɑl kɑɑ k sɑɑ kuɑ nisɑɑlk mɔb ni k fit tien’ɔ jɑknt u pɑl ni. Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ nyi nisɑɑlk pɑl ni e fit tien’ɔ jɑknt.
Wun nbɑ kul mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint»
Wɑɑ yet’b nnɑ gbenn yuo nbɑ k u nyik niib mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ ni. K u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ wun wɑnn’b mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «I mun biɑ lek dɑɑ tie yɑnkpienɑ ee? I k mi nɑn lin nbɑ kul kuɑ nisɑɑlk mɔb ni k tien’ɔ jɑknt ii?
K mɑɑn l k kuɑ u pɑl ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u puol ni e k l kuɑ, k biɑ kpɑntl bint k nyi.» Wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ mɑnŋ wɑnt nɑn jiet kul ɑ k kuɑ.
K u biɑ ŋɑnm yet pukn ɑ: «Lin nbɑ set nyi nisɑɑlk pɑl ni e tien’ɔ jɑknt,
k mɑɑn u pɑl ni e k dudukbiit bɑɑt nɑn puoweiu nɑn jɑweiu, nɑn nɑn-yuk, nɑn nikpinu,
nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, nɑn niɑnciɑɔnŋ nɑn biitbuolu buolu nɑn fɑɑk fɑɑlu, nɑn tuon-yɑnɑ, nɑn *funfunn, nɑn sɑnjɑɑɔnŋ, nɑn kɑlnbɑɑni, nɑn jɑt-tuonɑ.
Lin nbɑ nɑ kul e nyi nilɔ pɑl ni k tien’ɔ jɑknt.»
Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Tiil bɔkl po, k kuɑ ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ ni, k k luon suɑ n bɑnn nɑn u be lenŋ, ŋɑɑn u din kɑn fit bɔl u mɔnŋ.
K puosuɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk din be u bonpobik ni nɑ gbɑt u po, k u bɑɑl u buol ni k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn ni.
Puo mɑnŋ din tie Glek nilɔ e. B din mɑl’ɔ Feniisi tinŋ ni e, Siili tingbounŋ ni. K puo nɑ bɑln Yiesu ɑ wun nyinn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ u bonpobik mɑnŋ ni.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k wɑɑs n di sinsinn ɑ, k mɑɑn l k ŋɑn k nilɔ n jii wɑɑs jiet k tul bɔi.»
K puo nɑ jiin ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l set tie mɔni e, ŋɑɑn bɔi nbɑ tuu duɑ tiebul lɔunŋ ni nɑ mun gɑni wɑɑs jebulɑ nbɑ bɑɑ nɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A jiinu nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, n ji cɑb’ɑ, ii kun. Nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ ponŋ nyii ɑ bonpobik nɑ ni wɑɑ.»
K puo mɑnŋ set din fiil yɑɑt kun k sɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ k u bik nɑ duɑ u dunduɑnu pɑɑk, k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ set nyii wɑɑ.
Tɔn, k Yiesu ji din nyik Tiil yɑkl nɑ, ŋɑɑn tɔkn nyii Siidɔn yɑkl, nɑn tinŋ nbɑ k b din yi Doi-piik nɑ mɔkmɔk k sɑɑ bɑɑl Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl ni.
K nisiɑb din bɑɑl nɑn jɑsuɑ k u tie tuukpɑɑl k biɑ k fit k piɑk fɑnu, k b bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun yii u nuu juɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
K Yiesu gɑɑl’ɔ k b nyii kpinŋ po, b kuukuɑ, k u jii u niibilɑ k tun juɑ mɑnŋ tubɑ ni, ŋɑɑn siil mɔsɑnt ŋɑɑn sii juɑ mɑnŋ jeln,
k got sɑnpɑɑpo ŋɑɑn kulnt sikn, k yet juɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Efɑtɑ,» k l pɑɑk tie: «Lotl ɑ mɔnŋ.»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k juɑ nɑ ji gbiɑ, k u jeln biɑ tɑbt k u ji fit piɑk mɑɑn fɑnu.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yɑki nɑn niib nɑ ɑ b i mi k bin yet suɑ lin nbɑ k u tun mɑnŋ po, ŋɑɑn nɑn kpɑyɑɔk mɑnŋ kul b lek din ŋɑmi k yɑln mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
K bin nbɑ kul gbɑt lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ, k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ bonciɑnn, k b yet ɑ: «Lin nbɑ kul k u tuu tuun ŋɑn bonciɑnn. U te k tuukpɑɑ gbɑɑ tɑn fit gbiɑ, k te k mui biɑ fit piɑk.»
L yuo nɑ, k nibulciɑɔnŋ yɑɑn lɑkn lieb Yiesu buol ni. Bɑɑ k mɔk jiet nɑ, k Yiesu yiin u *puolpoweitieb nɑ u buol ni, k tɑn yet’b ɑ:
«Ninbɑɑɔk suol’n bonciɑnn nibul nɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ e nɑ k b be nɑn’n, ŋɑɑn k ji k mɔk jiet nbɑ k b sɑɑ di.
Mi i mun i cɑb’b nɑn kon, b sɑɑ sɑɑ fib sɔnu ni wɑɑ, k mɑɑn b siɑb sɔnu fɔk ɑ.»
K u puolpoweitieb nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «T sɑɑ lɑ jiet lee muuk nɑ ni k lin jɑnŋ nibul nɑ kul i?»
K u boi’b ɑ: «Pɑɑnu kunɑ ŋɑnŋɑ e be i buol ni nnɑ nɑ?» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑnlole.»
Ŋɑnn e k u te k nibul nɑ kul kɑl tinŋ ni. L puolpo k u jii pɑɑni ŋɑnlole nɑ, k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit k tul u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ bin tol nibul mɑnŋ.
B biɑ din mɔk jɑnbis wɑɑn b buol ni, k u biɑ tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ ɑ bin jii tol’b biɑk.
ŋɑɑn k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb kɑkt k kuɑ bulgbetl ni, k sɑɑn Dɑlmɑnutɑ tinŋ ni.
L puolpo e k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn tie selmi, ɑ bin bikn’ɔ k lɑ u mɔbonkpetl, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ wun tien *nyinn k lin wɑnn nɑn u yiikuo mɑnŋ nyii Yennu buol e.
L yuo k u kulnt ŋɑɑn boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k mɔtɑɑnɑ niib nɑ luon nyinn i? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i ɑ n kɑn tun nyinn k tul’b.»
L puolpo k u nyik’b, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni, k puot mɔkgbenŋl puotl nɑ po.
Tɔn, Yiesu puolpoweitieb din tɑnm k k diɑ jiet k l yɑb. B din diɑ pɑɑn-yenn kuɑ e bulgbetl nɑ ni.
K Yiesu yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn, kii guu i mɔnŋ nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Heluod * dɑtinŋ nɑ mɑn.»
Ŋɑnn e k b ji piɑk b lieb sinsuuk ni ɑ: «Tɑɑ k diɑ pɑɑnu nɑ e k u piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ.»
Ŋɑɑn k u bɑnn bɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i piɑk k yɑɑ ɑ i k diɑ pɑɑnu? I dɑɑ k bɑnn siɑl biɑk ii? I dudukt ni biɑ dɑɑ k yent ii?
I mɔk ninbinɑ, ŋɑɑn bee k i k lɑɑt i? I biɑ mɔk tubɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ k gbiɑ ɑɑ? I k tiɑn
yuo nbɑ k n ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu k tul niib tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ ɑɑ? Kpɑncubt ŋɑnŋɑ e k i tikl pɑɑnbulɑ nbɑ tenn i?» K b jiin ɑ: «Piik nɑn ŋɑnle.»
K u boi’b biɑk ɑ: «K yuo nbɑ k n ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑni ŋɑnlole k tul niib tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ, kpɑncubt ŋɑnŋɑ k i tikl pɑɑnbulɑ nbɑ tenn i?» K b jiin ɑ: «Ŋɑnlole.»
Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn k i biɑ lek dɑɑ k gbɑt l pɑɑk ii?»
K b din tɑn bɑɑl Betsɑidɑ, k nisiɑb din jii jɑjuɑnsuɑ nnɑ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol ni, k tɑn bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun sii’u.
K Yiesu suol u nuu k nyii nɑn’ɔ duo kpinŋ po, k siil mɔsɑnt juɑ nɑ ninbinɑ ni, k jii u nii k yii u pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A lɑɑt siɑl ii?»
Ŋɑnn e k juɑ mɑnŋ gokt got, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Nnn, n lɑɑt niib, ŋɑɑn b nɑɑn nɑn tiini nɑ e k sonm.»
K Yiesu biɑ jii u nii k yii juɑ mɑnŋ ninbinɑ pɑɑk, l yuo nɑ k juɑ mɑnŋ ji got silll, k suɑ k u ninbinɑ mɔk lɑɑfiɑ, k u ji lɑɑt bonsiɑl kul pul pul pul.
K Yiesu te k juɑ mɑnŋ kun u ŋɑɑk ni, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «Ii mi k ɑ ŋmɑt duo mɑnŋ ni jik.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din yɑɑt k sɑɑ Sesɑɑle Fiiliip tingbounŋ ni. Bɑɑ dɑɑ be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ nɑ k u boi’b ɑ: «Niib yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?»
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nisiɑb yien ɑ ɑ tie Sɑn, wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e, k nilieb mun yɑɑ ɑ tie Elii e k nilieb mun biɑ yɑɑ ɑ tie *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ yenɔ e.»
Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn k yinm ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?» K Piɑl jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie *Klistu nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yɑki nɑn’m ɑ bii mi k bin yet suɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ.

L puolpo k Yiesu ji din piin k wɑnt u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Sie k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ dii fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, k sɑɑkɑb nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb n tɑn yet’ɔ, k biɑ kpi’u, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u sɑɑ fiil kuun ni biɑk.»
U din pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ k k bɔl siɑl. Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl yiin’ɔ k nyii nɑn’ɔ kpinŋ po k sɑɑ yɑki nɑn’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ gbiɑ jiɑnt got u puolpoweitieb nɑ, k ji mun yɑki nɑn Piɑl ɑ: «Fin *Sɑɑtɑn nbɑ nɑ, sietl nnɑ nɑ. A k mɔk Yennu dudukt kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ mɔk nisɑɑlk dudukt e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yiin u puolpoweitieb nɑn nibul nbɑ wɑɑ’u nɑ, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ i luon wun wei’n, sie k u likn u sɑɑŋmɑnŋ, k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn kii wɑɑ’n,
k mɑɑn wun nbɑ k sɑɑk wun jii u mɑnfuol k tul’n, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ likn u sɑɑŋmɑnŋ, min nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ lɑ u mɑnfuol.
Nilɔ i lɑ tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk kul ɑ ŋɑɑn kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol, nyɔlɑnt po e k u sɑɑ lɑ?
Ami nilɔ sɑɑ fit jii bee k kpent u mɑnfuol i?
K wun nbɑ i tiin fei k jiin min nɑn n mɑɑn nɑ po biitdɑnm nɑn tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm sinsuuk ni, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun sɑɑ tin fei k jiin u po yuo nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑn u Bɑɑ *yudɑnt nɑn *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ.»
Tɔn, k Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yɑɑ n yet’i, siɑb be nnɑ k dɑɑ kɑn kpo sie k b tɑn lɑ Yennu nɑɑn bɑɑlu nɑn pɑnŋ.»
L puolpo e k l tɑn tien dɑɑ ŋɑnluob, k Yiesu jii Piɑl nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn k duo nɑn’m juɑl nbɑ fɔk bonciɑnn pɑɑk, k b be b kuɑ. L yuo k b lɑ k u lebt b nunm ni,
k u tiɑt nyilk k pien pɑl pɑl. K suɑ kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni k sɑɑ fit penn tiɑt nɑn ŋɑnn nɑ.
K b lɑ k *Elii nɑn Muois lekt yonm k piɑk nɑn Yiesu.
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl yet Yiesu ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, l ŋɑn nɑn tii be nnɑ nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k tin fɑɑ lɑnbont ŋɑntɑ, k yenn i tie ɑ yɑl, k liel i tie Muois yɑl k liel mun i tie Elii yɑl.»
Jɑŋmɑɑni nbɑ din suol Piɑl nɑn u lieb mɑnŋ bonciɑnn nɑ pɑɑk din te k u din k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ.
L yuo k sɑnpɑgbounŋ dɔkt k tɑn piin’m, k b gbɑt kunkɔl sɑnpɑgbounŋ nɑ ni, k l yet ɑ: «N Bilonkɑk e nɑ. Gbiintl u mɔb mɑn »
K b jiɑnt got, ŋɑɑn ji k lɑ suɑ b buol, sie Yiesu kuukuɑ.
Bɑɑ nyii juɑl mɑnŋ pɑɑk k siik, k Yiesu yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ b dɑɑ yien suɑ lin nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.
K b sɑk u mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k diɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ b sinsuuk ni, k biɑ boi b lieb ɑ: «‹Kuun fiilu› nɑ pɑɑk tie bee?»
K b tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee te k *senniwɑntieb yɑɑ ɑ sie k Elii e bɑɑl sinsinn i?»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Elii set bɑɑt sinsinn, ɑ wun tɑn ŋɑnm bonsiɑl kul fɑnu e. Ŋɑɑn, bee te k l biɑ diɑn ɑ l tie k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ n di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn k niib n yet’ɔ?
N yien’i e, Elii ponŋ bɑɑl nɑ, k niib diɑ’u gbɑkɑ gbɑkɑ nnɑ bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din tɑn bɑɑl nɑn u *puolpoweitieb Piɑl, Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn u puolpoweitelieb buol ni yuo nbɑ k b lɑ nibulciɑɔnŋ lɑkn, k senniwɑntieb biɑ noi nɑn’m mɔniɑɔk.
Nibul mɑnŋ nbɑ lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ, k b tin bɑɑl fuont’ɔ.
Ŋɑnn e k u boi u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «I noi nɑn’m lɑnn po pɑɑk e?»
K jɑsuɑ nnɑ nyii nibul mɑnŋ ni k jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, min e bo bɑɑt nɑn n bijɑ ɑ buol ni, k mɑɑn nɑlnbiiuk be u ni k l te k u k fit piɑk.

Siɑn nbɑ kul ɑ k nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ fiil, l tuu lu’u tinŋ ni e, k mɔsɑnkunkuounŋ nyi u mɔb ni, k u ŋmɑn u nyɑnɑ, k u gbɑnɑnt kul n wɑkl kenken. N bɑln ɑ puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ bin nyinn nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k b gbɑl.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet ɑ: «Yinm mɔtɑɑnɑ niib yɑdɑ mɑntk puɑl hei. N sɑɑ wei nɑn’i nlee? L sɑɑ wei nlee k n mɔk suklu nɑn’i ni? Bɑɑt nɑn bik mɑnŋ nnɑ.»
K b bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol. Nɑlnbiiuk nɑ nbɑ lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u fiil bik nɑ ni k lu’u tinŋ ni, k u duɑ k biln, k mɔsɑnkunkuounŋ nyi u mɔb ni.
K Yiesu boi u bɑɑ ɑ: «Nlee yuo e k l piin k tie’u nnɑ?» K u jiin ɑ: «L piin’ɔ u bisn ni e wɑɑ.
Yuo bonciɑnn e k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ tuu te k u bɑɑ muu ni, nɑn nyun ni, ɑ wun lek kpi’u. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ sɑɑ fit tien siɑl, ɑ lek tin’t ninbɑɑɔk k sonm’t.»
K Yiesu yet ɑ: «A yet ɑ l i tie k n fit i e. Bonsiɑl kul k pɑɑl k tul wun nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ buol ni.»
K juɑ nɑ yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «N tien yɑdɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn puknt n yɑdɑ pɑnŋ.»
Yiesu nbɑ lɑ k nibul nɑ ŋɑnmt tut bɑɑt b pɑɑk nɑ, k u tiɑn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ pɑɑk ɑ: «Fin nɑlnmutuukpɑɑl nɑ, min e tul’ɑ mɔb, nyimin u ni k ji dɑɑ mi jent u ni.»
K nɑlnbiiuk nɑ yikn k tɔkl bik mɑnŋ k lu’u tinŋ ni gbɑb, ŋɑɑn nyii u ni, k bik mɑnŋ ji nɑɑn nɑn u kpo e nɑ, k niib nɑ ni bonciɑnn yet ɑ: «U kpo e nɑ.»
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu suol bik mɑnŋ nuu k sonm’ɔ k u fiil set.
Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb nbɑ bo biɑl nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k tinm ŋɑnin bo k fit nyinn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ?»
K u yet’b ɑ: «I kɑn fit nyinn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ buolu sie k i mei Yennu.»
K Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ nyii lenŋ k tɔkn Gɑɑliile tingbounŋ po. Ŋɑɑn u din k luon suɑ n bɑnn wɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ,
k mɑɑn u din wɑnt u puolpoweitieb nɑ k yien’m ɑ: «B tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k tien’ɔ niib nuu ni k bin kpi’u, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
Ŋɑɑn u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ din k bɑnn mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn mun tiin jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn bin boi’ɔ.
Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nbɑ din bɑɑl Kɑpelnɑunm k tɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ k u boi’b ɑ: «I bo diɑ lɑbɑlɑnn po e sɔnu ni nɑ?»
Ŋɑɑn k b ŋmin ɑ, k mɑɑn sɔnu ni b noi nɑn b lieb *yudɑnt pɑɑk e b sinsuuk ni.
Ŋɑnn e k u ŋmɑnt k kɑl, ŋɑɑn yiin u tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul luon wun tien yudɑɑnɔ, sie k wun kpint u mɔnŋ k tien bik i kul ni, k biɑ tien i kul tuontunnɔ,»
ŋɑɑn jii bik nnɑ k senn’ɔ b sinsuuk ni, k puul u nii k wɔb bik mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ:
«Wun nbɑ kul gɑɑl bik nɑ buolu n sɑnn pɑɑk, min e k u gɑɑl’n, k wun nbɑ gɑɑl’n k gɑɑl min kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u gɑɑl wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e nɑ mun biɑk.»
Tɔn, k Sɑn yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t lɑ k jɑsuɑ nnɑ mun tɑɑn ɑ sɑnn k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k t yɑki nɑn’ɔ ɑ wun nyik, k mɑɑn u k tie t ni yenɔ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ biel’ɔ mɑn, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ sɑɑ tɑɑ n sɑnn k tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonn, l puolpo u ji kɑn fit pɑk siɑl k biil’n.
K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul k kɔn nɑn’t, u sie t puol e.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ kul got lɑ’i k tul’i nyun, ɑ yɑɑ tie Klistuyɑb nɑ pɑɑk, l dɑɑnɔ tɑn kɑn mi kɔnŋ u nyuɑt.»
K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm k yet ɑ: «Wun nbɑ te k wɑɑs mɑnŋ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ yenɔ kuɑ bɑɑ biit ni, b i bo i lɑnn nɑɑl l dɑɑnɔ tulu ni k tut’ɔ nɑn’n k lu’u mɔkgbenŋl ni gbɑɑ, l bo sii sɔ k tul’ɔ.
A ninbinn i te k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tun biit, fɑn kpɑkl k lu. L sɔ k fɑn tɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni nɑn ninbin-yenn kuɑ k gɑl fɑn tɑn kuɑ muu mɑnŋ ni nɑn ninbinɑ ŋɑnle.
Lenŋ e k ‹nɑnwubɑ nbɑ k kpenn nɑ be k di’b k muu nbɑ biɑ k kpient nɑ be k di’b.›
«B tɑn sɑɑ ŋɑnm suɑ kul nɑn muu nɑn yɑɑln e.»
«Yɑɑln mɑn, ŋɑɑn yɑɑln mɑnu i nyii, nlee k ɑ ji sɑɑ jiin l mɑnu? «Ii mɑn nɑn yɑɑln nɑ mɑn, k mɑnu ii be yinm nɑn i lieb sinsuuk ni.»
K Yiesu nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Suude tinŋ ni nɑn *Suulden kpenpuotl po, k nigbounŋ bonciɑnn ji lɑkn u buol ni, k u yɑɑn wɑnt’b Yennu mɑɑn nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ tuu wɑnt’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ bɑɑl u buol ni, k luon bin bikn’ɔ, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Senni nɑ cɑb nɑn juɑ n yet u ŋɑɑpuo ɑmi ii?»
Ŋɑnn e k u mun jiin k boi’b ɑ: «Muois din tul’i *senni nlee k jiin l po?»
K b jiin ɑ: «Muois din cɑb yiikuo ɑ juɑ sɑɑ fit diɑn puoyetu kɑdɑɑɔk ŋɑɑn yet u ŋɑɑpuo.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I tubkɑngbɑtɑ pɑɑk e din te k Muois diɑn senni mɑnŋ k tul’i.
Ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din nɑn *dulnyɑ pinpiik ni: ‹U din nɑn juɑ nɑn puo e.›
Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk k juɑ tuu sɑɑ nyi u bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ buol ni, ŋɑɑn k ŋuɑ nɑn puo n tɑɑn lieb,
k b bɑnle sɑɑ tɑɑn kii tie niyenɔ kuɑ. Ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k b ji k tie niib bɑnle, ŋɑɑn b ji tie gbɑnɑn-yent kuɑ e.
L pɑɑk, lin nbɑ k Yennu jii k tɑɑn nɑn liel, nisɑɑlk i mi k wun bɔkt’l.»
Yiesu nɑn u *puolpoweitieb nbɑ din tɑn jen ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ yet u ŋɑɑpuo ŋɑɑn kuɑn puogɑnɔ, u tun * boncuncontuonn k jiin puo nbɑ k u bel’ɔ nɑ po e nɑ.
Nnɑ e mun biɑk, puosuɑ i yet u sɔlɔ ŋɑɑn sɑɑn kun jɑgɑnɔ, u mun tun boncuncontuonn ɑ.»
Tɔn, k nisiɑb din tɑn bɑɑt nɑn b wɑɑs Yiesu buol ni ɑ wun tɑn yii u nii b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k u puolpoweitieb tiɑn b pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn wɑɑ bɑnn bɑɑ tiɑn b pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ k u wutuol duo, k u yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k wɑɑs mɑnŋ i bɑɑt n buol ni nɑ, k dɑɑ tiɑn’m, k mɑɑn b buolu e yen Yennu nɑɑn.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ k gɑɑl Yennu nɑɑn nɑn bik nɑ, u kɑn mi kuɑ l ni fɑb ɑ.»
K u gɑɑl wɑɑs mɑnŋ u nii ni, k yii u nii b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk
Yiesu nbɑ din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑ mɑnŋ, k jɑsuɑ tin k cet’ɔ k tɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntɔŋɑnɔ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k tɑn lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu?»
K Yiesu jiin boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ yi’n niŋɑnɔ? Niŋɑnsuɑ kɑɑ sie Yennu kuukuɑ.
A ponŋ mi Yennu senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ, ɑ: ‹Dɑɑ kpi nilɔ. Dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ. Dɑɑ jɑɑn. Dɑɑ fɑ fɑɑk suɑ pɑɑk. Dɑɑ ŋmɑb nilɔ. Ii bɑɑkt ɑ bɑɑ nɑn ɑ nɑɑ.› »
K juɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, n ponŋ sɑk lin nbɑ nɑ kul n bisn ni e wɑɑ.»

K Yiesu got’ɔ silll nɑn lonm, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn bon-yenn kuɑ e pɔt’ɑ. Ii kun k sɑɑ kɔi lin nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑ kul, k jii l likli mɑnŋ k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɔktuk sɑnpɑɑpo. L puolpo k ɑ jen ɑ kii wɑɑ’n.»
Juɑ nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ k u pɑl ni biil bonciɑnn, k u ŋmɑt kun nɑn pɑlbiil, k mɑɑn u din mɔk mɔktuk bonciɑnn.
K Yiesu ŋmɑnt got u puolpoweitieb nɑ k lint, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «L sii pɑɑl bonciɑnn nɑn mɔktɑ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
K u mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b, k u biɑ ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «N wɑɑs, l lek pɑɑl nɑn nilɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.
L pɑɑl nɑn mɔktɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni k cie lɑɑ pɑɑl nɑn yuyouk n kuɑ kpɑlpienu miɑl ni nɑ.»
K mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b bonciɑnn, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ i e, ŋmee ji sɑɑ fit k lɑ fielu?»
K u kpɑɑ u nuni b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑl k tul nisɑɑlk e, ŋɑɑn l k pɑɑl Yennu yɑɑ buol ni, k mɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ fit tun bonsiɑl kul ɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl tɔl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, tinm ŋɑnin nyik t bonsiɑl kul e ŋɑɑn wɑɑ’ɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ kul nyik u ŋɑɑk, ɑmi u ninjɑnm, ɑmi u niipuob, ɑmi u nɑɑ, ɑmi u bɑɑ, ɑmi u wɑɑs, ɑmi u kpɑɑnt, n sɑnn pɑɑk nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ pɑɑk

u tɑn sɑɑ biɑ lɑ bonɑ k lin gɑl wɑɑ nyik lin nbɑ nɑ. U tɑn sɑɑ lɑ ŋei, nɑn ninjɑnm, nɑn niipuob, nɑn nɑɑnbɑ, nɑn wɑɑs, nɑn kpɑɑnt, kobi kobi e tingbounŋ nɑ ni, l i lek i tie k b muks’ɔ, k yuo nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ k u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ dɔnŋ tuɑnn mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, b tɑn sɑɑ jil puol ɑ, ŋɑɑn bonciɑnn nbɑ mun biɑ juont puol mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ gɑl tuɑnn nɑ.»

L yuo nɑ k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din nyii sɔnu ni k do Selusɑɑlenm, k u gɑl b tuɑnn po, k b yɑn put k jɑŋmɑɑni biɑ suol nibul nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ kul ɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u yɑɑn nyii nɑn u tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ kpinŋ po, k yet’b lin nbɑ sɑɑ tien’ɔ,
ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, t do Selusɑɑlenm e, siɑn nbɑ k b sɑɑ jii *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k kuɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb nii ni ɑ bin bu u buut ŋɑɑn kpi’u, k jii’u tul bin nbɑ k tie *Suifnbɑ nɑ,
k b sɑɑ sɑlk’ɔ, k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, k buo’u gbɑnn, k biɑ tɑn kpi’u, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
L yuo k Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn, bin nbɑ din tie Sebede wɑɑs nɑ, bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t luon k ɑ tun lin nbɑ k t sɑɑ boi’ɑ nɑ po k tul’t.»
K u boi’b ɑ: «I luon k n tun bee k tul’i ni?»
K b jiin ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ ɑ nɑɑn yudɑnt nɑ, ɑ tɑn ŋɑɑn k t yenɔ n kɑl ɑ niidiitu po, k luɑ mun n kɑl ɑ niigɑnŋ po.»
K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «I k mi yɑɑ mei lin nbɑ po. I tɑn sɑɑ fit nyu n wɑhɑlɑ *kɔp nɑ ni wɑɑ ɑɑ? Kuo i sɑɑ fit gɑɑl n fɑlɑ Yennu nyunwulu nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?»
K b jiin ɑ: «T sɑɑ fit ɑ.» K u yet’b ɑ: «I set tɑn sɑɑ nyu kɔp nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ nyu lenŋ nɑ wɑɑ, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu nyunwulu nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl nɑ wɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn n k mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ gɑnn wun nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɑl n niidiitu po nɑn n niigɑnŋ po. Yennu e gɑnn bin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɑl l kinkɑɑni pɑɑk »
K Yiesu puolpoweitelieb piik nɑ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k b wutuol duo Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn pɑɑk.
K Yiesu yiin b kul ɑ k lɑk’m u buol, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ mi nɑn bin nbɑ k b goli’b k b tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yudɑnm nɑ diɑ’b nɑn ninmɔnn e, k nijɑɑnɑ mun gɑɑnt nɑn b yiikuo.
Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, l dɑɑ tie nnɑ kɑɑ i sinsuuk ni. I suɑ i luon wun tien nijɑɑnn, sie k wun tien u mɔnŋ suɑ kul ɑ tuontunnɔ,
k wun nbɑ mun luon wun tien yudɑɑnɔ, sie k wun tien suɑ kul ɑ dɑɑbl,
k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ, k bɑɑl ɑ niib n tun tul’ɔ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u bɑɑl ɑ wun tun k tul niib e, k biɑ kpo ɑ wun fiel niib bonciɑnn.»
Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl Seliiko k tɑn nyii, k ŋɑnm nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ tɔk sɑɑ, k juɑnsuɑ din be k tie miɑtɔ, k kɑl sɔnjokpinŋ, k u sɑnn yi Bɑɑltiime, wun nbɑ tie Tiime bijɑ nɑ.
Wɑɑ tɑn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ be yuo nbɑ, k u yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Yiesu, * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
K niib bonciɑnn tiɑn u pɑɑk ɑ wun ŋmin, ŋɑɑn k u biɑ ŋɑnm yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
K Yiesu set k yet ɑ: «Yiint’ɔ nɑ mɑn » K b yiin’ɔ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cien ɑ pɑl. U yi’ɑ. Fiit k set.»
Ŋɑnn e k juɑnŋ mɑnŋ lu u liɑtfuouk, ŋɑɑn fiil k set, k bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni. K Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «A luon k n tun bee k tul’ɑ ni?»
K juɑnŋ mɑnŋ jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, n luon k ɑ munt’n e.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tɔn, ii sɑɑ. A yɑdɑ te k ɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u ninbinɑ nyuɑnt, k u ji lɑɑt k wɑɑ Yiesu, k b sɑɑ.

Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u *puolpoweitieb nbɑ din tɑn pel Selusɑɑlenm k bɑɑl doi nbɑ k b yi Betfɑɑje nɑn Betɑɑni nɑ, k doi mɑnŋ biɑk jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ, k u tun u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni bɑnle, k yet’b ɑ:
«Ii sɑɑ duo nbɑ be tuɑnn po nɑ ni mɑn. Ii sɑɑ i bɑɑl, i sɑɑ lɑ bonbik nbɑ k suɑ dɑɑ k mi k jɑk’ɔ, k u lol ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ nɑn-yel po tɑnmɔb ni. Yin lot’ɔ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ n buol nnɑ.
Suɑ i boi’i ɑ bee k i lot bonŋ mɑnŋ, yin yet’ɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ e luon’ɔ, ɑ ŋɑɑn u sɑɑ jiin’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k b din sɑɑn k set sɑɑ lɑ k bonbik lol ŋɑsiɑk nnɑ nɑn-yel po. Bɑɑ set lot’ɔ yuo nbɑ
k nisiɑb nnɑ sie lenŋ k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i lot bonbik mɑnŋ i?»
K b yet’b nɑn Yiesu nbɑ bo yɑɑ bin yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b cɑb’b k b sɑɑn.
Bɑɑ din bɑɑl nɑn bonbik mɑnŋ Yiesu buol ni yuo nbɑ, k b jikt b tiɑt k pɑɑ bonŋ mɑnŋ buɑnn pɑɑk, k Yiesu jɑk.
K niib bonciɑnn jikt b tiɑt k lɑt sɔnu ni, k siɑb mun ŋɑt fɑɑmɑɑsɑɑ k lɑt sɔnu ni.
Bin nbɑ din gɑl Yiesu tuɑnn po, nɑn bin nbɑ din wɑɑ u puolpo kul ɑ din yikn k yien ɑ: «Hosɑnɑ. Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be wun nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk.
Yennu yetŋɑnm i biɑ kii be t yejɑ Dɑɑfiid nɑɑn nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ pɑɑk. Hosɑnɑ. Yudɑnt tie *Yendɔunŋ ni yɑl e.»
K Yiesu bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm k kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k lin got bonsiɑl kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn nyiɑɔk nbɑ din tɑn bɔnt nɑ pɑɑk, k ŋuɑ nɑn u tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ nyii k ŋmɑt sɑɑn Betɑɑni.
L sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk o k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nyii Betɑɑni k jent Selusɑɑlenm, k kon tɑn suol’ɔ.
K u lɑ fiigie nbɑ mɔk fɑɑmɑɑsɑ, k l sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ. K u sɑɑn tiik mɑnŋ nyɑkl ni ɑ wun sɑɑ lɑ luɑnɑ l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ k u k lɑ siɑl, sie fɑɑt kuukuɑ, k mɑɑn fiignbɑ yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl.
Ŋɑnn e k u pol tiik nɑ mɔb ɑ: «Suɑ ji kɑn mi di ɑ luɑnɑ lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ k sɑɑ.» K u puolpoweitieb gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ.

Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb tɑn bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, k Yiesu sɑɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k bel kɔitieb nɑn dɑɑtieb kul k nyint’b, k tut lik-kpentɑ tiebulɑ k lubn, k tut bin nbɑ kɔi ŋmɑnɑ nɑ koki k lubn,
k lek k sɑk k suɑ n jii bonsiɑl gɑl nɑn’n Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni.
Ŋɑnn e k u tumi niib nɑ k yet’b ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹B sii yi n ŋɑɑk Yenmiɑlu ŋɑɑk e k tul nibuolu kul ɑ.› Ŋɑɑn yinm e kpintl k tien nɑn-yukb kinkɑl buol.»
K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb gbɑt wɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b ji luon sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi’u, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ tiin’ɔ jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn u wɑnnu din tien nibul nɑ kul ɑ yɑɑl-lituk bonciɑnn.
Dɑɑjuouk nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb nyii Selusɑɑlenm.
L sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk o biɑk k b sonm sɔnu ni k gɑɑl, k lɑ k fiigie nɑ kuol nɑn jiinɑ ni wɑɑ k sie.
Piɑl nbɑ tiɑl Yiesu nbɑ won yet lin nbɑ nɑ, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, gotl, fɑɑ won pol fiigie nbɑ mɔb nɑ kuol ɑ.»
K Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, tient Yennu yɑdɑ mɑn.
Wun nbɑ kul yet juɑl nɑ ɑ lin fikt k sɑɑ bɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl ni, ŋɑɑn k k mɔk bilsuk u pɑl ni, k tien yɑdɑ nɑn wɑɑ yet lin nbɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑ tun ɑ, l set sɑɑ tun tul’ɔ wɑɑ.
L pɑɑk e k n yien’i, l i tie k i mei Yennu k boi’ɔ siɑl po, yii mɔk yɑdɑ i pɑlɑ ni nɑn i ponŋ gɑɑl bont mɑnŋ ɑ, k i set sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ.
L i tie k i fiil k set ɑ yin miɑl Yennu, ŋɑɑn tiɑl nɑn suɑ tun biit k biil’i, yin nyik cɑb’ɔ, k i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ mun sɑɑ nyik i biit k cɑb’i wɑɑ.
(Ŋɑɑn l i tie k i k nyikt cɑbt i lieb b biit, i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ mun kɑn nyik cɑb i biit.)»
Tɔn, k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ yɑɑn din tɑn jen Selusɑɑlenm, k u kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k sonm lin. K jɑɑnti yudɑnm, nɑn senniwɑntieb, nɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ ni sɑɑkɑb, bɑɑl u buol ni,
k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yiikuo lɑnn po e k ɑ mɔk k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ kul i? Ŋmee cɑb’ɑ l yiikuo?»
K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k n boi’i buboiyent kuɑ sinsinn. L i tie k i sɑɑ fit tul’n l jiinu, tɔn, n sɑɑ wɑnn’i yiikuo buolu nbɑ k n mɔk k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ.
Sɑn wun nbɑ dɑɑn wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo ɑmi nisɑɑlk e? Yetl’n mɑn.»
K b ŋmɑnt fɑɑ b lieb lɑbɑɑl k yien ɑ: «T i yet ɑ Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo, u sɑɑ boi’t ɑ k bee te k t k tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ?
K t sɑɑ fit yet ɑ nisɑɑli e cɑb’ɔ ɑɑ?» (B tiin niib nɑ, k mɑɑn b kul din duki nɑn Sɑn mɑnŋ set dɑɑn tie *Yennu sɔkni e nɑn bɑlmɔni.)
L pɑɑk, k b jiin k yet Yiesu ɑ: «T k mi.» K Yiesu mun yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, n mun kɑn yet’i wun nbɑ cɑb’n l yiikuo k n tuun lin nbɑ nɑ.»

L yuo k Yiesu jɑk bɑljokt yinu ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi *fiinyɑ nɑ u kpɑɑb ni, k cɑɑn gungounŋ lint’l, ŋɑɑn gbiil buotuk nbɑ k b tuu sii ŋmɑki tilonti mɑnŋ luɑnɑ nyun lenŋ, k biɑ mɑɑ siɑl k b sii do l pɑɑk k guu kpɑɑb nɑ, k jii kpɑɑb nɑ k tien kpɑɑlɑ nii ni ɑ bii goli, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn duo.
K luɑnɑ nɑ punpuɑlyuo tɑn bɑɑl, k u tun tuontunnɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn gɑɑl tiluɑnɑ u kpɑɑlɑ nɑ buol ni, k u sɑɑn.
K kpɑɑlɑ nɑ suol’ɔ k buo’u fɑnu, ŋɑɑn bel’ɔ, k u kun yɑnn.
K kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ biɑ tun tuontunluɑ, ŋɑɑn k kpɑɑlɑ nɑ biɑ fɑɑ u yul k suki’ɔ.
K kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm tun tuontunluɑ b buol ni, ŋɑɑn k b kpii ŋuɑ. L puolpo k u biɑ ŋɑnm tun tuontunlieb bonciɑnn b buol ni, k b biɑ tun nnɑ, k buo siɑb, ŋɑɑn kpii lieb.
Kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ tiɑɔnŋ bilonkɑk kuukuɑ din tɑn biɑl, k u tun’ɔ kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ buol ni, k yet ɑ: ‹B sɑɑ bɑɑk n tiɑɔnŋ bijɑ nɑ wɑɑ.›
Ŋɑɑn k kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ yet b lieb ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ tɑn sii tie kpɑɑb nɑ dɑɑnɔ dɑsiɑl e nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k tin kpi’u mɑn, ŋɑɑn k kpɑɑb nɑ n kpɑnt t yɑl.›
K b suol’ɔ k kpii’u k nyii nɑn’ɔ kpɑkpinŋ po k lu.»
K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «I dukn k kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑ tien nlee? U sɑɑ bɑɑl k tɑn kpi kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ e, ŋɑɑn jii kpɑɑb nɑ k tien kpɑɑlieb nii ni.
Ŋɑnn e k *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm yɑbi b mɔnŋ ɑ bin suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn b mi nɑn wɑɑ yin bɑljouk mɑnŋ nɑ, l sɑɑn gɑɑn b pɑɑk e. Ŋɑɑn k b tiin nibul nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni. L pɑɑk k b nyik’ɔ ŋɑɑn yɑɑt.
Ŋɑnn e k jɑɑnti yudɑnm, *senniwɑntieb nɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ sɑɑkɑb tun Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nɑn kpɑnbɑl *Heluod puolpo juɑmu nɑ ni siɑb Yiesu buol ni ɑ bin tɑn boi’ɔ buboit k lɑ u mɔbonkpetl.

K b tɑn bɑɑl k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t mi nɑn ɑ piɑk bɑlmɔni, k k mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn niib nbɑ sɑɑ dukn l po biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ k mɔk ningɑnni niib buol ni. Ŋɑɑn ɑ wɑnt niib Yennu sɔnu nɑn bɑlmɔni. Ŋɑnn yet’t, t *senni cɑb’t nɑn tii pɑ lɑnpo kii tien Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl, ɑmi t dɑɑ pɑ?»
K Yiesu bɑnn b sel nbɑ k b tie nɑ, k jiin’m ɑ: «Bee k i luon k yin piin’n bɑluk u? Bɑɑt mɑn nɑn liklib k n got.»
K b bɑɑl nɑn’n. Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Ŋmee nɑɑɔnŋ nɑn sɑnn e be l pɑɑk nɑ?» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl yɑl e.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, ii yenn i pɑ kii tien Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl lin nbɑ tie u yɑl, ŋɑɑn kii mun i pɑ kii tien Yennu lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl.» K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b bonciɑnn nɑn Yiesu.
*Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ, bin nbɑ din tuu yɑɑ ɑ niib tɑn kɑn fiil kuun ni nɑ, din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ:
«Wɑntuɑ, Muois din diɑn senni k yet ɑ: ‹Juɑ i kpo ŋɑɑn nyik u ŋɑɑpuo, ŋɑɑn k b k mɑl wɑɑs, l ŋɑn k u ninjɑ n fɑɑl pɑkuɑk nɑ k mɑl wɑɑs k tul kpiemɔ nɑ.›
Tɔn, jɑb bɑnlole din be k tie ninjɑnn, k sɑɑkuɑ po tɑn kuɑn puo, ŋɑɑn kpo k k mɑl wɑɑs.
Ŋɑnn e k wun nbɑ wɑɑ u pɑɑk nɑ fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn mun tɑn kpo k wɑɑs kɑɑ, k wun nbɑ wɑɑ bɑntɑ nɑ ni mun fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ biɑk, ŋɑɑn mun tɑn kpo, k k mɑl wɑɑs nɑn’ɔ.
Nnɑ e k bin nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ kul ɑ kuɑn puo mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn tɑn kpo, k b suɑ k mɑl bik nɑn’ɔ. L puolpo, k puo mɑnŋ mun tɑn kpo juont.
Tɔn, k kpienm fiilu dɑɑl, b ŋmee tɑn sii yen puo mɑnŋ i? K mɑɑn b bɑnlole mɑnŋ kul ɑ din kuɑn’ɔ wɑɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I kpɑnn i mɔnŋ e. I mi l pɑɑk ii? I k mi Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk, k biɑ k mi u yiikuo.
Kpienm i tɑnŋ i fiil kuun ni, b tɑn sii tie nɑn *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be *Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ e. Puokuɑnt nɑn jɑkunt tɑn sii kɑɑ.

Nnɑlɑ, k jii jiin kpienm fiilu po, i k mi lii *Yennu sɔkni Muois diɑni ni siɑn nbɑ yien kunkonjɑgotuk tiik nɑ po nɑ ɑɑ? L diɑn k yet ɑ Yennu din yet Muois ɑ: ‹Min e tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm Yennu, nɑn Isɑɑk Yennu, nɑn Sɑɑkɔb Yennu.›
Yennu k tie kpienm Yennu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tie fuotb Yennu e. I k mi e.»

Tɔn, senniwɑntɔsuɑ din be lenŋ k gbɑt Yiesu nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ nɑ lɑbɑfɑɑnu mɑnŋ, k lɑ Yiesu nbɑ jiin b buboit mɑnŋ fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ. L pɑɑk k u bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k mun tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «K senlɑnu po e kpɑn tie senjɑɑnn i?»
K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Lin nbɑ tie senjɑɑnn tie nnɑ e: ‹Islɑɑeltieb, gbiintl mɑn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu tie Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e.
‹Ii luon mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nɑn i pɑlɑ kul, nɑn i sei kul, nɑn i dudukt kul, nɑn i pɑnŋ kul ɑ.›
Senjɑɑnn nbɑ pukn ŋɑnle tie nnɑ e: ‹Ii luon *ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.› Sensɑu ji kɑɑ k gɑl senni ŋɑnle nbɑ nɑ.»
K senniwɑntuɑ mɑnŋ yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ yɑbl ɑ. A yet bɑlmɔni e, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu tie Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e, k yensɑu ji kɑɑ k pukn u po,

ɑ nisɑɑlk i luon Yennu e nɑn u pɑl kul ɑ, nɑn u dudukt kul ɑ, nɑn u pɑnŋ kul ɑ, kii biɑ kii luon u luɑ nɑn wɑɑ luon u mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs bonciɑnn nɑn nilɔ n sɑk senni nbɑ ŋɑnle nɑ k gɑl wun jii bonkobt k mɑnn mɑnnsɑu k tul Yennu.»
Yiesu nbɑ lɑ k u jiin nɑn yɑn nɑ, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «A k fɔk nɑn Yennu nɑɑn.» Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo k suɑ ji din k mɔk pɑl nɑn wun boi Yiesu buboisiɑt
Yiesu nbɑ din tumi niib Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k u tɑn boi’b buboit ɑ: «Bee k senniwɑntieb yɑɑ ɑ *Klistu tie * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?
K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm din ŋmɑktl Dɑɑfiid k u tiɑɔnŋ yet ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu din yet n Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ Kɑln n niidiitu po mɔkmɔk nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ te fɑn ŋmɑɑ ɑ dɑtɑi ɑ tɑɑpɑɔnŋ ni.›
Dɑɑfiid mɔnŋ mɔnŋ nbɑ din yiin Klistu nɑ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ,› k nlee k b yien ɑ Klistu nɑ tie ŋuɑ Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?» Nibul bonciɑnn din gbiint Yiesu wɑnnu mɑnŋ nɑn pɑlpienn.
Wɑɑ wɑnn’b nɑ k u yet’b ɑ: «Ii mi senniwɑntieb nɑ po mɑn. Ŋɑnm e luon bii liɑ bɑɑnt kii lin kii sonm, kii biɑ kii gɑɑn bulcinfuonti dɑi ni nɑ.
B i kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, b luon bii kɑɑl nijɑɑnɑ kɑɑni pɑɑk, k b i sɑɑn jɑɑnm ni, b biɑ luon yudɑnm kinkɑɑni boɑ e.
Ŋɑnm e biɑ di pɑkɔi fobt, ŋɑɑn ji tuu jen ɑ k mei Yennu k wei, ɑ bin wɑnn b mɔnŋ nɑn b tie niŋɑnm e. B buolu tubdɑtu tɑn sii bi bonciɑnn.»
Tɔn, k Yiesu kɑl Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni k kpiɑ nɑn Yennu piini lɑkl, ŋɑɑn goli niib nbɑ kpie b likli biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K mɔktɑ bonciɑnn kpie likyulɑ bonciɑnn,
ŋɑɑn k pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnsuɑ mun tɑn bɑɑl kpien jinjennbɑ ŋɑnle. Ŋɑnn e tie kuuk nɑ.
K Yiesu yiin u *puolpoweitieb k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ kpien piini nbɑ yɑb piini lɑkl nɑ ni k gɑl suɑ kul,
k mɑɑn b kul pɑɑt b piini b mɔknciɑɔnŋ ni e, ŋɑɑn pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ ŋɑnin tul lin nbɑ kul k u mɔk e.»
Yiesu nbɑ nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k u *puolpoweitieb yenɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, gotl tɑnŋɑnɑ nɑn digbenŋɑ nɑ jiɑk.»
K u jiin ɑ: «A lɑ digbenŋɑ mɑnŋ ɑɑ? Ŋɑɑn b tɑn sɑɑ tut l kul k lu tinŋ ni wɑɑ, k nɑn fiɑkl tɑn kɑn tenn.»
K Yiesu din tɑn sɑɑn kɑl *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tuɑnn po, k Piɑl nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn nɑn Andle tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni, b kuukuɑ, k boi’ɔ ɑ:
«Yet’t, biɑ yuo e k nɑn fiɑkl ɑ tɑn kɑn tenn i? K bee tɑn sɑɑ tun k wɑnn nɑn l yuo mɑnŋ pel nɑ k l kul ɑ n tɑn tien’i?»
K u yet’b ɑ: «Ii cek mɑn, k dɑɑ te k suɑ n kpɑnn’i mɑn.
Niib bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k tɑɑn n sɑnn k yien ɑ: ‹N tie *Klistu e›, k kpɑnn niib bonciɑnn.
I tɑn sii gbiɑ tɔbi dɑnml nnɑ, nɑn bɑnfɔkl, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. L bonbuolu tɑn sɑɑ fɑbl ɑ l tun, ŋɑɑn l kɑn wɑnn ɑ l juontu e nɑ.

«Nibuolu nɑn nibuolu tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn lieb, k kpɑnbɑl nɑn kpɑnbɑl mun tɑn sɑɑ tuok k kɔn nɑn lieb. Tinŋ jijekt tɑn sii be tingbounŋ nɑ lokɑ kul po. K kon tɑn sii bɑɑ. Lin nbɑ nɑ tɑn sii tie nɑn mɑtyiɑlu pinpiik nɑ e.
«Ii cek i mɔnŋ pɑɑk mɑn. B tɑn sɑɑ suol’i k sɑɑn nɑn’i buut-dɑnm buol ni, k buo’i *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni. I tɑn sɑɑ set tini yudɑnm nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ tuɑnn ni, n sɑnn pɑɑk, k di n *siɑlɑ b buol ni.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tingbounŋ nibuolu kul ɑ n gbɑt n lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ e wɑɑ.

B i tɑnŋ i suol’i k sɑɑn nɑn’i buut buol ni yuo nbɑ, i dɑɑ te k l dɑɑmi’i nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ. L yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, yin pɑk mɑɑn nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl i mɔi ni, k mɑɑn l kii tie yinm kɑɑ piɑk, ŋɑɑn l sii tie Foŋɑnm.
L yuo mɑnŋ, nilɔ tuu tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninjɑ k bin kpi’u, k bɑɑnbɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ tun nnɑ e k tul b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑɑs, k wɑɑs mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn b dɑnm, k cɑb’b nɑn kuun.
K suɑ kul ɑ tɑn sii nɑn’i k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tɑn gubn nɑn fɑlɑ yuo mɑnŋ juontu, tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.»

«I tɑn sɑɑ lɑ k bonbilɑnkɑnt nbɑ biil bonɑ bonciɑnn sie lɑ bo kii ŋɑn nɑn lii sie siɑn nbɑ. (Wun nbɑ tɑn lii diɑni nɑ, wun bɑnn lɑɑ wɑnt lin nbɑ.) L yuo mɑnŋ, bin nbɑ tɑn be Suude tinŋ ni, bin ciɑl k do juɑt.
Nisuɑ nbɑ i tɑnŋ i be u dituɑtuk pɑɑk, u ji tɑn dɑɑ siik kuɑ u dieok ni ɑ wun jii siɑl.
K nisuɑ nbɑ tɑn sii be kpɑɑb ni, u dɑɑ ŋmɑt ɑ wun jii u liɑtfuouk.
L yuo mɑnŋ, tinpunmɑ nɑn bin nbɑ diɑ wɑlɑi tɑn sɑɑ di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn.
Ii mei Yennu mɑn k u dɑɑ te k fɑlɑ nɑ bɑɑt wonfufuk yuo,
k mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ pinpiik ni wɑɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, suɑ dɑɑ k mi lɑ ninbɔnŋ k l bi k bɑɑl ninbɔnŋ nbɑ tɑn sii be dɑɑ mɑnŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ. K nunbɔnsiɑk mun ji kɑn mi be nɑn ŋɑnn nɑ.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ i bo i kii wɑt dɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑbnt, suɑ bo tɑn kɑn biɑl u mɑnfuol ni, ŋɑɑn u nigɑnnkɑb pɑɑk k u wɑt dɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑbnt.
«L yuo mɑnŋ, suɑ i tɑnŋ i yet’i ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn Klistu be nnɑ,› ɑmi nɑ wɑɑ, i dɑɑ tie’u yɑdɑ,
k mɑɑn fɑɑk Klistunbɑ nɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k tuun nyinɑ nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ, ɑ bin kpɑnn Yennu nigɑnnkɑb, l i bo i sɑɑ fit.
N ponŋ yet’i bonsiɑl kul e sinsinn ɑ, k suɑ yuo mɑnŋ dɑɑ k bɑɑl. Ŋɑɑn i cek mɑn fɑnu.»
«Fɑlɑ nɑ puolpo e, k yennu nɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɔnn, k ŋmɑɑlk ji kɑn yent,
k ŋmɑɑbilɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k bɑɑ, k lin bɑɑ kul be sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn sɑɑ jekl.
L yuo mɑnŋ k niib sɑɑ lɑ k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ ni nɑn yiikuo nɑn *yudɑnt bonciɑnn.
U tɑn sɑɑ tun *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tingbounŋ nɑ lokɑ ŋɑnnɑ nɑ kul po k bin tikl Yennu nigɑnnkɑb k lɑk’m.»
«Ii ji fiigie k tumi yɑn mɑn. Yɑɑ tuu lɑ k tiik mɑnŋ bintl yuo nbɑ nɑ, i ji tuu mi nɑn siɑɔk pel e nɑ.
Nnɑ e mun yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑɑt k lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul tuun, yin bɑnn nɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ jenu mɑnŋ pel e nɑ, l ji kɑn wei.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ kɑn kpo k gbenn kɑɑ wɑɑ k lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun.
Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ bot ɑ, ŋɑɑn n mɑɑn ŋɑnin kɑn mi k bot fɑb ɑ.»
«Suɑ k mi l dɑɑl mɑnŋ ɑmi l yuo. Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be *Yendɔunŋ ni k mi, k Yennu Bijɑ biɑ k mi. Bɑɑ Yennu kuukuɑ e mi.
Ii cek mɑn, k dɑɑ guɑnt, k mɑɑn i k mi dɑɑl nbɑ k yuo mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
L tɑn sii tie nɑn jɑsuɑ nbɑ nyii u ŋɑɑk ni k yɑɑt sɑɑ sɔnbɑnfɔkl, k cɑb u ŋɑɑjɑb yiikuo ɑ bii diɑ u ŋɑɑk, k biɑ cent b kul ɑ tuonɑ, k yet u ŋɑguulɔ ɑ wuu guu, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn.
Ii mun i guu mɑn, k mɑɑn i k mi yuo nbɑ k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ jen, pɑsiɑl dɑɑjuouk o, ɑmi tɑnsuuni e, ɑmi sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl e, ɑmi sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni e.
L i tie k u jen yiɑn ɑ, i dɑɑ te k wun lɑ’i k i guɑnt.
L pɑɑk, mɑɑ yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ, n yien suɑ kul e, ii guu mɑn.»

Tɔn, dɑɑ ŋɑnle din biɑl nɑn *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nɑn dɑɑ nbɑ k b di pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din tuu k tie * dɑtinŋ nɑ n piin, k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb luon sɔnu ɑ bin bɔl suol Yiesu k kpi’u, k yien ɑ:
«T dɑɑ so’u jɑɑnm nɑ dɑɑ nɑ ni, k mɑɑn kpikpiluk sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ.»

Tɔn, k Yiesu din be Betɑɑni, juɑ nbɑ din tuu tie gbɑɑtl, k b yi’u Siimɔn nɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k di jiet. L yuo k puosuɑ tɑn kuɑ nɑn sɑlenŋɑnn, k l gbie nɑn tulɑɑli nbɑ mɔk nublu bonciɑnn nɑ wɑɑ, k l dɑɑɔk biɑ pɑɑl bonciɑnn, k b yi’l nɑɑl nɑ. K puo mɑnŋ biit sɑlenn nɑ k but tulɑɑli mɑnŋ Yiesu yul pɑɑk.
K nisiɑb nbɑ din be lenŋ nɑ piɑk nɑn wutuol k yien ɑ: «Bee tien k u biil tulɑɑli nɑ nnɑ?
B bo sɑɑ fit kɔi’l k lɑ likli k lin gɑl denienbɑ kobi ŋɑntɑ (300) wɑɑ, k bo jii’l sonm tɑlɑs-dɑnm.» K b jii puo mɑnŋ nɑn mɔdunŋ bonciɑnn.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Nyikn puo nɑ. Bonŋɑnn e k u tun k tul’n mɑnŋ, k bee k i kpiln’mɔ nnɑ?
Tɑlɑs-dɑnm sii tun be i buol ni yuo kul ɑ, k i sɑɑ fit sonm’b yuo nbɑ kul k i luon, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kii tun be nnɑ kɑɑ.
Puo mɑnŋ tun wɑɑ sɑɑ fit tun lin nbɑ e k tul’n. Wɑɑ but tulɑɑli nbɑ n gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk nɑ, u tien n kuun piinu siil e.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, siɑn nbɑ kul k b sɑɑ muɑnt n lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, b biɑ sɑɑ muɑnt puo mɑnŋ nbɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ, k lii tie tiɑlu e k tul’ɔ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ yenɔ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt nɑ, din sɑɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm buol ni ɑ wun kɔi Yiesu.
Bɑɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ nɑ, b pɑlɑ penn, k b senn mɔsonn ɑ b sɑɑ tul’ɔ likli l pɑɑk. K u ji piin luon sɔnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ jii Yiesu k kubn’ɔ b nuu ni.

Tɔn, l dɑɑl nbɑ din tie dɑsinsinn nbɑ k b tuu di pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din tuu k tie dɑtinŋ nɑ, l dɑɑl e k b din tuu kpi pebis k tien *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ, k Yiesu *puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «A luon k tin sɑɑn lee k sɑɑ tien jɑɑnm mɑnŋ jiet siil k tul’ɑ ni i?»
K u tun b ni bɑnle k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ duo nɑ ni mɑn, k i sɑɑ sɑɑ cet jɑsuɑ k u jii nyunsuɑl. Ii wɑɑ’u mɑn
nɑn ŋɑɑk nbɑ k u sɑɑ sɑɑ kuɑ nɑ ni, k yet l ŋɑɑk dɑɑnɔ ɑ: ‹Wɑntuɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ tin boi’ɑ ɑ sɑɑnm dieok nbɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb sɑɑ di *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ be lee?›
K u sɑɑ wɑnn’i dituɑtuk nbɑ yɑb k ponŋ tien bonsiɑ kul siil ɑ, k yin tien jiet mɑnŋ lenŋ.»
K Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle mɑnŋ sɑɑn duo mɑnŋ ni, k set sɑɑ lɑ k siɑl kul ɑ tun l biɑnŋ ni nɑn wɑɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K b tien jɑɑnm mɑnŋ jiet siil.
K Yiesu nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ tɑn bɑɑl dɑɑjuouk.
Bɑɑ kɑl k di jiet yuo nbɑ, k u tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, min nɑn i yenɔ nbɑ di jiet nɑ, l dɑɑnɔ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n e.»
K l biil b pɑlɑ ni, k b boi’ɔ yenɔ yenɔ ɑ: «A yien min ee?»
K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «L lek tie yinm tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ nbɑ k min nɑn ŋuɑ lɑki tuun senn-yienŋ ni k di jiet nɑ e.
*Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ set sɑɑ kpo nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn bonbiil sii be dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n nɑ pɑɑk. B ii dinŋ ii bo i kii mɑl l dɑɑnɔ gbɑɑ, l bo din sii sɔ u po.»
Bɑɑ kɑl k di jiet mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu jii pɑɑnu k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit’l k tul u puolpoweitieb, k yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt mɑn. Nɑ e tie n gbɑnɑnt.»
Ŋɑnn e k u biɑ jii *kɔp nɑn dɑmunŋ k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, k jii k tul’b. K b kul ɑ nyuu.
K u yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ e tie n sɔn nbɑ sɑɑ nyi n gbɑnɑnt ni niib bonciɑnn pɑɑk, k l wɑnn nɑn Yennu *lol lolpɑɑnn.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, n ji kɑn mi k nyu dɑmunŋ nɑ sie dɑɑl nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ nyu l dɑmunpɑɑnn Yennu nɑɑn ni nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k b yin Yenjiɑntu *yɑni, ŋɑɑn nyii k sɑɑn *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I kul ɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tin k nyik’n ɑ, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹N tɑn sɑɑ kpi pekpɑɑlk nɑ, k pei nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tin yɑt.›
Ŋɑɑn mi i tɑnŋ i fiil kuun ni, l puolpo n sɑɑ dɔnŋ k gɑl i tuɑnn k sɑɑn Gɑɑliile.»
K Piɑl jiin yet ɑ: «N lieb nɑ kul i lek i nyik’ɑ, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kɑn nyik’ɑ ni.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, nyiɑɔk nɑ, ɑ sɑɑ noi ɑ ɑ k mi’n tɑɑl muntɑ e wɑɑ k kojouk n bui liel tɑɑl munle.»
K Piɑl ŋɑnm yet nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «L i lek i tie ɑ min nɑn fin n lɑkn kpo gbɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n kɑn mi k noi ɑ n k mi’ɑ ni.» K u lieb nɑ mun biɑ yet nnɑ.
L puolpo k Yiesu nɑn u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b yi Getsemɑɑne nɑ. Lenŋ e k u yet’b ɑ: «Kɑln nnɑ mɑn ŋɑɑn k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ miɑl Yennu.»
Ŋɑnn e k u jii Piɑl nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn k sɑɑn. K u yɑn put k u pɑl biil bonciɑnn,
k u yet’b ɑ: «Pɑlbiil buolu nbɑ suol’n nɑ pel lin kpi’n ɑ. Biɑt nnɑ mɑn kii nyɔi.»
Ŋɑnn e k u cɑt k sɑɑn tuɑnn po wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k bɑɑ fɑbn, k mei Yennu ɑ l i bo i sɑɑ fit, Yennu n ŋɑɑn k fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt u pɑɑk nɑ n yɑkl’ɔ, k yet ɑ:
«Abbɑ! n Bɑɑ, ɑ sɑɑ fit tun bonsiɑl kul ɑ. Dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k n kuɑ bonbiil nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ te k l tie mɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn te k lin tien fɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ e.»
Ŋɑnn e k u tunn k jen u puolpoweitieb bɑntɑ nɑ buol ni, k suɑ k b tɑɑn guɑn ɑ. K u boi Piɑl ɑ: «Siimɔn, ɑ guɑnt ee? A kɑn fit kii nyɔi wɑɑn ii?»
ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Ii nyɔi mɑn ŋɑɑn kii mei Yennu k i tɑn dɑɑ kuɑ jinjɑnmi ni. I sei ŋɑnin luon lin tun lin nbɑ siɑn, ŋɑɑn k i gbɑnɑnt kɑɑ pɑnŋ.»
K u biɑ sɑɑn Yenmiɑlu k sɑɑ mei nɑn wɑɑ bo miɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ sinsinn nɑ,
ŋɑɑn biɑ ŋmɑt k sɑɑ bɑɑl suɑ k u puolpoweitieb nɑ biɑ guɑn ɑ, k mɑɑn guɑn mɔk’b bonciɑnn. K b k mi bɑɑ sɑɑ yet’ɔ lin nbɑ l yuo mɑnŋ.
Wɑɑ tɑn jen tɑɑpɑɔnŋ muntɑ ni, k u boi’b ɑ: «I biɑ lek dɑɑ duɑ guɑnt e k foi ii? L jɑnŋ ɑ mɑn. Yuo mɑnŋ bɑɑl nɑ. Gotl mɑn, b ji kuɑt Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ k tien’ɔ biitdɑnm nuu ni wɑɑ.
Fiit mɑn k tin sɑɑn. Wun nbɑ nyii n puol nɑ bɑɑt.»

Yiesu nbɑ dɑɑ piɑk nɑ, k u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ, wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Suudɑ nɑ, bɑɑl nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ, k b siɑb diɑ juk-bɑnjɑi, k siɑb mun diɑ gbɑjɑlɑ, k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑn sɑɑkɑb tun’m.
K mɔlɑnfikdɑɑnɔ Suudɑ mɑnŋ ponŋ wɑnn’b nyinsiɑl ɑ, ɑ: «Mi i sɑi fuont wun nbɑ k muɑt u tɑnkpinn, yi mi nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ. Yin suol’ɔ kii guu’u kii sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ mɑn.»
Suudɑ nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u sɑɑn Yiesu buol ni k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ.» ŋɑɑn muɑt u tɑnkpinn.
K niib nɑ ji suol Yiesu k kub’ɔ kenken.
Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb ni yenɔ nbɑ sie lenŋ tɑn nuɑt u juk-bɑnjiɑk k cuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ dɑɑbl tubl k lu.
K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «I bɑɑl nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi nɑn gbɑjɑlɑ nɑ ɑ i tɑn suol’n nɑn n tie fɑt-tuɑ e nɑ ɑɑ?
N dɑɑn tuu be i buol Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni dɑɑl kul ɑ k wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn, k i tuu k so’n, ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk diɑni mɑnŋ n tien gbien.»
K u puolpoweitieb nɑ kul ji ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
K nɑɑsinbisuɑ nnɑ din gbɑb cincenn kuukuɑ k wɑɑ Yiesu puolpo K b tɑn bib’ɔ k suol u cincenn,
k u nyik u cincenn mɑnŋ b nuu ni, ŋɑɑn ciɑl yɑnn.
K b jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑk, siɑn nbɑ k jɑɑnti yudɑnm, nɑn tinŋ nɑ ni sɑɑkɑb, nɑn senniwɑntieb din lɑkn.
K Piɑl din be Yiesu puolpo k wɑɑ bɑnfɔkl ɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn bɑɑ tɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk ni. K Piɑl sɑɑn kɑl k pukn sejebit nɑ po k b nɑni muu.
Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ kul yɑbl b mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ bin lɑ siɑlɑɑdɑnm mɔb ni lin nbɑ k b sɑɑ jii Yiesu biit k kpi’u, ŋɑɑn kɔnŋ u bisiɑt.
Siɑlɑɑdɑnm bonciɑnn din fɑ fɑi k tien’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k b fɑi mɑnŋ din k wei liel.
L yuo k jɑsiɑb fiil set k fɑɑl fɑɑk tul’ɔ ɑ:
«T gbɑt k u yet ɑ u sɑɑ bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ k niib din mɑɑ nɑn b nii nɑ, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni k u sɑɑ jii k mɑɑ’l, k l tɑn kii tie nilɔ nii kɑɑ mɑɑ’l.»
Ŋɑɑn l kul yɑnn. B fɑi mɑnŋ lek biɑ din k wei liel.
Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ fiil k boi Yiesu ɑ: «Bɑli nbɑ k jɑb mɑnŋ piɑk k tien’ɑ nɑ po, l pɑɑk tie bee? A k mɔk l jiinu uu?»
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu lek ŋmin ɑ, k k jiin siɑl. K u biɑ ŋɑnm boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e set tie *Klistu wun nbɑ tie ŋuɑ Yennu nbɑ k t dont’ɔ nɑ Bijɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Nnn, min e nɑ. K i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k u kɑl Yɑbnt Yennu niidiitu po, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’u k u be sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ ni k siik.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ wutuol duo k u suol u mɔnŋ tiɑt k pɑt, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Bee te k t ji luon siɑlsuɑ.
I mɔnŋ gbɑt wɑɑ piɑk k biil Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ. I duki nlee?» K b kul sɑk ɑ u biil ɑ, u kpɑn ŋɑn nɑn kuun e.
K b siɑb siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, k b piit u nunm po, ŋɑɑn lubn’ɔ nikulɑ k yien’ɔ ɑ: «Buntl wun nbɑ peb’ɑ nɑ.» K sejebit nɑ suol’ɔ, k jɑk’ɔ nɑn tɑnpɑki.
Tɔn, Piɑl lek dɑɑ din be nɑn-yel po k nɑni muu, k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑsɑpɑɑntuontun-yenɔ tɑn bɑɑl lɑ’u,
k got’ɔ silll, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «A mun tuu wɑɑ Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu mɑnŋ.»
K Piɑl noi k yet ɑ: «N k mi. N k gbɑt fɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk,» ŋɑɑn fiil nyii.
K sɑpɑɑmɔ nɑ biɑ lɑ’u lenŋ k ŋɑnmt yien nisiɑb nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ mun tie u puolpoweitieb nɑ yenɔ e.»
Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl biɑ ŋɑnm noi. K l biɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ k bin nbɑ sie lenŋ mɑnŋ ŋɑnm jɑk Piɑl ɑ: «A set tie niib nɑ ni yenɔ e, k mɑɑn ɑ mun tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl pol ɑ: «L i tie k n fɑɑl fɑɑk i e, Yennu n dɑt n tubl, min k mi juɑ nbɑ k i piɑk u po nɑ.»
L yuo mɑnŋ k kojouk bui k pukn tɑɑpɑɔnŋ munle ni, k Piɑl ji tiɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yiesu yet’ɔ nɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ yet ɑ ɑ k mi’n tɑɑl muntɑ e wɑɑ, ɑ k kojouk n tɑn bui tɑɑl munle ni.» L yuo k Piɑl mɔ.

K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm, nɑn tinŋ nɑ ni sɑɑkɑb, nɑn *senniwɑntieb, nɑn *Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb kul lɑkn sɑn-nyɑpob ni, k lol lolɑ, k bɑɑn Yiesu bɑnt k jii’u sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ k b yi’u *Piilɑɑt nɑ buol.
K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e set tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ ɑɑ?» K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Fin yɑɑ.»
K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm mɑnŋ tɑɑl Yiesu bonɑ bonciɑnn pɑɑk.
K Piilɑɑt biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «A kɑn jiin siɑl ii? Gbiintl bɑɑ wɑɑ’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu k jiin siɑl, k l ji bɑkt Piilɑɑt.
Tɔn, *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm dinu yuo kul, Piilɑɑt tuu nyinn niyenɔ kuɑ e dɑnsɑlk ni, wun nbɑ k niib luon bin ŋɑɑ’u.
L yuo mɑnŋ k jɑsuɑ din be dɑnsɑlk, k u sɑnn yi Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs. Ŋuɑ nɑn nisiɑb din be dɑnsɑlk k mɑɑn b kpikpiluk nbɑ k b dɑɑn tie duo nɑ ni k kpii nilɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k nibul mɑnŋ din lɑkn k mei Piilɑɑt ɑ wun tun wɑɑ din tuu tuun bɑnnu nbɑ yɑɑnn.
K u boi’b ɑ: «I luon k n nyinn Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ ee?»
K mɑɑn u din mi fɑnu nɑn jɑɑnti yudɑnm *funfunn pɑɑk e te k b jii Yiesu k tien u nuu ni.
Ŋɑɑn k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm mɑnŋ din wɑɑ tik nibul nɑ ɑ bin yet’ɔ k wun nyinn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs e k tul’b.
K Piilɑɑt biɑ ŋɑnm boi’b ɑ: «K wun nbɑ k i yi’u Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ, i luon k n tien’ɔ nlee?»
K b tiɑn jiin sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
K Piilɑɑt boi’b ɑ: «Bee pɑɑk i? U biit mɑntk tie lɑnn po e?» K b biɑ ŋɑnm tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
K Piilɑɑt luon wun penn nibul mɑnŋ pɑlɑ, l pɑɑk k u nyinn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs tul’b, ŋɑɑn te k b buo Yiesu, k jii’u tul’b ɑ bin kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
K sejenm jii Yiesu k kuɑ nɑn’ɔ tinŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ Piilɑɑt ŋɑɑdundounŋ ni, k yiin b tɔk-nɑn-lieb kul.
K b jii bɑɑnmunŋ nnɑ k lɑnn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn jii kunkoni k luu nɑɑn foklk k yiln’mɔ,
ŋɑɑn ji fuont’ɔ ɑ: «Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl, fuontu wɑɑ.»
ŋɑɑn jii lɑnbɑnbik k fɑɑ u yul pɑɑk, k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk, k gbɑɑ b dunɑ pɑɑk u tuɑnn ni.
Bɑɑ dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b liɑt bɑɑnmunŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ tiɑt nɑ k lɑnn’ɔ, k jii’u k nyii nɑn’ɔ ɑ bin sɑɑn kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
L yuo k Siilenn jɑsuɑ din be, k u sɑnn yi Siimɔn, wun nbɑ tie Aleksɑndl nɑn Lufus bɑɑ nɑ, k u nyii kpɑɑnt ni k gɑɑl lenŋ. K sejenm miɑ’u ɑ wun gɑɑl Yiesu kuun dɑpunpunn nɑ k jii.
K b jii Yiesu k sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ siɑn nbɑ k b yi’l Golgotɑ, k l pɑɑk tie: «Yukpɑbuk buol nɑ.»
Lenŋ e k nisiɑb din tul’ɔ dɑmunŋ nbɑ ŋmɑt nɑn nyɔksɑu nbɑ k b yi’l miil nɑ, ŋɑɑn k u yet l nyunu.
K sejenm kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn tol b lieb u tiɑt nɑ, ŋɑɑn tɔ tiɑtiɑ k cent u tiɑt mɑnŋ.
B din kpɑɑ’u sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni e, kut mun-yiɑ yuo.
K b din diɑn lin nbɑ pɑɑk te k b kpɑɑ’u k tɑbn u dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, k l yɑɑ ɑ: «Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl mɑnŋ e nɑ.»
B biɑ din kpɑɑ fɑt-tieb bɑnle dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk k pukn u po, k yenɔ din be u niidiitu po, k luɑ nɑ mun din be u niigɑnŋ po.
(K l gbien lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «B jii’u tien biitdɑnm sinsuuk ni.»)
Tɔn, k bin nbɑ sonm gɑɑl lenŋ nɑ gumi yulɑ ŋɑɑn suki’ɔ, k yien ɑ: «Fin. A tuu yɑɑ ɑ sɑɑ fit bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ŋɑɑn biɑ mɑɑ’l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni.
Tɔn, fɑn nyi dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk k sik k fɑt ɑ mɔnŋ.»
Nnɑ e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb mun biɑ lɑɑ’u, ŋɑɑn yien tien b lieb ɑ: «U tuu fɑɑl lieb, ŋɑɑn tɑn kɑn fit k fɑt u mɔnŋ.
Ŋɑɑnt k Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl, *Klistu nɑ, n nyi dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk k sik nnɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, k tin lɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.» K bin nbɑ k b pukn u po k kpɑɑ’b nɑ mun suki’ɔ.
Lɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl yensuuk ni yuo nbɑ, k duo nɑ kul ji din bɔnn k sɑɑ bɑɑl kut muntɑ.
Kut muntɑ yuo e, k Yiesu yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl, k yet ɑ: «Eloi, Eloi, lemɑ sɑɑbɑɑktɑɑni?» k l pɑɑk tie ɑ: «N Yennu n Yennu, bee k ɑ lu’n i?»
K bin nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ nbɑ gbɑt u yiini mɑnŋ, k b siɑb yet ɑ: «Gbiintl mɑn. U yi Elii e.»
Ŋɑnn e k b ni yenɔ tin k sɑɑ jii sɑɑpo k suunt dɑmiituk nnɑ ni, k jii sɑkn dɑɑɔk pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn donn k tul’ɔ ɑ wun nyu, k biɑ yet ɑ: «I ŋɑɑn k tii guu k lɑɑn Elii bɑɑt ɑ wun sikn’ɔ dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk.»
K Yiesu ŋɑnm yikn nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl, ŋɑɑn nɑk l yuo.
L yuo nɑ k cincenn nbɑ tuu juɑn k puun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ ji bɔkt l yul pɑɑk k tɑn sik tinŋ ni.
K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ din sie dɑpunpunn mɑnŋ buol nɑ, wɑɑ lɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yiesu kpo nɑ, k u ji yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e, juɑ nɑ set tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
Tɔn, Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli nɑn Mɑɑli wun nbɑ din tie Sose nɑn Sɑɑk bik nɑɑ nɑ, nɑn Sɑɑlome din be, k b din pukn puosiɑb po k sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ ŋɑɑn goli.
B ponŋ din wɑɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u din be Gɑɑliile ni e wɑɑ k sonmt’ɔ. Puolieb bonciɑnn nbɑ wei Yiesu k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm nɑ mun biɑ din be lenŋ.
Piilɑɑt nbɑ din gbɑt ɑ Yiesu ponŋ kpo wɑɑ nɑ, k l ji yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’ɔ, k u yiin sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ wun lɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ kpo l wei wɑɑ?
Yuo nbɑ k u gbɑt yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ mɔb ni nɑ, k u yiin Suosiɑf mɑnŋ k tɑn cɑb’ɔ ɑ wun jii Yiesu gbɑnɑnt nɑ.
K Suosiɑf din dɑɑ kɑtinŋ, k kpɑɑt Yiesu gbɑnɑnt dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, k pɔbn’ɔ lenŋ, k jii’u k pii kɑɑɔk nbɑ k b ponŋ din jiɑl tɑnpiiuk, k bikt kɑtɑnu, k biin l mɔb nɑ.
K Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli nɑn Mɑɑli wun nbɑ din tie Sose nɑɑ nɑ din lɑ siɑn nbɑ k b pii Yiesu gbɑnɑnt mɑnŋ ɑ.
*Fuondɑɑl nbɑ din tɑn gɑl nɑ, k Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, nɑn Sɑɑlome, nɑn Mɑɑli wun nbɑ din tie Sɑɑk nɑɑ nɑ, din sɑɑn k sɑɑ dɑɑ tulɑɑlnunubt ɑ bin sɑɑn but Yiesu gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk.
*Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl nbɑ din gɑl k l yent sɑn-nyɑpob ni k b din sɑɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol ni.
Bɑɑ kuɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni nɑ, b lɑ nɑɑsimɔ nnɑ, k u liɑ bɑɑnpieounŋ k kɑl niidiitu po, k l tien’m jijiet bonciɑnn.
K nɑɑsimɔ mɑnŋ yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ jie siɑl mɑn. I luon Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu nbɑ k b kpii’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑ e. U fiil kuun ni wɑɑ. U kɑɑ nnɑ. Gotl mɑn, bɑɑ dɑɑn bilɔ siɑn nbɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn i ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet Piɑl nɑn *puolpoweitelieb ɑ u gɑl i tuɑnn po k sɑɑn Gɑɑliile wɑɑ. Lenŋ e k i sɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ’u nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ dɑɑn yet’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit puob mɑnŋ, k b gbɑnɑnt jek bonciɑnn, k b nyii kɑɑɔk nɑ ni, k ciɑl. B lek k fɑɑ suɑ l lɑbɑɑl, k mɑɑn jɑŋmɑɑni din suol’b bonciɑnn.
[Tɔn, Yiesu nbɑ din fiil kuun ni lɑsl dɑɑl sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni nɑ, u din dɔnŋ dɔkt Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli pɑɑk e, wun nbɑ k u din nyinn nɑlnbiit bɑnlole u ni nɑ.
K puo mɑnŋ sɑɑn sɑɑ yet Yiesu wei-nɑn-lieb nbɑ mɔ k fɑbn nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ gbɑt ɑ Yiesu jen u mɑnfuol ni k u lɑ’u nɑ, b k sɑk tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
Lin nbɑ nɑ puolpo e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle siɑb din tɑn nyii duo nɑ ni k sonm sɔnu ni k sɑɑ siɑl buol, k u lebt u mɔnŋ k dɔkt b pɑɑk.
K b ŋmɑt jen duo nɑ ni k tɑn yet b lieb, ŋɑɑn k b lek k tien’m yɑdɑ.

L puolpo e biɑk k Yiesu tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ din kɑl k di jiet, k Yiesu tɑn dɔkt b pɑɑk, k kpil’b b yɑdɑ puɑln pɑɑk nɑn b tubɑ nbɑ kpɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn b k tien bin nbɑ lɑ nɑn u fiil kuun ni nɑ yɑdɑ.
K u biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ kii muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ k tul suɑ kul tingbounŋ nɑ kul sɑɑk ɑ po.
Wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ, k b wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu, u sɑɑ lɑ fielu, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kul k tien yɑdɑ, Yennu sɑɑ bu u buut k biil’ɔ wɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ sɑɑ tun yɑɑl-lituk tuonɑ nɑ e: b sii tɑɑn n sɑnn k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k biɑ piɑk mɑɑn nbɑ k b k mi pɑk.
B i tɑnŋ i suol wɑi, ɑmi b i tɑnŋ i nyuu bonbiil, l kɑn tien’m siɑl. B biɑ sɑɑ yii b nii bɑɑtb pɑɑk k b sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.»
Tɔn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu nbɑ pɑk mɑɑn nɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k Yennu te k u duo sɑnpɑɑpo k sɑɑ kɑl ŋuɑ Yennu niidiitu po.
L puolpo k u puolpoweitieb sɑɑn k sɑɑ muɑntl u lɑbɑmɑnn lokl kul po, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din be nɑn’m, k te k b tuun yɑɑl-lituk tuonɑ, k l tuonɑ nɑ din wɑnn *siɑlɑ ɑ b muɑnti mɑnŋ set tie bɑlmɔni e.]
Cɑnbɑɑ Teofiil: Niib bonciɑnn din lɑ Yennu nbɑ din tun lin nbɑ t sinsuuk ni l pinpiik ni nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ.
Bɑɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑn b ninbinɑ, b biɑ din wɑnn’t. Bin nbɑ din wɑnn’t lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnm e kpɑnt Yennu tuontunnɑ.
Ŋɑnn e te k n mɔnŋ boi k fiitl bonŋɑnn k lɑ l bonsiɑl kul nbɑ din piin biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑn lɑɑ din sɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ. Cɑnbɑɑ, n biɑ dukn nɑn l ŋɑn k n diɑn l kul k tul’ɑ
k ɑ fit bɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ kul k b wɑnn’ɑ nɑ, l set tie bɑlmɔni e.
Yuo nbɑ k *Heluod din tie Suude tinŋ kpɑnbɑl nɑ, k Yennu mɑnntɔsuɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Sɑɑkɑɑli, k u be Abiɑ pɑɑbu ni k tuun, k u ŋɑɑpuo mun din tie mɑnntuɑ *Aɑlɔn yɑɑbuonn e, k u sɑnn yi Eliisɑɑbet.
B bɑnle din mɔk binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm, k sɑɑk u mɔb *senni kul nyiknyik.
B din k mɔk bik, k mɑɑn Eliisɑɑbet din tie puokɑnmɑtl e, k b bɑnle kul biɑ ponŋ din kpet ɑ.
Dɑsiɑl k Sɑɑkɑɑli tuontun-yuo tɑn bɑɑl u pɑɑbu ni, k u din tɑn yɑɑ wun tun u tuonn k tul Yennu nɑn b pɑɑbu nbɑ tuu tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
L yuo nɑ k b din tɑn tɔ tiɑtiɑ nɑn b mɑnntieb kɑɑl nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, k lukt’ɔ ɑ wun kuɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k wubn bonnunubt.
K nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ kul din biɑl sie nɑn-yel k mei Yennu, yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din wubnt bonnunubt nɑ.
L yuo nɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ *mɑlɑkɑ dɔkt Sɑɑkɑɑli pɑɑk k set bonnunubt binbintl nɑ diitu po.
Sɑɑkɑɑli nbɑ din tɑn lɑ’u yuo nbɑ, k u yɑn put ŋmɑt, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn k mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sɑɑkɑɑli, dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Yennu ponŋ dɔnŋ gbɑt ɑ miɑlu wɑɑ, k ɑ ŋɑɑpuo Eliisɑɑbet tɑn sɑɑ mɑl bonjɑk k tul’ɑ, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ pul u sɑnn Sɑn.
K l tɑn sɑɑ mɑnŋ’ɑ k ɑ pɑl n penn, k niib bonciɑnn pɑlɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ penn u mɑɑlu mɑnŋ pɑɑk,
k mɑɑn u tɑn sii tie tuontunjɑɑnn e Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn. U kɑn mi k nyu dɑmunŋ ɑmi dɑbuolu kul nbɑ mɔ, k u tɑn sɑɑ gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm ŋɑɑn dɑɑ be u nɑɑ puol ni.
U tɑn sɑɑ te k Islɑɑeltieb bonciɑnn n ŋmɑt k jen Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu buol ni.

U sii mɔk siek nbɑ din be Elii ni nɑ nɑn u pɑnŋ k tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ liit Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ wun ŋɑnm bɑɑnbɑ nɑn b wɑɑs sinsuuk ni, k biɑ tunn mɔyetdɑnm yɑn k lii tie nɑn yentinu dɑnm yɑl nɑ, k biɑ te k niib n tien siil kii guu Yonmdɑɑnɔ.»
K Sɑɑkɑɑli ji din boi mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ, «N sɑɑ tien nlee k bɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ tie mɔni? K mɑɑn n kpet ɑ, k n ŋɑɑpuo mun biɑ kpet ɑ.»
K mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Min e tie Gɑbliel! Min e be Yennu tuɑnn k tuun u tuonn, k u tun’n ɑ buol, ɑ n tɑn yet’ɑ ŋɑɑn wɑnn’ɑ lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑɑ muu k kii fit piɑk i nɑn yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ tien mɔni nɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ k tien n mɑɑn nbɑ sɑɑ tien mɔni nɑ yɑdɑ.»
Tɔn, k niib nbɑ din biɑl sie nɑn-yel k guu Sɑɑkɑɑli, k l bɑkt’b k mɑɑn wɑɑ wei Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Wɑɑ ji din tɑn nyii yuo nbɑ, u din k fit piɑk, k b ji din bɑnn nɑn u lɑ yelntu e Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni, k u ji piɑk muutl k lɑbn nii k tien’m.
Yuo nbɑ k u tuonɑ din tɑn gbenn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nnɑ k u kun ŋɑɑk ni.
L puolpo e k u ŋɑɑpuo Eliisɑɑbet din tɑn suol puol, ŋɑɑn bɔli u mɔnŋ ŋɑɑk ni tɑɑtɑɑtɑ nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnŋmu,
k din tɑn yet u mɔnŋ ɑ nnɑ: «Nnɑ e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tun tul’n k tin’n ninbɑɑɔk k nyinn’n fei ni.»
Tɔn, Eliisɑɑbet puol suolu ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob ni e, k Yennu din tun u mɑlɑkɑ Gɑbliel ɑ wun sɑɑn duo nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni, k b yi duo mɑnŋ Nɑɑsɑɑlet,
k sɑɑ pɑk tul sɑpɑɑnmunn, wun nbɑ sɑnn tie Mɑɑli nɑ. Sɑpɑɑmɔ mɑnŋ din tie jɑsuɑ sɑlkpenŋ e, k u sɑnn din tie Suosiɑf k u tie kpɑnbɑl * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn.
K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Mɑɑli buol ni k fuont’ɔ ɑ: «Fuontu lɑɑ. Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑl mei ɑ pɑɑk, k u biɑ be nɑn’ɑ.»
Wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k Mɑɑli yɑn ji din put ŋmɑt bonciɑnn k sɑɑ bɑɑ nuɑk ni, k u ji duki fuonti mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ biɑ yet’ɔ, «Mɑɑli, dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn Yennu pɑl mei ɑ pɑɑk.
A tɑn sɑɑ suol puol k mɑl bonjɑk, k ɑ sɑɑ pul u sɑnn Yiesu.
U tɑn sii tie nijɑɑnn e, k b tɑn sii yi’u Yɑbnt Yennu Bijɑ. Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑɑ te k wun di u yejɑ Dɑɑfiid nɑɑn,
k u tɑn sii tie Sɑɑkɔb yɑɑbuonɑ ni Kpɑnbɑl nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k u nɑɑn mɑnŋ biɑ tɑn kɑn mi gbenn.»
K Mɑɑli boi mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «N dɑɑ tie sɑpɑɑnmunn e, k nlee k n sɑɑ suol puol i?»
K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Foŋɑnm sɑɑ sik ɑ pɑɑk, k Yɑbnt Yennu pɑnŋ sɑɑ sik bɑkn ɑ pɑɑk. L pɑɑk, bik nbɑ k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ tɑn sii tie niŋɑnɔ, k b sii yi’u Yennu Bijɑ.
Bɑnt nɑn ɑ niipuo Eliisɑɑbet, wun nbɑ kpet ɑ nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ u lek suol puol ɑ k sɑɑ mɑl bonjɑk. U puol ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob e nɑ, ŋuɑ nbɑ k b tuu yi’u puokɑnmɑtl.
K mɑɑn siɑl kɑɑ k Yennu kɑn fit tun.»
K Mɑɑli yet’ɔ, «Tɔn, n tie Yennu tuontunnɔ e. Ŋɑɑnt k lin tien nɑn fɑɑ yet’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.» K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ ji din yɑɑt ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
L puolpo k Mɑɑli din tɑn fiil k sɑɑn yiɑn yiɑn k sɑɑ juɑt nbɑ be Suude tingbounŋ ni buol, k sɑɑ bɑɑl dosɑu ni,
k kuɑ Sɑɑkɑɑli ŋɑɑk ni k fuont Eliisɑɑbet.
Yuo nbɑ k Eliisɑɑbet gbɑt Mɑɑli fuonti nɑ, k bik nbɑ dɑɑ be Eliisɑɑbet puol ni mɑnŋ ji din dɑnm. L yuo nɑ k Eliisɑɑbet gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm,
k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ, «Wui wui ɑ: Yennu yetŋɑnm be ɑ pɑɑk k gɑl puolieb kul ɑ, k u yetŋɑnm biɑ be bik nbɑ be ɑ puol ni nɑ pɑɑk.
L tien’n nlee nɑ k n Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl n buol nnɑ?
Mɑɑ gbɑt ɑ fuonti yuo nbɑ nɑ, k bik nbɑ be n puol nnɑ dɑnm nɑn pɑlpienn.
Fin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ k u pɑk tul’ɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien mɔni, pɑlpienn tie ɑ yɑl e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Mɑɑli ji din yet ɑ «N dont Yennu sɑnn n pɑl ni,
k mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn Yennu wun nbɑ tie n Fietuɑ nɑ pɑɑk,
k mɑɑn u tin min nbɑ tie u tuontunpuok nɑ ninbɑɑɔk, Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, nigbounŋ kul tɑn sii yien ɑ n tie pɑlpienn dɑɑnɔ e,
k mɑɑn Yennu tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ k tul’n, k u sɑnn tie sɑn-yienŋ.
U biɑ mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn nigbounŋ kul nbɑ tiin’ɔ lɑɑ nyii yejɑnm ni k sɑɑ tuu bɑɑnbɑ nɑn yɑbuontuɑt-tuɑt ni.
U tɑnt u nuu k tun pɑnŋ tuonɑ, k yɑt kɑlnbɑɑndɑnm k biil b lolɑ,
k liɑt kpɑnbɑlɑ b nɑɑn ni, ŋɑɑn donn sikn-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm,
k u nuɑb bonŋɑnɑ k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm, ŋɑɑn te k mɔktɑ ŋmɑt nɑn niikuoni.
U bɑɑl k sonm u tuontunnɑ Islɑɑeltieb, u k tɑnm u ninbɑtinu nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul
Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn u yejɑŋɑɑk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k l tie nɑn wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn k tul t yejɑnm nɑ.»
Tɔn, l din tien nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ nɑ k Mɑɑli dɑɑ be Eliisɑɑbet buol ni k tɑn ŋmɑt kun.
Eliisɑɑbet mɑtuk yuo din tɑn bɑɑl, k u mɑl bonjɑk.
K b ŋɑkpiɑsnbɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm din gbɑt biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tin’ɔ ninbɑɑɔk bonciɑnn nɑ, k b kul mɔk pɑlpienn.
Tɔn, k l dɑɑ ŋɑnniin dɑɑl e k b din bɑɑl ɑ bin pot bik mɑnŋ punn, k luon bin pul u sɑnn Sɑɑkɑɑli, nɑn u bɑɑ sɑnn nɑ,
ŋɑɑn k u nɑɑ jiin k tul’b ɑ: «Aɑi, u sɑnn sii yi Sɑn e.»
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «A dɑnm ni, suɑ sɑnn k yi Sɑn.»
Ŋɑnn e k b pɑk muutl ni nɑn bik mɑnŋ bɑɑ, ɑ bin boi k lɑɑn u luon bii yi u bik mɑnŋ sɑnn ɑ bee,
k u wɑnn muutl ni ɑ bin jii dɑpɔuk tul’ɔ. Bɑɑ jii k tul’ɔ k u diɑn ɑ: «Bik mɑnŋ sɑnn e tie Sɑn.» K l ji din bɑkt b kul ɑ.
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k Sɑɑkɑɑli muut k ji din piin mɑɑn pɑku k piɑk Yennu.
K jɑŋmɑɑni din suol b duo niib kul ɑ, k lɑbɑɑl nɑ din muɑnt yɑt digbɑnɑ kul nbɑ be Suude juɑt pɑɑk,
k l tul bin nbɑ kul din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ dudukt, k b boi b lieb, «Bik nɑ tɑn sii tie nibuol bee nɑ?» k mɑɑn Yennu pɑnŋ ponŋ din be nɑn’ɔ.
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Foŋɑnm din gbie nɑn bik mɑnŋ bɑɑ Sɑɑkɑɑli, k u sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn k yien ɑ:
«Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin pɑk Yonmdɑɑnɔ wun nbɑ tie tinm Islɑɑeltieb Yennu nɑ, k mɑɑn u bɑɑl ɑ wun sonm u niib k fɑt’b ŋɑɑ’b.
U tul’t Fietuɑ nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ k u nyii Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonɑ ni.
Yɑɑyuo ni k Yennu din pɑk mɑɑn u sɔknŋɑnm mɔi ni k tul’t,
k yien ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’t t dɑtɑi nii ni, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’t bin nbɑ kul nɑn’t nɑ nii ni.
U biɑ din yet ɑ u sii mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn t yejɑnm, k kɑn tɑnm u *lol
nbɑ k u din lol k tul t yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑ.
U din senn ɑ u sɑɑ nyinn’t t dɑtɑi nii ni, k tin fit jiɑnt’ɔ k jɑŋmɑɑnsɑi sii kɑɑ,
k t sii tie niŋɑnm nɑn niŋɑnm u buol ni nɑn t mɑnfuol gbennu.
N bik nɑ, b tɑn sii yi’ɑ: ‹Yɑbnt *Yennu sɔkni e.› A sɑɑ liit Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn k sɑɑ ŋɑnm u sɔni k tul’ɔ,
k wɑnn u niib k bin bɑnn nɑn u tɑn sɑɑ fiel’b wɑɑ sɑɑ nyik cɑb b biit nɑ pɑɑk,
k mɑɑn t Yennu mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn bulcint, k l pɑɑk, k u sɑɑ te k yentgbenŋl n nyi sɑɑnpɑɑpo k dɔkt t pɑɑk k tie nɑn yenduol nɑ,
k l tɑn sɑɑ yent sɑnpɑɑpo k tul bin nbɑ be bunbɔnn ni nɑn bin nbɑ be kuun miɑl ni, k l biɑ tɑn sɑɑ yent t tɑɑ ni k tin tɔkn mɑnu sɑnjouk ni.»
K Sɑn din kpɑɑtl k puki pɑnŋ u siek ni, k be muuk ni tɑɑtɑɑ nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k u din tɑn dɔkt Islɑɑeltieb buol ni nɑ.
L yuo nɑ k kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Ogust din tul mɔb ɑ bin diɑn suɑ kul nikɑnt Luonmtieb yent kul ni.
Ŋɑnn e din tie sinsinn nikɑnt diɑnu, k Kiiliinius din tie Siili tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ l yuo.
L pɑɑk, suɑ kul din kun u duo ni ɑ bin sɑɑ diɑn u sɑnn.
Suosiɑf mun din nyii Nɑɑsɑɑlet nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tingbounŋ ni, k sɑɑn Suude tingbounŋ ni, k kun Dɑɑfiid duo ni, Betlehenm. Setk nɑn mɔni, Suosiɑf din tie * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn e.
U din kpen ɑ bin diɑn ŋuɑ nɑn u sɑlkpenŋ Mɑɑli sɑnɑ e. L yuo nɑ, k Mɑɑli mɔk puol.
Bɑɑ din dɑɑ be Betlehenm nɑ, k Mɑɑli mɑtuk yuo tɑn bɑɑl.
K u ji din mɑl bonjɑk, u sɑpɑɑnmɑl. U din jii cincenn k pɔbn’ɔ, k bil’ɔ bonkobluok ni, k mɑɑn dieok nbɑ k b din guun nikɑnt niib nɑ din gbie wɑɑ.
Pekpɑɑli mun din be duo mɑnŋ ni k kpɑɑl b pei nyiɑɔk muuk ni.
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑlɑksuɑ din tɑn dɔkt b pɑɑk, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yentsɑɑkɑl yent lint’b, k jɑŋmɑɑni mɑntk ji din suol’b bonciɑnn.
Ŋɑɑn k *mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet’b ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn, k mɑɑn n bɑɑl nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn e mɑɑ n wɑnn’i, lin nbɑ sɑɑ tul niib kul pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
Dinnɑ nyiɑɔk nɑ, Dɑɑfiid duo ni, b mɑl i Fietuɑ wun nbɑ tie *Klistu, Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ.
Nɑ e sii tie *nyinn k tul’i; I sɑɑ lɑ sɑnpɑntk nɑ puɑb cincenn ni k duɑ bonkobluok ni.»
L yuo nɑ k *Yendɔunŋ ni mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bonciɑnn dɔkt k pukn mɑlɑkɑ nɑ po, k yiin dont Yennu sɑnn ɑ:
«Yudɑnt tie Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ yɑl e, k mɑɑn mɑnu be Yennu nɑn niib sinsuuk ni, u lonm pɑɑk.»
K mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ tɑn nyik pekpɑɑli nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt duo Yendɔunŋ ni. K pekpɑɑli yet b lieb ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin sɑɑn Betlehenm k sɑɑ got lɑ lin nbɑ tien, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yien’t nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k b fiil sɑɑn yiɑn yiɑn k sɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf, k sɑnpɑntk mɑnŋ duɑ bonkobluok ni.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k b muɑnt lin nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet’b bik mɑnŋ po nɑ.
K bin nbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ k pekpɑɑli muɑnt nɑ, k l bɑkt b kul.
Ŋɑɑn Mɑɑli din tiɑl lin nbɑ tien nɑ kul, k din duki l po u pɑl ni bonciɑnn.
L puolpo e k pekpɑɑli nɑ ŋmɑt b pei buol muuk ni. Bɑɑ sɑɑ nɑ, k b piɑk dont Yennu sɑnn, lin nbɑ kul k b gbɑt k lɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k l set tie nɑn mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Yiesu mɑɑlu dɑɑ ŋɑnniin dɑɑl e, yuo nbɑ k b sɑɑ pot u punn nɑ, k b pul u sɑnn Yiesu, sɑnn nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑ din pul k suɑ u nɑɑ din dɑɑ k suol u puol nɑ.

Tɔn, l din tɑn jɑnŋ nɑn Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf n tun nɑn Muois *senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k ŋɑnm Mɑɑli Yennu buol ni. Ŋɑnn e k b ji din jii bik nɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Selusɑɑlenm, ɑ bin sɑɑ jii’u k tul Yonmdɑɑnɔ
nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ senni ni ɑ: «Bikpelk kul nbɑ tie bonjɑk e tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yuɑ.»
K b biɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ din senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «Bin lɑ lɑnjeli bɑnle ɑmi ŋmɑnbilɑ bɑnle k mɑnn.»
L yuo nɑ k jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm, k u sɑnn din tie Siimeɔn. U din be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm k din bɑɑkt Yennu bonciɑnn, k guu yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ fiel Islɑɑeltieb, k Foŋɑnm din be nɑn’ɔ.
K Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ ponŋ din fiit k wɑnn’ɔ ɑ u kɑn kpo sie k u tɑn lɑ Klistu, nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tun’ɔ nɑ.
L yuo nɑ k Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ din te k Siimeɔn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k sɑɑ lɑ Yiesu bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ ɑ bin tien’ɔ nɑn senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ.
K Siimeɔn din gɑɑl bik mɑnŋ ŋɑɑn pɑk Yennu k yet ɑ:
«N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ gbien ɑ mɔsonn nɑ wɑɑ. Lɑɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑnt k ɑ dɑɑbl n kpo, k kun nɑn mɑnu,
k mɑɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninbinn lɑ fɑɑ tun lin nbɑ k fiel ɑ niib ɑ,
lin nbɑ k ɑ tien niib kul ninbinɑ ni.
L sii tie yentu nbɑ sɑɑ te k niib kul n bɑnn’ɑ, k l biɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ niib Islɑɑel n lɑ dontl.»
Tɔn, Siimeɔn nbɑ pɑk k jikt sɑɑ bik mɑnŋ po biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k l bɑkt bik nɑ nɑɑ nɑn u bɑɑ bonciɑnn.

K Siimeɔn tul’b yetŋɑnm, ŋɑɑn yet bik nɑ nɑɑ Mɑɑli ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, Yennu nyinn bik nɑ k senn’ɔ ɑ Islɑɑeltieb bonciɑnn n bɑɑ yɑnn u pɑɑk, k lieb bonciɑnn mun biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu u pɑɑk e. Ŋuɑ e tɑn sii tie nyinn nbɑ k niib bonciɑnn tɑn kɑn sɑk l mɑɑn.
Lin nbɑ nɑ sɑɑ te k b wuol ni dudukt n nyi pɑɑnu. Ŋɑɑn bonsiɑl tɑn sɑɑ tun k pint ɑ pɑl pɑɑk bonciɑnn.»
Tɔn, k *Yennu sɔkniiluɑ mun din be lenŋ k tie puo, k u sɑnn yi Aɑnn, wun nbɑ tie Fɑɑnuel bipuo, k biɑ tie Aɑsel buolu ni nilɔ, k din tie puokpelcɑɑnwonŋ, wun nbɑ din yuo binɑ ŋɑnlole.
K l puolpo k u sɔlɔ tɑn kpo ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ pɑkuɑk, k u ji mɔk binɑ piiniin nɑn ŋɑnnɑ. U din tuu k nyi Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk, k jiɑntl Yennu k loln mɔb k mei’ɔ.
L yuo nɑ k u bɑɑl k tul Yennu niipuouk, k din piɑk bik nɑ po k tien bin nbɑ kul din guu yuo nbɑ k Yennu yɑɑ wun fiel Selusɑɑlenm tieb.
Yuo nbɑ k Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf nbɑ din tun gbenn Yonmdɑɑnɔ senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b ŋmɑt kun b duo Nɑɑsɑɑlet nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.
K Yiesu tɑn kpɑɑt nɑn pɑnŋ nɑn subni bonciɑnn, k Yennu yetŋɑnm din be u pɑɑk.
Tɔn, binn kul k Yiesu nɑɑ nɑn u bɑɑ din tuu do Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ di *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm.
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din tɑn bɑɑl binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle, k b din duo ɑ bin sɑɑ di jɑɑnm mɑnŋ nɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ k b din tuu tie nɑ.
Jɑɑnm dɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b ji piin kunu, ŋɑɑn k bik nɑ, Yiesu, din biɑl k be Selusɑɑlenm, ŋɑɑn k Mɑɑli nɑn Suosiɑf k mi nɑn u biɑl.
B din duki mi ɑ u be nibul nɑ ni e, k b sonm dɑɑl mɑnŋ kul. L puolpo k b luon’ɔ b niib ni nɑn b lieb ni.
Bɑɑ k lɑ’u nɑ, k b din ŋmɑt sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ luon’ɔ lenŋ.
K dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k b tɑn lɑ’u Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k u lɑkn kɑl nɑn wɑntieb k gbiintl b mɑɑn ŋɑɑn biɑ boi’b buboit.
K bin nbɑ kul din gbiintl u mɑɑn, l din bɑkt’b nɑn wɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k mɔk bɑnnu k piɑk k jiint’b.
K u nɑɑ nɑn u bɑɑ nbɑ din lɑ’u lenŋ, k l bɑkt’b bonciɑnn, k u nɑɑ ji boi’ɔ ɑ: «N bik, bee k ɑ tien’t nnɑ? A k mi ɑ min nɑn ɑ bɑɑ lɑ pɑlbiil hei k luon’ɑ ni ii?»
K u jiin k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i dɑɑn luon’n i? I k mi ɑ sie k n fɑbl kii be n Bɑɑ ŋɑɑk ni ii?»
Ŋɑɑn b din k gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k b din ŋmɑt nɑn Yiesu k sik Nɑɑsɑɑlet, k u din sɑɑk b mɔb. K u nɑɑ din tiɑn lin nbɑ tien nɑ kul u pɑl ni.
K Yiesu kpɑɑtl k u yɑn puki, k Yennu nɑn nisɑɑli pɑlɑ din mei u pɑɑk.

Yuo nbɑ k kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Tiibel Sesɑɑl din dii nɑɑn binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnŋmu, Pɔns *Piilɑɑt mun din tie Suude yudɑɑnɔ. *Heluod mun din tie Gɑɑliile kpɑnbɑl, k u ninjɑ Fiiliip mun din tie Ituule nɑn Tlɑɑkoniit kpɑnbɑl. Liisɑniɑs din tie Abiilenn kpɑnbɑl.
* Ann nɑn *Kɑɑyiif mun din tie Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm. L yuo nɑ k Yennu din jii u mɑɑn k tul Sɑn nbɑ tie Sɑɑkɑɑli bik nɑ, k u din be muuk ni.
Ŋɑnn e k Sɑn din tuu lin *Suulden kpenu po kul, k muɑntl k tien niib ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu k Yennu n nyik cɑb b biit.
Lin nbɑ nɑ tie nɑn *Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi nbɑ din diɑn u kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ «Nisuɑ tɑn sii be muuk ni k huot k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑnmt mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu sɔnu k tul’ɔ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm u sɔni k lii tuok.
Bɑɑt kul sɑɑ gbie k nɑɑ; juɑt nɑn kunkonɑ kul sɑɑ bit k nɑɑ. Sɔnu nbɑ ŋmɑl siɑn nbɑ buol, l sɑɑ sont fɑnu; sɔnbuotɑ sɑɑ piin k lɑt nɑɑ,
k tingbounŋ niib kul sɑɑ lɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ fiel’b nɑ.› »
Niib bonciɑnn din bɑɑl Sɑn buol ɑ wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu, k u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm wɑɑlɑbli nɑ. Ŋmee kpɑɑn’i ɑ i tin k nyi Yennu wutuol nbɑ yɑɑ lin bɑɑl i pɑɑk nɑ ni?
Ii tuun mɑn lin nbɑ sɑɑ wɑnn nɑn i set mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ. I dɑɑ yien i pɑlɑ ni nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie i yejɑ. N yien’i e, Yennu sɑɑ fit k fiin tɑnɑ nbɑ nɑ k lin kpɑnt Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ.
Pɑjɑl ponŋ tien siil ɑ, ɑ wun cuɑ tiini nɑn b jiinɑ, k tiik kul nbɑ k luon luɑnŋɑnɑ, b sɑɑ cuɑ’l e k lu’l muu ni.»
K nibulciɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ din boi’ɔ ɑ: «K t ji sɑɑ tien nlee?»
K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ mɔk liɑtfɔkt ŋɑnle, sie k wun pɑɑt yenn k tul wun nbɑ k mɔk, k wun nbɑ mɔk jiet, sie k wun wɑt tul wun nbɑ k mɔk.»
Ŋɑnn e k lɑnpogɑɑltesiɑb mun din bɑɑl ɑ wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, tinm sɑɑ tien nlee?»
K u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ gɑɑn likli k gɑɑl bɑɑ senn’i *senni biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
L puolpo k sejesiɑb mun boi’ɔ ɑ: «K tinm mun, t sɑɑ tien nlee?» K u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ muksl suɑ k gɑɑn siɑl i ɑmi k fɑ fɑɑk niib po. Ii mɔk pɑlpienn i pɑɑɔk nbɑ k i gɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk.»
Tɔn, k niib nbɑ din guu *Klistu bɑɑlu nɑ, ji din piin k boi b mɔnŋ, ɑ pɑsiɑl Sɑn sii tie Klistu e.
L yuo mɑnŋ k Sɑn yet b kul ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin wuul’i Yennu wulu nɑn nyun e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ cie’n bɑɑt. N ponŋ k ŋɑn nɑn k n lot u tɑɑsɑɑŋmi. Ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ jii Foŋɑnm nɑn muu k wul’i Yennu wulu.
U diɑ u dilenn ŋmɑni ɑ wun lenn bonŋɑnn, k nyinn dibin k wuun u buɑl ni, ŋɑɑn juo founŋ nɑ muu nbɑ kɑn mi k kpien nɑ ni.»
Sɑn nbɑ din muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ k tien niib nɑ, k u pɑk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k kpɑɑn’m,
ŋɑɑn k biɑ din tɑɑl kpɑnbɑl Heluod, k mɑɑn u din fɑt u mɔnŋ ninjɑ ŋɑɑpuo Heluodiɑd k kuɑn’ɔ wɑɑ, k biɑ tun biit bonciɑnn.
L puolpo e, k Heluod din tɑn tun bonbiil mɑntk k biɑ pukn l pɑɑk, k kuɑn Sɑn dɑnsɑlk.
Yuo nbɑ k Sɑn din wul niib kul Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, k Yiesu tɑn bɑɑl u buol k u wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu mun. Lenŋ mɑnŋ e k Yiesu din mei Yennu, k sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn luot,
k Foŋɑnm sik u pɑɑk nɑn gbɑnɑnt nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnn nɑ, k kunkɔl nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k yet ɑ: «Fin e tie n Bilonkɑk. Fin e k n nunm gbuo.»
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din piin u tuonn nɑ, k u din mɔk nɑn binɑ piintɑ nɑ. Niib din duki nɑn u tie Suosiɑf bijɑ e, k Suosiɑf bɑɑ din tie Heli,
k Heli bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑ, k Mɑɑtɑ bɑɑ din tie Liefi, k Liefi bɑɑ din tie Melki, k Melki bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑnɑi, k Sɑɑnɑi bɑɑ din tie Suosiɑf,
k Suosiɑf bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs, k Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs bɑɑ din tie Amos, k Amos bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑhunm, k Nɑɑhunm bɑɑ din tie Esli, k Esli bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑkɑi,
k Nɑɑkɑi bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑt, k Mɑɑt bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs, k Mɑɑtɑɑtiɑs bɑɑ din tie Semeɑn, k Semeɑn bɑɑ din tie Suosek, k Suosek bɑɑ din tie Juodɑ,
k Juodɑ bɑɑ din tie Suɑnɑn, k Suɑnɑn bɑɑ din tie Lesɑ, k Lesɑ bɑɑ din tie Solobɑɑbel, k Solobɑɑbel bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑlɑɑtiel, k Sɑɑlɑɑtiel bɑɑ din tie Neli,
k Neli bɑɑ din tie Melki, k Melki bɑɑ din tie Adi, k Adi bɑɑ din tie Kuosɑɑnm, k Kuosɑɑnm bɑɑ din tie Elmɑɑdɑnm, k Elmɑɑdɑnm bɑɑ din tie El,
k El bɑɑ din tie Yiesu, k Yiesu bɑɑ din tie Eliesel, k Eliesel bɑɑ din tie Suoliinm, k Suoliinm bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑ, k Mɑɑtɑ bɑɑ din tie Liefi,
k Liefi bɑɑ din tie Siimeɔn, k Siimeɔn bɑɑ din tie Suudɑ, k Suudɑ bɑɑ din tie Suosiɑf, k Suosiɑf bɑɑ din tie Suonɑɑnm, k Suonɑɑnm bɑɑ din tie Eliiɑkiinm,
k Eliiɑkiinm bɑɑ din tie Meleɑ, k Meleɑ bɑɑ din tie Menɑ, k Menɑ bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtɑɑtɑ, k Mɑɑtɑɑtɑ bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑtɑn, k Nɑɑtɑn bɑɑ din tie Dɑɑfiid,
k Dɑɑfiid bɑɑ din tie Jese, k Jese bɑɑ din tie Suobet, k Suobet bɑɑ din tie Buos, k Buos bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑlɑ, k Sɑɑlɑ bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑsɔn,
k Nɑɑsɔn bɑɑ din tie Amiinɑɑdɑɑb, k Amiinɑɑdɑɑb bɑɑ din tie Admin, k Admin bɑɑ din tie Alni, k Alni bɑɑ din tie Eslɔnm, k Eslɔnm bɑɑ din tie Fɑɑles, k Fɑɑles bɑɑ din tie Suudɑ,
k Suudɑ bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑkɔb, k Sɑɑkɔb bɑɑ din tie Isɑɑk, k Isɑɑk bɑɑ din tɑn tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm bɑɑ din tie Telɑ, k Telɑ bɑɑ din tie Nɑɑkɔl,
k Nɑɑkɔl bɑɑ din tie Seluk, k Seluk bɑɑ din tie Lɑɑgo, k Lɑɑgo bɑɑ din tie Fɑɑlek, k Fɑɑlek bɑɑ din tie Ebel, k Ebel bɑɑ din tie Sɑɑlɑ,
k Sɑɑlɑ bɑɑ din tie Kɑinɑɑnm, k Kɑinɑɑnm, bɑɑ din tie Alfɑɑksɑɑt, k Alfɑɑksɑɑt bɑɑ din tie Senm, k Senm bɑɑ din tie Noe, k Noe bɑɑ din tie Lɑɑmek,
k Lɑɑmek bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑtuusɑɑlɑ, k Mɑɑtuusɑɑlɑ bɑɑ din tie Henɔk, k Henɔk bɑɑ din tie Jɑɑlet, k Jɑɑlet bɑɑ din tie Mɑɑleliɑl, k Mɑɑleliɑl bɑɑ din tie Kɑinɑn,
k Kɑinɑn bɑɑ din tie Enos, k Enos bɑɑ din tie Set, k Set bɑɑ din tie Adɑn, k Adɑn bɑɑ din tie Yennu.
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din nyii *Suulden kpenu po, k gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm, k Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ k u kuɑ muuk ni,
k lenŋ e k *Sɑɑtɑn din sɑɑ jɑnm’ɔ dɑɑ piinnɑ. K u k dii siɑl i yuo mɑnŋ ni, k l yuo nɑ dɑɑ tɑn gɑl k kon ji din suol’ɔ.
K Sɑɑtɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ set tie Yennu Bijɑ i e, fɑn yet tɑnn nɑ k lin kpɑnt pɑɑnu.»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Pɑɑnu kuukuɑ kɑɑ te k nilɔ be.› »
L puolpo e k Sɑɑtɑn ji din jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo k sɑɑ wɑnn’ɔ tingbounŋ yent kul kul l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni,
ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N sɑɑ tul’ɑ yiikuo l kul pɑɑk nɑn l mɔktuk kul, k mɑɑn b tul’n ɑ, k n mun sɑɑ fit tul wun nbɑ k n luon.
Ŋɑnn, l i tie k ɑ gbɑɑn k jiɑnt’n, l kul sii tie ɑ yɑl e.»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Nilɔ i jiɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu kuukuɑ e, kii biɑ kii tuun kii tien ŋuɑ kuukuɑ.› »
Ŋɑnn e k Sɑɑtɑn biɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Selusɑɑlenm, k sɑɑ donn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɔpinyelk pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ i e, fɑn yukl mɔb nnɑ nɑ,
k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹U sɑɑ te k u *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ i guu’ɑ.›
L biɑ diɑn ɑ: ‹B sii diɑ’ɑ nɑn b nii k ɑ tɑɑl dɑɑ fɑɑ tɑnn k ɑ lɑɑt dɑnŋ.› »
K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «L yet Yennu kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹A dɑɑ biki Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu.› »
K Sɑɑtɑn nbɑ din jɑnm Yiesu k tɑn guo nɑ, k u dɑɑ nyik’ɔ sie yuo nbɑ k u ji tɑn sɑɑ lɑ yɑɑk.
K Yiesu din gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ k tɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑn Gɑɑliile. K b din muɑnt u lɑbɑɑl k l yɑt tinŋ mɑnŋ kul kul po.
K u din wɑnt’b Yennu mɑɑn b *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k niib kul piɑk’ɔ.
L puolpo e k Yiesu din sɑɑn Nɑɑsɑɑlet, siɑn nbɑ k b din wubi’ɔ. K *Fuondɑɑl k u din tɑn kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ din tuu kuɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k tɑn fiil ɑ wun lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk.
K b jii kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ k *Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din diɑn nɑ k tul’ɔ, k u pint kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k lɑ siɑn nbɑ k l diɑn k yet ɑ
«Yonmdɑɑnɔ Siek be n ni, k u lukt’n ɑ n muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn k tul nɑndɑnm nɑ. U tun’n ɑ n tɑn yet yonmi ɑ n sɑɑ nyinn’b yɑnn, k biɑ yet juɑni ɑ b sɑɑ nyuɑnt ɑ, k biɑ fɑt bin nbɑ be fɑlɑ ni k lu’b yɑnn,
k biɑ muɑnt ɑ l jɑnŋ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ n fiel u niib ɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ lii gbenn yuo nbɑ k u pin kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k jiin tul Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok tuontunnɔ, ŋɑɑn kɑl. K niib kul nbɑ be dieok nɑ ni ji din goli’ɔ.
K u piin piɑk k tien’m ɑ: «Mɑɑn nbɑ k n lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, l tɑn tien bɑlmɔni dinnɑ, yuo nbɑ k l bɑɑ i tubɑ ni nɑ.»
K b kul ji din piɑk’ɔ, k l bɑkt’b nɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k u pɑk nɑ, k b ji boi b lieb ɑ: «Suosiɑf bijɑ nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»

L yuo nɑ k u yet’b ɑ: «Bilsuk kɑɑ nɑn i tɑn sɑɑ yet’n bɑljouk nɑ e ɑ: ‹Fin tebtuɑ, tebn ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ,› k i biɑ tɑn sɑɑ yet’n ɑ: ‹Tient bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ duo nɑ nɑn tɑɑ gbɑt nɑn fɑɑ dɑɑn tun Kɑpelnɑunm nɑ.›
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, niib k cɔln Yennu sɔkni u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ duo ni.
Bɑlmɔni e, pɑkɔi bonciɑnn din be Islɑɑel tinŋ ni, yuo nbɑ k Elii dɑɑ din be nɑ. L yuo mɑnŋ, sɑɑk din k bɑɑ binɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob, k kon din tɑn bɑɑ bonciɑnn tinŋ mɑnŋ ni kul,
ŋɑɑn Yennu din k tun Elii suɑ buol fɑb ɑ, tinŋ mɑnŋ ni. U din tun’ɔ pɑkuɑk nbɑ din be Sɑɑleptɑ nbɑ be Siidɔn tinŋ ni nɑ buol e.
Yuo nbɑ k Eliise dɑɑ din be nɑ, gbɑɑtɑ bonciɑnn din be Islɑɑel tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn b suɑ din k lɑ pɑɑku tinŋ mɑnŋ ni. Nɑɑmɑn nbɑ din tie Siili juɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e din lɑ pɑɑku.»
K niib kul nbɑ din be Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok mɑnŋ ni nbɑ gbɑt Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k b ji din donn wutuol bonciɑnn u pɑɑk.
K b fiil bel’ɔ k nyinn’ɔ duo nɑ ni, k sɑɑ donn’ɔ kunkonn nbɑ k b din mɑɑ b duo nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ bin lu’u bɑɑɔk ni,
ŋɑɑn k u buut b ni k yɑɑt.
L puolpo k Yiesu din sik Kɑpelnɑunm nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni. Fuondɑɑl k u din tumi niib.
Wɑɑ din wɑnt’b bɑnnu nbɑ din bɑkt’b, k mɑɑn u din piɑk nɑn yiikuo.
K jɑsuɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk be u ni nɑ din be Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok nɑ ni k tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ
«Fin Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ, tinm nɑn fin, nlee mɑntk i? A bɑɑl ɑ ɑ tɑn biil’t ee? N mi fɑɑ tie wun nbɑ. A tie Yennu niŋɑnɔ nɑ e.»
K Yiesu din yɑki nɑn nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ ɑ: «Ŋminin fuut, ŋɑɑn nyi juɑ mɑnŋ ni.» K nɑlnbiiuk nɑ lu juɑ nɑ tinŋ ni b nunm ni, k nyii u ni, ŋɑɑn k k tien’ɔ dɑnŋ.
K l din tien suɑ kul yɑɑl-lituk, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Mɑbuol bee nɑ? U mɔk yiikuo nɑn pɑnŋ k tien nɑlnbiit mɔb, k b nyi niib ni.»
L pɑɑk, k b din muɑnt Yiesu sɑnn tinŋ mɑnŋ ni kul.
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok nɑ ni k sɑɑn Siimɔn ŋɑɑk. K b sɑɑ lɑ Siimɔn diɑnpuok k u yiɑl k u gbɑnɑnt ton bonciɑnn, k b bɑln Yiesu, puo nɑ po.
K Yiesu buɑn k got’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yɑki nɑn yiɑlu nɑ, k l gbenn, k puo nɑ fiil yiɑn ɑ k tien’m sɑɑɔnŋ.
Yuo nbɑ k yennu din tɑn bɑɑ, k bin nbɑ kul mɔk bɑɑtb b ŋei ni din jii’b k bɑɑl nɑn’m Yiesu buol, k b din yiɑl yiɑlbuolu buolu, k u yii u nii bɑɑtb nɑ kul pɑɑk yenɔ yenɔ k te k b pɑɑk.
Nɑlnbiit bonciɑnn din nyii niib ni. Bɑɑ nyii yuo nbɑ k b tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo k yien ɑ: «A tie Yennu Bijɑ e.» Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din k cɑb’b k b pɑk jik, k mɑɑn b mi nɑn u tie *Klistu e.
Lɑɑ din yent k Yiesu nyii duo nɑ ni k sɑɑn muuk ni, k niib nɑ din tɑn lin luon’ɔ k sɑɑ lɑ’u. Bɑɑ din tɑn lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k b ji guɑl’ɔ ɑ u dɑɑ yɑɑtl ŋɑɑn nyikt’b.
Ŋɑɑn k u yet’b ɑ: «Sie k n sɑɑn digbɑnliɑ biɑk kii sɑɑ i muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑmɑnn po, k mɑɑn l pɑɑk e te k Yennu tun’n.»
Ŋɑnn e k u din lin Suude digbɑnɑ k kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni k wɑnt niib mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
Dɑsiɑl k Yiesu din sɑɑn sɑɑ sie Genesɑɑlet mɔkgbenŋl gbingbɑnn pɑɑk, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din tut gbin ɑ bin gbiint Yennu mɑɑn.
K u lɑ bulgbetɑ ŋɑnle din be mɔkgbenŋl mɑnŋ gbingbɑnn, k jɑnsuoltieb din nyik’l ŋɑɑn cɑt sɑɑn ɑ bin wuul b jɑnlɑɑnt.
K u kuɑ bulgbetl nbɑ tie Siimɔn yɑl ni nɑ, ŋɑɑn miɑl’ɔ ɑ wun cɑt wɑɑn k fɔkt nɑn gbingbɑnn. K Yiesu kɑl bulgbetl nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn wɑnt nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ Yennu mɑɑn.
Wɑɑ din wɑnn niib k gbenn yuo nbɑ k u biɑ yet Siimɔn ɑ: «Jiln nyun sunsunŋ po k lu i jɑnlɑɑnt k suol jɑni.»
Ŋɑɑn k Siimɔn jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, wonn nyiɑɔk munn ɑ, t won yɑbl ɑ t suol jɑni, ŋɑɑn k fit suol siɑl. Tɔn, fɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin n sɑɑ lu k got.»
K Siimɔn nɑn u lieb nɑ ji din lu b jɑnlɑɑnt nɑ k suol jɑni bonciɑnn, k b jɑnlɑɑnt ji yɑɑ lin pɑt.
L pɑɑk, k b kɑbnt b lieb bulgbetliel nɑ ni ɑ bin bɑɑl k tɑn sonm’b. Bɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k b din donn jɑni k tɑn gbien b bulgbetɑ ŋɑnle kul ɑ, k l din kpiɑk k b ji yɑɑ bin kpii nyun ni.
K Siimɔn Piɑl nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k u gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nyikn’min ŋɑɑn kii sɑɑ k mɑɑn n tie biitdɑɑnɔ e,»
k mɑɑn bɑɑ suol jɑni bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k l bɑkt Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn bin nbɑ din be nɑn’ɔ kul,
k l biɑ tie nnɑ e k tul Siimɔn lieb, Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn nbɑ din tie Sebede wɑɑs nɑ. Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet Siimɔn ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, ɑ sɑɑ sɑɑn kii so niib.»
Ŋɑnn e k b ji din tut b bulgbetɑ mɑnŋ k donn gbingbɑnn, ŋɑɑn nyik b bonɑ kul lenŋ ŋɑɑn wɑɑ Yiesu.

Siɑn yuo k Yiesu din be dosɑu, k gbɑɑtl din be lenŋ k ŋɑɑɔk be u pɑɑk bonciɑnn. Wɑɑ din tɑn lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k u bɑɑl k gbɑɑn finfɑbl u tuɑnn k miɑl’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k ɑ luon ɑ sɑɑ fit te k n ŋɑɑɔk nɑ n gbenn.»
K Yiesu tɑnt u nuu ŋɑɑn sii’u k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N luon. A ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ n gbenn.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u ŋɑɑɔk nɑ set gbenn.

Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑ piɑk suɑ mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn i sɑɑ Yennu mɑnntuɑ buol k jii ɑ mɔnŋ k wɑnn’ɔ, k biɑ mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu nɑn Muois nbɑ din senn k jiin gbɑɑtɑ pɑɑku po nɑ, k suɑ kul n bɑnn nɑn ɑ ŋɑɑɔk mɑnŋ set gbenn ɑ.»
Ŋɑɑn Yiesu sɑnn set din duo bonciɑnn k gɑl sinsinn yuo nɑ, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din lɑkn u buol ɑ bii gbiintl u mɑɑn k biɑ lɑ pɑɑku b yiɑli pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn u din tuu tun nyi k sɑɑ muuk ni k sɑɑ mei Yennu.

Siɑn yuo, Yiesu din tumi niib k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn *senniwɑntieb mun din nyii Gɑɑliile doi kul ni, nɑn Suude doi kul ni, nɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k bɑɑl Yiesu buol k kɑl. L yuo k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu pɑnŋ din be Yiesu ni ɑ wun te k niib n pɑɑk.
K nisiɑb din tɑn bɑɑt k jii gbɑnɑnkpienn dɑɑnɔ liɑnŋ pɑɑk, k b din kol ɑ bin jii’u k kuɑ nɑn’ɔ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni k bil’ɔ Yiesu tuɑnn,

ŋɑɑn b din k lɑ yiɑl nbɑ sɑɑ kuɑ, k mɑɑn niib din yɑbt bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk k b din jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ mɔpinn pɑɑk, k cuɑ luot mɔpinn yul pɑɑk, k sikn’ɔ nɑn liɑnŋ nɑ k tɑn bil’ɔ Yiesu tuɑnn, niib nɑ sinsuuk ni.
Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ b yɑdɑ nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, k u yet juɑ nɑ ɑ: «N yuɑk, n nyik cɑb ɑ biit ɑ.»
K *senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ ji din duki b pɑlɑ ni ɑ: «Nilɑnɔpo e mun piɑk nnɑ k piɑk biil Yennu? Ŋmee dɑɑ sɑɑ fit nyik cɑb nilɔ biit, k l k tie Yennu kuukuɑ kɑɑ?»
Yiesu ŋɑnin din mi bɑɑ duki biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i duki nnɑ i pɑlɑ ni?
Mi i yet ɑ: ‹N nyik cɑb ɑ biit,› ɑmi mi i yet ɑ: ‹Fiit kii sonm,› mɑɑn munle nɑ sinsuuk ni lɑnn po e pɑɑl i?
Ŋɑɑn n luon k yin bɑnn nɑn *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mɔk yiikuo tingbounŋ nɑ ni k sɑɑ nyik cɑb niib b biit.» Ŋɑnn e k u yet gbɑnɑnkpienn dɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑ: «Fin, fiit k jii ɑ liɑnŋ kii kun ɑ ŋɑɑk ni.»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k juɑ mɑnŋ din fiil k set b nunm po, k jii u liɑnŋ mɑnŋ, k kun. Wɑɑ sɑɑ nɑ k u piɑk dont Yennu.
K l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit b kul ɑ, k b piɑk dont Yennu k yien ɑ: «Dinnɑ t jiɑ lɑ *dulnyɑ.»
L puolpo e k Yiesu din nyii ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ, k sɑɑ lɑ *lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ, k u sɑnn din tie Liefi, k u kɑl u tuonn pɑɑk lɑnpogɑɑldieok ni, k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit kii wɑɑ’n.»
K u nyik u bonɑ kul ŋɑɑn fiil k wɑɑ’u.
Ŋɑnn e k u tɑn tien jɑɑngbenŋl u ŋɑɑk ni k tul Yiesu, k *lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn niib bonciɑnn din bɑɑl k lɑkn di nɑn’m.
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nɑn b *senniwɑntieb din bɑɑl k tɑn buln nɑn Yiesu *puolpoweitieb k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i di k nyu nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm i?»
K Yiesu din jiɑnt k yet’b ɑ: «Bin nbɑ mɔk lɑɑfiɑ k luon tebtuɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ yiɑl luon’ɔ.
N k bɑɑl ɑ n yet bin nbɑ be binbenŋɑnŋ ni kɑɑ ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, ŋɑɑn n bɑɑl mɑɑ n yet biitdɑnm e ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ.»
Ŋɑnn e k nisiɑb din yet Yiesu ɑ: «Sɑn puolpoweitieb tun loln mɔi k mei Yennu, k t puolpoweitieb mun tie nnɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ puolpoweitieb ŋɑnin di k nyu.»
K u jiin k boi’b ɑ: «Puociɑnu i i be, suɑ sɑɑ fit k te k sɑɑnm n lol mɔi yuo nbɑ k puoyuokl sɔlɔ dɑɑ be b buol ni wɑɑ ɑɑ? Aɑi.
