Ŋɑɑn yuo sɑɑ bɑɑl k b tɑn sɑɑ nyinn puoyuokl sɔlɔ nɑ b buol, k l yuo mɑnŋ e k b sɑɑ lol mɔi.»
K Yiesu din yin’m bɑljouk biɑk ɑ: «Suɑ kɑn pɑt tɑpɑɑnn cɑbl k lik tɑkpel. L i tie k u tien nnɑ i e, u sɑɑ biil tɑpɑɑnn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn cɑbpɑɑnn nɑn tɑkpel mɑnŋ biɑ lek kii jɑn.
Nnɑ e mun k suɑ kɑn jii dɑpɑɑnin k liɑk dɑlenkpel ni. L i tie k u tien nnɑ i e, k dɑpɑɑnin nɑ tɑn mɔ yuo nbɑ, l sɑɑ yiel dɑlenkpel nɑ e, k dɑɑn mɑnŋ n muɑn yɑnn, k *linlenn nɑ mun n yiel.
Sie k ɑ jii dɑpɑɑnin k liɑk linlenpɑɑnn ni.
Tɔn, l i tie k wun nbɑ nyu dɑkpel i e, u i lɑ dɑpɑɑnin, u k fɑɑt’l, u sɑɑ yet ɑ: ‹Dɑkpel e mɑn.› »
Tɔn, fuondɑsiɑl k Yiesu din gɑɑl dii kpɑɑnt ni, k u *puolpoweitieb nɑ din sonm kɔni dikɑlɑ k pini k ŋmɑn.
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb din boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i tuun lin nbɑ k t *senni wɑnt nɑn t dɑɑ tuun *Fuondɑɑl i?»
K Yiesu jiin k boi’b ɑ: «I k mi lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni Dɑɑfiid nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ yuo nbɑ k kon din mɔk ŋuɑ nɑn u juɑmu nɑ ɑɑ?
U din kuɑ Yennu ŋɑɑk ni k sɑɑ jii pɑɑnu nbɑ k b din tuu senn k l tie Yennu yɑl nɑ, k biɑ tul u juɑmu nɑ. K senni nɑ din k cɑb nɑn suɑ n di pɑɑnu mɑnŋ sie mɑnntieb kuukuɑ e.»
K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: « *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ e yen Fuondɑɑl.»
Fuondɑliel k Yiesu din kuɑ *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni k tul niib wɑnnu, k jɑsuɑ din be lenŋ k u niidiitu kpo k guon.
K *senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb mun din be lenŋ, k goli Yiesu ɑ bin lɑɑn u sɑɑ te k wun pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl ii? K mɑɑn b din luon bin lɑ lin nbɑ k b sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ l po.
Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din mi b dudukt ni, k yet juɑ nbɑ k u nuu kpo nɑ ɑ: «Fiit k set suɑ kul tuɑnn po.» K juɑ mɑnŋ fiil k set.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «N boi’i e, t senni sɑk ɑ t tun lɑnn e? T tun bonŋɑnn Fuondɑɑl ɑmi t tun bonbiil i? T fit fɑt nilɔ mɑnfuol ɑmi tin kpi’u u?»
Ŋɑnn e k u got lint niib mɑnŋ kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn yet niikpienn dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ, «Tɑntl ɑ nuu mɑnŋ.» K u tɑnt, k u nuu mɑnŋ nɑɑt.
K *senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ ji din yɑɑ bin put nɑn wutuol, k b ji piin k piɑk yien lieb bɑɑ sɑɑ tien Yiesu biɑnŋ nbɑ.
L puolpo k Yiesu duo juɑl pɑɑk ɑ wun sɑɑ miɑl Yennu, k din sɑɑ mei Yennu nyiɑɔk nɑn lɑɑ tɑn yent.
K sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni k u din yiin u puolpoweitieb k tɑn lukt piik nɑn bɑnle k yi’b tuomiinbɑ.
U din gɑnn Siimɔn (wun nbɑ k u din pul’ɔ Piɑl nɑ) nɑn Siimɔn ninjɑ Andle, nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn, nɑn Fiiliip nɑn Bɑɑltelemi,
nɑn Mɑɑtieo nɑn Tuomɑ, nɑn Sɑɑk nbɑ din tie Alfe bijɑ nɑ, nɑn Siimɔn (wun nbɑ din luon k Suifnbɑ ii yen b mɔnŋ nɑ),
nɑn Suudɑ nbɑ din tie Sɑɑk bik, nɑn Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt (wun nbɑ din tɑn nyii Yiesu puol nɑ).

Yiesu nbɑ din nyii juɑl nɑ pɑɑk k sik nɑn’m yuo nbɑ, k u din sɑɑn set pɑɑnu ni, k u puolpo juɑmu lɑkn bonciɑnn, k niib bonciɑnn mun dɔnŋ nyii Suude po nɑn Selusɑɑlenm nɑn Tiil nɑn Siidɔn nbɑ kpiɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ,
k din bɑɑl ɑ bin tɑn gbiint u mɑɑn, k biɑ luon wun te k bin pɑɑk. Bin nbɑ k nɑlnbiit dɑɑmi’b mun din bɑɑl k u te k b pɑɑk.
K suɑ kul luon wun sii’u, k mɑɑn pɑnŋ din nyi u ni k te k suɑ kul pɑɑkt.
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu got u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn yet ɑ «Yinm nɑndɑnm, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn tie i yɑl e.
Yinm nbɑ k kon mɔk’i mɔtɑɑnɑ, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i tɑn sɑɑ gbuo. Yinm nbɑ mɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i tɑn sii lɑɑ.
«Niib i nɑn’i k bɔktl’i k suki’i k biil i sɑnɑ, k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e.
Ii yikn mɑn kii kpɑnm nɑn pɑlpienn mɑn l dɑɑl, k mɑɑn i nyuɑt tɑn sii yɑb *Yendɔunŋ ni. B yejɑnm mun din tie *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nnɑ e.
«Yinm mɔktɑ, l tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i dɔnŋ lɑ i yɑnbuɑbonɑ wɑɑ.
«Yinm nbɑ gbuo mɔtɑɑnɑ, l tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn kon tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt’i. Yinm nbɑ lɑɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, l tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i tɑn sii fɑbn k mɔ.»
«L tɑn sii bi i pɑɑk yuo nbɑ k niib kul piɑk’i k mɑɑn b yejɑnm mun din tie nnɑ e k tien fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ.»
«Yinm nbɑ gbiintl n mɑɑn nɑ, n yien’i e, ii mɔk lonm nɑn i dɑtɑi mɑn, kii tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn kii tien bin nbɑ nɑn’i.
Bin nbɑ polntl’i mɔpolɑ, yin yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk. Bin nbɑ sɑlkt’i, ii mei Yennu kii tien’m.
Wun nbɑ peb ɑ tɑnpɑk, fɑn ŋmɑnt liel po mun k wun peb. Wun nbɑ jii ɑ liɑtfuouk nbɑ tie gbɑktl, fɑn sɑk k wun gɑɑl ɑ suot mun biɑk.
Wun nbɑ kul miɑl’ɑ siɑl, fɑn tul’ɔ. Wun nbɑ fɑt ɑ bonɑ, ɑ ji dɑɑ wɑɑ gɑɑn.
Biɑnŋ nbɑ k i luon niib ii tuun kii tien’i nɑ, ii mun ii tuun nnɑ kii tien i lieb.
«L i tie k i luon bin nbɑ luon’i nɑ kuukuɑ i e, nlee k i sii guu nyuɑt i? Biit dɑnm mun luon bin nbɑ luon’m nɑ.
L i tie k i tuun bonŋɑnn k tien bin nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnn k tien’i nɑ, nlee k i sii guu nyuɑt i? Biit dɑnm mun tuun lin nbɑ nɑ.
L i tie k i kpentl k tien bin nbɑ k i dɑɑn nɑn b sɑɑ jiin ɑ, nlee k i sii guu nyuɑt i? Biit dɑnm mun kpentl nnɑ, k tien b lieb k biɑ tuu tɑn gɑɑl b bont biɑnŋ jinŋ.

«L pɑɑk, ii mɔk lonm nɑn i dɑtɑi mɑn, kii tuun bonŋɑnn kii tien’m, kii biɑ kii kpentl kii tien’m k dɑɑ dɑɑn nɑn b sɑɑ jiin ɑ. Nnɑ e k i nyuɑt sii yɑb k i biɑ sii tie Yennu wɑɑs, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e tuun bonŋɑnn k tien bin nbɑ k tien’ɔ niipuouk, nɑn biitdɑnm.
Ii mɔk ninbɑtinu mɑn nɑn i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ mɔk ninbɑtinu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
«I dɑɑ kpɑɑn lieb biit nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit tɑɑl’b l pɑɑk, k Yennu mun dɑɑ tɑɑl’i ni. Dɑɑ piɑk nilɔ biil k gbent’ɔ, k Yennu kɑn biil k gben’ɑ ni. Nyikn cɑb niib k Yennu sɑɑ nyik cɑb’ɑ mun.
Ii tien niib mɑn, k Yennu mun sii tien’i. Yennu sɑɑ cɑɑt bonŋɑnn nɑn ŋmɑnbɑnŋ nbɑ gbie nɑn mɔgbɑnɑ k tul’i k mɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ cɑɑt k tul’i biɑnŋ nbɑ k i cɑɑtl k tien i lieb nɑ e.»
L puolpo k Yiesu din yin’m bɑljouk ɑ: «Juɑnŋ sɑɑ fit dɑɑl u luɑ wɑɑ? Aɑi, b kul tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑ buotuk ni wɑɑ.
Tumiituɑ k gɑl u wɑntuɑ, k tumiituɑ mun i bɑnn gbenn, ŋuɑ nɑn u wɑntuɑ sii jɑn e.
«Bee k ɑ goli lɑɑt muɑnu nbɑ be *ɑ luɑ ninbinn ni, ŋɑɑn k k lɑ jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninbinn ni?

Nlee k ɑ sɑɑ yet ɑ luɑ ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, ŋɑɑnt k n nyinn muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ ninbinn ni,› ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ mɔnŋ ninbinn ni? Fin, kpinkpɑnni dɑɑnɔ nɑ, nyint jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ be ɑ ninbinn ni nɑ sinsinn, k ji fit lɑ fɑnu k nyinn muɑnu nbɑ be ɑ luɑ ninbinn ni nɑ.
«Tiŋɑnŋ k luon luɑnbiit, k tibiiuk mun k luon luɑnŋɑnɑ.
Tiik luɑnɑ ni e k b bɑnt’ɔ. B k lɑɑt luɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi *fiig kunkonŋ pɑɑk k pɔ, k biɑ k lɑɑt *lɑɑsen penn pɑɑk k pɔ.
Niŋɑnɔ e tuun bonŋɑnn k mɑɑn u pɑl ni gbie nɑn bonŋɑnn mɑnŋ, k nibiiuk mun tuun bonbiil k mɑɑn u pɑl ni gbie nɑn bonbiil mɑnŋ. Lin nbɑ be nilɔ pɑl ni, ŋɑnn e nyi u mɔb ni.
«Bee k i yi’n Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑn k k tuun mɑɑ wɑnn’i biɑnŋ nbɑ?
Wun nbɑ kul bɑɑt n buol k gbiintl n mɑɑn k sɑɑk k tuun l biɑnŋ, n sɑɑ wɑnn’i wɑɑ nɑɑn wun nbɑ.

U nɑɑn nɑn juɑ nbɑ din mɑɑ u ŋɑɑk nɑ e. Sinsinn u din gbiil fiɑkl k l sunŋ, k sɑɑ tuu tɑnpiiuk, k ji fɔkn fiɑkl mɑnŋ l pɑɑk. L puolpo k sɑɑk tɑn bɑɑ bonciɑnn, k kpenu gbie nɑn nyunmɔnn k sɑɑ duo k liɑt ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k l k bɑɑ, k mɑɑn u din mɑɑ’l bonŋɑnn e.

Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ gbiintl n mɑɑn ŋɑɑn k k tuun l biɑnŋ, u nɑɑn nɑn juɑ nbɑ mun din mɑɑ u ŋɑɑk tɑnbiini ni, ŋɑɑn k k gbiil fiɑkl nɑ e, k nyunmɔnn din tɑn gbie k sɑɑ duo k yil ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ, k l bɑɑ yiɑn ɑ k nɑn siɑl ɑ k tenn.»
Yiesu nbɑ din wɑnn niib lin nbɑ nɑ kul k gbenn nɑ, k u ji din gɑl sɑɑn Kɑpelnɑunm.
K Luonm tinŋ sejenm yudɑɑnsuɑ din be lenŋ k mɔk dɑɑblonkɑk, k yiɑlu din suol’ɔ k u pel kuun ɑ.
L yuo mɑnŋ k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ gbɑt Yiesu po k tun *Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb u buol ni ɑ bin sɑɑn k sɑɑ bɑln’mɔ k wun bɑɑl k tɑn te k u dɑɑbl nɑ n pɑɑk.
K b din sɑɑn Yiesu buol k sɑɑ bɑln’mɔ bonciɑnn k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Juɑ mɑnŋ jɑnŋ nɑn fɑn sonm’ɔ wɑɑ,
k mɑɑn u luon t niib k biɑ te k b mɑɑ tinm Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok k tul’t ɑ.»

Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu din wei’b sɑɑn. Wɑɑ din sɑɑ pel ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ din tun u yuɑsnbɑ k yet’b ɑ bin yet Yiesu nnɑ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, dɑɑ bɑknt ɑ mɔnŋ k bɑɑt, k mɑɑn n k ŋɑn nɑn fɑn bɑɑl kuɑ n ŋɑɑk ni.
Ŋɑnn e k n bo dukn nɑn n k ŋɑn nɑn k n nɑkn ɑ buol. Ŋɑɑn fɑn lek tul mɔb k n dɑɑbl sɑɑ pɑɑk ɑ.
K mɑɑn n mɔk bin nbɑ gɑl’n k yen’n, k n mun diɑ sejenm k yen’m, k fit yien yenɔ ɑ: ‹Bɑɑt,› k u bɑɑt, k yien luɑ ɑ: ‹Sɑɑnt,› k u sɑɑ, k biɑ yien n dɑɑbl: ‹Tient nnɑ,› k u tie.»
Yiesu nbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ, k l yɑɑl lit’ɔ, k u jiɑnt k got nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ wɑɑ u puolpo nɑ k yet’b ɑ: «N yien’i e, n dɑɑ k mi lɑ yɑdɑ nɑ buolu nɑ, nɑn Islɑɑeltieb sinsuuk ni wɑɑ.»
L yuo mɑnŋ e k tuomiinbɑ din ŋmɑt k sɑɑn sejenm yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk ni k sɑɑ bɑɑl suɑ dɑɑbl mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ.
L din yent e k Yiesu din sɑɑ duo nbɑ k b yi Nɑen nɑ, k u *puolpoweitieb nɑn nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ’u.
Wɑɑ din sɑɑ bɑɑl duo mɑnŋ tɑnmɔb ni yuo nbɑ, k u lɑ k b nyi duo mɑnŋ ni k jii kuun ɑ bin sɑɑn pii. Kpiemɔ mɑnŋ nɑɑ din tie pɑkuɑk e, k ŋuɑ e din tie u bijɑyenml k nibulciɑɔnŋ din ciɑnt pɑkuɑk mɑnŋ.
Yiesu nbɑ din lɑ pɑkuɑk nɑ, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑ mɔ,»
ŋɑɑn sɑɑn sii kuun liɑnŋ nɑ, k bin nbɑ jii’u nɑ set. K Yiesu yet ɑ: «Ŋɑɑjuɑ, n yien’ɑ e, fiit.»
K bik nbɑ kpo mɑnŋ nɑ fiil k kɑl k piin k piɑk. K Yiesu din jii’u k kubn’ɔ u nɑɑ.
K jɑŋmɑɑni ji din suol niib kul nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ, k b din dont Yennu sɑnn k yien lieb ɑ: « *Yennu sɔkniijɑɑnn be t sinsuuk ni,» k biɑ yien b lieb ɑ: «Yennu sik, ɑ wun sonm u niib.»
K Yiesu lɑbɑɑl nɑ din yɑt Suude tinŋ nɑn digbɑnkpini kpini nbɑ kpiɑ lenŋ mɑnŋ kul ɑ.
L puolpo e k Sɑn puolpoweitieb din sɑɑn k sɑɑ yet’ɔ l lɑbɑɑl kul, k u tɑn yiin u puolpoweitieb bɑnle b ni,
k tun’m Yonmdɑɑnɔ buol, ɑ bin sɑɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl nɑ ɑmi tii dɑɑ kii guu luɑ?»
Yuo nbɑ k b din bɑɑl Yiesu penŋ nɑ, k b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sɑn, wun nbɑ wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ tun’t ɑ penŋ ɑ t tɑn boi’ɑ k lɑɑn fin e tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl nɑ ɑmi tii dɑɑ kii guu luɑ?»
L yuo l yuo nɑ k Yiesu din te k bɑɑtb nɑn yiɑlpɑɑli dɑnm bonciɑnn pɑɑk, k nyinn nɑlnbiit siɑb ni, k nyuɑnt juɑni bonciɑnn.

Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet Sɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ: «Ii ŋmɑt mɑn k sɑɑ yet Sɑn lin nbɑ k i lɑ k biɑ gbɑt nɑ, ɑ i lɑ k juɑni nyuɑntl, k wɔbi tɑɑ nɑɑtl k b sonm, k gbɑɑtɑ ŋɑɑt gbent, k tuukpɑɑ ji gbiɑ, k kpienm fi kuun ni, k tɑlɑs-dɑnm gbiintl lɑbɑmɑnn muɑnti.
Pɑlpienn tie wun nbɑ kɑn nyi u yɑdɑ ni nɑ yɑl e.»

Sɑn tuomiinbɑ nbɑ din ŋmɑt nɑ puolpo e k Yiesu ji din piin k boi niib mɑnŋ buboit k jikt sɑɑ Sɑn po ɑ: «Yɑɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn muuk ni nɑ, i dɑɑn duki nɑn i sɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ bee? I dɑɑn mi ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ muuk nbɑ k wounŋ dɑnm nɑ ee?
Nnɑ i kɑɑ, i mɑntk jiɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ bee? Nilɔ k u liɑ tɑŋɑnt ɑmi ii? Nnɑlɑ, niib nbɑ liɑ tɑŋɑnt k be b yɑmɑ ni nɑ be kpɑnbɑlɑ ŋei ni e.
I dɑɑn sɑɑn muuk nɑ ni ɑ i sɑɑ lɑ bee? Yennu sɔkni ɑmi ii? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, Sɑn ŋɑnin gɑl sɔkni wɑɑ.
Ŋuɑ po e k b din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Nnɑlɑ, n sɑɑ tun n *tuomi ɑ tuɑnn po, wun nbɑ sɑɑ gɑl k ŋɑnm ɑ bɑɑlu sɔnu.› »
K Yiesu biɑ din yet’b ɑ: «N yien’i e, b dɑɑ k mi mɑl suɑ k u cie Sɑn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ juont tɑlk Yennu nɑɑn ni cie’u.»
(Niib kul nɑn *lɑnpogɑɑltieb din gbiintl Sɑn mɑɑn k bɑɑ din ŋɑɑn k Sɑn wul’b Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, din wɑnn nɑn b sɑk ɑ Yennu e ŋɑn.
ŋɑɑn k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn *senniwɑntieb din k gɑɑl lin nbɑ k Yennu lol tul’b, k mɑɑn b din k sɑk ɑ Sɑn n wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.)
K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ, n sɑɑ bikn’m nɑn bee? B nɑɑn nɑn bee?
B nɑɑn nɑn wɑɑs nbɑ tuu tikl k kɑl dɑɑk ni k tiɑn lieb pɑɑk nɑ e ɑ: ‹T pieb yeli k tien’i, ŋɑɑn k i k wɑɑ. T yiin kuyɑni k tien’i, ŋɑɑn k i k mɔ fɑbn.›
K mɑɑn Sɑn din bɑɑl k k di pɑɑnu, k biɑ k nyu dɑmunŋ, ŋɑɑn k i yɑɑ ɑ u mɔk nɑlnbiiuk,
k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn bɑɑl k di k nyu, ŋɑɑn k i yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn, u tie podɑɑnɔ nɑn dɑnyuuluk o. U biɑ tie lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm yuɑk e.›
Tɔn, bin nbɑ kul gɑɑl Yennu yɑn tuu yɑɑ ɑ l ŋɑn.»
K Fɑɑliisiɑnsuɑ din be, k din tɑn yiin Yiesu ɑ wun bɑɑl k di jiet u ŋɑɑk ni, k Yiesu din sɑɑn juɑ nɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k b sɑɑ lɑkn kɑl k dii.
K puosuɑ mun din be duo mɑnŋ ni k tie puocunconn, k wɑɑ tɑn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu di jiet ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni, k u bɑɑl nɑn sɑlenŋɑnn nbɑ gbie nɑn tulɑɑli,
k din set Yiesu puol, u tɑɑ buol, ŋɑɑn mɔ, k u nyin-nyuut bɑɑ Yiesu tɑɑ pɑɑk k tɑn mɑɑk, k u din tɑn jii u yut k fiɑn Yiesu tɑɑ, k puul lol u tɑɑ, k tɑn but tulɑɑli nɑ u tɑɑ pɑɑk.

K Fɑɑliisiɑnjuɑ nbɑ yiin Yiesu nɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ, k u dukn u pɑl ni ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ i bo i tie Yennu sɔkni e nɑn bɑlmɔni, u bo sɑɑ bɑnn puo nbɑ sii’u nɑ nbɑ tie wun nbɑ. U bo sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn u tie biitdɑɑnɔ wɑɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet Fɑɑliisiɑnjuɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Siimɔn, n mɔk mɔbonsiɑl k yɑɑ n yet’ɑ.» K Siimɔn jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, yetl’n.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑb bɑnle din be k mɔk lik-kpent-tuɑ pɑnn. Yenɔ din mɔk u pɑnn denienbɑ kobi ŋɑnŋmu (500), k luɑ nɑ mun din mɔk u pɑnn denienbɑ piiŋmu (50).
B bɑnle mɑnŋ suɑ din k fit pɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u din cɑb b kul ɑ, ɑ bii sɑɑ. Tɔn, ɑ duki nɑn ŋmee mɑntk sii luon lik-kpent-tuɑ mɑnŋ i?»
K Siimɔn jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N dukn nɑn l sii tie wun nbɑ k u cɑb’ɔ k u pɑnn yɑb nɑ e.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A mɔk mɔni,»
k din jiɑnt got puo nɑ, ŋɑɑn yet Siimɔn, «A lɑ puo nɑ wɑɑ? N kuɑ ɑ ŋɑɑk nnɑ, k ɑ k tul’n nyun k n fobt n tɑɑ, ŋɑɑn puo mɑnŋ ŋɑnin fobt n tɑɑ nɑn u nyin-nyuut, k biɑ jii u yut k fiɑl’n.
Fin ŋɑnin k puul wɔbn, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin k nyik n tɑɑ bɑlmu mɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ teee nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ.
A biɑ lek k suɑl n yut nɑn kpɑn, ŋɑɑn puo mɑnŋ biɑ jii tulɑɑli k suɑl n tɑɑ.
L pɑɑk, n yien’ɑ e, wɑɑ luon’n bonciɑnn nɑ pɑɑk e wɑnt nɑn u lɑ nyikcɑbu u biit nbɑ yɑb nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ lɑ nyikcɑbu u biit nbɑ k yɑb nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, mun luon’n wɑɑnm-nnɑ e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiɑnt k yet puo nɑ ɑ: «N nyik ɑ biit k cɑb’ɑ wɑɑ.»
K nilieb nbɑ kɑl k di nɑ ji din piin yien b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tie ŋmee k sɑɑ fit nyik cɑb nilɔ u biit i?»
K Yiesu yet puo nɑ: «A yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ. L pɑɑk, i sɑɑ nɑn mɑnu.»
L puolpo k Yiesu din lin digbɑnsɑɑkɑlɑ ni nɑn digbɑnbis ni, k muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑmɑnn k u tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle din wɑɑ’u.
Puob nbɑ k u din nyinn nɑlnbiit b ni, k biɑ te k b yiɑli nɑ gbenn nɑ mun din be lenŋ mɑnŋ k wɑɑ’u. Yenɔ din tie Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, wun nbɑ k nɑlnbiit bɑnlole din nyii u ni,

k lieb mun din tie Suusɑ ŋɑɑpuo Sɑɑnn (Suusɑ din tie *Heluod ŋɑɑtuontunnɑ sɑɑkuɑ), nɑn Suusɑɑnn, nɑn puolieb bonciɑnn. K b kul ɑ din jikt b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ bonɑ k tien Yiesu k sonmt ŋuɑ nɑn u *puolpoweitieb.
Niib lek din nyi digbɑnn nɑn digbɑnn k bɑɑt Yiesu buol, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din lɑkn, k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk ɑ:
«Jɑsuɑ din duo u kpɑɑb ni ɑ wun sɑɑ bul tɑn. Wɑɑ din buul nɑ, k bonbuoli nɑ yenn-nbɑ din yɑt bɑɑ sɑnjouk pɑɑk, k niib gɑɑl ŋmɑɑt l pɑɑk, k nuɑni biɑ tɔki k di.
K liel mun din bɑɑ tɑnpuut pɑɑk. Bonbuoli mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn piɑ yuo nbɑ, l tɑn kpo e, k mɑɑn l din k bɑɑ mɑɑtuk ni.
K liel mun din bɑɑ kunkoni ni, k tɑn lɑkn piɑ k kpɑɑt nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn k kunkoni ŋmɑbl’b.
Ŋɑɑn k liel mun bɑɑ tinŋɑnŋ ni, k piɑ k kpɑɑt bonŋɑnn, k tɑn nɑn nyik nyik nyik.» Yiesu nbɑ yin’m bɑljouk mɑnŋ k gbenn nɑ, k u yet ɑ: «Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ k sɑɑ gbɑt, wun gbiint.»
L puolpo e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb din boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑljouk nɑ pɑɑk tie bee?»
K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yinm ŋɑnin, Yennu cɑb ɑ yin bɑnn wuol ni mɑɑn k jii jiin u nɑɑn po, ŋɑɑn nilieb ŋɑnin, n yii’m bɑljokt e, ɑ n te k: Bin got ŋɑɑn dɑɑ lɑɑt; Bin biɑ gbiint, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ bɑnt l pɑɑk.»
«Bɑljouk nɑ pɑɑk tie nnɑ e: Bonbuoli nbɑ nɑ e tie Yennu mɑɑn.
Bin nbɑ tie nɑn sɑnjokpinŋ nbɑ k bonbuoli bɑɑ lenŋ nɑ, tie bin nbɑ tuu gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn *Sɑɑtɑn n bɑɑl k nyinn’l b pɑlɑ ni ɑ b dɑɑ tie yɑdɑ k lɑ fielu.
K lieb mun nɑɑn nɑn tɑnpuut nɑ e. B tuu gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ k gɑɑl’l nɑn pɑlpienn; ŋɑɑn b k ŋɑɑnt k l bɑɑ jiinɑ. B tuu tien yɑdɑ yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ŋɑɑn nyik yɑdɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ k jinjɑnmi bɑɑl b pɑɑk.
Bonbuoli nbɑ bɑɑ kunkoni ni nɑ nɑɑn nɑn bin nbɑ gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ ŋɑɑn binbenŋ dɑɑmiu nɑn mɔktuk lonm nɑn niɑnbiiuk nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni tuu nyɑkn mɑɑn mɑnŋ b pɑlɑ ni, k lin ŋɑkt.
K lin nbɑ mun bɑɑ tinŋɑnŋ ni nɑ ŋɑnin nɑɑn nɑn bin nbɑ gbiint n mɑɑn k diɑ’l kenken nɑn bɑlmɔni b pɑlɑ ni, k b pɑlcienn ni b biɑ luon luɑnɑ.
«Suɑ k jokt fitl ŋɑɑn liknt bokt l pɑɑk, ɑmi k gul’l u gɑdo lɔunŋ ni. Sie k u jii’l k tuɑn bonsiɑl nbɑ fɔk pɑɑk, k niib i jik i kuɑ yuo nbɑ, bii lɑɑt yentu nɑ.
Bɑli nbɑ kul wuo, sie k l tɑn wuot nyii pɑɑnu ni, k lin nbɑ mun liik, sie k l tɑn likt k nyii.
«L pɑɑk, ii mi mɑn yɑɑ gbiintl Yennu mɑɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ. Wun nbɑ mɔk, u biɑ sɑɑ lɑ k pukn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k mɔk, b sɑɑ jii bonmintk nbɑ k u mɔk nɑ e.»
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu nɑɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm din bɑɑl, ŋɑɑn k k fit lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ nɑkn’ɔ, k mɑɑn niib nɑ din yɑbt ɑ.
K suɑ tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «A nɑɑ nɑn ɑ ninjɑnm be nɑn-yel po k luon bin lɑ’ɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Bin nbɑ gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn k sɑɑk k biɑ tuun l biɑnŋ, ŋɑnm e tie n nɑɑ nɑn n ninjɑnm.»
Dɑsiɑl k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din kuɑ bulgbetl ni, k u yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k t puot k sɑɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ gbingbɑnliel po.» K b sɑɑn.
Bɑɑ sɑɑ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu duɑl guɑn. K wonpɑɑluk tɑn fikt k dɑ mɔkgbenŋl mɑnŋ ni, k nyunpɑnɑ pil k kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni k tɑn yɑɑ lin gbie, k b ji din kuɑ ninbɔnŋ ni.
K u puolpoweitieb din bɑɑl k fiin’ɔ k yi ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, cɑnbɑɑ, t be kuun ni e.» K u fiil k tiɑn wounŋ nɑn nyunpɑnɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ bin ŋmin, k l ji din fuɑ k ŋmin suon nnɑ.
K u jiɑnt boi u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «I yɑdɑ be lee?» K jɑŋmɑɑni din suol’b, k l biɑ yɑɑl lit’b, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Jɑbuolbee e nɑ, k u tɑn yet mɔb k tul wounŋ nɑn nyunpɑnɑ k b sɑk u mɔb u?»
Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din puot mɔkgbenŋl k bɑɑl Gelɑɑsɑ tinŋ ni, k set, ŋɑɑn k Gɑɑliile tinŋ biɑl puolpo.
K Yiesu nbɑ din nyii bulgbetl nɑ ni, k Gelɑɑsɑ jɑsuɑ din cet’ɔ, k nɑlnbiit din be juɑ mɑnŋ ni, k u din k liɑ siɑl i k l wei hei. U biɑ din k sɑɑk kɑɑl ŋɑɑk ni, ŋɑɑn duɑ kɑɑt ni.
Wɑɑ din lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k u yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn k tiɑn yet ɑ: «Yiesu, fin nbɑ tie Yɑbnt Yennu Bijɑ, min nɑn fin, nlee mɑntk i? N bɑln’mɑ e, dɑɑ muksl’n.»

U din yet nnɑ k mɑɑn Yiesu ponŋ tiɑn u pɑɑk k yet’ɔ ɑ wun nyi juɑ mɑnŋ ni. Yuo kul, nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ din tuu fiil e, k b din tuu bɑɑn u nii nɑn u tɑɑ nɑn jɑlt k guu’u, ŋɑɑn k u tuu yɑn jɑlt nɑ, k nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ biel’ɔ k kuɑnt’ɔ muuk ni.
K Yiesu boi’ɔ, «A sɑnn ii?» K u jiin ɑ: «N sɑnn yi bul e,» k mɑɑn nɑlnbiit bonciɑnn din kuɑ juɑ mɑnŋ ni.
L yuo nɑ k nɑlnbiit mɑnŋ ji din bɑln Yiesu hei ɑ, u dɑɑ te k b sɑɑ buotsunsunŋ ni.
K duoli bonciɑnn din be kunkonn nɑ pɑɑk k di, k nɑlnbiit nɑ bɑln Yiesu ɑ wun cɑb’b bin sɑɑn kuɑ duoli mɑnŋ ni, k Yiesu cɑb’b sɔnu.
Ŋɑnn e k nɑlnbiit nɑ nyii juɑ nɑ ni k sɑɑn sɑɑ kuɑ duoli nɑ ni, k duoli nɑ kul din tin bulbulbul k nyii kunkonn nɑ pɑɑk k sik k sɑɑ bɑɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni, k dii nyun.
Duokpɑɑli nɑ nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ tien mɑnŋ, k b ciɑl l yuo nɑ, k sɑɑ muɑnt l lɑbɑɑl duo ni nɑn kpɑɑnt ni.
K niib bɑɑl ɑ bin lɑ lin nbɑ tun nɑ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol, k suɑ juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiit ponŋ nyii u ni nɑ, k u kɑl Yiesu buol nɑn lɑɑfiɑ nɑn u dudukt kul ɑ fɑnu, k ji liɑ tiɑt, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol niib nɑ.
K bin nbɑ lɑ’l nɑn b nuni nɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yiesu te k juɑ nbɑ mɔk nɑlnbiit nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k Gelɑɑsɑ tinŋ tieb kul din bɑɑl Yiesu buol k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun siet nnɑ kii sɑɑ, k mɑɑn jɑŋmɑɑni suol’b hei. K Yiesu ji din kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni ɑ wun ŋmɑt.
Juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiit nyii u ni nɑ bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun ŋɑɑn k wun ciɑn’ɔ. Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din te k u nyik ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ
«I ŋmɑt kii kun k sɑɑ muɑnt bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ k Yennu tun k tul’ɑ nɑ.» K u ŋmɑt k lin duo nɑ kul k muɑntl bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ k Yiesu tun k tul’ɔ nɑ.
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din ŋmɑt k sɑɑ puot mɔkgbenŋl nɑ, k suɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ din tuok’ɔ nɑn pɑlpienn, k mɑɑn b kul ponŋ din guu u bɑɑlu e.
Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din bɑɑl lenŋ k b din yi’u Sɑilus, k u din tie *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok sɑɑkuɑ, k u tɑn bɑɑl k gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl u ŋɑɑk ni,
ɑ k mɑɑn u bonpoyenml nbɑ mɔk nɑn binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle nɑ yiɑl, k pel kuun ɑ. Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑ nɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ mun wɑɑ’u k gbin muk k tɑn tut’ɔ.
K puosuɑ nnɑ mun biɑ din be lenŋ, k siik fɑbounŋ k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle, k u din tɑn yɑt u bonɑ kul k tul tebtieb, ŋɑɑn b suɑ din k fit teb’ɔ k u pɑɑk,
k u tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu puol k sii u liɑtfuouk mɔgbɑnn k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k u fɑbounŋ nɑ ji din jit.
K Yiesu boi ɑ: «Ŋmee sii’n i?» Suɑ kul nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ din noi, k Piɑl tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ɑ k lɑ nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ muk’ɑ ni ii?»
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet ɑ: «Suɑ sii’n ɑ, k mɑɑn n bɑnn nɑn pɑnsiɑk nyii n ni wɑɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k puo nɑ ji din bɑnn nɑn u kɑn fit bɔl u mɔnŋ, k ji din nyii pɑɑnu ni k jekl, k tɑn gbɑɑn Yiesu tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ suɑ kul nunm ni lin nbɑ pɑɑk k u sii’u, nɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ k u pɑɑk l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni.
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N bipuo, ɑ yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k ɑ pɑɑk. Ii sɑɑ nɑn mɑnu.»
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu dɑɑ din sie k piɑk nɑ, k *tuomi nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok sɑɑkuɑ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑk ni k tɑn bɑɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «A bonpobik nɑ tɑɑn kpo wɑɑ, k ɑ ji dɑɑ bɑknt Wɑntuɑ nɑ.»
K Yiesu gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ k jiɑnt yet Yennu jɑɑnti dieok sɑɑkuɑ nɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Tient yɑdɑ kuukuɑ, k u sɑɑ fiil ɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ din bɑɑl ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ nɑn-yel ni yuo nbɑ, u din k sɑk k suɑ n kuɑ, l i kii tie Piɑl nɑn Sɑn nɑn Sɑɑk k pukn bik nɑ bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ.
K bin nbɑ kul be lenŋ mɔ kumɔni k fɑbn bik mɑnŋ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ mɔ mɑn. Bik nɑ k kpo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u guɑnt e.»
K niib nɑ lɑɑ’u; k mɑɑn b mi nɑn bik nɑ set kpo wɑɑ.
K Yiesu suol bik nɑ nuu ŋɑɑn yiin ɑ: «N bik, fiit.»
K u jen u mɑnfuol ni k fiil yiɑn ɑ, k Yiesu yet’b ɑ bin tul bik nɑ jiet k wun di.
L din bɑkt bik nɑ bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bonciɑnn; ŋɑɑn Yiesu din yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ bii mi k bin yet suɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ.
L puolpo k Yiesu din tɑn yiin u tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ k lɑkn’m, k tul’b pɑnŋ nɑn yiikuo nbɑ k b sii nyint nɑlnbiit nbɑ kul be niib ni, kii biɑ kii te k bɑɑtb i pɑɑkt,
k ji din te k b yɑt ɑ bii lin kii muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn po, k biɑ te k bɑɑtb i pɑɑkt.
K u yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ jikt siɑl k sɑɑ nɑn’n. I dɑɑ diɑ pɑti, ɑmi pɑkɑ, ɑmi pɑɑnu, ɑmi likli, ɑmi liɑtfɔkt ŋɑnlele.
Ŋɑɑk nbɑ k i sɑɑ kuɑ, yin biɑl lenŋ nɑn yɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi duo mɑnŋ ni.
Siɑn nbɑ kul k niib k tuok’i nɑn pɑlpienn, yin pit i tɑɑpɑnt ni tɑnt bil l duo ni yuo nbɑ k i nyi lenŋ, k l sii tie *siɑlɑ nbɑ wɑnt nɑn b mɔk biit.»
Ŋɑnn e k u *puolpoweitieb nɑ din nyii k lin digbɑnɑ ni k muɑntl Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn, k biɑ te k bɑɑtb pɑɑk l digbɑnɑ kul ni.
K Gɑɑliile kpɑnbɑl *Heluod din tɑn gbɑt lɑbɑɑl nbɑ din tun nɑ kul, k l ŋmɑt u yɑn ni, k mɑɑn yenm din yɑɑ ɑ Sɑn e fiil kuun ni,
k lieb yɑɑ ɑ yɑɑyuo ni sɔkni Elii e dɔkt, k lieb mun yɑɑ ɑ yɑɑyuo ni sɔkniinbɑ yenɔ e fiil kuun ni,
ŋɑɑn k Heluod yet ɑ: «N dɑɑn te k b pot Sɑn yul ɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmee k n jin gbiɑ u po nɑ mun i?» K u ji din kol l yuo nɑ ɑ wun lɑ Yiesu.
Tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn jen k yet Yiesu lin nbɑ k b dɑɑn sɑɑn sɑɑ tun. K u ji din jii’b k b sɑɑn dosɑu nbɑ k b yi Betsɑidɑ, b kuukuɑ.
Ŋɑɑn nibul nɑ nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b wei Yiesu k sɑɑn, k u tuok’b nɑn pɑlpienn, k wɑnn’b Yennu nɑɑn po, k biɑ te k bin nbɑ luon pɑɑku nɑ pɑɑk.

Yuo nbɑ k yennu din tɑn mɑɑkt nɑ, k u tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ bɑɑl u buol k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k nibul nɑ n sɑɑn doi nɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kpiɑ nɑ ni k lɑ jiet nɑn dunduɑnbuol, k mɑɑn nnɑ nɑ tie muuk ni e.»
K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ n tul’b jiet k bin di.» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «T k mɔk siɑl k pukn pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle nɑ po, k t nɔk sɑɑ sɑɑn dɑɑ jiet k tɑn dinn nibul nɑ kul ɑmi ii?»
(Jɑb nbɑ din be lenŋ nɑ din tie nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ.) K Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k niib nɑ n bɔkt kɑl piinŋmuŋmu.»
K u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn k b kul bɔkt kɑl kɑl.
K u jii pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle nɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt got sɑnpɑɑpo, k tul Yennu niipuouk jiet nɑ pɑɑk, k ji din ŋmit ŋmit k tul u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ bii tuol nibul nɑ,
k b kul dii k jɑnŋ. K u puolpoweitieb lɑkn jiet nbɑ k niib nɑ dii k tɑn tenn nɑ, k l gbie kpɑncubt piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
Dɑsiɑl k Yiesu din mei Yennu u kuukuɑ, k u puolpoweitieb din tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni l yuo nɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: «Nibul nɑ yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?»
K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yenm yɑɑ ɑ ɑ tie Sɑn wun nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e, k lieb mun yɑɑ ɑ ɑ tie Elii, k siɑb mun yɑɑ ɑ yɑɑyuo ni sɔkniinbɑ yenɔ e tɑn fiil kuun ni.»
K u boi’b ɑ: «K yinm ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ n tie ŋmee?» K Piɑl jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie Yennu *Klistu nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ b dɑɑ yien suɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ,

k biɑ yet’b ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ n di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, k t tinŋ ni sɑɑkɑb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb sɑɑ yet’ɔ, k biɑ kpi’u wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
Ŋɑnn e k u yet b kul ɑ: «Wun nbɑ i luon wun wei’n, sie k u yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn dɑɑl kul kii wɑɑ’n,
k mɑɑn wun nbɑ luon wun kɔn u mɑnfuol pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk n pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ lɑ u mɑnfuol nɑn bɑlmɔni.
Nilɔ i lɑ tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk kul, ŋɑɑn biil u mɔnŋ binbenŋ k kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol, nyɔlɑnt po e k u sɑɑ lɑ?
Wun nbɑ tiin fei k jiin min nɑn n wɑnnu nɑ po, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ i tɑnŋ i jen nɑn u *yudɑnt, nɑn u Bɑɑ yudɑnt nɑn u *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ yudɑnt, l yuo mɑnŋ u tɑn sɑɑ tin’ɔ fei mun.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yɑɑ n yien’i nɑ, siɑb be nnɑ k dɑɑ kɑn kpo sie k b tɑn lɑ Yennu nɑɑn sinsinn.»
Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, l puolpo e k l tien nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnniin nɑ, k u jii Piɑl nɑn Sɑn nɑn Sɑɑk, k duo nɑn’m juɑl pɑɑk ɑ bin sɑɑ miɑl Yennu.
Wɑɑ din mei Yennu nɑ k u nunm po tɑn kpint, k u tiɑt penn k nyilk.
L yuo nɑ k jɑb bɑnle nnɑ lekt lenŋ. L din tie Muois nɑn Elii e,
k b tiɑt nɑn b gbɑnɑnt nyili. B din piɑk nɑn Yiesu k jikt sɑɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ kpo Selusɑɑlenm k tun u tuonn k gbenn.
Guɑn din suol Piɑl nɑn u lieb bonciɑnn, k b guɑn k tɑn kpil yelk k fiil, k lɑ k yentsɑɑkɑl yent k lint Yiesu, k b biɑ lɑ jɑb bɑnle nbɑ din sie u buol nnɑ.

Jɑb mɑnŋ nbɑ din tɑn nyikt Yiesu nɑ, k Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, l ŋɑn nɑn tii be nnɑ nɑ. T sɑɑ fɑɑ lɑnbont ŋɑntɑ e, k yenn i tie ɑ yɑl, k liel i tie Muois yɑl, k liel mun i tie Elii yɑl.» Piɑl nbɑ din piɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, u din gbiɑ ɑ u piɑk e.
Wɑɑ din dɑɑ piɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, k sɑnpɑgbɑnn dɔkt k tɑn piin’m, k jɑŋmɑɑni din suol u puolpoweitieb nɑ nɑn sɑnpɑgbɑnn nbɑ dɔkt k piin’m nɑ.
K b din gbɑt kunkɔl sɑnpɑgbɑnn nɑ ni, k l yet ɑ: «N Bijɑ wun nbɑ k n lukt’ɔ e nɑ. Ii sɑɑk u mɔb mɑn.»
Kunkɔl nɑ nbɑ din pɑk gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b ji lɑ k Yiesu kuɑ e biɑl sie. L puolpo e k b ji din biɑl ŋmin k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ po, ŋɑɑn k k kumi suɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ l yuo nɑ.
L din tɑn yent k Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb nyii juɑl nɑ pɑɑk k sik, k nibulciɑɔnŋ din tuok’ɔ.
K jɑsuɑ din be nibul nɑ ni, k din tɑn tiɑn yiin Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, n bɑln’mɑ e, tɑn gotl n bijɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e kpɑn tie n biyenml,
k nɑlnbiiuk tuu te k wun kpil yikn k lu’u, k u tɑbt, k mɔsɑnkunkuounŋ nyi u mɔb ni, k u dint’ɔ wɑhɑlɑ k l gbiɑ’u k tuu tɑn wolk’ɔ wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k k nyikt’ɔ.
N bɑln ɑ puolpoweitieb ɑ bin nyinn nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ, k b gbɑl.»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yinm biitdɑnm, yinm nbɑ kɑɑ yɑdɑ. N sɑɑ wei nɑn’i nlee k di suklu nɑn’i mɑntk i?» K u biɑ yet juɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Bɑɑt nɑn ɑ bijɑ nɑ.»
K bik nɑ nbɑ din bɑɑt Yiesu buol ni yuo nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ libl’ɔ nɑn tinŋ gbɑb, k u bɑɑ duɑ k tɑbt. Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu tiɑn nɑlnbiiuk nɑ pɑɑk, k te k bik nɑ pɑɑk, k jii’u k tul’ɔ u bɑɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k l yɑɑl lit niib nɑ kul nɑn Yennu nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. L dɑɑ din bɑkt nibul nɑ nɑn wɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ kul nɑ pɑɑk, k Yiesu ŋmɑt yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ
«Luotl i tubɑ mɑn k gbɑt fɑnu lin nbɑ k n yɑɑ n pɑk k tul’i nɑ. B tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k kubn’ɔ niib nuu ni.»
Ŋɑɑn b lek din k bɑnn l pɑɑk, k mɑɑn siɑl din dɔkn b yɑn e, ɑ b dɑɑ bɑnt, k b biɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn bin boi Yiesu l mɑɑn pɑɑk.
L puolpo e k mɔniɑɔk din tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ sinsuuk ni, k b noi ɑ bin lɑɑn ŋmee tie nijɑɑnn b sinsuuk ni.
K Yiesu bɑnn bɑɑ duki biɑnŋ nbɑ. L pɑɑk k u jii bik nnɑ k senn’ɔ u nunm ni,
ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ gɑɑl bik nbɑ nɑ n sɑnn pɑɑk, u gɑɑl min e, k wun nbɑ mun sɑk k gɑɑl’n, u gɑɑl wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e mun biɑk. K mɑɑn wun nbɑ tie tɑlk i ni, ŋuɑ e tie nijɑɑnn k gɑl i kul ɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Sɑn din yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, t dɑɑn lɑ k jɑsuɑ mun tɑɑn ɑ sɑnn k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k t yet’ɔ ɑ wun nyik, k mɑɑn u k tie t ni yenɔ.»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «I dɑɑ tɑb’ɔ mɑn, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul k kɔn nɑn’i ni, u sie i puol e.»
Tɔn, yuo nbɑ k l din tɑn pel nɑn Yiesu n do *Yendɔunŋ ni, k u din tɑn fɑɑ pɑl k suol sɔnu ɑ wun sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm,
k u tun tuomiinbɑ ɑ bin gɑl *Sɑɑmɑɑli niib digbɑnbik nbɑ be liik ɑ bin tien siil nɑn u bɑɑlu,
ŋɑɑn lenŋ niib din k luon bin gɑɑl’ɔ, k mɑɑn b din mi nɑn u sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm e.
K u puolpoweitieb Sɑɑk nɑn Sɑn nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ luon k t te k muu n nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k sik di biil’b ii?»
Ŋɑɑn Yiesu jiɑnt gɑɑl jɑt b pɑɑk ɑ bin nyik ɑ, [k yet ɑ: «I k mi siek nbɑ te k i mɔk l dudukt.
K mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k bɑɑl ɑ wun buon niib sei kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u bɑɑl ɑ wun fiel’b e,»] k b nyik, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn digbɑnliel po.
Yuo nbɑ k b din sɑɑ mɑnŋ k jɑsuɑ tɑn yet Yiesu ɑ: «N sɑɑ wei’ɑ siɑn nbɑ kul po k ɑ sɑɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Lunlonɑ mɔk fɔli, k nuɑni mun biɑ mɔk tiɑt, ŋɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k mɔk dunduɑnbuol.»
K u biɑ tɑn yet jɑluɑ ɑ: «I wɑɑ’n.» K juɑ mɑnŋ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑnt k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ pii n bɑɑ sinsinn ɑ.»
K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k kpienm i pii b kpienlieb. Fin, i sɑɑ wɑɑ, kii sɑi muɑntl niib Yennu nɑɑn po.»
K luɑ mun yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n sɑɑ wei’ɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k n kun k sɑɑ cɑb n ŋɑɑtieb sinsinn ɑ k ji fit wei’ɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ diɑ nɑɑsɔk k ko ŋɑɑn goli puolpo, l dɑɑnɔ k ŋɑn nɑn Yennu nɑɑn tuontumu.»
L puolpo e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din lukt nilieb piinlole nɑn bɑnle k tun’m bɑnlele ɑ bin dɔnŋ gɑl doi ni, siɑn nbɑ po kul k u sɑɑ bɑɑl.
Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Dii nɑ biel k yɑb ɑ, ŋɑɑn k dijɑɑntieb wɑɑl. L pɑɑk, ii mei mɑn dii nɑ dɑɑnɔ k wun ŋɑnm pukn dijɑɑntieb k te k bin sɑɑn jɑɑn u dii mɑnŋ.
Ii sɑɑ mɑn. Gotl, n tuun’i, k i sii tie nɑn pebis nbɑ be kinkɑtɑ sinsuuk ni nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ jikt likbuɑli ɑmi pɑkɑ ɑmi tɑɑsɑliɑ. I biɑ dɑɑ sie sɔnu ni k fuont niib k kpɑmi.
Ŋɑɑk nbɑ yɑɑ ni k i sɑɑ kuɑ, yin fuont k yet ɑ: ‹Mɑnu ii be ŋɑɑk nɑ niib pɑɑk.›
K ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ i luon mɑnu, u sɑɑ gɑɑl. L i kii tie nnɑ, mɑnu mɑnŋ biɑ sɑɑ jen i pɑɑk nɑ.
L i tie k i kuɑ ŋɑɑk nbɑ yɑɑ ni, ii be lenŋ kii di kii nyu lin nbɑ k b tien’i, k mɑɑn tuontunnɔ ŋɑn k wun gɑɑl u pɑɑɔk o. I dɑɑ lin k luɑn ŋei k duɑ.
L i tie k i bɑɑl duo nbɑ yɑɑ ni k b tuok’i nɑn pɑlpienn, ŋɑɑn tɑn tul’i jiet nbɑ, yin di.
I te k bɑɑtb n pɑɑk lenŋ ŋɑɑn kii yien niib mɑnŋ ɑ: ‹Yennu nɑɑn nɑkn’i wɑɑ.›
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k i bɑɑl duo nbɑ ni k niib nɑ k gɑɑl’i, yin nyi sɔni pɑɑk ŋɑɑn kii yien ɑ:
‹T tɑɑ nbɑ tɑb i duo nɑ tɑnbiini nɑ, t pit ŋɑnn e k lubn k cɑbt’i. Ŋɑɑn ii mi mɑn nɑn Yennu nɑɑn ponŋ nɑkn’i wɑɑ.›
N yien’i e nɑn buut bunu dɑɑl, duo mɑnŋ niib tubdɑtu tɑn sɑɑ gɑl Suodonmtieb yɑl ɑ.»

«L sii bi yinm Kolɑsentieb pɑɑk. L sii bi yinm Betsɑidɑtieb mun yɑɑ pɑɑk. K mɑɑn mi i bo i tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ Tiil nɑn Siidɔn doi ni nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn tun i doi ni nɑ, b bo sɑɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn yiɑn ɑ k jii bɔtuot k liɑ liɑ k puk b mɔnŋ tɑnpen k wɑnn nɑn b luon k bin lebt binbenŋ.
Dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑ, i tubdɑtu tɑn sɑɑ gɑl Tiil nɑn Siidɔn tieb yɑl ɑ.
Yinm Kɑpelnɑunmtieb, i duki nɑn i tɑn sɑɑ do sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ? Aɑi, i tɑn sɑɑ sik muu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu ni e.»
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu din yet u *puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Wun nbɑ gbiin i mɑɑn, u gbiin min e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yet’i, u yet min e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yet’n, u yet Yennu nbɑ tun’n nɑ e mun biɑk.»
Ŋɑnn e k jɑb piinlole nɑn bɑnle mɑnŋ din tɑn jen nɑn pɑlpienn k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ sɑnn ni e k nɑlnbiit tɑn sɑɑk t mɔi.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «N lɑ k *Sɑɑtɑn nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ nɑn sɑnyiknti nɑ.
Gbiintl mɑn, n ponŋ tul’i yiikuo k i sii ŋmɑɑt wɑi nɑn nɑni pɑɑk, kii nyɑni i dɑtɑɑk pɑnŋ kul, k siɑl kɑn tien’i ni.
Ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn nɑlnbiit nbɑ sɑk i mɔi nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii jik i mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn nɑn Yennu ponŋ diɑn i sɑnɑ *Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.»

L yuo mɑnŋ k Foŋɑnm din te k Yiesu mɔk pɑlpienn hei, k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ wun nbɑ tie sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n piɑk’ɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ bɔl lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ subndɑnm nɑn mitieb buol e, ŋɑɑn fiit wɑnn wɑɑs. Nnn Cɑnbɑɑ, nnɑ e k ɑ luon k ɑ tun, k l mɑn’ɑ.»

Yiesu biɑ din ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ e wɑnn’n mɑɑn kul ɑ. Suɑ k mi Bijɑ nɑ nbɑ tie wun nbɑ sie Bɑɑ mɑnŋ, k suɑ mun biɑ k mi Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ tie wun nbɑ, sie Bijɑ nɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ k Bijɑ luon wun fiit Bɑɑ mɑnŋ wɑnn’b nɑ.»
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu ji din ŋmɑt got u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn yet’b b kuukuɑ ɑ: «Pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn i ninbinɑ nbɑ lɑ lin nbɑ k i lɑɑt nɑ.
N yien’i e nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ bonciɑnn din luon bin lɑ lin nbɑ k i lɑɑt nɑ, ŋɑɑn din k lɑ, k biɑ din luon bin gbɑt lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k i gbiɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn din k gbɑt.»
Dɑsiɑl k *senniwɑntɔsuɑ din fiil k set k luon wun bikn Yiesu k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu?»
K Yiesu jiin k boi’ɔ ɑ: «L diɑn nlee Yennu *senni ni? A lii k lɑɑt nlee?»

K juɑ nɑ jiin ɑ: «Fii mɑntk kii luon Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nɑn ɑ pɑl kul ɑ, kii biɑ kii luon’ɔ nɑn ɑ siek kul ɑ, nɑn ɑ pɑnŋ kul ɑ, nɑn ɑ dudukt kul ɑ, kii biɑ kii luon *ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A jiinu ŋɑn. Ii tuun nnɑ k tɑn lɑ mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.»
Ŋɑɑn k *senniwɑntuɑ nɑ lek din luon wun wɑnn nɑn u tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol ni, k boi Yiesu ɑ: «Tɔn, k ŋmee tie n luɑ?»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din nyii Selusɑɑlenm k siik Seliiko, k fɑt-tieb tɑn pikn’ɔ k liɑt u tiɑt k fɑt, ŋɑɑn buo’u bonciɑnn, k tɑn tenn u kuun dɑlk dɑlk nnɑ, ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
L puolpo e k tɑn suɑ k Yennu mɑnntɔsuɑ nnɑ mun tɔk l sɔnu k siik bɑɑt k tɑn lɑ juɑ nɑ k u duɑ, k u lɔk gɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
L biɑnŋ e nɑ biɑk, k Liefi buolu ni jɑsuɑ mun din bɑɑt lenŋ k tɑn lɑ juɑ mɑnŋ, k mun biɑ lɔk k gɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn *Sɑɑmɑɑli jɑsuɑ mun din tɔk l sɔnu k bɑɑt k tɑn dɔkt juɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk k lɑ’u, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn,
k u bɑɑl k jii kpɑn nɑn dɑɑn k wuul u fiɑt nɑ ŋɑɑn fin tɑnɑ, k jii’u k pɑɑn’ɔ u bonŋ pɑɑk k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ sɑɑnm dieok ni k sɑɑ got’ɔ.
Lɑɑ din tɑn yent yuo nbɑ k u jii denienbɑ ŋɑnle k tul wun nbɑ din goli sɑɑnm dieok nɑ, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ: ‹Ii goli juɑ nɑ, k mi i tɑnŋ i jen dɑɑl nbɑ, n sɑɑ pukn’ɑ lin nbɑ k ɑ din’ɔ k pukn nɑ pɑɑk.› »
Yiesu nbɑ pɑk nnɑ k gbenn, k u boi *senniwɑntuɑ nɑ ɑ: «Jɑb bɑntɑ nɑ ni, ŋmee wɑnt nɑn u tie wun nbɑ k fɑt-tieb fɑt’ɔ nɑ luɑ?»
K u jiin ɑ: «Wun nbɑ din tin’ɔ ninbɑɑɔk nɑ.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tɔn, fin, i sɑɑ kii tuun l biɑnŋ mun.»
Yiesu nɑn u puolpoweitieb din sɑɑ b sɔnu, k b sɑɑ bɑɑl digbɑnbisiɑk nnɑ ni, k puosuɑ din be lenŋ k b yi’u Mɑɑlt, k u din gɑɑl Yiesu nɑn pɑlpienn u ŋɑɑk ni.
U din mɔk niipuo k u sɑnn tie Mɑɑli, k Mɑɑli nɑ din bɑɑl k tɑn kɑl tinŋ ni k nɑkn Yonmdɑɑnɔ tɑɑ po k gbiintl u mɑɑn.

Ŋɑɑn k Mɑɑlt mun din gbɑɑ nɑn sɑɑncɑntuk kul kul, k u tɑn bɑɑl yet Yiesu ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, mɑɑ gbɑɑ nɑn sɑɑɔnŋ cɑntuk n kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn k n niipuo nɑ k sonmt’n, ɑ bɑkɑ kɑɑ l po oo? Yet’ɔ k wun bɑɑl k tɑn sonm’n.»
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɑɑlt, Mɑɑlt, n mi nɑn ɑ gbɑɑ nɑn bonɑ bonciɑnn, k l muks’ɑ hei,
ŋɑɑn bon-yenn kuukuɑ e kpɑɑ tɑlɑs. Mɑɑli gɑnn lin nbɑ ŋɑn, k suɑ kɑn fɑt’l.»

Dɑɑsiɑl k Yiesu din be siɑl po k mei Yennu. Wɑɑ miɑl gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u *puolpoweitieb yenɔ tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wɑnt’t tɑɑ sii mei Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑn Sɑn nbɑ mun din wɑnn u puolpoweitieb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yɑɑ tuu sii mei Yennu biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ: Bɑɑ, ɑ sɑnn n lɑ dontl. Ŋɑɑnt k ɑ nɑɑn n bɑɑl.
Tul’t mɑnn dɑɑl kul
Nyikn cɑb t biit nɑn tɑɑ mun nyikt k cɑbt bin nbɑ biil’t nɑ. A dɑɑ te k t kuɑ jɑnmi ni.»
Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «T sɑɑ yet ɑ i yenɔ mɔk u yuɑk k sɑɑn u ŋɑɑk ni nyiɑɔk tɑnsuuni k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, kpentl’n pɑɑni ŋɑntɑ,
k mɑɑn n yuɑs nbɑ ni yenɔ nyii sɔnu k bɑɑl n ŋɑɑk ni, ŋɑɑn k n k mɔk siɑl k sɑɑ tul’ɔ.›
K wun nbɑ be ŋɑɑk ni jiin ɑ: ‹Dɑɑ muks’n. N ponŋ kpɑl gɑnn ɑ, k min nɑn n wɑɑs biɑ duɑl ɑ. N kɑn fit fiil k tul’ɑ pɑɑnu.›
Gotl, n yien’i e, u kɑn sɑk fiil k tul’ɔ jiet mɑnŋ, wɑɑ tie u yuɑk nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ k tiin fei k biɑ mei’ɔ nɑ, sie k u tɑn tɑt fiil k tul’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ k u luon.
«L pɑɑk, n biɑ yien’i, miɑt mɑn, k b sɑɑ tul’i. Lomin mɑn, k i sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ. Kpɑɑn gɑnn mɑn, k b sɑɑ luot k tul’i,
k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul mei, gɑɑn e, k wun nbɑ mun luon, u lɑɑt e, k wun nbɑ kpɑɑn gɑnn, b luotl tien’ɔ.
Yinm bɑɑnbɑ, i ŋmee k u bijɑ sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ jɑnŋ k wun jii wɑɑɔk k tul’ɔ?
Ami ŋmee k u sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ jenn k wun jii nɑnŋ k tul’ɔ?
K l i tie k yinm nbɑ tie biitdɑnm nɑ mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k i sɑɑ tul i wɑɑs bonŋɑnɑ, k i Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ ŋɑnin kɑn jii Foŋɑnm k tul bin nbɑ mei’ɔ l po nɑ ɑɑ?»
Yiesu din nyint nɑlnbiiuk nbɑ din be jɑsuɑ ni k tien’ɔ muuk nɑ. Yuo nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ nyii u ni k gbenn, k juɑ nɑ muut k piin k piɑk. K l bɑkt nibul nɑ bonciɑnn.
Ŋɑɑn k yenm din yet ɑ: «Nɑlnbiit bɑt Beelsebuul e tien’ɔ yiikuo k u nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.»
Ŋɑɑn k yenm mun din luon k bin bikn Yiesu, k yɑɑ ɑ wun wɑnn’b *nyinn nbɑ nyii *Yendɔunŋ ni.
K Yiesu bɑnn bɑɑ duki lin nbɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Nɑɑn niib i ŋmɑt k kɔn tuokt b lieb, b nɑɑn mɑnŋ sɑɑ biil ɑ, k ŋɑɑk niib i mun i ŋmɑt kɔn nɑn lieb, l kɑn set.
Tɔn, l i tie k *Sɑɑtɑn ŋmɑt kɔn nɑn u lieb, nlee k u nɑɑn sɑɑ set i? N yet nnɑ k mɑɑn i yɑɑ ɑ Beelsebuul e tien’n yiikuo ɑ mii nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni.
L i tie k n nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni nɑn Beelsebuul yiikuo nɑ, ŋmee yiikuo ni e k i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑɑs nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni i? Ŋɑnn e k b tuonɑ wɑnt nɑn i k mɔk mɔni.
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k l tie Yennu yiikuo ni k n nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, l wɑnt nɑn Yennu nɑɑn ponŋ bɑɑl i buol ni wɑɑ.
«Jɑwɑktl nbɑ tien siil nɑn u jɑtiɑt k guu u ŋɑɑk, u bonsiɑl kul kɑn sii,
ŋɑɑn u pɑɑlɔ mun i tɑnŋ i pikn’ɔ k pɑɑk’ɔ, u sɑɑ fɑt u jɑtiɑt nbɑ k u dɑɑn l pɑɑk nɑ e, k biɑ jii u mɔktuk k tol niib.
«Wun nbɑ k sie n puol, u kɔn nɑn’n e, k wun nbɑ mun k tiki niib k tien’n, u yɑt’b e.»
«L i tie k nɑlnbiiuk tɑn nyii nilɔ ni, u tuu yiek e k lin mɔkuounŋ ni, k luon fuonbuol, ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt. L pɑɑk, u tuu tɑn yet u mɔnŋ e ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ ŋmɑt sɑɑn ŋɑɑk nbɑ ni k n dɑɑn nyii nɑ ni e.›
U ji kii ŋmɑt tɑn bɑɑl, wun lɑ k b piɑl k ŋɑnm ɑ,
u ji sɑɑ ŋmɑt nyi e k sɑɑ yiin nɑlnbilieb bɑnlole, bin nbɑ bi k cie u pɑɑk, k bɑɑl nɑn’m, k bin kuɑ k lɑkn be, k nilɔ mɑnŋ binbenŋ ji sii bi bonciɑnn k gɑl wɑɑ dɑɑn tuu be sinsinn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ din dɑɑ yien nnɑ mɑnŋ, k puosuɑ nnɑ be nibul nɑ ni, k yet sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Puo nbɑ mɑl’ɑ k muɑn’ɑ nɑ, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e.»
K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bin nbɑ gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn k sɑɑk’l, ŋɑnm e k pɑlpienn tie b yɑl.»
Nibul nbɑ din gbin Yiesu buol ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ tie biitdɑnm e, k mɑɑn b luon bin lɑ nyinn, ŋɑɑn b kɑn lɑ nyinsiɑl, l i kii tie Suonɑ nyinn nɑ i kɑɑ.
Biɑnŋ nbɑ k Suonɑ din tien nyinn k tul Niiniif tieb nɑ, l biɑnŋ e mun k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun sɑɑ tien nyinn k tul mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ.

Buut dɑɑl, puosuɑ nbɑ din tie kpɑnbɑl nbɑ din nyii gɑnŋ po nɑ tɑn sɑɑ set wɑnn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ tingbounŋ nɑ niib mɔk biit, k mɑɑn u din nyii digbɑnbɑnfɔkl e wɑɑ k tɑn bɑɑl ɑ wun gbiint kpɑnbɑl Sɑɑlomɔn yɑnfuon nɑ pinpɑɔk, k gotl mɑn, wun nbɑ cie Sɑɑlomɔn nɑ be nnɑ.
Buut dɑɑl, Niiniiftieb tɑn sɑɑ set wɑnn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ mɔk biit, k mɑɑn Suonɑ muɑnti pɑɑk k b din mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k gotl mɑn, wun nbɑ cie Suonɑ be nnɑ.»
«B k jokt fitl ŋɑɑn jikt k tie wuol ni, ɑmi k liknt bokt l pɑɑk. Sie k b jii’l k tuɑnn bonsiɑl nbɑ fɔk nɑ pɑɑk k lin yent, k niib i jik i kuɑ yuo nbɑ, bii lɑɑt yentu nɑ.
A ninbinɑ e tie ɑ gbɑnɑnt fitl. A ninbinɑ i ŋɑn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul sii mɔk yentu, ŋɑɑn ɑ ninbinɑ i kii ŋɑn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul sii be bunbɔnn ni e.
Ii mi mɑn k yentu nbɑ be i ni nɑ dɑɑ kpɑntl tie bunbɔnn.
Tɔn, ɑ gbɑnɑnt kul i yien bonŋɑnn k siɑl po k be bunbɔnn ni, l sii yien e k nyili pilpilpil, k nɑɑn nɑn fitl nbɑ yien k tien’ɑ yienŋɑnu nɑ.»
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk gbenn nɑ, k Fɑɑliisiɑnsuɑ din yet’ɔ ɑ wun wei’ɔ k bin sɑɑ di jiet. K u din wei sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ k kɑl ɑ wun di.
K l din tien Fɑɑliisiɑn mɑnŋ bɑktnɔunŋ wɑɑ lɑ k Yiesu k fobt nɑn b kɑɑl nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ wun di nɑ.
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yinm Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ, i tuu soki ŋmɑni nɑn seni puolpo kuukuɑ e, ŋɑɑn k i pɑlɑ ni gbie nɑn fɑtu nɑn bonbiil.
Yinm jɑtt nɑ. Wun nbɑ din nɑn puolpo nɑ, ŋuɑ kɑɑ din nɑn nuɑk ni mun ii?
Tuln tɑlɑs-dɑnm lin nbɑ be i ŋmɑni ni nɑn i seni ni, k i nɑn-yel po nɑn nuɑk ni kul sii yien.

«Yinm Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk. I jikt ment nɑn luu nɑn kpinliet nbɑ k b buul gungounŋ ni l buolu kul ni bɔktu piik ni bɔkyenn kuɑ, k tien Yennu, ŋɑɑn bɑkn lin nbɑ tuok, k biɑ k luon Yennu. L bo sii ŋɑn k yii tuun ŋɑnn, k dɑɑ nyikt lin nbɑ tenn.
«Yinm Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i luon nijɑɑnɑ kinkɑɑni boɑ *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k biɑ luon niib i fuont’i nɑn nibɑɑkl fuonti dɑi ni.
L sii bi i pɑɑk. I tie nɑn kɑɑt nbɑ k niib tuu ŋmɑɑ k do l pɑɑk ŋɑɑn kɑn bɑnn’l nɑ e.»
Ŋɑnn e k *senniwɑntɔyenɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, fɑɑ yet nnɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn ɑ sukl’t e nɑ mun.»
K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yinm *senniwɑntieb, l sii bi i pɑɑk mun, k mɑɑn i jint niib jik-kpiɑtɑ nbɑ pɑɑl nɑn bin jii, ŋɑɑn i mɔnŋ k sɑɑk k yii siin jikɑ mɑnŋ kii sonmt’b.
L sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i mɑɑ sɔkniinbɑ kɑɑt k sent bonŋɑnn. Ŋɑnm mɑnŋ e tie sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ k i yejɑnm din kpii’b mɑnŋ.
Yɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑnn e wɑnt niib nɑn i set sɑk i yejɑnm nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑnm e din kpii sɔkniinbɑ mɑnŋ, k i mun sɑɑn sɑɑ mɑɑ b kɑɑt mɑnŋ.
L pɑɑk, k Yɑndɑɑnɔ Yennu din yet ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tun sɔkniinbɑ nɑn tuomiinbɑ b buol ni, k b sɑɑ kpi siɑb ŋɑɑn muks lieb,›
ɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ n tɑn lɑ tubdɑtu sɔkniinbɑ kul kpinu nɑ pɑɑk. Kpinu mɑnŋ din piin *dulnyɑ nɑmu yuo e wɑɑ,

Kɑɑen nbɑ din kpii Abel yuo nbɑ nɑ, k l jii k tɑn bɑɑl Sɑɑkɑɑli kpinu, wun nbɑ k b din kpii’u Yennu *mɑnnu binbintl nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sinsuuk ni nɑ. N yien’i nɑn bɑlmɔni e, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ tubdɑtu lin nbɑ nɑ kul pɑɑk.
«Yinm *senniwɑntieb, l sii bi i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn i mɔk pienu nbɑ sɑɑ fit luot minu gɑnn. I k kuɑ lenŋ k i biɑ k cɑb bin nbɑ luon bin kuɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ siet lenŋ mɑnŋ, k senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ wutuol ji din duo bonciɑnn, k b ji din piin boi’ɔ buboit k jikt sɑɑ lɑbɑɑl bonciɑnn po,
k b lek din kol ɑ bin lɑ u mɔbonkpetl k fit tɑɑl’ɔ.

L yuo mɑnŋ k niib tusɑ tusɑ din muk lɑkn lieb, k tɑn ŋmɑɑt lieb tɑɑgbinɑ, k Yiesu din pɑk nɑn u *puolpoweitieb sinsinn k yɑɑ ɑ: «Ii lɔktl mɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ tumiiu nbɑ k tuok nɑ, b tie kpinkpɑnni dɑnm e.
Bɑlsɑi kɑɑ k duɑk k tɑn kɑn nyi pɑɑnu ni. Siɑl mun k be wuol ni k b tɑn kɑn bɑnn’l.
L pɑɑk, lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k i pɑk bunbɔnn ni nɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi yentu ni. Lin nbɑ k i lek lɔkn diet ni, ŋɑɑn l tɑn sɑɑ wuot k muɑnt nyi wɑɑ.»
«N yuɑsnbɑ, n yien’i e, i dɑɑ tiin bin nbɑ kpi gbɑnɑnt kuukuɑ nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn, k mɑɑn b kpi i gbɑnɑnt kuukuɑ e, k l puolpo b kɑn fit tien’i siɑl.
N sɑɑ wɑnn’i wun nbɑ k i sii tiin’ɔ. Tinin wun nbɑ fit kpi i gbɑnɑnt k biɑ mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k sɑɑ fit lu’i muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni. N yien’i e, tinin ŋuɑ e mɑn.»
«B k kɔi nuɑnbit bɑnŋmu kujɑ ŋɑnle ee? Ŋɑɑn Yennu k mi tɑnm nɑn b yenɔ kuɑ po wɑɑ.
Setk nɑn mɔni Yennu ponŋ mi i yulɑ pɑɑk yut kɑnn. I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn i mɔk nyuɑt k gɑl nuɑnbit bonciɑnn.»
«N yien’i e, wun nbɑ nyint u mɔnŋ pɑɑnu ni niib ni nɑn u tie n weilɔ e, *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’ɔ pɑɑnu ni Yennu *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ buol ni, nɑn u tie u yuɑ e,
ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ u k tie n weilɔ, niib ni, Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ yet ɑ u k mi’u, Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ mɑnŋ buol ni.
«Wun nbɑ kul pɑk mɔbonn k biil Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ, Yennu sɑɑ nyik cɑb’ɔ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ pɑk biil Foŋɑnm nɑ, Yennu kɑn nyik cɑb’ɔ.
«B i suol’i k bɑɑl nɑn’i *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni ɑmi kpɑnbɑlɑ buol ɑmi tinŋ yudɑnm buol, i dɑɑ te k l dɑɑnm’i nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk jiin biɑnŋ nbɑ, ɑmi yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ,
k mɑɑn l yuo nɑ e k Foŋɑnm tɑn sɑɑ wɑnn’i biɑnŋ nbɑ k i sɑɑ pɑk.»
L yuo mɑnŋ k jɑsuɑ din yet Yiesu nibul nɑ ni ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, yetl n yuɑlɔ nɑ k wun bɔkt t bɑɑ fɑɑl k tul’n.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N yuɑk, ŋmee tien’n bɑlbuulɔ ɑ n bu k bɔkt i fɑɑl mɑnŋ i?»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ŋɑnm pɑk nibul nɑ ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn mɔktuk lonm po. K mɑɑn mɔktuk bonciɑnn kɑɑ sɑɑ te k nilɔ i mɔk mɑnfuol.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk ɑ: «Mɔktsuɑ din be k mɔk u kpɑɑb, k u kpɑɑb nɑ din tien’ɔ jiet bonciɑnn,
k u tɑn dukn dudukt ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tien nlee, k mɑɑn n k mɔk yiɑl nbɑ k ji sɑɑ tien n jiet nɑ kul lenŋ.›
K u yet u mɔnŋ ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tien nnɑ e. N sɑɑ yiel n bɔkpelɑ nɑ e ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm mɑɑ bɔpɑɑnɑ nbɑ yɑb. Lenŋ e k n ji sɑɑ tien n dii nɑn n bonkokuot kul ɑ,
k n biɑ sɑɑ yet n mɔnŋ ɑ: N mɔk jiet nbɑ sɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn binɑ sɑɑn ɑ. N ji sii foi k di k nyu kii mɔk pɑlpienn.›
Ŋɑnn e k Yennu yet’ɔ ɑ, ‹Jɑjɑtuk nɑ. Nyiɑɔk nɑ, ɑ mɑnfuol sɑɑ kɑt. Ŋɑɑn lɑɑn, ɑ mɔktuk nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑ, ŋmee sɑɑ yent i?›
«Tɔn, wun nbɑ kul tiki mɔktuk k tien u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn k mɔk mɔktuk Yennu buol, l mun sii tie nnɑ e k tul’ɔ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb biɑk, «L pɑɑk k n yien’i, i dɑɑ te k l muks’i i binbenŋ po nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ di lin nbɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ te k l muks’i i gbɑnɑnt po nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ liɑ lin nbɑ,
k mɑɑn mɑnfuol gɑl dinu wɑɑ, k gbɑnɑnt mun gɑl tiɑt ɑ.
Gotl kinkɑɑt, b k buul. B biɑ k jɑɑn. B biɑ k mɔk dii nɑɑpɑɑt ɑmi sukɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu dint’b. I k mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k gɑl kinkɑɑt ii?
I ŋmee sɑɑ fit fɔkn u mɑnfuol u dudukt ni nbɑ muks’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk i?
Yɑɑ k fit tun bonbik nɑ, bee k l sii dɑɑmi’i nɑn bongbenŋl tumu?
Gotl mɑn tipuuk nɑn l ŋɑnt, ŋɑɑn b k tuun k luu b mɔnŋ cincenɑ, ŋɑɑn n yien’i nɑ, kpɑnbɑl Sɑɑlomɔn nbɑ din lek mɔk tɑŋɑnɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, u din k mi liɑ tiɑt k l ŋɑn nɑn tipuuk nɑ.
Muɑt nbɑ be dinnɑ, ŋɑɑn wonn k b sɑɑ juo muu nɑ, Yennu nbɑ te k l fɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u kɑn lɑnn yinm ii? Yinm yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑnɑ dɑnm nɑ.
«I biɑ dɑɑ gbɑɑ nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ di lin nbɑ ɑmi yɑɑ sɑɑ nyu lin nbɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ muks i dudukt,
k mɑɑn niib nbɑ k wɑɑ Yennu nɑ tuu muks b dudukt lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e. Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, i Bɑɑ ponŋ mi nɑn i luon lin nbɑ nɑ.
L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k i bɑkɑ ii be Yennu nɑɑn ni, k u sɑɑ jii bonɑ nbɑ nɑ k tul’i.
«N niib nbɑ k yɑb nɑ, i dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn i Bɑɑ lɑ nɑn l ŋɑn wun tul’i nɑɑn mɑnŋ ɑ.

Kɔin i bonɑ nbɑ k i mɔk k jii l likli k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm. Lomin mɑn likbuɑli nbɑ kɑn biil, kii biɑ kii mɔk mɔktuk *Yendɔunŋ ni, siɑn nbɑ k l kɑn wɑt, k nɑn-yukɔ kɑn kpiɑn lenŋ, k bonŋmiŋmɑbt biɑ kɑn muɑ’l.
Siɑn nbɑ k ɑ mɔktuk be nɑ, ɑ dudukt mun be lenŋ e.
«Siknt gbounŋ siɑk ni mɑn, k ŋɑɑn k i fitɑ ii di,
kii tie nɑn niib nbɑ tuu guu b cɑnbɑɑ nbɑ tuu nyi puociɑnu k kpen k tɑn bɑɑl yiin ɑ bin luot gɑnn tul’ɔ, k bin luot gɑnn yiɑn ɑ nɑ.
Tuontunnɑ nbɑ k b cɑnbɑɑ kpen k lɑ’b k b guu u kpenu nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, b cɑnbɑɑ nɑ sɑɑ te k u dɑɑbɑ n kɑl k wun bɑɑl nɑn jiet k tul’b k bin di.
L i tie k b cɑnbɑɑ tɑn kpen tɑnsuuni ɑmi kojomuɑk, k lɑ k b guu’u, pɑlpienn sii tie tuontunnɑ mɑnŋ yɑl e.
«Nnɑlɑ, l i tie k ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ ponŋ mi yuo nbɑ k nɑn-yukɔ sɑɑ bɑɑl i e, u kɑn ŋɑɑn k wun bɑɑl kuɑ.
Yinm mun n tien siil kii guu, k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen yuo nbɑ k i k duki ɑ u sɑɑ jen e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl boi Yiesu ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ yiin tinm e bɑljouk nɑ ɑmi suɑ kul ee?»

K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tuontunlɑnɔ e tie yɑndɑɑnɔ k tuun u cɑnbɑɑ nbɑ wɑnt’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ? Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k u cɑnbɑɑ sɑɑ tien’ɔ tuontun-yudɑɑnɔ ɑ u goli tuontunnɑ kul nbɑ be u ŋɑɑk ni, kii tien’m mɑnn yuo kul nbɑ jɑnŋ.
L i tie k u cɑnbɑɑ tɑn kpen k lɑ k u tuun nnɑ, pɑlpienn sii tie tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ yɑl e.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ sɑɑ jii u mɔktuk kul k tien tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ nuu ni ɑ wuu goli’l.
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ yet u mɔnŋ ɑ u cɑnbɑɑ kɑn jen yiɑn, k ji piin k buo u tuontunliɑ nɑ, jɑb, puob, k u buo’b, k biɑ di k nyu dɑɑn k tɑn yib,
u cɑnbɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen dɑɑl nbɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ k tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ k duki ɑ u sɑɑ jen, k tɑn sɑɑ dɑt u tubl bonbiil, k tien’ɔ nɑn wɑɑ tuu tien mɔyetdɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
«Tuontunnɔ i mi lin nbɑ k u cɑnbɑɑ luon wun tun, ŋɑɑn k tien u mɔnŋ siil, k biɑ k tun, b sɑɑ buo’u gbɑnn bonbiil.

Tuontunnɔ nbɑ k mi lin nbɑ k u cɑnbɑɑ luon wun tun, ŋɑɑn kpet tun bonkpetl nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn buot, b sɑɑ buo’u wɑɑnm-nnɑ. «Wun nbɑ k b tul’ɔ sɑɑn, ŋuɑ e k b tɑn sɑɑ boi gɑɑl sɑɑn. Wun nbɑ k b kubn’ɔ sɑɑn ɑ, ŋuɑ e k b tɑn sɑɑ boi k gɑɑl bonciɑnn mun.»
«Min Yiesu, n bɑɑl mɑɑ n lu muu e tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn n sunmɑn k l ponŋ yinn ɑ mɑn.
Wulsɑu be k n sɑɑ wul, ŋɑɑn l muks n dudukt e mɔkmɔk nɑn lɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ gbenn.
I duki mi ɑ n bɑɑl nɑn mɑnu tingbounŋ nɑ ni ee? Aɑi. N yien’i e, n bɑɑl nɑn bɔktu e.
Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, niib bɑnŋmu tɑn sii be ŋɑɑk ni, k b tɑn sɑɑ bɔkt. Bɑntɑ sɑɑ kɔn nɑn bɑnle, k bɑnle mun sɑɑ kɔn nɑn bɑntɑ.

Bɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u bijɑ, k bijɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u bɑɑ. Nɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u bipuo, k bipuo mun tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u nɑɑ. Siponɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u sipopuok, k sipopuok nɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn u siponɑɑ.»
L yuo mɑnŋ k Yiesu pɑk tul nibul nɑ k yet ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k i tuu tɑn lɑ sɑnpɑgbɑnt k lin do yenbɑɑpo, k i tuu yet yiɑn ɑ, ɑ sɑɑk sɑɑ bɑɑ wɑɑ, k u set tɑn bɑɑ.
Yuo nbɑ k i lɑɑt k gɑnŋ po wounŋ dɑ, i tuu yɑɑ ɑ nɑɑɔk sii be, k l set tɑn ton.
Yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm nɑ, i fit gbɑt lin nbɑ tien tingbounŋ ni nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn bee tien k i kɑn fit bɑnn mɔtɑɑnɑ yuo nɑ pɑɑk i?
«Bee tien k i kɑn fit dukn i mɔnŋ k senn lin nbɑ tuok i?

L i tie k fin nɑn suɑ mɔk mɑɑn k sɑɑ bɑlbuulɔ buol, yɑɑ dɑɑ be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ nɑ, l ŋɑn k ɑ kot ɑ mɔnŋ k ŋɑnm fin nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni. L i kii tie nnɑ i kɑɑ, u sɑɑ dɑt’ɑ bɑɑl nɑn’ɑ bɑlbuulɔ buol, k bɑlbuulɔ nɑ mun sɑɑ jii’ɑ k tien’ɑ dɑnsɑlguulɔ nuu ni, k dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ mun sɑɑ kuɑn’ɑ dɑnsɑlk.
N yien’ɑ e, b kɑn mi ŋɑɑ’ɑ ni, sie k ɑ tɑn pɑ likli kul nbɑ k b jiɑl’ɑ nɑ, k kuuk kɑn tenn.»
L yuo nɑ k nisiɑb din bɑɑl k yet Yiesu k jikt sɑɑ Gɑɑliile tieb nbɑ k *Piilɑɑt din kpii’b yuo nbɑ k b din mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k tien Yennu nɑ.
K Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Bɑɑ din kpii Gɑɑliile tieb mɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, i duki ɑ b mɑntk din tie biitdɑnm k gɑl b lieb kul nɑ ee?
Aɑi, ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, l i tie k i k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ i kɑɑ, i kul mun tɑn sɑɑ kpo nnɑ e.
Dɔnfuouk nbɑ din be Siiloe k tɑn bɑɑ k nyɑk niib piik nɑn bɑnniin k kpii’b nɑ, i duki ɑ niib mɑnŋ din jiɑ mɑntk tie biitdɑnm k gɑl lieb kul nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nuɑk ni ɑmi?
Aɑi, ŋɑɑn n yien’i e, l i tie k i k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ i kɑɑ, b mun tɑn sɑɑ kpi’i nnɑ e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu din yin’m bɑljouk k yet ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din wuu fiigie u kpɑɑb nbɑ k u wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi *fiinyɑ nɑ ni, k tɑn bɑɑl ɑ wun puɑl fiignbɑ, ŋɑɑn k k lɑ siɑl.
Ŋɑnn e k u yet u kpɑguulɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹Nnɑlɑ, binɑ ŋɑntɑ e nɑ k n tun bɑɑt fiigie nɑ buol mɑɑ n tuu puɑl fiignbɑ, ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt siɑl. Cuɑn’mɔ lu. Bee k l sii sie biil tinŋ yɑnn i?›
K u kpɑguulɔ nɑ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, dɑɑ nyikn binn nɑ dɑɑnn k n gbiil l nyɑkl ni k pii luln.
Pɑsiɑl binn nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ u sɑɑ lon luɑnɑ. L i tie k l k lon i e, fɑn ji tɑn ŋɑɑn k bin cuɑ’u.›»
Fuondɑsiɑl k Yiesu din tumi niib *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni,
k puosuɑ din be dieok mɑnŋ ni, k nɑlnbiiuk din be u ni k tien’ɔ wɑɑgolk binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnniin, k u k fit nɑɑtl u mɔnŋ fɑb ɑ.
Yiesu nbɑ tɑn lɑ’u, k u yiin’ɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «A yiɑlu mɑnŋ ŋɑɑ’ɑ wɑɑ,»
ŋɑɑn jii u nii k yii puo mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u fiil set nɑɑt u mɔnŋ k ji piɑk Yennu.

Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok yudɑɑnɔ wutuol din duo, k mɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ te k puo nɑ pɑɑk *Fuondɑɑl nɑ pɑɑk, k u yet niib nɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑ ŋɑnluob k t sii tuun tuonn. I tuu bɑɑl l dɑɑ ni kii lɑɑt pɑɑku, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ bɑɑt Fuondɑɑl ɑ wun te k i pɑɑk.»
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yinm kpinkpɑnni dɑnm, i kul nɑ tuu k luotl i nei nɑn i boni bonkobloi ni k dɑɑl sɑɑ nɑn’m k sɑɑ nyunt’b Fuondɑɑl ii?
K puo nɑ nbɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonn nɑ, ŋuɑ e k *Sɑɑtɑn din tien’ɔ yonmk binɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnniin, l bo k jɑnŋ nɑn k n nyinn’ɔ yomsn nɑ ni Fuondɑɑl ii?»
Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, k mɔnɔnoilɑ nɑ kul ɑ ji din dii fei, ŋɑɑn nibul nɑ kul ji din mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn wɑɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ kul mɑnŋ.
L puolpo k Yiesu boi niib mɑnŋ ɑ: «N sɑɑ bikn Yennu nɑɑn nɑn lɑnn po e? N sɑɑ nɑn’l nɑn biɑ?
L nɑɑn nɑn kpint tiik nbɑ k b yi’l *muutɑɑld nɑ binn nbɑ k nilɔ jii k bul u gungounŋ ni, k l kpɑɑt k tien tiik, k nuɑni bɑɑt k tiɑ tiɑt l yiini pɑɑk nɑ e.»
K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm boi’b ɑ: «N sɑɑ bikn Yennu nɑɑn nɑn lɑnn po e?
Yennu nɑɑn tie nɑn * dɑtinŋ nbɑ k puo jii k ŋmɑt nɑn pɑɑnu yon nbɑ yɑb, k lin tɑn miik mɔkmɔk nɑn lɑɑ tuu tɑn pukl nɑ e.»
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesu din be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, u din gɑl digbɑngbenŋɑ nɑn digbɑnbis ni, k tumi niib,
k suɑ tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, niib nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ, b tɑn sii tie wɑɑnm-nnɑ ɑmi ii?» K u yet’b ɑ
«Sie k i muks i mɔnŋ k yebn k kuɑ tɑnmɔyebk nɑ ni. K mɑɑn n yien’i e, niib bonciɑnn tɑn sii luon bin kuɑ lenŋ, ŋɑɑn tɑn gbɑl l kuɑnu.
Ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ i tɑnŋ i fiil k luon tɑnmɔb nɑ, i sɑɑ biɑl sie nɑn-yel po, k kpɑɑn tɑnmɔb k yi k yɑɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, luotl tul’t,› ŋɑɑn l yuo, u tɑn sɑɑ jiin yet’i ɑ: ‹N k mi yɑɑ nyii siɑn nbɑ.›
K i tɑn sɑɑ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹T din tuu di k nyu nɑn’ɑ, k ɑ tuu tumi’t t doi ni.›
K u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ jiin k yet’i ɑ: ‹N k mi yɑɑ nyii siɑn. Yinm biitdɑnm kul nɑ, sietl n buol ni nɑ mɑn.›
Lenŋ e k i tɑn sii fɑbn mɔ k nyiitl nyɑnɑ yuo nbɑ k i sɑɑ lɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb nɑn sɔkniinbɑ kul ɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni, ŋɑɑn b tɑn sɑɑ jii’i k lu’i nɑn-yel.
K niib tɑn sɑɑ nyi yendopo nɑn yenbɑɑpo nɑn diitu po nɑn gɑnŋ po k tɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni k kɑl k di jiet.
L yuo nɑ, nisiɑb nbɑ juont tɑn sɑɑ dɔnŋ sɑɑn liik, k siɑb nbɑ mun dɔnŋ sɑɑn liik tɑn sɑɑ juont.»
L yuo nɑ k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb din bɑɑl Yiesu buol k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sie k ɑ nyii nnɑ k sɑɑn siɑl po, k mɑɑn *Heluod luon k wun kpi’ɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ŋuɑ wonŋ nɑɑnɑɑt nɑ, ii sɑɑ mɑn, k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Gotl, dinnɑ nɑn wonn e k n sii biel nɑlnbiit niib ni ŋɑɑn biɑ kii te k bii pɑɑkt, k dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k n sɑɑ gbenn n tuonn.›
Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ nɑn wonn nɑn dɑɑlpo, sie k n lek fɑbl sonm n sonm ɑ, k mɑɑn l k ŋɑn k bin kpi *Yennu sɔkni siɑl po l i kii tie Selusɑɑlenm i kɑɑ.

«Selusɑɑlenm tieb, nbɑɑyuoo! Yinm nbɑ kpi Yennu sɔkniinbɑ, k biɑ jɑɑt u tuomiinbɑ nbɑ k u tun’m i buol ni nɑ tɑnɑ, biknu biknu tɑɑl munŋɑ e k n gbɑɑ mɑɑ n lɑkn’i yonm nɑn kolk nbɑ tuu lɑkn u kobis u kpinkpɑnt ni nɑ, k i k sɑk.
Gotl mɑn, i ŋɑɑk sɑɑ duɑl yɑnn e. N yien’i e nɑ, lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ k jii sɑɑ, i ji kɑn mi k lɑ’n k sɑɑ tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k i tɑn sɑɑ yet ɑ: ‹Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be wun nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk.› »
Tɔn, fuondɑsiɑl k Yiesu din tɑn kuɑ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ yudɑɑnsuɑ ŋɑɑk ni ɑ wun di jiet, k bin nbɑ be ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni din diisl’ɔ.
L yuo nɑ k bɑɑtsuɑ bɑɑl u tuɑnn, wun nbɑ k bonwuunkɑl wuun’ɔ.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi *senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «T *senni sɑk ɑ nilɔ n te k bɑɑtɔ n pɑɑk *Fuondɑɑl ii?»
Ŋɑɑn k b ŋmin ɑ. K Yiesu gɑɑl bɑɑtɔ mɑnŋ k te k u pɑɑk. L puolpo k u cɑb’ɔ ɑ wuu sɑɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «I yenɔ i mɔk bijɑ ɑmi nɑɑb k u tɑn bɑɑ bunbunn ni Fuondɑɑl, u kɑn donn’ɔ Fuondɑɑl mɑnŋ i?»
Ŋɑɑn k b k fit jiin’ɔ siɑl.
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu lɑ k bin nbɑ k b yiin’m nɑ luon bin gɑnn yudɑnm kɑɑni buol k kɑl. L pɑɑk, k u yin’m bɑljouk ɑ
«B i yiin’ɑ puociɑnu k ɑ bɑɑl, fɑɑ dɑɑ kɑɑl yudɑɑnɔ kɑɑnu buol, k mɑɑn pɑsiɑl b ponŋ bo yiin suɑ e wɑɑ, wun nbɑ cie’ɑ,
k yiintuɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ buol ni k tɑn yet’ɑ ɑ: ‹Fiit ŋɑɑn tul’ɔ u kɑɑnu.› L yuo nɑ, k fɑn ji di fei k ji fiil k sɑɑn kɑl kpinŋ.
Tɔn, b i yiin’ɑ puociɑnu k ɑ bɑɑl, fɑn kɑl kpinŋ, k yiintuɑ n tɑn fit k bɑɑl k yiin’ɑ: ‹N yuɑk, bɑɑt nɑ k tɑn kɑl yudɑnm kɑɑni buol.› L yuo nɑ k ɑ sɑɑ lɑ nibɑɑkl ɑ lieb mɑnŋ buol ni.
K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul dont u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ sikn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ siknt u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ donn’ɔ.»

Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu biɑ yet wun nbɑ yiin’ɔ nɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ yiin jɑɑnm, fɑɑ dɑɑ yi ɑ yuɑsnbɑ ɑmi ɑ yuɑlb ɑmi ɑ ninjɑnm ɑmi ɑ mɔktlieb, k mɑɑn ŋɑnm mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ jiin’ɑ b jiinu wɑɑ, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl lin nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn tien nɑ pɑnn.
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ yiin jɑɑnm u e, fɑn yiin tɑlɑs-dɑnm nɑn wɔbi nɑn diɑni nɑn juɑni,
k ɑ sii mɔk pɑlpienn. B i kii fit jiin’ɑ ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑɑ gɑɑl ɑ jiinu Yennu buol ni, dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ fiin bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm u buol ni kuun ni.»
Bin nbɑ k b din yiin’m k b din di nɑn Yiesu nɑ yenɔ nbɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk nɑ k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ sɑɑ di jiet Yennu nɑɑn ni, pɑlpienn sii tie u yɑl e.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din be k tɑn yɑɑ wun di u jɑɑngbenŋl, k poi niib bonciɑnn.
Jɑɑnm nɑ yuo nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl k u tun u tuontunnɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn yiin niib nbɑ k u dɑɑn yiin’m nɑ, ɑ bin bɑɑl nɑ, ɑ k jiet nɑ kul tien siil ɑ.
K b kul tɑɑn dukn dudukyent, k mei’ɔ ɑ wun cɑb’b k b dɑɑ bɑɑt, k sinsinn yuɑ nɑ yet tuontunnɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹N dɑɑ kpɑpɑɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, cɑb min k n sɑɑn sɑɑ got,›
k luɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N dɑɑ nɑɑkuoki piik. L pɑɑk, cɑb min k n sɑɑn bikn’m,›
k luɑ mun biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N dɑɑ yonn n puopɑɑnŋ e, k l pɑɑk e te k n kɑn fit bɑɑl.›

«Ŋɑnn e k tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet u cɑnbɑɑ lin nbɑ nɑ kul. K u cɑnbɑɑ mɑnŋ wutuol duo bonciɑnn, k u yet u tuontunnɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹Nyimin k sɑɑn duo ni yiɑn yiɑn, k sɑɑ got sɔni ni, k yiin tɑlɑs-dɑnm nɑn wɔbi nɑn diɑni nɑn juɑni k jen nɑn’m nɑ.›
L puolpo e k u tuontunnɔ nɑ yet ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, n tien fɑɑ yet lin nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k yiɑl dɑɑ be.›
Ŋɑnn e biɑk k u cɑnbɑɑ nɑ yet u tuontunnɔ nɑ ɑ: ‹Nyimin biɑk k sɑɑ got pɑnɑ pɑɑk nɑn sɑnjobis ni nɑn kpɑɑnt ni, k mɑbn niib k bin bɑɑl, k n ŋɑɑk n gbie.
N yien’ɑ e, bin nbɑ k n dɑɑn yiin’m nɑ, b suɑ ponŋ tɑn kɑn lenm n jɑɑnm nɑ jiet nɑ kɑɑ wɑɑ.› »
Nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ Yiesu, k u tɑn jiɑnt k yet’b ɑ

«Wun nbɑ luon k wuu be nɑn’n, sie k u luon’n bonciɑnn k gɑl wɑɑ luon u cɑnbɑɑ, nɑn u nɑɑ, nɑn u puo, nɑn u wɑɑs, nɑn u yuɑlb, nɑn u wɑɑli, nɑn u mɔnŋ mɑnfuol biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. L i kii tie nnɑ i kɑɑ, u kɑn fit k tien n *puolpoweituɑ.
Wun nbɑ k jii u kuun dɑpunpunn k buk k wɑɑ’n, u kɑn fit k tien n puolpoweituɑ.
«Wun nbɑ luon k wun mɑɑ detuɑtuk, sie k wun kɑl sinsinn, k dukn wɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k suol l mɔb, k lɑɑn u likli sɑɑ jɑnŋ ɑmi l kɑn jɑnŋ,
k mɑɑn l i tie k u fɔkn fiɑkl nɑ ŋɑɑn tɑn k fit kɑɑl mɑɑlu mɑnŋ, niib ji sii lɑɑ’u e k sɑlkt’ɔ.
B ji sii yien ɑ: ‹Juɑ nɑ dɑɑn fɔkn u dɔunŋ ŋɑɑn tɑn gbɑl kɑɑlu.›

«Kpɑnbɑl i mɔk niib tusɑ piik (10.000) k sɑɑn nɑn’m ɑ wun tuok u kpɑnbɑl luɑ nɑn u niib tusɑ piinle (20.000) mun, nlee k kpɑnbɑl nbɑ mɔk niib tusɑ piik (10.000) nɑ sɑɑ tien i? Sie k u kɑl sinsinn k dukn k bɑnn bɑɑ sɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn bɑɑ kɑn jɑnŋ nɑn u tuoku.
B i kii jɑnŋ i e, sie k wun tun *tuomi k bin ŋɑk fɑɑɔk, wɑɑ dɑɑ be bɑnfɔkl nɑ.
«Tɔn, nilɔ i kii nyik u mɔktuk kul, u kɑn fit tien n puolpoweituɑ.
«Yɑɑln mɑn, ŋɑɑn l mɑnu i tɑnŋ i biil, nlee k l ji sii mɑn i?
L lek k ŋɑn k ɑ jii’l k pɑk kpɑɑb ni, k biɑ k ŋɑn k ɑ pukn luln po. Sie k ɑ lu. Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint.»
Siɑn yuo k *lɑnpogɑɑltieb nɑn biitdɑnm bonciɑnn din bɑɑt Yiesu buol ni k gbiintl u mɑɑn.
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn *senniwɑntieb din buln k yien ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ gɑɑl biitdɑnm k biɑ di nɑn’m.»
L pɑɑk, k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk nɑ ɑ
«I yenɔ i mɔk pei kobk, k yenɔ n tɑn bot, u sɑɑ tien nlee? Sie k u nyik pei piin-yiɑ nɑn bɑn-yiɑ nɑ muuk ni, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn lon peyeunŋ mɑnŋ nbɑ bot nɑ nɑn wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’u.
Wɑɑ ji tɑn lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k u ji mɔk pɑlpienn. L yuo k u jii’u k buk’ɔ u bɔpiɑt pɑɑk
k kun ŋɑɑk ni. L yuo nɑ k u yiin u yuɑsnbɑ nɑn u ŋɑkpiɑsnbɑ k lɑkn’m k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ii mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn, k mɑɑn n lɑ n pebotkɑɔk mɑnŋ ɑ.›

«Ŋɑnn e mun, k n yien’i biɑk, biit dɑɑn-yenɔ i mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, pɑlpienn sii be *Yendɔunŋ ni l dɑɑnɔ pɑɑk, k gɑl lɑɑ sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni piin-yiɑ nɑn bɑn-yiɑ nbɑ k l k siɑn nɑn b sii mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ nɑ pɑɑk.
«K puo mun ii mɔk likbinɑ piik, k yenn tɑn bot, u sɑɑ tien nlee? Sie k u juo fitl k piɑl u dieok k lon fɑnu nɑn wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’l.
Wɑɑ ji tɑn lɑ’l yuo nbɑ, k u ji yiin u yuɑsnbɑ nɑn u ŋɑkpiɑsnbɑ k lɑkn’m k yet’b ɑ: ‹Ii mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn, k mɑɑn n lɑ n likbin nɑ wɑɑ.›
«Nnɑ e mun k n yien’i biɑk, l i tie k biitdɑɑn-yenɔ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, Yennu *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ sii mɔk pɑlpienn u pɑɑk e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din mɔk bonjɑi bɑnle,
k wɑɑlɔ po tɑn yet u bɑɑ ɑ: ‹N bɑɑ, n luon k ɑ jii fɑɑl nbɑ k n bo tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl ɑ kuun puolpo nɑ e k tul’n.› L yuo mɑnŋ k u bɑɑ bɔkt b fɑɑl mɑnŋ k tul’b.
Ŋɑnn e l k wei k wɑɑlɔ po nɑ jii u mɔktuk kul k yɑɑt sɑɑn digbɑnn bɑnfɔkl ɑ. Lenŋ e k u binbenŋ din k ŋɑn, k u biil u likli yiɑn yiɑn ɑ.
Wɑɑ gbenn u likli yuo nbɑ nɑ, k kon bɑɑ tinŋ mɑnŋ ni bonciɑnn, k suol’ɔ hei.
Ŋɑnn e k u ji sɑɑn be jɑsuɑ ŋɑɑk duo mɑnŋ ni, k u tuun’ɔ u kpɑɑb ni ɑ wuu dint u duoli.
K u tuu luon wun di duoli dɑbint nɑ k gbuo, ŋɑɑn suɑ din k tien’ɔ siɑl.
L puolpo k u yɑn jen, k u yet u mɔnŋ ɑ: ‹N bɑɑ tuontunnɑ kul ɑ lɑɑt jiet di k l jɑnŋt’b, k biɑ tent, ŋɑɑn k n tɑn kpenn kon nnɑ nɑ.›
Lɑɑ ji be nɑ, n sɑɑ kun n bɑɑ buol e k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N cɑnbɑɑ, n tun bonbiil k biil Yennu nɑn’ɑ wɑɑ.
N ji k ŋɑn nɑn k ɑ yiin’n ɑ bijɑ. Tient’n ɑ tuontun-yenɔ.»
Ŋɑnn e k u ji fiil k ŋmɑt k kun u bɑɑ buol. «Yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din be bɑnfɔkl k kun nɑ, k u cɑnbɑɑ lɑ’u, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u ciɑl k bɑɑl suol u bik nɑ bɔpiɑt k puul wɔb’ɔ.
Ŋɑnn e k bik nɑ yɑɑ ɑ: ‹N cɑnbɑɑ, n tun bonbiil k biil Yennu nɑn’ɑ wɑɑ. N ji k ŋɑn nɑn k ɑ yiin’n ɑ bijɑ.›
Ŋɑɑn k u bɑɑ yiin u tuontunnɑ, ‹Tient yiɑn ɑ k jii cincenŋɑnn, nɑn bɑnŋ, nɑn tɑɑsɑɑt nɑ, k tɑn gbɑbn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn piln’mɔ bɑnŋ nɑn tɑɑsɑɑt nɑ,
ŋɑɑn kii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ suol nɑɑjɑkpɑnml nɑ nɑ k tɑn kpi’u k tin tien jɑɑnm.
N tuu miɑ n bijɑ nɑ kpo e, ŋɑɑn k u be, k biɑ miɑ u bot e, ŋɑɑn k u tɑn jen ɑ.› Ŋɑnn e k b ji piin b jɑɑnm dinu nɑn pɑlpienn.
«L yuo nɑ k u bijɑkpel nɑ dɑɑ din be kpɑɑb ni e, k ji din tɑn kpent k pel ŋɑɑk k gbɑt fuut, k siɑk wɑɑ k jinjeluk jeln.
K u yiin u bɑɑ tuontun-yenɔ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Bee fuut e fu ŋɑɑk nnɑ?›
K tuontunnɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹A wɑɑlɔ nɑ e kpen, k ɑ bɑɑ te k b kpii nɑɑjɑkpɑnml, k mɑɑn u jen nɑn lɑɑfiɑ e.›
Ŋɑnn e k u yuɑlɔ mɑnŋ wutuol ji duo hei, k u yet ŋɑɑk ni kuɑnu. K u cɑnbɑɑ nyii k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl kuɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k u jiin u cɑnbɑɑ ɑ: ‹Nnɑlɑ, min e tuun’ɑ hei binɑ bonciɑnn. N biɑ k mi yet ɑ mɔb u, ŋɑɑn ɑ ponŋ tɑn k mi tul’n bubik k n kpii k yiin n nɑɑsin-yuɑsnbɑ k t tɑn dii k mɔk pɑlpienn.
Ŋɑɑn ɑ bijɑ nɑ e mɑntk biil ɑ fɑɑl kul k wei jɑntonɑ, k wɑɑ tɑn jen yuo nbɑ, k ɑ biɑ kpii nɑɑjɑkpɑnml k tul’ɔ.›
K u bɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N bik, fin ŋɑnin ponŋ tuu be nɑn’n yuo kul ɑ, k lin nbɑ kul k n tuu mɔk, l tuu tie ɑ yɑl e.
L ponŋ ŋɑn nɑn tin tien jɑɑnm kii mɔk pɑlpienn, k mɑɑn, ɑ wɑɑlɔ dɑɑn kpo wɑɑ ŋɑɑn jen u mɑnfuol ni; u biɑ dɑɑn bot ɑ ŋɑɑn k n tɑn lɑ’u.› »
K Yiesu din yet u *puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Mɔktsuɑ din be k mɔk u kɑlɑci, k b din tɑn kumi mɔktɔ nɑ ɑ u kɑlɑci nɑ biil u likli nɑn u bonɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k mɔktɔ nɑ din yiin’ɔ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Bee tien k n gbiɑ ɑ po nnɑ? I sɑɑ k sɑɑ diɑn fɑɑ tuu tuun nɑn n mɔktuk biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ ji kɑn mi k tien n kɑlɑci.›
K kɑlɑci mɑnŋ tɑn dukn dudukt ɑ: ‹N cɑnbɑɑ yɑɑ wun bel’n u tuonn ni e. N sɑɑ tien nlee? N k mɔk pɑnŋ nbɑ k n sɑɑ ko, k n biɑ tiin fei nɑn mii mei.
N mi mɑɑ sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k niib n gɑɑl’n b ŋei ni yuo nbɑ k n cɑnbɑɑ nyik’n gbenn.›
Ŋɑnn e k u yiin u cɑnbɑɑ pɑndɑnm kul yenɔ yenɔ, k tɑn boi sinsinn yuɑ ɑ: ‹A mɔk n cɑnbɑɑ pɑnn yinŋɑ e?›
K u jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Kpɑn ɑnkɔlɑ kobk (100).› K u yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Jiin ɑ kɑdɑɑɔk k sɑɑn kɑl yiɑn yiɑn k diɑn ɑnkɔlɑ piinŋmu (50).›
K u biɑ yiin luɑ k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fin, yinŋɑ e k ɑ mɔk n cɑnbɑɑ pɑnn i?› K u jiin’ɔ ɑ: ‹Dii bɔtuot kobk (100).› K u yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Jiin ɑ kɑdɑɑɔk k diɑn dii bɔtuot piiniin (80).›

Tɔn, yuo nbɑ k cɑnbɑɑ nɑ gbɑt u kɑlɑci fobdiilɔ nɑ nbɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u pɑk’ɔ, ɑ u tun nɑn yɑn e. Bin nbɑ wɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ sɔnu e mɔk yɑn b mɔnŋ niib sinsuuk ni k gɑl bin nbɑ wɑɑ yentu sɔnu nbɑ mɔk biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Min e yien’i nɑ, i jii tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk kii tuun nɑn’n kii so niib yuɑs, k mɔktuk mɑnŋ i tɑnŋ i gbenn yuo nbɑ, Yennu sɑɑ gɑɑl’i ŋei nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni.
«Wun nbɑ tuun fɑnu bonbis ni, u biɑ sii tuun fɑnu e bonsɑɑkɑ ni, k wun nbɑ mun k tuun fɑnu bonbis ni, u mun biɑ kɑn tun fɑnu bonsɑɑkɑ ni.
L i tie k ɑ tuun nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktuk k biil, ŋmee sɑɑ jii mɔmɔnm mɔktuk k tien ɑ nuu ni.
L i tie k ɑ di fobt nɑn lieb yɑl, ŋmee sɑɑ tul’ɑ ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yɑl i?
«Tɔn, tuontunnɔ kɑn fit tun k tul cɑnbɑɑnbɑ bɑnle. U sii luon yenɔ k gɑl luɑ, ɑmi u sii sɑɑk yenɔ mɔb ŋɑɑn kii sɑlkt luɑ nɑ. A kɑn fit wɑɑ Yennu nɑn likli biɑk.»
Yuo nbɑ k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ, k b ji din dɑɑn Yiesu nyɑtuk, k mɑɑn b din tie liklonnɑ e.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yinm, i wɑnt i mɔnŋ niib ni nɑn i tie niŋɑnm e Yennu buol ni, ŋɑɑn Yennu mi i pɑlɑ ni. Lin nbɑ k nilɔ duki nɑn l tie bonjɑɑnn e, ŋɑɑn l nubl e Yennu buol.

«Yennu *senni nɑn u sɔkniinbɑ diɑni din mɔk yiikuo mɔkmɔk nɑn Sɑn nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl. Lɑɑ nyii Sɑn bɑɑlu yuo ni e wɑɑ, k b muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn po, k suɑ kul muksl u mɔnŋ ɑ wun kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn mɑnŋ ni.
Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ fit bot k l k pɑɑl, ŋɑɑn Yennu senni bonmintk nnɑ kɑn mi k bot fɑb ɑ.
«Wun nbɑ yet u ŋɑɑpuo ŋɑɑn kuɑn puogɑnɔ, tun * boncuncontuonn nɑ, k wun nbɑ mun kuɑn puo nbɑ k u sɔlɔ yet’ɔ nɑ, mun biɑ tun boncuncontuonn nɑ.»
K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Mɔktsuɑ din be, k dɑɑl-yejɑŋɑɑk kul k u liɑ tɑŋɑnt, k be u yɑmɑ ni nɑn pɑlpienn.
K tɑlɑs-dɑɑnsuɑ mun din be, k u sɑnn yi Lɑɑsɑɑl, k u din mɔk fiɑt hei. K b din tuu bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ k wun kɑl mɔktɔ nɑ ŋɑɑtɑmɔyɑnŋl ni,
k tuu luon wun di mɔktɔ nɑ jebulɑbulɑ nbɑ tuu bɑɑ nɑ, k bɔi tuu bɑɑl k leni u fiɑt nɑ.
«L puolpo e k tɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ tɑn kpo, k Yennu *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm buol *Yendɔunŋ ni. K mɔktɔ nɑ mun tɑn kpo, k b pii’u,
k u din sɑɑn fɑlɑ buol muu ni, k din di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn. K u tɑn yɑɑt got k lɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm bɑnfɔkl ɑ, nɑn Lɑɑsɑɑl k u be Ablɑɑhɑɑnm buol ni.
Ŋɑnn e k mɔktɔ nɑ yikn yet ɑ: ‹N yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk, k tun Lɑɑsɑɑl k wun pɑk u niibl nyun ni, k tɑn tien n jeln pɑɑk k lin mɑɑk, k mɑɑn n di fɑlciɑɔnŋ o muu ni nnɑ.›

Ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N bik, tiɑt fɑɑ din tuu be ɑ mɑnfuol ni nɑ, ɑ din tuu mɔk ɑ bonŋɑnɑ e, ŋɑɑn Lɑɑsɑɑl mun din tuu tie fɑlɑ e. Mɔtɑɑnɑ u be u yɑmɑ ni e nnɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn fin e tɑn be fɑlciɑɔnŋ ni nɑ.
K lin nbɑ pukn, buotsunsunŋ be tinm nɑn fin sinsuuk ni, k suɑ kɑn fit nyi k luɑl sɑɑn ɑ buol ni, k suɑ mun kɑn fit nyi ɑ buol ni k luɑl t buol ni nnɑ nɑ.›
Ŋɑnn e k mɔktɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N yejɑ, l i tie nnɑ e i e, n bɑln’mɑ e, tumin Lɑɑsɑɑl n cɑnbɑɑ ŋɑɑk ni,
k mɑɑn n ninjɑnm bɑnŋmu be. Ŋɑɑnt wun sɑɑn kpɑɑn’m, k b ji tɑn dɑɑ bɑɑt fɑlɑ buol nɑ ni jik.›
K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹A ninjɑnm mɔk Muois nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn. Bin gbiint mɑɑn mɑnŋ.›
K mɔktɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, ɑɑi, ŋɑɑn suɑ i fiil kuun ni k sɑɑn b buol ni, ŋɑnn b sɑɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ ɑ.›
K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹B i kii gbiint mɑɑn nbɑ diɑn Muois kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kɑdɑɑt ni, nilɔ i lek i fiil kuun ni, ŋɑɑn b kɑn sɑk u mɔb.› »
Yiesu yet u *puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Jinjɑnmi nbɑ te k niib tuun biit nɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl, ŋɑɑn l sii bi k tien wun nbɑ te k jinjɑnmi bɑɑt niib pɑɑk.
B i bo i jii nɑɑl k lɑnn u tulu ni k lu’u mɔkl ni, l bo sii sɔ nɑn wɑɑ bo sɑɑ te k wɑɑs nɑ yenɔ kuɑ n tun biit.
Suot i mɔnŋ. «A nɑɑ bik i tun bonbiil, fɑn kpɑɑn’ɔ nɑn ninmɔnn, k l i tie k u yɑɑ ɑ u biil’ɑ, fɑn nyik u biit k cɑb’ɔ.
L i tie k u tun k biil’ɑ tɑɑl munlole dɑɑl nuɑk ni, ŋɑɑn tuu bɑɑl ɑ buol ni tɑɑl munlole k yɑɑ ɑ u biil’ɑ k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn, fɑn nyik cɑb’ɔ.»
L yuo mɑnŋ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuomiinbɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Puknt’t yɑdɑ.»

K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k i bo mɔk yɑdɑ k l yɑb k bɑɑl nɑn jinjuklu binn nɑ, i bo sɑɑ fit k yet tiik nbɑ k b yi siikomɔl nɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ k sɑɑn wuu mɔkgbenŋl ni,› k siikomɔl mɑnŋ sɑɑ sɑk i mɔb.
«Tɔn, i yenɔ i mɔk tuontunnɔ k u ko tɑnmɔnn ɑmi k kpɑɑl pei, k tuontunnɔ nɑ nyii kpɑɑb ni k kpen ŋɑɑk ni, u sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ bɑɑt yiɑn k tɑn kɑl k di jiet ii?
U sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Liɑtl ɑ kpɑkotiɑt k bil, ŋɑɑn liɑ tɑyieni, k tien n jiet k senn’n k n bɑɑl nɑ k tɑn di k nyu. L puolpo k ɑ mun sɑɑ di k nyu.›
A duki nɑn cɑnbɑɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑ tul u tuontunnɔ nɑ niipuouk k mɑɑn wɑɑ sɑk u mɔb nɑ pɑɑk ii?
L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e i buol ni. Yuo nbɑ k i tun tuonn nbɑ k b tul’i nɑ k gbenn, yin yet ɑ: ‹T tie dɑɑbɑ e. T kpɑn tuu tun lin nbɑ k t bo sɑɑ tun nɑ kuukuɑ e.› »
Yiesu nbɑ din sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u din gɑl *Sɑɑmɑɑli nɑn Gɑɑliile sinsuuk ni,
k din tɑn bɑɑl digbɑnsiɑl, k gbɑɑtɑ piik din cet’ɔ lenŋ, k din set bɑnfɔkl ɑ,
ŋɑɑn yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ, k yien ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Yiesu, tin’t ninbɑɑɔk.»
K Yiesu nbɑ lɑ’b yuo nbɑ k u yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn Yennu mɑnntieb buol ni k bin bikn’i got.» L yuo mɑnŋ k b ŋmɑt sɑɑ, k b ŋɑɑt mɑnŋ ji sɑɑ gbenn sɔnu ni.
K b yenɔ nbɑ bɑnn nɑn u ŋɑɑɔk gbenn nɑ, k u ŋmɑt Yiesu penŋ k sɑɑ pɑk Yennu nɑn kunkɔsɑɑkɑl,
ŋɑɑn bɑɑl gbɑɑn finfɑbl Yiesu tuɑnn k tul’ɔ niipuouk. Juɑ mɑnŋ din tie Sɑɑmɑɑli nilɔ e.
K Yiesu din boi ɑ: «Niib piik kɑɑ bo lɑ pɑɑku uu? Ŋɑɑn k niib bɑn-yiɑ nbɑ tenn nɑ be liɑ?
B suɑ k jen ɑ bin tɑn tul Yennu niipuouk sie Sɑɑmɑɑli juɑ nɑ kuukuɑ ee?»
Ŋɑnn e k u yet juɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Fiit kii sɑɑ. A yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k ɑ lɑ pɑɑku.»
Tɔn, k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din boi Yiesu ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nlee yuo e?» Ŋɑnn e k u din jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Yennu nɑɑn kɑn bɑɑl bɑnnu nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit lɑ’l kɑɑ.
Suɑ kɑn yet ɑ: ‹Gotl, ŋɑnn i nɑ,› ɑmi: ‹L be nɑ wɑɑ,› k mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn be i ni.»
Ŋɑnn e k u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Yuo bɑɑt k i tɑn sii sunmɑn k i lɑ *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ, ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ.
B tɑn sɑɑ yet’i: ‹Gotl, u be lenŋ,› ɑmi: ‹Gotl, u be nnɑ nɑ.› I dɑɑ sɑɑ goli, k biɑ dɑɑ wɑɑ’b,
k mɑɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ bɑɑlu tɑn sii tie nɑn sɑnyiknti nbɑ tuu nyiknt k yent sɑnpɑɑpo kul nɑ e.
Ŋɑɑn sinsinn, u tɑn sɑɑ di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ biɑ tɑn sɑɑ yet’ɔ.
Noe yuo nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l mun biɑ tɑn sii tie nnɑ e Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ bɑɑlu yuo.
Noe yuo e k b din di jiet k nyu, k kuɑnt puob, k jikt b wɑɑs k tien’m jɑb, k tɑn tuu dɑɑl nbɑ k Noe din kuɑ ŋɑlngbenŋl ni ŋɑɑn nyik’b, k nyunciɑɔnŋ bɑɑl k dii b kul ɑ.
Lɔt yuo nɑ mun biɑ din tie nnɑ e. B din di k nyu, k dɑɑ bonɑ k kɔi bonkukɔit, k buul tɑn, k mɑɑ ŋei,
ŋɑɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k Lɔt din tɑn nyii Suodonm, k sɑlwuutɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ nɑn muu k dii b kul ɑ.
K dɑɑl nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt, l mun tɑn sii tie nnɑ e.
«L dɑɑl mɑnŋ, juɑ nbɑ be dituɑtuk pɑɑk, u dɑɑ siik k kuɑ u dieok ni ɑ wun sɑɑ jii u bonɑ, k wun nbɑ mun biɑ be kpɑɑb ni, u dɑɑ ŋmɑt lin nbɑ be puolpo nɑ buol.
Tiɑtl Lɔt ŋɑɑpuo mɑɑn po mɑn.
Tɔn, wun nbɑ k yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk n pɑɑk, u tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ u mɑnfuol, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk n pɑɑk, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nɑn bɑlmɔni.
N yien’i e, yuo nbɑ k n sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ, niib bɑnle tɑn sii duɑ dunduɑn-yenu pɑɑk, k *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.
Puob bɑnle tɑn sii be k nɑɑn dii, k b tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.
Jɑb bɑnle mun tɑn sii be kpɑɑb ni, k b tɑn sɑɑ jii yenɔ ŋɑɑn nyik luɑ.»
K u puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, lee?» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bonkpienn nbɑ be siɑn, lenŋ e k juut tiki.»
Yiesu yin Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ bɑljouk ɑ wun wɑnn’b nɑn l ŋɑn k bii mei Yennu yuo kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ mɔk kpinkpɑngbɑtuk u,
k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlbuulɔ din be digbɑnsiɑl k din tuu k tiin Yennu k tɑn boi ɑ u bɑɑkt nilɔ.
Pɑkuɑk mun biɑ din be duo mɑnŋ ni, k din tuu tun bɑɑt u buol yuo kul k yien’ɔ ɑ: ‹Min nɑn nilɔ mɔk mɑɑn, bun k tul’n.›
Ŋɑɑn k u tuu yet. L puolpo k u tɑn dukn dudukt ɑ: ‹N ponŋ tɑɑn k tiin Yennu, k biɑ k bɑɑkt nilɔ,
ŋɑɑn pɑkuɑk nɑ dɑɑmiu pɑɑk, n sɑɑ tɑt k bu u mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑn l sɔnu k tul’ɔ. Nnɑ i kɑɑ u sii bɑɑt e tieee k n tɑn bɑk.› »
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «Gbiintl bɑlbutounŋ dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ.
K Yennu mun ii? U nigɑnnkɑb nbɑ mei’ɔ yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk nɑ, u kɑn bu k tul’b ii?
N yien’i e, u sɑɑ bu b buut yiɑn yiɑn. Ŋɑɑn *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ bin nbɑ mɔk yɑdɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni wɑɑ ɑɑ?»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin bɑljouk k tul bin nbɑ duki nɑn b tie niŋɑnm, ŋɑɑn sɑlkt b lieb nɑ, ɑ
«Jɑb bɑnle din sɑɑn sɑɑ kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni ɑ bin miɑl Yennu, k yenɔ din tie Fɑɑliisiɑn, k luɑ mun din tie lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ.

K Fɑɑliisiɑn nɑ set k miɑl u mɔnŋ po k yet ɑ: ‹Yennu, n tien’ɑ niipuouk nɑn mɑɑ k tie nɑn nilieb nɑ. N k tie nɑn-yukɔ, k biɑ k tie biitdɑɑnɔ, k mun biɑ k tuun boncuncontuonɑ. Niipuouk nɑn mɑɑ k tie nɑn lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ nɑ nɑ.
N loln n mɔb tɑɑl munle dɑɑ ŋɑnlole nuɑk ni, k mɑɑ tuu lɑ lin nbɑ, n biɑ tien’ɑ yenn kuɑ piik nuɑk ni.›
K lɑnpogɑɑltuɑ nɑ ŋɑnin din set bɑnfɔkl ɑ, k din k luon wun yɑɑt got sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn pɑk yul k yet ɑ: ‹Yennu, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk, k mɑɑn n tie biitdɑɑnɔ e.› »

K Yiesu ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «N yien’i e, Yennu ponŋ din nyik cɑb juɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn yet Fɑɑliisiɑn nɑ miɑlu. K mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul dont u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ sikn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ mun siknt u mɔnŋ, b tɑn sɑɑ donn’ɔ.»
Tɔn, k nisiɑb din bɑɑt nɑn b wɑɑs Yiesu buol ni, ɑ wun tɑn yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k u *puolpoweitieb nbɑ lɑ k b bɑɑt nɑn wɑɑs mɑnŋ nɑ, k b tiɑn b pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu te k wɑɑs mɑnŋ bɑɑl u buol ni, ŋɑɑn yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k wɑɑs mɑnŋ i bɑɑt n buol nɑ mɑn, k dɑɑ tiɑn’m, k mɑɑn b buolu e yen Yennu nɑɑn.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, wun nbɑ k gɑɑl Yennu nɑɑn nɑn bik nɑ, u kɑn mi kuɑ l ni fɑb ɑ.»
L yuo nɑ k yudɑɑnsuɑ din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntɔŋɑnɔ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k tɑn lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu?»
K Yiesu ŋmɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ yi’n niŋɑnɔ? Niŋɑnsuɑ kɑɑ sie Yennu kuukuɑ.
A ponŋ mi Yennu *senni: Dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ, dɑɑ kpi, dɑɑ jɑɑn, dɑɑ tie fɑɑk siɑl ɑ, bɑɑkt ɑ bɑɑ nɑn ɑ nɑɑ.»
K juɑ mɑnŋ jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N ponŋ sɑk lin nbɑ nɑ kul n bisn ni e wɑɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt u jiinu nɑ k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bon-yenn kuɑ e pɔt’ɑ, kɔin lin nbɑ kul k ɑ mɔk k jii l likli k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɔktuk *Yendɔunŋ ni. L puolpo k ɑ jen ɑ kii wɑɑ’n.»
Wɑɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ k u pɑl ji biil, k mɑɑn u din mɔk mɔktuk bonciɑnn.
Yiesu nbɑ bɑnn nɑn u mɔk pɑlbiil nɑ, k u yet ɑ: «L pɑɑl nɑn mɔktɑ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.
L biɑ pɑɑl nɑn mɔktɔ n kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni nɑn yuyouk nbɑ kɑn fit kuɑ kpɑlpienu miɑl ni nɑ.»
Niib nbɑ gbɑt wɑɑ piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ e i e, ŋmee ji sɑɑ fit k lɑ fielu?»
K u yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ k nilɔ kɑn fit tun, ŋɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ fit tun’l ɑ.»
K Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, t din nyik lin nbɑ k t din mɔk nɑ ŋɑɑn wɑɑ’ɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, wun nbɑ kul nyik u ŋɑɑk ɑmi u bɑɑ ɑmi u nɑɑ ɑmi u puo ɑmi u wɑɑs ɑmi u yuɑlb ɑmi u wɑɑli Yennu nɑɑn pɑɑk,
u biɑ sɑɑ lɑ bonɑ bonciɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k lin gɑl wɑɑ nyik lin nbɑ nɑ, k yuo nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ, u tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
Yiesu yiin u puolpoweitieb k nyii nɑn’m kpinŋ k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, t sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm e, k lenŋ e k b sɑɑ tien Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ lin nbɑ kul k *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ din diɑn u po biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
B tɑn sɑɑ suol’ɔ k tien’ɔ bin nbɑ k tie *Suifnbɑ nuu ni, k b tɑn sɑɑ dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k suki’ɔ k siin mɔsɑnt u pɑɑk,
k biɑ buo’u gbɑnn, k biɑ tɑn kpi’u, ŋɑɑn k dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni.»
Ŋɑɑn u puolpoweitieb nɑ din k bɑnn mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk. Siɑl din dɔkn b yɑn ɑ, k b k bɑnn lin nbɑ k u piɑk nɑ pɑɑk.
K Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn pel Seliiko nɑ, k juɑnsuɑ din be k kɑl sɑnjokpinŋ k din tuu mei,
k tɑn gbɑt k nibulciɑɔnŋ gɑɑl, k u boi ɑ: «Bee tie?»
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ e gɑɑl.»
K u yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Yiesu, * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
K sɔnliitɑ nɑ din tiɑn u pɑɑk ɑ wun ŋmin, ŋɑɑn k u biɑ ŋɑnm yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, tin’n ninbɑɑɔk.»
K Yiesu set, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ bin dɑt juɑnŋ mɑnŋ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ u buol. Wɑɑ din bɑɑl kpiɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ k Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ
«A luon k n tun bee k tul’ɑ ni?» K u jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n luon k ɑ nyuɑnt n ninbinɑ e tul’n.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nyuɑntl. A yɑdɑ pɑɑk k ɑ ninbinɑ nɑ lɑ tebuk.»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u ninbinɑ nyuɑnt k u ji lɑɑt, k wɑɑ Yiesu k sɑɑ k dont Yennu sɑnn. Yuo nbɑ k niib nɑ kul lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b ji piɑk Yennu.
L puolpo e k Yiesu din bɑɑl Seliiko k gɑɑl.
K jɑsuɑ din be lenŋ mɑnŋ k tie *lɑnpogɑɑltieb yudɑɑnɔ, k u sɑnn din yi Sɑɑse, k u din mɔk mɔktuk bonciɑnn.
K u din kol ɑ wun lɑ Yiesu nbɑ tie wun nbɑ, ŋɑɑn k fit lɑ’u. Niib din yɑbt nɑn wun lɑ’u wɑɑ, k mɑɑn u din tie jɑjinjinŋ e.
L pɑɑk k u ciɑl k gɑl tuɑnn po k sɑɑ duo tiik nbɑ k b yi siikomɔl nɑ ɑ wun lɑ Yiesu gɑlu, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ wun gɑl lenŋ e.
K Yiesu nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl siikomɔl mɑnŋ buol, k u yɑɑt got’ɔ k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Sɑɑse, kɑktl k sik nɑ. Sie k n duɑl ɑ ŋɑɑk ni dinnɑ.»
K Sɑɑse din kɑkt k sik yiɑn ɑ k gɑɑl’ɔ nɑn pɑlpienn, k b sɑɑn u ŋɑɑk ni.
K niib nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ mɑnŋ, k b ji din buln k yien ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ sɑɑn kuɑ biitdɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑk ni.»
K Sɑɑse fiil k set k yet Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, gotl, n sɑɑ bɔkt n mɔktuk kul k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm l bonjinn. L i tie k n mi dii suɑ fobt, n sɑɑ jiin’ɔ tɑɑl munnɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dinnɑ ŋɑɑk nɑ niib bɑnn nɑn Yennu fiel’b ɑ, k mɑɑn juɑ mɑnŋ mun tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonn e.
*Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ bɑɑl ɑ u lon bin nbɑ bot nɑ k lɑ’b ŋɑɑn fiel’b.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin niib nbɑ gbiintl mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ bɑljouk, k mɑɑn wɑɑ pel Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, k b duki ɑ l pɑɑk Yennu nɑɑn yɑɑ lin bɑɑl yiɑn e.
K u yet’b ɑ: «Nijɑɑnsuɑ din be k din tɑn nyii k sɑɑn digbɑnn bɑnfɔkl ɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑ din’ɔ nɑɑn, k l puolpo k wun jen kpen ŋɑɑk ni.
Wɑɑ dɑɑ din k nyii yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u yiin u tuontunnɑ piik k tul tul’b sɑlmɑ binn binn, k yet’b ɑ: ‹Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ kpent kpinkpounŋ nɑn likli mɑnŋ nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen.›
Ŋɑɑn k u duo ni niib nɑ nɑn’ɔ. Wɑɑ sɑɑn yuo nbɑ k b tun *tuomi kpɑnbɑl nɑ buol ni, ɑ b k sɑk ɑ ŋuɑ n tien b kpɑnbɑl.
«Tɔn, k nijɑɑnn nɑ sɑɑn sɑɑ set dii nɑɑn mɑnŋ k tɑn jen. Wɑɑ jen yuo nbɑ, k u te k b yiin u tuontunnɑ nbɑ k u dɑɑn tul’b likli nɑ, ɑ wun lɑ nyuɑt nbɑ k b lɑ likli nbɑ k u dɑɑn tul’b nɑ ni.
K sinsinn yuɑ nɑ bɑɑl u buol k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, sɑlmɑ binn nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn tul’n nɑ, n kpent kpinkpounŋ k lɑ sɑlmɑ binɑ piik k pukn l pɑɑk.›
K u cɑnbɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N fɑɑn, ɑ tie tuontunŋɑnɔ e. Fɑɑ diɑ bonmintk fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l pɑɑk, n sɑɑ tul’ɑ doi piik *yudɑnt.›
K wun nbɑ mun pɑɑ u pɑɑk nɑ bɑɑl k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, sɑlmɑ binn nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn tul’n nɑ, n kpent kpinkpounŋ k lɑ sɑlmɑ binɑ ŋɑnŋmu e.›
K u cɑnbɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tul’ɑ doi ŋɑnŋmu yudɑnt e.›
«K luɑ mun biɑ bɑɑl k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, gotl ɑ sɑlmɑ binn nɑ e nɑ. N dɑɑn gbin n ninfiɑnŋ ni e k bɔl,
k mɑɑn n dɑɑn tiin’ɑ ɑ tonu nɑ pɑɑk e. A tuu jikt lin nbɑ k ɑ k bil, k biɑ jɑɑn lin nbɑ k ɑ k bul.›
K u cɑnbɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fin tuontun-yuonn nɑ, n sɑɑ jii ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn e k pɑk gbenn ɑ. A ponŋ mi nɑn n tuu tie nitounŋ o, k tuu jikt lin nbɑ k n k bil, k biɑ jɑɑn lin nbɑ k n k bul.
Bee tien k ɑ dɑɑn k jii n likli mɑnŋ k kuɑn bɑnŋ ni k nyuɑt n tɑn pɑɑn l pɑɑk i? Mɑɑ bo tɑn jen nɑ, n bo sɑɑ lɑ n likli pɑɑtl ɑ,›
k u yet bin nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ ɑ: ‹Gɑɑt sɑlmɑ binn mɑnŋ u buol ni, k tul wun nbɑ mɔk sɑlmɑ binɑ piik nɑ.›
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Cɑnbɑɑ, u ponŋ mɔk sɑlmɑ binɑ piik.›
K u jiin’m ɑ: ‹N yien’i e, wun nbɑ mɔk bonɑ, b sɑɑ pukn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kɔnŋ bont, b biɑ sɑɑ tont bonmintk nbɑ k u ponŋ mɔk nɑ.
Tɔn, n dɑtɑi nɑ nbɑ k luon k n tien b kpɑnbɑl nɑ, ŋɑnn bɑɑt nɑn’m nnɑ nɑ k tɑn kpi’b n nunm nnɑ.› »
Yiesu nbɑ pɑk k gbenn nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u *puolpoweitieb yɑɑ bin do Selusɑɑlenm, k Yiesu gɑl b tuɑnn.
K b tɑn pel Betfɑɑje nɑn Betɑɑni doi nbɑ kpiɑ jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ, k Yiesu tun u puolpoweitieb nɑ ni bɑnle,
k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ digbɑnbik nbɑ be i tuɑnn po nɑ ni. I i sɑi bɑɑl, i sɑɑ lɑ bonsɑl k u lol, k suɑ dɑɑ k mi jɑk’ɔ. Yin lot’ɔ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ nɑ,
k wun nbɑ i boi’i ɑ: ‹Bee tien k i lot’ɔ?› yin yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ e luon’ɔ.› »
K b sɑɑn lɑ bonn kul nɑn Yiesu nbɑ pɑk’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Bɑɑ sɑɑn sɑɑ lot bonŋ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ k bondɑnm lɑ’b k boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i lot bonŋ mɑnŋ i?»
K b jiin yet’b ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ e luon’ɔ,»
ŋɑɑn dɑt bonŋ mɑnŋ k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol ni. K u puolpoweitieb jii b cincenɑ nɑn tiɑt k pɑɑn bonŋ nɑ pɑɑk k jɑkn Yiesu.
Wɑɑ jɑk bonŋ nɑ yuo nbɑ k nisiɑb jikt b cincenɑ nɑn b tiɑt k lɑt sɔnu ni.

Wɑɑ tɑn pel Selusɑɑlenm k u bɑɑl sɔnsinsikl nbɑ nyi Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk nɑ. Lenŋ e k u puolpoweitieb kul libn piin k dont Yennu sɑnn nɑn pɑlpienn, bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ kul nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ pɑɑk k b yien ɑ
«Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be Kpɑnbɑl nbɑ bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk. Mɑnu i be *Yendɔunŋ ni k yudɑnt i tie Yennu yɑl.»
Ŋɑnn e k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nbɑ be nibul nɑ ni yet Yiesu, «Wɑntuɑ, yetl ɑ puolpoweitieb nɑ, ɑ bin ŋmin.»
K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, niib mɑnŋ i ŋmin, ŋɑɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ duɑ sɔnu ni nɑ sii yikn e.»
Wɑɑ din pel k tɑn lɑ Selusɑɑlenm k u mɔ duo nɑ pɑɑk,
k yet ɑ: «L i bo i tie k ɑ bɑnn mɑnu sɔnu dinnɑ, l bo sii ŋɑn k tul’ɑ. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ l liil ɑ yɑn, k ɑ kɑn fit bɑnn.
Yuo bɑɑt k ɑ dɑtɑi tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl, k mɑɑ juonjɑl k lint’ɑ ŋɑɑn luon ɑ pɑɑk lokl kul po.
B tɑn sɑɑ biil’ɑ cɑin, fin nɑn niib kul. B kɑn nyik k tɑnn pɑɑ liel pɑɑk, k mɑɑn ɑ bo k bɑnn yuo nbɑ k Yennu bɑɑl ɑ buol ni.»
L Puol po e k Yiesu din sɑɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k din sɑɑ bel bin nbɑ kɔi bonɑ,
ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹N ŋɑɑk sii tie Yenmiɑlu ŋɑɑk e,› ŋɑɑn k yinm e kpint’l k tien’l nɑn-yukb kinkɑl buol.»
Tɔn, dɑɑl kul k Yiesu din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k tumi niib. K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb nɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ yudɑnm luon bin kpi’u,
ŋɑɑn k fit lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi’u, k mɑɑn niib nɑ kul din cɑɑn b tubɑ k gbiintl u mɑɑn.
Dɑsiɑl Yiesu nbɑ din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tumi niib k biɑ muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb nɑn sɑɑkɑb din bɑɑl u buol
k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yet’t, ŋmee yiikuo ni e k ɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ? Ŋmee cɑb’ɑ yiikuo mɑnŋ i?»
K u jiin ɑ: «N mun mɔk buboit k sɑɑ boi’i. Yetl’n mɑn,
Sɑn nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ, Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo ɑmi nisɑɑli ee?»
K b ŋmɑnt fɑɑ l lɑbɑɑl nɑn b lieb k yien ɑ: «T i yet ɑ Yennu e cɑb’ɔ l yiikuo, u sɑɑ boi’t ɑ bee k t k tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ?
K t i biɑ kii yet ɑ nisɑɑli e din cɑb’ɔ, niib nɑ kul ɑ sɑɑ jɑɑt’t tɑnɑ wɑɑ, k mɑɑn b tien yɑdɑ nɑn Sɑn din tie *Yennu sɔkni e.»
L pɑɑk, k b jiin k yet Yiesu ɑ: «T k mi u yiikuo nbɑ nyii siɑn.»
K Yiesu mun yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, n mun kɑn yet’i bɑnnu nbɑ k n lɑ l yiikuo k tuun lin nbɑ nɑ.»
L puolpo k Yiesu yin niib nɑ bɑljouk ɑ: «Jɑsuɑ din wuu tilonti nbɑ k b yi *fiinyɑ nɑ u kpɑɑb ni, ŋɑɑn ji din jii kpɑɑb nɑ k tien kpɑɑlɑ nuu ni ɑ bii goli, ŋɑɑn tɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn siɑl po k sɑɑ wei.
K puɑlyuo tɑn bɑɑl k u tun u tuontunnɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ buol ni, ɑ bin bɔkt tiluɑnɑ nbɑ tie kpɑdɑɑnɔ yɑl k tul’ɔ. Ŋɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ sɑɑ buo tuontunnɔ nɑ k jiin’ɔ yɑnn.
Ŋɑnn e k u biɑ tun tuontunluɑ, k kpɑɑlɑ nɑ biɑ sɑɑ buo’u k din’ɔ fei k biɑ jiin’ɔ yɑnn.
K kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ biɑ tun tuontunluɑ, k b sɑɑ tien’ɔ dɑnŋ k jii’u lu’u.
