Ŋɑnn e k kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ yet ɑ: ‹N sɑɑ tien nlee nɑ? Lɑɑ ji be nɑ, n sɑɑ tun n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ bilonkɑk e. Ŋuɑ ŋɑnin, pɑsiɑl b sɑɑ tul’ɔ nibɑɑkl ɑ.›
Ŋɑɑn kpɑɑlɑ nɑ nbɑ din tun ninbinn k lɑ u bik nɑ k u bɑɑt nɑ, k b yet b lieb ɑ: ‹Kpɑdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ fɑdiilɔ e nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt tin kpi’u mɑn, k u fɑɑl mɑnŋ n ji tien t yɑl.›
K b suol’ɔ k nyii nɑn’ɔ kpɑɑb nɑ kpinŋ po k sɑɑ kpii’u. «Tɔn, kpɑɑlɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, kpɑdɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑ tien’m nlee?
U sɑɑ bɑɑl k kpi’b, ŋɑɑn biɑ jii kpɑɑb mɑnŋ k tul lieb.» Niib mɑnŋ nbɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ k b yet ɑ: «Yennu n bɔl ŋɑnn.»
K Yiesu got’b ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni pɑɑk tie bee? ‹Tɑnn nbɑ k tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tien ŋɑɑk nɑ pɑnŋ.›
«Tɔn, wun nbɑ kul bɑɑ tɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk sɑɑ but but e, ŋɑɑn tɑnn mɑnŋ i bɑɑ wun nbɑ pɑɑk, binm, l sɑɑ mɑt mɑt’ɔ e.»
K senniwɑntieb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm bɑnn nɑn Yiesu nbɑ yin bɑljouk nɑ l sɑɑn gɑɑn b pɑɑk e. L pɑɑk, k b ji din kol ɑ bin suol’ɔ l tonton nɑ, ŋɑɑn tiin niib nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni.

Senni wɑntieb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm ji din wɑɑ piki Yiesu, k tun pikiitieb bin nbɑ kpɑnn ɑ b tie mɔmɔnpɑklɑ e, ɑ bin lɑ u mɔbonkpetl nbɑ tie lin nbɑ, k ji fit suol’ɔ k tien’ɔ l tinŋ yudɑɑnɔ nuu ni nɑn u yiikuo ni.
K pikiitieb mɑnŋ tɑn bɑɑl boi Yiesu buboit ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t mi nɑn fɑɑ yien lin nbɑ k biɑ wɑnt nɑ, l ŋɑn. A biɑ k tie luktn dɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn fin e biɑ wɑnt Yennu sɔnu nɑn bɑlmɔni.
Tɔn, t *senni cɑb’t nɑn tii pɑ lɑnpo kii tien Luonm tinŋ kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl ɑmi t dɑɑ pɑ?»
K Yiesu bɑnn b sel nbɑ k b tie nɑ k yet’b ɑ
«Wɑnt’n liklib. Tɔn, k ŋmee nɑɑɔnŋ nɑn sɑnn e be liklib nɑ pɑɑk i?» K b jiin ɑ: «Sesɑɑl yɑl e.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tɔn, ii yen i pɑ kii tien Sesɑɑl lin nbɑ tie u yɑl, ŋɑɑn mun i pɑ kii tien Yennu lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl.»
K pikiitieb nɑ lek k lɑ u mɔbonkpetl niib nɑ tuɑnn ni, k l tien’m yɑɑl-lituk nɑn Yiesu jiinu mɑnŋ k b ji ŋmin.
K *Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ siɑb din bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni. Ŋɑnm e din tuu yɑɑ ɑ niib tɑn kɑn fiil kuun ni, k b boi’ɔ ɑ
«Wɑntuɑ, Muois din diɑn senni k yet ɑ: ‹Nilɔ i kuɑn u ŋɑɑpuo k k mɑl wɑɑs ŋɑɑn tɑn kpo, ɑ l ŋɑn k u ninjɑ n fɑɑl pɑkuɑk nɑ k mɑl wɑɑs k tul kpiemɔ nɑ.›
Tɔn, jɑb bɑnlole din be k tɑɑ bɑɑ, k sɑɑkuɑ po tɑn kuɑn puo, k k mɑl wɑɑs, ŋɑɑn kpo,
k wun nbɑ mun pɑɑ u pɑɑk nɑ fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ, k mun biɑ k mɑl, ŋɑɑn kpo,
k wun nbɑ wɑɑ muntɑ ni nɑ mun din fɑɑl puo mɑnŋ k bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ kul ɑ din tɑn fɑɑl puo nɑ ŋɑɑn mun tɑn kpo kpo, k k mɑl wɑɑs mun biɑk.
K l juontu k puo mɑnŋ mun biɑ tɑn kpo.
K lɑɑ ji be nɑ, kuun fiilu dɑɑl, b ŋmee tɑn sii yen puo mɑnŋ i? K mɑɑn b bɑnlole kul ɑ din kuɑn’ɔ wɑɑ.»
K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kuɑnt puob k biɑ ciɑnt b wɑɑs k tien’m jɑb,
ŋɑɑn k bin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn kuun fiilu, k biɑ ŋɑn nɑn bii be *dulnyɑ pɑɑnn ni nɑ, b kii kuɑnt puob, k b biɑ kii ciɑnt b wɑɑs k tien jɑb,
k b ji kɑn mi k kpo, k mɑɑn b sii tie nɑn *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ e. B biɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs e k mɑɑn b fiil kuun ni wɑɑ.
Tɔn, Muois e mun din ponŋ wɑnn nɑn kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni. Muois nbɑ din diɑn jɑgotkunkonŋ po nɑ, u din yi Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm Yennu, nɑn Isɑɑk Yennu, nɑn Sɑɑkɔb Yennu.
Ŋɑnn Yennu k tie kpienm Yennu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tie fuotb Yennu e, k mɑɑn b kul tie fuotb e u tuɑnn ni.»
Ŋɑnn e k senniwɑntesiɑb yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ jiin bonŋɑnn ɑ.»
K b ji din jie nɑn bin boi Yiesu buboisiɑt.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Nlee k b yien ɑ *Klistu tie * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?
K mɑɑn Dɑɑfiid mɔnŋ mɔnŋ diɑn *yɑni kɑdɑɑɔk nuɑk ni ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet n Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ: Kɑln n niidiitu po
mɔkmɔk nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jii ɑ dɑtɑi k tien’m ɑ tɑɑkpɑktɑ.›
Dɑɑfiid nbɑ din yiin Klistu ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ› nɑ, nlee k Klistu nɑ tie ŋuɑ Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn i?»
Niib kul nbɑ gbiintl Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k u yet u *puolpoweitieb ɑ

«Suot i mɔnŋ mɑn nɑn senniwɑntieb. Ŋɑnm e luon bii liɑ liɑtbɑɑnt, kii lin kii sonm, k biɑ gɑɑn bulcinfuonti dɑi ni. B i kuɑ *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, b luon bii kɑɑl nijɑɑnɑ kɑɑni pɑɑk e. B i sɑɑn jɑɑnm ni, b biɑ luon yudɑnm kinkɑɑni buɑ.
Ŋɑnm e biɑ gɑɑn pɑkɔi nbɑ mɔk lin nbɑ kul, ŋɑɑn ji tuu jen ɑ k mei Yennu k wei ɑ bin kpɑnn ɑ b tie niŋɑnm e. B tubdɑtu tɑn sii bi bonciɑnn.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu got lint k lɑ mɔktɑ, k b kpient likli Yennu piini lɑkl ni,
k u biɑ lɑ pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ k u mun kpien jinjennbɑ ŋɑnle Yennu piini lɑkl nɑ ni.
K Yiesu yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i, pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ kpien k gɑl suɑ kul ɑ,
k mɑɑn b kul pɑɑt b likciɑnt nɑ ni e, ŋɑɑn pɑkɔtɑlɑs-dɑɑnɔ nɑ kpɑn jii lin nbɑ k u yɑɑ wun di nɑ e k kpien.»
Ŋɑnn e k siɑb din piɑk Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk po, k yien bɑɑ te k l fɑn nɑn tɑnŋɑnɑ nɑn Yennu piini k l ŋɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ. Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet’b ɑ
«Yɑɑ lɑɑt lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn yuo bɑɑt k b tɑn sɑɑ tut l kul ɑ k lu tinŋ ni, k l tɑn-yenn kuɑ tɑn kɑn tenn k tuɑ liel pɑɑk.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu *puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, biɑ yuo e k lin nbɑ nɑ tɑn sii tie e? K l nyinn biɑ tɑn sii tie nlee, lɑɑ tɑn sii yɑɑ lin tien i?»
K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn k bin tɑn kpɑnn’i. K mɑɑn niib bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl n sɑnn ni k yien ɑ: ‹Min e tie *Klistu,› ɑmi: ‹Yuo bɑɑl ɑ.› I dɑɑ wɑɑ l nibuolu.
I sɑɑ gbɑt tɑb nɑn kunkɔnɑ po, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ te k l mɔk’i jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun sinsinn dɑɑnn ɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie k *dulnyɑ gbennu sɑɑ bɑɑl l tonton nɑ kɑɑ.»
K u ŋɑnm yet’b ɑ: «Nibuolu nɑn nibuolu tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn lieb, k kpɑnbɑl nɑn kpɑnbɑl mun tɑn sɑɑ tuok k kɔn nɑn lieb.
Tinŋ jijekjɑɑnɑ nɑn kon nɑn nikuuk tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑ tingbounŋ lokl kul po buol buol, k niib biɑ tɑn sii lɑɑt lin nbɑ sii mɔk’b jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn nyinsɑɑkɑlɑ nbɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo.

Ŋɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tɑn tien, b tɑn sɑɑ suol’i k muks’i, k kubn’i *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet yudɑnm nii ni, k kuɑn’i dɑnsɑli, k b tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn’i kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn tinŋ yudɑnm buol ni k bin bu i buut, k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk.
K ŋɑnn e tɑn sɑɑ te k i lɑ yɑɑk k lin tien *siɑlɑ k jiin n po.
L pɑɑk, i tɑn suol i mɔnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ te k l dɑɑmi’i nɑn yɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk jiin biɑnŋ nbɑ l yuo,
k mɑɑn l yuo nɑ, n tɑn sɑɑ tul’i yɑn nɑn mɔbonɑ nbɑ k i tɑn sɑɑ pɑk, k i dɑtɑi kɑn fit nyɑnn i mɔbonɑ ɑmi k noi’i ni.
I cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn i nɑɑnbɑ, nɑn i ninjɑnm, nɑn i dɑnm, nɑn i yuɑsnbɑ mɔnŋ tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt’i, k b tɑn sɑɑ kpi i siɑb.
K suɑ kul tɑn sii nɑn’i, k mɑɑn yɑɑ wɑɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn i yul yut nɑn yenn kɑn bɑɑ yɑnn gbɑɑ.
Ii diɑ mɑn fɑnu mɑn, k i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
«Yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑ sejenm k b lint Selusɑɑlenm, yin bɑnn nɑn l yɑɑ lin biil e nɑ.
L yuo mɑnŋ, bin nbɑ tɑn be Suude tinŋ ni, bin ciɑl k do juɑt, k bin nbɑ mun be Selusɑɑlenm, bin nyi duo mɑnŋ ni, k bin nbɑ mun be digbɑnkpini nɑ ji dɑɑ bɑɑt duo mɑnŋ ni,
k mɑɑn l yuo nɑ tɑn sii tie yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ dɑt niib tubɑ. Lin nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
L yuo mɑnŋ, l tɑn sii bi k tien podɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ diɑ wɑlɑi, k mɑɑn fɑlɑ bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl tinŋ nɑ pɑɑk, k Yennu wutuol tɑn sɑɑ do niib mɑnŋ pɑɑk.

K sejenm tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k kpi niib bonciɑnn nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ suol bonciɑnn k sɑɑn nɑn’m tini kul po, k tien’m dɑɑbɑ. K bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ tɑn sii cibt lin Selusɑɑlenm mɔkmɔk nɑn b yuo nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ gbenn.
«K nyinɑ tɑn sii be yennu ni nɑn ŋmɑɑlk ni nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ ni. K tingbounŋ ni, pɑlbiil tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl tini ni, k yɑnputuk biɑ tɑn sii be, k mɑɑn mɔkgbenŋl nyunpɑnɑ nbɑ tɑn sii fu bonciɑnn nɑ pɑɑk.
Jɑŋmɑɑni tɑn sɑɑ jek niib, bɑɑ sii guu lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tɑn bɑɑl tingbounŋ ni nɑ, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo kul ɑ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɑnm k ŋmɑt nɑ.
L yuo k b tɑn sɑɑ lɑ k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ dɔktl bɑɑt sɑnpɑgbounŋ ni nɑn pɑnŋ bonciɑnn nɑn yentsɑɑkɑl.
Yuo nbɑ k lin nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ piin tienu, yin ŋɑnm set fɑnu k donn yulɑ k mɑɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ fiel’i nɑ ŋmɑn bɑɑl ɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yin’m bɑljouk ɑ: «Gotl fiigie nɑn tiini kul.
Yɑɑ tuu lɑ k tiini mɑnŋ fɑɑt bintl, i ji tuu bɑnn nɑn siɑɔk pel nɑ.
Nnɑ e mun biɑk, yuo nbɑ k i tɑn lɑɑt k lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul tuun, yin bɑnn nɑn Yennu nɑɑn pel ɑ.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ nigbounŋ nɑ kɑn kpo k gbenn kɑɑ wɑɑ k lin nbɑ nɑ kul n tun.
Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ gɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn n mɑɑn ŋɑnin kɑn mi k gɑl fɑb ɑ.
«Ii mi mɑn, k dɑɑ kpɑkint jɑɑnm-nbɑ dinu ni, nɑn dɑnyunu ni, k dɑɑ te k i binbenŋ pɑɑk dɑɑmi’i ni. Nnɑ i kɑɑ dɑɑl nbɑ k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k i k mi.
Dɑɑl mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ nyɑk niib kul ɑ nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni k suol’b nɑn tɑnbɑl nɑ e.
Ii guu mɑn kii mei Yennu yuo kul, ɑ yii mɔk pɑnŋ nbɑ sɑɑ te k i nyinn i mɔnŋ fɑlɑ kul nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ ni, k i biɑ sɑɑ fit set Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tuɑnn.»
Tɔn, yennu ni k Yiesu din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tumi niib, k din tuu tɑn sɑɑn nyiɑɔk k sɑɑ be jɑgbɑɑk nbɑ k b yi’l *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk.
K sɑn-nyɑpob ni k niib kul din tuu bɑɑt u buol Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tɑn gbiintl u mɑɑn.
Yuo nbɑ din tɑn pel nɑn bin tikl k di jɑɑnm, k ŋmɑn pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ * dɑtinŋ nɑ, k b din yi jɑɑnm mɑnŋ *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm,
k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb din kol ɑ bin lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi Yiesu, ŋɑɑn b din tiin niib nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni.
L yuo nɑ k *Sɑɑtɑn kuɑ Suudɑ ni, wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Iskɑɑliɑɔt k u biɑ din tie Yiesu tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ.
K ŋuɑ Suudɑ din sɑɑn k sɑɑ pɑk nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ k u sɑɑ fit k kuɑt Yiesu k bin suol’ɔ.
K b ji din mɔk pɑlpienn k gɑɑl ɑ b sɑɑ pɑ Suudɑ likli.
K u sɑk b lol mɑnŋ k ji piin luon sɔnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ jii Yiesu k kubn’ɔ b nuu ni yuo nbɑ k niib nɑ ji kɑɑ nɑ.
Pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ dɑtinŋ nɑ jɑɑnm dɑɑl nbɑ k b yɑɑ bin kpi pebis k tien *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ,
k Yiesu tun Piɑl nɑn Sɑn duo nɑ ni k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ tien *yuktgɑltiɑlu jiet nɑ siil k tul’t k tin di.»
K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Lee k ɑ luon k tin sɑɑn tien siil i?»
K u yet’b ɑ: «Nnɑlɑ, yuo nbɑ k i bɑɑt duo nɑ ni, i sɑɑ cet jɑsuɑ k u jii nyunsuɑl. Ii wɑɑ’u nɑn ŋɑɑk nbɑ k u sɑɑ kuɑ,
k yin yet ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ ɑ: ‹Wɑntuɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ t boi’ɑ ɑ dieok nbɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u *puolpoweitieb yɑɑ bin kuɑ di *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet nɑ be lee?›
K u sɑɑ wɑnn’i dituɑtuk nbɑ yɑb k ponŋ tien siil, k yin tien jiet mɑnŋ lenŋ.»
K b din sɑɑn k set sɑɑ lɑ bonn kul nɑn Yiesu nbɑ yet’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k b ji din tien jɑɑnm mɑnŋ jiet siil.
Jɑɑnm jiet dinu nɑ yuo nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl, k Yiesu kɑl ɑ wun di, k u tuomiinbɑ nɑ mun kɑl ɑ bin di nɑn’ɔ.
K u yet’b ɑ: «L mɑntk wɑnt n pɑl ni nɑn min nɑn yinm n lɑkn di *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm dinu dɑɑnn e wɑɑ k fɑlɑ n ji tɑn bɑɑl’n.
N yien’i e, n ji kɑn mi k di jɑɑnm nɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k bɑlmɔni jɑɑnm nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
Ŋɑnn e k u jii *kɔp nɑn dɑmunŋ, k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt nɑ mɑn k cent i lieb k nyu.
N yien’i e nɑn lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, n ji kɑn mi nyu dɑmunŋ nɑ, sie k Yennu nɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl.»
Ŋɑnn e k u jii pɑɑnu k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, k ŋmit ŋmit k tul’b ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Nɑ e tie n gbɑnɑnt, k n yɑɑ n jii’l k tul’i. Ii tun kii ŋmɑn mɑn kii tiɑn n po.»
K dinu nɑ puolpo e k u biɑ jii kɔp nɑ nɑn dɑmunŋ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Dɑmunŋ nɑ tie Yennu *lol pɑɑnn nbɑ lol nɑn n sɔn, k l muɑn i pɑɑk.
«Gotl mɑn wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n nɑ, ŋuɑ e kɑl k di nɑn’n nɑ.
*Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ set yɑɑ wun kpo nɑn Yennu nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn l sii bi k tul wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun kuɑt’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk.»
K b ji din piin k boi b lieb k yien ɑ: «T ŋmɑ po e yɑɑ wun tun lin nbɑ nɑ?»
L yuo k mɔniɑɔk bɑɑl u puolpoweitieb mɑnŋ sinsuuk ni, k b din noi k yien ɑ lɑnm e cie lieb.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kpɑnbɑlɑ diɑ b niib nɑn ninmɔnn, k b yudɑnm yi b mɔnŋ ‹b sonmtieb,›
ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, l k tie nnɑ. Wun nbɑ tie nijɑɑnn i ni, sie k u tien nɑn bik nɑ, k yudɑɑnɔ mun n tien nɑn tuontunnɔ nɑ.
Tɔn, ŋmee tie nijɑɑnn k gɑl u luɑ, wun nbɑ di jiet, ɑmi wun nbɑ tien e? L k tie wun nbɑ di nɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ? Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin be i sinsuuk ni nɑn tuontunnɔ nɑ e.
«Yinm ponŋ tun be nɑn’n n jinjɑnmi ni yuo kul.
N Bɑɑ nbɑ din’n nɑɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e mun k n yɑɑ n din’i nɑɑn,
k yin di k nyu nɑn’n n nɑɑn ni, k i tɑn sɑɑ kɑl nɑɑngbɑnt pɑɑk k bu Islɑɑeltieb buolu piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ buut.»
«Siimɔn, Siimɔn, gbiintl, Sɑɑtɑn bɑln ɑ wun lɑ yiikuo nbɑ k u sɑɑ bikn i kul k len’i nɑn dii nbɑ k b tuu lenn founŋ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn fin Siimɔn, min e miɑl Yennu ɑ pɑɑk k ɑ yɑdɑ dɑɑ bɑɑ, k yuo nbɑ k ɑ ji jen n buol ni, ɑ tot ɑ nɑɑ wɑɑs.»
K Piɑl jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie dɑnsɑlk ɑmi kuun i e, n tien siil ɑ, nɑn min nɑn fin n sɑɑn.»
K Yiesu din jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Piɑl, n yien’ɑ e, kojouk dɑɑ tɑn kɑn bui dinnɑ sinsinn dɑɑnn i k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ ɑ ɑ k mi’n.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi’b ɑ: «Mɑɑ din tun’i doi ni nɑ k i din k diɑ likbuɑli nɑn pɑkɑ nɑn tɑɑsɑliɑ nɑ, i din kɔnŋ siɑl ii?» K b jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Aɑi.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ jik lɑɑ, wun nbɑ mɔk likbuɑlk ɑmi pɑkl, wun jii’l, k wun nbɑ mun k mɔk juk-bɑnjiɑk, wun kɔi u liɑtfuouk k dɑɑ.
Min e yien’i nɑ, l tie k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ n tɑn tien mɔni n ni ɑ: ‹B jii’u k pukn’ɔ biitdɑnm kɑnn ni.› Setk nɑn mɔni, lin nbɑ k b din diɑn k jiin n po yɑɑ lin bɑɑl n pɑɑk.»
K b din yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, gotl, juk-bɑnjɑi ŋɑnle nɑ.» K u yet’b ɑ: «L jɑnŋ ɑ.»
Yiesu din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk, nɑn wɑɑ ponŋ tuu tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb wɑɑ’u sɑɑ.
Wɑɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ k u yet’b ɑ: «Ii mei Yennu mɑn k i tɑn dɑɑ kuɑ jinjɑnmi ni.»
Ŋɑnn e k u cɑt b buol ni k sɑɑn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k sɑɑ gbɑɑn tinŋ ni k miɑl Yennu,
k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, l i tie ɑ lonm, dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k n kuɑ bonbiil nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k ɑ lonm o n tun, k l dɑɑ tie n lonm kɑɑ.»
K *mɑlɑkɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn dɔkt u pɑɑk k tot’ɔ.
U din dii fɑlɑ bonciɑnn k miɑl Yennu nɑn u pɑnŋ kul, k nɑɑɔk tɑn pu u pɑɑk k tɑn tuot nɑɑn nɑn sɔn nɑ.
K u tɑn fiil Yenmiɑlu ni k ŋmɑt u puolpoweitieb nɑ buol, k sɑɑ lɑ k b guɑnt, k mɑɑn pɑlbiil nbɑ din be b pɑlɑ ni nɑ pɑɑk.
K u boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k i guɑnt i? Fiit kii mei Yennu mɑn k i tɑn dɑɑ kuɑ jinjɑnmi ni.»
Yiesu nbɑ din dɑɑ piɑk nɑn u puolpoweitieb nɑ, k nibul dɔkt. K Suudɑ, wun nbɑ tie u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ, gɑl b tuɑnn, k tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni ɑ wun muɑt u tɑnkpinn.
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «Suudɑ, ɑ muɑtl n tɑnkpinn ɑ ɑ kuɑt Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ ee?»
L yuo nɑ k u puolpoweitieb nɑ lɑ lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tien nɑ, k b boi Yiesu ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, t kɔn nɑn’m nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi ii?»
K b yenɔ tɑɑn kɑkt cuɑ Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ tuontunnɔ niidiitu tubl k pot.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Nyikn mɑn,» ŋɑɑn sii juɑ nɑ tubl mɑnŋ k l lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu boi Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb nbɑ bɑɑl ɑ bin suol’ɔ nɑ ɑ: «N tie fɑt-tuɑ e k i bɑɑl nɑn juk-bɑnjɑi nɑn gbɑjɑlɑ ɑɑ?
N ponŋ tuu tun be nɑn’i dɑɑl kul Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ŋɑɑn k i k so’n. Tɔn, ŋɑɑn yuo nɑ lek tie i yɑl e, nɑn bunbɔnn yiikuo yɑl.»
L yuo nɑ k b ji din suol Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ ŋɑɑk ni, k Piɑl ji sɑɑ wɑɑ u puolpo bɑnfɔkl ɑ.
Ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni, niib din juo muu dundonsinsuuk ni k kɑl lint ɑ, k Piɑl tɑn kuɑ k kɑl pukn’m.
Wɑɑ kɑl kpiɑ muu nɑ, k tuontunbipuoyenɔ lɑ’u k got’ɔ silll, k yet ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tuu be nɑn’ɔ.»
K Piɑl noi ɑ: «Puo, n k mi’u.»
Lɑɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k jɑsuɑ mun lɑ’u k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin, ɑ mun tie u puolpoweitieb yenɔ e.» K Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ, kɑi, l k tie min kɑɑ.»
Lɑɑ biɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k jɑluɑ nnɑ mun biɑ yet ɑ: «Yɑunwɑ, bɑlmɔni e, juɑ nɑ tuu be nɑn’ɔ k mɑɑn u mun biɑ tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ e.»
K Piɑl jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ, min tɑɑn k mi lin nbɑ k ɑ yien nɑ kɑɑ wɑɑ.» Wɑɑ dɑɑ piɑk nɑ e k kojouk fɑn bui l tonton nɑ.
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiɑnt got lɑ Piɑl, k Piɑl ji tiɑl ŋuɑ Yiesu mɔbonɑ nɑ po, wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑ: «Kojouk dɑɑ tɑn kɑn bui dinnɑ sinsinn dɑɑnn i k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ e ɑ ɑ k mi’n.»
K Piɑl ji nyii k bui bonbiil.
L puolpo e k bin nbɑ guu Yiesu nɑ dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k buo’u,
ŋɑɑn jii cincenn k bobn u nunm po ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Buntl wun nbɑ fɑɑ’ɑ nɑ.»
K b biɑ pɑk k biil u sɑnn bonciɑnn k suki’ɔ.
Lɑɑ yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni k *Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn senniwɑntieb din tɑɑn kɑl b yudɑnm tituk kɑɑnu, k te k b bɑɑl nɑn Yiesu.
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin i e set kii tie *Klistu, fɑn yet’t.» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Mi i yet’i, ŋɑɑn i ponŋ tɑn kɑn tien’n yɑdɑ gbɑɑ,
k mi i mun i biɑ kii boi’i buboit, i kɑn sɑk jiin’n buboit mɑnŋ.
Ŋɑɑn lɑɑ nyii mɔtɑɑnɑ k jii sɑɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ tɑn sii kɑl Yɑbnt Yennu niidiitu po.»
K b kul ɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «K ŋɑnn fin e tie Yennu Bijɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Nɑn yɑɑ kpɑn yɑɑ nɑ.»
K b yet b lieb ɑ: «T ponŋ ji luon siɑlɑɑdɑnm biɑ po e nɑ? T ponŋ gbɑt u mɔnŋ mɑɑn ɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k niib nɑ kul ɑ din fiil jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Piilɑɑt buol.
Lenŋ e k b ji din piin k wɑnt u biit k yien ɑ: «T lɑ nilɔ nɑ k u biil t niib k yɑɑ ɑ b dɑɑ pɑ lɑnpo k tien kpɑnbɑl Sesɑɑl, k biɑ yien ɑ ŋuɑ e tie *Klistu k biɑ tie Kpɑnbɑl.»
K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie *Suifnbɑ kpɑnbɑl nɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin k yet ɑ: «Fin e yɑɑ.»
K Piilɑɑt yet Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn nibul nɑ: «N k lɑ juɑ nɑ biit.»
K niib nɑ din yien nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «U tumiiu nɑ pilnt niib cenɑ. U din piin k wɑnt Gɑɑliile niib k tɑn sɑɑn Suude doi ni kul ɑ nɑn wɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl nnɑ nɑ.»
Piilɑɑt nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ nɑ k u boi’b ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ ee?»
Wɑɑ bɑnn nɑn Yiesu nyii Gɑɑliile tinŋ nbɑ k kpɑnbɑl Heluod yen nɑ, k u ŋɑɑn k b sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Heluod buol, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ Heluod mun din be Selusɑɑlenm l yuo.
K Heluod ponŋ din tuu gbiɑ Yiesu po, k luon wun lɑ’u k l wei wɑɑ. Wɑɑ din tɑn lɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u ji mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn, k luon Yiesu n tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonn k wun lɑ.
U boi Yiesu buboit bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn k u k jiin’ɔ siɑl.
K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn *senniwɑntieb mun din sie lenŋ k piɑk nɑn pɑnŋ k wɑnt Yiesu biit.
K Heluod nɑn u sejenm ji din sɑlkt Yiesu k dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk, k gbɑbn’ɔ cincenŋɑnn k jiin’ɔ Piilɑɑt buol.
L dɑɑl mɑnŋ k Piilɑɑt nɑn Heluod suol lieb yuɑs, k mɑɑn b din tuu tie dɑtɑi e sinsinn tuuk.
K Piilɑɑt din yiin Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑn nilieb
k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «I bɑɑl nɑn nilɔ nɑ k yɑɑ ɑ u kpɑnn niib e. Gotl, n bu u buut i nunm nnɑ, k k lɑ u biit nbɑ tie lin nbɑ k i yɑɑ ɑ u tun mɑnŋ.
Heluod mun biɑ k lɑ u biit. L pɑɑk te k u jiint’ɔ k tien’t nɑ. Gotl, juɑ nɑ k tun bisiɑt nbɑ k l jɑnŋ nɑn kuun.
Ŋɑnn i e, n sɑɑ buo’u gbɑnn, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’u k wun sɑɑn.»
[K binn kul *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm yuo nɑ, Piilɑɑt din tuu nyinn dɑnsɑlyenɔ e k ŋɑɑ’u.]
K nibul nɑ din tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo k yien ɑ: «Kpin juɑ nɑ. Nyint Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs yɑnn k tul’t.»
(B din kuɑn Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs dɑnsɑlk ni k mɑɑn b din bɑɑl nɑn kpikpiluk duo ni, k u kpii nilɔ.)
Ŋɑnn e k Piilɑɑt nbɑ din luon wun ŋɑɑ Yiesu nɑ, k u biɑ ŋɑnm k pɑk nɑn nibul nɑ,
ŋɑɑn k niib nɑ mun biɑ tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo k jiint Piilɑɑt ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk. Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.»
K Piilɑɑt boi’b tɑɑl muntɑ ni: «Bee pɑɑk e? U biit mɑntk tie lɑnn po e? N k lɑ lin nbɑ k u tun i k l jɑnŋ nɑn kukpinu. Ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, n sɑɑ buo’u gbɑnn e, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’u k wun sɑɑn.»
Ŋɑɑn k niib nɑ biɑ lek tiɑn tintiɑni ɑ wun kpɑɑ Yiesu k tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, k b tintiɑni mɑnŋ tɑn nyɑnn Piilɑɑt yɑl.
K Piilɑɑt ji cɑb’b bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑ lin tien nnɑ,
k u nyinn juɑ nbɑ k b luon wun nyinn’ɔ nɑ, wun nbɑ k b din kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk k mɑɑn kpikpiluk din bɑɑl duo ni k u kpii nilɔ, k u cɑb’b Yiesu nɑn bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ lin tien mɑnŋ.
L yuo nɑ k sejenm jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ, k sɑɑ tuok jɑsuɑ k u sɑnn yi Siimɔn, wun nbɑ din tie Siilenn juɑ, k u nyii kpɑɑnt ni, k b suol’ɔ k jii Yiesu dɑpunpunn nɑ k bukn’ɔ k u wɑɑ Yiesu puol.
K nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ Yiesu k b tɔk sɑɑ. B ni mɑnŋ puosiɑb din wɑɑ k bui k fɑbn u pɑɑk.
K Yiesu din tɑn jiɑnt b pɑɑk k yet’b ɑ: «Selusɑɑlenm puob, i dɑɑ bui n pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii bui mɑn i mɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑn i wɑɑs pɑɑk.
K mɑɑn, yuo bɑɑt k niib tɑn sii yien ɑ: ‹Puokɑnmɑtɑ, bin nbɑ k mɑl wɑɑs k muɑn’m biil, ŋɑnm e mɔk pɑlpienn.›
L yuo mɑnŋ e k niib tɑn sii yien juɑt ɑ: ‹Bɑɑn t pɑɑk.› k yien kunkonɑ ɑ: ‹Piin’t.›
K mɑɑn muu i di dɑmɑɑtɑ, k dɑkuont jik ii?»
Ŋɑnn e k b ji din jii doyieltieb bɑnle k pukn Yiesu pɑɑk ɑ bin kpi’b.

Bɑɑ din bɑɑl siɑn nbɑ k b yi’l Yukpɑbuk nɑ, lenŋ e k b din kpɑɑ Yiesu k tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, k biɑ din kpɑɑ doyieltieb bɑnle nɑ dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk, k yenɔ din be Yiesu niidiitu po, k luɑ nɑ mun din be u niigɑnŋ po.
K Yiesu yet k yɑɑ ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, nyikn cɑb niib nɑ, k mɑɑn b k bɑnn bɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.» K b tɔ tiɑtiɑ k cent u tiɑt.
K niib nɑ sie k goli, ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ din dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk k yien ɑ: «U tuu fie nilieb. L i tie k u set tie Klistu, Yennu Nigɑnntuɑ nɑ i e, wun fie u mɔnŋ.»
K sejenm biɑ din dɑɑn’ɔ nyɑtuk, k tɑn bɑɑl nɑn dɑmiituk k tien’ɔ,
ŋɑɑn yɑɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ set tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i e, fɑn fiel ɑ mɔnŋ.»
B biɑ diɑn diɑni k tɑbn dɑpunpunn nɑ, u yul pɑɑk, k l yet ɑ: «Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ.»
L yuo nɑ k doyieltieb nbɑ tɑɑb nɑ yenɔ din suki Yiesu k yɑɑ ɑ: «A k tie Klistu kɑɑ ɑɑ? Fiel ɑ mɔnŋ ŋɑɑn mun fiel’t.»
K luɑ din tiɑ’u k yet ɑ: «A k tiin Yennu uu? K mɑɑn fin nɑn ŋuɑ nbɑ be tubdɑtyenn kuɑ ni nɑ.
Tinm ŋɑn nɑn l tubdɑtu, k mɑɑn b jiint’t pɑnkpelɑ nbɑ k t tuu tuun nɑ pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin k biil siɑl.»
ŋɑnn e k u yet Yiesu ɑ: «Yiesu, yuo nbɑ k ɑ dii ɑ nɑɑn, ɑ tɑn tiɑl n po.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ, dinnɑ min nɑn fin sii be *Yendɔunŋ ni.»
L yuo din tie yensuuk ni e, k tingbounŋ nɑ kul ji din bɔnn mɔkmɔk nɑn yenlekl, kut muntɑ yuo,
k mɑɑn yennu ji din lib. Cincenn nbɑ din tuu juɑn k puun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k l ji din tɑn suol sinsuuk ni k bɔkt tɑɑl munle.
K Yiesu tɑn yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ Yennu, n jikt n siek k tie’l ɑ nuu ni.» Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ k u ji nɑk.
K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k u pɑk Yennu k yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e, juɑ nɑ set tie niŋɑnɔ e.»
K nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ din lɑkn lenŋ ɑ bin lɑ lin nbɑ din tie nɑ, k b lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k b ji ŋmɑt kun nɑn pɑlbiil ŋɑɑn pɑkn yulɑ.
K u yuɑsnbɑ kul nɑn puob nbɑ nyii Gɑɑliile nɑn’ɔ din be lenŋ k sie bɑnfɔkl ɑ, ŋɑɑn goli lin nbɑ tie.

K jɑsuɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Suosiɑf k din nyii Suifnbɑ duo nbɑ k b yi’l Aliimɑɑte, k din tie niŋɑnɔ nbɑ tie bulcimɔ, k din guu Yennu nɑɑn bɑɑlu nɑ. U din tie Suifnbɑ yudɑɑn-yenɔ e, ŋɑɑn u din k sɑk nɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑɑnlieb nbɑ din lol b lol nbɑ k tun nɑ.
K juɑ mɑnŋ sɑɑn Piilɑɑt buol k sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ ɑ wun cɑb’ɔ Yiesu gbɑnɑnt.
Ŋɑnn e k u sɑɑn kpɑɑt gbɑnɑnt nɑ dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk, k jii’u k pɔbn’ɔ kɑtinŋ ni, k pii’u kɑɑɔk ni, lin nbɑ k b ponŋ din jiɑl tɑnpiiuk lokl ni nɑ, k b din dɑɑ k pii suɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni.
L din tie dɑɑl nbɑ k b tie siil fuon pɑɑk e, k *Fuondɑɑl nɑ din tɑn yɑɑ lin piin.
K Puob nbɑ din nyii Gɑɑliile k din wɑɑ Yiesu nɑ wei Suosiɑf, k b sɑɑ lɑ Yiesu kɑɑɔk buol nɑn bɑɑ pii’u biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k b ji din ŋmɑt kun ŋɑɑk ni, k sɑɑ tien siil k ŋɑnm kpɑnunubt nɑn tulɑɑli, ŋɑɑn Fuondɑɑl k b din foi nɑn Yennu *senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Lɑsl dɑɑl sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl, k puob mɑnŋ nyii sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol nɑn b kpɑnunubt nɑn tulɑɑli nbɑ k b ponŋ ŋɑnm nɑ.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ, k b lɑ k kɑtɑngbenŋl nɑ, k l nyɑkt kɑɑɔk nɑ mɔb pɑɑk, k bilnt k sɑɑ duɑ.
Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ kuɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni, b k lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu gbɑnɑnt,
k b ji biɑl sie jiiɑɑ, k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k jɑb bɑnle sie k liɑ liɑtfɔkt nbɑ nyili.
Lɑɑ tien puob nɑ jɑŋmɑɑnsuoluk, k b gbɑɑn tinŋ ni, k jɑb nɑ boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i luon fuotɔ kpienm ni?
U kɑɑ nnɑ. U fiil kuun ni wɑɑ. Tiɑt mɑn wɑɑ din yet’i biɑnŋ nbɑ, yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din be Gɑɑliile nɑ,
ɑ l tie k bin suol *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k jii’u tien biitdɑnm nuu ni k bin kpɑɑ’u tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k wun kpo, k u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl.»
Ŋɑnn e k puob nɑ ji tiɑl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.
K puob nɑ ji siet kɑɑɔk nɑ buol k ŋmɑt kun, k sɑɑ yet lin nbɑ kul tien, k tul u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ kul ɑ.
Puob mɑnŋ sɑnɑ e din tie Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, nɑn Sɑɑnn, nɑn Mɑɑli nbɑ din tie Sɑɑk nɑɑ nɑ, k puolieb mun din pukn b pɑɑk k be b ni k b din yet Yiesu tuomiinbɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
Ŋɑɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ din duki nɑn l tie mɑyɑnɑ e, k b k tien’m yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl ŋɑnin din fiil k ciɑl sɑɑn kɑɑɔk nɑ buol, k sɑɑ tibn k got k lɑ kuun cincenn nɑ k l duɑ l kuukuɑ, k u ji ŋmɑt kun ŋɑɑk ni nɑn yɑɑl-lituk nɑn lin nbɑ tien mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
L dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k Yiesu *puolpoweitieb bɑnle din sɑɑ digbɑnbik nbɑ k b yi Emɑus nɑ. Lenŋ nɑn Selusɑɑlenm din tie nɑn kiiluomiɑtɑ piik nɑn yen nɑ e.
K b din sonm piɑk nɑn lieb lin nbɑ nɑ kul nbɑ tien mɑnŋ po.
Bɑɑ piɑk k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn lieb yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Yiesu mɔnŋ nɑkn’m k lɑkn nɑn’m sɑɑ,
ŋɑɑn k Yiesu te k l liil’b k b k bɑnn’ɔ.
K u boi’b ɑ: «I sonm piɑk ɑ bee?» K b set nɑn ninbiik.
Ŋɑnn e k b yenɔ, wun nbɑ sɑnn yi Kleopɑɑs nɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «A kuukuɑ e tie sɑɑmɔ nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ k tɑn k gbɑt lin nbɑ tien dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ ɑɑ?»
K u boi’b ɑ: «Lɑnn po e tien i?» K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «K jikt sɑɑ Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu po. Juɑ nɑ dɑɑn tie *Yennu sɔkni e, u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑn u mɑɑn dɑɑn mɔk pɑnŋ, Yennu nɑn niib tuɑnn.
K t yudɑnm nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm jii’u k tien’ɔ bɑlbuulɔ nuu ni, k yet ɑ u ŋɑn nɑn kuun e, k b tɑn kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn k t tuu dɑɑn nɑn ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ nyinn tinm Islɑɑeltieb t dɑtɑi nuu ni, k lin nbɑ pukn, dinnɑ tie dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ e nɑ lɑɑ tien.
Ŋɑnn mɑnŋ e biɑk, k t ni puosiɑb pɑk’t u po k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’t, k mɑɑn bɑɑ sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl nɑ,
b sɑɑ k lɑ u gbɑnɑnt. Bɑɑ jen yuo nbɑ k b yet’t ɑ ŋɑnm bo lɑ Yennu *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ, k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ mɑnŋ yet’b ɑ Yiesu jen u mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k t yenm tɑn sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol k sɑɑ lɑ nɑn puob nbɑ dɔnŋ yet’t nɑ, ŋɑɑn b k lɑ Yiesu.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yɑnkpienɑ nɑ, bee k i tɑɑntl nɑn yin tien Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ?
L k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn *Klistu n di fɑlɑ mɑnŋ, k tɑn lɑ u *yudɑnt ii?»
Ŋɑnn e k u wɑnt’b u mɑɑn nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk kul ni nɑ pɑɑk, k piin Muois diɑni ni nɑn sɔkniinbɑ diɑni kul ɑ ni.
Tɔn, k b tɑn pel digbɑnbik nbɑ k b bɑɑt nɑ, k Yiesu tɑn tien nɑn u gɑɑl e nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn b guɑl’ɔ k yien ɑ: «Biɑt nɑn’t nnɑ, k mɑɑn yennu bɑɑ wɑɑ k l ji bɔnt e.» L pɑɑk, k u ji kuɑ k biɑl b buol ni.
K u tɑn kɑl ɑ wun di nɑn’m, k jii pɑɑnu nɑ k tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmit ŋmit k tul’b.
L yuo nɑ k b nunm po ji yent k b ji bɑnn’ɔ. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u biɑ lil bot b ni.
K b ji yien lieb ɑ: «Wɑɑ piɑk nɑn’t sɔnu pɑɑk k wɑnt’t lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk, l bo k tie nɑn muu nɑ kɑɑ k di t pɑlɑ ni ii?»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k b fiil ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm, k sɑɑ lɑ u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ nɑn siɑb k b lɑkn lieb.
Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitelieb nɑ yet’b ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ set fiil e nɑn bɑlmɔni. U dɔkt Siimɔn pɑɑk.»
K niib bɑnle nɑ mun yet’b lin nbɑ tien sɔnu pɑɑk, nɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ k b bɑnn Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u tɑn ŋmit ŋmit pɑɑnu nɑ.
Puolpoweitieb bɑnle nbɑ nyii Emɑus nɑ nbɑ yien’m lin nbɑ nɑ nɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesu set b sinsuuk ni k yet’b ɑ: «Mɑnu ii be i pɑɑk.»
K gbɑnɑnjijekt nɑn jɑŋmɑɑni kuɑ’b hei, k mɑɑn b duki mi ɑ b lɑ siɑl ɑ funfɔntuk o.
Ŋɑnn e k u boi’b ɑ: «Bee k i yɑn pɑɑk put i? Bee k bilsuk be i ni?
Gotl n nii nɑn n tɑɑ mɑn, k bɑnn nɑn l set tie min e. Sii’n k bɑnn nɑn min e. Funfɔntuk k mɔk gbɑnɑnt nɑn kpɑbɑ nɑn yɑɑ lɑ mɑɑ mɔk’l biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ k u wɑnn’b u nii nɑn u tɑɑ.
Bɑɑ dɑɑ k fit tien yɑdɑ nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ b pɑlpienn nɑn b yɑɑl-lituk pɑɑk nɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: «I mɔk jesiɑt nnɑ ɑɑ?»
K b jii jɑnpulkjinn k tul’ɔ,
k u gɑɑl k ŋmɑn b nunm ni.

Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Gotl mɑɑ dɑɑn wɑnn’i lin nbɑ mɑɑ dɑɑ dɑɑn be nɑn’i. Lin nbɑ kul k b diɑn Muois *senni ni nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ diɑni ni nɑn Yennu *yɑni ni k jiin n po nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn l kul n tɑn mɑntk tun k gbenn.»
Ŋɑnn e k u ji yent b nunm ɑ bin bɑnn lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk,
k yet’b ɑ: «L diɑn ɑ Klistu sɑɑ di fɑlɑ k kpo k tɑn fiil kuun ni dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl,
k b sɑɑ piin Selusɑɑlenm ni k sɑɑn tuu nibuolu kul k muɑnt, u sɑnn ni, niib nbɑ sɑɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ nɑn biit nyikcɑbu lɑbɑɑl.»
K u biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Yinm e tie lin nbɑ nɑ siɑlɑɑdɑnm.
Nnɑlɑ, min e yɑɑ n tɑn tul’i lin nbɑ k n Bɑɑ senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’i nɑ. Ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ biɑl kii be mɑn Selusɑɑlenm mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k yiikuo tɑn sɑɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k sik i pɑɑk.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu nyii nɑn’m duo mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑn nɑn’m Betɑɑni. Lenŋ e k u sɑɑ donn u nii sɑnpɑɑpo ŋɑɑn yɑt yetŋɑnm b pɑɑk.
Wɑɑ yɑt yetŋɑnm nɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u yɑɑt k nyik’b ŋɑɑn duo *Yendɔunŋ ni.
K b ji jiɑnt’ɔ k tɑn ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm nɑn pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
K b ji din jii b yuo k be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yuo kul ɑ, k piɑk dont Yennu sɑnn.
Sintɑnsinm dinn, yuo nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ, *Mɑɑn ponŋ din be. U din be nɑn Yennu e, k biɑ tie Yennu.
Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e din be nɑn Yennu sinsinn.
Yennu din jii Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e nɑn bont kul, k siɑl din kɑɑ k Yennu nɑn k l k nyii u ni,
k u ni e biɑk k mɑnfuol be, k l mɑnfuol mɑnŋ e tie niib yentu,
k yentl tingbounŋ nɑ bunbɔnn, k bunbɔnn nɑ k fit bɔnt yentu mɑnŋ.
Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Sɑn k Yennu din tun’ɔ.
U din bɑɑl ɑ wun yet niib yentu mɑnŋ po, ɑ niib kul n tien yɑdɑ u mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk.
Sɑn tiɑɔnŋ kɑɑ din tie yentu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn u din bɑɑl ɑ wun tien yentu mɑnŋ siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ e.
Bɑlmɔni yentu mɑnŋ nbɑ yentl niib kul nɑ din bɑɑl tingbounŋ ni.
Mɑɑn din be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k Yennu ponŋ din jii Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e k nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ kul, ŋɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb lek tɑn k bɑnn Mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
U din bɑɑl u tiɑɔnŋ duo ni, ŋɑɑn u niib din k gɑɑl’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ kul gɑɑl’ɔ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, ŋɑnm e k u din tul’b yiikuo ɑ bii tie Yennu wɑɑs.
Bɑɑ din tien Yennu wɑɑs nɑ, l k tie nɑn bɑɑ tuu mɑɑl wɑɑs biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ, k biɑ k tie nilɔ nbɑ luon lin nbɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu e tul’b mɑnfopɑɑnn.
Mɑɑn mɑnŋ din tɑn kpɑnt nisɑɑlk, k tinm nɑn ŋuɑ din lɑkn kuɑ, k u gbie nɑn ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn bɑlmɔni. T din lɑ u *yudɑnt, k l yudɑnt tie lin nbɑ k Bijɑyenml lɑɑt u Bɑɑ buol ni.
Sɑn din piɑk u po k nyinn u *siɑlɑ k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k n dɑɑn yet ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ wɑɑ n puol nɑ cie’n k mɑɑn u ponŋ din be e wɑɑ k b tɑn mɑl’n.› »
Wɑɑ gbie nɑn ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ, k u tul’t yetŋɑnm k pukn yetŋɑnm pɑɑk.
Muois din tul’t Yennu *senni e, ŋɑɑn Yiesu *Klistu e din bɑɑl nɑn ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ k biɑ din bɑɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni.
Suɑ kɑɑ k mi lɑ Yennu. U mɔnŋ Bijɑyenml nbɑ set tie Yennu k biɑ kpiɑ’u nɑ, ŋuɑ e fiit’ɔ k wɑnn’t.
Tɔn, nɑ e tie Sɑn *siɑlɑ nbɑ k u nyinn yuo nbɑ k *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ din tun Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn *Liefiitnbɑ Sɑn mɑnŋ buol, ɑ bin boi’ɔ k lɑɑn u tie ŋmee?
K Sɑn mun din k yet jiinu, ŋɑɑn jiin k yet yent k yɑɑ ɑ: «Min kɑɑ tie Klistu nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «K ɑ tie ŋmee? A tie Elii ee?» K u jiin k yɑɑ ɑ: «N k tie Elii kɑɑ.» K b biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «K ɑ tie sɔkni nbɑ nɑ ee?» K u jiin ɑ: «N k tie ŋuɑ kɑɑ biɑk.»
Ŋɑnn e k b boi’ɔ: «K ɑ tie ŋmee? Wɑnt’t fɑɑ tie wun nbɑ k t ŋmɑt sɑɑ yet bin nbɑ tun’t nɑ. A sɑɑ yet nlee k jikt sɑɑ ɑ mɔnŋ po?»
K Sɑn jii sɔkni Esɑɑyi mɔbonɑ k jiin k yɑɑ ɑ: «Min e tie wun nbɑ be muuk ni nɑ, k huot yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑnmt mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu sɔnu k lii tuok.› »
Niib nbɑ k b tun’m Sɑn buol nɑ din tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ e.
K b biɑ boi Sɑn k yɑɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ k tie Klistu, k biɑ k tie Elii, k biɑ mun k tie sɔkni nbɑ nɑ, k l tien nlee k ɑ wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu?»
K Sɑn yɑɑ ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin wuul niib Yennu wulu nyun ni e, ŋɑɑn suɑ be i sinsuuk nnɑ k i k mi’u.
Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun wei n pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k n k ŋɑn nɑn k n lot u tɑɑsɑɑŋmi.»
Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tien duo nbɑ sɑnn yi Betɑɑni e, k l din be *Suulden kpenu puotl. Lenŋ e k Sɑn din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu.
Lɑɑ yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k Sɑn mɑnŋ lɑ Yiesu k u bɑɑt, k u yet niib nɑ ɑ: «Gotl mɑn. *Yennu Pebik nbɑ nyint tingbounŋ nɑ biit e nɑ.
Ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k n won yet’i ɑ: ‹Jɑsuɑ tɑn sɑɑ wei n pɑɑk, k cie’n nɑ, k mɑɑn u ponŋ din be e wɑɑ k b tɑn mɑl’n.›
N tuu k mi nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ, ŋɑɑn n dɑɑn bɑɑl k wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu, ɑ Islɑɑeltieb n bɑnn’ɔ.»
K Sɑn biɑ yet niib nɑ ɑ: «N dɑɑ lɑ Foŋɑnm, k u nyii *Yendɔunŋ ni k siik, k nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnn nɑ, k tɑn tuɑn u pɑɑk k biɑl nɑn’ɔ.

N dɑɑn dɑɑ k mi nɑn ŋuɑ e nɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tun’n ɑ n wul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ dɑɑn yet’n ɑ: ‹Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k ɑ tɑn lɑ k Foŋɑnm siik k tɑn tuɑn u pɑɑk k biɑl nɑn’ɔ, fɑn bɑnn nɑn ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ jii Foŋɑnm k wul niib Yennu nyunwulu.›
N set lɑ nnɑ, k biɑ yien’i nɑn ŋuɑ e tie Yennu Bijɑ.»
Lɑɑ yent, k Sɑn sie lenŋ biɑk nɑn u *puolpoweitieb nɑ ni bɑnle,
k tɑn lɑ k Yiesu gɑɑl sɑɑ, k u yet ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, *Yennu Pebik e nɑ.»
K Sɑn puolpoweitieb bɑnle nɑ nbɑ gbɑt k Sɑn yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b nyik’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ Yiesu.
K Yiesu sɑɑ jiɑnt got k lɑ k b wɑɑ’u, k u boi’b ɑ: «I luon bee?» K b jiin ɑ: «Lɑɑbi, (l pɑɑk tie wɑntuɑ) t luon k t bɑnn fɑɑ kuɑ siɑn e.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ lɑ mɑɑ kuɑ siɑn nbɑ.» L din tie nɑn kut munnɑ yuo nɑ e dɑɑjuouk, k b wei’ɔ k sɑɑn k sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ, k b ji din biɑl k be nɑn’ɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ ni.
B bɑnle mɑnŋ nbɑ din dɔnŋ gbɑt Sɑn nbɑ yet lin nbɑ k wɑɑ Yiesu nɑ, b yenɔ din tie Andle, wun nbɑ din tie Siimɔn Piɑl ninjɑ nɑ.
Wɑɑ din nyii Yiesu buol ni nɑ puolpo e, k u sɑɑn yiɑn ɑ k sɑɑ lon u yuɑlɔ Siimɔn buol, k tɑn yet’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: «T lɑ Meesi nɑ wɑɑ,» (k l pɑɑk tie Klistu,)
ŋɑɑn bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ Yiesu buol. K Yiesu got’ɔ silll, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie Siimɔn wun nbɑ tie Sɑn bijɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑnn biɑ sii yi Sefɑɑs.» (k l pɑɑk tie Piɑl Glek mɑɑn ni.)
L sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk o, k Yiesu luon wun sɑɑn Gɑɑliile k cet Fiiliip k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ’n.»
Fiiliip din nyii Betsɑidɑ e. Lenŋ e tie duo nbɑ k Andle nɑn Piɑl mun din nyii nɑ.
K Fiiliip mun cet Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl k yet’ɔ ɑ: «T lɑ wun nbɑ k Muois din diɑn u po Yennu senni kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k sɔkniinbɑ biɑ din diɑn u po. Ŋuɑ e tie Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Suosiɑf bik, k nyii Nɑɑsɑɑlet.»
K Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nɑɑsɑɑlet ii? Bonŋɑnn sɑɑ fit nyi Nɑɑsɑɑlet ɑɑ?» K Fiiliip yet’ɔ: «A mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun n bɑɑl k tɑn lɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ lɑ Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl k u bɑɑt u penŋ nɑ, k u pɑk u po k yet ɑ: «Mɔmɔnm Islɑɑel nilɔ e nɑ k fɑɑk kɑɑ u ni.»
K Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl boi’ɔ: «A tien nlee k mi’n i?» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiiliip nbɑ dɑɑ bo k bɑɑl k yiin’ɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn suɑ k n ponŋ lɑ’ɑ wɑɑ, k ɑ kɑl *fiigie nyɑkl.»
K Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, ɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ e, k biɑ tie Islɑɑeltieb Kpɑnbɑl.»
K Yiesu boi’ɔ: «Mɑɑ yet’ɑ ɑ n lɑ’ɑ k ɑ kɑl fiigie nyɑkl ni e, k ɑ tien’n yɑdɑ ɑɑ? ŋɑɑn ɑ sii lɑɑt bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ k lin gɑl lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ *Yendɔunŋ ni luot, k Yennu *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ siik *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k ŋmɑt do sɑnpɑɑpo.»
L dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl, k puokuɑnu jɑɑnm be Kɑɑnɑ duo ni, Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni. K Yiesu nɑɑ din be lenŋ,
k b biɑ yiin Yiesu nɑn u *puolpoweitieb, k b mun din be.
Tɔn, dɑmunŋ nbɑ k b tuu nyu nɑ, k l tɑn gbenn, k Yiesu nɑɑ bɑɑl yet Yiesu ɑ: «Dɑmunŋ nɑ gbenn ɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑ, bee te k ɑ wɑnt’n mɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ. N yuo e dɑɑ k bɑɑl.»
Ŋɑnn e k u nɑɑ mɑnŋ yet tuontunnɑ nɑ ɑ: «Lin nbɑ k u yet’i ɑ i tun, yin tun nnɑ.»
Tɔn, k bui ŋɑnluob nnɑ din sie lenŋ, lin nbɑ k *Suifnbɑ tie nyun lenŋ k nit nɑn b jɑɑnti kɑɑl nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ, k l bui din fit kuɑ nɑn liitɑ kobik kobik nɑ.
K Yiesu yet tuontunnɑ nɑ ɑ: «Gbient bui nɑ nɑn nyun.» K b gbien nɑn mɔgbɑnɑ wɑɑ.
K u ji yet’b: «Fint mɑn nyun mɑnŋ, k sɑɑn tul jɑɑnm nɑ sɑɑkuɑ.» K b finn k sɑɑn tul’ɔ,
k u gɑɑl lenm nyun nbɑ kpɑnt dɑmunŋ nɑ, k k mi dɑmunŋ nɑ nbɑ nyii siɑn, ŋɑɑn tuontunnɑ nbɑ dul nyun bui nɑ ni ŋɑnin mi. Ŋɑnn e k sɑɑkuɑ nɑ yiin puo nɑ sɔlɔ
k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Suɑ kul tuu tol dɑmɑnm sinsinn e wɑɑ. L i tie k b tɑn nyuu k yib ɑ, wun ji tol lin nbɑ k mɑn fɑnu nɑ, ŋɑɑn k yinm ŋɑnin ŋmin ɑ, k ji tɑn juont tuol dɑmunŋ nbɑ mɑn k gɑl siɑl kul nɑ.»
Tɔn, Yiesu nbɑ din tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn mɑnŋ Kɑɑnɑ nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, ŋɑnn e din tie u sinsinn nyinn, k l wɑnn niib wɑɑ mɔk *yudɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u puolpoweitieb nɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ l pɑɑk.
L puolpo k Yiesu nɑn u nɑɑ nɑn u ninjɑnm nɑn u puolpoweitieb sik Kɑpelnɑunm, k sɑɑ be lenŋ nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Islɑɑeltieb *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm tɑn pel, k Yiesu sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm.
Wɑɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ, k u kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k sɑɑ lɑ niib k b kɔi nei nɑn pei nɑn ŋmɑnɑ k lieb biɑ kɑl kpentl likli.
K u jii ŋmiit k piɑn gbɑnn, k bel niib nɑn b bonkobt nɑ kul ɑ, k nyinn’b Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni, ŋɑɑn tut tut lik-kpentɑ nɑ tiebulɑ k lu, k likli nɑ yɑt bɑɑ bɑɑ,
ŋɑɑn biɑ yet bin nbɑ kɔi ŋmɑnɑ nɑ, ɑ bin nyinn ŋmɑnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn biɑ yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ tie n Bɑɑ ŋɑɑk kpinkpent buol.»
L yuo nɑ k u puolpoweitieb ji tiɑl Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «N Yennu, n lonm nbɑ k n mɔk k jiin ɑ ŋɑɑk po di n pɑl ni nɑn muu nɑ e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm boi Yiesu ɑ: «A sɑɑ tun *nyinn lɑnn po e k wɑnn’t ɑ ɑ mɔk yiikuo k tun fɑɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ?»
K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Tɔn, i yiel Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ sinsuuk ni n sɑɑ mɑɑ’l kɑɑl.»
K b yet ɑ: «Wɑɑ. T jii binɑ piinnɑ nɑn ŋɑnluob o k mɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn k fin tɑn yɑɑ ɑ sɑɑ jii dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ kuukuɑ e k mɑɑ ɑɑ?»
Ŋɑɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ k Yiesu din pɑk l po nɑ, din tie u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt e.
Yennu nbɑ din fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ puolpo e, k u puolpoweitieb tiɑl lin nbɑ k u yet nɑ. K b tien yɑdɑ nɑn lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑn lin nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk nɑ.
Yiesu nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm mɑnŋ yuo nɑ, k niib bonciɑnn din lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u tun nɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ,
ŋɑɑn Yiesu din k jii u mɔnŋ k cɑb’b, k mɑɑn u din mi suɑ kul nbɑ tie wun nbɑ.
U din k luon suɑ n wɑnn’ɔ nifosɑɑlk po, k mɑɑn u din mi lin nbɑ be niib pɑlɑ ni nɑ.
Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Niikodenm. U din tie *Suifnbɑ yudɑɑnɔ e, k biɑ din tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ ni yenɔ,
k nyɑsiɑɔk k u tɑn bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t mi nɑn Yennu tun’ɑ ɑ ɑ tɑn tumi’t e, k mɑɑn suɑ kɑn fit tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun nɑ buolu, l i tie k Yennu k be nɑn’ɔ i kɑɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, suɑ kɑn fit k kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni, l i kii tie k b ŋɑnm mɑl’ɔ i kɑɑ.»
K Niikodenm boi’ɔ ɑ: «Nlee k b sɑɑ fit k ŋɑnm mɑl nilɔ nbɑ tie nikpel i? K mɑɑn u ji kɑn fit k ŋmɑt kuɑ u nɑɑ puol ni, k wun ŋɑnm mɑl’ɔ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ, suɑ kɑn fit kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni, sie k b mɑl’ɔ nyun nɑn Foŋɑnm ni.
Nisɑɑlk mɑɑl nisɑɑlk, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm nɑ ŋɑnin mɑɑl Foŋɑnm yuɑ e.
L pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ te k l tie’ɑ bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn mɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Sie k b ŋɑnm mɑl i kul nɑ.›
Wounŋ dɑ wɑɑ luon siɑn e. A gbiɑ k u dɑ e, ŋɑɑn ɑ k mi wɑɑ nyi siɑn, k biɑ k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn. L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k tul suɑ kul nbɑ k Foŋɑnm mɑl’ɔ nɑ.»
K Niikodenm boi’ɔ ɑ: «Nlee k l sɑɑ fit tien nnɑ?»
K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «A tie Islɑɑeltieb wɑntieb yudɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn tɑn k gbɑt lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk ii?
Bɑlmɔni e k n yɑɑ n yet’ɑ, t piɑk lin nbɑ k t mi l po nɑ, k t muɑnt lin nbɑ k t lɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k i k gɑɑn t mɑɑn.
L i tie k i k tien’n yɑdɑ, nɑn mɑɑ yet’i tingbounŋ nɑ bonɑ po nɑ, nlee k i ji sɑɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, l i tie k n yet’i *Yendɔunŋ ni bonɑ po?
Suɑ kɑɑ k duo Yendɔunŋ ni sie *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.»
Muois nbɑ din be muuk ni k fin kut wɑɑɔk k donn’ɔ dɑɑɔk pɑɑk nɑ, l mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k b tɑn sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ, k donn’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo,
k bin nbɑ kul tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
K mɑɑn Yennu mɑntk din luon tingbounŋ nɑ niib bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk, k u tul’b u Bijɑyenml, k wun nbɑ tien u Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ u tɑn kɑn kpo, ŋɑɑn u sii mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu,
k mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din tun u Bijɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, u din k tun’ɔ ɑ wun tɑn bu tingbounŋ nɑ niib buut k biil’b kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din yɑɑ wun fiel’b u Bijɑ mɑnŋ ni e.
K dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ, Yennu kɑn bu u buut k biil’ɔ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k tie’u yɑdɑ, Yennu ponŋ bu u yɑɑ buut k biil’ɔ wɑɑ, k mɑɑn u k tien ŋuɑ Yennu Bijɑyenml mɑnŋ yɑdɑ.
Lin nbɑ pɑɑk te k Yennu bu b buut k biil’b mɑnŋ tie nnɑ e: yentu din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni ŋɑɑn k niib luon bunbɔnn k gɑl yentu mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn bɑɑ tuun biit nɑ pɑɑk.
Dɑɑnɔ kul nbɑ tuun bonbiil, u nɑn yentu mɑnŋ e, k k luon wuu nɑki’ɔ, k mɑɑn u k luon u biit nɑ n tɑn nyi pɑɑnu.
Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ wɑɑ Yennu bɑlmɔni k biɑ tuun l biɑnŋ, ŋuɑ e bɑɑt yentu mɑnŋ buol, ɑ suɑ kul n bɑnn nɑn u tuonɑ kul, Yennu be l ni.
L puolpo e k Yiesu nɑn u *puolpoweitieb din nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Suude siɑl po, k sɑɑ be lenŋ nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nnɑ, k u din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu.
L yuo nɑ k suɑ k Sɑn din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu Ainɔn duo ni k l k fɔk nɑn Sɑɑliim k mɑɑn nyun din yɑb lenŋ. Niib din bɑɑt u buol ni k u wuul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
(L yuo nɑ k suɑ b dɑɑ din k kuɑn Sɑn dɑnsɑlk ni.)
Ŋɑnn e k mɔniɑɔk tɑn fiil Sɑn mɑnŋ puolpoweitieb nɑn Suifsuɑ nnɑ sinsuuk ni k jikt sɑɑ Suifnbɑ nbɑ tuu nit b nii nɑn b jɑɑnti nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ po.
K b sɑɑn Sɑn buol ni k sɑɑ yet’ɔ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, wun nbɑ dɑɑn be nɑn’ɑ *Suulden kpenpuotl, k ɑ dɑɑ wɑnn’t u po nɑ, tɔn, u ji wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu k suɑ kul sɑɑ u buol ni.»
K Sɑn yet’b ɑ: «Nilɔ kɑn fit lɑ siɑl, l i kii tie k Yennu cɑb’ɔ.
I mɔnŋ gbɑt k n yet mɑɑ min kɑɑ tie *Klistu, ŋɑɑn Yennu tun’n u tuɑnn.
Puosɔlɔ e tie wun nbɑ yen puoyuokl nɑ. Wun nbɑ tie puosɔlɔ nɑ yuɑk tuu be u buol k gbiin u mɑɑn k mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn wun gbɑt puosɔlɔ nɑ kunkɔl. Pɑlpienn mɑnŋ tie n yɑl k yɑb bonciɑnn k siɑl ji k tenn.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn ŋuɑ Klistu ii yɑbtl, ŋɑɑn k min ii wɑɑbt.»
Wun nbɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋuɑ e cie suɑ kul ɑ; wun nbɑ nyii tingbounŋ nɑ ni tie tingbounŋ nɑ nilɔ, k biɑ piɑk tingbounŋ bonɑ nɑ po. Wun nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni, ŋuɑ e cie suɑ kul.
U yien niib lin nbɑ k u lɑ k biɑ gbɑt, ŋɑɑn suɑ k gɑɑl u mɑɑn.
Wun nbɑ gɑɑl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ, l wɑnt nɑn ŋuɑ e sɑɑk nɑn Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni.
Wun nbɑ k Yennu tun’ɔ nɑ, u piɑk Yennu mɑɑn e, k mɑɑn Yennu tul’ɔ Foŋɑnm nbɑ yɑb k kɑɑ biknu.
Bɑɑ luon u Bijɑ, k kubn bonɑ kul u nuu ni.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, ŋɑɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yet Bijɑ mɑnŋ, Yennu wutuol be u pɑɑk k u kɑn lɑ mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
Tɔn, k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ din gbɑt ɑ Yiesu dɑɑk niib k wuul’b Yennu nyunwulu k b tie u *puolpoweitieb, k b yɑb gɑl Sɑn yɑb ɑ.
Bɑlmɔni ŋɑnin e Yiesu din k wuul niib u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn u puolpoweitieb e din wuul’b.
Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ, k u nyii Suude tinŋ ni k ŋmɑt sɑɑ Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.
K u sɔnu mɑnŋ ni, k l tie tɑlɑs e nɑn wun gɑl *Sɑɑmɑɑli tinŋ ni.
K yensuuk ni, wɑɑ din tɑn pel Sɑɑmɑɑliitieb digbɑnsiɑl ni, k b yi’l Siisɑɑl, k u bɑɑl nɑkn Sɑɑkɔb bunbunn buol. Lenŋ din k fɔk nɑn kpɑɑb nbɑ k Sɑɑkɔb din tul u bik Suosiɑf nɑ.
Wɑɑ din tɑn pel bunbunn nɑ, k bɑknt ji din suol’ɔ k u bɑk k mɑɑn sonml nɑ pɑɑk, k u biɑl kɑl bunbunn nɑ nyɑkl.
Ŋɑnn e k Sɑɑmɑɑli puosuɑ tɑn bɑɑl bunbunn mɑnŋ buol, ɑ wun luun nyun. K Yiesu miɑl’ɔ ɑ: «Tul’n nyun k n nyu.»
(L yuo nɑ ɑmi k suɑ k u puolpoweitieb ponŋ sɑɑn duo ni wɑɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑ dɑɑ jiet.)
K puo nɑ ji boi’ɔ ɑ: «A tie *Suif nilɔ e, k n mun tie Sɑɑmɑɑli puo e, k l tien nlee wɑɑ k ɑ tɑn mei’n nyun i?» (Suifnbɑ nɑ din tuu sinŋ Sɑɑmɑɑli niib e, k k luon bii tɑɑnt nɑn’m.)
K Yiesu din jiin’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ bo mi piini nbɑ k Yennu luon wun pi’ɑ nɑ, k biɑ mi mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ k mei’ɑ nyun nɑ, fin e bo sɑɑ boi’n nyun po k n sɑɑ tul’ɑ nyun nbɑ tien mɑnfuol.»
K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, bunbunn nɑ sumi hei, k ɑ mun biɑ k mɔk guokɑ. Lee k ɑ sɑɑ luun mɑnfuol nyun mɑnŋ i?
T yejɑ Sɑɑkɔb din lukl bunbunn nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u wɑɑs nɑn u bonkobt kul ɑ din nyu lenŋ e. A duki nɑn ɑ gɑl Sɑɑkɔb ɑmi?»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ nyuu bunbunn nɑ nyun, nyun-nyuklu tɑn sɑɑ ŋɑnm suol’ɔ wɑɑ,
ŋɑɑn mi i tul wun nbɑ n nyun nɑ k u nyuu, nyun-nyuklu kɑn mi k suol’ɔ jik, k mɑɑn mi i tul suɑ n nyun nɑ, l sii buni mɑnfuol nyun e u ni, k biɑ sɑɑ tul’ɔ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, tul’n l nyun, k nyun-nyuklu ji dɑɑ mi k so’n, k n biɑ ji dɑɑ mi k bɑɑt nnɑ k tɑn lu nyun.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «I sɑɑ k sɑɑ yiin ɑ sɔlɔ k jen nɑn’ɔ nɑ.»
K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «N k mɔk sɔlɔ.» K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Fɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ ɑ k mɔk sɔlɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn ɑ mɔk mɔni,
k mɑɑn ɑ ponŋ kun jɑb bɑnŋmu ɑ, k juɑ nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑ be nɑn’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, u k tie ɑ sɔlɔ nɑn mɔni kɑɑ. A set pɑk mɔni e.»
K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, n ji bɑnn nɑn ɑ tie *Yennu sɔkni e.
T yejɑnm din jiɑntl Yennu juɑl nɑ pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn k yinm Suifnbɑ ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ Selusɑɑlenm e tie *siɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn Yenjiɑntu.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnnɑɑ, tient’n yɑdɑ, yuo bɑɑt k niib tɑn kii jiɑntl Bɑɑ Yennu juɑl nɑ pɑɑk, k biɑ tɑn kii jiɑntl’ɔ Selusɑɑlenm mun biɑk.
Yinm Sɑɑmɑɑliitieb k mi yɑɑ jiɑntl wun nbɑ, ŋɑɑn tinm Suifnbɑ ŋɑnin mi tɑɑ jiɑntl wun nbɑ, k mɑɑn niib fielu nyii Suifnbɑ ni e.
Ŋɑɑn yuo bɑɑt, k l ponŋ set bɑɑl nɑ, k bin nbɑ jiɑntl Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ sii jiɑntl’ɔ b pɑlɑ ni nɑn mɔni, k mɑɑn l nibuolu e k Yennu luon bii jiɑntl’ɔ nnɑ.
Yennu tie siek e, k bin nbɑ jiɑntl’ɔ nɑ, l tie tɑlɑs e bii jiɑntl’ɔ b sei ni nɑn mɔni.»
K puo nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N mi nɑn Meesi (wun nbɑ k b yi’u *Klistu nɑ) tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ. U i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ wɑnn’t mɑɑn kul ɑ.»
K Yiesu jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Min e nɑ, min nbɑ piɑk nɑn’ɑ nɑ.»
L yuo mɑnŋ e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb jen, k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn Yiesu nbɑ tɑn piɑk nɑn puo, ŋɑɑn b suɑ k boi ɑ: «A luon bee?» kuo: «Bee k ɑ tɑn piɑk nɑn puo o?».
Ŋɑnn e k puo nɑ nyik u nyunsuɑl nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑn duo nɑ ni, k sɑɑ yiin niib ɑ:
«I bɑɑl mɑn, k tɑn got juɑ nbɑ yet’n bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k n ponŋ mi tun. Pɑsiɑl u k tie Klistu kɑɑ ɑɑ?»
Ŋɑnn e, k b nyii duo nɑ ni k sɑɑn Yiesu penŋ.
Yuo nbɑ k puo nɑ dɑɑ din piɑk nɑn niib duo nɑ ni nɑ, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑln’mɔ, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, dimin jiet.»
K Yiesu jiin’m yɑɑ ɑ: «Min mɔk jiet nbɑ k n sɑɑ di, ŋɑɑn k i k mi l po.»
K u puolpoweitieb ji boi b lieb ɑ: «I mi suɑ tɑn sii tul’ɔ jiet i?»
K Yiesu jiin’m: «Min yɑɑ jiet tie mɑn cɔln wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ lonm e, k biɑ tun tuonn nbɑ k u tul’n nɑ gbenn.»
«B tuu k yet ɑ: ‹L tenn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnnɑ e nɑn bin jɑɑn dii ii?› Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin yien’i e, gotl mɑn. Dii biel ɑ; k l jɑnŋ nɑn bin jɑɑn ɑ.
Dijɑɑntieb lɑɑt b pɑɑɔk o, k tiki dibin nbɑ sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu k ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k wun nbɑ buul nɑn wun nbɑ jɑɑn dii mɑnŋ sii mɔk pɑlpienn.
T mɔk bɑljouk, k l yiin ɑ: ‹Yenɔ e buul, k luɑ mun jɑɑn,› k l set tie mɔni.
Min tun’i ɑ yin jɑɑn dii siɑn nbɑ k i k kuo. Siɑb e ponŋ kuo wɑɑ, k i mun lɑɑt nyuɑt b tuonn pɑɑk.»
Sɑɑmɑɑli duo mɑnŋ ni niib bonciɑnn gbɑt puo nɑ nbɑ yien’m yɑɑ ɑ: «U yet’n bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k n ponŋ mi k tun,» k b tien Yiesu yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑnn e, bɑɑ bɑɑl bunbunn nɑ buol ni Yiesu penŋ, k b bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun biɑl kii be nɑn’m. K Yiesu sɑk k biɑl be nɑn’m dɑɑ ŋɑnle,
k u mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk k b bonciɑnn din tien’ɔ yɑdɑ k pukn.

L yuo nɑ k b yet puo nɑ: «Tɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, l k tie fɑɑ yien’t u po nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑɑ gbɑt u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk e k t tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k bɑnn nɑn ŋuɑ e set tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb Fietuɑ.»
L dɑɑ ŋɑnle puolpo e, k Yiesu nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.
(U mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ponŋ yet ɑ: «Yennu sɔkni kɑn lɑ nibɑɑkl u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ duo ni.»)
Ŋɑɑn wɑɑ din bɑɑl Gɑɑliile yuo nbɑ, niib nɑ din gɑɑl’ɔ, k mɑɑn b mun dɑɑn sɑɑn *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm Selusɑɑlenm, k lɑ lin nbɑ kul k u ponŋ tun Selusɑɑlenm ni jɑɑnm mɑnŋ yuo nɑ.
Wɑɑ din lin Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k u din sɑɑn Kɑɑnɑ, siɑn nbɑ k u din te k nyun kpɑnt dɑmunŋ nɑ. K yudɑɑnsuɑ din be Kɑpelnɑunm, k u bijɑ din yiɑl.
K wɑɑ din gbɑt ɑ Yiesu nyii Suude k bɑɑl Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k u bɑɑl u penŋ, k bɑln’mɔ ɑ wun bɑɑl Kɑpelnɑunm, ɑ k tɑn te k u bijɑ n pɑɑk, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ wun kpo e.
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k i k lɑ nyinɑ nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ ii kɑɑ, i kɑn tien’n yɑdɑ.»
K yudɑɑnɔ nɑ jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ŋɑɑnt tin sɑɑn, k n bik dɑɑ k kpo nɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «I kun. A bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ.» Ŋɑnn e k yudɑɑnɔ nɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu nbɑ pɑk’ɔ lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, k ji ŋmɑt kun.
U sɔnu ni e k u tuontunnɑ cet’ɔ nɑn lɑbɑɑl ɑ: «A bik nɑ pɑɑk ɑ.»
K u boi’b ɑ: «Nlee yuo e k bik mɑnŋ pɑɑk i?» K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wonn, kut yonm yenlekl, k bik nɑ gbɑnu won mɑɑk.»
K juɑ nɑ tiɑl nɑn l yuo e tie yuo nbɑ k Yiesu won yet’ɔ ɑ: «A bijɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ,» nɑ. L pɑɑk k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ.
Nɑ e tie bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ pukn munle, yuo nbɑ k Yiesu nyii Suude tinŋ ni k bɑɑl Gɑɑliile.
L puolpo e k *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnsiɑb tɑn bɑɑl, k Yiesu sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm.
Lenŋ e k biɑɔnŋ nɑn nyun din be, k bɑkt ŋɑnŋmu din cɑɑn lint ɑ, k Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, b din yi’l Betesdɑ, k l kpiɑ nɑn Pei Tɑnmɔb.
K bɑɑtb bonciɑnn din tuu duɑ lenŋ, k siɑb tie juɑni, k siɑb mun tie diɑni, k siɑb mun tie gbɑnɑnkpienɑ dɑnm. (B tuu duɑ k guu nyun nɑ e, ɑ lin dɑnm.
Yosɑu tuuk Yennu mɑlɑksuɑ tuu sik e k dɑnm nyun mɑnŋ. Yuo nbɑ k u dɑnm nyun mɑnŋ, k bɑɑtɔ nbɑ sint sik nyun nɑ ni, u yiɑlu tuu gbenn e.)
Tɔn, k jɑsuɑ din be l buol, k din yiɑl binɑ piintɑ nɑn ŋɑnniin.
K Yiesu tɑn bɑɑl lɑ k u duɑ l buol, k bɑnn nɑn juɑ mɑnŋ yiɑlu wei wɑɑ, k u boi’ɔ: «A luon k ɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ ɑɑ?»
K bɑɑtɔ nɑ jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, nyun nɑ ii dɑnm yuo nbɑ, n k mɔk suɑ nbɑ sɑɑ jii’n sikn’n l ni. K mi i tuu yɑɑ n sik, suɑ tuu dɔnŋ k sik e, ŋɑɑn nyik’n.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Fiit, k jii ɑ duɑnu kii sonm.»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k juɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k fiil k jii u duɑnu k sonm sɑɑ. Dɑɑl nbɑ k juɑ nɑ din lɑ lɑɑfiɑ nɑ din tie *Fuondɑɑl e.
L pɑɑk e tien k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dinnɑ tie Fuondɑɑl e. T *senni k cɑb nɑn fɑn jii ɑ duɑnu kii sonm nɑn’n.»
K u jiin ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ te k n pɑɑk nɑ, ŋuɑ e yet’n ɑ n jii n duɑnu mɑnŋ kii sɑɑ nɑn’n.»
K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Jɑlɑnɔ po e yet’ɑ ɑ ɑ jii ɑ duɑnu mɑnŋ kii sɑɑ nɑn’n i?»
Ŋɑɑn juɑ nɑ ji din k mi wun nbɑ din te k u pɑɑk jik, k mɑɑn Yiesu ji din ponŋ kuɑ nibul nɑ ni k juɑ nɑ ji k lɑ’u.
L puolpo e k Yiesu ji lon juɑ nɑ, k tɑn lɑ’u Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, ɑ ji pɑɑk ɑ. A ji dɑɑ mi k tuun biit, nnɑ i kɑɑ siɑl ɑ bonbisiɑl tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl’ɑ k gɑl nnɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ pɑk nɑn juɑ nɑ, k juɑ nɑ nyii k sɑɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ buol k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ: «Yiesu e te k n pɑɑk.»
L pɑɑk te k yudɑnm mɑnŋ ji piin Yiesu muksuk, k mɑɑn wɑɑ te k juɑ nɑ pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu din yet’b ɑ: «N Bɑɑ tun tuun e, k n mun tuun nnɑ e.»

L pɑɑk e k Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ ŋɑnm donn wutuol k luon bin kpi’u k gɑl sinsinn nɑ. B dukn nɑn l k tie wɑɑ biil Fuondɑɑl senni nɑ pɑɑk kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ biɑ jii u mɔnŋ k yekn nɑn Yennu, k yɑɑ ɑ Yennu tie u Bɑɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, Yennu Bijɑ k fit tuun siɑl u kuukuɑ. U lɑɑt u Bɑɑ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ e, k mun tuun. Lin nbɑ kul k Bɑɑ mɑnŋ tuun nɑ, u Bijɑ mun tuun ŋɑnn e.
K mɑɑn Bɑɑ mɑnŋ luon u Bijɑ, k wɑnt’ɔ lin nbɑ kul k u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ tuun. K u biɑ sɑɑ wɑnn’ɔ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ wuu tuun, k lin gɑl lin nbɑ k i lɑ nɑ, k l sɑɑ tien’i bɑktnɔunŋ.
Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ fiint kpienm k tien’m mɑnfuol nɑ, nnɑ e mun, k u Bijɑ nɑ mun sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ k u lukt’b nɑ mɑnfuol.
«Bɑɑ mɑnŋ k bu suɑ buut, ŋɑɑn u cɑb u Bijɑ e, ɑ wuu bu niib buut,
ɑ k suɑ kul i tien u Bijɑ bɑɑkl nɑn bɑɑ tien Bɑɑ mɑnŋ bɑɑkl biɑnŋ nbɑ. Wun nbɑ k tie u Bijɑ nɑ bɑɑkl, u biɑ k tien u Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’ɔ nɑ bɑɑkl.

«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ gbɑt n mɑɑn nɑ, k biɑ tien wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k Yennu kɑn bu u buut k biil’ɔ. U biɑ ponŋ nyii kuun nuu ni wɑɑ, k be mɑnfuol mɑnŋ ni e.
«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, yuo bɑɑt, k l ponŋ bɑɑl ɑ, k kpienm tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt Yennu Bijɑ kunkɔl, k bin nbɑ gbɑt kunkɔl mɑnŋ sii be mɑnfuol ni.
Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ yen mɑnfuol k tien niib nɑ, nnɑ e mun k u cɑb ɑ u Bijɑ mun i yen mɑnfuol kii tien niib,
k u biɑ cɑb’ɔ yiikuo ɑ wuu bu niib buut, k mɑɑn u Bijɑ tie *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ e.
I dɑɑ te k l tie’i yɑɑl-lituk u. Yuo bɑɑt k kpienm kul tɑn sɑɑ gbɑt Yennu Bijɑ kunkɔl,
k fiil. Bin nbɑ tun bonŋɑnn, b tɑn sɑɑ fiil k be b mɑnfuol ni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ mun tun bonbiil nɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ fiil, k u sɑɑ bu b buut k biil’b.

«N kɑn fit tun siɑl n mɔnŋ. Mi i bu nilɔ buut biɑnŋ nbɑ, Yennu e tuu yet’n ɑ n bu. L pɑɑk e tien k n buut ŋɑn, k mɑɑn n k luon k n tun n mɔnŋ yɑnbuɑtuonɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n tuun Yennu nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑnbuɑtuonɑ e.»
«N pinpɑɔk nɑ e wɑnt mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, ŋɑɑn l k mɔk nyuɑt.
Ŋɑɑn suɑ e be wɑɑ, k piɑk wɑnt niib mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, k n mi nɑn wɑɑ piɑk n po mɑnŋ, l tie bɑlmɔni e.
«Tɔn, i tun i niib Sɑn buol, k u jii l bɑlmɔni k tul’i.
L k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs kɑɑ nɑn nilɔ n pɑk n po, ŋɑɑn n yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ e ɑ yin lɑ fielu.
Sɑn mɑnŋ dɑɑn tie nɑn fitl nbɑ k b tuu juo, k l yentu nyɔkt nɑ e, k i dɑɑn jii yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ k niɑn u yentu mɑnŋ.
«Ŋɑɑn siɑl be k wɑnt n *siɑlɑ k cie Sɑn *siɑlɑ nɑ k mɑɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑɑ mii tuun, k n biɑ tuun nɑ, ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn Bɑɑ mɑnŋ tun’n.
Bɑɑ mɑnŋ wɑnt n *siɑlɑ. I k mi gbɑt u kunkɔl, k biɑ k mi lɑ’u nɑn i ninbinɑ,
k u mɑɑn biɑ kɑɑ i pɑlɑ ni, k mɑɑn i k tien wun nbɑ k u tun’ɔ nɑ yɑdɑ.
«Tɔn, i lek tuu lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ, k mɑɑn i tuu duki mi ɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu be lenŋ e, k Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ wɑnt n po,
ŋɑɑn k i lek yet nɑn k i bɑɑl n penŋ k n tul’i mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
«N k luon nisɑɑlk pɑku,
ŋɑɑn n mi i po nɑn i k luon Yennu i pɑlɑ ni fɑb ɑ.
N bɑɑl n Bɑɑ sɑnn ni e, k i k gɑɑl’n. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ bɑɑl u mɔnŋ sɑnn ni, i tuu gɑɑl’ɔ e.
I tuu luon k i gɑɑl i lieb pɑku e, ŋɑɑn i tuu k luon bɑnnu nbɑ k i sɑɑ lɑ Yennu nbɑ tie Yen-yenml nɑ pɑku. Nlee k i mun sɑɑ fit tien’n yɑdɑ?
I dɑɑ duki nɑn n sɑɑ tɑɑl’i n Bɑɑ buol. Muois tie wun nbɑ sɑɑ tɑɑl’i. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k i dɑɑn u po nɑ.
I setk i bo i tien Muois diɑni yɑdɑ, i bo sɑɑ tien’n yɑdɑ wɑɑ mun, k mɑɑn u din diɑn pɑk n po e.
Ŋɑɑn yɑɑ k tien wɑɑ din diɑn lin nbɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ nɑ, nlee k i ji sɑɑ tien n mɑɑn yɑdɑ?»
L puolpo k Yiesu ŋmɑt puot Gɑɑliile mɔkgbenŋl nbɑ k b biɑ yi’l Tiibeliɑt mɔkgbenŋl nɑ puotl.
K nibulciɑɔnŋ din wɑɑ u puolpo, k mɑɑn b din lɑ u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u din tuun k te k bɑɑtb pɑɑk nɑ.
K Yiesu din duo juɑl pɑɑk k sɑɑ kɑl nɑn u *puolpoweitieb.
L yuo k suɑ k Juifnbɑ *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm pel nɑ.
Yiesu nbɑ din kɑl mɑnŋ nɑ, k u tɑn got lɑ k nibulciɑɔnŋ bɑɑt u penŋ. K u tɑn boi Fiiliip ɑ: «T sɑɑ lɑ jiet lee k dɑɑ, k dinn niib nɑ kul i?»
U din boi nnɑ mɑnŋ k luon wun bikn Fiiliip e, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ ŋɑnin ponŋ din mi wɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ e wɑɑ.
K Fiiliip jiin ɑ: «T i yɑɑ t dɑɑ pɑɑnu k tul niib nɑ, l sɑɑ fit di nɑn denienbɑ kobi ŋɑnle (200) nɑ wɑɑ, k suɑ kul n fit lɑ wɑɑn.»
K u puolpoweitelieb ni yenɔ nbɑ k b yi u sɑnn Andle, wun nbɑ din tie Siimɔn Piɑl ninjɑ nɑ, yet Yiesu ɑ:
«Bisiɑk e be nnɑ k mɔk pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu nɑn jɑni ŋɑnle. Ŋɑɑn l sɑɑ tien nlee k jɑnŋ nɑn nibul nɑ kul i?»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k niib mɑnŋ n kɑl.» Pɑɑnu din be k mɔk mɔpɑɑɔnŋ lenŋ, k jɑb nɑ din kɑl, k b din tie nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ.
K Yiesu jii pɑɑnu nɑ, k tul Yennu niipuouk, ŋɑɑn te k b tol niib nbɑ kɑl mɑnŋ, k u biɑ jii jɑni nɑ k tien nnɑ, k b kul ɑ din dii k sɑɑ jɑnŋ bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Bɑɑ gbuo yuo nbɑ, k u yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ bin lɑkn jiet nbɑ tenn nɑ, ɑ k l dɑɑ biil.
K b lɑkn pɑɑni ŋɑnŋmu bulɑ nbɑ k nibul nɑ dii ŋɑɑn tenn nɑ, k gbien kpɑncubt piik nɑn ŋɑnle.
Niib mɑnŋ nbɑ lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn nbɑ k Yiesu tun nɑ, k b yet ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e setk, nilɔ nɑ e tie *Yennu sɔkni nbɑ din tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ.»
K Yiesu ji bɑnn nɑn b yɑɑ bin suol’ɔ k din’ɔ nɑɑn e. L pɑɑk e te k u nyik’b ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt juɑl pɑɑk u kuukuɑ, k sɑɑ be.
Dɑɑjuouk nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb sik sɑɑn mɔkgbenŋl ni,
k sɑɑn kuɑ bulgbetl k kɑn sɑɑ, k sɑɑ puotl mɔkgbenŋl nɑ, k tuok Kɑpelnɑunm. L yuo nɑ din tie nyiɑɔk o, k Yiesu dɑɑ k bɑɑl b buol.
K wonpɑɑluk tɑn fikt k dɑ nyun nɑ pɑɑk.
Yuo nbɑ k u puolpoweitieb kɑn sɑɑn nɑn kiiluomiɑtɑ ŋɑnŋmu ɑmi ŋɑnluob nɑ, k b lɑ Yiesu sonm nyun pɑɑk k tuokt bulgbetl mɑnŋ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol’b.
K Yiesu yet’b: «I dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni mɑn. Min e.»
Ŋɑnn e, k b luon bin jii’u k kuɑn’ɔ bulgbetl nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k bulgbetl sie bɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ nɑ gbingbɑnn.
Lɑɑ yent yuo nbɑ nɑ, niib nbɑ din biɑl mɔk-puotl po nɑ, lɑ nɑn bulgbetyenn kuɑ won be. B mi nɑn Yiesu won k kuɑ bulgbetl nɑn u puolpoweitieb ŋɑɑn k ŋɑnm e won fiil k sɑɑn b kuukuɑ.
Bulgbetliɑ biɑ nyii Tiibeliɑt k bɑɑt k pel siɑn nbɑ niib won dii jiet nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ won tul Yennu niipuouk l pɑɑk nɑ.
Nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ nbɑ lɑ nɑn Yiesu kɑɑ lenŋ nɑ, k u puolpoweitieb biɑ kɑɑ nɑ, k b sɑɑn kuɑ bulgbetɑ nɑ ni, k sɑɑn Kɑpelnɑunm, ɑ bin sɑɑ lon’mɔ.
Niib nɑ nbɑ din puot mɔkgbenŋl mɑnŋ nɑ, k b lɑ Yiesu, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ɑ bɑɑl nnɑ nlee yuo e?»
K Yiesu yet’b: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, mɑɑ won tul’i jiet k i dii k gbuo nɑ e, ŋɑnn e te k i luon’n mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn l k tie yɑɑ lɑ n bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ kɑɑ.

I dɑɑ tuun tuonn jiet nbɑ sɑɑ fit biil pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ii tuun tuonn jiet nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu pɑɑk. *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ sɑɑ tul’i l jebuolu, k mɑɑn u Bɑɑ Yennu dɔk’ɔ u dɔuk k l wɑnn nɑn Bijɑ mɑnŋ mɔk u Bɑɑ yiikuo.»
Ŋɑnn e k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «T sɑɑ tien nlee k fit tun tuonɑ nbɑ k Yennu luon nɑ?»
K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «Tuonn nɑ e k Yennu luon k yii tuun, ɑ yin tien wun nbɑ k u tun’ɔ nɑ yɑdɑ.»
K b biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnlɑnn po e k ɑ sɑɑ tun k wɑnn’t, k tin lɑ k tien’ɑ yɑdɑ? Tuonlɑnn po e k ɑ sɑɑ tun i?
T yejɑnm nbɑ din be muuk ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, b din tuu di jiet nbɑ k b yi’l mɑnn nɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ɑ: ‹U din tien’m pɑɑnu nbɑ nyi *Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ ɑ bii di.› »
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, l k tie Muois kɑɑ tul’i pɑɑnu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn n Bɑɑ e tie wun nbɑ tul’i mɔmɔnm pɑɑnu nbɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.
Pɑɑnu nbɑ k Yennu jii tien’i mɑnŋ, ŋɑnn e tie wun nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k tien tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb mɑnfuol.»
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ii tien’t pɑɑnu nɑ dɑɑl kul.»
K u yet’b ɑ: «Min e tie mɑnfuol pɑɑnu mɑnŋ. Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ bɑɑl n buol ni, kon kɑn mi k suol l dɑɑnɔ, k wun nbɑ mun tien’n yɑdɑ, nyun-nyuklu kɑn mi k suol’ɔ.
«Ŋɑɑn n ponŋ yet’i nɑn i lɑ’n ɑ, ŋɑɑn k k tien’n yɑdɑ.
Wun nbɑ kul k n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ jii’u k tul’n nɑ, sɑɑ bɑɑl n buol ni, k n kɑn mi bel wun nbɑ bɑɑl n buol ni,
k mɑɑn n nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k sik nɑ mɑɑ n tun wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑnbuɑtuonn e, ŋɑɑn l k tie n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yɑnbuɑt kɑɑ.
Wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ lonm tie nnɑ e, ɑ n dɑɑ buont bin nbɑ k u tul’n nɑ nɑn yenɔ kuukuɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑn fiin’m kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
Nnɑ e k n Bɑɑ Yennu luon, ɑ wun nbɑ lɑ u Bijɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k n tɑn sɑɑ fiin’m kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.»
Ŋɑnn e k *Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ ji buln buln nɑn lieb, ɑ k mɑɑn wɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ ŋuɑ e tie pɑɑnu nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ pɑɑk.
K b boi lieb ɑ: «U k tie Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Suosiɑf bijɑ nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ? T mi u bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ. Nlee k u yɑɑ ɑ u nyii Yendɔunŋ ni?»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «I dɑɑ buln nɑn lieb mɑn.
Suɑ kɑn fit k bɑɑl n buol ni k tien n yuɑ, k l k tie k Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ tun’n nɑ kɑɑ te k u bɑɑl, k n tɑn sɑɑ fiin l dɑɑnɔ kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
*Yennu sɔkniinbɑ din diɑn ɑ: ‹Yennu sɑɑ tumi suɑ kul.› Bin nbɑ kul gbiintl Bɑɑ mɑnŋ k biɑ gbiɑ, ŋɑnm e sɑɑ bɑɑl n penŋ.
L k tie suɑ mi lɑ Bɑɑ mɑnŋ sie wun nbɑ nyii u buol ni, ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e lɑ’u.
«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Min e tie mɑnfuol pɑɑnu nɑ.
Yuo nbɑ k i yejɑnm din tuu be muuk ni nɑ, b din tuu di mɑnn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn b kpo wɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn pɑɑnu nbɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ be nnɑ, k wun nbɑ dii’l, u kɑn kpo.

Min e tie mɑnfuol pɑɑnu mɑnŋ nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ k sik. L i tie k suɑ dii pɑɑnu mɑnŋ, u sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Pɑɑnu nbɑ k n sɑɑ tul tie n gbɑnɑnt e, k n tɑn sɑɑ tul’l ɑ tingbounŋ ŋɑɑtieb n lɑ mɑnfuol.»
Ŋɑnn e k mɔniɑɔk fiil Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ sinsuuk ni, k b boi b lieb: «Nlee k juɑ nɑ sɑɑ tul’t u gbɑnɑnt k tin di i?»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, sie k i ŋmɑn Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ gbɑnɑnt, k biɑ nyuu u sɔn. Nnɑ e kɑɑ, i kii mɔk mɑnfuol mɑnŋ i ni.
K dɑɑnɔ nbɑ ŋmɑn n gbɑnɑnt k biɑ nyuu n sɔn, u mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k n tɑn sɑɑ fiin’ɔ kuun ni tingbounŋ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
K mɑɑn n gbɑnɑnt tie jiet nɑn bɑlmɔni, k n sɔn mun tie dɑɑn nɑn bɑlmɔni.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ ŋmɑn n gbɑnɑnt, k biɑ nyuu n sɔn, ŋuɑ e be n ni, k n mun be u ni.
«Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ yen mɑnfuol nɑ tun’n, k l pɑɑk k n mun mɔk mɑnfuol, nnɑ e mun, wun nbɑ ŋmɑn n gbɑnɑnt nɑ, n pɑɑk k u sii mɔk mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
Nɑ e tie pɑɑnu nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni k sik. L k nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ k i yejɑnm din di muuk ni k biɑ kpo nɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ di pɑɑnu mɑnŋ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
Yiesu e din pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, wɑɑ dɑɑ din be Kɑpelnɑunm, Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k tumi niib nɑ.
Yiesu puolpoweitieb bonciɑnn nbɑ din gbɑt u wɑnnu mɑnŋ, k b yien b lieb ɑ: «Wɑnnu nɑ pɑɑl bonciɑnn. Ŋmee sɑɑ fit gɑɑl’l i?»
Yiesu din bɑnn nɑn u puolpoweitieb nɑ mɔk bunbulmi u wɑnnu mɑnŋ pɑɑk. L pɑɑk, k u boi’b ɑ: «Mɑɑn mɑnŋ kpɑɑ i kpiɑni ee?
L i tie k i lɑ Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ do Yendɔunŋ ni siɑn nbɑ k u din tuu be nɑ, i ji sii duki nlee?
Foŋɑnm e tien niib mɑnfuol. Gbɑnɑnt nɑ tie yɑnn e. Mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk’i nɑ e tie Foŋɑnm nɑn mɑnfuol.
Ŋɑɑn i siɑb lek k tien’n yɑdɑ.» Yiesu din pɑk’b lin nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn u ponŋ mi sinsinn bin nbɑ tɑn kɑn tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, nɑn wun nbɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ kuɑt’ɔ.
K u biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «L pɑɑk e te k n yien’i ɑ suɑ kɑn fit bɑɑl n buol ni, sie k Bɑɑ mɑnŋ e cɑb’ɔ.»
L yuo nɑ k ji sɑɑ, k u puolpoweitieb bonciɑnn ji din ŋmɑt puol, k ji k tɔki nɑn’ɔ.
Ŋɑnn e k u din boi u tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «K i mun sɑɑ nyik’n ɑɑ?»
K Siimɔn Piɑl jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k t mun ji sɑɑ nyik’ɑ ŋɑɑn sɑɑn ŋmee buol i? Fin e mɔk mɑɑn nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
T tien’ɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑ k mi nɑn fin e tie Yennu niŋɑnɔ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yinm jɑb piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ, min kɑɑ lukt’i ni ii? Ŋɑɑn k i ni yenɔ tie *Sɑɑtɑn yuɑ.»
(U din yien Suudɑ wun nbɑ tie Siimɔn Iskɑɑliɑɔt bijɑ nɑ po e. Ŋuɑ e din tie u tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ ni yenɔ, ŋɑɑn lek yɑɑ wun kuɑt’ɔ.)
L kul nɑ puolpo e k Yiesu ji din be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn lin lenŋ digbɑnɑ ni. U din k luon wuu lin Suude tinŋ ni, k mɑɑn *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din luon bin kpi’u.
Suifnbɑ jɑɑnm nbɑ k b yi’l lɑnbont jɑɑnm nɑ tɑn pel.
K Yiesu ninjɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nyikn nnɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn Suude tinŋ ni, k ɑ *puolpoweitieb n lɑ tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun nɑ.
L i tie k suɑ luon wun wɑnn niib wɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, l k ŋɑn k wun bɔl tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun. K mɑɑn fɑɑ tuun tuonɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, l ŋɑn fɑn wɑnn niib tuonɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑnu ni.»
(U ninjɑnm nɑ lek din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.)
K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «N yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin sɑɑ fit sɑɑn yuo nbɑ kul k i luon.
Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kɑn fit nɑn’i, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin b nɑn’n, k mɑɑn n yien’m nɑn b tuonɑ bi.
Tɔn, yinm i sɑɑ jɑɑnm mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin dɑɑ k sɑɑ, k mɑɑn n sinsɑɑn-yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl.»
Wɑɑ wɑnn’b nnɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k u biɑl Gɑɑliile.
Yiesu ninjɑnm nɑ nbɑ din sɑɑn jɑɑnm nɑ, k l puolpo k Yiesu mun tɑn wei k sɑɑn. U din k sɑɑn pieee pieee kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din bɔl e k sɑɑn.
K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din lin k luon’ɔ jɑɑnm mɑnŋ ni, k boi niib ɑ: «U be lee?»
K niib bonciɑnn nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ lɔkn k piɑk bonciɑnn k jikt sɑɑ u po, k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «U tie niŋɑnɔ e,» k lieb yɑɑ ɑ: «Aɑi, u kpɑnn niib nɑ e,»
ŋɑɑn suɑ din k pɑk u po pɑɑnu ni, k mɑɑn b tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni e.
K jɑɑnm nɑ yuo sinsuuk ni, k Yiesu sɑɑn kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k piin k tumi niib.
K l tien Suifnbɑ bɑktnɔunŋ, k b boi ɑ: «Nlee k nilɔ nɑ mɑntk mɔk yɑn nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k k kuɑ t sɑkul i?»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Mɑɑ wɑnt wɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, l k tie n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑnnu kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l nyii Yennu wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ buol e.
Wun nbɑ luon wun tun Yennu yɑnbuɑtuonɑ, ŋuɑ e sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ k n piɑk k wɑnt nɑ nyii Yennu buol ɑmi n buol e.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piɑk u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ wɑnnu, ŋuɑ luon *yudɑnt k tien u mɔnŋ e. Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ luon ɑ wun nbɑ tun’ɔ nɑ n lɑ yudɑnt, ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piɑk mɔmɔnm k fɑɑk kɑɑ u ni.
«Muois kɑɑ din tul’i t *senni ii? Ŋɑɑn i suɑ k diɑ l *senni mɑnŋ. K bee k i luon k i kpi’n i?»
K niib nbɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Nɑlnbiiuk be ɑ ni. Ŋmee yɑɑ wun kpi’ɑ ni?»
K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «N tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnyenn k l tien’i kul ɑ bɑktnɔunŋ.
K mɑɑn Muois nbɑ din tul’i *punpotu sennu nɑ pɑɑk (ŋɑɑn Muois kɑɑ din piin, i yejɑnm e din piin) k i sɑɑk k poli punɑ *Fuondɑɑl.
Tɔn, l i tie k i pot bonjɑbik Fuondɑɑl, ɑ i dɑɑ biil Muois *senni e, nlee k i donn wutuol n pɑɑk ɑ mɑɑ te k bɑɑtɔ pɑɑk Fuondɑɑl nɑ?
Dɑɑ goli nilɔ nɑn-yel po k bu u buut, ŋɑɑn i tuu bu nɑn senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Selusɑɑlenm nisiɑb boi b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ, k b yɑbi ɑ bin kpi’u nɑ ɑɑ?
Gotl mɑn, u piɑk pɑɑnu ni, k suɑ mun biɑ k piɑk siɑl. T yudɑnm nɔk sii bɑnn ɑ ŋuɑ e tie *Klistu nɑ ɑmi?
Ŋɑɑn t mi juɑ nɑ nbɑ nyii siɑn nbɑ. Klistu nɑ i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, suɑ kɑn fit bɑnn wɑɑ nyii siɑn.»

Yiesu nbɑ tumi niib nɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ, k u tɑn pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo k yet’b ɑ: «I mi min k biɑ mi mɑɑ nyii siɑn. N k bɑɑl n mɔnŋ bɑɑlu kɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tun’n nɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk bɑlmɔni kul, k i k mi’u,
ŋɑɑn min mi’u, k mɑɑn n tuu be u buol ni e, k ŋuɑ e tɑn tun’n nnɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k b din yɑbi ɑ bin suol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k suɑ k suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn u suolu yuo dɑɑ din k bɑɑl.
Ŋɑɑn k nibul nɑ ni niib bonciɑnn din tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k boi b lieb ɑ: «Klistu nɑ i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, u sii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn k gɑl juɑ nɑ yɑl ɑɑ?»
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nbɑ din gbɑt niib nbɑ lɔkn lɔkn k piɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ Yiesu po nɑ, k ŋɑnm nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm din tun Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm ɑ bin sɑɑn k sɑɑ suol Yiesu.
K Yiesu din yet nibul nɑ ɑ: «N sii be nɑn’i yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e, k l puolpo k n ŋmɑt k sɑɑn wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ penŋ.
I tɑn sɑɑ lon n buol, ŋɑɑn i kɑn lɑ’n, k mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k n tɑn sii be nɑ, i kɑn fit bɑɑl lenŋ.»
K Suifnbɑ nɑ boi b lieb ɑ: «U yɑɑ wun tɑn sɑɑn lee, k t kɑn lɑ’u? U yɑɑ wun tɑn sɑɑn Glek doi ni siɑn nbɑ k Suifnbɑ be nɑ, kii sɑɑ kii wɑnt Glek tieb nɑ ɑmi ii?
Wɑɑ yet ɑ t tɑn sɑɑ lon u buol ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ’u, ɑ k biɑ tɑn kɑn fit sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k u sii be nɑ, l pɑɑk tie bee?»
Tɔn, k jɑɑnm mɑnŋ gbennu dɑɑl din tie dɑjɑɑnn e. L dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k Yiesu fiil set k pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ k nyun-nyuklu gbɑt’ɔ, wun bɑɑl n buol ni k tɑn nyu,
k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ, mɑnfuol nyun sii tɔ nyunkpɑnɑ e k nyi u pɑl ni.› »

Yiesu nbɑ din piɑk nɑ, l din wɑnt Foŋɑnm po e, k bin nbɑ din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ din tɑn sɑɑ lɑ Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ. L yuo nɑ dinn, Yennu dɑɑ din k tul niib Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn u dɑɑ din k donn Yiesu k tul’ɔ u yentsɑɑkɑl.
Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din be nigbounŋ nɑ ni k gbɑt k u yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b yet ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ set tie *Yennu sɔkni nɑn bɑlmɔni e,»
k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «U tie Klistu e,» k lieb mun boi ɑ: «Nlee k Klistu sɑɑ nyi Gɑɑliile?
Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk k wɑnn ɑ Klistu nɑ tɑn sii tie * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn ee? K b biɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑl’ɔ Betlehenm duo nbɑ din tie ŋuɑ Dɑɑfiid duo nɑ ni ee?»
K niib nɑ ji suol bɔkt k mɑɑn Yiesu pɑɑk.
K siɑb biɑ luon bin suol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn b ni suɑ k suol’ɔ.
L puolpo e k sejenm nɑ ji ŋmɑt Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ buol ni, k b boi’b ɑ: «Bee tien k i k jen nɑn’ɔ?»
K sejenm nɑ jiin yet’b ɑ: «Suɑ dɑɑ k mi k pɑk mɑɑn nɑn juɑ nɑ mɑbuolu nbɑ k u piɑk nɑ.»
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ boi’b ɑ: «K i mun biɑ nyik k u kpɑnn’i ni ii?
I tɑn mi lɑ k t yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ suɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ ɑɑ?
Ŋɑɑn nigbounŋ nɑ nbɑ k mi Yennu senni nɑ, mɔpol be b pɑɑk.»
K yudɑnm mɑnŋ ni yenɔ e din tie Niikodenm, wun din sɑɑn ɑ wun sɑɑ lɑ Yiesu nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ:
«T senni k cɑb’t ɑ tin bu nilɔ buut k biil’ɔ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k gbɑt u mɔb ni k bɑnn u biit.»
K b boi’ɔ: «A mun tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ ee? Gotl Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni. A sɑɑ lɑ nɑn Yennu sɔkni k mi nyii Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni.»
L puolpo e k suɑ kul kun.
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu din duo *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk pɑɑk.
K l yent sɑn-nyɑpob ni, k u ŋmɑt kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k niib bonciɑnn tikl bɑɑl kuɑ lint’ɔ, k u kɑl k tumi’b.
Ŋɑnn e k *senniwɑntieb nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ bɑɑl nɑn puo nbɑ tun * boncuncontuonn, k te k u set Yiesu tuɑnn po,
ŋɑɑn yet Yiesu ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ, t lɑ puo nɑ, k u tuun boncuncontuonn e, k t suol’ɔ l yuo nɑ.
T *senni ni, Muois din senn ɑ l puobuolu ŋɑn k bin jɑɑt’ɔ tɑnɑ e k kpi’u. Fin ŋɑnin sɑɑ yet ɑ bee?»
B din yet nnɑ, k luon bin kpɑl Yiesu e, k ji fit tɑɑl’ɔ. K Yiesu tibn ŋɑɑn jii u niibil k diɑn tinŋ ni.
Bɑɑ biɑ lek sie k boi’ɔ buboit yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u tibt k yet’b ɑ: «Wun nbɑ k mi k tun biit, l dɑɑnɔ n sint jɑɑ’u tɑnsinsinn,»
ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm tibn k diɑn tinŋ ni.
Bɑɑ gbɑt k u yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b piin yɑt yenɔ yenɔ, k nikpelɑ nɑ dɔnŋ yɑt, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu biɑl, ŋuɑ nɑn puo nɑ, k u biɑ dɑɑ sie u tuɑnn po.
K u tibt boi’ɔ: «Puo, b sɑɑn lee? Suɑ k biɑl ɑ wun bu ɑ buut biil’ɑ ni ii?»
K u jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, suɑ k biɑl.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N mun kɑn bu ɑ buut k biil’ɑ. Ii kun. A ji dɑɑ mi k tuun biit.»
Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm piɑk nɑn niib Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ɑ: «Min e tie tingbounŋ nɑ yentu, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ wɑɑ’n, ŋuɑ ji kɑn mi sonm bunbɔnn ni ŋɑɑn u sii mɔk yentu nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol.»
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fɑɑ piɑk k wɑnt ɑ mɔnŋ po nɑ, l tie yɑnn e.»

K Yiesu jiin yet’b: «Mi i lek i piɑk k wɑnt n mɔnŋ po i e, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yet lin nbɑ, l tie mɔni e, k mɑɑn min mi mɑɑ nyii siɑn nbɑ, k biɑ mi mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ. Yinm ŋɑnin k mi mɑɑ nyii siɑn. I biɑ k mi mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn.
Yinm goli nilɔ nɑn-yel po e k bu u buut, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin k bu suɑ buut.
Mi i ponŋ i yɑɑ n bu nilɔ buut i e, n sɑɑ bu u buut nɑn bɑlmɔni e, k mɑɑn n k bu buut n kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n nɑ e be nɑn’n.
Tɔn, l ponŋ diɑn i senni ni ɑ niib bɑnle *siɑlɑ i jɑnŋ nɑn liel, ŋɑnn i tie bɑlmɔni.
N piɑk wɑnt n mɔnŋ po, k n Bɑɑ wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ mun biɑ piɑk wɑnt n po nnɑ e.»
K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «A Bɑɑ mɑnŋ be lee?» K Yiesu pɑk jiin’m ɑ: «I k mi’n, k tɑn boi n Bɑɑ. I i bo i mi’n i e, i mun biɑ bo sii mi n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ.»
Yiesu din pɑk mɑɑn nɑ yuo nbɑ k u din tumi niib, k b din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni siɑn nbɑ k b sent Yennu piini likli lɑkl nɑ, ŋɑɑn suɑ k suol’ɔ, k mɑɑn u suolu yuo dɑɑ k bɑɑl.
K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm pɑk yet’b ɑ: «N sɑɑ yɑɑt ɑ, k i tɑn sɑɑ lon’n, ŋɑɑn i tɑn sɑɑ kpo i biit ni. I biɑ tɑn kɑn fit sɑɑn mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn.»
Ŋɑnn e k *Suifnbɑ nɑ yet ɑ: «U yɑɑ wun kpi u mɔnŋ ee? Ŋɑnn e te k u yɑɑ ɑ t kɑn fit sɑɑn wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn ii?»
K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Yinm tie tinŋ nnɑ yɑb e, ŋɑɑn min tie sɑnpɑɑpo yuɑ e. Yinm nyii tingbounŋ nɑ ni e, ŋɑɑn min k nyii tingbounŋ nɑ ni kɑɑ.
L pɑɑk e te k n yet’i mɑɑ i sɑɑ kpo i biit ni. L i tie k i k tien yɑdɑ nɑn n tie mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ nɑ, i set sɑɑ kpo i biit ni.»
K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin ŋmee?» K u jiin’m ɑ: «Pinpiik ni n din yet’i mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ wɑɑ.
N bo sii fit piɑk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k biil’i, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ, k n piɑk yien tingbounŋ nɑ niib lin nbɑ k n gbiɑ u buol nɑ.»
Niib nɑ din k mi nɑn u piɑk u Bɑɑ po e.

L pɑɑk k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k i sɑɑ jii *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ k donn’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ, l yuo e k i tɑn sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn n tie mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, k i biɑ sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn n k tuun siɑl nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yiikuo, ŋɑɑn n biɑ yien lin nbɑ k n Bɑɑ wɑnn’n ɑ n tɑn yet e.
K wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e be nɑn’n. U k nyikt n kuukuɑ, k mɑɑn yuo kul n tuun lin nbɑ gbuot u nunm e.»
Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din gbɑt Yiesu nbɑ pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet Suifnbɑ nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ: «L i tie k i sɑɑk n mɑɑn, i set tie n *puolpoweitieb nɑn bɑlmɔni e,
k i biɑ sɑɑ bɑnn bɑlmɔni, k bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ sɑɑ nyinn’i dɑɑbs ni.»
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «T tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e, k t k mi k tien suɑ dɑɑbɑ. Nlee k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ t tɑn sɑɑ nyi dɑɑbs ni?»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, suɑ kul nbɑ tuun biit, u tie biit dɑɑbl e.
Dɑɑbl k tie ŋɑɑk yuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑk bik ŋɑnin tie ŋɑɑk yuɑ e yuo kul.
L i tie Bijɑ nɑ nyint’i dɑɑbs ni e, i set sɑɑ nyi dɑɑbs ni nɑn bɑlmɔni wɑɑ.
N mi nɑn i tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e, ŋɑɑn k i lek yɑbi ɑ i kpi’n, k mɑɑn n mɑɑn mɑnŋ k kuɑ i tubɑ ni.
Mɑɑ tuu be n Bɑɑ penŋ k lɑɑt lin nbɑ, ŋɑnn e k n piɑk, ŋɑɑn yinm tuun lin nbɑ k i bɑɑ yet’i ɑ yii tuun nɑ e.»
K b jiin’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: «T bɑɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm e.» K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k i bo tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm wɑɑs nɑn mɔni e, i bo sii tuun Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tuonbuolu nɑ e,
ŋɑɑn k mɔtɑɑnɑ k i yɑbi ɑ i kpi’n, nɑn mɑɑ tie nilɔ nbɑ yien’i bɑlmɔni nbɑ k n gbɑt Yennu penŋ nɑ. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din k tien nnɑ.
Ŋɑɑn yinm tuun i bɑɑ nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ e.» K b jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Tinm k tie kpen-k-ŋmiɑ kɑɑ. T mɔk bɑɑ yenɔ kuɑ e, k ŋuɑ e tie Yennu.»
K Yiesu yet’b: «L i bo i tie k Yennu mɔnŋ tie i bɑɑ, i bo sii luon’n ɑ, k mɑɑn n nyii ŋuɑ Yennu penŋ e k bɑɑl nnɑ. N biɑ k bɑɑl nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yiikuo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ e tun’n.
Bee tien k i k bɑnn n mɑɑn nɑ pɑɑk i? K mɑɑn yɑɑ k fit gbɑt n mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ.

I tie i bɑɑ *Sɑɑtɑn wɑɑs e, k luon k i tuun i bɑɑ mɑnŋ yɑnbuɑtuonɑ. Sinsinn u ponŋ din tie nikpiiluk o, k biɑ fɔk nɑn bɑlmɔni, k mɑɑn bɑlmɔni kɑɑ u ni nɑn wɑɑn ɑ. U i fɑɑl fɑɑk yuo nbɑ, l ponŋ tie u binbenŋ e, k mɑɑn wɑɑ tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ nɑ. Fɑi kul nyi u buol e.
Ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yien’i bɑlmɔni nɑ e te k i k tien’n yɑdɑ.
I ŋmee sɑɑ fit wɑnn n biit i? Mi i yet’i bɑlmɔni i e, bee tien k i k tien’n yɑdɑ?
Wun nbɑ tie Yennu yuɑ, ŋuɑ e gbiintl lin nbɑ k Yennu piɑk, ŋɑɑn i k tie Yennu yɑb. Ŋɑnn e tien k i k gbiintl’l.»
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ nɑ jiin k yet Yiesu ɑ: «Tɑɑ yet k yɑɑ ɑ tie *Sɑɑmɑɑli nilɔ, k nɑlnbiiuk biɑ be ɑ ni nɑ, l k tokn ii?»
K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Nɑlnbiiuk kɑɑ n ni. Min bɑɑkt n Bɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k yinm ŋɑnin siɑn’n.
Ŋɑɑn n k luon nibɑɑkl k tien n mɔnŋ. Yenɔ e be k u luon bin tien’n nibɑɑkl, k ŋuɑ e tie buut dɑɑnɔ.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ sɑɑk n mɑɑn, u kɑn mi k kpo.»
K Suifnbɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ t set bɑnn nɑn nɑlnbiiuk be ɑ ni. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din kpo wɑɑ, k *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mun din kpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ dɑɑnɔ nbɑ sɑɑk ɑ mɑɑn kɑn mi k kpo.
T cɑnbɑɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din kpo nɑ, ɑ duki mi ɑ ɑ cie’u ee? Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mun biɑ din kpo wɑɑ. Fin duki mi ɑ ɑ tie ŋmee?»
K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «Mi i bo i dontl n mɔnŋ i e, l bo sii tie yɑnn e. Wun nbɑ dontl’n tie n Bɑɑ e. ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k i yɑɑ ɑ u tie i Yennu nɑ.
I k mi’u, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin mi’u. L i bo i tie k n yɑɑ ɑ n k mi’u, n bo sɑɑ tien fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ nɑn yinm nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn n mi’u, k biɑ sɑɑk u mɑɑn.
I cɑnbɑɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ wun tɑn lɑ yuo nbɑ k n sɑɑ sik tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k u set tɑn lɑ l yuo mɑnŋ ɑ, k l mɑnŋ’ɔ.»
K Suifnbɑ nɑ boi’ɔ: «A dɑɑ k bɑɑl binɑ piinŋmu, ŋɑɑn tɑn lɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ii?»
K Yiesu jiin yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, bɑɑ din tɑn mɑɑl Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑ, ŋɑɑn suɑ k N Tie e.»
Ŋɑnn e k b ji tɔki tɑnɑ ɑ bin jɑɑt’ɔ k kpi’u, k u bɔl k nyii Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni.
L puolpo e k Yiesu din gɑɑl sɑɑ k tɑn lɑ juɑnŋ nnɑ, k u tie juɑnŋ u mɑɑlu ni wɑɑ.
K u *puolpoweitieb boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ŋmee biit e te k b mɑl juɑ nɑ juɑnŋ i? L dɑɑ tie u mɔnŋ biit ɑmi u dɑnm e?»
K u jiin’m ɑ: «U biit pɑɑk kɑɑ te k u juɑn. L mun biɑ k tie u dɑnm biit pɑɑk kɑɑ. U juɑn ɑ niib n lɑ Yennu tuonɑ u ni e.
Yuo nbɑ k yentu dɑɑ be nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k tii tuun wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ tuonɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn nyiɑɔk bɑɑt, yuo nbɑ k suɑ kɑn fit tun tuonn.
Mɑɑ dɑɑ be tingbounŋ nnɑ, n tie tingbounŋ nɑ niib yentu e.»
Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ puolpo e k u siil mɔsɑnt tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn buun tɑnt, k pɔl juɑnŋ nɑ ninbinɑ pɑɑk,
K yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ Siiloe biɑɔnŋ ni k sɑɑ yibl.» (Siiloe pɑɑk tie «t tun suɑ.») Ŋɑnn e k u sɑɑn k sɑɑ yibl, k nyuɑnt k kun.
Ŋɑnn e k u kuɑnɑnlieb nɑn niib nbɑ tuu lɑɑt’ɔ k u mei likli nɑ boi b lieb ɑ: «Jɑjuɑnŋ nbɑ tuu mei nɑ kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
K siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «Ŋuɑ e,» k lieb yɑɑ ɑ: «Aɑi, l k tie ŋuɑ kɑɑ. U nɑɑn’ɔ e.» K juɑ mɑnŋ tiɑɔnŋ yet ɑ: «Min e nɑ.»
K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «L tien nlee k ɑ ninbinɑ tɑn nyuɑnt i?»
K u jiin’m ɑ: «Juɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Yiesu nɑ, ŋuɑ e buun tɑnt k jii k pɔl n ninbinɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet’n ɑ mii sɑɑ Siiloe biɑɔnŋ ni k sɑɑ yibl. Ŋɑnn e k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ yibl k nyuɑnt.»
K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «U be lee?» K u jiin k yet’b ɑ: «N k mi.»
Jɑjuɑnŋ nɑ kuɑnɑnlieb nɑn niib nbɑ tuu lɑɑt’ɔ nɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ buol.
Dɑɑl nbɑ k Yiesu din buun tɑnt k nyuɑnt juɑnŋ nɑ, l dɑɑl din tie *Fuondɑɑl e.
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm boi juɑ nɑ, ɑ u tien nlee k nyuɑnt i? K u yet’b ɑ: «Yiesu e buun tɑnt, k jii k pɔl n ninbinɑ pɑɑk, k n yibl k nyuɑnt.»

K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb yet ɑ: «Yiesu k nyii Yennu buol ni kɑɑ, k mɑɑn u k sɑk Fuondɑɑl sennu.» K b siɑb mun boi ɑ: «Nlee k biitdɑɑnɔ sii fit tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ buolu?» K bɔktu bɑɑl Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ sinsuuk ni.
L pɑɑk k b biɑ boi juɑ nɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ pɑk ɑ bee k jiin wun nbɑ nyuɑnt ɑ ninbinɑ nɑ po?» K u biɑ pɑk jiin’m ɑ: «U tie *Yennu sɔkni e.»
Ŋɑɑn k l pɑɑl nɑn *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm n tien yɑdɑ nɑn b mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ e ŋɑɑn k u tɑn nyuɑnt. K b yɑɑ sie k b yiin juɑnŋ nɑ dɑnm,
k tɑn boi’b ɑ: «U tie i bijɑ ee? I set yɑɑ ɑ i mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ ee? K l tien nlee k u ji nyuɑnt mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ?»
K b jiin yet’b ɑ: «T mi nɑn u tie t bijɑ ŋɑnin e, k t biɑ mi nɑn t mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ e.
Ŋɑɑn t k mi lɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ k u tɑn nyuɑnt, k t biɑ k mi wun nbɑ nyuɑnt’ɔ. U mɔnŋ ji k tie bik kɑɑ. Boin’mɔ mɑn. U sɑɑ fit pɑk u mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ.»
U dɑnm din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn b tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni, k mɑɑn yudɑnm mɑnŋ ponŋ tɑɑn mɔb k yet ɑ wun nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ Yiesu e tie *Klistu nɑ, sie k b nyinn’ɔ b Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni.
L pɑɑk te k u dɑnm din yɑɑ ɑ u k tie bik kɑɑ, ɑ b mɔnŋ n boi’ɔ.
K l tɑɑl munle ni e k b biɑ ŋɑnm yiin juɑ nbɑ tuu tie juɑnŋ ŋɑɑn tɑn nyuɑnt nɑ, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yennu tuɑnn, pɑkn mɔni e. T mi nɑn Yiesu tie biitdɑɑnɔ e.»
K juɑ nɑ yet’b ɑ: «Wɑɑ tie biitdɑɑnɔ, ɑmi wɑɑ k tie, n k mi. Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin mi bon-yenn e: n tuu tie juɑnŋ e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji nyuɑnt ɑ.»
K b ŋɑnm biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «U tien nlee k nyuɑnt’ɑ ni?»
K u jiin’m ɑ: «N ponŋ yet’i wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k i k gbɑt. Bee k i jin luon k n yet’i ni? I mun luon k i tien u puolpoweitieb ee?»
Ŋɑnn e k b suki’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie nilɔ mɑnŋ puolpoweituɑ, ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin tie Muois puolpoweitieb e.
T mi nɑn Yennu din pɑk nɑn Muois, ŋɑɑn nilɔ nɑ ŋɑnin, t k mi wɑɑ nyii siɑn.»
K juɑ nɑ yet’b ɑ: «lin nbɑ tie pɑluk o nɑ: i k mi wɑɑ nyii siɑn, ŋɑɑn k u yen nyuɑnt n ninbinɑ wɑɑ.
T mi nɑn Yennu k gbiin biitdɑnm, ŋɑɑn u gbiɑ dɑnm nbɑ jiɑntl’ɔ k tuun wɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ e.
Lɑɑ nyii *dulnyɑ piinu ni wɑɑ, t dɑɑ k mi gbɑt ɑ suɑ nyuɑnt wun nbɑ k b mɑl’ɔ juɑnŋ.
L i bo i tie k juɑ mɑnŋ k nyii Yennu penŋ, u bo kɑn fit tun siɑl.»
K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin nbɑ k b mɑl’ɑ nɑn biit nɑ po, ɑ tie ŋmee k wɑnt tinm i?» ŋɑɑn bel nyinn’ɔ nɑn-yel.
Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt ɑ b bel’ɔ nɑ, k u tɑn lon’mɔ k lɑ’u, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «A tien *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ yɑdɑ ɑɑ?»
K u jiin boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ŋmee tie nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ? Yetl’n wɑɑ tie wun nbɑ, k n tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «A ponŋ lɑ’u wɑɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ piɑk nɑn’ɑ nɑ.»
K juɑ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n tien’ɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑ,» ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn u tuɑnn k puki’ɔ.
K Yiesu yet ɑ: «N bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni ɑ n bu niib buut, ɑ k juɑni n nyuɑnt k bin nbɑ nyuɑn n juɑn.»
K Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ siɑb nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ gbɑt k u yet nnɑ, k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «A yɑɑ ɑ t mun tie juɑni ee?»
K u jiin’m ɑ: «L i bo i tie k i tie juɑni e, i bo kii mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ i nyuɑn nɑ, i mɔk biit.»
K Yiesu biɑ yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, nilɔ nbɑ k tɔkn peluok tɑnmɔb k kuɑ, ŋɑɑn duo juonn k kuɑ, l dɑɑnɔ e tie nɑn-yukɔ nɑn fɑt-tuɑ.
Ŋɑɑn nilɔ nbɑ tɔkn peluok nɑ tɑnmɔb k kuɑ, l dɑɑnɔ e tie pei mɑnŋ kpɑɑlk.
U i tɑnŋ i bɑɑt ɑ wun kuɑ, tɑnmɔguulɔ nɑ sɑɑ luot e, wun kuɑ, k u yi u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pei nɑ sɑnɑ, k b gbiɑ u mɔb, k u nyint’b.
U i nyinn u mɔnŋ pei kul yuo nbɑ, u tuu gɑl b tuɑnn e, k b wɑɑ u puol, k mɑɑn b mi u kunkɔl.
Ŋɑɑn b kɑn wei sɑɑmɔ ŋɑnin. B sɑɑ ciɑl, k mɑɑn b k mi u kunkɔl.»
Yiesu din puɑ’b kpɑnjɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn k b k bɑnn l pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, k u biɑ ŋɑnm k yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, min e tie peluok nɑ tɑnmɔb.
Bin nbɑ kul liit’n k bɑɑl nɑ tie nɑn-yukb e nɑn fɑt-tieb, ŋɑɑn pei nɑ k gbiɑ b mɔb.
Min e tie tɑnmɔb nɑ, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ wei’n k kuɑ, ŋuɑ e sɑɑ lɑ fielu, k sii tun gɑɑl kuɑ, k ŋmɑt nyi, k lɑɑt jeŋɑnt.
Nɑn-yukɔ bɑɑt ɑ wun jɑn k kpi k biil kuukuɑ e. Min e bɑɑl ɑ niib n lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ tie mɑnfuol nɑn bɑlmɔni.
«Min e tie pekpɑɑŋɑnŋ, k pekpɑɑŋɑnŋ e kpenn u pei pɑɑk.

Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kpɑɑl pei likli pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn k k tie pekpɑɑlk nɑn mɔni, k biɑ k yen pei nɑ, l i tie k u lɑ k *kinkɑtl tɑn bɑɑt yuo nbɑ, sie k u ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik pei nɑ, k kinkɑtl n ji bɑɑl k suol’b, k pelei nɑ n yɑt.
U tuu ciɑl e, k mɑɑn u kpɑɑl pei nɑ likli pɑɑk e, k u bɑkɑ kɑɑ pei nɑ ni.
Min e tie pekpɑɑŋɑnŋ. N Bɑɑ nbɑ mi’n, k n mun mi’u nɑ, l mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k n mi n pei, k b mun mi’n, k n sɑɑ yit n mɑnfuol sɑlk b pɑɑk.
Pelei be k tie n yɑb, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm k tie peluok mɑnŋ ni yɑb. Sie k n bɑɑl nɑn ŋɑnm mun biɑk, k b sɑɑ gbɑt n kunkɔl, k b kul ji sii tie pebuolyenŋ, k mɔk pekpɑɑyenŋ kuɑ.
«Ŋɑnn e k n Bɑɑ luon’n, k mɑɑn n yɑɑ n nyinn n mɑnfuol, k l puolpo k n biɑ sɑɑ ŋɑnm lɑ n mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
Suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ nyinn n mɑnfuol mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e yɑɑ n nyinn’l, k mɑɑn n mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ nyinn’l, k biɑ mɔk yiikuo k tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’l. Nnɑ e k n Bɑɑ yet’n ɑ n tun.»
Wɑɑ yet nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm biɑ ŋɑnm bɔkt,
k b bonciɑnn yɑɑ ɑ: «Nɑlnbiiuk be u ni, k wɑɑtuk biɑ mɔk’ɔ. Bee tien k i gbiintl u mɑɑn i?»
K lieb mun yɑɑ ɑ: «Nilɔ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk be u ni nɑ kii piɑk nnɑ. Nɑlnbiiuk sɑɑ fit nyuɑnt juɑnŋ ii?»
L puolpo e wɑɑ k b tɑn mɔk b jɑɑnm nbɑ k b tien Yennu niipuouk b jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ pɑɑk nɑ. Jɑɑnm mɑnŋ din be Selusɑɑlenm e. L yuo din tie wonfufuk yuo e,
k Yiesu din sonm lin bɑlntl nbɑ k b yi’l Sɑɑlomɔn bɑlntl nɑ ni, k l din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni.
K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm din bɑɑl k tikl k lint’ɔ, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A yɑɑ lin wei nlee wɑɑ, k tin tɑn bɑnn nɑn ɑ tie *Klistu? L i tie k ɑ tie ŋuɑ i e, fɑn yet’t bɑlmɔni.»
K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «N ponŋ dɑɑn yet’i wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k i k tien’n yɑdɑ. Tuonɑ nbɑ k n tuun nɑn n Bɑɑ yiikuo nɑ ni, ŋɑnn i wɑnt mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ.
I k tien’n yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn yɑɑ k tie n pei nɑ pɑɑk.
N pei gbiintl n kunkɔl, k n mi’b, k b wɑɑ’n,
k n tien’m mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k b kɑn mi k kpo, k suɑ biɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit fɑt’b n nuu ni.
N Bɑɑ nbɑ jii’b k tien’m n nuu ni nɑ, ŋuɑ e cie suɑ kul k suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit fɑt’b n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ nuu ni.
Min nɑn n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ tie yonm e.»
L yuo nɑ k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ tɔki tɑnɑ biɑk, ɑ bin jɑɑt’ɔ k kpi’u.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «I ponŋ lɑ k n tun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn, nbɑ k n Bɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ n tun nɑ, k tuonŋɑnɑ mɑnŋ ni, lɑnn pɑɑk e te k i ji yɑɑ i jɑɑt’n tɑnɑ ɑ?»
K b jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «T k luon k tin jɑɑt’ɑ tɑnɑ tuonŋɑnsiɑl pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn fɑɑ piɑk k biil Yennu nɑ pɑɑk. A kpɑn tie nilɔ e, ŋɑɑn yi ɑ mɔnŋ Yennu.»
K Yiesu jiin boi’b ɑ: «L k diɑn i *senni ni ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: ‹I tie yenni ee?
(k t mi nɑn Yennu kɑn fɑɑl fɑɑk fɑb ɑ, k mɑɑn Yennu yi bin nbɑ k u tul’b u mɑɑn nɑ yenni e).›
Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin, Yennu lukt’n k tun’n tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k nlee k i sɑɑ fit yet ɑ n piɑk biil Yennu e mɑɑ yet ɑ n tie Yennu Bijɑ e nɑ?
L i tie k n k tuun n Bɑɑ nɑ tuonɑ i e, ŋɑnn i dɑɑ tie’n yɑdɑ.
