Ŋɑɑn l i tie k n tuun ŋuɑ Yennu tuonɑ mɑnŋ i e, l i lek i tie k i k tien’n yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn yin tien n tuonɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ. Ŋɑnn e, k i sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑn n Bɑɑ be n ni, k n mun biɑ be u ni.»
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ nɑ tɑn yɑɑ bin suol’ɔ biɑk, k u buut nyii,
k ŋmɑt puot *Suulden kpenpuotl, k sɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ k Sɑn din tuu wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ.
K niib bonciɑnn din bɑɑl Yiesu penŋ, k din piɑk nɑn b lieb ɑ: «Sɑn ŋɑnin din k tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnsiɑl, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ kul k u din piɑk k jikt sɑɑ juɑ mɑnŋ po, l tie bɑlmɔni e.»
K niib bonciɑnn din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ lenŋ.
Tɔn, jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Betɑɑni, k u sɑnn yi Lɑɑsɑɑl, k u din tɑn yiɑl. Betɑɑni din tie Mɑɑli nɑn u niipuo Mɑɑlt duo e.
Mɑɑli e din tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ but tulɑɑli Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu tɑɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn jii u yut k fiɑl fiɑl nɑ. Ŋuɑ Mɑɑli ninjɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl e din yiɑl. Wɑɑ din tɑn yiɑl nɑ,
k u niipuob tun *tuomi ɑ wun sɑɑn k sɑɑ yet Yiesu ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ nɑɑsin-yuɑk nbɑ k ɑ mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ yiɑl e.»

Yiesu nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ k u yet u *puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Lɑɑsɑɑl nbɑ yiɑl nɑ, yiɑlu mɑnŋ k tie u mɑnfuol telk kɑɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie lin nbɑ k niib sɑɑ dont Yennu sɑnn l pɑɑk e, ɑ Yennu Bijɑ mun n lɑ dontl biɑk.»
Tɔn, Yiesu din luon Mɑɑlt nɑn Mɑɑli nɑn Lɑɑsɑɑl.
Wɑɑ gbɑt ɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl yiɑl nɑ, ŋɑɑn u din tien dɑɑ ŋɑnle k dɑɑ be lenŋ.
L puolpo e k u din tɑn yet u puolpoweitieb nɑ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin ŋmɑt sɑɑn Suude.»
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ, k *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ dɑɑn yɑɑ bin jɑɑt’ɑ tɑnɑ, k ɑ biɑ yɑɑ ɑ t ŋmɑt lenŋ ii?»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yentu tuu be yendopo mɔkmɔk nɑn yenbɑɑpo e. L i tie k nilɔ sonm yennu ni, u kɑn gbiɑt, k mɑɑn u lɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ yentu nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn u i sonm nyiɑɔk, u gbiɑtl e, k mɑɑn yentu kɑɑ u ni.»
Yiesu din yet nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn biɑ yet ɑ: «T yuɑk Lɑɑsɑɑl guɑnt e, ŋɑɑn n sɑɑ sɑɑn fiin’ɔ wɑɑ.»
K u puolpoweitieb nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k u guɑnt i e, u sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ.»
Yiesu din wɑnt k l tie ɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl kpo e, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm din mi ɑ u wɑnt ɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl guɑnt e.
L pɑɑk din te k u yet’b gbenn ɑ: «Lɑɑsɑɑl kpo wɑɑ,
ŋɑɑn i pɑɑk n mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn kɑɑ u buol ni nɑ, k mɑɑn ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k i ji fit tien’n yɑdɑ. Ŋɑɑnt tin sɑɑn u penŋ mɑn.»
K Tuomɑ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Jɑɑk nɑ, yet u lieb ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k t mun n sɑɑn mɑn. L i sii tie kuun, tinm nɑn ŋuɑ n kpo.»
Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ k suɑ bɑɑ pii Lɑɑsɑɑl, l dɑɑ ŋɑnnɑ e nɑ.
Betɑɑni din k fɔk nɑn Selusɑɑlenm. L fɔknt din tie nɑn kiiluomiɑtɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑ e.
L pɑɑk din tien k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn din bɑɑl Mɑɑlt nɑn Mɑɑli penŋ, ɑ bin mɑɑn b pɑlɑ, k mɑɑn b ninjɑ nɑ kuun pɑɑk.
Mɑɑlt nbɑ tɑn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu bɑɑt yuo nbɑ, k u nyii cet’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k Mɑɑli ŋɑnin biɑl be ŋɑɑk ni.
K Mɑɑlt yet Yiesu: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k ɑ dɑɑn bo be nnɑ nɑ, n ninjɑ nɑ dɑɑn bo kɑn kpo.
Ŋɑɑn n mi nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, l i tie k ɑ miɑl Yennu lin nbɑ kul po, u sɑɑ tul’ɑ wɑɑ.»
K u yet’ɔ: «A ninjɑ sɑɑ fiil kuun ni wɑɑ.»
K Mɑɑlt jiin’ɔ: «N mi nɑn u tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni *dulnyɑ cincɑɑtdɑɑl, dɑɑl nbɑ k kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni nɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Min e tie kuun fiilu k tie mɑnfuol. Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e sii mɔk mɑnfuol, u lek i kpo,
k dɑɑnɔ kul nbɑ mɔk mɑnfuol k tien’n yɑdɑ, u kɑn mi k kpo. A tien yɑdɑ nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
K u jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, nnn, n tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tie *Klistu nɑ, Yennu Bijɑ nbɑ bɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ.»
Mɑɑlt nbɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yiin u niipuo Mɑɑli suon nnɑ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ nɑ be nnɑ wɑɑ, k yi’ɑ.»
Mɑɑli nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k u fiil yiɑn yiɑn, k sɑɑn u buol ni.
K Yiesu din dɑɑ k bɑɑl digbɑnbik mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ be siɑn nbɑ k Mɑɑlt cet’ɔ nɑ e.
K Suifnbɑ nbɑ be nɑn Mɑɑli ŋɑɑk ni k mɑɑnt u pɑl nɑ, bɑɑ lɑ k u nyii yiɑn yiɑn nɑ, k b mun wei nyii, k mɑɑn b mi ɑ u sɑɑ kɑɑɔk buol e ɑ wun sɑɑ bui kumɔni.
Mɑɑli nbɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol k lɑ’u yuo nbɑ, k u gbɑɑn u tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l i tie k ɑ dɑɑn bo be nnɑ nɑ, n ninjɑ nɑ dɑɑn bo kɑn kpo.»
K Yiesu lɑ k u mɔ, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ wei’ɔ k bɑɑl nɑ, k b mun mɔ, k ninbɑɑɔk suol’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u kuli u pɑl ni.
K u boi’b «I pii’u liɑ po e?» K b yet’ɔ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bɑɑt k tɑn got.»
K Yiesu sikn nyin-nyuut.
K Suifnbɑ nɑ yet ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, wɑɑ jiɑ luon Lɑɑsɑɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
K siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ nyuɑnt juɑnŋ nɑ, u dɑɑn bo kɑn fit te k Lɑɑsɑɑl dɑɑ kpenn ii?»
K Yiesu pɑl biɑ ŋɑnm biil bonciɑnn, k u bɑɑl kɑɑɔk nɑ buol ni. Kɑɑɔk nɑ din tie tɑnfiɑɔk o, k kɑtɑnu bii l mɔb.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Biitl kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ mɑn.» K Mɑɑlt wun nbɑ tie kpiemɔ nɑ niipuo, yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l sii pɔi hei, k mɑɑn bɑɑ pii’u, l dɑɑ ŋɑnnɑ e nɑ.»
K Yiesu boi’ɔ: «N bo k yet’ɑ ɑ l i tie k ɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, ɑ sɑɑ lɑ Yennu *yudɑnt ɑɑ?»
Ŋɑnn e k b biit kɑɑɔk nɑ. K Yiesu gokt sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, n tien’ɑ niipuouk nɑn fɑɑ sɑk n miɑlu nɑ.
N mi nɑn yuo kul ɑ sɑɑk n miɑlu, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yet nnɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn n luon k nibul nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ n gbɑt k tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tun’n.»
Wɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yiin sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Lɑɑsɑɑl, nyimin nɑ.»
K kpiemɔ nɑ nyii, k u tɑɑ nɑn u nii k l fin fin nɑn kɑtinŋ, k cincenn buob u nunm po. K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Fintl kɑtinŋ mɑnŋ k ŋɑɑ’u.»
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn nbɑ din bɑɑl ɑ bin fuont Mɑɑli nɑ, lɑ lin nbɑ k Yiesu tun, k b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑɑn b siɑb sɑɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’b lin nbɑ k Yiesu tun.
L pɑɑk k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ mɑnŋ nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm yiin tintɑɑnkɑɑnu, k b tikl, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «T sɑɑ tien nlee? K mɑɑn juɑ mɑnŋ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn.
T i ŋɑɑn k u ŋɑnmt k tuun nnɑ k puki, suɑ kul sɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ wɑɑ, k Luonm tieb n bɑɑl k yiel Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ buont t niib.»
K b yenɔ, wun nbɑ yi *Kɑɑyiif, k tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ l binn ni nɑ, yet’b ɑ: «Yinm ŋɑnin k mi siɑl.
I k mi nɑn l ŋɑn k niyenɔ kuɑ n gɑɑl niib nɑ kul ɑ pɑɑk k kpo, k gɑl k t niib kul n buont ii?»
U din k pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ nɑn u mɔnŋ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ din tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ binn mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k Yennu te k u pɑk bunt buntl, ɑ Yiesu tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl Suifnbɑ nɑ pɑɑk k kpo,
k l k tie Suifnbɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl b pɑɑk k kpo, ŋɑɑn nɑn bin nbɑ kul tie Yennu niib k yɑt be tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ e k u sɑɑ gɑɑl b pɑɑk k kpo, ɑ bin tɑɑn nɑn lieb yonm.
K l dɑɑl mɑnŋ k jii sɑɑ k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ lol suol ɑ bin kpi Yiesu.
L pɑɑk k u ji din k sonm pɑɑnu ni Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni, ŋɑɑn k tɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn duo nbɑ k b yi Eflɑiinm, k l kpiɑ nɑn pɑɑnpieonŋ nɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb ji be lenŋ.
Suifnbɑ *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nbɑ tɑn pel nɑ, k niib bonciɑnn nyii digbɑnɑ k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, ɑ bin sɑɑ mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k ŋɑnm b mɔnŋ.
K niib nɑ din luon Yiesu. Bɑɑ tikl Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «I duki nlee? U mɑntk kɑn bɑɑl jɑɑnm nɑ ɑmi?»
K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ tul mɔb ɑ: «Wun nbɑ mi u buol, wun bɑɑl k tɑn ŋmɑɑ t tɑɑl k tin suol’ɔ.»
Tɔn, dɑɑ ŋɑnluob din tɑn biɑl nɑn *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm n di, k Yiesu bɑɑl Betɑɑni, duo nbɑ k Lɑɑsɑɑl be nɑ. Ŋuɑ e k Yiesu din fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ.
Lenŋ e k b din tien jiet, k Mɑɑlt jii k tul’b, k Lɑɑsɑɑl din tie b ni yenɔ nbɑ din kɑl k di nɑn’m.

K Mɑɑli jii tulɑɑli liitjinn, lin nbɑ yɑɑ dɑɑɔk pɑɑl bonciɑnn. B din jii fɑɑt nbɑ k b yi’l nɑlt e k tien tulɑɑli mɑnŋ, k u jii’l k but Yiesu tɑɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn suol u mɔnŋ yut k fiɑl fiɑl, k ŋɑɑk nɑ ji nubl nɑn tulɑɑli nɑ gbinm.
K Yiesu *puolpoweitɔyenɔ, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt, (ŋuɑ e din tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ wun tɑn kuɑt Yiesu nɑ,) k u yet ɑ:
«Bee tien k b bo k kɔi tulɑɑli mɑnŋ denienbɑ kobi ŋɑntɑ (300) k jii l likli k tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm i?»
Wɑɑ din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, l din k tie ɑ u bɑkɑ be tɑlɑs-dɑnm nɑ ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din tie nɑn-yukɔ e. ŋuɑ e din tie wun nbɑ diɑ likli pɑkl k tuu jɑɑn.
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt’ɔ. U tien nnɑ k l tie n kuun siil tienu e.
Tɑlɑs-dɑnm e sii tun be nɑn’i yuo kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin kii tun be nnɑ kɑɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k *Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn gbɑt ɑ Yiesu be Betɑɑni, k b sɑɑn lenŋ. B din k sɑɑn Yiesu pɑɑk kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn b din luon k bin sɑɑ lɑ Lɑɑsɑɑl e mun, wun nbɑ k Yiesu fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ.
L pɑɑk e tien k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm din loln lolɑ ɑ bin kpi Lɑɑsɑɑl mun biɑk,
k mɑɑn u kuun fiilu pɑɑk e k *Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn din nyik Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn wei Yiesu k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
L yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk o k nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm ɑ bin di *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nɑ gbɑt ɑ Yiesu bɑɑt.

K b ji ŋɑt biɑbfɑɑt k cet ɑ bin tuok’ɔ, k yikn wuyikni sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ k yɑɑ ɑ: «Hosɑnɑ, Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be dɑɑnɔ nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk. Yennu n yɑt u yetŋɑnm Islɑɑeltieb Kpɑnbɑl pɑɑk.»
K Yiesu din lɑ bonbik e k jɑk k bɑɑt, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ
ɑ: « *Siiɔn duo tieb, i dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Gotl mɑn, i Kpɑnbɑl e jɑk bonbik k bɑɑt nɑ.»

K u puolpoweitieb din dɑɑ k bɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk l yuo mɑnŋ. Ŋɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ din tɑn lɑ dontl nɑ, l yuo e k b ji din tiɑl nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k jikt sɑɑ u po e, k biɑ tiɑl nɑn niib nɑ mun set din tien’ɔ nnɑ e.
Nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ din be nɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ k u yiin Lɑɑsɑɑl ɑ wun nyi kɑɑɔk ni ŋɑɑn fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ, k din muɑntl lin nbɑ k b lɑ nɑ.
L pɑɑk e te k niib bonciɑnn din cet’ɔ, k mɑɑn bɑɑ gbɑt k u tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnn mɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ yien b lieb ɑ: «Gotl mɑn. T ji kɑn fit tun siɑl. I k lɑ ɑɑ? Tingbounŋ nɑ niib kul ɑ wɑɑ’u e.»
Niib nbɑ din sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm ɑ bin sɑɑ di *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm nɑ, k Glek siɑb din be b ni,
k b tɑn sɑɑn Fiiliip penŋ, wun nbɑ nyii Betsɑidɑ nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ, k b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, t luon k t lɑ Yiesu.»
K Fiiliip sɑɑn k sɑɑ yet Andle, k Andle nɑn Fiiliip ji sɑɑn k yet Yiesu.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ donn *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, l i tie k b k bul dibinn tinŋ ni, l kɑn kpo. L sii tie dibin-yenml e. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k b bul’l k l kpo, l sɑɑ pɑ e k nɑn dii bonciɑnn.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ deki u mɑnfuol tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ’l e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ yit u mɑnfuol sɑlk tingbounŋ nɑ ni, u sii diɑ’l k l tɑn sii tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon wuu tuun n tuonn, sie k u wɑɑ’n, k mɑɑ tɑn sii be siɑn nbɑ, k n tuontunnɔ mun tɑn sii be lenŋ. N Bɑɑ sɑɑ donn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tuun n tuonn.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet ɑ: «N mɔk pɑlbiil bonciɑnn. N sɑɑ pɑk bee? N sɑɑ yet ɑ: ‹N Bɑɑ, nyint’n lin nbɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk nɑ ni ɑmi ii?› Aɑi, k mɑɑn ŋɑnn e te k n bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni k di fɑlɑ mɑnŋ.
N Bɑɑ, ŋɑɑnt k ɑ sɑnn n lɑ dontl.» Ŋɑnn e k kunkɔl pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ: «N sɑnn ponŋ lɑ dontl ɑ, k biɑ sɑɑ ŋɑnm lɑ dontl k pukn.»
Niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din sie lenŋ nɑ din gbɑt kunkɔl mɑnŋ, k b yɑɑ ɑ: «L tie sɑtiɑni e,» k siɑb yɑɑ ɑ: « *Mɑlɑkɑ e piɑk nɑn’ɔ.»
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «L k tie n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pɑɑk kɑɑ k kunkɔl mɑnŋ pɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie i tiɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e.
Yuo nbɑ k Yennu yɑɑ wun tɑn bu tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb buut nɑ, l yuo bɑɑt, k u biɑ sɑɑ bel wun nbɑ tie tingbounŋ nɑ bɑt.
B i tɑnŋ i jii’n k donn’n sɑnpɑɑpo yuo nbɑ, n sɑɑ te k niib kul n bɑɑl n buol.»
U mɑɑn nɑ din wɑnt wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ kpo biɑnŋ nbɑ e.
K nibul nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «T *senni ni wɑnt’t ɑ *Klistu nɑ sii mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Nlee k ɑ yet ɑ b sɑɑ jii Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ nɑ k donn’ɔ? Ŋmee tie Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ mɑnŋ i?»
K u jiin yet’b ɑ: «Yentu nɑ sii be i buol wɑɑnm-nnɑ e. L pɑɑk, ii sonm mɑn yentu mɑnŋ ni, lɑɑ dɑɑ be nɑ, k bunbɔnn dɑɑ bɑɑt’i, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ sonm bunbɔnn ni, u k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ po.
Tient yentu nɑ yɑdɑ mɑn, lɑɑ dɑɑ be i sinsuuk ni nɑ k kpɑnt yentu wɑɑs e.» Yiesu nbɑ din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ puolpo e, ŋɑɑn k u nyii niib nɑ ni, k sɑɑn bɔl.
U lek din tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn b nunm ni, ŋɑɑn b din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ,
ɑ *Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi mɑɑn nɑ n ji fit gbie nɑn lɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋmee gɑɑl t mɑɑn i? ŋmee k Yennu jii u pɑnŋ k fiit wɑnn’ɔ?»
B din k fit tien yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn Esɑɑyi biɑ din yet ɑ:
«Yennu e tien’m juɑni, k biɑ te k b gbɑl bɑnnu, ɑ k b ninbinɑ dɑɑ lɑɑt, k b yɑn ni dɑɑ bɑnt l pɑɑk, k b dɑɑ fit bɑɑt n buol ni, k mɑn teb’b.»
Esɑɑyi din yet nnɑ, k mɑɑn u din lɑ Yiesu *yudɑnt e, k din piɑk u po.
Ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm bonciɑnn gbɑɑ din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn b k nyinn b mɔnŋ pɑɑnu ni ɑ b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn b tiin jɑŋmɑɑni ɑ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ sɑɑ nyinn’b Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni,
k mɑɑn b din luon niib n pɑk’b e, k gɑl Yennu n pɑk’b.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu tɑn pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, u k tien min kuukuɑ kɑɑ yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn u mun tien wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e yɑdɑ.
Wun nbɑ lɑɑt’n, u lɑɑt wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ e mun.
N bɑɑl tingbounŋ ni nɑ mɑɑ mii tei yentl niib e, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, u kɑn biɑl bunbɔnn ni.
K biɑ jen ɑ, wun nbɑ gbɑt n mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn k k sɑk, min kɑɑ sɑɑ bu u buut k biil’ɔ, k mɑɑn n k bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni mɑɑ n tɑn bu u buut k biil’ɔ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n bɑɑl mɑɑ n tɑn fiel *dulnyɑ e.
K wun nbɑ yien’n k k sɑɑk n mɑɑn nɑ, lenŋ e k u sɑɑ lɑ lin nbɑ sɑɑ bu k biil’ɔ. Mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk nɑ tɑn sɑɑ bu nɑn’ɔ dulnyɑ cincɑɑtdɑɑl.
N k piɑk nɑn n tiɑɔnŋ yiikuo kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n nɑ yet’n mɑɑ sɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ nɑn mɑɑ sɑɑ wɑnn lin nbɑ.
N mi nɑn lin nbɑ k u wɑnn’n tien niib mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e. Ŋɑnn, lin nbɑ k n piɑk nɑ, l tie lin nbɑ k n Bɑɑ wɑnn’n e.»

Yuo nbɑ k *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm ji din k fɔk, k Yiesu din mi nɑn yuo nɑ e k u sɑɑ nyi tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k ŋmɑt u Bɑɑ penŋ. U din luon u tiɑɔnŋ *puolpoweitieb nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k biɑ din luon’m nɑn wɑɑ tɑn gbenn u tuonɑ.
L yuo nɑ k ŋuɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb din di jiet, k *Sɑɑtɑn ponŋ din dɔnŋ k te k Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt wun nbɑ tie Siimɔn bik nɑ dukn ɑ u sɑɑ kuɑt Yiesu.
Ŋɑɑn Yiesu ŋɑnin din mi nɑn u Bɑɑ tul’ɔ bont kul u nuu ni wɑɑ, k biɑ din mi nɑn u nyii u Bɑɑ penŋ e, k biɑ sɑɑ ŋmɑt u penŋ ɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k u fiil jiet pɑɑk, k liɑt u liɑtfuouk k bil, ŋɑɑn jii nunfiɑnŋ, k gbɑb u siɑk ni,
ŋɑɑn jii nyun k wɑt tien tɑtlɑɑɔk ni, k piin fobtl u puolpoweitieb tɑɑ, ŋɑɑn tuu suol nunfiɑnŋ nbɑ k u gbɑb nɑ k fiɑl b tɑɑ.
K u tɑn bɑɑl Siimɔn Piɑl penŋ. K Piɑl boi’ɔ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ yɑɑ ɑ fobt n tɑɑ e mun ii?»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ, ɑ dɑɑ k bɑnn mɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ɑ sɑɑ bɑnn ɑ.»
K Piɑl yet’ɔ: «Min ŋɑnin ponŋ, ɑ kɑn mi k fobt n tɑɑ fɑb ɑ.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mi i kii fobt ɑ tɑɑ, min nɑn fin sɑɑ jiɑl muɑnu e.»
Ŋɑnn e jik k Siimɔn Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, dɑɑ fobtl n tɑɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn fobtl n nii nɑn n yul kul ɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ ponŋ wul nyun, l dɑɑnɔ ji k mɔk jɑknt. L pɑɑk, l k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn wun ŋɑnm k wul biɑk, sie k wun fobt u tɑɑ e. I ji k mɔk jɑknt, ŋɑɑn l k tie i kul ɑ kɑɑ.»
Yiesu ponŋ din mi wun nbɑ sɑɑ kuɑt’ɔ nɑ. L pɑɑk e te k u din yet yɑɑ ɑ: «L k tie i kul ɑ kɑɑ k mɔk jɑknt.»
Yiesu nbɑ fobt b tɑɑ k gbenn yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u ji jii u liɑtfuouk nɑ k liɑ, ŋɑɑn jen kɑl jiet nɑ buol, ŋɑɑn boi’b ɑ: «I mi mɑɑ tun lin nbɑ k tul’i nɑ pɑɑk ii?
I yi’n ɑ n tie i Wɑntuɑ e, ɑ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k i mɔk mɔni, k mɑɑn n set tie nnɑ e.
Tɔn, k min nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn Wɑntuɑ, ŋɑɑn tɑn fobt i tɑɑ nɑ, l mun ŋɑn k ii fobtl i lieb tɑɑ,
k mɑɑn n wɑnn’i nyinn e nɑ, k ii mun i tuun nnɑ mɑn nɑn mɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ k tul’i nɑ.
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, tuontunnɔ k cie u dɑɑnɔ, k tuomu mun k cie wun nbɑ tun’ɔ nɑ.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ l i tie k i ji mi lin nbɑ nɑ, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e l i tie k i tuun nnɑ.»

«N k piɑk i kul ɑ po kɑɑ. N mi yinm nbɑ k n gɑnn’i nɑ pɑlɑ ni. Ŋɑɑn l tie k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni n gbie ɑ: ‹Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k min nɑn ŋuɑ lɑkn di pɑɑnu nɑ, ŋuɑ e yɑɑ wun kuɑt’n.› Sie k diɑni nɑ fɑbl tien mɔni k gbien.
N yien’i lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, k suɑ l dɑɑ k tien, k l i tei tien gbenn yuo nbɑ, k yin tien yɑdɑ nɑn n set tie mɑɑ tie wun nbɑ e.
«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ gɑɑl n tuomu, u gɑɑl min e, k wun nbɑ gɑɑl min nɑ, u gɑɑl wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ mun e.»
Yiesu nbɑ din yet nnɑ puolpo e, k pɑlbiil bɑɑl’ɔ bonciɑnn, k u yet’b ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i ni yenɔ sɑɑ kuɑt’n ɑ.»
K l ŋmɑt b yɑn, nɑn wɑɑ yien wun nbɑ i e, k b jiɑntl goli b lieb.
B ni yenɔ nbɑ k Yiesu mɑntk din luon’ɔ nɑ kɑl kpiɑ’u.
K Siimɔn Piɑl kɑbint’ɔ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Boin’mɔ k lɑɑn u yien ŋmɑ po e.»
K u puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ dɔnn nɑkn’ɔ, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, l tie ŋmee?»
K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Mi i tei ŋmit pɑɑnu k tun suk kpint ni k tul wun nbɑ, yin bɑnn nɑn l dɑɑnɔ e nɑ.» Ŋɑnn e k u ŋmit pɑɑnu nɑ k suk kpint ni, k jii k tul Suudɑ wun nbɑ tie Siimɔn Iskɑɑliɑɔt bijɑ nɑ.
Suudɑ nbɑ din gɑɑl pɑɑnu mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Sɑɑtɑn kuɑ u ni. K Yiesu ji yet’ɔ: «Tient fɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ tien lin nbɑ yiɑn yiɑn.»
Ŋɑɑn b suɑ din k bɑnn lin nbɑ k Yiesu pɑk’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
K mɑɑn Suudɑ nbɑ din tuu diɑ likli pɑkl nɑ, b siɑb din duki mi ɑ Yiesu tun’ɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn sɑɑ dɑɑ jɑɑnm nɑ jiet e, ɑmi u yet’ɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn tul tɑlɑs-dɑnm e likli.
Suudɑ nbɑ din gɑɑl pɑɑnu nɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, l tonton nɑ k u fiil nyii. L din tie nyiɑɔk o.
Suudɑ nbɑ din nyii nɑ puolpo, k Yiesu yet u puolpoweitieb ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ e k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ sɑɑ lɑ dontl, k n ni e Yennu mun sɑɑ lɑ dontl biɑk.
L i tie k Yennu lɑ dontl u ni, l kɑn wei i k u mun sɑɑ te k Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ n lɑ dontl u ni.
«N wɑɑs, n ji kɑn wei nɑn’i bonciɑnn. I tɑn sɑɑ lon’n, ŋɑɑn n sɑɑ wɑnn’i nɑn mɑɑ yet *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ɑ i kɑn fit bɑɑl siɑn nbɑ k n sɑɑ nɑ.»
«Mɔtɑɑnɑ n tien’i senpɑɑnu e, ɑ ii luon i lieb mɑn. Mɑɑ luon’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ii mun i luon i lieb nnɑ.
L i tie k i luon i lieb, suɑ kul sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn i tie n puolpoweitieb e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Siimɔn Piɑl boi’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tɑn sɑɑn lee?» K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ, i kɑn fit wei mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑɑn l puolpo i sɑɑ wei’n ɑ.»
K Piɑl biɑ boi’ɔ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bee tien k n kɑn fit wei’ɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ? Min ŋɑnin ponŋ tien siil nɑn k n gɑɑl ɑ pɑɑk k kpo.»
K Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «A set tien siil nɑn mɔni nɑn k ɑ gɑɑl n pɑɑk k kpo oo? Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, kojouk dɑɑ tɑn kɑn bui dɑɑnn, k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ noi tɑɑl muntɑ ɑ ɑ k mi’n.»
«I dɑɑ te k i yɑn put. Tient Yennu yɑdɑ, k mun tien’n yɑdɑ.
Diet bonciɑnn be n Bɑɑ ŋɑɑk ni. L i bo i kii tie bɑlmɔni, n bo kɑn yet’i ni, k mɑɑn n kun ɑ sɑɑ tien i diet mɑnŋ siil e.
K mi i kun k sɑɑ tien i diet nɑ siil k gbenn, n biɑ sɑɑ jen ɑ k tɑn jii’i, k i mun tɑn sii be siɑn nbɑ k n tɑn sii be nɑ.
I mi mɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ, k biɑ mi l sɔnu.»
K Tuomɑ boi’ɔ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, t k mi fɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn. Nlee k t sɑɑ bɑnn l sɔnu?»
K Yiesu jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Min e tie sɔnu nɑ, k biɑ tie mɔmɔnm, k biɑ tie mɑnfuol. Suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ bɑɑl n Bɑɑ buol ni, k l k tie k u sint bɑɑl’n.
L i bo i tie k i mi’n, i biɑ bo sii mi n Bɑɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ k jikt sɑɑ, i ji mi’u k biɑ lɑɑt’ɔ.»
K Fiiliip yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wɑnt’t ɑ Bɑɑ mɑnŋ, k t pɑlɑ n pɑɑk.»
K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Fiiliip, n ponŋ be nɑn’i k l wei wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k ɑ dɑɑ k mi’n ii? Wun nbɑ lɑ’n, u set lɑ n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ e nɑ. K bee k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ n wɑnn’i n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ i?
A k tien yɑdɑ nɑn n be n Bɑɑ ni e, k n Bɑɑ mun be n ni ii? Mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk k tul’i nɑ, l k nyii n ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l nyii n Bɑɑ Yennu buol e. Ŋuɑ e be n ni k tuun u tuonɑ mɑnŋ.
Tient’n yɑdɑ nɑn n be n Bɑɑ ni, k n Bɑɑ mun be n ni. L i kii tie nnɑ biɑk, yin tien yɑdɑ tuonɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
«Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’n yɑdɑ, u sii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑn mɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ mɑnŋ gbɑɑ sɑɑ gɑl n yɑl ɑ, k mɑɑn n sɑɑ n Bɑɑ buol e.
K lin nbɑ kul k i sii mei’ɔ l po n sɑnn ni, n sɑɑ tun’ɑ, ɑ k ŋuɑ Yennu n lɑ dontl n pɑɑk.
K l i tie k i mei’ɔ lin nbɑ kul po n sɑnn ni, n sɑɑ tun ɑ.»
«L i tie k i luon’n, i sii sɑɑk n mɔb,
k n sɑɑ miɑl n Bɑɑ k u sɑɑ tul’i sonmtɔluɑ, k u sii be nɑn’i yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Ŋuɑ e tie Foŋɑnm nbɑ wɑnt bɑlmɔni. Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb k fit gɑɑl’ɔ, k mɑɑn b k lɑɑt’ɔ, k biɑ k mi’u, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin mi’u, k mɑɑn u be nɑn’i, k biɑ sii be i ni.
«N kɑn nyik’i, k i tie kpiebi. N sɑɑ jen i penŋ nɑ.
K l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb ji kɑn lɑ’n, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin biɑ sɑɑ lɑ’n ɑ. Mɑɑ mɔk mɑnfuol nɑ, k i mun sii mɔk mɑnfuol.
L dɑɑl i bɑɑl, i tɑn sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn n be n Bɑɑ ni e, k i mun biɑ be n ni, k n mun be i ni.
«Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ mɔk n *senni k biɑ sɑɑk’l, l dɑɑnɔ e luon’n. N Bɑɑ Yennu sii luon wun nbɑ luon’n, k n mun sii luon’ɔ, k sɑɑ fiit n mɔnŋ k wɑnn’ɔ.»
K Suudɑ, (l k tie Suudɑ Iskɑɑliɑɔt kɑɑ) boi’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bee tien k ɑ sɑɑ fiit ɑ mɔnŋ k wɑnn’t, ŋɑɑn kɑn fiit ɑ mɔnŋ k tul tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb i?»
K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon’n, u sii sɑɑk n mɑɑn, k n Bɑɑ sii luon’ɔ, k min nɑn n Bɑɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl u buol k sii tun be u ni.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k luon’n, u k sɑɑk n mɑɑn, k yɑɑ gbɑt mɑɑn nbɑ nɑ, l k tie n yɑl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie n Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n nɑ yɑl e.
«N yien’i mɑɑn nbɑ nɑ, mɑɑ dɑɑ be nɑn’i nɑ,
ŋɑɑn k n Bɑɑ sɑɑ tun sonmtuɑ i buol, n sɑnn ni. L sonmtuɑ e tie Foŋɑnm nɑ. Ŋuɑ e sɑɑ wɑnn’i mɑɑn kul, k biɑ sɑɑ tiɑl’i lin nbɑ kul k n ponŋ yet’i.
«N tien’i mɑnu e. N pi’i piini nbɑ tie n mɑnu e. N k tul’i nɑn tingbounŋ ŋɑɑtieb nbɑ tuu tul b lieb bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ. I dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbiil. I biɑ dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni.
I ponŋ gbɑt k n yet’i ɑ: ‹N yɑɑtl e, ŋɑɑn n biɑ sɑɑ jen i buol ni nɑ.› L i tie k i luon’n i e, i sii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɑɑ sɑɑ n Bɑɑ Yennu buol ni nɑ, k mɑɑn n Bɑɑ cie’n.
«N yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, k suɑ l dɑɑ k tien, k yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ tien e wɑɑ, k yin tien yɑdɑ.
N kɑn pɑk nɑn’i k wei, k mɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ bɑɑt. U k mɔk n yiikuo,
ŋɑɑn l tie k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb n bɑnn nɑn n luon n Bɑɑ nɑn mɔni, k n mun tuun lin nbɑ k u yet’n ɑ n tun. «Fiit mɑn k tin yɑɑt mɑn.»
«Min e tie bɑlmɔni tiik nbɑ k b yi *fiinyɑ nɑ, k n Bɑɑ Yennu tie l ŋɑnmtuɑ,
k u tuu cuɑ yiini kul nbɑ gɑɑ n pɑɑk ŋɑɑn k k luon luɑnɑ nɑ. Ŋɑɑn yiini kul nbɑ ŋɑnin luon luɑnɑ nɑ, u tuu gbɑt gbɑt ŋɑnn e, k lin ŋɑnm k lon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ, yinm e tie niŋɑnm, mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk k tul’i nɑ pɑɑk.
Ii gɑɑ n pɑɑk mɑn, k n sii be i ni. Tiik yiinu kɑn fit lon luɑnɑ u kuukuɑ, sie k u gɑɑ tiik pɑɑk. I mun kɑn fit lon luɑnɑ, sie k i gɑɑ n pɑɑk.
«Min e tie tiik mɑnŋ, k yinm e tie l yiini. Wun nbɑ gɑɑ n pɑɑk, k n mun be u ni, ŋuɑ e sii luon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn mi i kɑɑ i ni, i kɑn fit tun siɑl.
Wun nbɑ k gɑɑ n pɑɑk, u nɑɑn nɑn tiik yiinu nbɑ k b cuɑ’l k lu k l kuol nɑ e. L tiik yiinbuolu e k b tuu tikl k juo muu nɑ.
L i tie k i tun gɑɑ n pɑɑk, k n mɑɑn nɑ be i ni, miɑt lin nbɑ kul k i luon, k i sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ.
L i tie k i luon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn, ŋɑnn e sɑɑ wɑnn nɑn i set tie n *puolpoweitieb nɑn bɑlmɔni, k n Bɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ dontl.
«N Bɑɑ nbɑ luon’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, n mun luon’i l biɑnŋ e. Ii gɑɑ n pɑɑk, k n lonm sii be i ni.
L i tie k i sɑɑk n mɔb, n lonm sii be i ni, nɑn mɑɑ sɑɑk n Bɑɑ mɔb, k u lonm mun be n ni nɑ.»
«N pɑk nɑ k tul’i, ɑ n pɑlpienn i be i ni e, k i pɑlpienn n gbie.
Nɑ e tie n *senni k n senn k tul’i, mɑɑ ii luon i lieb nɑn mɑɑ luon yinm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Lonjɑɑnsiɑl kɑɑ k gɑl nilɔ n sɑk k gɑɑl u yuɑsnbɑ pɑɑk k kpo.
«L i tie k i tuun mɑɑ yien’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, i tie n yuɑsnbɑ e.
N ji kɑn yiin’i tuontunnɑ, k mɑɑn tuontunnɔ k mi u Yonmdɑɑnɔ dudukt. Mɑɑ yi’i n yuɑsnbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn lɑbɑɑl kul nbɑ k n gbɑt n Bɑɑ penŋ nɑ, ŋɑnn e k n wɑnn’i.
Yinm kɑɑ gɑnn’n, ŋɑɑn min e gɑnn’i, k tul’i tuonɑ mɑɑ ii sɑɑ kii luon luɑnɑ bonciɑnn, luɑnɑ nbɑ sii be mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔkmɔk, ɑ n Bɑɑ Yennu n tul’i lin nbɑ k i miɑl’ɔ n sɑnn ni.
Lin nbɑ nɑ e k n pɑk senn k tul’i, mɑɑ ii luon i lieb mɑn.
«Tɔn, l i tɑnŋ i tie k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb nɑn’i, yin bɑnn nɑn b ponŋ nɑn min e wɑɑ.

L i bo i tie k i tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑk niib i e, tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb bo sii luon’i nɑn bɑɑ luon b mɔnŋ niib biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e. Ŋɑɑn n gɑnn’i k nyinn’i tingbounŋ nɑ niib ni wɑɑ, k i ji k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb yɑb. L pɑɑk e tien k b nɑn’i.
Ii tiɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk’i nɑ mɑn, ɑ: ‹Tuontunnɔ kɑɑ k cie u cɑnbɑɑ.› B i muks’n, b mun sɑɑ muks’i wɑɑ, k b i sɑk n mɑɑn, b mun biɑ sɑɑ sɑk i mɑɑn ɑ.
B set sɑɑ muks’i n sɑnn pɑɑk k mɑɑn b k mi wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ.
«Mi ii dinŋ ii kii sik k tɑn pɑk k tul’b, b bo kii mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ sɔnsɑu ji kɑɑ k b sɑɑ fit bɔl b biit.
Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ nɑn’n, u nɑn n Bɑɑ e mun.
Mi i bo kii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k suɑ dɑɑ k mi tun nɑ b buol ni, b biɑ bo kii mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ b lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn nɑn min nɑn n Bɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ tien ɑ lin gbie lin nbɑ diɑn b senni ni ɑ: ‹B nɑn’n, ŋɑɑn k l k mɔk pɑɑk.›
«N sɑɑ tun sonmtuɑ i penŋ, wun nbɑ tie Foŋɑnm k wɑnt bɑlmɔni nɑ. U nyi n Bɑɑ buol e k sii piɑk n po.
K i mun sii tie n *siɑlɑ, k mɑɑn i ponŋ tun be nɑn’n, lɑɑ din nyii yuo nbɑ k n din piin k tuun n tuonn nɑ.
«N wɑnt’i lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ i dɑɑ buol i yɑdɑ ni e.
B tɑn sɑɑ yuɑ nyinn’i *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni. K yuo bɑɑt k wun nbɑ tɑn kpi’i, u sii duki mi ɑ u tuun nnɑ k tien Yennu e.
B tɑn sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ nɑ k tul’i wɑɑ, k mɑɑn b din k mi n Bɑɑ k biɑ k mi’n.
Ŋɑɑn n yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ, ɑ l yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, k yin ji fit tiɑl n mɑɑn nbɑ k n pɑk’i nɑ.» «N din k yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ sinsinn, k mɑɑn min nɑn yinm e tuu be.
Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n sɑɑ wun nbɑ tun’n nɑ penŋ e. Ŋɑɑn i suɑ k boi’n k lɑɑn n sɑɑ lee.
Ŋɑɑn mɑɑ yien’i lin nbɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ pɑɑk, k i ji mɔk pɑlbiil bonciɑnn.
N yien’i bɑlmɔni e, nɑn l ŋɑn i po nɑn k n yɑɑt sɑɑn, k mɑɑn mi i kii sɑɑn, sonmtuɑ nɑ kɑn bɑɑl i penŋ. Ŋɑɑn mi i tɑnŋ i sɑɑn, n sɑɑ tun’ɔ i penŋ nɑ.
«U i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ wɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ e k jiin biit po, k biɑ kpɑnn b mɔnŋ k jiin lin nbɑ ŋɑn po, k biɑ kpɑnn b mɔnŋ k jiin Yennu bɑlbunu po.
U sɑɑ wɑnn’b ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ e k jiin biit po, k mɑɑn b k tien’n yɑdɑ.
U sɑɑ wɑnn’b ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ k jiin lin nbɑ ŋɑn po, k mɑɑn n ji sɑɑ n Bɑɑ penŋ e k i ji kɑn lɑ’n.
U sɑɑ wɑnn’b ɑ b kpɑnn b mɔnŋ e k jiin Yennu bɑlbunu po, k mɑɑn u ponŋ bu tingbounŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ buut k biil’ɔ wɑɑ.
«Mɑɑn be bonciɑnn k n bo sɑɑ pɑk’i, ŋɑɑn i kɑn fit gɑɑl’l mɔtɑɑnɑ.

Foŋɑnm nbɑ wɑnt bɑlmɔni nɑ, u i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ wɑnn’i bɑlmɔni kul wɑnnu wɑɑ. K mɑɑn u tɑn kii piɑk u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ po kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tɑn sii wɑnt’i lin nbɑ k u gbiɑ, k biɑ sii yien’i lin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑ.
U sii dont n sɑnn, k mɑɑn u tɑn sii jikt lin nbɑ kul tie n yɑl e k wɑnt’i.
Lin nbɑ kul k n Bɑɑ mɔk tie n yɑl e. Ŋɑnn e te k n yet ɑ u sii jikt lin nbɑ tie n yɑl e k wɑnt’i.»
«L i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ i ji kɑn lɑ’n, ŋɑɑn l i biɑ kii yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, i biɑ sɑɑ lɑ’n ɑ.»
K u *puolpoweitesiɑb boi b lieb ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk tie bee? K u yɑɑ ɑ l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ɑ t kɑn lɑ’u, ɑ ŋɑɑn l i biɑ kii yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, ɑ t sɑɑ lɑ’u wɑɑ. K u biɑ yɑɑ ɑ k mɑɑn u sɑɑ u Bɑɑ penŋ e.
‹L i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ› pɑɑk tie bee? T k mi wɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.»
K Yiesu bɑnn nɑn b yɑɑ bin boi’ɔ buboit e. L pɑɑk e te k u boi’b ɑ: «Mɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ l i yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ i kɑn lɑ’n, k biɑ yɑɑ ɑ l i biɑ yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ i sɑɑ lɑ’n ɑ nɑ, i boi i lieb e ɑ i bɑnn l pɑɑk ii?
Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, i tɑn sii fɑbn k mɔ, ŋɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb ŋɑnin tɑn sii mɔk pɑlpienn e. I sii mɔk pɑlbiil, ŋɑɑn l puolpo k i pɑlbiil mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ tunn k tien pɑlpienn.

«L tie nɑn puo nbɑ tuu yɑɑ wun mɑl, k mɔk pɑlbiil nɑ e, k mɑɑn u fɑlɑ yuo bɑɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn u i tɑnŋ i mɑl bik yuo nbɑ, u ji tuu tɑnm u fɑlɑ nɑ po e, ŋɑɑn ji mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn wɑɑ mɑl bik tingbounŋ ni nɑ pɑɑk.
L tɑn sii tie i mun nnɑ e. Mɔtɑɑnɑ yɑɑ mɔk pɑlbiil nɑ, ŋɑɑn n biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’i wɑɑ, k i pɑlɑ tɑn sɑɑ penn bonciɑnn, k suɑ kɑɑ k tɑn sɑɑ nyinn pɑlpienn mɑnŋ i ni.
«L yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, i tɑn kɑn boi’n buboit. Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’i nɑ, lin nbɑ kul k i mei n Bɑɑ nɑn n sɑnn ni, u sɑɑ tul’i wɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, i dɑɑ k mi miɑl’ɔ bonsiɑl nɑn n sɑnn ni. Ii mei’ɔ mɑn, k i sɑɑ lɑ, k ji fit lɑ pɑlpienn k sɑɑ yɑkl.»
«N ponŋ tuu puɑn’i kpɑnjɑn e, ŋɑɑn yuo bɑɑt k n ji tɑn kii puɑn’i kpɑnjɑn, ŋɑɑn n tɑn sii piɑk k yentl i nunm po e k jikt sɑɑ n Bɑɑ Yennu po.
Ŋɑɑn l yuo i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, i tuu sii mei’ɔ n sɑnn ni. N k yɑɑ ɑ n tɑn sii mei’ɔ k tien’i kɑɑ,
k mɑɑn n Bɑɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ luon’i, yɑɑ mun luon’n k tien yɑdɑ nɑn n nyii n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ buol ni nɑ pɑɑk.
N din nyii n Bɑɑ mɑnŋ penŋ e k sik tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji nyikt tingbounŋ mɑnŋ e nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt u penŋ.»
Ŋɑnn e k u puolpoweitieb nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ ɑ ji kpɑn piɑk yentl t nunm po e nɑ. A ji k puɑn’t kpɑnjɑn kɑɑ.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ t ji bɑnn nɑn ɑ mi bonsiɑl kul, k l k tie k suɑ n boi’ɑ buboit kɑɑ wɑɑ. K l pɑɑk e tien k t tien yɑdɑ nɑn ɑ nyii Yennu penŋ e.»
K Yiesu jiin’m ɑ: «I ji tien’n yɑdɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?
Tɔn, yuo bɑɑt, k l ponŋ bɑɑl ɑ, k i kul tɑn sɑɑ yɑt kun. I tɑn sɑɑ nyik’n, k n be n kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn n kii be n kuukuɑ kɑɑ, k mɑɑn n Bɑɑ be nɑn’n.
N yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ yin lɑ mɑnu e, yɑɑ gɑɑ n pɑɑk nɑ. I tɑn sii di fɑlɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni. Ŋɑɑn ii mɔk pɑlcienn mɑn. N nyɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ wɑɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn gokt got sɑnpɑɑpo, k yet ɑ: «N Bɑɑ, yuo mɑnŋ bɑɑl nɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k ɑ Bijɑ n lɑ dontl, k ji fit te k ɑ mun n lɑ dontl,
k mɑɑn fin e tul’ɔ yiikuo niib kul pɑɑk, ɑ wun ji fit tul niib kul nbɑ k ɑ tul’ɔ mɑnŋ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
K mɑnfuol mɑnŋ e tie lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k niib n bɑnn fin nbɑ tie Yennu nɑn bɑlmɔni, k suɑ kɑɑ, nɑn Yiesu *Klistu nbɑ k ɑ tun’ɔ nɑ.
Tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tul’n, ɑ n tun nɑ, n ji tun k gbenn ɑ, k donn ɑ sɑnn tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
N Bɑɑ, tuln’min *yudɑnt mɔtɑɑnɑ, yudɑnt nbɑ k n din mɔk, yuo nbɑ k n din be ɑ buol ni k suɑ k ɑ dɑɑ din k nɑn *dulnyɑ nɑ.
«Niib nbɑ k ɑ din gɑnn’b tingbounŋ nɑ ni k tul’n nɑ, n te k b bɑnn’ɑ wɑɑ. B din tie ɑ yɑb e, k ɑ din jii’b k tul’n, k b mun sɑk ɑ mɑɑn ɑ.
K mɔtɑɑnɑ b mi nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ, l nyii ɑ buol e,
k mɑɑn n pɑk’b mɑɑn nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ wɑɑ, k b mun gɑɑl ɑ. B mi nɑn n set nyii ɑ penŋ e nɑn mɔni, k b tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tun’n.
«Tɔn, mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji mei’ɑ b pɑɑk e nɑ. N k mei’ɑ tingbounŋ nɑ niib kul pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n mei’ɑ bin nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ pɑɑk e, k mɑɑn b tie ɑ yɑb e.
N yɑb kul tie ɑ yɑb e, k ɑ yɑb kul mun tie n yɑb, k b ni e k n lɑɑt yudɑnt.

N ji k be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm ŋɑnin dɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni e. N bɑɑt ɑ buol ni e. N Bɑɑ, *Ŋɑnɔ nɑ, i diɑ’b fɑnu nɑn ɑ sɑnn ni, sɑnn nbɑ k ɑ din pul’n nɑ, ɑ bin ji fit tɑɑn yonm nɑn min nɑn fin nbɑ kpɑn tie yonm nɑ.
Mɑɑ dɑɑ be nɑn’m nɑ, n diɑ’b fɑnu nɑn ɑ sɑnn nbɑ k ɑ din pul’n nɑ ni. N guu’b k b ni suɑ k bot, sie wun nbɑ din sɑɑ bot ɑ k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ n gbie e.
Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ n bɑɑt ɑ penŋ e, k mɑɑ dɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ, n piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ k tien’m, ɑ bin ji fit lɑ n pɑlpienn nɑ k sɑɑ yɑkl.
«N pɑk ɑ mɑɑn nɑ tul’b ɑ, k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb nɑn’m, k mɑɑn b k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yɑb, nɑn mɑɑ mun k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuɑ nɑ.
N k mei’ɑ mɑɑ ɑ nyinn’b tingbounŋ nɑ ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n mei’ɑ fɑn guul’b fɑnu, k Klistu dɑtɑɑk dɑɑ bɑɑt k biil’b.
B k tie tingbounŋ nɑ yɑb, nɑn mɑɑ mun k tie tingbounŋ nɑ yuɑ nɑ.
«Ŋɑɑnt k bii tie ɑ yɑb nɑn bɑlmɔni, k mɑɑn ɑ mɑɑn tie bɑlmɔni e.
Fɑɑ din tun’n tingbounŋ nɑ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e k n mun tun’m tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
K b pɑɑk e k n jikt n mɔnŋ k tien’ɑ nɑ, ɑ bin ji fit tien ɑ tiɑɔnŋ yɑb nɑn bɑlmɔni.
«N k mei’ɑ k tien ŋɑnm kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n biɑ mei’ɑ k tien bin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien’n yɑdɑ b muɑnti pɑɑk e wɑɑ,
ɑ b kul n tɑɑn yonm. N Bɑɑ, ŋɑɑnt k bii be t ni, nɑn fɑɑ be n ni k n mun be ɑ ni nɑ, ɑ k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb n tien yɑdɑ nɑn fin e tun’n.
N tul’b yudɑnt nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ, ɑ b kul n tɑɑn yonm nɑn min nɑn fin nbɑ tɑɑn yonm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
N be b ni, k ɑ mun be n ni, ɑ k bin tɑɑn yonm dede k tingbounŋ ŋɑɑtieb n fit bɑnn nɑn fin e tun’n, k ɑ mun luon’m nɑn fɑɑ luon’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
«N luon k bin nbɑ k ɑ tul’n nɑ i be mɑɑ tɑn sii be siɑn nbɑ k bin lɑ n yudɑnt nbɑ k ɑ din tul’n k suɑ k ɑ dɑɑ k nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ.
N Bɑɑ, fin nbɑ tie Ŋɑnɔ nɑ, tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb k mi’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn n mi’ɑ, k bin nbɑ be nɑn’n mi nɑn fin e tun’n.
N te k b bɑnn’ɑ k n biɑ sɑɑ te k b ŋɑnm bɑnn’ɑ, ɑ k lonm nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑn’n nɑ ii be b ni k n mun sii be b ni.»
Yiesu nbɑ din pɑk k gbenn nɑ puolpo, k ŋuɑ nɑn u *puolpoweitieb yɑɑt sɑɑ, k sɑɑ puot kpenu nbɑ k b yi Seedlɔn nɑ. Gungounŋ nnɑ din be lenŋ, k b din be gungounŋ mɑnŋ ni.
Tɔn, Suudɑ wun nbɑ kuɑt Yiesu nɑ din tuu mi gungounŋ mɑnŋ buol, k mɑɑn yuo kul Yiesu din tuu sɑɑ nɑn u puolpoweitieb lenŋ e.
Ŋɑnn e k Suudɑ tɑn bɑɑl gungounŋ mɑnŋ ni nɑn sejenm bonciɑnn, nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ tuontunnɑ, k b din diɑ jɑtiɑt nɑn fitɑ nɑn mulɑnbɑɑbi.
Yiesu ŋɑnin din mi bonsiɑl kul nbɑ yɑɑ lin tien’ɔ, ŋɑnn e k u nyii tuɑnn, k boi’b ɑ: «I luon ŋmee?»
K b jiin ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ.» K u yet’b ɑ: «Min e nɑ.» K Suudɑ, wun nbɑ nyii u puol nɑ, k u sie lenŋ nɑn’m.
Yiesu nbɑ ŋɑnin yɑɑ ɑ: «Min e nɑ» yuo nbɑ, k b ji ŋmɑt potuntunɑ, k bɑɑ bɑɑ tinŋ ni.
K Yiesu ŋɑnm boi’b ɑ: «I luon ŋmee?» K b biɑ yɑɑ ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ.»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «N ponŋ yet’i ɑ min e nɑ. L i tie k i luon’n i e, yin ŋɑɑn k bin nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ k bin yɑɑt ɑ.»
Nnɑ e k lin nbɑ k u yet ɑ: «Fɑɑ tul’n bin nbɑ kul nɑ, b suɑ k bot,» k lin fit tien mɔni.
L yuo mɑnŋ k Siimɔn Piɑl din diɑ juk-bɑnjiɑk k nuɑt, k cuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ tuontunnɔ niidiitu po tubl k pot. Tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ sɑnn din yi Mɑɑlkus.
K Yiesu yet Piɑl ɑ: «Jiin ɑ juk-bɑnjiɑk mɑnŋ k jiin nuɑn. A duki nɑn wɑhɑlɑ *kɔp nbɑ k n Bɑɑ tul’n nɑ, n kɑn nyu lenŋ ii?»
Ŋɑnn e jik k sejenm nɑn b yudɑɑnɔ nɑn *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm tuontunnɑ nɑ suol Yiesu, k lol’ɔ,
k jii’u k dɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Ann buol sinsinn. Ann din tie *Kɑɑyiif diɑnjuɑ e, k Kɑɑyiif din tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ e l binn ni.
Kɑɑyiif mɑnŋ e dɑɑn yet Suifnbɑ yudɑnm ɑ l i tie k niyenɔ kuɑ gɑɑl niib kul pɑɑk k kpo, l sɔ.

Bɑɑ din sɑɑn nɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ wɑɑ. K puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ din tie suɑ nbɑ k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ mi’u e. L pɑɑk, k u din fit kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ ŋɑɑdundounŋ ni, siɑn nbɑ k Yiesu be nɑ.

Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl ŋɑnin biɑl sie nɑn-yel po yɑnŋl tɑnmɔb ni, k puolpoweitɔluɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ din mi’u nɑ, k u ŋmɑt yɑnŋl tɑnmɔb nɑ ni, k pɑk nɑn sɑpɑɑmɔ nbɑ guu tɑnmɔb nɑ, k kuɑn Piɑl dundounŋ ni.
K sɑpɑɑmɔ mɑnŋ boi Piɑl: «A k tie juɑ nɑ puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ ɑɑ?» K Piɑl jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Aɑi. N k tie u puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ.»
Wɑɑt din be l yuo, k tuontunnɑ nɑ nɑn sejenm nɑ juo sɑnkuɑnɑ muu, k sie k nɑni, k Piɑl tɑn sɑɑn tɑɑn’m k b nɑni.
Ŋɑnn e k Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ boi Yiesu u puolpoweitieb nɑn u wɑnnu nɑ po.

K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «N ponŋ tuu piɑk yienin ni k tien suɑ kul. Yuo kul n tuu wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, siɑn nbɑ k Suifnbɑ kul tuu bɑɑt lɑknt nɑ. N k pɑk siɑl wuol ni.
Bee tien k ɑ boi’n nnɑ? Boin bin nbɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ k n tuu yien’m nɑ. Ŋɑnm mi mɑɑ tuu yien lin nbɑ.»
Yiesu nbɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k sejenm nɑ yenɔ peb’ɔ tɑnpɑk, ŋɑɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Nnɑ e k ɑ sɑɑ pɑk jiin Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ?»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Mi i pɑk bonbisiɑl i e, fɑn yet suɑ kul lɑɑ tie lin nbɑ. Ŋɑɑn mi i pɑk lin nbɑ tokn i e, bee tien k ɑ ji peb’n i?»
L yuo e k Ann te k b jii Yiesu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Kɑɑyiif wun nbɑ tie Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k Yiesu biɑ lek dɑɑ lol nɑn ŋmiit.
Piɑl nbɑ din sie k nɑni muu nɑ, lenŋ mɑnŋ k b boi’ɔ ɑ: «A k tie u puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ ɑɑ?» K Piɑl noi, k yet’b ɑ: «Aɑi, n k tie u puolpoweitɔyenɔ kɑɑ.»
K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑɑnɔ tuontun-yenɔ nbɑ k u ninjɑ tie wun nbɑ k Piɑl cuɑ u tubl k pot nɑ, k u boi’ɔ ɑ: «N k lɑ’ɑ nɑn Yiesu, gungounŋ nɑ ni ii?»
K Piɑl biɑ noi. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k kojouk bui.

L puolpo k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nyii nɑn Yiesu Kɑɑyiif ŋɑɑk ni k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Luonmtieb kpɑnbɑl ŋɑɑk ni. L din tie sɑn-nyɑpob ni e. Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ yudɑnm mɑnŋ k luon bin kuɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni k mɑɑn b din k luon bin kuɑn b mɔnŋ jɑknt ni ɑ bin fit k di *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm jiet.
L pɑɑk k *Piilɑɑt nyii nɑn-yel k tuok’b, k boi’b ɑ: «I tɑɑl juɑ nɑ biɑ pɑɑk e?»
K b yɑɑ ɑ: «Wuu bo i kii tun bonbiil, t bo kɑn bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ ɑ buol nnɑ.»
K Piilɑɑt yet’b: «I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ n jii’u k bu nɑn’ɔ i *senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ.» K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm mɑnŋ yɑɑ ɑ: «T k mɔk yiikuo nɑn tin kpi nilɔ.»
L din set tɑn tie nnɑ e, ɑ Yiesu nbɑ din yɑɑ ɑ kubuolu nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ kpo nɑ, n ji fit gbie.
K Piilɑɑt ŋmɑt k kuɑ ŋɑɑk nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn yiin Yiesu, k boi’ɔ ɑ: «A tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl ee?»
K Yiesu jiin k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e dɑɑ boi’n buboit nɑ ɑmi siɑb e yet’ɑ n po oo?»
K Piilɑɑt yet’ɔ: «N mun tie Suifnbɑ buolu ni nilɔ ee? A mɔnŋ mɔnŋ niib nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm e jii’ɑ k tɑn tul’n. A jiɑ biil bee?»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑn k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yɑl kɑɑ. N nɑɑn i bo i tie tingbounŋ nnɑ yɑl i e, n sejenm bo sɑɑ kɔn n pɑɑk, k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm bo kɑn suol’n. Aɑi, n nɑɑn k tie tingbounŋ nnɑ nɑɑn.»

K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «A set tie Kpɑnbɑl e ŋɑnin ii?» K Yiesu jiin ɑ: «Nnn, fin e yien ɑ n tie Kpɑnbɑl. B din mɑl’n ɑ n wɑnn niib bɑlmɔni e. K l pɑɑk e, k n din bɑɑl *dulnyɑ nɑ ni k suɑ kul nbɑ wɑɑ bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ gbiɑ n mɑɑn.»
K Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bɑlmɔni tie bee?» Wɑɑ yet nnɑ puolpo k u ŋmɑt nyii nɑn-yel Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ buol k yet’b ɑ: «N k lɑ juɑ nɑ biit k sɑɑ biil’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn i mɔk siɑl k tuu tie binn kul ni, k n tuu nyinn dɑnsɑlyenɔ *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm yuo k tul’i. I luon k n nyinn Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl nɑ k tul’i ni ii?»
K b tiɑn tintiɑni k yɑɑ ɑ: «T k luon juɑ nɑ kɑɑ. T luon Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs e, k ɑ nyinn’ɔ k tul’t.» Ŋɑɑn k Bɑɑlɑɑbɑɑs mɑnŋ din tie fɑt-tuɑ e.
L yuo nɑ k *Piilɑɑt te k b buo Yiesu gbɑnn.
K sejenm nɑ luu kunkoni foklk k yiln’mɔ, ŋɑɑn lɑnn’ɔ bɑɑnmunŋ nnɑ,
k nyi bɑɑt k gbɑɑ u tuɑnn, k yien ɑ: « *Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl, t fuont’ɑ,» ŋɑɑn pebt’ɔ tɑnpɑki.
Ŋɑnn e k Piilɑɑt biɑ ŋɑnm k dɑɑ nyii nɑn-yel k yet yudɑnm nɑ: «Gotl mɑn, n bɑɑt nɑn’ɔ i buol, k yin bɑnn nɑn n k lɑ u biit.»
Ŋɑnn e, k Yiesu bɑɑl nɑn-yel po, k yil kunkoni foklk nɑ nɑn bɑɑnmunŋ nɑ, k Piilɑɑt yet’b ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, juɑ mɑnŋ e nɑ.»

Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑn b sejenm nbɑ lɑ’u nɑ, k b tiɑn tintiɑni, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk. Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.» K Piilɑɑt yet’b ɑ: «Yinm jii’mɔ mɑn k kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk i mɔnŋ, k mɑɑn min k lɑ u biit.»
K Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ jiin yɑɑ ɑ: «T mɔk sensɑu, k *senni mɑnŋ wɑnt nɑn u kpɑn lek tie wun kpo e, k mɑɑn u yɑɑ ɑ u tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
Piilɑɑt nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni biɑ ŋɑnm suol’ɔ bonciɑnn,
k u ŋmɑt kuɑ ŋɑɑn yiin Yiesu, k tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «A nyii lee?» Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din k jiin’ɔ siɑl.
Ŋɑnn e, k Piilɑɑt boi’ɔ ɑ: «A kɑn pɑk jiin’n ii? A k mi nɑn n mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ ŋɑɑ’ɑ, k biɑ mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ kpɑɑ’ɑ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk ii?»
K Yiesu ji jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Yennu i bo i kii cɑb’ɑ yiikuo, ɑ bo kii mɔk n yiikuo. L pɑɑk, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ suol’n k jiin kubn’ɑ nɑ, u biit yɑb bonciɑnn k gɑl ɑ yɑl ɑ.»

L yuo k ji sɑɑ, Piilɑɑt din yiɑb luon wun ŋɑɑ Yiesu, ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ yɑki kpɑyɑkt k yɑɑ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ ŋɑɑ’u, ŋɑnn ɑ ji k tie Luonm kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl yuɑk kɑɑ, k mɑɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ pul u mɔnŋ Kpɑnbɑl, u tie kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ dɑtɑɑk e.»
Piilɑɑt nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ, k u nyii nɑn Yiesu nɑn-yel po, k kɑl u buut kɑɑnu pɑɑk, k b yi’l Binbintl. (Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, b yi’l Gɑɑbɑɑtɑ nɑ.)
L din tie yensuuk po e, k l sɑɑ yent k *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm n di. K Piilɑɑt yet Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑ ɑ: «I Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ.»

K b yɑki kpɑyɑkt k yɑɑ ɑ: «Kpin’mɔ. Kpin’mɔ. Kpɑɑn’mɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk.» K Piilɑɑt boi’b: «I luon k n kpɑɑ i Kpɑnbɑl dɑpunpunn pɑɑk ii?» K Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm nɑ jiin ɑ: «T k mɔk kpɑnbɑlsuɑ sie Luonm kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl kuukuɑ.»
K Piilɑɑt ji cɑb ɑ bin kpɑɑ Yiesu dɑpunpunn pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k sejenm ji gɑɑl Yiesu,
k u jii u tiɑɔnŋ kuun dɑpunpunn k nyii duo nɑ kpinŋ, k sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b yi’l «Yukpɑbuk» nɑ. (Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, b yi ŋɑnn e «Golgotɑ» nɑ.)
Lenŋ e k b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, k biɑ kpɑɑ niib bɑnle dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk k pukn Yiesu po, k yenɔ be u ciɑnu k luɑ mun be u ciɑnu, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu be sinsuuk ni.
K Piilɑɑt diɑn diɑni k b tɑbn Yiesu dɑpunpunn nɑ yul pɑɑk, k l yɑɑ ɑ: «Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu wun nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ.»
K Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn din lii diɑni mɑnŋ ɑ, k mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k b din kpɑɑ Yiesu dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑ, l din k fɔk nɑn Selusɑɑlenm. Diɑni nɑ, l din diɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn Luonm tieb nɑn Glek tieb mɑɑn ni e.
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ Yennu jɑɑnti yudɑnm sɑɑn k yet Piilɑɑt ɑ: «Dɑɑ dɑ ɑ: ‹Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl i nɑ,› ŋɑɑn diɑnt ɑ: ‹Juɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ u tie Suifnbɑ Kpɑnbɑl e.› »
K Piilɑɑt jiin ɑ: «Mɑɑ sɑt diɑn lin nbɑ, n diɑn e.»
Sejenm nbɑ kpɑɑ Yiesu nɑ puolpo e, k b jii u tiɑt k cent’l tɑɑl munnɑ, k sejenm nɑ kul din gɑɑl tol. L puolpo e biɑk k b jii u liɑtfuouk, lin nbɑ k b luu’l bonmunn, k l k mɔk nyɑlmu nɑ,

k b yet b lieb ɑ: «I dɑɑ pɑt. Ŋɑɑnt k t tɔ tiɑtiɑ k lɑɑn wun nbɑ sɑɑ yent’l.» L din tien nnɑ, ɑ Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ din yet nnɑ, lin ji fit gbie ɑ: «B cent n tiɑt, k biɑ tɔ tiɑtiɑ n liɑtfuouk pɑɑk.» Nnɑ e k sejenm nɑ set din tun.
K Yiesu nɑɑ din sie kpiɑ u dɑpunpunn nɑ, ŋuɑ nɑn u niipuo, k b yi’u Mɑɑli wun nbɑ tie Klopɑs ŋɑɑpuo, nɑn Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, k b lɑkn sie lenŋ.
K Yiesu lɑ u nɑɑ, k biɑ lɑ u *puolpoweituɑ nbɑ k u mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ, k u mun sie lenŋ, k Yiesu yet u nɑɑ ɑ: «N nɑɑ, ɑ bijɑ i nɑ jik,»
k biɑ yet u puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «A mun, ɑ nɑɑ i nɑ jik.» Lɑɑ din nyii l yuo nɑ k u puolpoweituɑ nɑ ji din jii Yiesu nɑɑ k kun nɑn’ɔ u ŋɑɑk ni.
L puolpo e, Yiesu din mi nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k u din tuun nɑ, l ji gbenn ɑ, k u yet ɑ: «Nyun-nyuklu mɔk’n,» ɑ lin gbien lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ.
Ŋmɑnŋ din sie nɑn dɑmiituk lenŋ, k b jii sɑɑpo k tun dɑmiituk mɑnŋ ni, k jii tiik nbɑ k b yi iisɔp nɑ dɑɑɔk k fin sɑɑpo nɑ, k tien u mɔb ni,
k u fuɑnt k nɑk, k yet ɑ: «L gbenn ɑ,» ŋɑɑn tibn k jii u siek k tul Yennu ŋɑɑn kpo.
L din tie ɑlsumɑ dɑɑl e, k Suifnbɑ din k luon niib nɑ i be dɑpunpunɑ pɑɑk *Fuondɑɑl, k mɑɑn Fuondɑɑl mɑnŋ din tie dɑjɑɑnn e. Ŋɑnn e k b din boi Piilɑɑt ɑ wun cɑb’b k bin kɔnn kɔnn b tɑɑ k kpɑɑt’b.
L pɑɑk, k sejenm nɑ sɑɑn k sɑɑ kɔnn bin nbɑ k b libn kpɑɑ’b nɑn Yiesu nɑ tɑɑ,
ŋɑɑn bɑɑ bɑɑl Yiesu buol ni, k suɑ k u ponŋ kpo nɑ, b din k kɔnn u tɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k sejenm yenɔ jii kpɑnn k ŋmuu Yiesu lokl ni. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k sɔn nɑn nyun ji nyi.
Wun nbɑ diɑn lin nbɑ nɑ tie *siɑlɑ e k u *siɑlɑ tie mɔni, k u mun mi nɑn u piɑk mɔni e ɑ yin mun tien yɑdɑ.
Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tien ɑ lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni n gbie ɑ: «B kɑn yiel u kpɑbɑ nɑn yenn kuɑ wɑɑ.»
K l biɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Niib tɑn sii goli bɑɑ ŋmuu wun nbɑ kpɑnn nɑ.»

L puolpo e k Suosiɑf, wun nbɑ tie Aliimɑɑte nilɔ nɑ, sɑɑn Piilɑɑt buol ni, k sɑɑ miɑl’ɔ Yiesu gbɑnɑnt. Suosiɑf din tie Yiesu puolpoweituɑ e, ŋɑɑn u din wɑɑ’u wuol ni e, k mɑɑn u din tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm e jɑŋmɑɑni. K Piilɑɑt cɑb’ɔ, k u sɑɑn k sɑɑ kpɑɑt Yiesu k jii’u.

K Niikodenm mun bɑɑl, wun nbɑ din ponŋ mi k bɑɑl Yiesu penŋ nyiɑɔk nɑ, k diɑ tulɑɑli k l tie nɑn cilu piintɑ nɑ. (B din jii bonsiɑl nbɑ k b yi’l miil nɑn bonsiɑl nbɑ k b yi’l ɑlos k ŋmɑt k tien tulɑɑli mɑnŋ.)
Ŋɑnn e, k b jii Yiesu k pɔbn’ɔ cincenŋɑnɑ ni nɑn tulɑɑli nɑ, nɑn Suifnbɑ kupiinu kɑɑl nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Bɑɑ din kpɑɑ Yiesu siɑn nbɑ nɑ, kpɑɑb din be lenŋ, k kɑpɑɑɔnŋ ponŋ be lenŋ, k b dɑɑ din k pii suɑ kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ ni.
Suifnbɑ Fuondɑɑl nbɑ pel nɑ, k kɑɑɔk nɑ biɑ k fɔk nɑ, k b bil Yiesu lenŋ.
K *Suifnbɑ *Fuondɑɑl tɑn gɑl, ŋɑɑn k lɑsl dɑɑl sɑn-nyɑpob ni e k suɑ l yuo dɑɑ bɔn, k Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli sɑɑn Yiesu kɑɑɔk buol, k lɑ k b bilnt kɑtɑnu kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ mɔb buol ɑ,
k u ciɑl sɑɑn Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn Yiesu *puolpoweitɔluɑ nbɑ k Yiesu mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ penŋ, k yet’b ɑ: «B piit Yonmdɑɑnɔ kɑɑɔk nɑ ni wɑɑ, k t k mi bɑɑ bil’ɔ siɑn nbɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nɑ nyii k ciɑl sɑɑn kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol ni,
k b bɑnle tiin k sɑɑ ŋɑɑn Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nɑ ciɑl pɑɑk Piɑl, k sɑɑ dɔnŋ bɑɑl kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ buol sinsinn,
ŋɑɑn k k kuɑ. U din tibn e k lɑ kɑtinŋ.
K Siimɔn Piɑl tɑn yuɑnt k bɑɑl k kuɑ, k lɑ k kɑtinŋ nɑ duɑ lenŋ,
k biɑ lɑ cincenbik nbɑ k b dɑɑn fin Yiesu yul nɑ, k ŋɑnn fin l biɑnŋ k duɑ l kuukuɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nbɑ din dɔnŋ k bɑɑl nɑ, mun kuɑ k ji lɑ k biɑ tien puo nɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑdɑ.
(Ŋɑɑn b dɑɑ din k gbɑt lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ l tie k Yiesu n fiil kuun ni.)
K Yiesu puolpoweitieb bɑnle mɑnŋ ŋmɑt k kun.
Ŋɑɑn Mɑɑli din biɑl e sie kɑɑɔk mɑnŋ nɑn-yel po k mɔ, k tɑn tibn k got kɑɑɔk nɑ ni,
k lɑ *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ bɑnle, k b liɑ tɑpieni, k yenɔ kɑl siɑn nbɑ po k b dɑɑn bil Yiesu nɑ l yul po, k luɑ nɑ mun kɑl l tɑɑ po.
K b boi’ɔ ɑ: «Puo nɑ, bee k ɑ mɔ?» K u jiin ɑ: «B piit n Yonmdɑɑnɔ e, k n k mi bɑɑ bil’ɔ siɑn.»
Wɑɑ yet nnɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑnt lɑ k Yiesu sie, ŋɑɑn k u k mi ɑ Yiesu e nɑ.

K Yiesu boi’ɔ: «Puo nɑ, bee k ɑ mɔ? A goli luon ŋmee?» Mɑɑli ŋɑnin din mi ɑ u tie gungounŋ nɑ tuontunnɔ e, k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, l i tie k fin i e i jii’u, fɑn yet’n fɑɑ bil’ɔ siɑn, k n sɑɑn k sɑɑ jii’u.»
K Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mɑɑli.» K u ŋmɑnt k tokn’ɔ, k jiin’ɔ Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni ɑ: «Lɑɑbuuni.» (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Wɑntuɑ.»)
K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Ji dɑɑ diɑ’n, k mɑɑn n dɑɑ k duo n Bɑɑ buol ni. Ŋɑɑn i sɑɑ n nɑɑ wɑɑs penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ, n sɑɑ do wun nbɑ tie n Bɑɑ nɑn i Bɑɑ nɑ penŋ ɑ, wun nbɑ tie n Yennu nɑn i Yennu nɑ.»
K Mɑgdɑɑlɑ puo Mɑɑli, ŋmɑt Yiesu puolpoweitieb penŋ k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ: «N lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ wɑɑ,» ŋɑɑn yet’b wɑɑ yet’ɔ lin nbɑ nɑ.

Lɑsl dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑjuouk o, k Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ tɑn lɑkn lieb k be dieok ni, ŋɑɑn kpɑl gɑnn, k mɑɑn b tiin Suifnbɑ yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni e, k tɑn suɑ k Yiesu sie b sinsuuk ni, k fuont’b ɑ: «Mɑnu i be i pɑɑk.»
Wɑɑ yet nnɑ puolpo e, k u wɑnn’b u niipɑnt ni fɔnɑ nɑn u lokl ni fɔnn nɑ. U puolpoweitieb nbɑ lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ, k b ji mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
K Yiesu biɑ ŋɑnm fuont’b ɑ: «Mɑnu i be i pɑɑk. N Bɑɑ nbɑ tun’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, n mun yɑɑ n tun’i l biɑnŋ e.»
L puolpo e k u pebl wɑn b pɑɑk k yet’b ɑ: «Gɑɑt Foŋɑnm mɑn.
L i tie k i nyik cɑb suɑ biit, u set lɑ nyikcɑbu biit mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k i k nyik cɑb suɑ biit, u k lɑ nyikcɑbu.»
Tɔn, k u puolpoweitɔyenɔ Tuomɑ, wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Jɑɑk nɑ, ŋuɑ din kɑɑ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu bɑɑl b ni nɑ.

Ŋɑnn e, k u puolpoweitelieb nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «T lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ.» K Tuomɑ yet’b ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin, l i kii tie k n tɑn lɑ’u nɑn u niipɑnt ni fɔnɑ nɑ, k jii n niibil k tun siɑn nbɑ k b kpɑɑ kpɑi nɑ, k biɑ jii n nuu k tun u lokl nɑ ni i kɑɑ, n kɑn tien yɑdɑ.»
L dɑɑ ŋɑnniin puolpo e k Yiesu puolpoweitieb nɑ biɑ tɑn lɑkn lieb k be dieok ni, k Tuomɑ ji be b ni. B lek kpɑl gɑnn, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu tɑn bɑɑl sie b sinsuuk ni, k fuont’b ɑ: «Mɑnu i be i pɑɑk,»
ŋɑɑn yet Tuomɑ ɑ: «Jiin ɑ niibil k tun n niipɑnt ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ tɑnt ɑ nuu k tun n lokl ni, k ji dɑɑ bils, ŋɑɑn tien’n yɑdɑ.»
K Tuomɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin e tie n Yonmdɑɑnɔ k biɑ tie n Yennu.»
K Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «Fɑɑ ji lɑ’n nɑ pɑɑk e k ɑ tien’n yɑdɑ ɑɑ? Bin nbɑ k lɑɑt’n ŋɑɑn tien’n yɑdɑ nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e.»
K Yiesu din tun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn k pukn u puolpoweitieb penŋ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnn k diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni.
Ŋɑɑn bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ diɑn k be nnɑ nɑ, b diɑn ɑ yin tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu e tie *Klistu, Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, ɑ l i tie k i tien yɑdɑ yin lɑ mɑnfuol u sɑnn ni.
L puolpo e k Yiesu ŋɑnm dɔkt k wɑnn u mɔnŋ k tul u *puolpoweitieb, mɔkgbenŋl nbɑ k b yi’l Tiibeliɑt nɑ kpinŋ. Wɑɑ dɔkt biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ:
Siimɔn Piɑl nɑn Tuomɑ (wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Jɑɑk nɑ) nɑn Nɑɑtɑɑniɑl (ŋuɑ e din nyii Kɑɑnɑ nbɑ be Gɑɑliile tinŋ ni nɑ), nɑn Sebede wɑɑs, nɑn Yiesu puolpoweitelieb bɑnle din lɑkn be lenŋ.
K Siimɔn Piɑl tɑn yet u lieb ɑ: «N sɑɑ sik k suol jɑni wɑɑ.» K b yet’ɔ: «T sɑɑ ciɑn’ɑ.» K b sɑɑn kuɑ bulgbetl ni, ŋɑɑn l nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ b din k fit suol siɑl.
L din tɑn yent sɑn-nyɑpob ni e k Yiesu sie nyunkpinŋ, ŋɑɑn k u puolpoweitieb k mi ɑ ŋuɑ e.
K u yiin’m boi’b ɑ: «Ŋɑɑjɑb, i suol siɑl ii?» K b jiin ɑ: «Aɑi.»
K u yet’b: «Lun i jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ i niidiitu po, k i sɑɑ suol jɑni.» K b lu b jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ, k ji gbɑl donnu, k mɑɑn jɑni nbɑ k b suol nɑ kpiɑtu din pɑɑk ɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu puolpoweituɑ nbɑ k u mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ yet Piɑl ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ e.» Siimɔn Piɑl nbɑ gbɑt ɑ u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ e nɑ, k u liɑ u liɑtfuouk nbɑ k u ponŋ liɑt bil nɑ, ŋɑɑn yukl sik nyun ni.
Lenŋ din k fɔk nɑn nyunkpinŋ nɑ, k l fɔknt din tie nɑn miɑtɑ kobk nɑ, k Yiesu puolpoweitelieb ji kɑn bulgbetl nɑ k l dɑɑl jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ, k l gbie nɑn jɑni, k bɑɑl nyunkpinŋ nɑ.
Bɑɑ nyii bulgbetl nɑ ni yuo nbɑ k b lɑ sɑnkuɑnɑ muu, k jɑnŋ nɑn pɑɑnu pɑɑ l pɑɑk k biet.
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Jiin jɑni nbɑ k i suol nɑ siɑl, k bɑɑl nɑn’n nnɑ.»
K Siimɔn Piɑl kuɑ bulgbetl nɑ ni, k dɑt jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ k duo nɑn’n kunkonn, k l gbie nɑn jɑngbenŋɑ, k b kɑn, k l tie jɑni kobk nɑn piinŋmu nɑn ŋɑntɑ. L din yɑb bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn jɑnlɑɑɔnŋ nɑ lek k pɑt.
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «Sɑɑ nɑ mɑn k tɑn ŋmɑn.» Ŋɑɑn nɑn b yenɔ kuɑ wɑɑ lek k mɔk pɑl nɑn wun boi’ɔ ɑ u tie ŋmee, k mɑɑn b mi nɑn u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ e.
K Yiesu jii pɑɑnu nɑ k tul’b, k biɑ jii jɑnŋ nɑ k tul’b.
Lin nbɑ nɑ e din tie tɑɑl muntɑ ni k Yiesu jii u mɔnŋ k wɑnn u puolpoweitieb, Yennu nbɑ din fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ puolpo.

Bɑɑ din dii jiet mɑnŋ puolpo e, k Yiesu boi Siimɔn Piɑl ɑ: «Siimɔn, fin nbɑ tie Sɑn bik, ɑ luon’n k gɑl bin nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin ɑ: «Nnn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ mi nɑn n luon’ɑ.» K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii goli n pebis.»
K tɑɑl munle ni k Yiesu boi Siimɔn Piɑl ɑ: «Siimɔn, fin nbɑ tie Sɑn bik, ɑ luon’n ii?» K u jiin ɑ: «Nnn, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ mi nɑn n luon’ɑ.» K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii kpɑɑl n pei.»

K tɑɑl muntɑ ni biɑk k Yiesu boi’ɔ ɑ: «Siimɔn, fin nbɑ tie Sɑn bik, ɑ luon’n ii?» K Piɑl pɑl ni ji biil, k mɑɑn Yiesu nbɑ boi’ɔ tɑɑl muntɑ ni ɑ: «A luon’n ii?» nɑ. K u yet’ɔ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ɑ mi bonsiɑl kul. A mi nɑn n luon’ɑ.» K Yiesu yet’ɔ: «Ii goli n pei.

Bɑlmɔni e k n yien’ɑ nɑ, fɑɑ din dɑɑ tie nɑɑsimɔ nɑ, ɑ din tuu liɑ ɑ tiɑt ɑ tiɑɔnŋ o, k sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ po k ɑ luon, ŋɑɑn ɑ i tɑnŋ i kpet yuo nbɑ, ɑ sɑɑ tɑnt ɑ nii, k suɑ sɑɑ lɑnn’ɑ tiɑt, k jii’ɑ k ɑ sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ po k ɑ k luon.»
Yiesu nbɑ yet lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, l din wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ k Piɑl tɑn sɑɑ kpo k te k Yennu sɑnn n lɑ dontl. L puolpo k Yiesu yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii wɑɑ’n.»

K Piɑl tɑn jiɑnt k lɑ Yiesu puolpoweitɔluɑ nbɑ k u mɑntk luon’ɔ nɑ, k u wɑɑ. (Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ din kɑl k kpiɑ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k b din lɑkn di jiet nɑ, k u din dɔnn k nɑkn’ɔ k boi’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋmee yɑɑ wun tɑn kuɑt’ɑ mɑnŋ nɑ?»)
Piɑl nbɑ lɑ’u yuo nbɑ nɑ, k u boi Yiesu ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn k juɑ nɑ ŋɑnin i? Bee tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl’ɔ?»
K Yiesu jiin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Mi i luon k wuu be nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen, l k lɑ’ɑ ni. Fin, ii wɑɑ’n.»
L pɑɑk e tien k Yiesu puolpoweitieb din yien ɑ Yiesu puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ kɑn kpo. Ŋɑɑn Yiesu ŋɑnin din k pɑk yɑɑ ɑ u kɑn kpo kɑɑ. U din yet ɑ: «Mi i luon wuu be nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen, l k lɑ’ɑ ni.»
Tɔn, Yiesu puolpoweituɑ mɑnŋ e tie wun nbɑ tie *siɑlɑ mɑnŋ, k jiin lin nbɑ nɑ po, k biɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k t mi nɑn u *siɑlɑ mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni e.
Bonɑ bonciɑnn din be k Yiesu din tun k pukn. B i bo i diɑn lin nbɑ kul k u din tun mɑnŋ, n dukn nɑn kɑdɑɑt nbɑ k b bo sɑɑ diɑn nɑ bo kɑn lɑ yiɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni kii be.
Cɑnbɑɑ Teofiil: N sinsinn diɑni nɑ ni, n din diɑn lin nbɑ kul k Yiesu din piin k tuun nɑn lin nbɑ k u din wɑnt niib nɑ, u tuonn pinpiin-yuo nɑ ni,
mɔkmɔk nɑn Yennu nbɑ din tɑn donn’ɔ *Yendɔunŋ ni. Ŋɑɑn sinsinn dɑɑnn, wɑɑ din dɑɑ k duo nɑ, Foŋɑnm yiikuo ni e k u din wɑnn wɑɑ din gɑnn bin nbɑ k tien’m u tuomiinbɑ nɑ, bɑɑ sii tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ.
U kuun puolpo e k u din jii dɑɑ piinnɑ k wɑnt’b nɑn u set be, bɑnnu nbɑ k bilsuk kɑɑ nɑn u set jen u mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ, k b din tuu tun lɑɑt’ɔ, k u piɑk nɑn’m k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn po.
Yosɑu yɑɑnn k u din tɑn lɑkn be nɑn’m k di jiet, k din tɑn tul’b mɔb ɑ: «I dɑɑ nyi Selusɑɑlenm, ŋɑɑn kii be kii guu piini nbɑ k n Bɑɑ senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’i nɑ, mɑɑ din ponŋ yet’i lin nbɑ po nɑ.
Sɑn din wuul niib nɑn nyun e, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ ni Yennu sɑɑ wuul’i Foŋɑnm ni.»
Tuomiinbɑ nbɑ din lɑkn nɑn Yiesu yuo nbɑ, k b din tɑn boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, yuo nbɑ nɑ e k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ fɑt tinm Islɑɑeltieb yent k jiin’t ɑmi nlee?»
K Yiesu yet’b ɑ: «L k lɑ’i nɑn k i bɑnn jinjɑnŋyuo nbɑ k n Bɑɑ senn yɑɑ lin tɑn tien. Ŋuɑ e mɔk u mɔnŋ yiikuo k senn l yuo.
Ŋɑɑn yuo nbɑ k Foŋɑnm sɑɑ sik i pɑɑk, i sɑɑ lɑ yiikuo, k tɑn sii tie n siɑlɑɑdɑnm Selusɑɑlenm, nɑn Suude tinŋ kul ni, nɑn *Sɑɑmɑɑli tinŋ ni, nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ lokl kul po.»
Wɑɑ pɑk mɑɑn mɑnŋ k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b lɑ k u do sɑnpɑɑpo, k b goli’ɔ, k sɑnpɑgbɑnn sɑɑ dɔkn u pɑɑk k u bot, k b ji k lɑ’u.
Bɑɑ lek biɑ sie k kpɑɑ b ninbinɑ k goli sɑnpɑɑpo nɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k suɑ jɑb bɑnle sie k liɑ tɑpieni,

k boi’b ɑ: «Yinm Gɑɑliile tieb, bee k i sie nnɑ k goli sɑnpɑɑpo nnɑ? Yiesu nɑ nbɑ nyii i buol ni k duo Yendɔunŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi Yendɔunŋ mɑnŋ ni k jen sik nɑn yɑɑ goli’ɔ k u do sɑnpɑɑpo biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.»
L yuo nɑ k Yiesu tuomiinbɑ nɑ nyii *Oliifienbɑ jɑgbɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk k ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm. Lenŋ mɑnŋ nɑn Selusɑɑlenm din fɔk nɑn *Fuondɑɑl sɔnu nɑ e.

Bɑɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ k b sɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk nbɑ k b tuu be nɑ ni k duo dituɑtuk pɑɑk. Bin nbɑ din kuɑ mɑnŋ din tie Piɑl nɑn Sɑn nɑn Sɑɑk nɑn Andle nɑn Fiiliip nɑn Tuomɑ nɑn Bɑɑltelemi nɑn Mɑɑtieo nɑn Sɑɑk wun nbɑ din tie Alfe bijɑ, nɑn Siimɔn wun nbɑ yɑɑ ninbinn din mɔn nɑn k Suifnbɑ n yent b mɔnŋ nɑ, nɑn Suud wun nbɑ tie suɑ nnɑ k b yi’u Sɑɑk nɑ bijɑ,
k b kul ɑ tuu tun lɑknt nɑn b lieb k din pukn puosiɑb nɑn Yiesu nɑɑ, Mɑɑli, nɑn Yiesu ninjɑnm, k b mei Yennu nɑn dudukyent kuukuɑ k k nɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k dɑsiɑl nnɑ, k bin nbɑ din tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ nɑn kobk nɑn piinle nɑ tɑɑn tikl kɑl, k Piɑl tɑn fiil k set k yet ɑ:
«N nɑɑ wɑɑs, lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm din te k Dɑɑfiid din sint yet k jikt sɑɑ Suudɑ nbɑ dɑɑn wɑnn niib k b suol Yiesu nɑ po, k l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k lin tɑn tun nnɑ k gbie.
Suudɑ din tie t ni yenɔ k biɑ tuun tuonn nbɑ k t tuun.»
(Suudɑ nbɑ din kɔi Yiesu k gɑɑl likli nbɑ nɑ e, k u jii k dɑɑ kpɑɑb, l kpɑɑb ni e k u din jɔnn u mɔnŋ k bɑɑ k put puol, k u nuɑt kul nyii.
K Selusɑɑlenmtieb kul gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k pul kpɑɑb mɑnŋ sɑnn b mɔnŋ mɑɑn ni ɑ Akeldɑmɑ, k l pɑɑk tie «Sɔn Kpɑɑb.»)
«Tɔn, l diɑn *yɑni kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹Ŋɑɑnt k u ŋɑɑk n set lɑngbounŋ k suɑ dɑɑ kuɑ lenŋ.› K l biɑ diɑn ɑ: ‹L ŋɑn k suɑ n gɑɑl u tuonn yiɑl nɑ.›

«L pɑɑk ɑmi l tie k tin gɑnn niyenɔ e k pukn’ɔ t po, ɑ wuu mun i tie Yiesu kuun fiilu siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ, k l ŋɑn k wuu tie tinm nbɑ din tuu tun lin nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yuo nbɑ k Sɑn din wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu mɔkmɔk k tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k Yiesu nyii t buol ni k duo Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ ni yenɔ.»
Ŋɑnn e k b gɑnn jɑb bɑnle k b tie Suosiɑf wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Bɑɑlsɑɑbɑɑs nɑ (b biɑ din yi ŋuɑ e Sustus nɑ), nɑn Mɑɑtiɑs,
ŋɑɑn ji miɑl Yennu ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin nbɑ mi suɑ kul pɑl ni, wɑnt’t jɑb bɑnle nɑ ni, wun nbɑ k ɑ gɑnn,
k wun tien *tuomi k gɑɑl tuonn nɑ yiɑl nbɑ k Suudɑ nyik ŋɑɑn sɑɑn sɑɑ be *siɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn’ɔ nɑ.»
L puolpo k b tɔ tiɑtiɑ, ɑ bin gɑnn b bɑnle mɑnŋ ni yenɔ, k Mɑɑtiɑs dii, k b jii’u k pukn’ɔ tuomiinbɑ piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ ni.
Tɔn, jɑɑnm nbɑ k b yi’l *Pɑntekuot dɑɑl e bɑɑl, k dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k Yiesuweilɑ kul ɑ lɑkn tɑɑn lieb boyenn kuɑ ni.
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k fuut nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k fu nɑɑn nɑn wonpɑɑluk o dɑ nɑ, k bɑɑl sik k gbie ŋɑɑk nbɑ k b kɑl nɑ ni.
K b lɑ k siɑl nɑɑn nɑn mupieunŋ nɑ, k yɑt k tuɑ tuɑ suɑ kul pɑɑk
k Foŋɑnm gbie k yent suɑ kul ni, k b piin piɑk mɑbuolu buolu nbɑ k Foŋɑnm yɑɑ bii piɑk nɑ.
K *Suifnbɑ nbɑ tie yentinnɑ mun din be Selusɑɑlenm l yuo, bin nbɑ nyii tini kul po tingbounŋ nɑ ni k bɑɑl lenŋ.
Bɑɑ gbɑt fuut mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k nibul tikl lenŋ, k l tien’m yɑɑl-lituk, k mɑɑn Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ piɑk bɑlgɑni suɑ kul mɑɑn ni k u gbiɑ.
K l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn yɑɑl-lituk, k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Niib nɑ kul nbɑ piɑk nɑ k tie Gɑɑliile tieb kɑɑ ɑɑ?
K l tien nlee k t kul ɑ tɑn jiɑ gbiɑ k b piɑk t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn nnɑ?
T siɑb nyii Pɑlt nɑn Medi nɑn Elɑnm nɑn Mesopotɑɑmi nɑn Suude nɑn Kɑɑpɑɑdos nɑn Pɔn nɑn Asii,
nɑn Fliiji nɑn Pɑnfiili nɑn Ejipt, nɑn Liibi yɑkɑ po siɑn nbɑ kpiɑ nɑn Siilenn, duo nbɑ kpiɑ nɑn Liibi nɑ, k t ni yenm mun biɑ nyii Luonm,

k t siɑb tie Suifnbɑ, k lieb mun tie buolgɑnu nbɑ din lebt b jɑɑnti k wɑɑ Suifnbɑ Yennu, k t yenm mun biɑ nyii Klet nɑn Alɑɑbi, ŋɑɑn k t kul ɑ lek gbiɑ k b piɑk t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn ni, k piɑk dont Yennu sɑnn nɑn u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u tun.»
K l bɑkt ŋɑɑn yɑɑl lit’b k ŋmɑt b yɑn k b boi b lieb ɑ: «Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk tie bee?»
Ŋɑɑn k siɑb mun biɑ lɑɑ k sɑlkt Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «B nyuu dɑɑn e k yib.»

Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nɑn u tuomiinbɑ lieb piik nɑn yenɔ kuɑ nɑ fiil k set nibul nɑ tuɑnn po, k Piɑl pɑk sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Yinm Suifnbɑ, nɑn yinm nbɑ kul be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, gbiintl mɑn fɑnu mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk’i lin nbɑ nɑ, k gbɑt l pɑɑk.
Yɑɑ duki nɑn jɑb nɑ yib e nɑ, ŋɑɑn b k yib kɑɑ, k mɑɑn l dɑɑ tie sɑn-nyɑyendɑnn e.
Lin nbɑ tien nɑ tie lin nbɑ k *Yennu sɔkni Suoel din yet k yɑɑ l tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑ e nɑ, ɑ:

‹Yennu yet ɑ: *Dulnyɑ juontu yuo n tɑn sɑɑ tun nnɑ e: n tɑn sii siknt n Siek suɑ kul pɑɑk k i bonjɑbis nɑn i sɑpɑɑnbis tɑn sii sɔknt n mɑɑn k i nɑɑsinm mun tɑn sii lɑɑt yelntu, k i jɑkpelɑ tɑn sii dɑmi dɑmiit.
K l yuo mɑnŋ n tɑn sii siknt n Siek mɑnŋ n tuontunnɑ nbɑ tie jɑb nɑn bin nbɑ tie puob pɑɑk k b mun biɑ tɑn sii sɔknt n mɑɑn.
N tɑn sii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ sɑnpɑɑpo, nɑn bɑktnɔunŋ nyinɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k sɔn nɑn muu nɑn munyuuk tɑn sii be,
k yennu tɑn sɑɑ kpint k bɔnn, k ŋmɑɑlk mun tɑn sɑɑ kpint k mɔnn nɑn sɔn nɑ, k l puolpo n dɑɑl sɑɑ bɑɑl k l sii tie dɑjɑɑnn e,
k suɑ kul nbɑ tɑn boi min Yonmdɑɑnɔ po, n sɑɑ fiel’ɔ wɑɑ.› »

Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «Yinm Islɑɑeltieb, gbiintl mɑn lin nbɑ k n yɑɑ n yet’i k jikt sɑɑ Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ po. I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mi nɑn Yennu te k u tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nɑn nyinɑ i ni, k l set wɑnt nɑn mɔni nɑn Yennu e tun’ɔ.
Yennu mi lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tɑn tien, k l pɑɑk k u dɔnŋ lol lol k kubn’ɔ i nuu ni, k i te k biitdɑnm kpɑɑ tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u, k l wɑnt nɑn yinm e set kpii’u.
«Wɑɑ dɑɑn kpo k dɑɑ be kuun nii ni nɑ, k Yennu fɑt’ɔ k fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k mɑɑn kuun k fit diɑ’u.
K mɑɑn Dɑɑfiid din yet k jikt sɑɑ Yiesu po k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹N din tun lɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ n tuɑnn ni, k mɑɑn u be n niidiitu po, ɑ n dɑɑ jekl.
L pɑɑk, n mɔk pɑlpienn k piɑk pɑlpienn mɑɑn. Mi i lek i tɑnŋ i kpo gbɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n sii mɔk dindɑnn,
k mɑɑn ɑ tɑn kɑn nyik n siek k lin kpɑkn kpientinŋ ni. A kɑn ŋɑɑ k min ɑ Niŋɑnɔ gbɑnɑnt n tɑn bɑt,
k ɑ biɑ te k n bɑnn sɔni nbɑ bɑɑt mɑnfuol ni, k mɑɑ sii be ɑ tuɑnn ni n sii mɔk pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk.› »
K Piɑl biɑ ŋɑnm yet yɑɑ ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n sɑɑ fit wɑnn’i nɑn bɑlmɔni k jikt sɑɑ t yejɑsɑɑkuɑ Dɑɑfiid po. U din kpo k b pii’u, k u kɑɑɔk dɑɑ be t buol nnɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn u din tie Yennu sɔkni e, k din mi nɑn Yennu senn mɔsonn k tul’ɔ, k yet yɑɑ ɑ, u tɑn sɑɑ jii u yɑɑbuonn yenɔ kuɑ k din’ɔ u mɔnŋ nɑɑn.
Dɑɑfiid din mi lin nbɑ k Yennu yɑɑ wun tɑn tien. L pɑɑk, k u din pɑk *Klistu kuun fiilu po, k yet ɑ Yennu Nigɑnntuɑ tɑn kɑn kpɑkn kpientinŋ, k u gbɑnɑnt biɑ kɑn bɑt.»
«Yiesu nbɑ nɑ e k Yennu dɑɑn fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k t kul ɑ nɑ mun tie u kuun fiilu mɑnŋ siɑlɑɑdɑnm.

K Yennu biɑ donn’ɔ ɑ wun kɑl u niidiitu po. Wɑɑ kɑl nɑ k u gɑɑl Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u Bɑɑ din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k u yɑt Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ t pɑɑk k ŋɑnn e k i gbiɑ k biɑ lɑɑt lin nbɑ tuun t ni nɑ.
K mɑɑn Dɑɑfiid din k duo *Yendɔunŋ ni u tiɑɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn u din yet ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu yet n Yonmdɑɑnɔ ɑ Kɑln n niidiitu po
mɔkmɔk nɑn mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ jii ɑ dɑtɑi k tien’m ɑ tɑɑkpɑktɑ.› »
K Piɑl biɑ yet ɑ: «Tɔn, l ŋɑn k Islɑɑeltieb kul n bɑnn nɑn l tie Yiesu nɑ e, wun nbɑ k i dɑɑn te k b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u nɑ, ŋuɑ e k Yennu wɑnn nɑn u tie Klistu k biɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ biɑk.»
Niib nɑ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b pɑlɑ ni biil bonciɑnn, k b boi Piɑl nɑn u lieb nɑ ɑ: «T nɑɑ wɑɑs, k t sɑɑ tien nlee?»
K Piɑl yet’b ɑ: «Sie k i kul ɑ n mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k tin wul’i Yennu nyunwulu Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni, k Yennu n nyik i biit k cɑb’i, k sɑɑ tul’i u piini nbɑ tie Foŋɑnm nɑ,
k mɑɑn u ponŋ din senn mɔsonn k tul yinm nɑn i wɑɑs nɑn bin nbɑ kul be bɑnfɔkl k yɑb bonciɑnn k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu tɑn sɑɑ yiin’m nɑ.»
L puolpo e k Piɑl pɑk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k kpɑɑn’m k biɑ cie b pɑlɑ ɑ: «Nyint i mɔnŋ mɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ nibiit nɑ sinsuuk ni.»
Bin nbɑ din sɑk u mɑɑn mɑnŋ k b wul’b Yennu nyunwulu l dɑɑl nɑ, din tie nɑn niib tusɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑ k pukn Klistuweilɑ po.
K b ŋɑnmt k lek tumi k bɑnt tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ wɑnnu, k jii b yuo k tɑɑn diɑ lieb nɑn mɔtɑɑɔk, k lɑknt k centl pɑɑnu, k biɑ tiki mei Yennu
K jijiet ji din mɔk suɑ kul, k mɑɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn.
K Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ kul ɑ biɑ lek diɑ lieb nɑn mɔtɑɑɔk, k centl b bonɑ kul k tien b lieb,
k tuu kɔi bɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ k jikt l likli k tuol b lieb, k jɑnŋt nɑn suɑ kul nbɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Dɑɑl kul b biɑ lek tuu tɑɑn lieb e Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k b lɑknt bɑɑ jedikpɑguul b mɔnŋ ŋei ni, k sɑɑ di jiet nɑn lieb nɑn pɑlpienn, k ninfɔksɑi kɑɑ nɑn b lieb.
K yuo kul k b pɑk Yennu, k suɑ kul pɑl mei b pɑɑk. K dɑɑl kul k Yonmdɑɑnɔ biɑ ŋɑnmt k te k niib lɑɑt fielu k puki b pɑɑk.
Dɑsiɑl yenlekl dinn k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn din tɑn sɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni Yenmiɑlyuo.

Ŋɑnn e k b sɑɑ yɑɑ bin kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tɑnmɔb nbɑ k b din yi Tɑnmɔŋɑnŋ nɑ, k lɑ jɑsuɑ nnɑ k u kɑl lenŋ, k ponŋ tie wɔbk u mɑɑlu ni wɑɑ, k dɑɑl yejɑ ŋɑɑk kul k b din tuu jii’u k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ tɑnmɔb mɑnŋ buol ni, ɑ wuu mei likli niib nbɑ bɑɑt Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni nɑ.
Yuo nbɑ k u lɑ Piɑl nɑn Sɑn k b yɑɑ bin kuɑ nɑ, k u miɑl’b likli.
K b jiɑnt k goli’ɔ silll, k Piɑl tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii goli’t.»
Ŋɑnn e k u ji nul u ninbinɑ k goli’b, k dɑɑn nɑn u sɑɑ gɑɑl siɑl e b penŋ.
Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «N lek k mɔk likli k biɑ k mɔk sɑlmɑ k sɑɑ tul’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ e k n yɑɑ n tul’ɑ. Mi i tul’ɑ mɔb Yiesu *Klistu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ sɑnn ni, fiit kii sonm,»
ŋɑɑn suol u niidiitu k fiin’ɔ. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k juɑ nɑ tɑɑ kɑkt yiɑn ɑ,
k u tɑb k fiil set, k ji piin sonm k lin, k tɑn wei’b k kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni, k yuuk k mobt nɑn pɑlpienn, k pɑk Yennu.
K niib kul lɑ’u k u sonm k pɑk Yennu.
Bɑɑ ji din bɑnn nɑn ŋuɑ e tie miɑtɔ nbɑ tuu kɑɑl k mei niib likli Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk tɑnmɔb nbɑ k b yi’l Tɑnmɔŋɑnŋ nnɑ, k l ji yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b nɑn lin nbɑ tien k tul’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
K wɔbk mɑnŋ puul wɔb Piɑl nɑn Sɑn, k l tien niib nɑ kul ɑ bɑktnɔunŋ bonciɑnn, k b ciɑl sɑɑn lɑkn b buol ni. Bɑɑ lɑkn siɑn nɑ k b yi’l Sɑɑlomɔn bɑlntl.

Piɑl nbɑ lɑ niib nɑ yuo nbɑ k u yet ɑ: «Yinm Islɑɑeltieb, bee k l yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’i ni i? K bee k i bɑli tinm nnɑ ɑ? Tɑɑ te k jɑwɔbk nɑ fiil sonm nɑ, i duki mi ɑ l tie t mɔnŋ yiikuo ɑmi t mɔnŋ yentinu pɑɑk e?

Yennu nbɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb nɑn t yejɑlieb Yennu nɑ, ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ donn u tuontunnɔ Yiesu k tul’ɔ u mɔnŋ *yudɑnt. Yiesu mɑnŋ e k i jii’u k tien’ɔ t yudɑnm nii ni ɑ bin kpi’u nɑ, k *Piilɑɑt din ponŋ bikn sinsinn ɑ wun ŋɑɑ’u, ŋɑɑn k i yet’ɔ Piilɑɑt buol ni.
Ŋuɑ e lek tie Yennu nilɔ, k biɑ jen ɑ tie Niŋɑnɔ, ŋɑɑn k i lek yet’ɔ, ŋɑɑn biɑ miɑl Piilɑɑt ɑ wun nyinn nikpiiluk k tul’i.
Yinm e te k b kpii Mɑnfotultuɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k Yennu fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k tinm e tie lin nbɑ nɑ siɑlɑɑdɑnm.
Wɔbk nɑ tie wun nbɑ k i ponŋ tuu mi’u k biɑ lɑɑt’ɔ e, ŋɑɑn k u tɑn pɑɑk nɑ, k mɑɑn wɑɑ tien Yiesu mɑnŋ sɑnn yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk. Wɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e te k u pɑɑk cɑin k sie i nunm nnɑ.
«Tɔn, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, n mi nɑn yinm nɑn i yudɑnm nbɑ dɑɑn te k b kpii Yiesu nɑ, i dɑɑn k bɑnn yɑɑ tun lin nbɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn nnɑ e k Yennu tɑn te k lin nbɑ k u din pɑk k tul u sɔkniinbɑ kul, k b mun pɑk tul niib nɑ n tɑn tien mɔni, ɑ l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k u Klistu n lek di fɑlɑ.
«L pɑɑk, i mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ mɑn kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu, k wun nyik cɑb i biit,
k u sɑɑ tul’i fuon k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun Yiesu Klistu i buol ni, wun nbɑ k u ponŋ lukt’ɔ k tul’i nɑ,
ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ Yiesu mɑnŋ lek dɑɑ sii be *Yendɔunŋ ni, nɑn Yennu nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ ŋɑnm bonɑ kul ɑ, nɑn wɑɑ din te k u sɔknŋɑnm nbɑ din be yɑɑyuo ni nɑ nbɑ din yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
«Muois mun din yet ɑ: ‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu sɑɑ tul’i u sɔkniisuɑ, nɑn mɑɑ tie sɔkni biɑnŋ nbɑ k u sii tie i mɔnŋ nilɔ. Gbiintl’ɔ mɑn k tun lin nbɑ kul k u sɑɑ pɑk tul’i.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k gbɑt sɔkni mɑnŋ mɑɑn, Yennu sɑɑ nyinn l dɑɑnɔ i sinsuuk ni k wun kpo.›
« *Yennu sɔkni Sɑɑmuel nɑn sɔkniinbɑ kul nbɑ din wei u pɑɑk nɑ, din piɑk k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ yɑɑ lin tɑn tien t yuo nɑ ni po.

Yennu mɔsonn nbɑ k u din senn k tul u sɔkniinbɑ mɑnŋ, l mɔsonn tie i yɑl e, k *lol nbɑ k u din lol nɑn t yejɑnm nɑ, yuo nbɑ k u din yet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ɑ: ‹A yɑɑbuonyenɔ ni e k tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ n yetŋɑnm,› k l lol mun biɑ tie i yɑl e.
Yennu nbɑ din lukt u Tuontunnɔ mɑnŋ nɑ, k u tun’ɔ i buol ni sinsinn, ɑ yin lɑ yetŋɑnm k mɑɑn wɑɑ nyinn’i biit sɔni ni nɑ pɑɑk.»
Yuo nbɑ k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn dɑɑ din sie k piɑk tien niib mɑnŋ nɑ, k Yennu mɑnntieb nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑn *Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ kpil bɑɑl Piɑlnbɑ buol ni.
B wutuol duo nɑn Piɑl nɑn Sɑn, ɑ b wɑnt niib ɑ Yiesu dɑɑn fiil kuun ni k l wɑnt nɑn kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni k jen b mɑnfuol ni biɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k b suol’b k kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk ɑ lin yent ɑ, k mɑɑn yuo ponŋ gɑl ɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k niib bonciɑnn nbɑ din gbɑt Piɑl mɑɑn mɑnŋ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k jɑb nbɑ tien u weilɑ nɑ din tien nɑn tusɑ ŋɑnŋmu nɑ.
Lɑɑ tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑn *senniwɑntieb lɑkn b tituk kɑɑnu ni Selusɑɑlenm,
k b lɑkn nɑn juɑ nbɑ tie Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ k b yi’u * Ann nɑ, nɑn *Kɑɑyiif, nɑn Sɑn nɑn Aleksɑndl nɑn mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ŋɑɑtelieb,
k te k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn fiil k set b sinsuuk ni, ŋɑɑn k b boi’b ɑ: «Pɑnbuolbee k i mɔk i? K ŋmee sɑnn ni e k i fiin wɔbk nbɑ nɑ?»
Ŋɑnn e k Foŋɑnm fiil Piɑl ni, k u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb, gbiintl mɑn.
L i tie k i boi’t dinnɑ nɑ k jikt sɑɑ tuonŋɑnn nbɑ k t tun k tul wɔbk nɑ nɑn wɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ nɑ pɑɑk i e,

ŋɑnn l ŋɑn k i kul ɑ n bɑnn, k Islɑɑeltieb kul n mun bɑnn nɑn Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu *Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk e, k juɑ mɑnŋ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ, k sie i nunm ni nɑ. L Yiesu e k i dɑɑn kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u nɑ, ŋɑɑn k Yennu fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ.
Ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk piɑk u po nɑ, ɑ: ‹Tɑnn nbɑ k yinm tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tie tɑnn nbɑ te k ŋɑɑk mɔk pɑnŋ.›
K suɑ sɑnn ji kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni k Yennu tul niib ɑ bin lɑ fielu, sie Yiesu kuukuɑ.»

Tituk niib mɑnŋ nbɑ din lɑ Piɑl nɑn Sɑn pɑlcienn nbɑ k b mɔk nɑ, k biɑ bɑnn nɑn Piɑl nɑn Sɑn tie dɑnm nbɑ k mi kɑdɑɑɔk bonŋɑnn k k tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑ, l din yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b e, k b ji bɑnn nɑn b tuu tie Yiesu wei-nɑn-lieb e.
Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ lɑ juɑ nbɑ k b won te k u pɑɑk nɑ, k u sie Piɑl nɑn Sɑn buol ni nɑ, b ji din k mɔk mɔb nbɑ sɑɑ pɑk k jiin.
Ŋɑnn e k tituk niib din ŋɑɑn k b nyii b lɑknu dieok mɑnŋ ni dɑɑnn, ŋɑɑn k b biɑl fɑɑ nɑn b lieb lɑbɑɑl,
k boi b lieb, ɑ: «T sɑɑ tien jɑb nɑ nlee nɑ? K mɑɑn suɑ kul nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm ponŋ mi yɑɑl-lituk tuonn nbɑ k b tun mɑnŋ nɑ. L pɑɑk nnɑ t ji kɑn fit noi,
ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin potn k tul’b, k b ji dɑɑ mi k yi Yiesu sɑnn k tien niib ni, k lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ ji dɑɑ biɑ yɑt k sɑɑ niib ni.»
Ŋɑnn e k b yiin’m, ɑ bin ŋɑnm kuɑ, k tɑn potn k tul’b ɑ b dɑɑ mi k piɑk ɑmi k tumi niib Yiesu sɑnn ni jik.
K Piɑl nɑn Sɑn jiin k yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ n got lɑɑn lɑnn e tokn Yennu buol ni. L ŋɑn k t ji sɑk i mɔb ŋɑɑn nyik Yennu mɔb ɑmi nlee?
k mɑɑn tinm kɑn fit k nyik pinpɑɔk lin nbɑ po k t lɑ k biɑ gbɑt.»
K tituk niib mɑnŋ lek potn k tul’b nɑn ninmɔnjɑl, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’b yɑnn ɑ bii sɑɑ, k mɑɑn b k lɑ sɔnsɑu nbɑ k b sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ, k mɑɑn niib nɑ din piɑk Yennu lin nbɑ din tien nɑ pɑɑk,
k mɑɑn juɑ nbɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonn nɑ pɑɑk nɑ binɑ din gɑl nɑn binɑ piinnɑ nɑ wɑɑ.
Bɑɑ ŋɑɑ Piɑl nɑn Sɑn yuo nbɑ, k b ŋmɑt b lieb penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’b lin nbɑ k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ pɑk’b.
Bɑɑ mun gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ k b kul tɑɑn lieb nɑn dudukyent kuukuɑ, k mei Yennu ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin e din nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ nɑ, nɑn mɔkgbenŋɑ nɑn lin nbɑ kul be lenŋ,
k Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ ni e k ɑ din pɑk ɑ tuontunnɔ Dɑɑfiid nbɑ tie t yejɑ nɑ mɔb ni ɑ: ‹Bee te k bin nbɑ k tie Islɑɑeltieb nɑ tuun nɑn jɑpɑɑt i? Bee te k b loln lol yɑnɑ ɑ?
Tingbounŋ nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn yudɑnm tɑɑn lieb k tuok ɑ bin kɔn nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu nɑn u Klistu nɑ.›
«L tie bɑlmɔni e nɑn *Heluod nɑn Pɔns *Piilɑɑt nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Islɑɑeltieb nɑ nɑn Islɑɑeltieb dɑɑn set lɑkn duo nɑ ni, k lol lolɑ ɑ bin kpi ɑ tuontunŋɑnɔ Yiesu, wun nbɑ k ɑ din gɑnn k senn’ɔ nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k b lɑkn, ɑ bin tun lin nbɑ kul k ɑ ponŋ din dukn ɑ yiikuo nɑn ɑ yɑnbuɑt, k yɑɑ l tɑn sɑɑ tien nɑ.
Tɔn, mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, gbiintl niib nɑ nbɑ fuɑ kɔnfuɑt nɑn ninmɔnn t pɑɑk nɑ, k ŋɑɑn k tinm nbɑ tie ɑ tuontunnɑ nɑ i piɑk ɑ mɑɑn nɑn pɑlcienn bonciɑnn.
Tɑntl ɑ nuu k te k bɑɑtb n pɑɑk k bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ i tuun ɑ tuontunŋɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni.»
K bin nbɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ nbɑ gbenn Yenmiɑlu nɑ yuo nbɑ, k siɑn nbɑ po k b tikl nɑ ji jek, k b kul ɑ gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm, k ji piin piɑk Yennu mɑɑn nɑn pɑlcienn.
L yuo nɑ k Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ kul ɑ tɑɑn lieb nɑn dudukyent kuukuɑ. B suɑ din k yɑɑ ɑ u yen siɑl u mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn b din centl b bonɑ k tien b lieb e.
L yuo nɑ jik k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ din nyint Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu kuun fiilu *siɑlɑ nɑn yiikuo bonciɑnn, k Yennu yetŋɑnm bonciɑnn din be b kul ni.
K lin nbɑ nɑ suɑ din kɑɑ b ni k pɔt siɑl, k mɑɑn bin nbɑ din mɔk b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ kpɑɑnt nɑn b ŋei din tuu kɔi e, k gɑɑl l likli k bɑɑl nɑn’n,
k tɑn tien tuomiinbɑ nɑ, k b centl k tien b lieb nɑn bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
K jɑsuɑ din be lenŋ k u sɑnn yi Suosiɑf, k u din tie Liefi buolu ni nilɔ, k b din mɑl’ɔ Siipl, k tuomiinbɑ nɑ din yi’u Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs (k l pɑɑk tie wun nbɑ cien pɑlɑ nɑ),
k u din tɑn kɔi u kpɑɑb, k gɑɑl l likli k bɑɑl nɑn’n, k tɑn tul tuomiinbɑ nɑ.
Jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be k u sɑnn yi Anɑɑniɑs, k u ŋɑɑpuo sɑnn mun din yi Sɑɑfiilɑ, k u mun din tɑn kɔi u kpɑɑb k gɑɑl l likli,
ŋɑɑn pɑɑt likli mɑnŋ pɑɑk k bɔl k u ŋɑɑpuo mi l po, ŋɑɑn jii lin nbɑ tenn nɑ, k bɑɑl nɑn’n k tɑn tul tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ.
K Piɑl boi’ɔ ɑ: «Anɑɑniɑs, ɑ tien nlee k *Sɑɑtɑn kuɑ yent’ɑ, k ɑ fɑɑl fɑɑk k luon k ɑ kpɑnn Foŋɑnm, k pɑɑt likli nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn kɔi ɑ kpɑɑb nɑ pɑɑk i?

Fɑɑ dɑɑn dɑɑ k kɔi ɑ kpɑɑb mɑnŋ nɑ, l dɑɑn k tie ɑ yɑl kɑɑ ɑɑ? K fɑɑ biɑ dɑɑn kɔi’l nɑ, l likli mɑnŋ biɑ dɑɑn k be ɑ yent ni kɑɑ ɑɑ? K bee tien k ɑ dukn ɑ pɑl ni k tun lin nbɑ nɑ? A k fɑɑl fɑɑk mɑnŋ k pɑɑn nilɔ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ fɑɑl k pɑɑn Yennu e.»
Anɑɑniɑs nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k u bɑɑ k kpo l yuo nɑ. K jɑŋmɑɑnciɑɔnŋ kuɑ bin nbɑ kul gbɑt u kuun mɑnŋ po.
K nɑɑsinm fiil k jii’u k pɔbn’ɔ cincenn ni, k nyii nɑn’ɔ k sɑɑ pii’u.
Ŋɑnn e k l yɑnn nɑn kut muntɑ nnɑ nɑ, k u ŋɑɑpuo bɑɑl k kuɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k bɑnn lin nbɑ tien.
K Piɑl biɑ boi’ɔ ɑ: «Yetl’n, l set tie bɑlmɔni e nɑn fin nɑn ɑ sɔlɔ kpɑɑb likli nbɑ k i gɑɑl nɑ kul i nɑ ɑɑ?» K u jiin ɑ: «Nnn, l kul i nɑ.»
K Piɑl boi’ɔ ɑ: «Bee k fin nɑn ɑ sɔlɔ tɑɑn mɔb, k lol lol ɑ i bikn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Foŋɑnm i? Tɔn, nɑɑsinm nbɑ jii ɑ sɔlɔ k sɑɑn k sɑɑ pii’u nɑ, ŋɑnm e kuɑ tɑnmɔb nnɑ, k b mun biɑ sɑɑ jii’ɑ nnɑ e.»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k u bɑɑ k kpo, k nɑɑsinm nɑ kuɑ k lɑ k u kpo wɑɑ, k b biɑ jii’u k nyii nɑn’ɔ k sɑɑ pii’u k kpiɑn’ɔ nɑn u sɔlɔ.
L yuo nɑ k jɑŋmɑɑnciɑɔnŋ suol Yiesuweilɑ kul nɑn bin nbɑ kul gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.
L yuo nɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ niib nɑ ni bonciɑnn. K Yiesuweilɑ kul ɑ tuu tɑɑn lieb Sɑɑlomɔn bɑlntl buol.
Bin nbɑ k tie Yiesuweilɑ nɑ din k mɔk pɑl nbɑ k b sɑɑ lɑkn nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn niib din piɑk dont Yiesuweilɑ nɑ bonciɑnn.
Jɑb nɑn puob bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ k pukn Yiesuweilɑ nɑ po.
Ŋɑnn e k niib din nyi nɑn bɑɑtb, k duɑnt’b liɑni nɑn dunduɑni pɑɑk sɑnjokpini ni, ɑ Piɑl i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl k gɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k u yun-yunŋ n lek bɑɑ b pɑɑk.
K niib nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm digbɑnbis ni mun jikt bɑɑtb, nɑn bin nbɑ k nɑlnbiit dɑɑmi’b nɑ, k bɑɑt nɑn’m, k b kul ɑ din lɑɑt lɑɑfiɑ.
L pɑɑk, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑn u wei-nɑn-lieb kul, bin nbɑ tie *Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ nɑ, din fiin punponn bonciɑnn nɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ, k din te k b sɑɑn
k sɑɑ suol tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ k kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk.
Ŋɑɑn l nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ e k Yennu *mɑlɑkɑ sik k luot dɑnsɑlk tɑnmɔi, k nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ:
«Ii sɑɑ mɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k sɑɑ set, ŋɑɑn muɑnt k tul niib mɑɑn nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nɑ kul ɑ.»

Bɑɑ gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k b sɑɑn k sɑɑ kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ ni, sɑn-nyɑpob ni, k ji piin k wɑnt niib mɑɑn mɑnŋ. K Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑn u wei-nɑn-lieb nɑ din yiin Islɑɑeltieb yudɑnm kul ɑ, k lɑk’m tituk kɑɑnu, k b tɑn tun sejenm ɑ bin nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ dɑnsɑlk ni k bɑɑl nɑn’m nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn b sɑɑn dɑnsɑlk mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ got k k lɑ’b k ŋmɑt tituk mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ yet’b ɑ:
«Tɑɑ bɑɑl dɑnsɑlk ni yuo nbɑ, t lɑ k tɑnmɔi kpɑl e kenkenken ɑ, k dɑnsɑlguulɑ nɑ be tɑnmɔi ni k guu, k t luot tɑnmɔi nɑ, ŋɑɑn k k lɑ suɑ dɑnsɑldieok mɑnŋ ni.»
Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k l tien’m yɑɑl-lituk nɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ botu mɑnŋ pɑɑk k b ji bils lin nbɑ sɑɑ tien,
k tɑn suɑ k jɑsuɑ nnɑ kuɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Gotl mɑn, jɑb nbɑ k i won kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk wonn nɑ, b sie Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k tumi niib.»
L yuo nɑ k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ jii u jɑb, k b sɑɑn k sɑɑ nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ k jen nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn b k nyinn’b nɑn pɑnŋ kɑɑ, k mɑɑn b tiin jɑŋmɑɑni ɑ niib nɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn jɑɑt’b tɑnɑ.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn’m yuo nbɑ, k b te k b sɑɑn set tituk niib nɑ sinsuuk ni, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ piin k boi’b buboit,
k yet’b ɑ: «T dɑɑn tul’i mɔb nɑn ninmɔnn, k yɑɑ ɑ i dɑɑ wɑnt niib wɑnnu juɑ mɑnŋ sɑnn ni, ŋɑɑn i tun bee nɑ? I jii i wɑnnu mɑnŋ k yɑt Selusɑɑlenm kul po, k ji luon ɑ i tien’t Yiesu kpiilɑ.»
K Piɑl nɑn tuomiinbɑ lieb nɑ jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Sie k tii lek ii sɑɑk Yennu mɔb k gɑl nilɔ mɔb.
Yiesu mɑnŋ e k i dɑɑn ponŋ kpɑɑ tɑbn’ɔ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k kpii’u nɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ tie t yejɑnm Yennu nɑ, ŋuɑ e fiin Yiesu kuun ni,
k jii’u donn’ɔ k kɑɑn’ɔ u niidiitu po, k tien’ɔ Yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Fietuɑ, ɑ k Islɑɑeltieb n lɑ yɑɑk k fit mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k biɑ fit lɑ nyikcɑbu.
Tinm nɑn Foŋɑnm e tie Yiesu kuun fiilu mɑnŋ siɑlɑɑdɑnm, k Yennu jii u Siek mɑnŋ k tul wun nbɑ sɑɑk u mɔb.»
Yudɑnm mɑnŋ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b wutuol fiil bonciɑnn, k b ji yɑɑ bin kpi tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ.

Ŋɑɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnsuɑ nnɑ din be, k u sɑnn yi Gɑɑmɑɑliɑl, k u din tie *senniwɑntuɑ e, k niib kul din tie’u nibɑɑkl, k u din fiil k set tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm sinsuuk ni k yet ɑ bin nyinn tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nɑn-yel po wɑɑn.
Ŋɑnn e k u yet’b ɑ: «Islɑɑeltieb, ii mi mɑn nɑn yɑɑ yɑɑ i tien niib nɑ lin nbɑ nɑ fɑn.

Siɑn yuo nbɑ din gɑl, k Teudɑɑs din wɑnt u mɔnŋ nɑn u tie nijɑɑnsuɑ e k niib nɑn kobi ŋɑnnɑ nɑ din tie u puolpo juɑmu, ŋɑɑn niib nbɑ din tɑn kpii’u nɑ, u juɑmu nɑ kul ɑ din yɑt e, k u jɑgbeln nɑ gbenn.
Ŋɑnn tɑn gɑl nnɑ, k Suudɑ, wun nbɑ din tie Gɑɑliile nilɔ mun din nyii k set nikɑnt yuo nɑ, k wɑnt u mɔnŋ, k din tunn niib bonciɑnn yɑn k b wɑɑ’u, k b mun din tɑn kpii’u, k u juɑmu nɑ kul yɑt.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ lɑɑ, kpɑn ŋɑɑnt jɑb mɑnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ tie’b siɑl, k l i tie k b dudukt nɑn b tuonɑ nɑ i tie nisɑɑlk yɑl i e, l tɑn sɑɑ gbenn ɑ.
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k l tie Yennu yɑl i e, i kɑn fit k nyɑnn’b. I sɑɑ lɑ k i mɑnn kpet k kɔn nɑn Yennu e gbɑɑ.» Ŋɑnn e k tituk niib mɑnŋ ji sɑk Gɑɑmɑɑliɑl mɔb nɑ,
k yiin tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ k kuɑn’m, k te k b buo’b gbɑnn, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑ’b, ŋɑɑn tul’b mɔb ɑ: «Ii mi mɑn k i ji kii piɑk Yiesu sɑnn mɑnŋ ni.»
Ŋɑnn mɑnŋ e k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nyii tituk kɑɑnu nɑ ni nɑn pɑlpienn, Yennu nbɑ lɑ k b jɑnŋ nɑn fei dinu, Yiesu sɑnn pɑɑk nɑ.
K dɑɑl kul k b sɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lin niib ŋei ni, k wɑnt niib ɑ Yiesu tie *Klistu e k biɑ muɑntl u lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, k k nyikt.

L yuo nɑ k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ ŋɑnmt yɑbtl k puki nɑ, k bunbulmi tɑn bɑɑl *Suifnbɑ nbɑ piɑk Glek mɑɑn nɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ piɑk b mɔnŋ mɑɑn nɑ sinsuuk ni, k mɑɑn bin nbɑ piɑk Glek mɑɑn nɑ din yet ɑ b i tuol jiet dɑɑl kul, b pɑkɔi k lɑɑt b tolɑ nɑn lieb nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k tuomiinbɑ *piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ yiin Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ kul ɑ, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «L k ŋɑn k tin nyik Yennu mɑɑn muɑntu ŋɑɑn biɑl jiet tolu ni.
L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, gotl k gɑnn jɑb bɑnlole i sinsuuk ni, bin nbɑ k i mi nɑn b gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn yɑnfɑntl, k tin tien’m tuonɑ nɑ yudɑnm,
ŋɑɑn k tinm n jii t mɔnŋ yuo k tien Yenmiɑlu ni, nɑn Yennu mɑɑn wɑnnu ni, k dɑɑ nɑk.»

K mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ kul ji din mɔk pɑlpienn tuomiinbɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k b gɑnn Etiɑnn, wun nbɑ mɑntk gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn yɑdɑ nɑ, nɑn Fiiliip, nɑn Pluokɔl, nɑn Niikɑɑnɔl, nɑn Tiimɔn, nɑn Pɑɑlmenɑɑs, nɑn Niikolɑ, wun nbɑ din nyii Antiɑɔs. Sinsinn u din k tie Suif nilɔ, ŋɑɑn siɑn yuo u din kpint u jɑɑnti k wɑɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti, ŋɑɑn k mɔtɑɑnɑ k u ji tie Yiesuweilɔ.
Mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ nbɑ lukt’b yuo nbɑ, k b te k b sɑɑn set tuomiinbɑ nɑ tuɑnn po, k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ miɑl Yennu k tul’b ŋɑɑn jii b nii k yii b pɑɑk.
L puolpo e k Yennu mɑɑn ŋɑnmt k yɑt kuɑ niib ni, k Yiesuweilɑ mun biɑ yɑbtl k puki bonciɑnn Selusɑɑlenm, k Yennu mɑnntieb bonciɑnn sɑk Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ.
Etiɑnn nbɑ din gbie nɑn Yennu yetŋɑnm nɑn u yiikuo bonciɑnn nɑ, din tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ niib nɑ sinsuuk ni.

Ŋɑɑn nisiɑb din k sɑk’ɔ. Bin nbɑ din noi nɑn Etiɑnn mɑnŋ din tie Suifnbɑ nbɑ din tie dɑɑbɑ, k b ŋɑɑ’b b dɑɑbs ni, k b nyii Siilenn nɑn Aleksɑndli nɑn Siiliisi nɑn Asii ni e. B mun din mɔk b mɔnŋ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok o.
Ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm din tul Etiɑnn yɑnfɑntl bonciɑnn, k b k fit nyɑnn’ɔ nɑn u mɑɑn mɑnŋ.
Bɑɑ din k fit nyɑnn’ɔ nɑ, k b din kuɑ nisiɑb ɑ bin yet ɑ nnɑ: «T gbɑt k u piɑk bonbilɑnkɑnt k biil Muois nɑn Yennu.»
Bɑɑ yet nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k niib nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑn *senniwɑntieb wutuol duo, k b fiil k suol’ɔ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ b yudɑnm tituk buol ni,
k b tɑn bɑɑl nɑn nisiɑb nnɑ biɑk ɑ bin fɑɑl fɑɑk, k yet ɑ: «Yuo kul juɑ nɑ tun piɑk k biil Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk mɑnŋ, nɑn Muois *senni nɑ e,
k mɑɑn t gbɑt k u yet ɑ Yiesu nbɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ sɑɑ bet Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, ɑ ŋɑɑn lebt Muois kɑɑl nbɑ k u din senn nɑ.»
Bin nbɑ kul din lɑkn kɑl tituk mɑnŋ ni din kpɑɑ b ninbinɑ k goli Etiɑnn, k tɑn lɑ k u nunpo lebt k ji nɑɑn nɑn *mɑlɑkɑ nunpo nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ boi Etiɑnn ɑ: «L set tie mɔni ee?»
K Etiɑnn yɑɑ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn n nɑɑ wɑɑs, gbiintl mɑn. Yuo nbɑ k t yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din be Mesopotɑɑmi yɑkl po, l yuo k u din dɑɑ k sɑɑn Hɑlɑn nɑ, k Yennu nbɑ be *yudɑnt ni nɑ dɔkt u pɑɑk
k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fiit k nyik ɑ tinŋ nɑn ɑ niib, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k n sɑɑ wɑnn’ɑ nɑ.›
Ŋɑnn e k u fiil k nyik Sɑldeen tinŋ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn k sɑɑ kɑl Hɑlɑn duo ni. U bɑɑ kuun puolpo e, k Yennu biɑ te k u fiil, k bɑɑl tinŋ nbɑ k i be nɑ ni.
Ŋɑɑn Yennu dɑɑ din k tul’ɔ tinŋ nɑ nɑn bonmintk ɑ, ɑ wun yent ŋɑɑn senn mɔsonn ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ tul’ɔ tinŋ nnɑ, k ŋuɑ nɑn u yɑɑbuonɑ i yen. Ŋɑɑn l yuo nɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm dɑɑ din k mɔk bik.
Nnɑ e k Yennu din yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹A yɑɑbuonɑ tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn k be tingɑnŋ ni e wɑɑ, k tɑn sii tie dɑɑbɑ lenŋ, k b tɑn sɑɑ lɑ muksuk lenŋ bonciɑnn, k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ kobiinnɑ.
Ŋɑɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ niib nbɑ k b sii tuun k tien’m nɑ, n tɑn sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ, k l puolpo, ɑ yɑɑbuonɑ mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ nyi tinŋ mɑnŋ ni, k bɑɑl tinŋ nɑ ni, k jiɑnt’n.›

«L puolpo k Yennu *lol lol k tul Ablɑɑhɑɑnm, k biɑ din wɑnn’ɔ lol mɑnŋ nyinn, ɑ ŋuɑ nɑn u yɑɑbuonɑ i poli punɑ. K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tɑn mɑl Isɑɑk, k l dɑɑ ŋɑnniin dɑɑl k u pot’ɔ, k Isɑɑk mun din tɑn pot u bijɑ Sɑɑkɔb, k Sɑɑkɔb mun din tɑn pot u bonjɑi piik nɑn bɑnle bin nbɑ tie t yejɑsɑɑkɑb.
K Sɑɑkɔb wɑɑs mɑnŋ din tɑn mɔk punponn nɑn b wɑɑlɔ Suosiɑf, k din tɑn suol’ɔ k kɔi’ɔ, k nisiɑb dɑɑ’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Ejipt tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn Yennu din be nɑn’ɔ,
k din nyinn’ɔ fɑlɑ kul ɑ ni, k biɑ tul’ɔ yɑn k te k Ejipt kpɑnbɑl Fɑɑlɑɑɔn niɑn’ɔ k jii’u tien’ɔ yudɑɑnɔ Ejipt tinŋ ni, k biɑ te k u tie yudɑɑnɔ u ŋɑɑk ni.
«L puolpo k kon tɑn bɑɑ Ejipt tinŋ nɑn Kɑɑnɑɑn tinŋ ni kul ɑ, k kon suol niib bonbiil, k t yejɑnm kɔnŋ jiet.
Sɑɑkɔb nbɑ din gbɑt ɑ dii be Ejipt yuo nbɑ, k u tun u wɑɑs nbɑ tie t yejɑnm lenŋ. Ŋɑnn i din tie b sinsinn sɑɑnu.
«B sɑɑnu tɑɑl munle ni e, k Suosiɑf ji din te k u nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ bɑnn’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e k Fɑɑlɑɑɔn ji din bɑnn Suosiɑf buolu.
K Suosiɑf ji din tun’m ɑ bin ŋmɑt kun u cɑnbɑɑ Sɑɑkɔb buol, k sɑɑ jii ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul k jen nɑn’m Ejipt nɑ, k b din tie niib piinlole nɑn bɑnŋmu.
«Ŋɑnn e k Sɑɑkɔb nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb mɑnŋ fiil sɑɑn Ejipt k sɑɑ kɑl, k l puolpo, ŋuɑ nɑn u wɑɑs din tɑn kpo gbenn lenŋ
k b jii b gbɑnɑnt k sɑɑn nɑn’m Siisenm k sɑɑ pii’b kɑɑɔk nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ponŋ din dɑɑ nɑn likli Hemɔl nibuolu buol ni nɑ.
«Yuo nbɑ din tɑn pel nɑn Yennu n gbien u mɔsonn nbɑ k u din senn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑ, l yuo mɑnŋ, t niib nbɑ be Ejipt nɑ ji yɑbt bonciɑnn.
L puolpo e k suɑ din dii Ejipt nɑɑn, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ din k mi Suosiɑf.
K kpɑnbɑl mɑnŋ din diɑ t bɑɑ nbɑ diɑbiiuk, k din tuu ton nɑn’m bonciɑnn, k biɑ din tuu miɑ’b ɑ bin nyinn b sɑnpɑnti b ŋei ni k lu’b k bin kpo.
«Ŋɑnn e k b din mɑl Muois, k u fɑn bonciɑnn, k Yennu biɑ din luon’ɔ, k u be u bɑɑ ŋɑɑk ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ.
U bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ nbɑ din tɑn nyinn’ɔ ŋɑɑk ni yuo nbɑ, k kpɑnbɑl nɑ sɑpɑɑmɔ din lɑ’u, k gɑɑl’ɔ k jii’u k wubi’ɔ, k u ji tie nɑn u mɔnŋ bik nɑ.
Nnɑ e k b din tumi ŋuɑ Muois, yɑn kul nbɑ k Ejipt-tieb mɔk, k u mɑɑn nɑn tuonɑ din mɔk pɑnŋ.
«Muois nbɑ din tɑn lɑ binɑ piinnɑ yuo nbɑ, k dɑsiɑl k u tɑn dukn ɑ wun gɔn u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ buolu Islɑɑeltieb,
k tɑn lɑ k Ejipt nilɔ buo Islɑɑeltieb ni yenɔ, k u bɑɑl ɑ wun fɑt’ɔ, k tɑn kpii Ejipt nilɔ mɑnŋ.
U din mi ɑ u nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ sɑɑ bɑnn ɑ Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k ŋuɑ e n nyinn’b dɑɑbs ni, ŋɑɑn b din k bɑnn nnɑ.
K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k u biɑ lɑ Islɑɑeltieb bɑnle k b kɔn k u luon k wun tɑɑn’m k bin mɑnŋ nɑn b lieb, k yet’b ɑ: ‹Gotl mɑn i tie nɑɑ wɑɑs e, k bee tien k i buo i lieb k tien i lieb dɑni i?›
K wun nbɑ tul u luɑ dɑnŋ nɑ pii Muois, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋmee lukt’ɑ ɑ ɑ tien t yudɑɑnɔ ɑmi t bɑlbuulɔ.
A yɑɑn luon k ɑ kpi’n nɑn fɑɑ won kpii Ejipt nilɔ nɑ ɑmi ii?›
Muois nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k u ciɑl nyii Ejipt tinŋ ni, k bɑɑl Mɑɑdiɑn tinŋ ni k be lenŋ, k mɑl bonjɑi bɑnle.
«Binɑ piinnɑ nbɑ din tɑn gɑl, k u din tɑn sɑɑn muuk ni dɑsiɑl k sɑɑ bɑɑl Siinɑi juɑl buol ni, k lɑ mupieunŋ, k l di k leni kunkonjɑgotuk pɑɑk k *mɑlɑkɑ dɔkt muu mɑnŋ ni.
«Muois nbɑ din lɑ nnɑ mɑnŋ k l tien’ɔ yɑɑl-lituk, k u cɑt nɑkn ɑ wun ŋɑnm got k ji gbɑt k Yonmdɑɑnɔ kunkɔl k u yien’ɔ k yɑɑ ɑ:
‹Min e tie ɑ yejɑnm Yennu, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb Yennu.› Muois nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji kuɑ’u, k u ji sie k jekl k ji k mɔk pɑl nɑn wun got.
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Pitl ɑ tɑɑsɑɑt nbɑ k ɑ pil nɑ, k mɑɑn siɑn nbɑ k ɑ sie nɑ tie tinŋɑnŋ e.
Tɔn, n got k lɑ Ejipt-tieb nbɑ dint n mɔnŋ niib fɑlciɑɔnŋ Ejipt tinŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ, k n gbiɑ b fɑbni. Ŋɑnn e k n sik mɑɑ n fɑt nyinn’b. Bɑɑt mɔtɑɑnɑ k n sɑɑ tun’ɑ Ejipt tinŋ ni.› »

«Muois nbɑ nɑ e k Islɑɑeltieb din yet’ɔ nɑ, k b din yet’ɔ k yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Ŋmee lukt’ɑ ɑ ɑ tien t yudɑɑnɔ ɑmi t bɑlbuulɔ?› ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ nɑ e k Yennu mun din lukt’ɔ ɑ wuu tie b yudɑɑnɔ nɑn b fɑt-tuɑ biɑk, k ŋuɑ Yennu din te k mɑlɑkɑ pɑk nɑn’ɔ ŋɑɑn tun’ɔ.
