Mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ e k Muois din lɑ’u kunkonjɑgotuk pɑɑk muu nɑ ni nɑ.
Ŋuɑ Muois e din tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ din nyinn’b Ejipt tinŋ nnɑ, k din biɑ tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ Ejipt tinŋ ni, nɑn bɑɑ biɑ din sɑɑ puot Mɔkmunŋ nɑ, nɑn bɑɑ biɑ din be pɑɑnpieonŋ ni binɑ piinnɑ nɑ.
«L Muois e din yet Islɑɑeltieb ɑ: ‹Yennu tɑn sɑɑ tun sɔkniisuɑ i buol ni nɑn wɑɑ tun’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k u sii tie i buolu ni yenɔ.›

Muois mɑnŋ e din be nɑn t niib lɑknu ni, pɑɑnpieonŋ ni nɑ. Lenŋ e k u din tɑn duo Siinɑi juɑl pɑɑk k sɑɑ be nɑn Yennu mɑlɑkɑ, k mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ din piɑk k tien Muois, ɑ Muois n sɔkn tul t yejɑnm. L yuo e k Muois din gɑɑl Yennu mɑnfuol mɑɑn k tul t yejɑnm nɑn tinm.
«Ŋɑɑn t yejɑnm din k luon k bin sɑk’ɔ. L pɑɑk, k b din yet’ɔ, k mɑɑn b yɑn tunn Ejipt ɑ.
B din yet *Aɑlɔn ɑ wun mɑɑ pɑtɑ, k b i tie b ŋmɑkt dɑnm k bii wɑɑ’b, k biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Ŋɑɑn Muois ŋɑnin, wun nbɑ nyinn’t Ejipt nɑ, t k mi lin nbɑ tien’ɔ.›
Ŋɑnn e k b mɑɑ pɑtl k nɑn’ɔ nɑɑjɑbik, k mɑnn *mɑlunŋ l pɑɑk k tien jɑɑnm lin nbɑ k b mɑɑ nɑn b mɔnŋ nii nɑ pɑɑk.

«L pɑɑk, k Yennu ji k goli’b ŋɑɑn cɑb’b, k b ji jiɑntl ŋmɑɑbilɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: ‹Islɑɑeltieb, yɑɑ din kpi bonkobt k mɑnn mɑlunŋ muuk ni binɑ piinnɑ nɑ, i din mɑnn mɑlunŋ mɑnŋ k tien min ee?
I din tuu jikt pɑtl Molɔk lɑnbounŋ o, k biɑ din tuu jikt ŋmɑɑbil Liefɑn nɑɔnŋ o, k l tie pɑtl, k i jiɑntl’l. L pɑɑk, n sɑɑ bel’i i tinŋ ni k sɑɑn nɑn’i siɑn nbɑ fɔk k gɑl Bɑɑbiilonn.› »

Etiɑnn biɑ piɑk k yɑɑ ɑ: «T yejɑnm din fɑɑ Yennu lɑnbounŋ muuk ni, k l tie *siɑlɑ nɑn Yennu din lol lol nɑn b yejɑnm k l lɑnbounŋ ni, Yennu nbɑ din diɑn u *senni nbɑ tɑnpɑtlɑi ŋɑnle pɑɑk nɑ din be l ni. Yennu e din wɑnn Muois, bɑɑ sii fɑɑ lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ, k b fɑɑ. L din tie nɑn Muois nbɑ din lɑ lin nbɑ nɑ e.

L puolpo, k t yejɑnm ji din tɑn jii lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ k tul b wɑɑs, k b gɑɑl k mun jikt k sɑɑ nɑn’n, yuo nbɑ k Suosue din tie b yudɑɑnɔ nɑ, k din bɑɑl nnɑ yuo nbɑ k b din fɑt tinŋ k Yennu din bel nibuolgɑni nbɑ din yen’n l yuo nɑ, k l din biɑl tinŋ nɑ ni dik dik nɑn Dɑɑfiid yuo mun.
Dɑɑfiid mɑnŋ din gbuot Yennu nunm, k din tɑn miɑl Yennu ɑ wun cɑb’ɔ k wun mɑɑ ŋɑɑk k tul Sɑɑkɔb Yennu nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Sɑɑlomɔn e din tɑn mɑɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ.
«Ŋɑɑn t mi nɑn Yɑbnt Yennu k kɑɑl ŋei nbɑ k niib mɑɑ ni kɑɑ. L tie nɑn Yennu sɔkni nbɑ din yet ɑ:
‹Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet ɑ Sɑnpɑɑk tie n nɑɑngbounŋ o, k tingbounŋ nɑ mun tie n tɑɑkpɑktl. Ŋɑbuolbee k i sɑɑ fit mɑɑ k tul’n i? Liɑ buol e k n sɑɑ fit kuɑ lenŋ i?
Min kɑɑ din nɑn bonɑ nɑ kul ii?› »
Etiɑnn biɑ piɑk k yɑɑ ɑ: «I mɑntk tie nigbɑbɑ hei, k i dudukt biɑ fɔk nɑn Yennu bonciɑnn, k i tubɑ k gbiɑ Yennu mɑɑn i k i yet Foŋɑnm tuonɑ. I nɑɑn nɑn i yejɑnm nɑ e.
Yennu sɔkni lɑnɔ po e k i yejɑnm din k muks’ɔ? B biɑ din kpii bin nbɑ din ponŋ sɔknt ɑ Niŋɑnɔ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ wɑɑ. Tɔn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ yinm e tie dɑnm nbɑ nyii u puol k biɑ tie u kpiilɑ.
Yinm e biɑ tie dɑnm nbɑ din gɑɑl Yennu senni nbɑ k i din gɑɑl mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nuu ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lek k sɑk’l nɑ.»
K *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm, sɑɑkɑb nɑn *senniwɑntieb nɑ nbɑ gbiint Etiɑnn mɑɑn mɑnŋ k b donn wutuol bonbiil ŋɑɑn gbɑb mɔgbɑbɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm fiil Etiɑnn ni, k u yɑɑt k got *Yendɔunŋ ni, k lɑ Yennu yentsɑɑkɑl, k Yiesu sie ŋuɑ Yennu niidiitu po,
k u yet ɑ: «Gotl, n lɑ k sɑnpɑɑpo luot k *Nisɑɑlk Bijɑ sie Yennu niidiitu po.»
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ yudɑnm, sɑɑkɑb nɑn senniwɑntieb nɑ yikn sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn pii b tubɑ, k b kul ɑ tɑn lɑkn wuul bɑɑl k kpil’ɔ,
k bel’ɔ k nyinn’ɔ duo mɑnŋ ni, k piin k jɑɑt Etiɑnn tɑnɑ ɑ bin kpi’u, k siɑlɑɑdɑnm jii bin nbɑ jɑɑt tɑnɑ nɑ liɑtfɔkt k bil nɑɑsimɔ nbɑ k b yi’u Sɔul nɑ buol ni, ɑ wuu guu.
B din jɑɑt’ɔ e dik dik dik, k u din tɑn miɑl ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu, gɑɑt n siek nɑ,»
ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, dɑɑ jikt b biit nɑ k biil’b.» U yet nnɑ e ŋɑɑn ji kpo.

K Sɔul din sɑk bɑɑ din sɑk ɑ bin kpi’u. L dɑɑl mɑnŋ e k muksbiil din bɑɑl *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ pɑɑk k b kul ɑ din nyii yɑt k sɑɑn Suude nɑn *Sɑɑmɑɑli yɑkɑ po, ŋɑɑn nyik tuomiinbɑ nɑ kuukuɑ lenŋ.
K yentinsiɑb din jii Etiɑnn, k sɑɑn sɑɑ pii’u, ŋɑɑn mɔ yikn k fɑbn bonciɑnn u pɑɑk.
K Sɔul ŋɑnin din luon wun biil Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib e, k din lin kuɑ ŋɑɑk ŋɑɑk, k so Yiesuweilɑ, jɑb nɑn puob, k nyint’b k sɑɑ kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli.
Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din nyii k yɑt nɑ ji din sɑɑ lokl kul po e k muɑntl Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ,
k Fiiliip nyii k sik Sɑɑmɑɑli tinŋ digbɑnsɑɑkɑl ni, k sɑɑ muɑnt Klistu po k tul lenŋ niib.
Nibulciɑɔnŋ nbɑ gbɑt Fiiliip mɑɑn k biɑ lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun nɑ, k b mɑntk gbiintl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ fɑnu nɑn dudukyent.

Nɑlnbiit din nyii bɑɑtb bonciɑnn ni k yikn sɑnpɑɑpo, k gbɑnɑnkpienɑ nɑn wɔbi bonciɑnn biɑ din pɑɑk. K nigbounŋ nɑ mun din tikl k gbiint Fiiliip muɑnti mɑnŋ, k biɑ lɑ nɑn u bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun. U din nyinn nɑlnbiit niib bonciɑnn ni, k b yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k nyi, k u biɑ te k gbɑnɑnkpienɑ dɑnm nɑn wɔbi bonciɑnn pɑɑk. L pɑɑk din tien k b mɑntk gbiintl u mɑɑn fɑnu nɑn dudukyent.
K pɑlpienn din be duo mɑnŋ ni bonciɑnn.
Jɑsuɑ nnɑ ponŋ din be duo mɑnŋ ni, k u sɑnn din yi Siimɔn, k u tuu tɑn diɑ u linŋin k tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ, k l din bɑktl niib kul nbɑ be duo mɑnŋ yɑkl po, k u din yi u mɔnŋ ɑ u tie nijɑɑnn e.
Niib kul nbɑ din tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑn tɑli din bɑɑkt’ɔ, k b din tuu yɑɑ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tie Yennu yiikuo e, lin nbɑ k b yi’l Yiikuociɑɔnŋ nɑ.»
B din gbiintl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ fɑnu fɑnu k mɑɑn u din tuu te k l bɑktl’b nɑn u bɑktnɔunŋ k l wei wɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ din tien yɑdɑ nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k Fiiliip din muɑntl k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn nɑn Yiesu sɑnn po nɑ, k jɑb nɑn puob din te k b wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
Siimɔn mɔnŋ mun din tien Fiiliip mɑɑn yɑdɑ, k u wul’ɔ. K u tien Fiiliip wei-nɑn-luɑ, k lɑɑt bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k u tuun nɑ, k l tuu yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’ɔ.
K tuomiinbɑ nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm gbɑt ɑ Sɑɑmɑɑliitieb gɑɑl Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k b din tun Piɑl nɑn Sɑn.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl Sɑɑmɑɑli yuo nbɑ nɑ, k b miɑl Yennu bin nbɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ bin gɑɑl Foŋɑnm,
k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ dɑɑ din k sik b suɑ ni. B kpɑn din gɑɑl Yennu nyunwulu Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni kuukuɑ e.
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nɑn Sɑn yii b nii b pɑɑk k b gɑɑl Foŋɑnm.
Siimɔn nbɑ din lɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑ nbɑ yiin b nii niib pɑɑk k Yennu tul’b Foŋɑnm nɑ, k u yɑɑ ɑ wun tul tuomiinbɑ nɑ likli,
ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Cɑbn’n mun yiikuo nɑ mɑn k n mun tuu yii n nii suɑ pɑɑk k wun gɑɑl Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ.»
Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl yet’ɔ yɑɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ kpo yiɑk e nɑn ɑ likli mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn ɑ duki mi ɑ ɑ sɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu piini nɑn likli e.
A lek kɑn tun siɑl t tuonn nɑ ni, k mɑɑn ɑ pɑl k be fɑnu nɑn Yennu
Mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ kii mei Yonmdɑɑnɔ k pɑsiɑl i u sɑɑ nyik cɑb’ɑ nɑn ɑ dudukbiit mɑnŋ,
k mɑɑn n lɑ nɑn ɑ gbie nɑn nuɑntont e, k biit kun’ɑ wɑɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Siimɔn jiin k yet’b ɑ: «Miɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ k tul’n mɑn k lin nbɑ k i yet nɑ dɑɑ bɑɑt n pɑɑk.»
Piɑl nɑn Sɑn din pɑk *siɑlɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ po k tul niib, k biɑ muɑnt u mɑɑn ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt k sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm. Bɑɑ din sɑɑ nɑ e, k b din muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn Sɑɑmɑɑli digbɑnbis bonciɑnn ni.
Ŋɑnn e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ *mɑlɑkɑ tɑn bɑɑl yet Fiiliip ɑ: «Fiit sɑɑn gɑnŋ po k tɔkn sɔnu nbɑ nyi Selusɑɑlenm k siik Gɑɑsɑ nɑ.» L sɔnu pɑɑk din k pɑ siɑl.

K Fiiliip fiil k sɑɑ k sɑɑ cet Etiopi kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nnɑ k u din tie nijɑɑnn k biɑ tie likli kɑlɑcinbɑ yudɑɑnɔ Etiopi puo nbɑ din tie kpɑnbɑl k b yi’u Kɑndɑɑs nɑ buol ni. Kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ ponŋ din sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ jiɑnt Yennu,
k ji kun k kɑl u toluk ni k tɑɑni dɑɑl’ɔ, k u lii *Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi kɑdɑɑɔk ni. Wɑɑ din kɑl k sɑɑ yuo nbɑ, k u lii *Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi kɑdɑɑɔk ni.
Foŋɑnm yet Fiiliip ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ nɑkn toluk nɑ.»
K u ciɑl sɑɑn nɑkn lenŋ, k gbɑt k juɑ nɑ lii Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k u boi’ɔ ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ, ɑ bɑnn lin nbɑ k ɑ lii nɑ pɑɑk ii?»
K u jiin ɑ: «Nlee k n sɑɑ bɑnn l pɑɑk, k l k tie k suɑ wɑnn’n kɑɑ?» K u bɑln Fiiliip ɑ wun kuɑ toluk nɑ k kɑl nɑn’ɔ.

Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk mɑɑn nbɑ k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn mɑnŋ din lii nɑ, ŋɑnn i nɑ ɑ: «U din tie nɑn pieok nbɑ k b sɑɑ ɑ bin sɑɑ kpi’u nɑ e, k u ŋmin nɑn pebik nbɑ k b tuu pot pot u kobt k u ŋmin nɑ, k u k yɑɑt u mɔb
U din sikn u mɔnŋ, k b yet bin bu u buut bonŋɑnn. Ŋmee sɑɑ fit pɑk siɑl k jiin u yɑɑbuonɑ po? K mɑɑn b gbenn u mɑnfuol tingbounŋ nnɑ wɑɑ.»
K kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ boi Fiiliip ɑ: «Yetl’n, ŋmee k sɔkni nɑ yien nɑ? U yien u mɔnŋ ɑmi suɑ ee?»
K Fiiliip piin siɑn nbɑ k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn mɑnŋ lii nɑ k sɑɑ, k piɑk Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn.
Bɑɑ tɔk sɔnu mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b lɑ nyun nnɑ duɑ, k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, nyun e nɑ. Bee yɑɑ lin tien k ɑ kɑn wul’n Yennu nyunwulu?»
K Fiiliip yet’ɔ ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑn ɑ pɑl kul ɑ, n sɑɑ wul’ɑ wɑɑ.» K u jiin ɑ: «N tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu Klistu tie Yennu Bijɑ e.»
K kɑlɑcijɑɑnn mɑnŋ te k tɑɑni nɑ set, k ŋuɑ nɑn Fiiliip sik nyun nɑ ni, k Fiiliip wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu.
B tɑn nyii nyun nɑ ni k duo, k Foŋɑnm jii Fiiliip k yɑɑt nɑn’ɔ, k kɑlɑcijɑɑnn nɑ ji k lɑ’u, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm suol u sɔnu k kun nɑn pɑlpienn.
K Fiiliip ji din sɑɑ be Asot ɑ, k din lin digbɑnɑ kul k muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn mɔkmɔk nɑn wɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle.
Tɔn, Sɔul lek biɑ din fuɑ kɔnfuɑt, k yien ɑ u sii dint Yonmdɑɑnɔ *puolpoweitieb biɑk nɑn u yɑɑ wun kpi’b nɑ e, k tɑn sɑɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ buol ni,
ɑ wun gɑɑl kɑdɑɑt, ɑ k sɑɑn Dɑɑmɑɑs k sɑɑ wɑnn *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet yudɑnm, ɑ u sɑɑ lɑ wun nbɑ wɑɑ Yiesu sɔnu mɑnŋ, juɑ ɑmi puo, sie wun suol’b k lol’b k jen nɑn’m Selusɑɑlenm.
Tɔn, wɑɑ ji din sɑɑ yuo nbɑ e k sɑɑ pel Dɑɑmɑɑs, k yentu nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, k sik yent lint’ɔ.
K u bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k gbɑt k kunkɔl yi’u ɑ: «Sɔul, Sɔul, bee k ɑ muksl’n i?»
K u boi ɑ: «A tie ŋmee e?» K kunkɔl nɑ jiin ɑ: «Min Yiesu e, k ɑ muksl’n.
Ŋɑɑn fiit k sɑɑn duo nɑ ni, k b sɑɑ sɑɑ yet’ɑ fɑɑ ji sɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
L yuo nɑ, jɑb nbɑ din ciɑnt Sɔul nɑ ji biɑl set silinmm. B din gbiɑ kunkɔl nɑ ŋɑnin, ŋɑɑn k lɑɑt suɑ.
K Sɔul tɑn fiil tinŋ ni, k munt u nuni, ŋɑɑn k k lɑɑt. Ŋɑnn e k b dɑt u nuu k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Dɑɑmɑɑs.
Dɑmunjɑɑ ŋɑntɑ k u k fit lɑɑt. L dɑɑ mɑnŋ ni u din k dii ɑmi k nyuu siɑl.
K Yiesuweisuɑ din be Dɑɑmɑɑs mɑnŋ, k u sɑnn yi Anɑɑniɑs, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yiin’ɔ yelntu ni ɑ: «Anɑɑniɑs.» K u jiin ɑ: «Min e nɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ.»
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit k sɑɑn tɔkn sɔnu nbɑ yi Sɔnsunsonn nɑ k sɑɑ kuɑ Suudɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k boi juɑ nbɑ nyii Tɑɑls k u sɑnn yi Sɔul nɑ po. U mei Yennu e mɔtɑɑnɑ,
k u lɑ jɑsuɑ yelntu ni, k u sɑnn yi Anɑɑniɑs, k u kuɑ k jii u nii k yii u pɑɑk ɑ wuu jik ii lɑɑt.»
K Anɑɑniɑs jiin ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, niib bonciɑnn e piɑk juɑ nɑ po, k jikt sɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ kul k u tuun bonbiil k tien ɑ mɔnŋ niib Selusɑɑlenm.
U dɑɑn gɑɑl yiikuo mɑnntieb yudɑnm buol ni, k bɑɑl nnɑ, ɑ wun suol wun nbɑ kul yi ɑ sɑnn.»
Ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fin i sɑɑ wɑɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k n lukt’ɔ ɑ wuu tuun n tuonn, k te k buolgɑnu nɑn b kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn Islɑɑeltieb n bɑnn n sɑnn,
k n mɔnŋ sɑɑ wɑnn’ɔ muksuk nbɑ kul k u sɑɑ di n pɑɑk.»

Ŋɑnn e k Anɑɑniɑs sɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk nɑ ni, k yii u nii Sɔul pɑɑk ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑ bik Sɔul, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu e tun’n. Ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k ɑ dɑɑn bɑɑt nnɑ k tɑn lɑ’u sɔnu pɑɑk nɑ, k u tun’n ɑ n tɑn te k ɑ i jik i lɑɑt k biɑ gbie yent nɑn Foŋɑnm.»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k siɑl tɑbt u ninbinɑ ni k bɑɑ, k nɑɑn nɑn jɑnwɔkɑ nɑ, k u ji lɑɑt jik, k fiil set, k b wul’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu.
Ŋɑnn e k u dii jiet k pɑnŋ jen. Sɔul din lɑkn be nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnle nɑ Dɑɑmɑɑs,
k din sɑɑn yiɑn ɑ, Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k muɑntl Yiesu po, ɑ Yiesu kpɑn set tie Yennu Bijɑ e.

Bin nbɑ kul din gbɑt u muɑnti mɑnŋ, l din tien’m yɑɑl-lituk o, k b boi ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ kɑɑ dɑɑn muks bin nbɑ yi Yiesu sɑnn Selusɑɑlenm nɑ ɑɑ? U yɑɑn k bɑɑl ɑ wun suol k lol Yiesuweilɑ, k ŋmɑt nɑn’m k sɑɑ tul’b Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm kɑɑ nɑ ɑɑ?»
Ŋɑɑn k Sɔul muɑnti mɑnŋ biɑ lek ŋɑnmt k puki nɑn yiikuo, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ be Dɑɑmɑɑs nɑ k fit jiin’ɔ siɑl, yuo nbɑ k u wɑnt nɑn Yiesu e set tie *Klistu k bilsuk kɑɑ nɑ.
K dɑɑ bonciɑnn tɑn gɑl, k Suifnbɑ nɑ lɑkn lieb k lol lol ɑ bin kpi Sɔul,
ŋɑɑn suɑ tɑn kumi’ɔ bɑɑ loln u pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ. Yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk k b din guu duo mɑnŋ tɑnmɔi e bonŋɑnn ɑ bin kpi’u, K suɑ tɑn kumi’ɔ bɑɑ loln u pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ,
ŋɑɑn nyɑyeunŋ k u wei-nɑn-lieb tɑn jii’u k tien’ɔ cibuk ni, k nyinn’ɔ duo mɑnŋ juonfɔnn ni, k sikn’ɔ tinŋ ni.
Sɔul nbɑ din bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, u din yɑbl u mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ wun lɑkn nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k b k tien yɑdɑ nɑn u ji tie Yiesuweilɔ e, k tiin’ɔ jɑŋmɑɑni.

K Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din tɑn bɑɑl u sonml, k jii’u k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ tuomiinbɑ nɑ buol ni, k kɑt wɑnn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ k Sɔul dɑɑn lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu ni, nɑn wɑɑ pɑk nɑn’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ. U biɑ din ŋɑnm k wɑnn’b Sɔul nbɑ din muɑntl Yiesu po nɑn pɑlcienn Dɑɑmɑɑs biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Sɔul din lɑkn be nɑn’m, k b din kɑk k lin Selusɑɑlenm kul po, k muɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni nɑn pɑlcienn.
U biɑ din piɑk nɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ piɑk Glek mɑɑn nɑ k jikt sɑɑ Yiesu po, ŋɑɑn b din noi nɑn’ɔ, k kol ɑ bin kpi’u.
Ŋɑɑn yuo nbɑ k Yiesuweilɑ bɑnn nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b jii Sɔul k sik nɑn’ɔ Sesɑɑle, k te k u sɑɑn Tɑɑls.
Ŋɑnn e k Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be Suude nɑn Gɑɑliile nɑn *Sɑɑmɑɑli nɑ ji k lɑɑt muksuk u, k ŋɑnmt k tumi Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn, k tie yentinnɑ, k Foŋɑnm sonml ni k b puki.
L puolpo e k Piɑl din yek lin siɑl kul po, k biɑ din tɑn sik ɑ wun gɔn Yennu niib nbɑ be Liidɑ nɑ.
Lenŋ e k u din sɑɑ lɑ jɑsuɑ nnɑ, k u sɑnn yi Ene, k u din ponŋ tie gbɑnɑnkpienn dɑɑnɔ e, k din k fit fi u duɑnu ni teee nɑn binɑ ŋɑnniin.
K Piɑl tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ene, Yiesu Klistu te k ɑ pɑɑk ɑ. Fiit k ŋɑnm ɑ duɑnu.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k u fiil.
Liidɑ nɑn Sɑɑlɔn doi niib kul nbɑ din lɑ’u k u pɑɑk nɑ, k b kpɑnt tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑb.
Puosuɑ mun din be Sope, k u sɑnn yi Tɑɑbiitɑ, ŋɑɑn Glek mɑɑn ni, b din yi’u Dɔlkɑɑs, k l pɑɑk tie pɑmɔnɔ. U din tie Yiesuweilɔ e, k din tuun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn k tien niib, k biɑ din sonmt tɑlɑs-dɑnm.
L yuo nɑ dinn k yiɑlu din suol’ɔ k u kpo, k b din jii’u k wul’ɔ, ŋɑɑn jii’u duo nɑn’ɔ dituɑtuk ni k bil’ɔ.
Sope mun din k fɔk nɑn Liidɑ sɑɑn, k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din be Sope din gbɑt nɑn Piɑl be Liidɑ, k b tun jɑb bɑnle u buol ni ɑ bin yet’ɔ ɑ: «T bɑln’mɑ. Kɑkt bɑɑl yiɑn yiɑn nɑ.»

K u fiil k b jen nɑn’ɔ. Wɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k b jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ dituɑtuk mɑnŋ ni. K pɑkɔi din be dieok nɑ ni, k b kul ŋɑɑ lint Piɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔ, k jikt b liɑtɑ nɑn b cincenɑ k wɑnt’ɔ, k yien ɑ: «Dɔlkɑɑs nbɑ tuu be u mɑnfuol ni k nyɑl lin nbɑ k tien’t e nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl nyinn b kul ɑ dieok nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn gbɑɑn tinŋ ni, k miɑl Yennu ŋɑɑn tɑn ŋmɑnt kpiemɔ nɑ pɑɑk k yiin ɑ: «Tɑɑbiitɑ, fiit.» K u munt u nuni k lɑ Piɑl, k ji fiil k kɑl.
K Piɑl dɔnn k suol u nuu k fiin senn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yiin Yennu niib nɑn pɑkɔi nɑ, k tɑn jii’u k wɑnn’b nɑn u jen u mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ.
K l lɑbɑɑl din yɑt sɑɑn Sope kul po, k niib bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ.
K Piɑl ji din biɑl be Sope dɑɑ bonciɑnn, k din be jɑsuɑ nbɑ tie gbɑnfebltuɑ nɑ ŋɑɑk ni e, k b yi’u Siimɔn.
Tɔn, jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Sesɑɑle, k u sɑnn yi Kɔlnɑi. U din tie sejenm yudɑɑnsuɑ e u pɑɑbu ni. K l pɑɑbu k b yi Itɑɑli pɑɑbu.
U din tie Yenjiɑnt-tuɑ e, k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ din jiɑntl Yennu. U din sonmt Suifnbɑ ni tɑlɑs-dɑnm bonciɑnn, k biɑ din mei Yennu yuo kul.
L din tɑn tie nɑn yenlekl kut muntɑ yuo nɑ e, k u lɑ Yennu *mɑlɑkɑ yelntu ni pieee, k u kuɑ u dieok ni k tɑn yiin ɑ: «Kɔlnɑi.»

Kɔlnɑi nbɑ din got lɑ mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni suol’ɔ, k u yet ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, bee?» K mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ jiin ɑ: «Yennu gɑɑl ɑ miɑlu wɑɑ, k biɑ gɑɑl ɑ ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun k tien tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k biɑ tiɑn ɑ po.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ, tumn nisiɑb Sope, k bin sɑɑ yiin jɑsuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn, k u sɑnn biɑ tie Piɑl nɑ.
U tie sɑɑmɔ e k be gbɑnfebltuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn nɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k u ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ kpiɑ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ.»
Mɑlɑkɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din pɑk nɑn’ɔ nɑ ji din yɑɑt, k Kɔlnɑi ji yiin u ŋɑɑtuontunnɑ bɑnle nɑn sejesuɑ nnɑ, wun nbɑ din tie Yenjiɑnt-tuɑ, k tie u kpɑɑkyenɔ nɑ.
Wɑɑ yet’b lin nbɑ kul tien mɑnŋ puolpo e, k u tun’m Sope.
Lɑɑ yent, k b sɑɑ, k sɑɑ pel Sope. L yuo nɑ k Piɑl mun duo dituɑtuk pɑɑk yensuuk ni, ɑ wun miɑl Yennu
K kon din tɑn gbɑt’ɔ, k u ji luon wun di jiet, k b dɑɑ tie jiet siil, k u lɑ yelntu.
U lɑ k sɑnpɑɑpo luot k bonsiɑl nnɑ nɑɑn cincenn k nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, k siɑl diɑ l mɔgbɑnɑ ŋɑnnɑ k siknt tinŋ ni,
k u lɑ bonkobt, bonfulinkɑ, nɑn bon-yuyukt buolu kul,
k u gbɑt kunkɔl yiin ɑ: «Piɑl, fiit k kpi’b k ŋmɑn.»
Ŋɑɑn k Piɑl jiin ɑ: «O, O, O, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nnɑ kɑɑ. N k mi dii t kuɑt.»
K kunkɔl nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: «Lin nbɑ k Yennu kpint’l ɑ l k kuɑ, dɑɑ yien ɑ l kuɑ.»
L din tien nnɑ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ tɑɑl muntɑ, k b jiin bont mɑnŋ sɑnpɑɑpo.
Piɑl nbɑ duki yelntu nɑ pɑɑk po nɑ, k suɑ Kɔlnɑi *tuomi nɑ boi Siimɔn ŋɑɑk nbɑ be siɑn nbɑ po, k b bɑɑl ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ tɑnmɔb ni, k set,
ŋɑɑn yiin k boi ɑ: «Suɑ be nnɑ, k u sɑnn tie Siimɔn k b biɑ yi’u Piɑl ii?»
Piɑl nbɑ lek kol ɑ wun bɑnn yelntu mɑnŋ pɑɑk nɑ, k Foŋɑnm yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gotl, jɑb bɑntɑ be nnɑ k luon’ɑ.
L pɑɑk, fiit k sik, k dɑɑ bils nɑn ɑ sɑɑn nɑn’m, k mɑɑn min e tun’m.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl sik, k yet jɑb nɑ ɑ: «Min e k i luon nɑ. Bee tien k i bɑɑl i?»

K b jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Kɔlnɑi e tun’t. U tie sejenm yudɑɑnɔ e, k u tie nibulcimɔ e biɑk, k jiɑntl Yennu k Suifnbɑ kul tien’ɔ nibɑɑkl. Tɔn, Yennu mɑlɑkɑ won bɑɑl yet’ɔ ɑ wun yiin’ɑ k ɑ bɑɑl u ŋɑɑk ni, k wun tɑn gbɑt lin nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ pɑk k tul’ɔ.»
K Piɑl fɑn yiin jɑb nɑ k kuɑn’m, ɑ bii be k sɑn-nyiɑɔk n yent ɑ. K l tɑn yent k u tien siil, k b sɑɑ, k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din be Sope nɑ, k b siɑb ciɑn’ɔ.
L dɑɑl din tɑn bɔnn yent e, k b bɑɑl Sesɑɑle, ŋɑɑn suɑ k Kɔlnɑi ponŋ yiin u nɑɑtɑɑni nɑn u yuɑsnbɑ, k b kul ji kɑl guu Piɑl bɑɑlu.
Piɑl nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl ɑ wun kuɑ yuo nbɑ, k Kɔlnɑi cet’ɔ tɑnmɔb ni, k gbɑɑn, k puki’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn Piɑl yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit, k mɑɑn n tie nifosɑɑlk e,» ŋɑɑn fiin’ɔ senn’ɔ.
Wɑɑ din piɑk nɑn Kɔlnɑi ŋɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k u lɑ niib bonciɑnn tikl k guu’u.
K u yet’b ɑ: «I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun mi nɑn tinm Suifnbɑ sennu k cɑb’t nɑn tin sɑɑn gɔn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ, ɑmi k tɑɑn nɑn’m, ŋɑɑn Yennu wɑnn’n ɑ n dɑɑ yien nisuɑ, wɑɑ k tie Suif nɑ pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, fɑɑ yiin’n nɑ, n bɑɑl, k k bils. Ŋɑnn e k n boi’ɑ mɑɑ n lɑɑn bee tien k ɑ tun k yiin’n i?»
K Kɔlnɑi yet’ɔ ɑ: «L dɑɑn tie nnɑ yuo e dinnɑ dɑɑl, k n dɑɑn mei Yennu n ŋɑɑk ni kut muntɑ yuo yenlekl. L yuo nɑ k n lɑ k nisuɑ nnɑ sie k liɑ liɑtfuouk nbɑ nyili n tuɑnn po,
k yet ɑ: ‹Kɔlnɑi, Yennu gbɑt ɑ miɑlu wɑɑ, k biɑ tiɑn ɑ ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ tuonɑ po.
L pɑɑk, tumn suɑ Sope, k wun sɑɑ yiin wun nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn, k u sɑnn biɑ tie Piɑl nɑ. U tie sɑɑmɔ e, k be gbɑnfebltuɑ Siimɔn ŋɑɑk nbɑ kpiɑ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑ.›
K l pɑɑk e, k n dɑɑn tun ɑ po yiɑn ɑ nɑ, k ɑ mun tien bonŋɑnn k bɑɑl nɑ. Mɔtɑɑnɑ, t kul ɑ be Yennu tuɑnn, k ji guu ɑ t gbɑt lin nbɑ kul k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tul’ɑ mɔb ɑ ɑ pɑk tul’t nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl piin pɑku k yɑɑ ɑ: «N ji bɑnn nɑn l tie mɔni e nɑn Yennu set k mɔk luktn,
ŋɑɑn nibuolu kul ni, dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ tien’ɔ bɑɑkl, k biɑ tuun wɑɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋuɑ e gbuot Yennu nunm.
I mi nɑn Yennu din tul Islɑɑeltieb u mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ po, ɑ Yiesu *Klistu ni e k tinm nɑn Yennu mɑnŋ nɑn lieb. Ŋuɑ Yiesu Klistu e tie t kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
I ponŋ mi lin nbɑ din tien Gɑɑliile nɑn Suude tini kul ni, Sɑn nbɑ din muɑnt Yennu mɑɑn k wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ puolpo.

I mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu din tul Yiesu, Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ nɑ, Foŋɑnm nɑn yiikuo nɑ. I biɑ mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k u din lin k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, k biɑ te k bin nbɑ kul be pol yiikuo k yiɑl nɑ lɑ pɑɑku, k mɑɑn Yennu be nɑn’ɔ.
K t lɑ tuonɑ kul nbɑ k u tun Suifnbɑ tingbounŋ ni nɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k t tie u siɑlɑɑdɑnm. K b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk k u kpo,
ŋɑɑn k Yennu din fiin’ɔ kuun ni dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl, k te k t lɑɑt’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn niib kul kɑɑ wɑɑ din lɑɑt’ɔ. L din tie tinm nbɑ k Yennu ponŋ din lukt’t ɑ tii tie u siɑlɑɑdɑnm nɑ e din lɑɑt’ɔ, k biɑ din tuu di k nyu nɑn’ɔ u kuun fiilu puolpo mɑnŋ.
K u tul’t mɔb ɑ tii muɑntl kii tien niib ɑ Yiesu e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu nyinn senn’ɔ ɑ u tie fuotb nɑn kpienm bɑlbuulɔ.
*Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kul din tuu piɑk u po, k yien ɑ suɑ kul nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, sɑɑ lɑ nyikcɑbu Yiesu mɑnŋ sɑnn ni.»
Piɑl nbɑ din dɑɑ piɑk nɑ, k Foŋɑnm sik kuɑ bin nbɑ kul din gbiintl mɑɑn mɑnŋ ni.
K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ k nyii Sope k ciɑn Piɑl nɑ, k l tien’m bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn Yennu nbɑ jii u piini nbɑ tie u Foŋɑnm, k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun nɑ,
k mɑɑn b gbiɑ k b piɑk bɑlgɑni k dont Yennu sɑnn. Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl yet ɑ:
«Niib nɑ gɑɑl Foŋɑnm, nɑn tɑɑ mun din gɑɑl nɑ e. Suɑ be nnɑ k sɑɑ bel’t ɑ t dɑɑ wuul’b Yennu nyunwulu uu?»
ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ bin wul’b Yennu nyunwulu Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni. Ŋɑnn e k b din guɑl Piɑl ɑ wun biɑl nɑn’m nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ, k u biɑl.
L yuo nɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Suude lokl kul po nɑ din gbɑt ɑ bin nbɑ k tie *Suifnbɑ mun tɑn gɑɑl Yennu mɑɑn.
L pɑɑk, Piɑl nbɑ din tɑn duo Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, k Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ pot punɑ nɑ yɑki nɑn’ɔ, k yien’ɔ ɑ:
«A dɑɑn sɑɑn bin nbɑ tie punjuot ŋɑɑk ni, k biɑ tɑɑn dii nɑn’m ɑ gbɑɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl piin l pinpiik, k kɑt wɑnn’b lin nbɑ kul din tien ɑ:
«N dɑɑn be Sope k mei Yennu e k tɑn lɑ yelntu, k bonsiɑl nnɑ nɑɑn nɑn cincengbenŋl k l nyii sɑnpɑɑpo, k siɑl diɑ l mɔgbɑnɑ ŋɑnnɑ k siknt n buol ni.
K n duɑnt l nuɑk ni, k lɑ bonkobt, bonsusuot, bonfulnkɑ nɑn bon-yuyukt buolu kul ɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k n gbɑt k kunkɔl yet ɑ: ‹Piɑl, fiit, k kpi’b k ŋmɑn.›
Mɑɑ: ‹O, O, O, Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nnɑ kɑɑ. N ponŋ k mi dii t kuɑt.›
K kunkɔl nɑ biɑ ŋɑnm k yet *Yendɔunŋ ni ɑ: ‹Lin nbɑ k Yennu kpint’l ɑ l k kuɑ, dɑɑ yien ɑ l kuɑ.›
L dɑɑn tien nnɑ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ tɑɑl muntɑ, k l ŋmɑt duo sɑnpɑɑpo.
«L tonton nɑ k Sesɑɑle jɑb bɑntɑ nbɑ k b dɑɑn tun’m n penŋ nɑ bɑɑl ŋɑɑk nbɑ k n be nɑ ni.
Ŋɑnn e k Foŋɑnm yet’n ɑ n sɑɑn nɑn’m k dɑɑ bils. K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Sope nɑ, b ni bɑnluob nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ mun ciɑn’n k sɑɑn Sesɑɑle, k t kul ɑ bɑɑl kuɑ Kɔlnɑi ŋɑɑk ni.
K u yet’t biɑnŋ nbɑ k u lɑ k *mɑlɑkɑ bɑɑl set u ŋɑɑk ni k yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Tumn suɑ Sope, k wun sɑɑ yiin juɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Siimɔn, k u sɑnn biɑ tie Piɑl nɑ,
k u sɑɑ pɑk mɑɑn k tul’ɑ, k fin nɑn ɑ ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ n lɑ fielu.›
«Tɔn, mɑɑ piin mɑɑn pɑku yuo nbɑ, k Foŋɑnm sik kuɑ b ni nɑn wɑɑ din sik kuɑ t ni l pinpiik ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k n tiɑl Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ din yet ɑ: ‹Sɑn ŋɑnin din wuul niib nɑn nyun e, ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin sɑɑ gbie yent nɑn Foŋɑnm e.›
Tɔn, l i tie k Yennu set pi’b u Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ nɑn wɑɑ mun din pi tinm nbɑ tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ i e, k ŋɑnn, n tie ŋmee k sɑɑ yet Yennu nbɑ luon wun tun lin nbɑ?»
Bɑɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b ji nyik b kpɑyɑkt nɑ, ŋɑɑn donn Yennu sɑnn, k yien ɑ: «Yennu te bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun fit mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.»
Tɔn, muksuk nbɑ din bɑɑl Etiɑnn kpinu puolpo nɑ din te k Yiesuweilɑ fiil Selusɑɑlenm k yɑt, k b siɑb din yɑɑt k sɑɑn Feniisi, nɑn Siipl, nɑn Antiɑɔs, k din muɑntl Yiesu mɑɑn k tien Suifnbɑ kuukuɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Yiesuweilɑ siɑb nbɑ din tie Siipltieb, nɑn Siilenntieb nɑ, sɑɑn Antiɑɔs, k sɑɑ muɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn k tien bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ,
k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yiikuo din be nɑn’m, k niib bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ k wɑɑ’u.
K Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ gbɑt lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ, k tun Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs ɑ wun sɑɑn Antiɑɔs.
Wɑɑ din sɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ k lɑ Yennu nbɑ tul’b yetŋɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u lɑ pɑlpienn bonciɑnn, k din cie b pɑlɑ, k kpɑɑn b kul kpɑɑni ɑ bin jii b mɔnŋ k tul Yonmdɑɑnɔ fɑnnu.
Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din tie niŋɑnɔ e, k mɑntk gbie nɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn yɑdɑ, k nigbounŋ bonciɑnn din tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ k tien u weilɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din sɑɑn Tɑɑls, ɑ wun sɑɑ lon Sɔul.
Wɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k u jen nɑn’ɔ Antiɑɔs, k b din jii binn munn k tɑɑn nɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib, k wɑnt niib bonciɑnn Yennu mɑɑn. L din tie Antiɑɔs e k b din sint k pul Yiesuweilɑ ɑ: «Klistuyɑb.»
L yuo dinn e k *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ siɑb din nyii Selusɑɑlenm k sik Antiɑɔs.
B yenɔ sɑnn din yi Agɑɑbuus, k Foŋɑnm ni e k u din fiil k set, k yet ɑ kon bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ kul po, k kon mɑnŋ din set tɑn bɑɑ yuo nbɑ k Kluod din tie kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ.
Yuo nbɑ k Yiesuweilɑ din gbɑt ɑ kon yɑɑ lin bɑɑ nɑ, k b din dukn dudukt ɑ b sɑɑ tul sonml, k wun nbɑ fit nyɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ lek, wun tul Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Suude nɑ.
K b din tien nnɑ, k tun Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul nɑn likli nɑ, ɑ bin sɑɑ tul Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb Suude tinŋ ni.
L yuo nɑ dinn k kpɑnbɑl *Heluod din jɑk Yiesuweilɑ siɑb nɑn muksuk,
k din te k b kpii Sɑn ninjɑ Sɑɑk nɑn juk-bɑnjiɑk.
Kpɑnbɑl Heluod nbɑ bɑnn nɑn wɑɑ tien biɑnŋ nbɑ te k *Suifnbɑ pɑlɑ penn nɑ, k u biɑ lek ŋɑnmt k tie nnɑ, k tɑn suol Piɑl, yosɑu nbɑ k b din mɔk jɑɑnm k di pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ * dɑtinŋ nɑ.

Wɑɑ suol Piɑl yuo nbɑ k u kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk, k tul’ɔ dɑnsɑlguulɑ. B din tie pɑɑbu munnɑ e k guu’u, k pɑɑbyenn kul ni guulɑ bɑnɑ e guu’u, k Heluod din duki ɑ jɑɑnm mɑnŋ puolpo e wɑɑ, k u sɑɑ nyinn Piɑl ɑ bin n bu u buut niib ni.
K Piɑl dɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni, ŋɑɑn k Yiesuweilɑ pɑɑ Yenmiɑlu pɑɑk u po nɑn ninmɔnn.

Tɔn, k Heluod din duki nɑn l i yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, u sɑɑ nyinn Piɑl k kpi’u, k l dɑɑl nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ k Piɑl lol nɑn jɑlt ŋɑnle, k guɑnt guulɑ bɑnle nɑ sinsuuk ni, k guulɑ mɑnŋ siɑb mun din guu dɑnsɑlk dieok nɑ tɑnmɔb.

L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yonmdɑɑnɔ *mɑlɑkɑ dɔkt, k yentu yent dɑnsɑlk dieok nɑ ni, k u sik k pɑɑpɑɑ Piɑl lokl ni k fiin’ɔ, ŋɑɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Fiit yiɑn yiɑn.» K u fiil. Wɑɑ fiil yuo nbɑ, k jɑlt nɑ pit u nii ni k bɑɑ.
K mɑlɑkɑ nɑ yet’ɔ: «Bobnt ɑ gbɑnn, k pil ɑ tɑɑsɑɑt.» K Piɑl tien nnɑ. K u biɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Gbɑbn ɑ cincenn kii wɑɑ’n.»
K u bobn u gbɑnn k wɑɑ’u, k b nyii dɑnsɑlk dieok nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn Piɑl din k bɑnn nɑn mɑlɑkɑ nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ mɑnŋ, ɑ l tie mɔni e. U din mi ɑ u lɑɑt yelntu e.

K b din bɑɑl gɑl sinsinn guulɑ nɑ buol ni, k biɑ tɑn bɑɑl gɑl lieb nɑ buol, k ji sɑɑ bɑɑl kutgɑnjuontk nɑ ni, k gɑnn mɑnŋ luot l tiɑɔnŋ k tul’b, k b nyii nɑn-yel, k tɔkn sɔnu k sɑɑ, k mɑlɑkɑ nɑ tɑɑn lil bot ŋɑɑn nyik’ɔ.

Ŋɑnn e k Piɑl ji yelnt bɑnn, k yet ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ e k n ji dɑɑ bɑnn nɑn l set tie mɔni e nɑn Yennu tun u mɑlɑkɑ k u bɑɑl nyinn’n Heluod nuu ni, k biɑ nyinn’n nɑn *Suifnbɑ nbɑ duki ɑ bin tun’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.»
Wɑɑ bɑnn u mɔnŋ po nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, k u sɑɑn Sɑn, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Mɑɑlk nɑ, nɑɑ Mɑɑli ŋɑɑk ni, k niib bonciɑnn ponŋ tikl lenŋ k mei Yennu.
K Piɑl kpɑɑ kpɑɑ nɑn-yel po gɑnn, k sɑpɑɑntuontunnɔ, wun nbɑ sɑnn yi Luodɑ nɑ, bɑɑl gɑnn mɑnŋ penŋ ɑ wun gbiint,
k ji bɑnn Piɑl kunkɔl, k ciɑl ŋmɑt nɑn pɑlpienn niib nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn tɑɑn ji k luot gɑnn nɑ, k yet’b ɑ: «Piɑl be nɑn-yel po.»
K b yet’ɔ ɑ: «Wɑɑtuk o mɔk’ɑ.» Ŋɑɑn k u biɑ ŋɑnmt lek yien ɑ u be, k b yɑɑ ɑ: «L tie u mɑlɑkɑ e.»
K Piɑl biɑ lek sie k kpɑɑn gɑnn nɑ, k b tɑn luot gɑnn mɑnŋ k lɑ’u, k l ji yɑɑl ŋɑɑn lit’b.
K u donn nuu ɑ bin ŋmin, ŋɑɑn wɑnn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ nyinn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk ni, k yet’b ɑ: «Ii sɑɑ mɑn k sɑɑ yet Sɑɑk nɑn Yiesuweilɑ lieb lin nbɑ nɑ po.» L puolpo k u nyik’b ŋɑɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn siɑl po.
Ŋɑnn e k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k mukl muk dɑnsɑlguulɑ nɑ k l k jeln, k mɑɑn b k mi Piɑl nbɑ ji be siɑn.
K Heluod tul mɔb ɑ bin lon u buol, k b lon’ɔ k k lɑ’u, k u boi guulɑ mɑnŋ buboit, ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ bin kpi’b. L puolpo e k Heluod din nyii Suude k sik Sesɑɑle, k yɑnn lenŋ wɑɑn ɑ.

Heluod wutuol din duo bonciɑnn Tiil nɑn Siidɔn tieb pɑɑk. B din tuu lɑɑt jiet Heluod yent ni. L pɑɑk, k b lɑkn lieb ɑ bin sɑɑn lɑ’u. Sinsinn bɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ Blɑstus, wun nbɑ tie Heluod kɑlɑcigbenŋl nbɑ goli kpɑnbɑl nɑ dieok pɑɑk nɑ, k b mɑlk b mɔb k mɑnŋ nɑn’ɔ, k b tɑn sɑɑn Heluod buol ni k sɑɑ duo’u sindɑnt.
Ŋɑnn e k Heluod din tɑn senn dɑɑl, k tɑn liɑ u kpɑnbɑl liɑtgbenŋɑ, k nyii kɑl u nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk ŋɑɑn pɑk tul niib nɑ,
k niib nɑ wuus ɑ: «Nilɔ kunkɔl kɑɑ nɑ. U tie yensuɑ e.»
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu mɑlɑkɑ fɑɑ’u k mɑɑn u din k tien Yennu dontl mɑnŋ, k nɑnwubɑ kuɑ muɑ’u k u kpo.
K Yennu mɑɑn ŋɑnmt yɑt k kuɑ niib ni.
Yuo nbɑ k Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul din gbenn b tuonɑ nbɑ k b sɑɑn k tun nɑ, k b ji jii Sɑn, wun nbɑ k b biɑ yi’u Mɑɑlk nɑ, k nyii Selusɑɑlenm k ŋmɑt k kun Antiɑɔs.

Antiɑɔs duo ni e k *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ siɑb nɑn wɑntesiɑb din be *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ ni. Ŋɑnm e din tie Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Siimeɔn (wun nbɑ k b din yi’u Jɑbɔnŋ nɑ), nɑn Lusius, wun nbɑ din nyii Siilenn nɑ, nɑn Mɑɑnɑenn (b din lɑkn wubi Mɑɑnɑenn nɑn kpɑnbɑl *Heluod e b bisn ni), nɑn Sɔul.
K dɑsiɑl k b dɑɑ din be k jiɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ k loln mɔi, k Foŋɑnm tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Nyint Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul, k bin tun tuonn nbɑ k n yiin’m ɑ bin tun nɑ.» K b nyinn’b.
L puolpo k b biɑ lol mɔi k miɑl Yennu k yii nii b pɑɑk ŋɑɑn cɑb’b.
Yuo nbɑ k Foŋɑnm din tun Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul k b din sik Selusi k kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl Sɑɑlɑɑmiinn nbɑ din be Siipl tinŋ ni nɑ,
k nyii ŋɑlunŋ ni lenŋ, k sɑɑ *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn k tien’m. K Sɑn-Mɑɑlk din tie b kpɑɑkl k be nɑn’m.
L puolpo e k b din nyii Sɑɑlɑɑmiinn, k gɑɑl tinŋ mɑnŋ doi kul ni, k sɑɑ bɑɑl Pɑɑfuos. Lenŋ e k b din lɑ nyɔkluulsuɑ, k u sɑnn yi Bɑɑl-yiesu, k u din tie Suif nilɔ nbɑ kpɑnn ɑ u tie Yennu sɔkni
U din be Siipl tinŋ ni yudɑɑnɔ buol e, k yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ sɑnn din yi Seljius Pɔulus, k u din tie yɑndɑɑnɔ e, k din yiin Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Sɔul ɑ bin tɑn pɑk Yennu mɑɑn k wun gbɑt.
Ŋɑɑn k nyɔkluulɔ mɑnŋ, wun nbɑ sɑnn din yi Eliimɑɑs, Glek mɑɑn ni nɑ, k u k sɑk’b ŋɑɑn kol ɑ wun tiɑ yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ k u dɑɑ tie Yiesu yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Foŋɑnm fiil Sɔul ni, wun nbɑ sɑnn mun din yi Pɔul nɑ, k u got nyɔkluulɔ nɑ silll, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ:
«Fin e tie pol bijɑ, k biɑ tie tuonŋɑnɑ kul dɑtɑɑk. Fin nibiiuk nbɑ gbie nɑn kpinkpɑnni nɑ. A kɑn bɑn nyik fɑɑ tuu jii Yennu bɑlmɔni k kpintl’l fɑɑk nɑ ɑɑ?
Tɔn, Yennu nuu sɑɑ pɑɑ’ɑ k ɑ juɑn k kɑn lɑ yentu k lin yɑnn ɑ.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni, k wunn nbɑ bɔn bɑɑ u ninbinɑ ni, k u ji sonm k tuln, k luon suɑ n suol u nuu k dɑt’ɔ.
K yudɑɑnɔ nɑ nbɑ lɑ lin nbɑ tien nɑ, k u tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn u yɑn din kuɑ nɑn lin nbɑ k u ji bɑnn k jikt sɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ po nɑ.
L puolpo e jik k Pɔul nɑn u wei-nɑn-lieb kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k nyii Pɑɑfuos k sɑɑn Pelj nbɑ din be Pɑnfiili tinŋ ni nɑ. Lenŋ e k Sɑn-Mɑɑlk din nyik’b ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm.
K b sɑɑ tuɑt k nyii Pelj, k bɑɑl Antiɑɔs nbɑ din be Piisiidi tinŋ ni nɑ. K *Fuondɑɑl k b sɑɑn kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni k kɑl,

k lɑ k b lii Muois *senni ni nɑn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ diɑni ni, k Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok mɑnŋ ni sɑɑkɑb yet’b ɑ bin yet Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs ɑ: «T nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie k i mɔk lɑbɑŋɑnn nbɑ i e k sɑɑ pɑk k tul’t, yin pɑk.»
K Pɔul fiil k set k donn nuu ŋɑɑn piin pɑku, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Yinm Islɑɑeltieb nɑn yinm nbɑ kul be k jiɑntl Yennu nɑ, gbiintl mɑn.
Islɑɑeltieb Yennu din lukt t yejɑnm k te k b yɑbt bonciɑnn, yuo nbɑ k b dɑɑ din tie sɑɑnm k be Ejipt tinŋ nnɑ, k ŋuɑ Yennu din jii u yiikuo k nyinn’b lenŋ.
K bɑɑ din be muuk ni binɑ piinnɑ k u lek suol u yɑn nɑn’m.
Ŋɑɑn l puolpo k u biil nibuolu munlole nbɑ din be Kɑɑnɑɑn tinŋ nnɑ, ŋɑɑn te k u mɔnŋ niib Islɑɑeltieb yent tinŋ mɑnŋ.
K lin nbɑ nɑ kul din wei binɑ kobiinnɑ nɑn piinŋmu. «Yuo nbɑ k b din yent tinŋ mɑnŋ nɑ, k u din tul’b yudɑnm ɑ bii bu b mɑɑn dɑɑnn nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu sɔkni Sɑɑmuel tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
K l puolpo, b biɑ din tɑn boi Yennu ɑ wun tul’b kpɑnbɑl. Ŋɑnn e k Yennu din lukt Sɔul, wun nbɑ din tie Kiis bijɑ, Bensɑɑmen buolu ni nilɔ nɑ, ɑ wuu tie b kpɑnbɑl, k u din dii nɑɑn mɑnŋ binɑ piinnɑ.

K Yennu din tɑn liɑt’ɔ u nɑɑn ni, ŋɑɑn dinn Dɑɑfiid ɑ wuu tie b kpɑnbɑl jik. Nnɑ e k Yennu din pɑk Dɑɑfiid po ɑ: ‹N bɑnn nɑn Dɑɑfiid, wun nbɑ tie Sese bijɑ nɑ, mɑntk gbuot n nunm, k u sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ kul k n luon nɑ.›
«Juɑ nɑ yɑɑbuonɑ ni e, k Yennu din nyinn t Fietuɑ Yiesu, k tien’ɔ Islɑɑeltieb ni, nɑn wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Sɑn wun nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu nɑ e din dɔnŋ bɑɑlu k din muɑntl tien Islɑɑeltieb kul ɑ, ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, k wun wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
U tuonn nbɑ ji din tɑn gbent nɑ, k u boi’b ɑ: ‹I duki mi ɑ n tie ŋmee? N k tie wun nbɑ k i guu’u k u sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ kɑɑ. Gotl mɑn, ŋuɑ e yɑɑ wun tɑn bɑɑl n puolpo, k n kii ŋɑn nɑn k n pit u tɑɑsɑɑt.› »
Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul biɑ yɑɑ ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, yinm nbɑ tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ, nɑn i kul nbɑ be nnɑ k jiɑntl Yennu nɑ, mɑɑn nbɑ k Yennu tul’t k l wɑnt fielu mɑnŋ po nɑ, l bɑɑl t buol ɑ.

Niib nɑ nbɑ din be Selusɑɑlenm, nɑn b yudɑnm nɑ, b din k mi Yiesu nbɑ tie wun nbɑ, k biɑ k bɑnn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nbɑ k b tuu lii Fuondɑɑl kul nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ din bu u buut k yɑɑ u ŋɑn nɑn kuun e nɑ, b din gbien Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɔi mɑnŋ ɑ.
B din k lɑ u bisiɑt nbɑ tie lin nbɑ k b yɑɑ bin kpi’u, ŋɑɑn lek biɑ yɑɑ ɑ *Piilɑɑt n kpi’u.
Bɑɑ din tien Yiesu lin nbɑ nɑ kul gbenn nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ din wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l yuo k b kpɑɑt’ɔ dɑpunpunn nɑ pɑɑk k sikn’ɔ k pii’u kɑɑɔk ni,
ŋɑɑn k Yennu fiin’ɔ kuun ni.

Dɑɑ bonciɑnn ni k Yiesu din jii u mɔnŋ k wɑnn nɑn u be mɑnfuol ni k tul bin nbɑ din tuu tɔki nɑn’ɔ k nyi Gɑɑliile, k lin tieee k tɑn gbenn k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm nɑ. B ji tie u siɑlɑɑdɑnm mɔtɑɑnɑ k tien t niib.
«T mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e bɑɑl nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ. Mɔsonn nbɑ k Yennu din senn k tul t yejɑnm nɑ,

wɑɑ din fiin Yiesu kuun ni nɑ, u ji gbien mɔsonn mɑnŋ. Nnɑ e k l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, *yɑni nbɑ tie munle nɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nuɑk ni, ɑ ŋuɑ Yennu yet’ɔ ɑ: ‹Fin e tie n Bijɑ, k lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ n tie ɑ Bɑɑ e.›
Yennu din yet ɑ u sɑɑ fiin’ɔ kuun ni k u gbɑnɑnt dɑɑ bɑt, k yet ɑ: ‹Mɔsonɑ nbɑ k n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din senn, k yɑɑ ɑ n sɑɑ tul Dɑɑfiid nɑ, sie k n set gbenn tul’ɑ.›
Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni siɑl buol l yet ɑ: ‹A kɑn sɑk k ɑ Niŋɑnɔ gbɑnɑnt n kpɑkn kɑɑɔk ni k bɑt.›
Tɔn, Dɑɑfiid din tun lin nbɑ k Yennu din luon nɑ, k l puolpo k u din tɑn kpo, k b pii’u u yejɑnm kɑɑɔk ni, k u gbɑnɑnt bɑt.
Ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din fiin Yiesu kuun ni nɑ, ŋuɑ yɑɑ gbɑnɑnt k bɑt kɑɑɔk ni.
«L pɑɑk ɑmi, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon k i bɑnn nɑn Yiesu nbɑ din tun lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu nyikt cɑbt i biit.
Yiesu pɑɑk e k Yennu ji yet ɑ wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ nɑ tie niŋɑnɔ bonɑ kul ni bɑnnu nbɑ k Muois senni din k fit tun k tul’i ni.
«L pɑɑk, suot i mɔnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ te k Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din yet lin nbɑ nɑ k lin tɑn di’i ni. Nnɑ e k Yennu din yet ɑ:
‹Gotl mɑn yinm jɑpɑdɑnm nɑ, ŋɑɑnt k lin bɑkt’i k yin bot. K mɑɑn n sɑɑ tun siɑl i yuo nɑ gbɑɑ, k suɑ i lek i yet’i l po i e, i kɑn mi k tien yɑdɑ.› »
Bɑɑ gbenn lɑknu yuo nbɑ, k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din nyii Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok nɑ ni, k niib nɑ bɑln’m ɑ bin ŋɑnm jen Fuondɑɑl nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ, k tɑn wɑnn’b lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ biɑk.

K Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn, nɑn buolgɑnu bonciɑnn, bin nbɑ din lebt b jɑɑnti k wɑɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti nɑ, k b kul ɑ ji din wɑɑ Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs, k b piɑk nɑn’m k kpɑɑn’m ɑ bin yɑbl k biɑl fɑnu Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ni.
K fuondɑliel nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl, l din biɑl wɑɑnm-nnɑ e nɑn duo nɑ ni suɑ kul n lɑkn k gbɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn.
Suifnbɑ nbɑ din lɑ nigbounŋ tiki nɑ, k b fiin punponn, k piɑk biil Pɔul wɑnnu, k biɑ suki’ɔ.

Ŋɑɑn k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs lek biɑ yien nɑn pɑlcienn ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn k tin sint pɑk Yennu mɑɑn k tul yinm. Ŋɑɑn yɑɑ yet mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k biɑ dukn nɑn i k ŋɑn nɑn i lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, l pɑɑk e te k t ji sɑɑ bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ni nɑ,
k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ tul’t mɔb ɑ nnɑ: ‹Min e lukt’ɑ ɑ fii tie yentu, k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ, ɑ fii bɑɑt nɑn fielu kii tien tingbounŋ nɑ lokl kul po.› »
Tɔn, bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k b ji mɔk pɑlpienn, k piɑk Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn K bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b ɑ bin lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ tien yɑdɑ.
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ yɑt tinŋ nɑ lokl kul po.
L yuo nɑ k Suifnbɑ nɑ din fiin Antiɑɔs nɑ yudɑnm, nɑn puojɑɑnɑ nbɑ din tie yentinnɑ nɑ, wutuol, k b jɑk Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs muksuk, k bel’b nyinn’b b yent ni.
Ŋɑnn e k tuomiinbɑ nɑ din pit pit tɑɑpɑnt ni tɑnt k lu ŋɑɑn yɑɑt sɑɑn Ikoniunm.
K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din biɑl Antiɑɔs nɑ mɑntk din gbie nɑn pɑlpienn nɑn Foŋɑnm.
Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nbɑ din bɑɑl Ikoniunm, k b sɑɑn *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k pɑk bɑnnu nbɑ te k Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ bonciɑnn tien yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ nbɑ din tie nikɑngbɑtɑ din te k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ mɔk dudukbiit k jikt sɑɑ Yiesuweilɑ po.

K Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑ ji din jii yuo bonciɑnn k be lenŋ, k ŋɑnmt piɑk nɑn pɑlcienn k jikt sɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ po, k u cɑb’b ɑ bii fit kii tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ, k l din wɑnt nɑn bɑɑ piɑk u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ po nɑ, l mɑɑn mɑnŋ set nyii u buol e.
K duo nɑ niib din bɔkt, k siɑb din sie Suifnbɑ puol, k lieb nɑ mun sie tuomiinbɑ nɑ puol.
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ nɑn buolgɑnu nɑ lɑkn lieb nɑn b duo mɑnŋ yudɑnm, k duki ɑ bin tien tuomiinbɑ biɑsn k jɑɑt’b tɑnɑ,
k bɑɑ ji tɑn bɑnn nɑn b yɑɑ bin jɑɑt’b tɑnɑ nɑ, k b ciɑl sɑɑn Liistl nɑn Delb, nɑn digbɑnbis nbɑ kpiɑ kpiɑ, Liikɑoni yent ni.
Bɑɑ din sɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ mɑnŋ, k b muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn.
K jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be Liistl k tie wɔbk. B din mɑl’ɔ k u tie wɔbk e, k k mi sonm,
k u gbiintl Pɔul muɑnti nɑ. K Pɔul got’ɔ silll, k tɑn bɑnn nɑn u mɔk yɑdɑ nbɑ sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ wɑɑ,
k u yet’ɔ sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Fiit k set ɑ tɑɑ pɑɑk.» K u tɑb nɑɑt k fiil k ji sonm.
Nibulciɑɔnŋ nɑ nbɑ din lɑ Pɔul nbɑ tun lin nbɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, k b ji piin yikn b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑɑn ni ɑ: «T yenni sik t buol ni k kpint k nɑɑn nɑn nisɑɑli nɑ.»
K b tɑɑn yi Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs sɑnn ɑ Suus, k Pɔul mun k b yi’u ɑ Helmes, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ din tie bɑlpɑklɔ.

K b yennu Suus mɑnntuɑ nyii pociɑnfiek ni, (puociɑnfiek mɑnŋ din sie duo nɑ tuɑnn po e,) k u tɑn bɑɑl nɑn nɑɑjɑi nɑn tipuut duo nɑ tɑnmɔb ni, k ŋuɑ nɑn nibul nɑ tikl ɑ bin mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k tul tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ.
Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Pɔul nbɑ din gbɑt nnɑ, k b pɑlɑ biil, k b pɑt pɑt b liɑtfɔkt, k ciɑl kuɑ nibul nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn yikn ɑ:

«Bee k i tie nnɑ? T mun tie nisɑɑli e nɑn yinm nɑ. T muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn, k yien’i ɑ yin nyik bon-yɑnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn kii wɑɑ Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ wun nbɑ din nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nɑn lin nbɑ kul be l ni.
Yɑɑyuo ni e wɑɑ k u din ŋɑɑn k nibuolu kul din tuun b yɑmɑ ni mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ.
Ŋɑɑn yuo kul u tuun bonŋɑnɑ. U te k sɑɑk nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k bɑɑ k tien’i, k biɑ tien’i dii dijɑɑn-yuo, k gbuont’i jiet, k i lɑɑt pɑlpienn.»
Tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn l lek din pɑɑl nɑn bin tiɑ nigbounŋ mɑnŋ k b dɑɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tien’m.

L puolpo e k Suifnbɑ siɑb din nyii Antiɑɔs nbɑ be Piisiidi tinŋ ni, nɑn Ikoniunm, k bɑɑl k pɑk tunn nigbounŋ nɑ yɑn. Ŋɑnn e k nibul nɑ jɑɑt Pɔul tɑnɑ, k ji fuul’ɔ nyinn’ɔ duo nɑ ni, k mɑɑn b mi ɑ u kpo e.
Ŋɑɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ bɑɑl k set lint’ɔ, k u tɑn fiil, k ŋɑnm nɑn ŋuɑ ŋmɑt duo nɑ ni biɑk. K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs fiil k sɑɑn Delb.
K b sɑɑn k sɑɑ muɑnt Yiesu bɑlŋɑnni Delb, k dɑk niib bonciɑnn, k b tien Yiesuweilɑ. L puolpo k b ŋmɑt sɑɑ Liistl nɑn Ikoniunm nɑn Antiɑɔs nbɑ be Piisiidi tinŋ ni nɑ.
B cien Yiesuweilɑ pɑlɑ doi mɑnŋ ni, k yien’m ɑ bii kpɑnŋ i diɑ b yɑdɑ mɑnŋ nnɑ, k wɑnt’b ɑ: «Sie k t fɑbl k dii fɑlɑ bonciɑnn ɑ k tɑn kuɑ Yennu nɑɑn ni.»
K jiɑnti kul ni k b tuu lukt *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib *sɑɑkɑb, k din mei Yennu k loln mɔi, k jikt Yiesuweilɑ nɑn b sɑɑkɑb nɑ k kubnt’b Yonmdɑɑnɔ nuu ni, wun nbɑ k b ponŋ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ.
Bɑɑ din gɑl Piisiidi tinŋ ni nɑ puolpo e, k b bɑɑl Pelj nbɑ be Pɑnfiili tinŋ ni nɑ,
k din pɑk Yiesu mɑɑn lenŋ k ji fit yen sik Atɑɑli.
Lenŋ e k b din kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ ni, k ŋmɑt sɑɑn Antiɑɔs, siɑn nbɑ k Yiesuweilɑ din miɑl Yennu ninbɑtinu po ɑ wun sonm’b b tuonn ni. K mɔtɑɑnɑ b tun tuonn mɑnŋ k gbenn ɑ.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl Antiɑɔs mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k b tikl Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ, k tɑn yet’b lin nbɑ kul k Yennu tun nɑn’m, nɑn wɑɑ luot sɔnu biɑnŋ nbɑ k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ɑ bin tien Yiesu yɑdɑ k tien u weilɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k b ji din biɑl lenŋ k wei bonciɑnn nɑn Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ.
L yuo nɑ k nisiɑb nnɑ din nyii Suude k sik Antiɑɔs, k tɑn wɑnt Yiesuweilɑ nɑ ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k i pot i punɑ, nɑn Muois *senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Ŋɑnn i kɑɑ, Yennu kɑn fiel’i.»

K Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn ŋɑnm noi nɑn lieb bonciɑnn nɑn ninmɔnn, k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ tɑn dukn k nyinn Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn b ni siɑb, ɑ bin sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k sɑɑ lɑ tuomiinbɑ nɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ *sɑɑkɑb, mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.

Tɔn, k Antiɑɔs Klistuyɑb nɑ tul’b sɔnu k biɑ cɑb’b sɔnu, k b sɑɑ k sɑɑ gɑl Feniisi nɑn *Sɑɑmɑɑli yɑkɑ po, k muɑntl bɑnnu nbɑ k bin nbɑ k tie *Suifnbɑ nɑ siɑb nyik b bonkpelɑ ŋɑɑn tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ din tul Yiesuweilɑ kul pɑlpienn k sɑɑ yɑkl.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ, k *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑn b sɑɑkɑb nɑn tuomiinbɑ nɑ din gɑɑl’b sɑɑɔnŋ. Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs yet’b lin nbɑ kul k Yennu tun nɑn’m.
Ŋɑɑn k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ siɑb nbɑ tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ fiil set, k yet ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n pot b punɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ diɑ Muois senni.»
L pɑɑk, k tuomiinbɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ lɑkn lieb, ɑ bin dukn mɑɑn mɑnŋ po.

Ŋɑnn e k b din pɑk wei nɑn lieb, k Piɑl tɑn fiil k yet ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i mi nɑn yuo nbɑ din gɑl nɑ, Yennu din lukt’n ɑ n muɑnt Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ, ɑ bin gbɑt’l k biɑ tien yɑdɑ.
K Yennu nbɑ mi nisɑɑlk pɑl ni nɑ, ŋuɑ e din tul’b Foŋɑnm nɑn wɑɑ kpɑn din tul’t nɑ, k l wɑnn nɑn u mun gɑɑl’b.
U k mɔk luktn tinm nɑn ŋɑnm sinsuuk ni k mɑɑn u wuul b pɑlɑ ni, bɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, bee k i luon k i bikn Yennu, yɑɑ luon k i te k buolgɑnu nbɑ tie Yiesuweilɑ nɑ n diɑ senni nbɑ k tinm nɑn t yejɑnm din k fit diɑ gbɑɑ?
Ŋɑɑn t tien yɑdɑ nɑn t lɑ fielu Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑn bɑɑ mun lɑ’l bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ kul ɑ din ŋmin, ŋɑɑn ji gbiintl Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Pɔul, k b yien’m bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ k Yennu din tun nɑn’m bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ sinsuuk ni.
Bɑɑ yet’b gbenn yuo nbɑ, k Sɑɑk yet’b ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, gbiintl’n mɑn.
Siimɔn yet’t biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu sint tin bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ninbɑtinu, k nyinn niib b ni ɑ bii tie u mɔnŋ niib.
K *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn mun biɑ din pɑk nnɑ e, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ:
‹L puolpo, n sɑɑ jen k ŋɑnm mɑɑ Dɑɑfiid ŋɑɑk nbɑ din bɑɑ nɑ, n sɑɑ ŋɑnm mɑɑ l dikpinɑ k fiin senn’l,
ɑ niib kul nbɑ tenn n fit got Yonmdɑɑnɔ, nnn, bin nbɑ kul k n yiin’m ɑ bii tie n yɑb.
Nnɑ e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wun nbɑ te k b bɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ yɑɑyuo ni wɑɑ yet.› »
K Sɑɑk biɑ yet k pukn ɑ: «L tien n dudukt ni nɑn t dɑɑ jikt lin nbɑ pɑɑl k tien bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ nbɑ nyik b bonkpelɑ k wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu nɑ pɑɑk.

Ŋɑɑn l ŋɑn k tin diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk o, k yet’b k b dɑɑ di lin nbɑ k b ponŋ mɑnn pɑtɑ, k biɑ yet’b ɑ bii so b mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, k puob nɑn jɑb dɑɑ duɑ nɑn lieb yɑnɑ yɑnɑ k biɑ dɑɑ ŋmɑn bonkobuk nbɑ k b ŋmɑkl kpii, k biɑ dɑɑ di sɔn.
K mɑɑn yɑɑyuo ni k tɑn tuu dinnɑ b muɑntl Muois senni digbɑnɑ kul ni, k *Fuondɑɑl kul b tuu lii senni mɑnŋ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni.»

Ŋɑnn e k tuomiinbɑ mɑnŋ nɑn sɑɑkɑb nɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nɑ kul ɑ dukn k nyinn nisiɑb b ni, ɑ bin tun ŋɑnm nɑn Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs, ɑ bin sɑɑn Antiɑɔs. Ŋɑnm e din tie Suud, wun nbɑ sɑnn din yi Bɑɑlsɑɑbɑɑs nɑ, nɑn Siilɑɑs. Jɑb bɑnle mɑnŋ din tie Yiesuweilɑ yudɑnm nɑ yenm e.
K b din tun’m nɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k diɑn ɑ: «Tinm tuomiinbɑ nɑn Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb nbɑ tie i nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ, dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k fuont yinm t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ k be Antiɑɔs nɑn Siili nɑn Siiliisi.
T gbɑt k t nisiɑb bɑɑl i penŋ, k piɑk’i bɑlsɑi k l dɑɑmi’i k ŋmɑt i yɑn ŋɑɑn t mun k wɑnn’b siɑl ɑ bin tɑn tien nnɑ,
k l pɑɑk e te k t tɑɑn lieb k suol k lukt nisiɑb t sinsuuk ni, k tuun’m i buol nnɑ, k ŋɑnm nɑn t yuɑsnbɑ, Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs nɑn Pɔul e sɑɑ,
bin nbɑ yit b mɔnŋ sɑlk Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk k t tun Suud nɑn Siilɑɑs ɑ bin wɑnn’i b mɔb ni ɑ lin nbɑ k t diɑn nɑ tie bɑlmɔni.
K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nɑn tinm kul dukn nɑn l k ŋɑn k t jinn’i jik-kpiɑsl k gɑl lin nbɑ kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k t diɑn t kɑdɑɑɔk ni,

ɑ i dɑɑ di jiet nbɑ k b mɑnn pɑtɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ di sɔn, k biɑ dɑɑ ŋmɑn bonkobuk nbɑ k b ŋmɑkl kpii, ŋɑɑn kii so i mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, k puob nɑn jɑb dɑɑ duɑ nɑn lieb yɑnɑ yɑnɑ. L i tie k i diɑ i mɔnŋ nnɑ, l sii ŋɑn i po. L kul i nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k b tun’m, k b sik Antiɑɔs, k sɑɑ lɑkn tɑɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nɑ kul ɑ, k tul’b kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ.
Niib nɑ nbɑ lii kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b lɑ pɑlpienn nɑn b kpɑɑni mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
K Suud nɑn Siilɑɑs, bin nbɑ din tie sɔkniinbɑ nɑ, din wei nɑn’m k yet’b Yennu mɑɑn bonciɑnn k cien Yiesuweilɑ mɑnŋ pɑlɑ k tot’b.
B weiu mɑnŋ puolpo e, k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ cɑb’b ɑ bii ŋmɑt bin nbɑ tun’m nɑ buol ni nɑn mɑnu.
(Ŋɑɑn Siilɑɑs ŋɑnin din dukn ɑ wun biɑl Antiɑɔs e.)
Ŋɑɑn Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs biɑ din wei Antiɑɔs, k ŋɑnm nɑn lieb tumi niib k muɑntl Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn.
L din yɑnn wɑɑn k Pɔul yet Bɑlnɑɑbɑɑs ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k tin ŋmɑt k sɑɑn gɔn t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ be digbɑnɑ kul nbɑ k t din sɑɑn k sɑɑ muɑnt Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn nɑ, k lɑɑn bɑɑ be biɑnŋ nbɑ.»
K Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs luon bin jii Sɑn-Mɑɑlk,
ŋɑɑn Pɔul din k sɑk ɑ bin jii’u, k mɑɑn u din tɑn nyik k k tuun nɑn’m yuo nbɑ k b din tɑn bɑɑl Pɑnfiili yiɑl ni.
K mɔniɑɔk din fiil Pɔul nɑn Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs sinsuuk ni, k b bɔkt lieb. K Bɑɑlnɑɑbɑɑs din jii Sɑn-Mɑɑlk, k b kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn Siipl.
K Pɔul mun din lukt Siilɑɑs, k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ din jii’b k tien’m Yonmdɑɑnɔ ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ni.
Pɔul din sɑɑn, k sɑɑ gɑl Siili nɑn Siiliisi yɑkɑ po, k cien Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib pɑlɑ doi nɑ ni.
L puolpo e k Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs din tɑn bɑɑl Delb nɑn Liistl, k lɑ Yiesuweitɔsuɑ, k u sɑnn yi Tiimuote, k u be lenŋ. U nɑɑ din tie *Suif nilɔ nbɑ tie Klistuyuɑ e, k u bɑɑ din tie Glek nilɔ.
Yiesuweilɑ kul nbɑ din be Liistl nɑn Ikoniunm nɑ din pɑk Tiimuote po bonŋɑnn.
K Pɔul din luon wun jii’u k bii sɑɑ sɔni. Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ din be digbɑnn kul yɑkl nɑ ni kul din mi nɑn Tiimuote bɑɑ tie Glek nilɔ e. L pɑɑk, k Pɔul din pot Tiimuote punn.
K b din sɑɑ doi ni, k muɑntl kpɑɑni nbɑ k tuomiinbɑ nɑ nɑn sɑɑkɑb din diɑn Selusɑɑlenm nɑ.
K lin nbɑ nɑ cie *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib mɑnŋ pɑlɑ b yɑdɑ ni, k b kɑnn puki dɑɑl kul.
B din luon bin sɑɑn muɑnt Yennu mɑɑn Asii tinŋ ni e, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm din k sɑk. Ŋɑnn e k b gɑl sɑɑn Fliiji nɑn Gɑɑlɑɑti yɑkɑ po.
Bɑɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Miisi yɑkl telk pɑɑk k b kot ɑ bin sɑɑn Biitiini yɑkl po, ŋɑɑn k Yiesu Siek din k sɑk ɑ bin sɑɑn.
Ŋɑnn e k b din gɑl Miisi yɑkl po, k sik Tloɑs.
Lenŋ e k Pɔul din lɑ yelntu nyiɑɔk, k u lɑ k Mɑɑseduɑnn juɑ, k u bɑɑl sie k bɑln’mɔ ɑ: «Puotl mɔkgbenŋl nɑ k bɑɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn yɑkl po nɑ, k tɑn sonm’t.»
Pɔul nbɑ lɑ yelntu mɑnŋ nɑ, l tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k t tien siil ɑ tin sɑɑn Mɑɑseduɑnn, k mɑɑn t ji din lɑ nɑn Yennu yien’t ɑ tin sɑɑn kii sɑɑ i muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn kii tien niib nɑ lenŋ.
Ŋɑnn e k t biɑ kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k nyii Tloɑs, k tɔkn bɑɑl Sɑɑmuotlɑɑs, k l yent k t bɑɑl Neɑpoliis. Lenŋ e k t nyik ŋɑlunŋ nɑ,
ŋɑɑn tuɑt k gɑl bɑɑl Fiiliip, duo nbɑ tie digbɑnsɑɑkɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn yent ni nɑ. Duo mɑnŋ din tie Luonmtieb yent e. T din be duo mɑnŋ ni k l mɑnn nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ.
K *Fuondɑɑl k t nyii sik duo mɑnŋ kpenu ni. T din mi ɑ Suifnbɑ Yenmiɑlu buol tie lenŋ e, k t bɑɑl kɑl k pɑk nɑn puob nbɑ tikl lenŋ nɑ.

Puob nbɑ din gbɑt t mɑɑn mɑnŋ, b yenɔ sɑnn din tie Liidi. U din nyii Tiɑtiil e k din tie cincenmunŋ nbɑ k l dɑɑɔk pɑɑl nɑ kuɑt-tuɑ, k biɑ din jiɑntl Yennu. K Yonmdɑɑnɔ din luot u pɑl ni ɑ wun gbiint Pɔul mɑɑn nbɑ k u piɑk nɑ fɑnu.
K t din wul ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb Yennu nyunwulu, k u din guɑl’t, k yet ɑ: «L i tie k i gɑɑl ɑ n set tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni e, yin bɑɑl kii be n ŋɑɑk ni.» Ŋɑnn e k u mɑbn’t k t bɑɑl kuɑ be.

Dɑsiɑl k t tɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑ Yenmiɑlu buol nɑ, k sɑpɑɑndɑɑbl nnɑ din mɔk u yonmdɑnm, k tɑn cet’t. K nɑlnbiiuk din be u ni k yent’ɔ, k nɑlnbiiuk mɑnŋ din tien’ɔ nin-nyuɑntuɑ. U nin-nyuɑnsn mɑnŋ ni, u din lɑɑt likli bonciɑnn k tien u dɑnm nɑ.
K u din wɑɑ tinm nɑn Pɔul k tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ: «Jɑb nɑ tie Yɑbnt Yennu tuontunnɑ e. B muɑntl k wɑnt’i fielu sɔnu.»

U din tiɑn k yikn nnɑ k l mɑnn nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul ji din tɑn miɑt nɑn u yikni mɑnŋ, k jiɑnt k yet nɑlnbiiuk nbɑ be sɑpɑɑmɔ mɑnŋ ni nɑ ɑ: «Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni, n tul’ɑ mɔb, nyin u ni.» L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ nyii u ni.
U yonmdɑnm nbɑ bɑnn nɑn b liklomu sɔnu nɑ gbenn i nɑ, k b suol Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs, k dɑt’b bɑɑl nɑn’m b yudɑnm linlɑknbuol ni.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn’m Luonmtieb bɑlbuulɑ buol ni yuo nbɑ, k b yet ɑ: «Niib nɑ tie Suifnbɑ e, k bɑɑt nɑn ŋmɑtl bonciɑnn t duo pɑɑk
k wɑnt’t b kɑɑ nbɑ k t *senni k cɑb’t ɑ tin gɑɑl, k mɑɑn t tie Luonmtieb e.»
Ŋɑnn e k nibul nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ mun jɑk’b k kpil’b. K bɑlbuulɑ nɑ te k b suol Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs tiɑt k fɔb k liɑt liɑt, ŋɑɑn k buo’b lɑnbɑnn.
Bɑɑ buo’b bonciɑnn k gbenn yuo nbɑ, k b ji jii’b sɑɑn kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk, ŋɑɑn yet dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ ɑ wun kpɑl’b kenkenken ɑ.
Wɑɑ gbɑt b mɔb mɑnŋ, k u mun jii’b k kuɑn’m dɑnsɑlk dieok mɑnŋ ni pib pib ɑ, ŋɑɑn bɑɑn’m dɑɑt bɑɑnɑ.
K l din tɑn tie nɑn tɑnsuuni nɑ, k Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs din tɑn mei Yennu k yiin *yɑni k piɑk’ɔ, k dɑnsɑl-lei nɑ ji gbiintl’b.
Yiɑn ɑ k tinŋ jek bonciɑnn k ŋɑk dɑnsɑlk nɑ fiɑkɑ. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k tɑnmɔi luot, k jɑlt nɑn bɑɑnɑ yɑbt dɑnsɑli nɑ kul nii nɑn b tɑɑ ni, k bɑɑ bɑɑ.
L yuo nɑ k dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ fiil guɑn ni, k lɑ dɑnsɑlk dieok tɑnmɔi k l luot yɑɑ yɑɑ, k u dukn mi ɑ dɑnsɑli mɑnŋ kul nyii e, k l pɑɑk k u nuɑt u juk-bɑnjiɑk k luon wun kpi u mɔnŋ.
K Pɔul tiɑn sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Dɑɑ tie ɑ mɔnŋ dɑnŋ, k mɑɑn t kul be.»
Ŋɑnn e k guulɔ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ bin tuo muu, ŋɑɑn fɑɑl kuɑ dɑnsɑli dieok mɑnŋ ni, k gbɑɑn wuok k jekl Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs tuɑnn,
k tɑn fiil nyinn’b, ŋɑɑn boi’b ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑnbɑ, n sɑɑ tien nlee k Yennu n fiel’n i?»
K b jiin ɑ: «Tient Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ, k fin nɑn ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu,»
ŋɑɑn pɑk Yennu mɑɑn k tul ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul ɑ.
L yuo mɑnŋ nyiɑɔk nɑ, k u jii’b k wuul b fiɑt nɑ. L puolpo e k b wul ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb nɑ kul ɑ Yennu nyunwulu.
K u biɑ tɑn jii Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs k sɑɑn nɑn’m u ŋɑɑk ni, k sɑɑ tul’b jiet k b dii. K ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb ji mɔk pɑlpienn k l sɑɑ yɑkl, k mɑɑn bɑɑ tien Yennu yɑdɑ k kpint k tien Yiesuweilɑ nɑ pɑɑk
L din yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk o, k Luonmtieb bɑlbuulɑ nɑ din tun sejenm dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ buol ni ɑ bin yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn jɑb mɑnŋ k bin sɑɑn.»
K dɑnsɑlguulɔ nɑ yet Pɔul ɑ: «Bɑlbuulɑ nɑ tun sejenm ɑ n te k fin nɑn Siilɑɑs n nyi. L pɑɑk nɑ, ii nyi mɑn kii sɑɑ nɑn lɑɑfiɑ.»

K Pɔul jiɑnt yet sejenm nɑ: «B dɑɑ k bu t buut, ŋɑɑn won buo’t lɑnbɑnn niwol ni, ŋɑɑn k t tie Luonmtieb e, k i bɑlbuulɑ biɑ won tɑɑn jii’t k lu’t dɑnsɑlk ni, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k b ji luon bin bɔl nyinn’t ii? Wɑɑ. L kɑn tien. Ŋɑɑnt k bɑlbuulɑ mɑnŋ n bɑɑl b mɔnŋ k tɑn nyinn’t.»
K sejenm nɑ ŋmɑt k sɑɑ yet bɑlbuulɑ mɑnŋ Pɔul nbɑ pɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Bɑlbuulɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ ji bɑnn nɑn Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs tie bin nbɑ k Luonmtieb cɑb’b b yiikuo nɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol’b.
L pɑɑk, k b bɑɑl Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs penŋ, k tɑn tien’m gɑfɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn nyinn’b dɑnsɑlk nɑ ni, k bɑln’m ɑ bin lek nyi b duo ni.
K Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs nbɑ siet lenŋ nɑ, k b sɑɑn Liidi ŋɑɑk. Bɑɑ din sɑɑ lɑ Yiesuweilɑ lenŋ nɑ, k b cie b pɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑt.
Tɔn, k b ji din sɑɑ k sɑɑ gɑl Amfiipoliis nɑn Apoloni, k bɑɑl Tesɑɑluoniik. Lenŋ e k *Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok din be.
K Pɔul din tɑn sɑɑn kuɑ lenŋ, nɑn wɑɑ din tuu kuɑ k tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. U din jii fuondɑɑ ŋɑntɑ e k kuɑ lenŋ, k piɑk Yennu mɑɑn nɑn niib nbɑ be nɑ,

k wɑnn’b ɑ Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnt bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e nɑ, *Klistu din sɑɑ bɑɑl k di fɑlɑ, k kpo, k biɑ fiil kuun ni k jen u mɑnfuol ni. Pɔul din yet’b ɑ: «Yiesu nbɑ nɑ e k n piɑk’i u po, ŋuɑ e tie Klistu mɑnŋ.»
K u din tɑn pɑk tunn b siɑb yɑn k b ji bɑɑl tɑɑn ŋuɑ nɑn Siilɑɑs po k wɑɑ’b. K Gleknbɑ bonciɑnn nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu nɑ, nɑn puojɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn, k b mun pukn b po k wɑɑ Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs.
Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ donn punponn, k lin k tikl niyin-yekɑ nbɑ be nɑ, k tɑɑnm, k te k b muk duo nɑ, k tɑn bɑɑl kpil Sɑɑsɔn ŋɑɑk, k luon Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs buol, ɑ bin nyinn’b niib ni.
Bɑɑ k lɑ’b yuo nbɑ, k b suol Sɑɑsɔn nɑn Yiesuweisiɑb, k dɑt’b bɑɑl nɑn’m duo nɑ yudɑnm buol, ŋɑɑn tiɑn yien ɑ: «Niib nɑ lin lɑbi tingbounŋ nɑ k te k mukl muk niib, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k b tɑn bɑɑl t duo nɑ,
k Sɑɑsɔn gɑɑl’b u ŋɑɑk ni, k b lin k wɑnt niib bɑlsɑɑni k biil t kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ *senni, k yɑɑ ɑ Kpɑnbɑl-luɑ e mun be, ɑ k b yi’u Yiesu.»
Bɑɑ yet nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k l dɑɑmi nibul nɑ nɑn yudɑnm nɑ pɑlɑ ni bonciɑnn.
K yudɑnm nɑ te k Sɑɑsɔn-nbɑ pɑ likli ŋɑɑn k b ŋɑɑ’b.
Nyiɑɔk nbɑ tɑn bɔnn yuo nbɑ, k Yiesuweilɑ tun Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs ɑ bin sɑɑn Beele. Bɑɑ bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ k b kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni.
Lenŋ niib din mɑn k gɑl Tesɑɑluoniiktieb. B din gɑɑl Yennu mɑɑn nɑ nɑn b pɑlɑ kul, k lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk dɑɑl kul, ɑ bin lɑɑn Pɔul nbɑ piɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, ɑ l set tie mɔni ɑmi nlee.
Ŋɑnn e k siɑb bonciɑnn tien yɑdɑ, k Glek puojɑɑnɑ bonciɑnn nɑn Glek jɑb bonciɑnn mun din tien yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din be Tesɑɑluoniik nɑ din gbɑt ɑ Pɔul biɑ muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn Beele, k b bɑɑl lenŋ, k fiin nibul nɑ wutuol, ɑ bin kpil’ɔ.
L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni k Yiesuweilɑ nɑ te k Pɔul nɑn bin nbɑ ciɑnt’ɔ nɑ nyii k tɔkn sɔnu k bɑɑl mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote ŋɑnin din biɑl Beele.
Niib nbɑ din ciɑnt Pɔul nɑ din sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ nɑn Atenn e wɑɑ, k b tɑn yɑɑ bin ŋmɑt kun, k Pɔul yet’b ɑ bin sɑɑ yet Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote ɑ bin yɑbl k bɑɑl yiɑn yiɑn nɑ. K niib nɑ ji din ŋmɑt kun Beele.
Pɔul nbɑ din dɑɑ be Atenn k guu Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote nɑ, k u lɑ k pɑtɑ gbie nɑn duo nɑ, k l din biil u pɑl ni bonciɑnn.
K u tuu kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn buolgɑnu nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu nɑ. K u biɑ din tuu sɑɑn b linlɑknbuol ni dɑɑ kul, k sɑɑ fɑɑ nɑn bin nbɑ bɑɑt lenŋ nɑ lɑbɑɑl.

K sɑɑkɑyɑndɑɑnsiɑb nnɑ din be, k b yi b yenm Epiikuuliɑnbɑ, k lieb mun Stoisiɑnbɑ, k b mun tɑn bɑɑl k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn Pɔul. K b siɑb tɑn pɑk nɑn b lieb ɑ: «Bɑlfuouk dɑɑnɔ nbɑ wɑnt u mɔnŋ nɑ mun yien bee nɑ?» K b yenm mun yɑɑ ɑ: «L tɑɑn tie nɑn u piɑk digbɑngɑnɑ yenni po e nɑ.» B din yet nnɑ mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn Pɔul muɑntl Yiesu po nɑn u kuun fiilu po.
Ŋɑnn e k b jii Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ b sɑɑkɑb tintɑɑnkɑɑnu buol nbɑ k b din yi Aleopɑɑj nɑ, ŋɑɑn din boi Pɔul ɑ: «T sɑɑ fit bɑnn tumiipɑɑnu nbɑ k ɑ wɑnt nɑ ɑɑ?
K mɑɑn ɑ piɑk bɑlyeni, k l tie bɑlsɑɑni e t penŋ, k t luon k tin bɑnn l pɑɑk.»
(Atenn niib kul nɑn bin nbɑ din nyii tingɑni k bɑɑl k be nɑ, k b tuu jii b yuo k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl, k biɑ gbiintl bɑlsɑɑni nbɑ juont bɑɑl nɑ.)
Tɔn, k Pɔul fiil b tintɑɑnkɑɑnu mɑnŋ ni, k set b tuɑnn, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «Atenntieb, n lɑ i benu kul ni k i luon i pɑtɑ bonciɑnn,
k mɑɑn mɑɑ kɑk k lin i duo nɑ, n got i pɑtɑ, k biɑ lɑ binbintl k l diɑn l pɑɑk ɑ: ‹Yennu nbɑ k t k mi’u.› N luon k n wɑnn’i wun nbɑ k i puki k tien’ɔ ŋɑɑn k mi’u nɑ.
Yennu mɑnŋ, ŋuɑ e din nɑn *dulnyɑ nɑn bont kul nbɑ be l ni. Ŋuɑ e tie sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k k tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ be puociɑnfei nbɑ k niib mɑɑ ni kɑɑ.
K nisɑɑlk kɑn fit tun siɑl nɑn u nuu k tul’ɔ k lin pukn’ɔ siɑl, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien nisɑɑli kul mɑnfuol nɑn bonɑ kul.
Ŋuɑ e mun te k nibuolu kul nyii yejɑ yenɔ kuɑ ni, k biɑ te k b be tingbounŋ nɑ kul ni, k u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din senn yuo nbɑ k nibuolu kul sii be, k biɑ tien b binbeboɑ teli.
U din tien nnɑ mɑnŋ ɑ bin lon’mɔ, ɑ k pɑsiɑl i bin tuln k tɑn nɑkn bɑnn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu set k fɔk nɑn t suɑ.
Nisuɑ din yet ɑ: ‹L tie Yennu pɑɑk e k t be k fo k tuun.› I yɑndɑnm pinpɑkt mun biɑ lek wɑnt nnɑ mɑnŋ e ɑ: ‹T biɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs e.›
Tɔn, tinm nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs nɑ, l k ŋɑn k tin dukn nɑn Yennu tie nɑn *siɑl ɑ bonninnɑɔnŋ nbɑ tie sɑlmɑ ɑmi tɑnn nbɑ k nilɔ ŋɑnm’l nɑn u yɑn ɑmi u dudukt ni.
Yuo nbɑ gɑl nɑ, Yennu din k ŋmɑnn niib tubɑ nɑn bɑɑ din jɑnŋ nɑn tubdɑtu bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u yet suɑ kul, ɑ wun mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ,

k mɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu ponŋ senn dɑɑl nbɑ k u sɑɑ bu tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kul buut cib cib. U sɑɑ te k suɑ nbɑ k u lukt’ɔ nɑ n bu buut mɑnŋ, k u set fiin’ɔ kuun ni, k l tie nyinn k tul suɑ kul, ɑ u set sɑɑ tun wɑɑ senn lin nbɑ nɑ.»
Bɑɑ gbɑt k Pɔul pɑk kuun fiilu po nɑ, k siɑb lɑɑ k sɑlkt’ɔ, ŋɑɑn k siɑb mun yɑɑ ɑ: «T luon k tin ŋɑnm gbiint lin nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ pɑk nɑ e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul din nyii ŋɑɑn nyik’b.

Ŋɑɑn siɑb mun din tɑɑ u po k tien yɑdɑ. K b ni mɑnŋ, Deniis din be. Ŋuɑ e din tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ din tuu be Aleopɑɑj tintɑɑnkɑɑnu ni. K puosuɑ mun din be b ni, k u sɑnn yi Dɑmɑlis. K lieb mun din be k pukn’m.
L puolpo e k Pɔul din nyii Atenn k sɑɑn Kuolent.

Lenŋ e k u din sɑɑ lɑ *Suif nisuɑ, k u sɑnn yi Akiilɑɑs, wun nbɑ k b din mɑl’ɔ Pɔn, k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Pliisiil nyii Itɑɑli k bɑɑl Kuolent, k mɑɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Kluod din tul mɔb ɑ Suifnbɑ kul n nyi Luonm. Bɑɑ be Kuolent nɑ, l dɑɑ k wei, k Pɔul din tɑn bɑɑl b ŋɑɑk ni,
ɑ wuu be nɑn’m, k mɑɑn b kul din jikit bonkobt gbɑnt e tie ŋei.
K *Fuondɑɑl kul, u tuu kuɑ yenjiɑntu dieok ni, k gbɑɑ ɑ Suifnbɑ nɑn Gleknbɑ n gbɑt l pɑɑk kii wɑɑ Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn.
Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote nbɑ din tɑn nyii Mɑɑseduɑnn k bɑɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Pɔul ji din jii u yuo kul k muɑntl Yiesu mɑɑn k tien Suifnbɑ nɑ, k din wɑnt nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ Yiesu e tie *Klistu nɑ.

Ŋɑɑn k b lek din k sɑk mɑɑn mɑnŋ, k suki’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e k u din pit pit u nii nɑn u tɑɑ, ŋɑɑn yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k i tɑn kɔnŋ i mɑnfuol i e, l jii i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ yulɑ pɑɑk e. N nuu kɑɑ jik. Lɑɑ jii dinnɑ k sɑɑ, sie k n nyik ŋɑɑn wɑnn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ Yiesu mɑɑn mɑnŋ.»
Ŋɑnn e k u nyik’b ŋɑɑn sɑɑn sɑɑ be suɑ ŋɑɑk ni, k b yi’u Tiitius Sustus. K u din jiɑntl Yennu. U ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ din kpiɑ nɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok o.
K Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok mɑnŋ yudɑɑnɔ Kliispus nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kul tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ, k Kuolent-tieb bonciɑnn mun din gbiintl Pɔul mɑɑn k tien yɑdɑ k b wul’b Yennu nyunwulu.
Nyɑyeunŋ o dinn k Pɔul din tɑn lɑ yelntu. K u yelntu mɑnŋ ni k Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn kii muɑntl n mɑɑn mɑnŋ k dɑɑ nyikt,
k mɑɑn n be nɑn’ɑ, k suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ kpil’ɑ k tien’ɑ dɑnŋ, k mɑɑn niib bonciɑnn be duo nɑ ni k tie n yɑb.»
L pɑɑk, Pɔul din be lenŋ binn nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob, k din wɑnt niib Yennu mɑɑn.
Tɔn, yuo nbɑ k Gɑɑliɔn din tie Akɑɑyi tinŋ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ, k Suifnbɑ din tɑn tɑɑn lieb k lek Pɔul k suol’ɔ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ buut buol,
k sɑɑ yet ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tumi niib biɑnŋ nbɑ k b sii jiɑntl Yennu k l k tɑɑ nɑn t *senni.»
Pɔul nbɑ din yɑɑ wun pɑk yuo nbɑ, k Gɑɑliɔn yet Suifnbɑ mɑnŋ ɑ: «Yinm Suifnbɑ, l i tie k u kpii nilɔ kuo u tun biit nbɑ gbenŋ, l bo sii ŋɑn k i di suklu k gbiint,
ŋɑɑn lɑɑ tie mɑɑn nbɑ jii k jiin i mɔnŋ mɑɑn nɑn i sɑnɑ, nɑn i mɔnŋ senni nɑ i e, i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ n got l ni. N k sɑk ɑ n sɑɑ bu l mɑbuolu.»
Ŋɑnn e k u bel nyinn’b buut buol mɑnŋ.
K b suol Sositenn wun nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok yudɑɑnɔ k tɑn buo’u buut mɑnŋ buol ni, ŋɑɑn k Gɑɑliɔn bɑkɑ tɑɑn kɑɑ b po.

K Pɔul din dɑɑ biɑl Kuolent ŋmɑɑli bonciɑnn. Ŋɑnn e k u din tɑn cɑb Yiesuweilɑ, ŋɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn Siili tinŋ ni k Pliisiil nɑn u sɔlɔ Akiilɑɑs din ciɑn’ɔ. Wɑɑ din tɑn yɑɑ wun kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ, u din be Senkle k te k b kuol u yut mɔsonn nbɑ k u din senn nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k b din bɑɑl Efes. Lenŋ e k Pɔul din nyik Pliisiil nɑn Akiilɑɑs ŋɑɑn gɑl sɑɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn Suifnbɑ,
k b tɑn miɑl’ɔ ɑ wun biɑl nɑn’m k wei ŋɑɑn k u k sɑk.
Wɑɑ din yɑɑ wun cɑb’b k sɑɑn nɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «L i tie k Yennu sɑk i e, n biɑ sɑɑ jen i buol nnɑ,» ŋɑɑn biɑ jin kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn.
Wɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle yuo nbɑ k u tuɑt gɑl Selusɑɑlenm k sɑɑ fuont Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib ŋɑɑn gɑl sik Antiɑɔs biɑk,
k sɑɑ wei lenŋ, k biɑ tɑn nyii lenŋ k sɑɑ Gɑɑlɑɑti nɑn Fliiji yɑkɑ po, k sɑɑ cien Yiesuweilɑ kul pɑlɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Suif jɑsuɑ nnɑ din be, k u sɑnn yi Apuoluos, k b din mɑl’ɔ Aleksɑndli, k u din tɑn bɑɑl Efes. U din tie wun nbɑ mi mɑɑn e, k din mi Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk fɑnu.
B din ponŋ wɑnn’ɔ Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu e wɑɑ, k u tɑn bɑɑl k din piɑk wɑnt Yiesu po bonŋɑnn nɑn ninmɔnn, ŋɑɑn u din mi Sɑn nbɑ din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu biɑnŋ nbɑ kuukuɑ e.
K u din piin piɑk Yennu mɑɑn nɑn pɑlcienn, Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k Pliisiil nɑn u sɔlɔ Akiilɑɑs nbɑ gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k b tɑn jii’u k fiit Yennu sɔnu bonciɑnn fɑnu k wɑnn’ɔ.

L puolpo e k Apuoluos dukn ɑ wun sɑɑn Akɑɑyi. K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ din be Efes nɑ sonm’ɔ, k diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Akɑɑyi nɑ, ɑ u i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, bin gɑɑl’ɔ sɑɑɔnŋ. Wɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl lenŋ yuo nbɑ, k u set tot bin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk,
k mɑɑn ŋuɑ nɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ din tɑn noi nɑn lieb, k u din jikt Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk, k wɑnt’b ɑ Yiesu e set tie Klistu k din pɑk nɑn pɑnŋ k nyɑnn’b niwol ni.
Apuoluos nbɑ din dɑɑ be Kuolent nɑ, k Pɔul ŋɑnin din gɑl yɑkl nbɑ mɔk juɑt nɑ k sɑɑn Efes. Lenŋ e k u din sɑɑ lɑ Yiesuweisiɑb,
k boi’b ɑ: «Yɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ k wɑɑ’u nɑ, i mi k gɑɑl Foŋɑnm ii?» K b jiin ɑ: «Aɑi. T ponŋ tɑɑn k mi k gbɑt ɑ Foŋɑnm be kɑɑ wɑɑ gbɑɑ.»
K Pɔul boi’b ɑ: «K ŋɑnn, b wul’i wulbuol-lɑnu po e?» K b jiin ɑ: «B wul’t nɑn Sɑn nbɑ din wuul niib biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.»
K Pɔul yet’b ɑ: «Sɑn din wuul niib Yennu nyunwulu, k l wɑnt ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, ŋɑɑn yien’m ɑ bin tien wun nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ yɑdɑ, k ŋuɑ e tie Yiesu.»
Bɑɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k b ji wul’b Yennu nyunwulu Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni.
K Pɔul jii u nii ŋɑɑn yii b pɑɑk k Foŋɑnm sik kuɑ b ni, k b ji piɑk bɑlgɑni, k biɑ piɑk sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn.
Jɑb mɑnŋ din tie nɑn piik nɑn bɑnle nɑ e.
L din tie ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ e k Pɔul ji din sɑɑn Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti dieok ni, k fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn niib nɑn pɑlcienn, k yɑbi u mɔnŋ ɑ wun kpint b yɑn k jikt sɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn po.

Ŋɑɑn niib nɑ siɑb din tie tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm e, k din k sɑk mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn piɑk bɑlbiit nibul nɑ ni, k biil Yonmdɑɑnɔ weiu sɔnu. Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul nyik’b, ŋɑɑn jii Yiesuweilɑ nɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’m Tiilɑɑnus sɑkul dieok ni, k dɑɑl kul jik k u fɑɑ lɑbɑɑl nɑn niib lenŋ.
L din jii nnɑ k bɑɑl binɑ ŋɑnle. K niib kul ɑ nbɑ din be Asii tinŋ ni k tie *Suifnbɑ, nɑn nilieb kul ɑ, din gbɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ ɑ.
L yuo nɑ k Yennu din te k Pɔul tuun bɑktnɔunŋ tuonjɑɑnɑ nbɑ be l kuɑ.
Nnɑ e k niib din tuu jii cincenɑ nɑn nunfiɑni nbɑ sii Pɔul gbɑnɑnt nɑ, k sɑɑn tul b bɑɑtb k b yiɑli nɑ nyik’b k nɑlnbiit nyi b ni.

L yuo nɑ k Suif nisiɑb din be, k din tuu lin k nyint nɑlnbiit niib ni, k b biɑ din tuu bikn ɑ bin jii Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn kii nyint nɑlnbiit, k b din biel nɑlnbiit nɑ ɑ: «Min e tul’i mɔb Yiesu sɑnn ni, wun nbɑ k Pɔul muɑntl u mɑɑn nɑ, nyimin mɑn.»
Bin nbɑ din tuun nnɑ mɑnŋ din tie jɑb bɑnlole nbɑ din tie *Suifnbɑ Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnsuɑ Sefɑ wɑɑs e.
Ŋɑɑn nɑlnbiiuk jiin k yet’b ɑ: «N mi Yiesu, k biɑ mi Pɔul po, ŋɑɑn k yinm mun, i tie ŋmee?»
K juɑ nbɑ k nɑlnbiiuk nɑ din be u ni nɑ yukl k tɑn cib’b bii, nɑn pɑnŋ, k nyɑnn’b, k tul’b dɑni, k biɑ pɑt pɑt b tiɑt, k b kul ɑ ciɑl gbɑnɑnbilɑ, k nyii u ŋɑɑk ni.
Yuo nbɑ k Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ kul ɑ nbɑ be Efes nɑ gbɑt nnɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol b kul ɑ, k b bɑɑk Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn bonciɑnn.
Ŋɑnn e k bin nbɑ din tɑn tien yɑdɑ nɑ bonciɑnn pɑk kɑt b nɔi ni biit, niib ni, k wɑnn lin nbɑ k b tuu tuun.
K linŋin dɑnm bonciɑnn ji tikl b kɑdɑɑt nɑn b sɑbɑ k bɑɑl nɑn’n, k tɑn juo muu niib kul nuni ni, k b kɑn kɑdɑɑt nɑ yɑbnt likli, k l tie likli kut binɑ tusɑ piinŋmu.
Ŋɑnn e din te k Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn ji din ŋɑnmt yɑt k kuɑ niib ni, k puki nɑn pɑnŋ.
L puolpo k Pɔul dukn ɑ u sɑɑ gɑɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn nɑn Akɑɑyi po e, k sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k yet ɑ: «L puolpo, l tie k n sɑɑn Luonm.»
L pɑɑk, k u tun Tiimuote nɑn Elɑst, u sonmtieb ni bɑnle, ɑ bin gɑl u tuɑnn po k sɑɑn Mɑɑseduɑnn, ŋɑɑn k u din biɑl Asii tinŋ ni.
L yuo mɑnŋ dɑɑmuk bonbiil din fiil k jikt sɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ weiu po.

K jɑsuɑ nnɑ mun din be k u sɑnn yi Demetlius, k u tuu jikt likli kut k din mɑɑ b yennu nbɑ k b yi’u *Altemiis nɑ puociɑnfei, l bonninnɑnɑ, k l tie pɑtɑ, k u kɔi, k din jii niib k b tuun u tuonɑ, k b lɑɑt likli bonciɑnn.
Ŋɑnn e k u tɑn yiin’m k tɑɑn b kul ɑ, k biɑ tɑɑn bin nbɑ kul kul tuun l tuonbuolu nɑ, k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «N ninjɑnm, i mi nɑn t nyuɑt nyi t tuonɑ nɑ ni e.

I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun ponŋ gbɑt k biɑ lɑ Pɔul nbɑ yien lin nbɑ nɑ. U yɑɑ ɑ nilɔ nbɑ mɑɑ yenni nɑn u nii, ɑ ŋɑnn k tie yenni kɑɑ, k u mɑɑn nɑ tunn niib bonciɑnn yɑn Efes nnɑ k sɑɑn pel lin gbenn Asii doi kul ɑ.

Pɑsiɑl k t tuonɑ nɑ sɑnn tɑn sɑɑ kpet mɑnn biil, k biɑ jen ɑ, k t yɑbnt yennu Altemiis puociɑnfiek tɑn sɑɑ kpet mɑnn k tien yɑnn, k biɑ jen ɑ, k t yennu Altemiis nibɑɑkl tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn k wɑɑb, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k suɑ kul nbɑ be Asii tinŋ ni nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ kul ɑ jiɑntl’ɔ nɑ.»
Nibul nɑ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k b wutuol fiil, k b tiɑn tintiɑni, k yɑɑ ɑ: «Tinm Efestieb yennu Altemiis tie yɑbnt yennu e.»
K duo nɑ kul muk. K b suol Gɑius nɑn Aliistɑɑlk k ciɑl sɑɑn kuɑ nɑn’m nibul ni. Jɑb bɑnle mɑnŋ din tie Mɑɑseduɑnn niib, bin nbɑ k Pɔul tuu tɔki nɑn’m nɑ.
K Pɔul luon k wun kuɑ niib nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k Yiesuweilɑ k sɑk ɑ wun kuɑ.
K duo nɑ yudɑnm ni siɑb nbɑ din tie Pɔul yuɑsnbɑ din tun *tuomi ɑ Pɔul n di suklu, k dɑɑ kuɑ nibul mɑnŋ ni.
L yuo nɑ, nibul mɑnŋ ni, siɑb din tiɑn tintiɑni, k yɑki kpɑyɑkt jiɑk jiɑk, k niib nbɑ tikl nɑ yɑn ŋmɑt sɑɑ gɑl, k mɑɑn b bonciɑnn din k bɑnn b lɑknu mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Tɔn, k Suifnbɑ nyinn jɑsuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Aleksɑndl, k senn’ɔ b tuɑnn, ɑ wun pɑk b pɑɑk k tul’b. K Aleksɑndl donn nuu sɑnpɑɑpo, ŋɑɑn ji luon wun pɑk tul nibul nɑ k nyinn Suifnbɑ mɔniɑɔk mɑnŋ ni.
Ŋɑɑn bɑɑ tɑn bɑnn nɑn u tie Suif nilɔ nɑ, k b kul ji tiɑn tintiɑni, k yien ɑ: «Tinm Efestieb yennu Altemiis tie yɑbnt yennu e.» K b kul tiɑn nnɑ k wei bonciɑnn.

L juontu k duo mɑnŋ sɑɑkuɑ te k nibul nɑ ŋmin, ŋɑɑn k u yet’b ɑ: «Yinm Efestieb, suɑ kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni k k mi nɑn Efestieb e guu k goli yɑbnt Altemiis puociɑnfiek, ŋɑɑn mun guu k goli Altemiis ninnɑɔnŋ nbɑ nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k tɑn bɑɑ nɑ.
Suɑ biɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit noi lin nbɑ nɑ. L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k i di suklu, k dɑɑ tie jɑti.
I bɑɑl nɑn niib nɑ nnɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k b k jɑn t pɑtɑ bont. B biɑ k piɑk k suki’i biil t yennu.
L i tie k Demetlius nɑn u tuontunlieb mɔk mɑɑn nɑn suɑ i e, ŋɑnn buut buol ponŋ be k mɔk l dɑɑ, k buut dɑnm mun biɑ be. Ŋɑɑnt bin sɑɑn kii sɑɑ i puotl b lieb lenŋ.
L i tie k i mɔk bɑlsɑi k sɑɑ pukn, l ŋɑn k yin sɑɑn yudɑnm buol.
Setk nɑn mɔni, pɑsiɑl Luonmtieb tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn lɑ t biit, k yet ɑ t tie doyieltieb e, k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ tien dinnɑ nɑ po, k l k mɔk pɑɑk, k t mun biɑ kɑn fit wɑnn l pɑɑk k jikt sɑɑ dɑɑmuk nɑ po.»
U yet nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn ji yɑt niib nɑ.
L kpikpiluk puolpo e, k Pɔul ji din yiin Yiesuweilɑ nɑ, k tɑn cie b pɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn ji cɑb’b, k yɑɑt k sɑɑn Mɑɑseduɑnn tinŋ ni,
k din lin Mɑɑseduɑnn tinŋ yɑkɑ po, k biɑ pɑk Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ Yennu mɑɑn bonciɑnn k kuɑnt’b pɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn gɑl sɑɑn Gleknbɑ tinŋ ni.

U ji be lenŋ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ, k l puolpo, k u ji tie siil ɑ wun kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑn Siili, ŋɑɑn tɑn bɑnn nɑn *Suifnbɑ loln lolɑ k guu’u. L pɑɑk k u dukn ɑ l ŋɑn wun ŋmɑt k sɑɑn gɑl Mɑɑseduɑnn tinŋ ni.

Piilus bik Suopɑɑtel, wun nbɑ nyii Beele nɑ, nɑn Aliistɑɑlk nɑn Sekundus, bin nbɑ nyii Tesɑɑluoniik nɑ, nɑn Gɑius, wun nbɑ nyii Delb nɑ, nɑn Tiikiik nɑn Tlofiinm, bin nbɑ nyii Asii tinŋ ni nɑ, nɑn Tiimuote, ŋɑnm e din sɑɑn nɑn Pɔul.
K b gɑl tuɑnn k ji sɑɑ guu’t Tloɑs.
Jɑɑnm nbɑ k b din tuu di pɑɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ * dɑtinŋ nɑ dinu puolpo e, k t ji din kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k nyii Fiiliip, k sɑɑ Tloɑs. K dɑɑ ŋɑnŋmu dɑɑl k t bɑɑl b buol Tloɑs, k biɑl lenŋ k jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole.
Tɔn, k *Fuondɑɑl dɑɑjuouk k t tikl lieb, k tɑɑn nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ, ɑ t di Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk dinu. K Pɔul piɑk nɑn niib nɑ dik dik dik nɑn tɑnsuuni, k mɑɑn lɑɑ sɑɑ yent k wun gɑl nɑ pɑɑk.
T din tikl dituɑtuk nnɑ ni e, k b din juo fitɑ bonciɑnn lenŋ.

Nɑɑsinsuɑ nnɑ mun din be k u sɑnn yi Eotiik, k u din kɑl dituɑtuk nɑ tɑkɑlbonn pɑɑk, k Pɔul piɑk mɔkmɔk, k u kɑl tikntl, k ji tɑn guɑn k libt nyii dituɑtuk muntɑ nɑ ni, k tɑn bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k b sik jii’u, k suɑ k u kpo wɑɑ.
K Pɔul nyii dituɑtuk nɑ ni, k sonm sik tɑn fɑbn u pɑɑk k diɑ’u, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «I dɑɑ te k i pɑlɑ biil. U fo.»
L puolpo k u ŋmɑt k duo dituɑtuk nɑ ni, k sɑɑ dii jiet. L puolpo biɑk k u piɑk nɑn lɑɑ tɑn yent k u ji nyik’b, ŋɑɑn yɑɑn yɑɑt gɑl.
Ŋɑɑn k b ji jii nɑɑsimɔ nɑ ŋɑnin, k u mɔk mɑnfuol, k b kun nɑn’ɔ nɑn pɑlpienn, k l k tie wɑɑnm-nnɑ.
L puolpo k t biɑ kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ, k dɔnŋ gɑl sɑɑn Asuos. Lenŋ e k t din yɑɑ t jii Pɔul, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ din yet’t ɑ tin cet’ɔ, k mɑɑn u din luon wun sonm tɑɑtinŋ e k bɑɑl lenŋ.
Wɑɑ din bɑɑl Asuos yuo nbɑ, k u lɑ’t, k t ji jii’u k kuɑn’ɔ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, k sɑɑn Miitiilenn.
K t biɑ tɑn tuɑt lenŋ k l yent k t bɑɑl Kio. K l biɑ yent k t bɑɑl Sɑɑmuos, k dɑɑl nbɑ wɑɑ nɑ k t bɑɑl Miile.
Pɔul din k luon ɑ wun sɑɑn Efes, k mɑɑn u din k luon k wun wei Asii tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn u din luon yiɑn yiɑn, k mɑɑn u din luon ɑ l i sɑɑ fit, wun bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm dɑjɑɑnn nbɑ k b yi *Pɑntekuot nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul din tun *tuomi ɑ bin nyi Miile duo ni, ɑ k sɑɑn Efes k sɑɑ yiin *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sɑɑkɑb nɑ.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «I mi n binbenŋ nbɑ tuu be biɑnŋ nbɑ, mɑɑ din sint bɑɑl Asii tinŋ nnɑ k jikt sɑɑ.
N din tuun Yennu tuonɑ nɑn sikn-n-mɔnŋ bonciɑnn, nɑn nyin-nyuut, k biɑ lɑ biknu Suifnbɑ lolɑ pɑɑk.
I biɑ mi nɑn mɑɑ din muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn k biɑ wɑnt niib ni nɑn i ŋei ni nɑ, n din pɑk’i lin nbɑ kul sɑɑ sonm’i, k k nyik k biɑ k tenn siɑl.
N kpɑɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ kul ɑ bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu, k tien t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ.
«Tɔn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ Foŋɑnm e mɑb’n k n yɑɑ n sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, ŋɑɑn n k mi lin nbɑ sɑɑ sɑɑ tien’n lenŋ.
Ŋɑɑn mɑɑ mi lin nbɑ kuukuɑ tie nnɑ e. Mɑɑ lin duo kul nɑ ni, Foŋɑnm e tuu wɑnt’n nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ dɑnsɑlk nɑn fɑlɑ tɑn sii tie n yɑl e.
Ŋɑɑn n k yi n mɑnfuol k l tie siɑl, k mɑɑn min ŋɑnin luon k n tun tuonɑ nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu tul’n nɑ e k gbenn k l tuonɑ tie k mii muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ wɑnt Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ po e.
«N din lin i kul ɑ sinsuuk ni, k muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑɑl. Tɔn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ, n mi nɑn i ji kɑn mi k lɑ’n biɑk.
L pɑɑk e te k n yet’i dinnɑ dɑɑl nɑ, ɑhuo, wun nbɑ kɔnŋ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, n nuu kɑɑ lenŋ jik,
k mɑɑn n k mi k fɔlnt k ŋmɑt puolpo nɑn k n muɑnt Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ kul k wɑnn’i.
L pɑɑk, i diɑ i mɔnŋ mɑn bonŋɑnn, nɑn Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ k Foŋɑnm kubn i nuu ni ɑ yii tie b yudɑnm kii goli’b. Ii guu Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ k Yennu te k b tie u yɑb u Bijɑ kuun pɑɑk.
N mi nɑn mi i kɑɑ, nibiit tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl i sinsuuk ni, k biil Yiesuweilɑ siɑb, nɑn kinkɑtɑ nbɑ tuu so pei biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Nisiɑb tɑn sɑɑ nyi i mɔnŋ mɔnŋ sinsuuk ni gbɑɑ, k fɑ fɑi k jiin bɑlmɔni wɑnnu po, ɑ bin tunn Yiesuweilɑ yɑn k te k bii wɑɑ’b.
L pɑɑk, ii guu mɑn k dɑɑ tɑnmt mɑɑ din kpɑɑn i kul nɑn nyin-nyuut, k k nyik yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk, k tɑn jɑnŋ binɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑ ni.
«Mɔtɑɑnɑ, n jikt’i k tie’i Yennu nuu ni, k biɑ mi nɑn yɑɑ bɑnn u mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnt u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ po, l mɑɑn mɑnŋ sɑɑ fit cie i pɑlɑ, k biɑ tul’i fɑɑl nbɑ tie bin nbɑ kul tie u yɑb nɑ yɑl.
N din k luon suɑ likli ɑmi u sɑlmɑ ɑmi u tiɑt.
I mɔnŋ biɑ mi nɑn n din diɑ n nii nɑ e k tuun, k min nɑn n wei-nɑn-lieb di k biɑ gbɑb.

Mɑɑ din tuun nnɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e wɑnt nɑn sie k tii tuun bonciɑnn k fit k sonm tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k dɑɑ tɑnmt Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ din yet lin nbɑ nɑ ɑ: ‹Pɑlpienn sii tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ piin piini yɑl e, k gɑl wun nbɑ gɑɑn.› »
Pɔul nbɑ gbenn mɑɑn mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b kul ɑ lɑkn gbɑɑn k miɑl Yennu.
Mɔni suol’b, k b kul ɑ mɔ, ŋɑɑn jii b nii k kokn kokn Pɔul.
B pɑlɑ mɑntk din biil nɑn wɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ b ji kɑn lɑ’u nɑ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn e k b din ciɑn’ɔ k u kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ.
Tɑɑ din tɑt nyik Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb mɑnŋ nɑ, k t tɔkn bɑɑl Kuos, k l yent k t bɑɑl Luod, k biɑ nyii lenŋ k sɑɑn Pɑɑtɑɑlɑ.
Lenŋ e k t din lɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ sɑɑ Feniisi tinŋ ni. Ŋɑnn e k t kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ k sɑɑ.
Tɑɑ tɑn lɑ duo nbɑ k nyun lint k b yi Siipl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k t gɑɑl t gɑnŋ po, k tɑn bɑɑl Siili tinŋ ni, k nyii ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, duo nbɑ k b yi Tiil nɑ ni, k ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ dɑnm din yɑɑ bin nyinn tiɑt lenŋ.
Lenŋ e k t din lɑ Yiesuweilɑ, k ji biɑl be b buol ni k sɑɑ jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole, k Foŋɑnm din te k b yet Pɔul ɑ u ji dɑɑ sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm.
Dɑɑ ŋɑnlole nbɑ tɑn gɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k ŋɑnm nɑn b puob nɑn b wɑɑs din ciɑn’t, k sɑɑ nyii duo nɑ ni, k diɑn’t, k t kul ɑ gbɑɑn mɔk-kpinŋ k miɑl Yennu.
L puolpo k t cɑb lieb, ŋɑɑn yɑɑn kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ k sɑɑ, k b mun ŋmɑt k kun.
Ŋɑnn e k t nyii Tiil k bɑɑl Tolemɑiis. Lenŋ e k t sɑɑn fuont Yiesuweilɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑl b buol ni dɑyenn kuukuɑ.
L yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk k t nyii Tolemɑiis k bɑɑl Sesɑɑle k sɑɑn kuɑ Fiiliip ŋɑɑk ni, wun nbɑ muɑntl Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, k be. U din tie jɑb bɑnlole nbɑ k b din lukt’b Selusɑɑlenm nɑ yenɔ e.
U din mɔk sɑpɑɑnmunɑ bɑnnɑ, k b mun din tie bin nbɑ sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn.
T din be lenŋ k tien nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ, k *Yennu sɔkni, wun nbɑ k b yi’u Agɑɑbuus, nɑ din nyii Suude k sik,

k bɑɑl t buol ni, k tɑn jii Pɔul gbɑnn, k lol u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ tɑɑ nɑn u nii, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Foŋɑnm nbɑ yɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ e nɑ, ɑ *Suifnbɑ nbɑ be Selusɑɑlenm nɑ tɑn sɑɑ lol gbɑnn nɑ dɑɑnɔ nɑ nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn jii’u k kubn’ɔ bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ nuu ni.»
Tɑɑ ji din gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k tinm nɑn Sesɑɑle duo ni Yiesuweilɑ kul ɑ bɑln Pɔul ɑ u ji dɑɑ sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm.
Ŋɑɑn k u ji din jiin ɑ: «Bee tien k i mɔ k luon k i biil n pɑl i? N k tien siil nɑn bɑɑ sɑɑ lol’n Selusɑɑlenm nɑ pɑɑk kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n ponŋ tien siil nɑn k n kpo Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn pɑɑk.»
Tɑɑ gbɑl nɑn tin tunn u yɑn nɑ, k t ji nyik ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, n tun.»
T weiu mɑnŋ puolpo e, k t ji din tien siil k sɑɑ Selusɑɑlenm.
K Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Sesɑɑle nɑ, k b siɑb mun din wei’t k sɑɑn. Ŋɑnn e k b din jii’t, k t sɑɑn Minɑɑsɔn ŋɑɑk ni. Minɑɑsɔn mɑnŋ ponŋ din tie Yiesuweikpel e k din tie Siipl nilɔ.
Tɑɑ din bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ, k lenŋ Yiesuweilɑ gɑɑl’t nɑn pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k tinm nɑn Pɔul sɑɑn ɑ t sɑɑ fuont Sɑɑk. Yiesuweilɑ sɑɑkɑb kul ɑ mun din be lenŋ l yuo.
Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul fuont’b, ŋɑɑn kɑt wɑnn’b lin nbɑ kul k Yennu tun k tul bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ Pɔul nbɑ din tun lin nbɑ kul Yiesu sɑnn ni nɑ pɑɑk.
Bɑɑ ji din gbɑt u mɑɑn mɑnŋ nɑ, k b kul ɑ pɑk Yennu k yet Pɔul ɑ: «T nɑɑ bik, ɑ mi Suifnbɑ nbɑ tie tusɑ tusɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k b kul ɑ biɑ diɑ Muois *senni kenkenken.
Siɑb kumi’b ɑ ɑ wɑnt Suifnbɑ kul ɑ nbɑ be buolgɑnu tini ni ɑ bin yet Muois *senni, k biɑ yien’m ɑ b dɑɑ poli b wɑɑs punɑ, k biɑ yet’b ɑ b dɑɑ wɑɑ Suifnbɑ kɑɑl.
K t sɑɑ tien nlee nɑ? K mɑɑn b lek sɑɑ gbɑt nɑn ɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
L pɑɑk, t i yet’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, fɑn tun l biɑnŋ. Jɑb bɑnnɑ e be nnɑ k pol pol nɑn Yennu.

Tɔn, fin nɑn ŋɑnm i sɑɑ k sɑɑ ŋɑnm i mɔnŋ, k fɑn pɑ b likli ɑ bin fit kuol b yut, k suɑ kul n fit ŋɑnm bɑnn nɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k b tuu piɑk ɑ po nɑ, l set k tie mɔni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ mɔnŋ ponŋ wɑɑ Muois senni mɑnŋ nɑn l sɔnu.

Bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ ŋɑɑn tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ ŋɑnin, t ponŋ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’b, k wɑnn’b tɑɑ din juont bɑnnu nbɑ ɑ b dɑɑ mi k di jiet nbɑ k b mɑnn pɑtl, ɑmi k ŋmɑn sɔn, ɑmi bonkobuk nbɑ k b ŋmɑkl k kpii, ŋɑɑn biɑ suol b mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ.»

Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul din jii jɑb mɑnŋ, k l tɑn yent, k ŋuɑ nɑn ŋɑnm din ŋɑnm b mɔnŋ. L puolpo k Pɔul din sɑɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k wɑnn dɑɑl nbɑ k ŋɑnmu mɑnŋ sɑɑ gbenn k suɑ kul sɑɑ nɑn piini k pi u mɔnŋ pɑɑk.
Dɑɑ ŋɑnlole dɑɑl nbɑ tɑn pel yuo nbɑ, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ nyii Asii k bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm k be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ, k b tɑn lɑ Pɔul, k te k niib nɑ kul fiil jil jil jil, k suol’ɔ,

ŋɑɑn biɑ tiɑn tintiɑni ɑ: «Suifnbɑ, sonm’t mɑn. Ŋuɑ e tie nilɔ nbɑ lin lokl kul po, k wɑnt niib k biil’b nɑn Suifnbɑ nɑn Muois senni nɑn Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ, k biɑ tɑn bɑɑl nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ gbɑɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni, k tɑn biil buol nbɑ tie Yennu tiɑɔnŋ yɑl nɑ.»
(B yet nnɑ k mɑɑn b din dɔnŋ lɑ Pɔul nɑn Tlofiinm, wun nbɑ din tie Efes nilɔ nɑ, k b be duo nɑ ni, k b dukn k mi ɑ Pɔul kuɑ nɑn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni e.)
L pɑɑk, k duo nɑ niib kul din fiil, k niib kul ɑ ciɑl, k bɑɑl kpil Pɔul, k suol’ɔ k piit nyinn’ɔ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni. L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ, k siɑb luon ŋɑɑk nɑ tɑnmɔi.
B ji yɑɑ bin kpi Pɔul. L yuo nɑ k Luonmtieb sejenm yudɑɑnɔ ji gbɑt ɑ Selusɑɑlenmtieb kul ɑ fiil jil jil jil.
K u kɑkt yiɑn ɑ, k jii sejenm nɑn b sɑɑkɑb, k b fɑɑl sik nibul nɑ ni. Niib nɑ nbɑ lɑ’u nɑn sejenm nɑ yuo nbɑ, k b ji nyik Pɔul buot.
K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ sɑɑn suol Pɔul, ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ bin bɑɑn’ɔ jɑlt ŋɑnle, ŋɑɑn boi Pɔul nbɑ tie wun nbɑ nɑn wɑɑ biil lin nbɑ nɑ.
K nibul nɑ ni, siɑb tiɑn Pɔul pɑɑk jiɑk jiɑk. B bɑlŋmɑtuk mɑnŋ pɑɑk k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ k fit bɑnn l pɑɑk bonŋɑnn. L pɑɑk, k u tul mɔb ɑ bin jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ ni.
Bɑɑ bɑɑl kɑnŋ nɑ tɑnmɔb tɑɑŋmɑɑtɑ pɑɑk nɑ, k sejenm nɑ jii’u sɑnpɑɑpo, k mɑɑn nigbounŋ nbɑ din luon bin kpi’u nɑ pɑɑk.
B ji din wɑɑ b puol k tiɑn tintiɑni ɑ: «Kpin’mɔ mɑn.»
Sejenm mɑnŋ nbɑ ji din yɑɑ bin kuɑ nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ ni nɑ, k u boi sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑ: «A sɑɑ sɑk k n pɑk siɑl k tul’ɑ nii?» K u jiin boi’ɔ ɑ: «A gbiɑ Glek mɑɑn ii?
Fin kɑɑ tie Ejipt nilɔ nbɑ k dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ nbɑ gɑl nɑ ni k u te k niib bɑɑl nɑn kunkɔnn duo nɑ pɑɑk, k u jii nifokpiilt tusɑ ŋɑnnɑ, k sɑɑn nɑn’m k dɑɑn be muuk ni nɑ ɑɑ?»
K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «N tie Suif nilɔ e, k b mɑl’n Tɑɑls nbɑ be Siiliisi yɑkl ni e, k n tie digbɑngbenŋl ni nilɔ e. N bɑln’mɑ e, ŋɑɑnt k n pɑk k tul niib nɑ.»
Sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ cɑb’ɔ mɔb, k Pɔul ŋmɑnt k set tɑnmɔb tɑɑŋmɑɑtɑ nɑ pɑɑk ŋɑɑn ŋɑk u nuu k tul niib nɑ, ɑ bin ŋmin. Bɑɑ ŋmin yuo nbɑ, k u pɑk nɑn’m Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, k yet ɑ:
«Cɑnbɑɑnbɑ nɑn n nɑɑ wɑɑs, gbiintl mɑn lin nbɑ k n yɑɑ n wɑnn’i k jiin n mɔnŋ po.»
Bɑɑ gbɑt k u piɑk *Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni nɑ, k b ji ŋmin suon nnɑ. K u piɑk k sɑɑ ɑ:

«N tie Suif nilɔ e, ŋɑɑn k b mɑl’n Tɑɑls nbɑ be Siiliisi yɑkl ni, ŋɑɑn k n tɑn ŋmɑnt nilɔ Selusɑɑlenm nnɑ. K n wɑntuɑ din tie Gɑɑmɑɑliɑl e, k u din wɑnt’n t yejɑnm *senni cib cib, k n lek din wɑɑ Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn, nɑn i kul nbɑ wɑɑ’u dinnɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
N din muksl bin nbɑ wɑɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɔnu, k biɑ din kpi’b gbɑɑ. N din so jɑb nɑn puob k kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli.

Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑn t yudɑnm kul sɑɑ fit k tien n *siɑlɑ lin nbɑ k n piɑk nɑ pɑɑk nɑn l set tie bɑlmɔni e. N din tɑn sɑɑn gɑɑl kɑdɑɑt b penŋ k tul Suifnbɑ nbɑ be Dɑɑmɑɑs nɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑɑn lenŋ mɑɑ n sɑɑ suol niib nbɑ wɑɑ Yiesu sɔnu nɑ, k jen nɑn’m Selusɑɑlenm nnɑ, k bin dɑt b tubɑ.
«Tɔn, k dɑɑsiɑl k n din tɑn sɑɑ k sɑɑ pel Dɑɑmɑɑs yensuuk ni, min tɑɑn tɑɑntl suɑ k yentsɑɑkɑl nyiknt sɑnpɑgbɑnn ni, k sik yent k lint’n ɑ.
K n bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k gbɑt kunkɔl yi ɑ: ‹Sɔul, Sɔul, bee k ɑ muksl’n i?›
K n jiin k boi mɑɑ: ‹A tie ŋmee?› K u yet’n ɑ: ‹Min, Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu e, k ɑ muksl’n mɑnŋ.›
Niib nbɑ din ciɑnt’n nɑ ŋɑnin din lɑ yentu nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑnm din k gbɑt kunkɔl nbɑ piɑk nɑn’n nɑ ŋɑnin.
«Ŋɑnn e k n boi’ɔ: ‹N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, n sɑɑ tien nlee?› K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’n ɑ: ‹Fiit kii sɑɑ Dɑɑmɑɑs, k b sɑɑ sɑɑ wɑnn’ɑ lin nbɑ kul k Yennu nyinn ɑ ɑ tun.›
Tɔn, n din juɑn ɑ, k mɑɑn yentu nbɑ din yent k nyɔkt n ninbinɑ ni nɑ pɑɑk, k n tɔk-nɑn-lieb nɑ ji din dɑt n nuu k sɑɑn nɑn’n Dɑɑmɑɑs.
«Lenŋ e k jɑsuɑ din be k b yi’u Anɑɑniɑs, k u din tie nipiemɔ, k biɑ din diɑ Muois senni fɑnu, k Suifnbɑ kul ɑ nbɑ be Dɑɑmɑɑs nɑ din tien’ɔ nibɑɑkl bonciɑnn.
U din bɑɑl n penŋ k set, k yet’n ɑ: ‹N nɑɑ bik Sɔul, nyuɑntl.› L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ k n nyuɑnt k lɑ’u.
K u yet’n ɑ: ‹Yennu nbɑ tie t yejɑnm Yennu nɑ ponŋ din lukt’ɑ, ɑ fɑn bɑnn u yɑnbuɑtuonɑ, k biɑ lɑ niŋɑnɔ *Klistu, k biɑ gbɑt mɔbonɑ u tiɑɔnŋ mɔb ni,
k mɑɑn u luon fin e n tien u siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ, kii piɑk kii tien suɑ kul fɑɑ lɑ lin nbɑ k biɑ gbɑt lin nbɑ.
L pɑɑk, k ɑ ji kɑl k guu biɑ? Fiit, k wul Yennu nyunwulu k wuul ɑ biit kii yi u sɑnn.›
«Tɔn, k n ji din ŋmɑt Selusɑɑlenm, k mɑɑ din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k mei Yennu nɑ k n lɑ yelntu.
K n yelntu mɑnŋ ni, k n lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k u yet’n ɑ: ‹Kɑktl k nyi Selusɑɑlenm yiɑn yiɑn, k mɑɑn Selusɑɑlenmtieb kɑn gɑɑl lin nbɑ k ɑ piɑk k jiin n po nɑ.›
K n jiin ɑ: ‹N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, b ponŋ tuu mi nɑn min e tuu lin kuɑ Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, k so niib nbɑ tien’ɑ yɑdɑ nɑ, k buo’b kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli.
K biɑ jen ɑ, bɑɑ din yɑɑ bin kpi ɑ siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ Etiɑnn nɑ, n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun din be lenŋ, k din tɑɑ b po. Min e biɑ din diɑ niib nbɑ din kpii’u nɑ tiɑt.›
K Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet’n ɑ: ‹Fin i sɑɑ wɑɑ, min e yɑɑ n tun’ɑ niib nbɑ be bɑnfɔkl k k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ tini ni.› »

Tɔn, Pɔul nbɑ piɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, k niib nɑ lek k gbiint wɑɑ pɑk lin nbɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ tɑn pɑk juont k b ji k sɑk, k tiɑn tintiɑni sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ k ŋɑn nɑn wuu be tingbounŋ nɑ ni. Yinm tɑɑn lek kpin’mɔ mɑn.»
K b yikn wuyikni k tiɑn, ŋɑɑn liɑtl b tiɑt k pɑt ŋɑkn, ŋɑɑn wo tɑnt k yɑln sɑnpɑɑpo, b wutuol nbɑ duo nɑ pɑɑk
Ŋɑnn e k Luonmtieb sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ tul mɔb ɑ bin jii Pɔul k kuɑ nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ yet’b ɑ bin buo’u, k wun bɑnn biit nbɑ k u tun k Suifnbɑ tiɑn tintiɑni mɑnŋ.
K b lol’ɔ, ŋɑɑn ji yɑɑ bin buo’u. Ŋɑnn e k u boi sejenm sɑɑkɑbik nbɑ sie lenŋ nɑ ɑ: «Senni cɑb ɑ ɑ buo Luonm nilɔ k suɑ i dɑɑ k bu u buut ii?»
Sejenm sɑɑkuɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k u sɑɑn b yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k sɑɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «A sɑɑ tien nlee? U mɔk yiikuo nɑn Luonm nilɔ nɑ e.»
K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ mun fiil, k tɑn bɑɑl boi Pɔul ɑ: «Yetl’n, Luonmtieb set tul’ɑ b yiikuo ee?» K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «Nnn.»
K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Min ŋɑnin din pɑ likli sɑɑn e wɑɑ k b cɑb’n yiikuo mɑnŋ.» K Pɔul yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin, bɑɑ mɑl’n, b ponŋ cɑb’n yiikuo mɑnŋ ɑ.»

L tɑɑkpɑɑk ni nɑ, k sejenm nbɑ bo luon k bin boi Pɔul buot buboit nɑ, ji fuln, k ŋmɑt potuntunɑ jik, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ, nɑn wɑɑ lɑ k u lol Pɔul nbɑ k Luonmtieb cɑb’ɔ b yiikuo nɑ jɑlt.

Ŋɑnn e k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ lek yɑbi ɑ wun bɑnn mɑɑn nbɑ k Suifnbɑ tɑɑl Pɔul nɑ pɑɑk cib cib. K l ji tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k u te k b lot’ɔ, ŋɑɑn biɑ tul mɔb ɑ Suifnbɑ mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑ nɑn b tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm kul ɑ n tikl nɑ, ŋɑɑn te k Pɔul bɑɑl set b tuɑnn po.
Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul got tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm mɑnŋ silll, k tɑn yet ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, mɑɑ din be biɑnŋ nbɑ k tɑn tuu mɔtɑɑnɑ, n mi nɑn l fɑn nɑn Yennu.»
Wɑɑ yet nnɑ, k mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ Anɑɑniɑs yet bin nbɑ sie k kpiɑ Pɔul nɑ ɑ bin fɑɑ Pɔul mɔb pɑɑk.
K Pɔul yet’ɔ ɑ: «Yennu sɑɑ fɑɑ fin kpinkpɑnni dɑɑnɔ nɑ wɑɑ. A kɑl lenŋ k bu n buut nɑn t *senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn fɑɑ yɑɑ bin buo’n nɑ, ɑ mɔnŋ biil *senni mɑnŋ ɑ.»
K bin nbɑ sie k kpiɑ Pɔul nɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «A tɑn suki Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ ɔɔ?»
K u jiin ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n k mi nɑn u tie mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ e. L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: ‹L k ŋɑn k ɑ pɑk bɑlbiiuk k jiin ɑ yudɑɑnɔ po.› »

Tɔn, Pɔul nbɑ ji bɑnn nɑn tituk kɑɑnu mɑnŋ siɑb tie *Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ, k lieb mun tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ, k u yet sɑnpɑɑpo wɑɑ niib nɑ ni ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n tie Fɑɑliisiɑn e, Fɑɑliisiɑn bik e tie’n. K n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn kpienm tɑn sɑɑ fiil ɑ. L pɑɑk e te k b bu n buut nɑ.»
Wɑɑ pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k mɔniɑɔk ji fiil Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑn Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ mɑnŋ sinsuuk ni, k tintɑɑnu tɑn bɔkt.
(Sɑɑdiuseɑnbɑ nɑ yɑɑ ɑ kpienm fiilu kɑɑ, k *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ kɑɑ, k sei biɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ ŋɑnin tien l kul ɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑ.)
