Ŋɑnn e k b tintiɑni nɑ ŋɑnmt k do k puki, k *senniwɑntieb nɑ siɑb, bin nbɑ tie Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ nɑ, fiil pɑk nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ: «T k lɑ juɑ nɑ biit. Pɑsiɑl siek ɑmi mɑlɑkɑ e pɑk tul’ɔ.»

K mɔniɑɔk nɑ din ŋɑnm k fiil bonciɑnn, k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ mi ɑ b tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn kpet k dɑt Pɔul k pɑt pɑt’ɔ. L pɑɑk, k u tul mɔb ɑ sejenm n sɑɑn k sɑɑ nyinn Pɔul tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm mɑnŋ ni, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kɑnŋ nɑ ni.
L puolpo k nyiɑɔk tɑn bɔnn, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑl Pɔul penŋ, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Ii mɔk pɑlcienn. A ponŋ tul’n *siɑlɑ Selusɑɑlenm ɑ, k l biɑ kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn k ɑ biɑ tun Luonm duo ni nnɑ.»
L din tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k Suifnbɑ tikl, k kɑl lol lol, ŋɑɑn biɑ pol pol, ɑ b kɑn di siɑl i ɑmi k nyu siɑl, sie k bin tɑn kpi Pɔul ɑ.
Bin nbɑ din lol lol mɑnŋ din yɑb gɑl nɑn niib piinnɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e k b fiil sɑɑn Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn sɑɑkɑb buol k yet’b ɑ: «T pol pol nbɑ pɑɑl e, ɑ t kɑn di siɑl ɑmi k nyu siɑl, sie k tin tɑn kpii Pɔul ɑ.

L pɑɑk, yinm nɑn tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm nɑ n tun *tuomi Luonmtieb sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k wun nyinn Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ i buol nnɑ, k lii tie nɑn i luon k i boi’ɔ buboit e, k bɑnn u mɑɑn mɑnŋ po cib cib nɑ. T dɑɑn tien siil, ɑ tin kpi’u k suɑ u dɑɑ k bɑɑl nnɑ»
Ŋɑɑn k Pɔul niipuo bijɑ mun gbɑt b lolɑ mɑnŋ, k sɑɑn kɑnŋ nɑ ni, k sɑɑ yet Pɔul l bɑnnu.
Pɔul nbɑ gbɑt nnɑ mɑnŋ, k u yiin sejenm sɑɑkɑyenɔ, k tɑn yet’ɔ ɑ: «Jiin nɑɑsimɔ nɑ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ ɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ, k mɑɑn u mɔk siɑl e k yɑɑ wun yet’ɔ.»
K sejenm sɑɑkɑyenɔ nɑ jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ b yudɑɑnɔ nɑ penŋ, k yet’ɔ ɑ: «Pɔul, wun nbɑ k t diɑ’u dɑnsɑlk nɑ, yet ɑ n bɑɑl nɑn nɑɑsimɔ nɑ ɑ penŋ, k mɑɑn u mɔk siɑl e k luon k wun yet’ɑ.»
K sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ suol u nuu suon nnɑ, k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kpinŋ, k sɑɑ boi’ɔ: «A mɔk bɑl-lɑni e k luon k ɑ yet’n ii?»
K u yet’ɔ ɑ: « *Suifnbɑ tɑɑn mɔb k luon k bin won boi’ɑ wonn k ɑ nyinn Pɔul k sik nɑn’ɔ b tituk ni, k lii tie nɑn b luon k bin bo boi’ɔ buboit e, k bɑnn u po cib cib nɑ.

Ŋɑɑn ɑ dɑɑ fiin b po, k mɑɑn Suifnbɑ siɑb yɑb, k gɑl nɑn jɑb piinnɑ nɑ wɑɑ, bin nbɑ sɑɑ bɔl k guu ɑ bin kpi’u. B kul ɑ pol pol e, k yɑɑ ɑ b kɑn di jiet ɑmi k nyu siɑl, sie k bin tɑn kpi’u wɑɑ. B kpɑn tien siil e wɑɑ ŋɑɑn ji guu ɑ mɔb.»
Ŋɑnn e k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ yet nɑɑsimɔ nɑ ɑ: «I mi k ɑ yet suɑ nɑn ɑ kumi’n l lɑbɑɑl,» ŋɑɑn te k u ŋmɑt.

Ŋɑnn e k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ yiin u sɑɑkɑb nɑ ni bɑnle k tɑn yet’b ɑ: «Jiin mɑn sejenm kobiinle, nɑn tɑnjɑklɑ piinlole, ŋɑɑn jii kpɑntuɑlɑ kobiinle mun k tien siil k sɑɑn Sesɑɑle. Ii nyi gɔtonm yuo nyiɑɔk nɑ, k sɑɑn.
Jiin tɑɑnm k tul Pɔul k wun jɑk, ŋɑɑn tenn tɑɑnlei kii diɑ, kii sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ suon nnɑ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks penŋ, k u dɑɑ lɑɑt dɑnŋ,»
k u diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’b, k l wɑnt ɑ nnɑ:
«Min Kluod Liisiɑs e diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ, k tien Cɑnbɑɑ yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks, n fuont’ɑ.
«Suifnbɑ e dɑɑn suol juɑ nɑ, k dɑɑn bo sɑɑ kpi’u wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k n gbɑt ɑ u tie Luonm nilɔ e. L pɑɑk, k n jii sejenm, k sɑɑn k sɑɑ fɑt’ɔ.
N dɑɑn luon k n bɑnn lin nbɑ pɑɑk e k b tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, k n jii’u k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ b tituk kɑɑnu dɑnm buol,
k tɑn bɑnn nɑn l tie b mɔnŋ senni pɑɑk e k b tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ. Ŋɑɑn l k tie bisiɑt kɑɑ k l bo jɑnŋ nɑn u kuun, ɑmi dɑnsɑlkuɑnu.

«Ŋɑnn e k b bo kumi’n ɑ Suifnbɑ loln lolɑ ɑ bin kpi’u. L pɑɑk, k n yɑɑ ɑ sejenm n jii’u k bɑɑl ɑ penŋ yiɑn yiɑn, ŋɑɑn k n biɑ yet bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ, ɑ bin bɑɑl ɑ buol, k tɑn wɑnn’ɑ lin nbɑ k b tɑɑl’ɔ l pɑɑk nɑ.»
Ŋɑnn e k sejenm nɑ jii Pɔul nɑn b yudɑɑnɔ nbɑ tul’b mɔb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k sɑɑ nɑn’ɔ, k sɑɑ bɑɑl duo nbɑ yi Antiipɑɑtliis nɑ, l nyiɑɔk mɑnŋ.
K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k sejenm nbɑ sonm tɑɑtinŋ nɑ ji ŋmɑt kun Selusɑɑlenm, kɑnŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn cɑb tɑnjɑklɑ nɑ ɑ bin sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ.
K b jii’u k sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ Sesɑɑle, k sɑɑ jii kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tul yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks nɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ jii Pɔul k kubn’ɔ.
K yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ gɑɑl kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k lii, ŋɑɑn boi Pɔul ɑ u nyii tinlɑnŋ e? Wɑɑ bɑnn nɑn Pɔul nyii Siiliisi nɑ,
k u yet’ɔ ɑ: «Bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, n sɑɑ bu ɑ buut.» Ŋɑnn e k u tul mɔb ɑ guutieb ii diɑ’u kpɑnbɑl *Heluod ŋɑɑk ni.

Tɔn, k dɑɑ ŋɑnŋmu tɑn gɑl, k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ Anɑɑniɑs, nɑn sɑɑkɑb, nɑn lɔyɑ wun nbɑ k b yi’u Teltulus nɑ, tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle k sɑɑn yudɑɑnɔ Feliiks buol ni, k wɑnn’ɔ bɑɑ tɑɑl Pɔul lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
B yiin Pɔul k u bɑɑl b tuɑnn k Teltulus piin k tɑɑl’ɔ k yien ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Feliiks, ɑ pɑɑk e te k t tinŋ nɑ mei, nɑn ɑ minu pɑɑk te k duo nɑ ŋɑn.
Siɑl kul po t mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ yuo kul ɑ, k t tien’ɑ niipuouk bonciɑnn.
N k mɑntk luon k n biil ɑ yuo, ŋɑɑn n bɑln’mɑ e k ɑ di suklu k gbiint t mɑɑn nɑ wɑɑn.
«T lɑ k juɑ nɑ biil bonɑ bonciɑnn, k biɑ jen ɑ, k u tuk *Suifnbɑ b sinsuuk ni, tingbounŋ nɑ kul ni. Ŋuɑ e biɑ tie Nɑɑsɑɑlienbɑ yudɑɑnɔ gbɑɑ,
k u dɑɑn luon k wun kuɑn jɑknt Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni. Ŋɑnn e te k t suol’ɔ k t dɑɑn bo luon ɑ tin bu u buut e nɑn t *senni nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ,
ŋɑɑn k sejenm yudɑɑnɔ Liisiɑs bɑɑl, k tɑn kpil t niib nɑn pɑnŋ k fɑt’ɔ t penŋ.
L puolpo e k Cɑnbɑɑ Liisiɑs mɑnŋ biɑ tul mɔb ɑ bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ mɑnŋ n bɑɑl ɑ buol nnɑ. A mɔnŋ sɑɑ fit boi’ɔ buboit k lɑ nɑn tɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, l tie bɑlmɔni e.»
Ŋɑnn e k Suifnbɑ wɑnn bɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ k yɑɑ ɑ l tie mɔni.
L yuo nɑ k yudɑɑnɔ nɑ wɑnn Pɔul nuu ɑ wun pɑk. K Pɔul yet ɑ: «N mi nɑn fɑɑ tien tinm Suifnbɑ nɑ bɑlbuulɔ, l dii binɑ bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk, l tien’n pɑlpienn nɑn mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pɑɑk ɑ buol nnɑ.
«L i tie k ɑ luon, ɑ sɑɑ boi k bɑnn nɑn l k gɑl nɑn dɑɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnle nnɑ k n dɑɑn duo Selusɑɑlenm, mɑɑ n sɑɑ jiɑnt Yennu.
K Suifnbɑ dɑɑn k lɑ k n noi mɔnɔsiɑɔk nɑn suɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, ɑmi k tiki niib k fiint b wutuol Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet ni, ɑmi duo mɑnŋ ni biɑk.
B biɑ kɑn fit k wɑnn lin nbɑ k bilsuk kɑɑ, k b tɑɑl’n mɑnŋ.

«Min yien’ɑ e nɑn mɑɑ wɑɑ sɔnu nbɑ k Suifnbɑ yien ɑ l sɔnu tie fɑɑk sɔnu nɑ, ŋɑɑn min lek jiɑntl t yejɑnm Yennu e. Lin nbɑ diɑn Muois senni kɑdɑɑt nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ kɑdɑɑt ni nɑ, n tien l kul ɑ yɑdɑ,
k mɔk dindɑnn nɑn niib nɑ mun biɑ mɔk l dindɑnn buolu nnɑ e, nɑn Yennu tɑn sɑɑ fiin bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ tie nibiit kul kuun ni.
K l pɑɑk, n yɑbi n mɔnŋ yuo kul, mɑɑ n tun lin nbɑ tuok sɔnu, Yennu nɑn nisɑɑlk buol ni.
«Tɔn, mɑɑ din nyii Selusɑɑlenm, l din wei bonciɑnn nɑ, k n ji tɑn ŋmɑt lenŋ mɑɑ n tul n niib likli, ŋɑɑn biɑ pi Yennu piini.
Tɔn, sinsinn, mɑɑ dɑɑn ŋɑnm n mɔnŋ k gbenn nɑ, k n dɑɑ be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k dɑɑ pi piini mɑnŋ, k b kuɑ k lɑ’n lenŋ. Niib bonciɑnn kɑɑ dɑɑn ciɑn’n, k fuut mun biɑ dɑɑn kɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k Suifnbɑ nbɑ dɑɑn nyii Asii tinŋ ni nɑ ŋɑnin dɑɑn be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk nɑ ni. L i bo i tie k b lɑ n biit, l bo kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k bin bo bɑɑl k tɑɑl’n.
Ŋɑnn i kɑɑ, fɑn ŋɑɑn k niib nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ n wɑnn biit nbɑ k b dɑɑn lɑ k n tun, mɑɑ dɑɑn sie b tituk kɑɑnu ni yuo nbɑ nɑ.
B dɑɑn k lɑ n biit, sie bon-yenn kuukuɑ nbɑ k n dɑɑn yet b sinsuuk ni, lin nbɑ k b k luon, k n yɑɑ ɑ: ‹Buut nbɑ k i bu nɑn’n nɑ tie mɑɑ yet yɑɑ ɑ kpienm fiilu be nɑ pɑɑk e.› »
Feliiks nbɑ ŋɑnin mi Yiesu weiu po bonŋɑnn nɑ, k u nyik mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ ɑ: «Sejenm yudɑɑnɔ Liisiɑs i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl yuo nbɑ, n sɑɑ got i mɑɑn mɑnŋ po,»
ŋɑɑn yet u sejenm sɑɑkɑyenɔ ɑ u guu Pɔul, k wuu be u yɑmɑ ni, k biɑ cɑb Pɔul yuɑsnbɑ ɑ b i tien’ɔ lin nbɑ k u luon.

Ŋɑnn e k dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nnɑ tɑn gɑl, k Feliiks tɑn bɑɑl u buut buol nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Dlusiil, k u tie Suif, k Feliiks te k b yiin Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ. K ŋuɑ Feliiks gbiintl, k Pɔul piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ k nilɔ sɑɑ tien Yiesu *Klistu yɑdɑ.
Tɔn, Pɔul nbɑ piɑk k wɑnt yentinu nɑn mɔnŋdiɑnu nɑn buut dɑɑl bɑɑlu po yuo nbɑ, k jɑŋmɑɑni ji suol Feliiks, k u yet ɑ: «Mɔtɑɑnɑ, ii dɑɑ kii sɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k n lɑ yɑɑk, n biɑ sɑɑ ŋɑnm yiin’ɑ.»
Feliiks biɑ lek din luon nɑn Pɔul tɑn sɑɑ tul’ɔ likli e. L pɑɑk e te k u din tuu tun k yi Pɔul k piɑk nɑn’ɔ.
Tɔn, l din tie nnɑ e k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ ŋɑnle k l puolpo k Polsius Festus mun gɑɑl Feliiks setu k gɑɑl *yudɑnt mɑnŋ. Feliiks din yɑɑ wun penn Suifnbɑ pɑlɑ, k ŋɑɑn k Pɔul be dɑnsɑlk ni.
Yudɑɑnɔ Festus nbɑ bɑɑl Sesɑɑle, l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl k u nyii lenŋ k duo Selusɑɑlenm.
Lenŋ e k Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm nɑn *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm bɑɑl Festus penŋ k pɑk pɑɑn Pɔul mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn miɑl Festus
ɑ wun te k b pɑlɑ i mei, k te k Pɔul n bɑɑl Selusɑɑlenm, k mɑɑn b din lol lol ɑ bin bɔl k lɑɑ k tɑn kpi Pɔul sɔnu ni.
Ŋɑɑn Festus jiin ɑ: «Pɔul be dɑnsɑlk ni Sesɑɑle, k n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ lek sɑɑ ŋmɑt k sɑɑn lenŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlele nɑ wɑɑ.
L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k i yudɑnm n wei’n, k tin sik Sesɑɑle. L i tie k juɑ nɑ tun bonbiil i e, bin tɑɑl’ɔ.»
Festus din dii nɑn dɑɑ ŋɑnniin ɑmi dɑɑ piik nɑ k be nɑn’m, k tɑn fit k ŋmɑt Sesɑɑle, k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k u ji kɑl u buut pɑɑk k te k b nyinn Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ.
Pɔul nbɑ bɑɑl yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Suifnbɑ nbɑ nyii Selusɑɑlenm nɑ, fiil k ŋɑɑ lint Pɔul k tɑɑl’ɔ bonbiil, ŋɑɑn biɑ lek k fit wɑnn nɑn l tie mɔni e.
Ŋɑnn e k Pɔul pɑk u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ pɑɑk k yet ɑ: «N k tun k biil Suifnbɑ *senni ni. N biɑ k tun k biil Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk siɑl, ɑmi Luonmtieb kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl.»
Ŋɑɑn k Festus luon k wun penn Suifnbɑ pɑlɑ. L pɑɑk, k u boi Pɔul ɑ: «A sɑɑ sɑk k ɑ sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm, k n sɑɑ bu ɑ buut lenŋ ii?»
K Pɔul jiin k yet’ɔ ɑ: «N kpɑn dɑɑ sie Luonm yent kul ni kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ buut bunbubuol e nɑ. Ŋɑnn i ŋɑn nɑn k ɑ bu n buut. N k tun Suifnbɑ bisiɑt, k ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun biɑ mi nnɑ.

Mi i bo i mɔk biit i e, k tun lin nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn kuun, n kɑn yet ɑ n fit nyi kuun ni. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k b tɑɑl’n yɑnn i e, suɑ kɑn fit jii’n k kubn’n b nuu ni. Ŋɑɑn sie k n gɑɑn n mɑɑn mɑnŋ Luonm yent kul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl buol.»
Ŋɑnn e k Festus pɑk nɑn u sɑɑkɑb mɑɑn mɑnŋ po, ŋɑɑn yet Pɔul ɑ: «A gɑɑn ɑ mɑɑn Luonm yent kul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl buol ɑ. L pɑɑk, ɑ set sɑɑ sɑɑn ɑ.»
Dɑɑ ŋɑnle nnɑ nbɑ gɑl, k kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Beleniis tɑn bɑɑl Sesɑɑle ɑ bin fuont yudɑɑnɔ Festus.
Bɑɑ din sɑɑ tien lenŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnŋɑ nɑ, k Festus tɑn wɑnn kpɑnbɑl nɑ, Pɔul mɑɑn nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, k yet ɑ: «Feliiks dɑɑn yɑɑt, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑn suɑ dɑnsɑlk ni.
Mɑɑ dɑɑn sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm yuo nbɑ nɑ, k Suifnbɑ sɑɑkɑb nɑn jɑɑnti yudɑnm dɑɑn puot’ɔ, k yɑɑ ɑ n bu u mɑɑn mɑnŋ k kpi’u.
K n mun jiin k yet’b ɑ: ‹Tinm Luonmtieb yɑɑ buol ni ŋɑnin, l k tie t kɑɑl kɑɑ k tin cɑb ɑ bin kpi wun nbɑ k b tɑɑl’ɔ nɑ k suɑ ŋuɑ nɑn bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ nɑ dɑɑ k tuok lieb k u lɑ yɑɑk k pɑk u mɔnŋ pɑɑk.›
«L pɑɑk, b kul ɑ nbɑ dɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl nnɑ yuo nbɑ, n k tɑɑntl, k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni k n kɑl n buut pɑɑk ŋɑɑn tul mɔb k b kuɑ nɑn Pɔul.
«Bin nbɑ tɑɑl’ɔ nɑ fiil k set, ŋɑɑn b k tɑɑl’ɔ nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn bo duki mi ɑ b sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn b kpɑn noi mɔniɑɔk k jikt sɑɑ b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ Yenjiɑntu po, nɑn jɑsuɑ nbɑ din kpo, k u sɑnn yi Yiesu nɑ, wun nbɑ k Pɔul lek yien yɑɑ ɑ u be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ.
«K l mɑɑn jɑl’n. L pɑɑk, k n boi Pɔul ɑ u sii luon wun sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenm k n sɑɑ bu u mɑɑn lenŋ ii?

K u yet ɑ bii diɑ’u dɑnsɑlk ni mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k b tɑn sɑɑ sɑɑn nɑn’ɔ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ buol, k wun sɑɑ jiɑl u mɑɑn mɑnŋ. Ŋɑnn e k n tul mɔb mɑɑ bii guu’u, mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ fit tun’ɔ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ.»
K kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ yet Festus ɑ: «N mɔnŋ mɔnŋ luon k n gbɑt nilɔ mɑnŋ mɔb ni.» K Festus jiin’ɔ ɑ: «Wonn e wɑɑ k ɑ won sɑɑ gbɑt u mɔb ni.»

K l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑpuo Beleniis muk mukt bonciɑnn, k sejenm yudɑnm nɑn duo nɑ yudɑnm wei b puol k bɑɑl kuɑ buut dieok nɑ ni, k yudɑɑnɔ Festus ji tun *tuomi ɑ bin jii Pɔul k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ nɑ.

Ŋɑnn e k Festus yet ɑ: «Kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ nɑn yinm nbɑ kul be nnɑ nɑ, i lɑ juɑ nɑ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ! Suifnbɑ nbɑ be nnɑ nɑ nɑn bin nbɑ kul be Selusɑɑlenm bɑɑl n buol nnɑ k tɑɑl’ɔ, k yɑki kpɑyɑkt nɑn’n, k yɑɑ ɑ l k ŋɑn k wuu be.
Min ŋɑnin lɑ k u k tun bisiɑt nbɑ k l jɑnŋ nɑn kuun, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ ponŋ yɑɑ ɑ u luon k wun gɑɑn u mɑɑn mɑnŋ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ nɑ e, k n dukn mɑɑ n te k wun sɑɑn.

Ŋɑɑn n k mi mɑɑ sɑɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ k pɑk’ɔ lin nbɑ k sɑɑn gɑɑn u po. Ŋɑnn e te k n bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ i kul nunm nnɑ, ŋɑɑn l mɑntk kpɑɑ fin kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ e. L pɑɑk, u buboit fiitu puolpo, n sii mɔk mɑɑn nbɑ k n sɑɑ fit k diɑn,
k mɑɑn l kɑɑ pɑɑk nɑn k n te k dɑnsɑlk n sɑɑn kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ, ŋɑɑn k n kɑn fit wɑnn wɑɑ biil lin nbɑ.»
L yuo nɑ k kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ yet Pɔul ɑ: «N cɑb’ɑ mɔb. Pɑkn nyinn ɑ mɔnŋ.» K Pɔul tɑnt u nuu sɑnpɑɑpo ɑ wun pɑk k nyinn u mɔnŋ, k yet ɑ:
«Kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ, l mɑnŋ’n bonciɑnn nɑn mɑɑ sie ɑ tuɑnn ni dinnɑ, k yɑɑ n pɑk k nyinn n mɔnŋ, k jikt sɑɑ lin nbɑ kul k *Suifnbɑ tɑɑl’n nɑ po.

K biɑ jen ɑ, n mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn nɑn mɑɑ sie ɑ tuɑnn ni nɑ, nɑn fɑɑ tie bɑntuɑ, k mi Suifnbɑ kɑɑl nɑn b mɔniɑɔk nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ kul nɑ. L pɑɑk, cɑnbɑɑ, n bɑln’mɑ e, di’n suklu k gbiint mɑɑ yɑɑ n pɑk lin nbɑ nɑ.
«Mɑɑ fiil n bisn ni wɑɑ nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, Suifnbɑ kul ɑ mi mɑɑ din tuu be biɑnŋ nbɑ n tinŋ ni nɑn Selusɑɑlenm biɑk.
B ponŋ mi’n k l fɔk. L i tie k b luon, b sɑɑ fit wɑnn nɑn n tuu wɑɑ Fɑɑliisiɑnnbɑ Yenjiɑntu sɔnu nbɑ mɑntk pɑɑl nɑ e.
K mɔtɑɑnɑ n ji sie k b bu n buut nɑ, mɑɑ mɔk dindɑnn nɑn mɔsonn nbɑ k Yennu din senn k tul t yejɑnm nɑ.

L mɔsonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k tinm Suifnbɑ buolu piik nɑn munle tuu mɔk dindɑnn k duki nɑn t tɑn sɑɑ lɑ. L pɑɑk te k b jiɑntl Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk nɑ. Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, l dindɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk e lɑɑ, k Suifnbɑ tɑɑl’n nɑ.
Bee k l pɑɑl i pɑɑk nɑn k i tien yɑdɑ ɑ Yennu fiint kpienm i?
«Sinsinn, n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din dukn nɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn k n tun bonsiɑl kul k biil Nɑɑsɑɑlet nilɔ Yiesu sɑnn.

Nnɑ e k n din tuun Selusɑɑlenm. Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm din tuu cɑb’n yiikuo k n so Yennu niib k kuɑnt’b dɑnsɑli. Bɑɑ din tuu bu b mɑɑn k tɑn gbenn k cɑb ɑ bin kpi’b nɑ, n mɔnŋ mun din tuu be bin nbɑ din tuu cɑb ɑ bin kpi’b nɑ kɑnn ni.

«Yuo kul n din tuu tun k muksl’b Suifnbɑ jɑɑnti diet kul ni, k din tuu luon k bii noi ɑ b k wɑɑ Yiesu. N din mɑntk donn wutuol bonciɑnn b pɑɑk k l sɑɑ yɑkl ɑ. L pɑɑk, k n biɑ lek din tuu sɑɑ doi nbɑ be tingɑni ni, k sɑɑ muksl’b biɑk.»
«Nnɑ e k n din sɑɑ Dɑɑmɑɑs siɑn yuo. Yennu mɑnntieb yudɑnm e din ponŋ cɑb’n yiikuo, k biɑ tul’n mɔb ɑ n tun nnɑ.
«Tɔn, Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, l din tie yensuuk ni e k n be sɔnu pɑɑk k sɑɑ, k tɑn lɑ k yentu nyii sɑnpɑɑpo k yien gɑl yennu k yent nyɔkt k lint min nɑn n tɔk-nɑn-lieb nɑ.

K t kul ɑ bɑɑ tinŋ ni, k n gbɑt k kunkɔl pɑk Suifnbɑ mɑɑn ni, k yin ɑ: ‹Sɔul, Sɔul, bee k ɑ muksl’n i? Fɑɑ tuu yien’n nɑ, l pɑɑk e te k l pɑɑl ɑ pɑɑk nɑn bonkobuk nbɑ tuu yien u dɑɑnɔ mɔb k u buo’u lɑnbɑnn nɑ.›
«K n jiin k boi ɑ: ‹A tie ŋmee?› K Yonmdɑɑnɔ jiin ɑ: ‹Min, Yiesu e, k ɑ muksl’n mɑnŋ.
Ŋɑɑn fiit k set. N nyinn fin e, ɑ ɑ tien n tuontunnɔ. L pɑɑk te k n dɔkt ɑ pɑɑk. Tient niib *siɑlɑ k wɑnn’b fɑɑ lɑ’n biɑnŋ nbɑ dinnɑ, nɑn lin nbɑ k n sii fiitl wɑnt’ɑ yuo nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
Mɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun’ɑ siɑn nbɑ nɑ, n biɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyinn’ɑ dɑɑl ni Suifnbɑ nɑn nilieb nii ni.

Fin e tie wun nbɑ sɑɑ yent b nunm po, k bin nyi bunbɔnn ni k kuɑ yentu ni, k biɑ nyinn’b *Sɑɑtɑn yiikuo ni k bin kuɑ Yennu yiikuo ni, ɑ bin lɑ nyikcɑbu k biɑ lɑ yiɑl bin nbɑ tie Yennu niib b yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ sinsuuk ni.› »
«L pɑɑk, Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, n din k yet *Yendɔunŋ ni yelntu mɑnŋ.

Sinsinn n din sɑɑn Dɑɑmɑɑstieb penŋ e, k l puolpo k n din sɑɑn Selusɑɑlenmtieb nɑn bin nbɑ be Suude tinŋ ni doi kul po nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ buol. N din muɑnt ɑ b kul n mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu, kii tuun lin nbɑ wɑnn nɑn b set mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ nɑn mɔni.
«L din tie lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, k Suifnbɑ din suol’n, mɑɑ dɑɑ din be Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni nɑ, k b din luon k bin kpi’n.
Ŋɑɑn lɑɑ jii sɑɑ k tɑn tuu dinnɑ, k Yennu guu’n, k n ji be k sie k muɑntl u mɑɑn k tien tɑli nɑn pɑɑlb kul ɑ nɑ. N k pukn siɑl Muois nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din wɑnn lin nbɑ k l sɑɑ tien nɑ pɑɑk

ɑ *Klistu tɑn sɑɑ fɑbl k kpo, k ŋuɑ e biɑ tɑn sii tie sinsinn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ fiil kuun ni, k l pɑɑk, k u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ muɑnt k tul Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun biɑk, k yien’m mɑɑn nbɑ tɑn sii yentl b nunm po.»
Pɔul nbɑ din piɑk ɑ wun nyinn u mɔnŋ nɑ, ŋɑnn e k Festus tiɑn u pɑɑk ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Pɔul, ɑ wɑɑt ɑ. A bɑnciɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e te k ɑ wɑɑt.»
K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «Cɑnbɑɑ Festus, n k wɑɑt kɑɑ. Mɑɑn nbɑ k n piɑk nɑ, l tie bɑlmɔni e, k biɑ mɔk pɑɑk.
Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, n mɔk pɑlcienn k sɑɑ pɑk k tul’ɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ mɔnŋ mi lin nbɑ nɑ po. N biɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ k bɔl ɑ buol, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ din tien mɑnŋ, l din k bɔl kɑɑ.
Cɑnbɑɑ Agliipɑ, ɑ tien Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn yɑdɑ wɑɑ ɑɑ? N lek mi nɑn ɑ tien yɑdɑ wɑɑ.»
K kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ jiin Pɔul ɑ: «Fin duki mi ɑ ɑ pinpɑɔk mintk nɑ sɑɑ fit dɑk’n k n tien Klistuweilɔ wɑɑ ɑɑ?»

K Pɔul jiin ɑ: «N pinpɑɔk i fɔk ɑmi lɑɑ k fɔk, min yɑɑ Yenmiɑlu tie k fin nɑn niib kul ɑ nbɑ gbiintl n mɑɑn nɑ dinnɑ nɑ, n tien Yiesuweilɑ nɑn mɑɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jɑlt nbɑ nɑ kuukuɑ e k i kii mɔk.»
Ŋɑnn e k kpɑnbɑl nɑ nɑn yudɑɑnɔ nɑ nɑn Beleniis, nɑn bin nbɑ kul kɑl lenŋ nɑ kul fiil k nyii.
Bɑɑ yɑɑ bin ji yɑt yuo nbɑ, k b ji yien b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ tɑɑn k tun biit k l jɑnŋ nɑn bin kpi’u, ɑmi k kuɑn’ɔ dɑnsɑlk.»
K kpɑnbɑl Agliipɑ yet Festus ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ i dɑɑn bo i kii miɑl ɑ u sɑɑ gɑɑn u mɑɑn nɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl penŋ, t bo sɑɑ fit ŋɑɑ’u wɑɑ.»
Bɑɑ ji din tɑn senn ɑ tin sɑɑn Luonm, Itɑɑli tinŋ ni, k b jii Pɔul nɑn dɑnsɑl-lei, k tul’b Luonmtieb sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nnɑ, k u sɑnn yi Sulius, k u be sejenm pɑɑbu nbɑ k b yi Kpɑnbɑlɑ Yudɑɑnɔ Pɑɑbu nɑ.

T kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ nyii Adlɑmiit, k mɑɑn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ponŋ tien siil nɑn wun nyi Sesɑɑle k sɑɑn Asii tinŋ ni digbɑnɑ nbɑ kuok mɔkl nɑ kpinŋ. Mɑɑseduɑnn nilɔ Aliistɑɑlk nbɑ nyii Tesɑɑluoniik nɑ din ciɑn’t.
L tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k t bɑɑl Siidɔn, k sejenm sɑɑkuɑ Sulius din diɑ Pɔul fɑnu, k din cɑb’ɔ ɑ wun sɑɑn k sɑɑ cɑn u yuɑsnbɑ nbɑ be duo mɑnŋ ninŋ nɑ sɑɑɔnŋ.
K t tɑn nyii lenŋ k yɑɑt sɑɑ, k wounŋ fukt k dɑ tuokt’t, k t pek kpiɑn Siipl tinŋ po k sɑɑ, k tinŋ mɑnŋ tiɑ wounŋ nɑ k tul’t.
Tɑɑ puot mɔkgbenŋl nɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, k t tɑn pel Siiliisi nɑn Pɑnfiili tini po, k ji bɑɑl Miilɑ, Liisi tinŋ ni nɑ.
Lenŋ e k sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nɑ lɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ nyii Aleksɑndli k sɑɑ Itɑɑli tinŋ ni, k u te k t luɑl k kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ.

T din jii dɑɑ bonciɑnn k k fit sɑɑ yiɑn yiɑn, k t din lɑ fɑlɑ k tɑn bɑɑl Siniit duo nɑ tuɑnn. Wounŋ nɑ biɑ lek k nyik k tin sɑɑn tɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ po nɑ. L pɑɑk, t din bɔkn, k gɑɑl Klet tinŋ mɑnŋ po e. L po mɑnŋ e k wounŋ din k pɑɑl, k t tɑn kpiɑn nɑn Sɑlmɔne, Klet tinŋ ni, k gɑl.
Tɑɑ din sɑɑ nɑ, l din pɑɑl bonciɑnn nɑn tɑɑ tɑn bɑɑl Klet duo nbɑ k b yi Setŋɑnu nɑ. Lenŋ din k fɔk nɑn Lɑɑse duo.
T ponŋ din biil yuo bonciɑnn. *Suifnbɑ *mɔlolu dɑgbenŋl ji din ponŋ gɑl ɑ, k yuo nbɑ k ninbɔnŋ tuu tɑn bɑɑl mɔkgbenŋl pɑɑk nɑ tɑn bɑɑl. L pɑɑk, k Pɔul kpɑɑn’m k yet’b ɑ:
«N yuɑsnbɑ, n mi nɑn t sɔnu nɑ ni, ninbɔnŋ sɑɑ dɑɑmi’t bonciɑnn, k l k tie tiɑt nbɑ be ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, ɑmi ŋɑlunŋ nɑ kuukuɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn nɑn t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑnfuol gbɑɑ sii be ninbɔnŋ mɑnŋ ni.»
Ŋɑɑn sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nɑ bɑkɑ din tɑɑn kɑɑ nɑn lin nbɑ k Pɔul pɑk nɑ po, ŋɑɑn fiin wun nbɑ kɑn ŋɑlunŋ nɑn l dɑɑnɔ nɑ po e.

Ŋɑɑn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ nbɑ din set duo nbɑ nɑ din k fɑn nɑn tin set lenŋ wonfufuk yuo. L pɑɑk, k b bonciɑnn ji din yɑɑ ɑ bin ŋɑɑn k bin fiil lenŋ k sɑɑn, ɑ pɑsiɑl b tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl Feniigs. Lenŋ din tie Klet tinŋ duo e, k ŋɑlunŋ sinsetbuol be lenŋ k tuok yenbɑɑpo, k b luon bii be lenŋ wonfufuk yuo.

L yuo nɑ k b lɑ gɑnŋ po nɑ wounŋ ji dɑ wɑɑn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k b ji dukn ɑ pɑsiɑl l sii tie wonŋɑnŋ o, lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k bin fit nyɑnn bɑɑ duki biɑnŋ nbɑ, k l yuo nɑ, k b ji fiil k dɑt kutkpiɑtl nbɑ so ŋɑlunŋ k sent nɑ, k yɑɑn jɑk b sɔnu k sɑɑ, k buɑk Klet mɔk-kpinŋ.
L k wei k wonpɑɑluk nbɑ nyi yendopo nɑ fikt tinŋ nɑ ni, k dɑ siik mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni,
k fuɑn ŋɑlunŋ nɑ k l din pɑɑl bonciɑnn nɑn tin fit kɑn’n wounŋ nɑ ni, k t goli k l sɑɑ,
k l jii’t, k t sɑɑ bɑɑl k gɑl tinŋ nbɑ k nyun lint’l k b yi’l Kuodɑ nɑ. Tɑɑ gɑɑl kpiɑnt yuo nbɑ k tinbik mɑnŋ guɑl wounŋ nɑ k u bɑlk, k t ji gbɑɑ gbɑɑ sɑɑ guɑl bulgbetl nbɑ tuuk ŋɑlunŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ,

k b ji dɑt bulgbetl nɑ k kuɑn’n ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lol ŋɑlunŋ nɑ nɑn ŋmiit kenken k lint. B din tiin jɑŋmɑɑni, k mi ɑ b tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn kpet k kpiɑn Liibi tinŋ ni, siɑn nbɑ k nyun k sumi nɑ. Lenŋ din tie ninbɔnŋ buol e. Ŋɑnn e k b sikn ŋɑlunŋ nɑ cincenn k ji ŋɑɑn k wounŋ nɑ yɑɑn jii’b k sɑɑ nɑn’m.
Wonpɑɑluk nbɑ mɑntk din dɑ nɑ, k l yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, k b piin k nyinn bonkuɑdkɑlɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni,
k l sɑn-nyɑfɑnnuk jik, k b jii b mɔnŋ nii k nyinn nyinn ŋɑlunŋ tiɑt nbɑ be ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni nɑ, k lu lu mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni.
L din jii dɑɑ bonciɑnn k sɑnpɑgbɑnɑ dɔkn sɑnpɑɑpo, k t k fit lɑ yennu ɑmi ŋmɑɑbilɑ gbɑɑ, k wounŋ nɑ lek biɑ dɑ nɑn pɑnŋ. Tɑɑ din mɔk dindɑnn k duki mi ɑ t sɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ, k l kul nyii peb.
L din wei bonciɑnn k b k dii, k Pɔul tɑn fiil set k yet ɑ: «N yuɑsnbɑ, i dɑɑn i bo i sɑk n mɔb k biɑl Klet tinŋ ni, l dɑɑn bo sii ŋɑn. I bo tɑn kii lɑɑt ninbɔnŋ k di fɑlɑ nɑ buolu.
Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, ii sɑɑk n mɔb kii mɔk pɑlcienn mɑn. I suɑ nɑn yenɔ kuukuɑ wɑɑ kɑn kpo gbɑɑ, ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ e nɔk sɑɑ biil.
K mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ k n tie u yuɑ k jiɑntl’ɔ nɑ, u *mɑlɑkɑ won sik n pɑɑk nyiɑɔk nɑ,
k tɑn yet’n ɑ: ‹Pɔul, dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Sie k b tɑn jii’ɑ k sɑɑn nɑn’ɑ kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ Sesɑɑl nɑ penŋ. A pɑɑk k Yennu yɑɑ wun fiel niib kul nbɑ be nɑn’ɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni.›
L pɑɑk, n yuɑsnbɑ, ii mɔk pɑlcienn mɑn k mɑɑn n tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑn l kpɑn sii tie nɑn wɑɑ yet’n nɑ e.
Ŋɑɑn wounŋ lek sɑɑ tut’t nɑn pɑnŋ, k dɑɑmi’t, k te k tin bɑɑl tinbisiɑk pɑɑk »
Lɑɑ din tɑn tien nyɑtunmunɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnnɑ yuo nbɑ, k wounŋ nɑ biɑ lek dɑ k sɑɑ nɑn’t mɔkgbenŋl nbɑ k b yi’l Adliɑtiik nɑ pɑɑk k tɑnsuuni k ŋɑlnkɑnnɑ nɑ ji duki mi ɑ t pel tinŋ e.

Ŋɑnn e k b jii bonbikn-kɑl, ɑ bin bikn k lɑɑn l sumi ɑmi l k sumi, k b ji bikn k suɑ k l sunmiu tie miɑtɑ piintɑ nɑn ŋɑnlole. K l yɑnn wɑɑnm-nnɑ, k b yɑɑn bikn, k suɑ k l sunmiu ji tie miɑtɑ piinle nɑn ŋɑnniin.

K jɑŋmɑɑni kuɑ’b, k mɑɑn b duki mi ɑ b ŋɑlunŋ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn kpet k do tɑnɑ pɑɑk. L pɑɑk, k b ji jii kutkpiɑtɑ ŋɑnnɑ nbɑ so ŋɑlunŋ k sent nɑ, k lu nyun ni, k gɑɑn gɑɑn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ puolpo, ŋɑɑn lek ji miɑl Yennu ɑ lin yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk.
Ŋɑnn e k ŋɑlnkɑnnɑ nɑ ji luon bin bot ŋɑɑn nyik ŋɑlunŋ nɑ. K b siknt bulgbetl nɑ nyun pɑɑk ŋɑɑn ji tie sel k l tie nɑn b yɑɑ bin sikn kutkpiɑtɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ tuɑnn po e nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn k Pɔul yet sejenm sɑɑkuɑ nɑ nɑn sejenm mɑnŋ ɑ: «Ŋɑlunŋ kɑnnɑ nɑ i kɑɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ ni, i suɑ kɑn lɑ fielu.»
Ŋɑnn e k sejenm nɑ pot pot ŋmiit nbɑ k b lol lol bulgbetl mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn te k l bɑɑ nyun ni.
Tɔn, k l yɑɑn tɑn pel yentu, k Pɔul yet b kul ɑ ɑ bin di jiet, k yet ɑ: «Dinnɑ l puki dɑɑ piik nɑn ŋɑnnɑ e nɑ k i mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni k dɑɑ k dii siɑl.
L pɑɑk, n bɑln’mi e k yi lek di jiet, k mɑɑn l tie lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k i fɑt i mɔnŋ e. Nɑn suɑ yukobuk ɑ kɑn bot.»
Pɔul nbɑ pɑk nnɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn jii pɑɑnu k tul Yennu niipuouk b nuni ni, ŋɑɑn ji ŋmit dii.
Ŋɑnn e k b pɑlɑ ji cie, k b kul ɑ jɑk jiet nɑ k di.
T kul ɑ kɑnn din tie niib kobiinle nɑn piinlole nɑn bɑnluob o.
Suɑ kul nbɑ din dii jiet nɑ k jɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, k b jii * ble nbɑ din tenn ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni nɑ k lu mɔkgbenŋl nɑ ni ɑ ŋɑlunŋ nɑ n fukt.

Lɑɑ tɑn yent sɑn-nyiɑɔk, k ŋɑlnkɑnnɑ nɑ lɑ tinŋ nɑ, k ji k bɑnn, ŋɑɑn lɑ lɔtuk nnɑ mɔkgbenŋl nɑ kpinŋ, k l mɔk gbingbɑnŋɑnn k b bikn ɑ l i sɑɑ fit, bin te k ŋɑlunŋ nɑ n sɑɑn kuɑ lenŋ k do gbingbɑnn nɑ.

Ŋɑnn e k b ji din pot ŋmiit nɑ, k kutkpiɑtɑ mɑnŋ bɑɑ nyun ni, ŋɑɑn biɑ lot ŋmiit nbɑ lol dɑɑt nbɑ k b diɑ k kɑn ŋɑlunŋ nɑ, k ji fit donn cincenn ŋɑlunŋ nunm po, ɑ wounŋ i dɑ kii sɑɑ nɑn’m. Ŋɑnn e k b tɑn pel gbingbɑnn,
k ŋɑlunŋ nɑ tuɑnn po fel tinŋ ni. L tuɑnn po nɑ nbɑ fel tinŋ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k ŋɑlunŋ nɑ gbɑl sɑɑnu, k nyunpɑnɑ ji liɑ l puolpo nɑn pɑnŋ k jint’l.
Tɔn, k sejenm nɑ ji luon bin kpi dɑnsɑlkuɑlɑ nɑ kul, ɑ nnɑ e kɑɑ, pɑsiɑl b tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn k duk puot k ciɑl.
Ŋɑɑn sejenm mɑnŋ sɑɑkuɑ nɑ ŋɑnin luon k wun fiel Pɔul. L pɑɑk, k u tiɑ’b ɑ b dɑɑ kpi’b, ŋɑɑn tul mɔb ɑ suɑ kul nbɑ mi nyunduku, bin yukl bɑɑ nyun nɑ ni sinsinn k duk puot.
Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ biɑl k k mi duku nɑ n mun suol suol dɑɑt ɑmi ŋɑln-yɑkɑ k wɔb k duk puot. B kul ɑ ji din tien nnɑ e k fiel b mɔnŋ.
Tɑɑ din tɑn nyii ninbɔnŋ ni nɑ, k t bɑnn nɑn tinŋ nbɑ k nyun lint nɑ sɑnn yi Mɑɑlt.
Lenŋ niib din gɑɑl’t bonŋɑnn. Sɑɑk nbɑ din bɑɑ nɑ, k wɑɑt be bonciɑnn, k b juo mugɑnn k tul’t ɑ t nɑni.
K Pɔul tɑn tikl dɑgingɑni bonciɑnn k kpɑb nɑn wɑɑɔk, k tien muu nɑ ni, k muu nɑ tonu tɑn gbɑt wɑɑɔk nɑ, k u nyii k jokl Pɔul nuu.
Lenŋ niib nbɑ lɑ k wɑɑɔk nɑ juɑn Pɔul nuu pɑɑk nɑ, k b ji yien b lieb ɑ: «Juɑ nɑ kpɑn tie nikpiiluk o. Wɑɑ lek fɑt u mɔnŋ mɔkgbenŋl nnɑ, ŋɑɑn yennu ŋɑnin kɑn nyik’ɔ k wuu be u mɑnfuol ni.»
K Pɔul ŋɑk u nuu, k wɑɑɔk nɑ bɑɑ muu nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn k Pɔul k lɑ dɑnŋ nɑn wɑɑn ɑ.
B ji dɑɑn ɑ bin lɑɑn u siɑl po sɑɑ mɔl, ɑmi u tɑn sɑɑ kpil bɑɑ k kpo. Bɑɑ ji dɑɑn dɑɑn k tɑn guo k k lɑ siɑl tien’ɔ nɑ, k b lebt b dudukt mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ ɑ u tie yensɑu e.
Lenŋ biɑ din k fɔk nɑn Publius kpɑɑnt nbɑ be nɑ. Ŋuɑ e biɑ din tie tinŋ mɑnŋ ni bɑt, k u din gɑɑl’t sɑɑɔnŋ k sɑɑ jɑnŋ dɑmunjɑɑ ŋɑntɑ.
K Publius bɑɑ mun din duɑ yiɑl gbɑnɑntounŋ nɑn nɔniikɑk ni, k Pɔul tɑn kuɑ u dieok ni, k miɑl Yennu k yii u nii u pɑɑk k te k juɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
Wɑɑ din te k u pɑɑk nɑ, k bɑɑt-lieb nbɑ be lenŋ nɑ kul ɑ din bɑɑl, k u tɑn te k b mun pɑɑk.
B cɔln’t bonciɑnn, tɑɑ biɑ din tɑn fi ɑ tin kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ yuo nbɑ, k b bɑɑl nɑn lin nbɑ k t tɑn sii luon sɔnu ni, k kuɑn ŋɑlunŋ ni k tul’t.
T benu lenŋ ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ puolpo e wɑɑ, k t din kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ nbɑ din nyii Aleksɑndli k din bɑɑl Mɑɑlt k be wonfufuk piinu nɑn gbennu, k b yi ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ Yenjɑɑsnbɑ. K l fiil sɑɑ,
k yɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl duo nbɑ k b yi Siilɑɑkuus nɑ, k biɑl lenŋ dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ,
k tɑn tuɑt gɑl bɑɑl Legio duo ni, k l tɑn yent k wounŋ yɑɑn jɑk dɑnu, k nyii gɑnŋ po k tut’t, k t jii dɑɑ ŋɑnle k yɑɑn bɑɑl Puusɔl duo ni.
Lenŋ e k t lɑ Yiesuweisiɑb, k b guɑl’t ɑ tii be nɑn’m k jɑnŋ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole, k t be nɑn’m, k tɑn nyii lenŋ k sɑɑ Luonm duo ni.

Yiesuweilɑ nbɑ be Luonm duo ni nɑ nbɑ gbɑt t po nɑ, k b fiil bɑɑl cet’t digbɑnbik nbɑ k b yi’l Apius dɑɑk ni, k siɑb mun cet’t digbɑnbik nbɑ k b yi’l Sɑɑnm-ŋei-Ŋɑntɑ nbɑ kpiɑ Luonm duo nɑ. Pɔul nbɑ lɑ’b yuo nbɑ, k l tul’ɔ pɑlcienn, k u tul Yennu niipuouk.
Tɑɑ din bɑɑl Luonm nɑ, k b sɑk cɑb Pɔul k u be u yul po ŋɑɑk, k b te k seje guu’u.

Tɔn, l dɑɑ ŋɑntɑ dɑɑl e k Pɔul yiin *Suifnbɑ yudɑnm lɑknu. Bɑɑ tikl lieb yuo nbɑ, k u yet’b ɑ: «N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n lek k tun bonbisiɑl k biil t niib ɑmi t yejɑnm kɑɑl, ŋɑɑn b din suol’n Selusɑɑlenm e k kubn’n Luonmtieb nuu ni.
B boi’n buboit, k tɑn luon k bin nyik’n, k mɑɑn b k lɑ mɑɑ tun bonbisiɑl nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn bin kpi’n.
Ŋɑɑn Suifnbɑ nbɑ din k sɑk ɑ bin nyik’n nɑ, l din tie k n gɑɑl mɑɑn Luonm yent kul kpɑnbɑlɑ yudɑɑnɔ penŋ e, ŋɑɑn l din k tie ɑ n luon k n tɑɑl n buolu kɑɑ.
«L pɑɑk e te k n yiin’i mɑɑ n tɑn lɑ’i ŋɑɑn yet’i lɑbɑɑl nɑ po. Mɑɑ muɑntl wun nbɑ k Suifnbɑ dɑɑn dindɑnn nɑ po e, ŋɑnn e te k b bɑɑn’n jɑlt nɑ.»
K b yet’ɔ yɑɑ: «T k lɑ kɑdɑɑt k l nyii Suude k bɑɑl k l wɑnt ɑ po, ɑmi t suɑ biɑ k nyii lenŋ k bɑɑl nɑn lɑbɑsiɑl, ɑmi suɑ mun biɑ k pɑk bonbisiɑl k sɑɑn gɑɑn ɑ po biɑk.
Ŋɑɑn t sii luon k tin bɑnn ɑ dudukt, k mɑɑn t ponŋ mi nɑn siɑl po kul ɑ, niib bonciɑnn piɑk k biil jɑɑnti nbɑ k ɑ jiɑntl nɑ.»

L pɑɑk, k b senn dɑɑl, k bin nbɑ bɑɑl din yɑb k cie bin nbɑ din bɑɑl sinsinn nɑ, k b bɑɑl siɑn nbɑ k Pɔul din be nɑ k u kɑt wɑnn’b Yennu nɑɑn po, sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑjuouk, k wɑnt’b Yiesu mɑɑn nbɑ be Muois *senni ni nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ diɑni ni biɑnŋ nbɑ, k yɑbi ɑ wun tunn niib nɑ yɑn k jiin Yiesu po.
B siɑb yɑn din tunn k kuɑ Yiesu po, u mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn k lieb mun k tien yɑdɑ.
K b jɑk lieb nɑn mɔniɑɔk, ŋɑɑn yɑɑ bin yɑt sɑɑn, k mɑɑn Pɔul din ŋɑnm yet mɔbon-yenn kuɑ ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nbɑ din te k u sɔkni Esɑɑyi nbɑ din pɑk tul t yejɑnm nɑ, u din pɑk mɔni e,
k din yet yɑɑ nnɑ: ‹I sɑɑ k sɑɑ yet niib nɑ ɑ i tɑn sɑɑ gbiint k gbiint, ŋɑɑn lek kɑn gbɑt l pɑɑk. ɑ k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ got k got ŋɑɑn biɑ lek kɑn lɑ,
k mɑɑn niib nɑ ji tie yɑnkpienɑ e, k kpɑɑ b tubɑ k biɑ mun b ninbinɑ b i kii tien nnɑ, b sɑɑ gbɑt e k bɑnn l pɑɑk k gɑɑl n mɑɑn k wei’n k mɑn fiel’b.› »
K Pɔul biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «Yennu tul u lɑbɑmɑnn ɑ niib nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ n lɑ fielu e.»
Pɔul nbɑ din pɑk nnɑ yuo nbɑ, k Suifnbɑ ji din yɑt sɑɑ, ŋɑɑn jɑk lieb nɑn mɔniɑɔk bonciɑnn.
Pɔul nbɑ din be ŋɑɑk nbɑ nɑ ni, u din pɑ likli ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ pɑɑk ŋɑɑn din be lenŋ binɑ ŋɑnle. Nilɔ nbɑ kul tɑn bɑɑl u buol, u tuu gɑɑl’ɔ bonŋɑnn.
K u biɑ din tuu muɑntl Yennu nɑɑn po, k biɑ wɑnt niib Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu po, k din tuu piɑk u yɑmɑ ni nɑn pɑlcienn.
Min Pɔul, wun nbɑ tie Yiesu *Klistu tuontunnɔ, k u yiin’n ɑ n tien u *tuomi k Yennu lukt’n ɑ n muɑnt u lɑbɑmɑnn.
Yennu ponŋ din dɔnŋ senn u mɔsonn lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ po e wɑɑ, k u sɔkniinbɑ din muɑntl u mɔsonn mɑnŋ, k l diɑn u tiɑɔnŋ lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni.
Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ wɑnt u Bijɑ po e. Wɑɑ tien nisɑɑlk nɑ, b din mɑl’ɔ k u tie * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn e.
Foŋɑnm din wɑnn nɑn yiikuo nɑn u set tie Yennu Bijɑ u kuun fiilu ni. Ŋuɑ e tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu.
Ŋuɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu ninbɑtinu be t pɑɑk k te k t tie u tuomiinbɑ ɑ tin jii u sɑnn k sɑɑn nibuolu kul buol ni, k te k bii sɑɑk u mɔb kii tie’u yɑdɑ,
k i mun be dɑɑnsiɑb nbɑ k Yennu yiin’m ɑ bii tie Yiesu Klistuyɑb nɑ kɑnn ni.
N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien yinm nbɑ be Luonm duo ni, yinm nbɑ k Yennu luon’i k yiin’i ɑ i tien u mɔnŋ niib nɑ. T Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu i mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i k biɑ tul’i mɑnu.
Sinsinn, n tien Yennu niipuouk, Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni, i kul ɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul gbiɑ i yɑdɑ po.
N wɑɑ Yennu nɑn n pɑl kul, k muɑntl u Bijɑ lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie n siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ k mi nɑn yuo kul n duki i kul ɑ po,
k mei’ɔ i pɑɑk yuo kul. N mei’ɔ ɑ l i tie u lonm i e l ji kɑn wei k n sɑɑ bɑɑl i buol,
k mɑɑn n mɑntk luon k n lɑ’i k fit sonm’i k yin gɑɑl Foŋɑnm piinsiɑl nbɑ sɑɑ te k i mɔk pɑnŋ u sɔnu ni.
K biɑ jen ɑ, n luon k mii be i sinsuuk ni ɑ tin cie lieb pɑlɑ, tɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.

N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon yin bɑnn nɑn n yɑbl nɑn tɑɑl munŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ɑ n bɑɑl k tɑn gɔn’i, ŋɑɑn k siɑl guɑl’n mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ k n k fit gɔn’i ni. N luon k n tuonn n tun siɑl i sinsuuk ni nɑn lɑɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nilieb sinsuuk ni nɑ.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k n sɑɑn niib kul buol ni, bin nbɑ mɔk nin-yentl nɑn bin nbɑ k mɔk nin-yentl, bin nbɑ mi kɑdɑɑɔk nɑn bin nbɑ k mi kɑdɑɑɔk.
L pɑɑk, k n ninbinn mɔn bonciɑnn ɑ n muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ k tul yinm nbɑ be Luonm duo ni nɑ.
Fei k mɔk’n nɑn k n muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn l tie Yennu yiikuo nbɑ fiel wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ nɑ e. Sinsinn l tie *Suifnbɑ yɑl e, k mun biɑ tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ kul yɑl.

Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu yet ɑ nilɔ tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn e. L tie yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e. L kul e nɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ tien niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol, u yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, l dɑɑnɔ sii mɔk mɔmɔnm mɑnfuol.»
Yennu wɑnn nifosɑɑli ɑ u donn wutuol b pɑɑk, k mɑɑn b tuun biit k k wɑɑ u sɔnu, k b biit sɔni mɑnŋ te k niib k bɑnt u bɑlmɔni.
Yennu donn wutuol, k mɑɑn nifosɑɑlk nbɑ sii fit mi lin nbɑ k jiin u po nɑ, ŋɑnn e fiit k be pɑɑnu ni, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e fiit’l k wɑnn’b.

Yuo nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn *dulnyɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, u nɑɑmi mɑnŋ ni k b bɑnn u ŋɑnt nbɑ k nifosɑɑlk ninbinn k fit lɑɑt nɑ: ŋɑnn e tie u yiikuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, nɑn wɑɑ tie Yennu bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. L pɑɑk, k b ji k mɔk leku Yennu tuɑnn k sɑɑ yet ɑ b k mi b biit.
B mi Yennu, ŋɑɑn b k tien’ɔ bɑɑkl nbɑ k u yen nɑ, k biɑ k tien’ɔ niipuouk. B mɔk jɑt-dudukt, k b dudukt be bunbɔnn ni.
B yɑɑ ɑ b mɔk yɑn e, ŋɑɑn tie wɑɑtb.
Bɑɑ bo sii jiɑntl Yennu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, b k sɑk, ŋɑɑn jiɑntl pɑtɑ nbɑ k niib nɑn’m k l nɑɑn nifosɑɑli nbɑ sɑɑ fit kpo nɑ, ɑmi nuɑni, ɑmi bonkobt, ɑmi bonfulinkɑ nbɑ fuln tinŋ ni.
L pɑɑk, k Yennu nyik’b, ɑ bii tuun biit nbɑ k b pɑlɑ luon, k b dint b mɔnŋ fei b gbɑnɑnt tuonɑ ni nɑn b lieb.
B jii lin nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni k jikt sɑɑ Yennu po nɑ k lu, ŋɑɑn sɑk fɑɑk, k lebt k jiɑntl lin nbɑ k Yennu nɑn, ŋɑɑn nyik Yennu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ, wun nbɑ yen pɑku kul mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.
L pɑɑk, k Yennu nyik’b ɑ bii tuun b mɔnŋ lonbiiuk nbɑ mɔk fei, k b puob nyik bii duɑ nɑn jɑb ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt k duɑ nɑn b lieb.
Nnɑ e mun k jɑb nyik bii duɑ nɑn puob ŋɑɑn k b niɑɔnŋ be b lieb ni bonciɑnn. Jɑb tie bonsiɑ nbɑ mɔk fei nɑn jɑlieb. L pɑɑk, k b lɑ tubdɑtu b gbɑnɑnt ni k l jɑnŋ nɑn b biit.
Nifosɑɑli nbɑ din k luon k bin bɑnn Yennu, l pɑɑk e k Yennu nyik’b nɑn b dudukbiit, k b tuun tuonɑ nbɑ bi bonciɑnn.
K biit kul be b ni, k b gbie nɑn biit nɑn niɑnciɑɔnŋ nɑn tonu nɑn nikpinu nɑn kunkɔnɑ nɑn fɑi nɑn dudukbiit, k biɑ tie sɑnjɑɑnjɑnnɑ,
k piɑk biil b lieb, k tie Yennu dɑtɑi, k suki b lieb k mɔk gɑluk k dont b mɔnŋ, k biɑ ŋɑmi duki dudukbiit sɔni, k k sɑɑk b bɑɑnbɑ nɑn b nɑɑnbɑ mɔi.
B biɑ k mɔk yɑnsiɑn b ni. B k wɑɑ b mɔsonɑ biɑk. B k mɔk lonm nɑn b lieb k biɑ k tiin lieb ninbɑɑɔk.
B mi nɑn Yennu sennu wɑnn nɑn bin nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ buolu, b nyuɑt tie kuun e, ŋɑɑn b lek kpɑn tuun ŋɑnn e, k biɑ tɑɑ bin nbɑ tuun l tuonbuolu nɑ po.
L pɑɑk, fin nbɑ bu *ɑ luɑ buut nɑ, suklu kɑɑ ɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn fɑɑ bu ɑ luɑ buut nɑ, ɑ mun bu ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ buut e k mɑɑn ɑ mun tuun nnɑ e.
T mi nɑn Yennu nbɑ bu bin nbɑ tuun nnɑ nɑ buut nɑ, u buut bunu nɑ tuok.
Fin nbɑ tie nifosɑɑlk k wɑnt lieb biit, bɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ, ŋɑɑn mun tuun nnɑ nɑ, ɑ duki nɑn Yennu kɑn dɑt ɑ tubl ii?
Ami ɑ sɑlkt lonciɑɔnŋ nɑn suklu bonciɑnn nbɑ k Yennu mɔk nɑn’t nɑ ɑmi nlee? A k mi nɑn Yennu mɔk bulcint nɑn’ɑ ɑ wun te k ɑ mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ ee?
Ŋɑɑn ɑ pɑl wɑki k ɑ lek k sɑk nɑn fɑn mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ nɑ, l pɑɑk, ɑ puki ɑ mɔnŋ fɑlɑ nbɑ k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu wutuol nɑ tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu, k u tɑn sɑɑ bu niib buut nɑn bɑlmɔni,
k tul suɑ kul u tuonɑ nyuɑt nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Bin nbɑ ninbinɑ mɔn nɑn bii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ k lɑ pɑku nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, ŋɑnm e k Yennu sɑɑ tul’b mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu mɑnŋ.
Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ mɔk kunkɔnɑ, k k sɑk lin nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni nɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ bonbiil sɔnu, ŋɑnm e k Yennu wutuol sɑɑ do b pɑɑk k wun bu b buut.
U sɑɑ jii fɑlɑ nɑn muksuk k tul nisɑɑli kul nbɑ tuun biit nɑ. *Suifnbɑ nɑ e sɑɑ lɑ l tubdɑtu sinsinn, k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n juont.
Ŋɑɑn Yennu sɑɑ jii pɑku nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn mɑnu k tul bin nbɑ kul tuun bonŋɑnn nɑ. Suifnbɑ sɑɑ gɑl sinsinn, k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n juont,
k mɑɑn Yennu k mɔk ningɑnni.

Bin nbɑ kul k mi Yennu *senni k tuun biit, b lek sɑɑ kpo b biit tumu nɑ pɑɑk ɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie bɑɑ k diɑ senni nɑ pɑɑk nɑ kɑɑ. Bin nbɑ kul mɔk Yennu senni nɑ, ŋɑɑn tuun biit, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ jii senni mɑnŋ e k bu nɑn’m.
K mɑɑn l k tie ɑ bin nbɑ gbiɑ senni nɑ kɑɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ set tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ k senni nɑ wɑnn nɑ, ŋɑnm e tie niŋɑnm u buol.
Bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, b k mɔk senni nɑ, ŋɑɑn b i tuun senni nɑ nbɑ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑn b tiɑɔnŋ yɑn i e, b mɔk b tiɑɔnŋ senni b pɑlɑ ni, nɑn bɑɑ lek k mɔk senni mɑnŋ nɑ.

Ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ diɑn b pɑlɑ ni, k b yɑngɑnm mun wɑnt’b lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn lin nbɑ k ŋɑn, k mɑɑn yuo nɑn yuo b dudukt tuu tɑn sɑk b tuon-yenɑ nɑn l ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn yosɑu mun b dudukt n biɑ yet b tuonliɑ pɑɑk nɑn l k ŋɑn.
Tɔn, l tɑn sii tie nnɑ e dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑl nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k Yiesu *Klistu n bu nisɑɑli wuol ni dudukt buut, nɑn mɑɑ muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Gotl, ɑ yi ɑ mɔnŋ Suif e k mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnu fɑɑ mɔk senni nɑ pɑɑk k yi ɑ mɔnŋ Yennu yuɑ.
A mi lin nbɑ k Yennu luon fii tuun k senni wɑnn’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ lukt lin nbɑ ŋɑn.
A tien yɑdɑ nɑn ɑ fit wɑnt juɑni sɔnu, k biɑ tie yentu k tul bin nbɑ be bunbɔnn ni nɑ.
A dukn nɑn ɑ fit kpɑɑn jɑtt nɑ kpɑɑni k biɑ tumi wɑɑs k mɑɑn ɑ mi nɑn ɑ mɔk minu kul nɑn bɑlmɔni kul, senni mɑnŋ ni.
A wɑnt lieb wɑnnu, ŋɑɑn bee k ɑ k wɑnt ɑ mɔnŋ i? A wɑnt lieb ɑ nɑn-yuk k ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn bee te k fin jɑɑn i?
Fin nbɑ wɑnt niib ɑ b dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn, ɑ biɑ conm ii? Fin nbɑ sɑlkt pɑtɑ mɑɑn nɑ, ŋɑɑn bee te k ɑ jɑɑn puokpeli ni bonɑ?
Fin nbɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ senni mɑnŋ pɑɑk nɑ, ɑ yien senni mɑnŋ k dint Yennu fei,
nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yinm Suifnbɑ pɑɑk e k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ piɑk k suki Yennu.»
L i tie k ɑ sɑk Yennu senni, ɑ *punpotu mɔk nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn l i tie k ɑ k sɑk senni nɑ, l nɑɑn nɑn ɑ k pot nɑ e.
L pɑɑk, l i tie k wun nbɑ k pot nɑ sɑk senni e, Yennu kɑn gɑɑl’ɔ nɑn wun nbɑ pot nɑ ɑɑ?
Wun nbɑ *k pot punn, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ senni nɑ, ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ bu fin nbɑ k sɑɑk senni ŋɑɑn biɑ mɔk senni k l diɑn senni kɑdɑɑɔk ni k biɑ pot punn nɑ buut.
Nilɔ nbɑ tie Suif pɑɑnu ni kuukuɑ, u k tie Suif nɑn mɔni. Punpotu nɑn mɔni mun k tie punpotu nbɑ niib goli nɑ kɑɑ.

Bɑlmɔni Suif tie wun nbɑ tie Suif u pɑl ni e. Punpotu nɑn mɔni mun be pɑl ni e, k l punpotu tie Foŋɑnm tuonn e k k tie senni nbɑ diɑn senni kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ. L dɑɑnɔ pɑku k nyii nisɑɑli buol kɑɑ, l nyii Yennu buol e.
L i tie k nilɔ i tie *Suif, l mɔk nyɔlɑnt e? *Punpotu mɔk nyuɑt ii?
L mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn. Sinsinn tie Yennu din jii u mɔbonɑ nɑ k guun Suifnbɑ e.
B siɑb ii dinŋ ii kii wɑɑ Yennu sɔnu nɑn bɑlmɔni e, l wɑnt nɑn Yennu ji kii tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ bɑɑ k wɑɑ’u nɑ pɑɑk ii?

Aɑi, l k wɑnt nnɑ kɑɑ. Niib kul i bo i tie fɑi dɑnm, ŋɑɑn Yennu ŋɑnin tie bɑlmɔnpɑklɔ e, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ piɑk, b sɑɑ lɑ k ɑ mɔk mɔni, k b i bu ɑ buut, ɑ biɑ di mɔni e.»
Ŋɑɑn t biit i fiit wɑnn nɑn Yennu mɔk mɔni, bee k t sɑɑ yet i? Wɑɑ dɑt t tubɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k t ji sɑɑ yet ɑ u k mɔk mɔni ii? (Nisɑɑlk dudukt e k n yet nnɑ.)
Aɑi, n kɑn yet nnɑ kɑɑ. Yennu i kii mɔk mɔni, u bo kɑn fit kii bu tingbounŋ nɑ niib buut.
Tɔn, n fɑɑk nɑ i wɑnt nɑn Yennu mɔk mɔni k biɑ pukn’ɔ dontl, bee tien k u sɑɑ dɑt n tubl ɑ n tie biitdɑɑnɔ?

Bee k t ji kɑn yet ɑ: «Ŋɑɑnt k tin tun biit ɑ bonŋɑnn n tɑn bɑɑl,» ii? Setk nɑn mɔni, nisiɑb luon bin pɑk bonbiil k jiin n po k b tɑɑl’n ɑ n yet nnɑ. Yennu sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ nɑn lɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn’m biɑnŋ nbɑ e.
K l tie nlee? Tinm nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, t binbenŋ cie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ binbenŋ ɑmi? Aɑi, nɑn wɑɑn ɑ. N ponŋ dɔnŋ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ k Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ kul be biit yiikuo ni,
nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Suɑ kɑɑ k tie niŋɑnɔ, ɑɑi, nɑn yenɔ kuɑ wɑɑ.
Suɑ kɑɑ k mɔk minu, suɑ kɑɑ k kpɑɑn Yennu.
Suɑ kul kpet sɔnu nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ wɑɑ, k b kul bot ɑ. Suɑ kɑɑ k tuun bonŋɑnn, suɑ kɑɑ nɑn yenɔ kuɑ wɑɑ gbɑɑ.
B mɔi yɑɑ nɑn kɑyɑɑnt nɑ e, k fɑi nyi b jelmɑ ni, k lin nbɑ nyi b mɔi ni tie wɑɑɔk lɔbi e.
Mɔpolɑ nɑn mɑbiit kuukuɑ e nyi b mɔi ni.
K b tien siil nɑn nikpinu,
k siɑn nbɑ kul k b gɑl, pɑlbiil tuu tɑn bɑɑl lenŋ e.
B k mi sɔnu nbɑ k b sɑɑ tɔkn k lin bɑɑl nɑn mɑnu.
B binbenŋ ni, b k tiin Yennu.»
Tɔn, t mi nɑn Yennu *senni i yet lin nbɑ, l yien k tien bin nbɑ be l yiikuo ni. L pɑɑk e k niib kul sii muu b mɔi, k tingbounŋ nɑ tieb kul be Yennu buut ni, k u tuɑnn suɑ kɑɑ k mɔk mɔni.
Suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit tien niŋɑnɔ Yennu tuɑnn, wɑɑ wei senni nɑ nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn senni nɑ pɑɑk e te k nifosɑɑlk bɑnn nɑn u tuun biit.
Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yennu wɑnn’t bɑnnu nbɑ k u tien’t niŋɑnm u buol ni, k l k tie senni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ. Muois senni nɑ nɑn sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nɑ wɑnt ŋɑnn e.
Yennu te k nisɑɑli kul nbɑ tien Yiesu *Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ e tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn. L tie nɑ e k tul bin nbɑ kul nbɑ tien Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ,
k mɑɑn nifosɑɑli kul tun biit k fɔk nɑn dontl nbɑ k Yennu luon wun tul’b nɑ.
Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn. L tie piini e, k mɑɑn Yiesu Klistu pɑ b pɑɑk k nyinn’b biit dɑɑbs ni.

Yennu e din luon k Yiesu n muɑn u sɔn k lii tie *mɑlunŋ, k mɑlunŋ pɑɑk, k Yiesu n gɑɑl biit nyikcɑbu k tul bin nbɑ kul tien’ɔ yɑdɑ. Nnɑ e k Yennu din luon wun wɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ k u tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ: siɑn yuo u din mɔk suklu. U din k dɑt nisɑɑli tubɑ b biit pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u wɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ k u te k nisɑɑli tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn k mɑɑn u luon wuu tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ kii biɑ kii te k nisɑɑli i tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn bɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, siɑl be k t mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt nɑn’n ii? Aɑi, siɑl kɑɑ. Bee pɑɑk e? L tie bɑɑ wɑɑ senni nbɑ wɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk ee? Aɑi, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k pɑlbifɑɑnt kɑɑ.
T duki k yien ɑ nisɑɑlk yɑdɑ tienu pɑɑk e k Yennu yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ, k l k tie ɑ wɑɑ wɑɑ senni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ.
Yennu tie Suifnbɑ kuukuɑ Yennu ee? U k tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ Yennu mun ii? Nnn, u biɑ tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ Yennu e,
k mɑɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be k sɑɑ yet ɑ Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, k b kul n tien niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b yɑdɑ tienu pɑɑk.
Tɔn, tɑɑ yet ɑ nifosɑɑlk lɑɑt fielu u yɑdɑ tienu ni e nɑ, ŋɑnn e te k senni nɑ tie yɑnn ii? Aɑi, l k tie nnɑ kɑɑ. T lek sie senni nɑ po e.
Tɔn, t sɑɑ yet ɑ bee k jikt sɑɑ t yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm po? U din lɑ bee?
Wɑɑ din wɑɑ *senni nɑ ii dinŋ ii te k Yennu yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn, u bo sii mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt, ŋɑɑn u kii mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt Yennu tuɑnn.
L diɑn nlee Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni? L yet ɑ: «Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ e, k u yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu tien’ɔ niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn.»
L i tie k nilɔ tuun tuonɑ, u nyuɑt kii tie piini kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l sii tie pɑɑɔk o.
Ŋɑɑn nilɔ nbɑ k tien senni weiu nɑ yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn tien Yennu yɑdɑ, Yennu sɑɑ jii l dɑɑnɔ k u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn. L dɑɑnɔ yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu sɑɑ jii’u.
Nnɑ e k Dɑɑfiid din yet ɑ dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn k l k tie ɑ u tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, l dɑɑnɔ mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
Dɑɑfiid din yet ɑ: «Dɑnm nbɑ k Yennu nyik b biit k cɑb’b k piin b biit nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k Yennu k tiɑn u biit po, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e.»

L pɑlpienn mɑnŋ tie bin nbɑ pot nɑ kuukuɑ yɑl ɑmi ii? Kuo l mun biɑ tie bin nbɑ k pot nɑ yɑl e? T ponŋ bo yet ɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ e, k u yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn.
Nlee yuo e k Yennu din jii’u nnɑ? Yennu ponŋ din yi’u niŋɑnɔ e wɑɑ, k u tɑn pot ɑmi u din pot e wɑɑ, k Yennu yi’u niŋɑnɔ? Aɑi, Yennu ponŋ din yi’u niŋɑnɔ e wɑɑ, k u tɑn pot.

U din pot ɑ, ŋɑɑn u potu mɑnŋ tie *siɑlɑ nbɑ wɑnt nɑn u yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu ponŋ din jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ. L puolpo e wɑɑ, k u ji tɑn pot. L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ kul tie Yennu yɑdɑ ŋɑɑn k k pot nɑ, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie b bɑɑ e. Bɑɑ tie Yennu yɑdɑ pɑɑk e, k Yennu yi’b niŋɑnm.

Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie bin nbɑ pot nɑ mun yɑɑ bɑɑ e. L k tie ɑ bɑɑ pot nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ biɑ wɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ k t bɑɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑ, l puolpo e wɑɑ k u din tɑn pot. B yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie b bɑɑ.

Yennu din senn mɔsonn k tul Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nɑn u yɑɑbuonɑ ɑ tingbounŋ nɑ tɑn sii tie b yɑl e. L din k tie nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ wɑɑ senni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ k Yennu senn mɔsonn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din jii Ablɑɑhɑɑnm k u tie niŋɑnɔ ŋuɑ Yennu tuɑnn u yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ, pɑɑk e k Yennu din senn mɔsonn mɑnŋ.
L i bo i tie k Yennu mɔsonn nɑ tie bin nbɑ diɑ senni mɑnŋ yɑl i e, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, nilɔ yɑdɑ bo sii tie yɑnn e, k Yennu mɔsonn bo kii mɔk nyuɑt,
k mɑɑn senni e bɑɑt nɑn Yennu wutuol ŋɑɑn senni i kɑɑ, mɔyetuk biɑ sii kɑɑ.

L pɑɑk, Yennu mɔsonn sie yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, ɑ lii tie piini nbɑ nyii Yennu buol kii biɑ kii tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ kul yɑl. L k tie bin nbɑ wɑɑ senni nɑ kuukuɑ yɑl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ kul tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din tien biɑnŋ nbɑ. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm e tie t kul ɑ bɑɑ,

nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k u yet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ɑ: «N tien’ɑ nibuolu bonciɑnn bɑɑ e.» L pɑɑk, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tie t bɑɑ e Yennu buol, wun nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ. Ŋuɑ e te k kpienm lɑɑt mɑnfuol, k biɑ piɑk lin nbɑ dɑɑ k be po nɑn l set be.
Siɑl din k wɑnt nɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ii mɔk dindɑnn ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm lek ji din mɔk dindɑnn k biɑ tien yɑdɑ, k u din tien nibuolu bonciɑnn bɑɑ, nɑn Yennu nbɑ yet’ɔ ɑ: «A yɑɑbuonɑ tɑn sɑɑ pɔt bonciɑnn.»
Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din lɑ nɑn binɑ kobk nɑ, k din mi nɑn u gbɑnɑnt kpet ɑ, k u ŋɑɑpuo Sɑɑlɑ biɑ din tie puokɑnmɑtl e, ŋɑɑn nɑn l kul ɑ gbɑɑ, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑdɑ din k wɑt.
U mɑntk din tien Yennu yɑdɑ, u din k mɔk bilsuk nɑn Yennu mɔsonn nɑ, u yɑdɑ e din te k u pɑl cie, k u din piɑk Yennu.
U mɑntk din mi k k bils nɑn Yennu mɔk yiikuo k set sɑɑ fit tun lin nbɑ k u senn nɑ.
L pɑɑk, k: «Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ,» k mɑɑn u tien Yennu yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm kuukuɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ k l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu jii’u k u tie niŋɑnɔ,»
ŋɑɑn l diɑn k tien tinm nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ gɑɑl’t mun k t tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn, k mɑɑn tɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ Yennu wun nbɑ fiin t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu kuun ni nɑ.
Ŋuɑ e din jii Yiesu k cɑb k u kpo t biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn biɑ fiin’ɔ kuun ni, ɑ wun te k tii tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn.
L pɑɑk, Yennu nbɑ jii’t k t tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn t yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ e, k mɑnu ji be tinm nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu pɑɑk.
Yiesu ni e k t fit cɑt nɑkn Yennu k lɑ u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ t yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk k ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ ni k t be k wɑki. T ji mɔk pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk k mɑɑn t mɔk dindɑnn nɑn t tɑn sii mɔk Yennu *yudɑnt.
Nɑn l kul nɑ, t biɑ mɔk pɑlpienn t fɑldinu ni, k mɑɑn t mi nɑn fɑldinu bɑɑt nɑn gbɑnkul e,
k gbɑnkul mun bɑɑt nɑn pɑlcienn, k pɑlcienn mɑnŋ mun bɑɑt nɑn dindɑnn,
k dindɑnn mɑnŋ ni t tɑn kɑn di fei, k mɑɑn Yennu jii lonm nbɑ k u mɔk nɑ k tien t pɑlɑ ni, Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u tul’t nɑ ni.
Setk nɑn mɔni, yuo nbɑ k t dɑɑ din k mɔk sonml nɑ, Klistu din gɑɑl biitdɑnm pɑɑk k kpo, k l tie yuo nbɑ k Yennu din senn e.
L pɑɑl nɑn nilɔ n gɑɑl nipiemɔ pɑɑk k kpo, ŋɑɑn pɑsiɑl ɑ sɑɑ lɑ suɑ wun gɑɑl niŋɑnɔ pɑɑk k kpo,
ŋɑɑn Yennu wɑnn nɑn u set luon’t bonciɑnn k mɑɑn tɑɑ din tie biitdɑnm nɑ Klistu din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo.
L i tie k Yennu yet ɑ t tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn, Yiesu sɔn pɑɑk i e, nnɑ e mun k Yiesu mun sɑɑ fɑt’t Yennu wutociɑɔnŋ nɑ ni wɑɑ.

T din tuu tie Yennu dɑtɑi e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ jik, l ji ŋɑnm tinm nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni, bilsuk ji kɑɑ nɑn u sɑɑ fiel’t, k mɑɑn u Bijɑ nɑ kuun pɑɑk, k mɔtɑɑnɑ lɑɑ ŋɑnm tinm nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni nɑ, u ji sɑɑ fiel’t Yiesu mɑnfuol pɑɑk ɑ.
Ŋɑɑn l kul kɑɑ nɑ. T biɑ mɔk pɑlpienn Yennu nbɑ sonm’t bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ŋɑnm tinm nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni.
Tɔn, niyenɔ kuɑ e din te k biit bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k u biit nɑ pɑɑk e te k kuun be. L pɑɑk e te k kuun kpi niib kul, k mɑɑn nisɑɑlk kul tun biit ɑ.
Biit din be tingbounŋ nɑ ni e wɑɑ k Yennu din tɑn tul Muois *senni nɑ, ŋɑɑn senni i kɑɑ, suɑ kɑn tɑɑl nilɔ k yet ɑ u biil senni mɑnŋ.

Lɑɑ nyii Adɑn yuo ni k tɑn tuu Muois yuo, k kuun mɔk yiikuo suɑ kul pɑɑk, k kpi dɑnm kul nɑn bin nbɑ din k biil Yennu sennu nɑn Adɑn nbɑ din biil bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. Tɔn, Adɑn din tie wun nbɑ din yɑɑ wun wei puol nɑ ninnɑɔnŋ o.

Ŋɑɑn b bɑnle nɑ k jɑn, k mɑɑn Yennu piini nbɑ k u pi’t yɑnn nɑ k tie nɑn Adɑn biit nɑ kɑɑ. L tie mɔni e nɑn niib bonciɑnn kpo niyenɔ kuɑ biit pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ yɑb, k u piini nbɑ k u tien niib bonciɑnn yɑnn k l nyii niyenɔ kuɑ ni, wun nbɑ tie Yiesu Klistu nɑ mun biɑ cie nnɑ.

Bɔktu be Yennu piini nɑn niyenɔ kuɑ Adɑn biit sinsuuk ni, k mɑɑn niyenɔ kuɑ Adɑn biit mɑnŋ puolpo e k Yennu din bu u buut k yet ɑ u biit mɑnŋ ŋɑn nɑn tubdɑtu, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ Yiesu piini nbɑ k u pi’t yɑnn nɑ tie nyikcɑbu, biit bonciɑnn puolpo e.

Niyenɔ kuɑ mɑnŋ biit pɑɑk e k kuun kpi suɑ kul, k l nyii niyenɔ mɑnŋ buol e, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ wei niyenɔ kuɑ Yiesu Klistu tuonn nɑ gɑl nnɑ wɑɑ. Niib kul nbɑ lɑ Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nbɑ yɑb, nɑn u piini nbɑ tie nyikcɑbu piini nɑ, b sɑɑ di nɑɑn kii mɔk mɑnfuol Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e k niyenɔ kuɑ mɑnŋ biit pɑɑk e te k suɑ kul ŋɑn nɑn tubdɑtu, nnɑ e mun, niyenɔ kuɑ tuonŋɑnn pɑɑk e te k Yennu yi niib niŋɑnm k b lɑ mɑnfuol.
Niyenɔ kuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Adɑn nɑ mɔyetuk pɑɑk e te k niib bonciɑnn tien biitdɑnm. L mun tie nnɑ e nɑn niyenɔ kuɑ nbɑ k b yi’u Klistu nɑ mɔsɑku pɑɑk k niib bonciɑnn tien niŋɑnm Yennu buol.
Senni nɑ bɑɑl ɑ lin te k biit n yɑbt, ŋɑɑn k biit nbɑ din yɑbt nɑ, Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ mun din yɑbt k gɑl nnɑ.
L pɑɑk, biit nbɑ din te k nisɑɑli kpenn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e mun k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk te k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol, k tul’b mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, t sɑɑ yet nlee? T biɑ sii be t biit tumu ni e k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ n pukn ɑmi ii?
Aɑi, ŋɑnn kɑɑ. L tie nɑn t kpo nɑ e, k l pɑɑk biit k mɔk t yiikuo. Nlee k t sɑɑ biɑl biit tumu ni?
I k bɑn nɑn bɑɑ din wul’t Yennu nyunwulu, ɑ lin tɑɑn tinm nɑn Yiesu *Klistu nɑ, l wulu biɑ din tɑɑn tinm nɑn Yiesu Klistu u kuun ni ee?
L pɑɑk, t din kpo e nɑn Klistu k b lɑkn pii’t nɑn’ɔ Yennu nyunwulu ni, k u Bɑɑ nbɑ din jii u bɑktnɔunŋ yiikuo k fiin’ɔ kuun ni nɑ, nnɑ e k t mun fiil ɑ tii be mɑnfopɑɑnn ni.
L i tie k tinm nɑn Klistu lɑkn kpo, nnɑ e biɑk k t biɑ sɑɑ lɑkn k fiil kuun ni nɑn wɑɑ din fiil biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
T mi nɑn t binbenkpelk nɑ lɑkn k kpo nɑn Yiesu u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, ɑ t biit binbenŋ nɑ ji dɑɑ mɔk yiikuo, k t ji kii be biit dɑbs ni,
k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kpo nɑ ji k be biit dɑbs ni.
L i tie k t kpo nɑn Klistu nɑ, t tien yɑdɑ nɑn t sii be mɑnfuol ni nɑn’ɔ.
T mi nɑn Yennu nbɑ din fiin Klistu kuun ni nɑ, k u ji kɑn mi kpo. Kuun k mɔk u yiikuo.
Yiesu nbɑ din kpo nɑ, u din kpo t biit pɑɑk e tɑɑl yonm kuɑ, ŋɑɑn wɑɑ ji be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ, u be k tien Yennu e.
Nnɑ e mun, i jii i mɔnŋ k lii nɑɑn nɑn i kpo nɑ k biit ji k mɔk i yiikuo, ŋɑɑn, Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk, i ji be i mɑnfuol ni k tien Yennu.
L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ cɑbt k biit n yent i gbɑnɑnt nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kpo wɑɑ nɑ, k te k i tuun gbɑnɑnt mɑnŋ lonm.
Dɑɑ cɑbt biit k l mɔk i gbɑnɑnt yɑɑk k tuun nɑn’n bonbiil, ŋɑɑn jiin i mɔnŋ k tul Yennu, ŋɑɑn kii tie nɑn i nyii kuun ni e k kuɑ mɑnfuol ni nɑ. Jiin i gbɑnɑnt kul k tul Yennu ɑ lii tuun lin nbɑ tuok.
K mɑɑn, *senni nbɑ ji k yen’i, ŋɑɑn Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ e yen’i nɑ, l k ŋɑn k biit i mɔk i yɑɑk.
Tɔn, senni nɑ nbɑ k yen’t nɑ, i ŋɑɑn k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ e i yen’t, t sɑɑ biɑl biit tumu ni ɑmi ii? Aɑi, t kɑn tien nnɑ kɑɑ.

I mi nɑn l i tie k i jii i mɔnŋ k tul suɑ ɑ yin sɑk u mɔb i e, i set tie wun nbɑ k sɑɑk u mɔb nɑ dɑɑbɑ e. I i sɑk k tuun biit, i tie biit dɑɑbɑ e, k l juontu tie kuun e. Ŋɑɑn i i sɑk Yennu mɔb, i tie mɔsɑkdɑnm e, k ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k i tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol.
Siɑn yuo, biit din mɔk i yiikuo, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i mɑntk sɑɑk bɑlmɔni wɑnnu nbɑ k b din wɑnt’i nɑ nɑn i pɑlɑ kul. L pɑɑk, k n tien Yennu niipuouk.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ i ji k tie biit dɑɑbɑ, ŋɑɑn i ji tie dɑɑbɑ k tul lin nbɑ tuok nɑ tumu e.

Yinm nisɑɑli nbɑ k fit bɑnt Yennu mɑɑn yiɑn nɑ pɑɑk e k n yɑɑ n pɑk nisɑɑlk yɑn k wɑnn’i u lɑbɑɑl. Yɑɑ din jii i mɔnŋ k tien biit dɑɑbɑ k l nɔb nɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ jiin mɑn i mɔnŋ kii tuun yentinu tuonɑ kii tie niŋɑnm.
Yɑɑ din tuu tie biit dɑɑbɑ nɑ, i din k tie lin nbɑ tuok nɑ dɑɑbɑ.
Tuonɑ nbɑ k i din tuun k l mɔk’i fei mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, l din mɔk nyɔlɑnt e k tul’i ni? L tuonbuolu bɑɑt nɑn kuun e.
Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i ji nyii biit dɑɑbs ni wɑɑ k ji tie Yennu dɑɑbɑ e. L pɑɑk, yɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ kul, i gbuot Yennu nunm e k mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. Ŋɑnn e tie i nyuɑt.
K mɑɑn biit nyuɑt tie kuun e, ŋɑɑn Yennu piini nbɑ k u tien’t yɑnn nɑ tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e, t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i kul mi *senni nɑ po, l pɑɑk, i sɑɑ fit suol mɑɑ yɑɑ n yet lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk ɑ. Senni nɑ mɔk wun nbɑ be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ kuukuɑ yiikuo e.

L tie nɑn puo nɑn u sɔlɔ sinsuuk ni nɑ e. Senni nɑ nuɑk ni, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn puo n tɑɑn nɑn u sɔlɔ yuo nbɑ k u sɔlɔ dɑɑ be u mɑnfuol ni, ŋɑɑn u sɔlɔ nɑ i tɑnŋ i kpo yuo nbɑ, senni nɑ ji k mɔk puo nɑ yiikuo.

L pɑɑk, l i tie k u kun jɑluɑ k suɑ u sɔlɔ dɑɑ be u mɑnfuol ni, b sii yi’u puocunconn e. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k u sɔlɔ kpo i e, Yennu senni ji k mɔk u yiikuo, k u sɑɑ fit kun jɑluɑ ŋɑɑn k b kɑn fit k yiin’ɔ puocunconn.

N nɑɑ wɑɑs, l mun tie nnɑ e k tul’i. I kpo e k senni ji k mɔk i yiikuo, k yɑɑ tie *Klistu gbɑnɑnt bɔkl nɑ, i tie suɑ yɑb e. Mɔtɑɑnɑ, i gɑɑ nɑn nisuɑ e, wun nbɑ fiil kuun ni nɑ, ɑ yii tuun lin nbɑ mɔk nyuɑt k tul Yennu.
Yuo nbɑ k t din tuun t gbɑnɑnt lonm nɑ e, senni nɑ te k t mɔk niɑnbiiuk k l tuun t gbɑnɑnt ni. Niɑnbiiuk mɑnŋ e din te k t tuonɑ juontl nɑn kuun.

Mɔtɑɑnɑ ŋɑnin, senni nɑ k diɑ’t k mɑɑn t din kpo e k senni nɑ ji k mɔk t yiikuo. L pɑɑk, t ji fit tuun k tien Yennu nɑn binbenpɑɑnŋ nbɑ nyii Foŋɑnm buol ni. T ji k tuun nɑn binbenkpelk nbɑ k senni nbɑ diɑn lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni mɔk l yiikuo nɑ kɑɑ.

L pɑɑk, t sɑɑ yet ɑ nlee? T sɑɑ yet ɑ senni tie lin nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn biit ɑmi? T kɑn yet nnɑ kɑɑ. Senni nɑ i bo i kɑɑ, n bo kɑn bɑnn biit nbɑ tie lin nbɑ. Senni nɑ i bo i kii wɑnn’n ɑ: ɑ dɑɑ mɔk niɑɔnŋ nɑn *ɑ luɑ bonɑ, n bo kɑn bɑnn niɑɔnŋ nbɑ tie lin nbɑ,
ŋɑɑn k biit lɑ yiikuo sennu mɑnŋ nɑ ni, k te k niɑnbuolu buolu bonciɑnn fiil n pɑl ni. Senni nɑ i bo i kɑɑ, biit bo sii tie bonkpienn e.
Yuo nbɑ k n din k mi senni mɑnŋ nɑ, n din mɔk mɑnfuol e, ŋɑɑn mɑɑ tɑn bɑnn sennu mɑnŋ, k biit fiil, k n kpo.
Sennu nbɑ bo sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn mɑnfuol nɑ, k l bɑɑl nɑn kuun,
k mɑɑn biit lɑ u sɔnu senni nɑ ni e k kpɑnn’n, k lenŋ e k l kpii’n.
Senni nɑ tiɑɔnŋ nyii Yennu buol k sennu mɑnŋ mun nyii Yennu buol e, k tuok k biɑ ŋɑn.

Tɔn, l wɑnt nɑn lin nbɑ ŋɑn e kpɑnt tien lin nbɑ bɑɑl nɑn kuun k tul’n ɑmi? Aɑi, l k wɑnt nnɑ kɑɑ. Biit nɑ e jii lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ k bɑɑl nɑn kuun tul’n, ɑ lin wɑnn biit nbɑ tie lin nbɑ. Ŋɑnn e, sennu mɑnŋ ni k t ji bɑnn nɑn biit tie bonbilɑnkɑnt e.
T mi nɑn senni nyii Yennu buol e, ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin tie nisɑɑlk e, k b kɔi’n k n tie nɑn biit dɑɑbl nɑ.
Lin nbɑ k n tuun nɑ, n k mi l pɑɑk, k mɑɑn n k tuun lin nbɑ k n luon, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ k n nɑn nɑ, ŋɑnn e k n tuun.
Mi i tun lin nbɑ k n bo k luon k n tun nɑ, l wɑnt nɑn n sɑk nɑn senni mɑnŋ ŋɑn e.
L pɑɑk, l k tie n mɔnŋ kɑɑ tuun’l, ŋɑɑn l tie biit nbɑ be n ni nɑ.
N mi nɑn bonŋɑnsiɑl kɑɑ n ni, k l wɑnt nɑn n biit binbenŋ ni, k mɑɑn n luon k n tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn n kɑn fit k tuun’l.
Mɑɑ luon k n tun bonŋɑnn nbɑ nɑ, n k tuun’l, ŋɑɑn bonbiil nbɑ k n k luon k n tun nɑ, ŋɑnn e k n tuun.
L i tie k n tuun lin nbɑ k n k luon mii tuun, l ji k tie min kɑɑ tuun, ŋɑɑn l tie biit nbɑ be n ni nɑ e tuun.
N lɑ k sennsiɑl be n ni yuo kul ɑ. Mi i yɑɑ n tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn bonbiil biɑ lek tuu be nɑn’n.
K mɑɑn n ni, n pɑl pien Yennu senni nɑ pɑɑk,
ŋɑɑn k n lɑɑt sennsiɑl nbɑ tuun n gbɑnɑnt ni, k l kɔn nɑn senni nbɑ k n yɑn luon nɑ. Sennliel nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn biit nɑ tuun n gbɑnɑnt ni k lol’n nɑn dɑnsɑlk nɑ.
Abɑ, n tie yɑnbɔndɑɑnɔ e. Ŋmee sɑɑ fɑt’n k nyinn’n gbɑnɑnt nbɑ sɑɑ nɑn’n kuun ni nɑ?
Yennu yien niipuouk t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ni. L pɑɑk, n mɔnŋ wɑɑ Yennu senni nɑ n yɑn ni, ŋɑɑn k n nifosɑɑlk binbenŋ ni n tie sennliel nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn biit nɑ dɑɑbl e.
Tɔn, mɔtɑɑnɑ Yennu kɑn bu k biil bin nbɑ be Yiesu *Klistu ni,
k mɑɑn mɑɑ tɑɑn nɑn Yiesu Klistu nɑ, Foŋɑnm *senni nbɑ tien mɑnfuol nɑ, fɑt’n biit nɑn kuun senni ni wɑɑ.

Senni nɑ k fit tun nnɑ, k mɑɑn tinm nisɑɑli k fit diɑ’l fɑnu. Ŋɑnn e k Yennu din tun u mɔnŋ Bijɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ wun gɑɑl binbenŋ nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn tinm biitdɑnm binbenŋ nɑ, k tɑn gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo t biit pɑɑk. K u kuun mɑnŋ pɑɑk, Yennu biil biit nbɑ be tinm nisɑɑli pɑlɑ ni nɑ pɑnŋ.
Yennu din tun nnɑ, ɑ senni nbɑ boi’t lin nbɑ nɑ, n tun t ni, tinm nbɑ ji k tuun t tiɑɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt lonm, ŋɑɑn tuun Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
Bin nbɑ wɑɑ b tiɑɔnŋ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ nɑ jiit b dudukt k tie binbenŋ mɑnŋ ni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ wɑɑ Foŋɑnm nɑ jiit b dudukt k tie lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm luon nɑ ni e.
Dudukt nbɑ wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, juontl nɑn kuun e, ŋɑɑn dudukt nbɑ wɑɑ Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, juontl nɑn mɑnfuol nɑn mɑnu e.
Wun nbɑ yɑɑ dudukt be nisɑɑlk binbenŋ yiikuo ni, l dɑɑnɔ tie Yennu dɑtɑɑk, k k sɑɑk Yennu senni, k set kɑn fit k sɑk’l.
Bin nbɑ be b nisɑɑlk binbenŋ ni nɑ kɑn fit penn Yennu pɑl.
Foŋɑnm i set be i ni, i k wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn i wɑɑ Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ e. Wun nbɑ k mɔk Klistu Siek mɑnŋ u ni, l dɑɑnɔ k tie Klistuyuɑ.
I gbɑnɑnt nbɑ lek sɑɑ kpo biit pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn Yiesu i be i ni, Foŋɑnm tien’i mɑnfuol, k mɑɑn Yennu yet ɑ i tie niŋɑnm e u buol.
L i tie k Yennu Siek nbɑ fiin Yiesu kuun ni nɑ be i ni, ŋuɑ nbɑ fiin Yiesu Klistu kuun ni nɑ sɑɑ tul i gbɑnɑnt nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ kpo wɑɑ nɑ mɑnfuol, Siek nbɑ be i ni nɑ pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, l luon k t mɑbn t mɔnŋ k dɑɑ wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ.
K mɑɑn, l i tie k i wɑɑ nisɑɑlk binbenŋ, i sɑɑ kpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k i jii Foŋɑnm yiikuo k kpi i gbɑnɑnt biit, i sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol ɑ.
Bin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm ŋmɑktl’b sɔnu nɑ, ŋɑnm e tie Yennu wɑɑs.
K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u tul’i nɑ, u k te k i tie dɑɑbɑ nɑn jɑŋmɑɑndɑnm kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u te k i tie Yennu wɑɑs e, k yi Yennu ɑ: «Abbɑ! n Bɑɑ.»
Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ e te k t mɔnŋ sei mi bonŋɑnn nɑn t tie Yennu wɑɑs.

Tɑɑ set tie u wɑɑs nɑ pɑɑk, t sɑɑ lɑ u bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k u bil k guun u niib nɑ wɑɑ. T biɑ sɑɑ lɑkn nɑn Klistu k gɑɑl’l ɑ, k mɑɑn l i tie k tinm nɑn Klistu libn dii fɑlɑ, tinm nɑn ŋuɑ mun tɑn sɑɑ libn lɑ *yudɑnt ɑ.
N mi nɑn fɑlɑ nbɑ k t di mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ, l kɑn fit yekn nɑn yudɑnt nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ wɑnn’t nɑ.
*Dulnyɑ bonɑ kul nbɑ k Yennu nɑn nɑ, guu nɑn ninmɔnn e nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ nyinn u wɑɑs yienin ni,
k mɑɑn dulnyɑ bonɑ kul din biil ɑ, k ji k mɔk nyuɑt, l din k tun l tiɑɔnŋ kɑɑ, l din tie Yennu lonm e k l tien nnɑ, ŋɑɑn k dindɑnn biɑ lek be dulnyɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Dɑsiɑl be k dulnyɑ bonɑ mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ nyi kuun dɑɑbs ni, k kuun ji kɑn diɑ’l, k l mun tɑn sii yen l mɔnŋ nɑn Yennu wɑɑs nbɑ sii yen b mɔnŋ nɑn yudɑnt bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
T mi nɑn l yiɑl dulnyɑ bonɑ mɑnŋ k tɑn tuu mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn puo nbɑ tuu mɔ mɑtyiɑlu k kuli biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.

L k tie dulnyɑ bonɑ nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ k l yiɑl, ŋɑɑn tinm nbɑ mɔk Foŋɑnm nbɑ tie Yennu sinsinn piini nɑ mun kuli e t pɑlɑ ni, k guu yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k t tien u wɑɑs, k te k t gbɑnɑnt n nyi dɑɑbs ni.
Tɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ e k t mɔk dindɑnn nɑ. Tɔn, nilɔ i lɑ lin nbɑ k u bo mɔk dindɑnn l pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, l ji k tie dindɑnn. Ŋmee ji sii mɔk dindɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ k u ponŋ lɑ’l pɑɑk i?
Ŋɑɑn t i mɔk dindɑnn nɑn lin nbɑ k t k lɑɑt pɑɑk, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin, t ji tuu guu nɑn suklu e.
Nnɑ e mun k Foŋɑnm nɑ bɑɑl ɑ wun sonm tinm nbɑ k mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ k mɑɑn t k mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k t sii mei Yennu. Ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɔnŋ e mei Yennu k tien’t k kuli bɑnnu nbɑ k t mɔbonɑ kɑn fit wɑnn l pɑɑk.
K Yennu nbɑ lɑɑt nisɑɑlk pɑl ni mi Foŋɑnm nɑ dudukt nbɑ tie, k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nɑ mei Yennu u tiɑɔnŋ niib pɑɑk, k l wɑɑ nɑn ŋuɑ Yennu nbɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Bin nbɑ k Yennu yiin’m nɑ, u mɔk lin nbɑ pɑɑk k u yinm e, k b mɔk lonm nɑn’ɔ, k t mi nɑn lin nbɑ kul tuun nɑ, u te k l tien bonŋɑnn k tien ŋɑnm e.
U ponŋ din senn nɑn bin nbɑ k u lukt’b nɑ, ɑ bii tie nɑn u Bijɑ nɑ, k u Bijɑ nɑ n tien Bikpelk, wɑɑs bonciɑnn sinsuuk ni.
K Yennu yiin bin nbɑ k u senn nɑ, k bin nbɑ k u yiin’m nɑ k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol, k bin nbɑ k u yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol nɑ, k u donn’b.
T i got lin nbɑ nɑ kul, t sɑɑ yet ɑ nlee? L i tie k Yennu be t po, ŋmee ji be k sɑɑ biil’t i?
Yennu nbɑ k minn’t u mɔnŋ Bijɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii’u k tul t kul nɑ, nlee k u ji kɑn tul’t lin nbɑ kul biɑl i?
Ŋmee sɑɑ tɑɑl bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ? Ŋuɑ Yennu e yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol.
Ŋmee be k sɑɑ bu b buut k biil’b i? Suɑ kɑɑ, k mɑɑn Yiesu Klistu nbɑ din kpo k fiil kuun ni k biɑ be Yennu niidiitu po k tie t sindɑntinnɔ nɑ.
Ŋmee sɑɑ fit nyinn’t Yiesu Klistu lonm ni? T fɑlɑ ɑmi mɑɑn ɑmi muksuk ɑmi kon ɑmi nɑmu ɑmi bonbiil ɑmi kuun e? Aɑi.
L tie nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ ɑ: «A pɑɑk e k t be kuun fɑlɑ ni sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni wɑɑ k tɑn tuu dɑɑjuouk, k t tie nɑn pei nbɑ k b tuu tie siil ɑ bin kpi’b nɑ e.»
Ŋɑɑn bonɑ kul ni t mɔk nyɑnnu kul, wun nbɑ mɔk lonm nɑn’t nɑ pɑɑk.
K mɑɑn, n mi fɑnu nɑn siɑl kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit bɔkt tinm nɑn Klistu lonm, kuun ɑmi mɑnfuol ɑmi *mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ ɑmi nɑlnbiit ɑmi lin nbɑ tie mɔtɑɑnɑ ɑmi lin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien ɑmi
lin nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo ɑmi tinpuɑl ni ɑmi. Siɑl kɑɑ nɑɔnŋ kul ni k sɑɑ fit bɔkt tinm nɑn Yennu lonm nbɑ k t lɑ t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ni nɑ.
N piɑk bɑlmɔni e. N tie Klistuyuɑ e, n k fɑ fɑɑk. Foŋɑnm e ŋmɑktl n *dudukt k u tie *siɑlɑ nɑn n piɑk mɔni.
N mɔk pɑlbiil bonciɑnn k l yiɑl’n yuo kul,
n mɔnŋ nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tie n buolu nɑ pɑɑk. L i bo i sɑɑ fit k n set n niib pɑɑk k Yennu n biil’n k bɔkt min nɑn *Klistu, n bo sɑɑ sɑk nnɑ wɑɑ.
Ŋɑnm e tie Islɑɑeltieb, k Yennu din tien’m u wɑɑs, k din be nɑn’m nɑn *yudɑnt, k tul’b lolɑ, k tul’b *senni, k tul’b jɑɑnti, k biɑ tul’b mɔsonɑ.
B yejɑnm din tie nijɑɑnɑ e k Klistu nbɑ din kpɑnt nisɑɑlk nɑ, u din tie b buolu ni yenɔ e. Ŋuɑ e tie Yennu nbɑ yen bont kul nɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ pɑku k l kii mɔk gbennu. * Amenn.
N k yien ɑ Yennu mɔsonn nɑ ji kɑn tun kɑɑ, k mɑɑn Islɑɑel yɑɑbuonɑ kul kɑɑ tie Islɑɑeltieb nɑn bɑlmɔni.
Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ kul kɑɑ mun tie u yɑɑbuonɑ nɑn mɔni, k mɑɑn Yennu din yet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ɑ: «Isɑɑk buolu tɑn sii tie ɑ yɑɑbuonɑ e.»
L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm mɑl’b nifosɑɑlk mɑɑlu nɑ k tie Yennu wɑɑs, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ tie Yennu mɔsonn mɑɑlu wɑɑs nɑ, ŋɑnm e set tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm wɑɑs nɑn mɔni.
Yennu mɔsonn nɑ din tie ɑ: «Yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ, l yuo e k Sɑɑlɑ sɑɑ mɑl bonjɑk.»
Ŋɑɑn l kul kɑɑ nɑ. T yɑɑ Lebekɑ din mɑl wɑɑs bɑnle k b tɑɑ bɑɑ, wun nbɑ tie t yejɑ Isɑɑk.
L tie nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «N din mɔk lonm nɑn Sɑɑkɔb ŋɑɑn nɑn Esɑɑu.»
K t ji sɑɑ yet ɑ bee? T sɑɑ yet ɑ Yennu k tun lin nbɑ tuok ɑmi? Aɑi, t kɑn yet nnɑ kɑɑ.
Yennu din yet Muois ɑ: «Bin nbɑ k n luon k n tin’m ninbɑɑɔk nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sɑɑ tin’m ninbɑɑɔk. Bin nbɑ k n luon k mii mɔk lonm nɑn suklu b pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sii mɔk lonm nɑn suklu b pɑɑk.»
L pɑɑk, l k tie nisɑɑlk nbɑ luon lin nbɑ ɑmi u tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie Yennu ninbɑɑɔk pɑɑk e.
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k tul Fɑɑlɑɑɔn ɑ: «Min Yennu dinn’ɑ nɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, ɑ n jii’ɑ k wɑnn’ɑ n yiikuo, k te k n sɑnn n muɑnt lin tingbounŋ nɑ kul.»
L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ k Yennu luon k wun tin’m ninbɑɑɔk nɑ, ŋɑnm e k u tiin’m ninbɑɑɔk, k biɑ tien siɑb nikɑngbɑtɑ nɑn wɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Tɔn, pɑsiɑl k i yenɔ n boi’n ɑ: «L i tie nnɑ i e, nlee k Yennu lɑɑt nisɑɑlk biit i? Ŋmee sɑɑ fit k yet lin nbɑ k Yennu senn i?»
Ŋɑɑn n yuɑk, ɑ tie ŋmee k sɑɑ pɑk jiin Yennu? Bobl kɑn fit boi bobmɑɑlɔ ɑ: «Bee k ɑ mɑɑ’n k n tie nnɑ?»
Bobmɑɑlɔ mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ jii yɔuk bul k mɑɑ bobl nbɑ ŋɑn k tul kpɑnbɑl nɑn bobl nbɑ tie tɑlɑs-dɑnm yɑl.
Tɔn, Yennu din tun k luon wun wɑnn u wutuol k niib kul ɑ n bɑnn u yiikuo. Ŋɑɑn u din mɔk suklu nɑn bin nbɑ k u wutuol sɑɑ bɑɑl b pɑɑk k l bo jɑnŋ nɑn wun biil’b nɑ.
Yennu din luon wun wɑnn’t u yudɑnt nbɑ yɑb bɑnnu nbɑ, tinm nbɑ k u tin’t ninbɑɑɔk nɑ, tinm nbɑ k u ponŋ din lukt’t ɑ tin gɑɑl u yudɑnt nɑ.
Tinm e tie bin nbɑ k u din yiin’t nɑ, k u k yiin’t *Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ mun biɑ pukn lenŋ.

L tie nɑn Ose nbɑ din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni biɑnŋ nbɑ, ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: «Niib nbɑ din k tie n niib nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sɑɑ jii’b k bii tie n niib, k buolu nbɑ k n din k luon nɑ, ŋɑnm e k n sɑɑ yiin’m buolu nbɑ k n luon’m.
k siɑn nbɑ k b din yet’b ɑ b k tie n niib nɑ, lenŋ e biɑk k b sɑɑ yiin’m: ‹Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ wɑɑs.› »
*Yennu sɔkni Esɑɑyi din yikn sɑnpɑɑpo k wɑnn Islɑɑeltieb po k yet ɑ: «Islɑɑeltieb i lek i yɑb nɑn mɔkgbenŋl tɑnbiini nɑ, ŋɑɑn b wɑɑnm-nnɑ e sɑɑ lɑ fielu,
k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ tien k tul tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑn wɑɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ yiɑn yiɑn k gbenn.»

L tie nɑn Esɑɑyi nbɑ ponŋ din yet nɑ e ɑ: «T Yɑbnt Yonmdɑɑnɔ i bo i kii ten’t wɑɑs, l bo tɑn sɑɑ tun k tul’t nɑn lɑɑ din tun k tul Suodonm duo ni niib biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k t bo sii tie nɑn Guomuɔl duo ni niib nɑ e.»
Tɔn, t sɑɑ yet nlee? Bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ din k kol ɑ bin tien niŋɑnm Yennu buol, ŋɑɑn k Yennu yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn, b yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk,
ŋɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din kol ɑ bin lɑ senni nbɑ sɑɑ te k Yennu yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn nɑ, k b ji kɔnŋ’l.
Bee k b din kɔnŋ i? B din k kol ɑ Yennu n yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b yɑdɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn b din kol ɑ wun yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b tuonɑ pɑɑk e. B gbiɑt tɑngbiɑtkɑl e k bɑɑ,

tɑnn nbɑ k b diɑn l po Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Gotl, min Yennu bil tɑnn *Siiɔn duo ni, lin nbɑ sɑɑ te k niib n gbiɑt k bɑɑ. L tie tɑnjɑgbounŋ o, k b sɑɑ bilnt l pɑɑk k bɑɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, u kɑn di fei.»
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon nɑn n pɑl kul k mei Yennu ɑ wun fiel n mɔnŋ buolu, *Suifnbɑ.
N mi k tien *siɑlɑ nɑn b wɑɑ Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn, ŋɑɑn b ninmɔnn mɑnŋ k yent.
B k mi sɔnu nbɑ te k Yennu yet ɑ niib tie niŋɑnm u buol, ŋɑɑn luon b mɔnŋ sɔnu, k l pɑɑk, b k jii b mɔnŋ k lol nɑn Yennu sɔnu nɑ.
K mɑɑn, Yiesu tun k gbien Muois *senni nɑ wɑɑ. K mɔtɑɑnɑ, Yennu yi bin nbɑ tien *Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ niŋɑnm u buol ni.
Muois din diɑn k jiin bɑnnu nbɑ k nilɔ sii tie niŋɑnɔ senni weiu ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ k senni nɑ senn nɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol l pɑɑk ɑ.»

Ŋɑɑn nɑ e tie bɑɑ yet lin nbɑ k jikt sɑɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k Yennu yet ɑ niib tie niŋɑnm u tuɑnn b yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ ɑ: «A dɑɑ duki ɑ pɑl ni ɑ: ‹Ŋmee tɑn sɑɑ do *Yendɔunŋ ni?› » (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Ŋmee sɑɑ do Yendɔunŋ ni k te k Klistu n sik i?»)
«A biɑ dɑɑ boi ɑ: ‹Ŋmee tɑn sɑɑ sik tinpuɑl ni?› » (L pɑɑk tie ɑ: «Ŋmee sɑɑ sik k te k Klistu n fiil kuun ni?»)
Yennu yet ɑ bee? L yet ɑ: «Mɑɑn nɑ kpiɑ’ɑ. L be ɑ mɔb ni nɑn ɑ pɑl ni.» Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ tie yɑdɑ lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k t muɑntl nɑ.
L i tie k ɑ set pɑk k sɑt nyinn ɑ mɔb ni k yet ɑ: «Yiesu tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ,» k biɑ tien yɑdɑ ɑ pɑl ni nɑn Yennu set fiin’ɔ kuun ni, ɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.
K mɑɑn nilɔ set tien Yiesu yɑdɑ e u pɑl ni, k Yennu yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u tuɑnn, k l set nyii u mɔb ni e k u yet nnɑ, k l pɑɑk e k u lɑ fielu.
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, u kɑn mi di fei.»
Bɔktu kɑɑ Suifnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni, Yennu kuukuɑ nɑ e tie b kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ, k bin nbɑ kul mei’ɔ, u sonmt’b nɑn bulcintuk.
K mɑɑn, l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul mei Yonmdɑɑnɔ sonml po, u sɑɑ lɑ fielu.»
Tɔn, niib i kii tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, b sɑɑ tien nlee k miɑl’ɔ sonml po? K b i kii gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, b sɑɑ tien nlee k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ? K b i kii muɑnt u lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, nlee k niib sɑɑ gbɑt u po?
K b i kii tun tuomiinbɑ, nlee k lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ sɑɑ muɑnt i? L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Bin nbɑ lin k muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, b bɑɑlu ŋɑn bonciɑnn.»
Ŋɑɑn niib kul kɑɑ sɑk lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn Esɑɑyi yet ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, ŋmee tien yɑdɑ nɑn t lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ?»
L pɑɑk, nilɔ i gbiɑ lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, l bɑɑt nɑn yɑdɑ e, k lɑbɑmɑnn nyi niib nbɑ muɑntl Klistu mɑɑn nɑ ni e.
Ŋɑɑn n boi k lɑɑn niib k gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ ɑmi? Mɔmɔnm, b gbɑt ɑ. L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Niib gbɑt b kunkɔlɑ tingbounŋ lokl kul po, k b mɑɑn yɑt nɑn *dulnyɑ kul.»

N yɑɑ n ŋɑnm k boi e k lɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb din k bɑnn l pɑɑk ɑmi? Muois tiɑɔnŋ o din dɔnŋ jiin sinsinn, ɑ Yennu din yet Islɑɑeltieb ɑ: «N sɑɑ te k i mɔk *funfunn nɑn niib nbɑ k mɔk buolu nɑ pɑɑk, k te k i wutuol n do buolu nbɑ tie jɑtt nɑ pɑɑk.»
K Esɑɑyi mɔk pɑl k yet ɑ Yennu yɑɑ ɑ: «Niib nbɑ k fiin n po nɑ, b tɑn lɑ’n ɑ, k niib nbɑ k boi n po nɑ, k n jii n mɔnŋ k fiit wɑnn’b.»
Ŋɑɑn k u yet Islɑɑeltieb po ɑ: «N tɑnt n nuu yennu ni nɑn nyiɑɔk ɑ n gɑɑl’b, ŋɑɑn k b tie tubkɑngbɑtɑ k k sɑɑk n mɔb.»
L pɑɑk, n luon k n boi k lɑɑn i duki ɑ Yennu yet u mɔnŋ niib ɑmi? Aɑi, u k yet’b kɑɑ. N mɔnŋ tie Islɑɑel nilɔ e, k tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonn, k nyii Bensɑɑmen nɑɑkuuk ni.
Yennu k lu u niib nbɑ k u dɔnŋ lukt’b nɑ. I mi lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni k wɑnt *Elii nbɑ din yien Yennu, Islɑɑeltieb biit po biɑnŋ nbɑ ɑ:
«N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, b kpii ɑ sɔkniinbɑ kul ɑ, k biil ɑ binbintɑ nɑ. N kuukuɑ e biɑl, k b kol ɑ bin kpi’n.»
Yennu din jiin ɑ biɑ? Yennu din jiin ɑ: «N mɔk niib tusɑ ŋɑnlole bin nbɑ dɑɑ k mi gbɑɑn jiɑnt Bɑɑl nɑ.»
L tie nnɑ e mɔtɑɑnɑ. Niib wɑɑnm-nnɑ e dɑɑ be k Yennu lukt’b u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk.
Yennu i lukt niib, u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e, k u lukt’b, k l k tie b tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ. Yennu i bo i lukt niib b tuonɑ pɑɑk i e, u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ bo kii tie bɑlmɔni ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ kɑɑ.
Tɔn, t sɑɑ yet ɑ biɑ? L wɑnt nɑn Islɑɑeltieb k lɑ bɑɑ luon lin nbɑ. Bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ kuukuɑ nɑ lɑ’l, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ tien tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm e.
L tie nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu din te k b yɑn lib, k te k b ninbinɑ k lɑɑt, k te k b tubɑ k gbiɑ k tɑn tuu dinnɑ.»
K Dɑɑfiid yet Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu n te k b jɑɑnm i tie bɑluk k tul’b, ɑ bii bɑɑ kii lɑɑt tubdɑtu,
k te k b ninbinɑ n juɑn, k b dɑɑ lɑɑt, k b sii buɑ k b sɑi ni kɑn nɑɑt i »

N boi biɑk k lɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb din gbiɑt k bɑɑ k ji k fit fiil ɑmi? Aɑi, l k tie nnɑ kɑɑ. Bɑɑ tun biit nɑ pɑɑk, k Yennu fiel bin nbɑ k tie *Suifnbɑ nɑ. Yennu tun nnɑ ɑ ŋɑnm Suifnbɑ nɑ i mɔk *funfunn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
L i tie k Suifnbɑ biit te k tingbounŋ tieb lɑ piisn, k bɑɑ k tien yɑdɑ nɑ te k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ lɑ bonŋɑnn, nlee k bonŋɑnn kɑn yɑbt *dulnyɑ ni l i tie k b ŋmɑt k lebt b binbenŋ i?
N piɑk k tien yinm nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ e: Yennu nbɑ te k n tie *tuomi i buol ni nɑ, n sii mɔk yugontl n tuonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Mi i bo i sɑɑ fit te k n mɔnŋ buolu niib i mɔk funfunn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, pɑsiɑl ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k b siɑb n lɑ fielu.

Yennu nbɑ din yet Suifnbɑ nɑ, l din te k l ji mɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni. Yennu i ŋmɑnt k gɑɑl’b k b tie u niib, l ji sii tie nlee? L set sii tie bɑlmɔni e nɑn bi fiil kuun ni k jen mɑnfuol ni wɑɑ.
L i tie k b buun pɑɑnu yon, k bɔkt sinsinn yɑl k tien pɑɑnu k l tie Yennu yɑl, lin nbɑ ten nɑ mun biɑ tie Yennu yɑl e. L i tie k tiik jiinɑ tie Yennu yɑl i e, l yiini nɑ mun biɑ tie u yɑl e.

Suifnbɑ nɑ tie nɑn ŋɑɑk ni tiik nbɑ k b yi oliifie nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ e, k b kɔnn tiik nɑ yiinsiɑ. Fin nbɑ k tie Suif nɑ, ɑ tie nɑn muuk ni oliifie yiinu nɑ e k b tukn’ɑ b yiɑl ni ŋɑɑk ni oliifie pɑɑk, k mɔtɑɑnɑ ɑ gɑɑn bonŋɑnn nbɑ nyi ŋɑɑk ni oliifie nɑ jiinɑ nɑ ni e.
L pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt nɑn sinsinn yiini nɑ. Dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt, k mɑɑn ɑ tie yiinu kuukuɑ e. Jiinɑ nɑ e diɑ’ɑ, fin kɑɑ diɑ jiinɑ.
A sɑɑ jiin k yet ɑ: «Mɔni e, b kɔnn yiini nɑ ɑ bin tukn’n yiini nɑ yiɑl ni e.»
L set tie mɔni e. Bɑɑ k tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k b kɔnn’b, k fin nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e k b jii’ɑ tukn’ɑ l pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn, ɑ ji dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbifɑɑnt dudukt l pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni.
L i tie k Yennu k ŋɑɑn k tiik nɑ tiɑɔnŋ yiini nbɑ tie Suifnbɑ nɑ n biɑl, i dɑɑ duki nɑn u sɑɑ ŋɑɑn k i biɑl.

Gotl Yennu nbɑ mɔk bulcint ŋɑɑn biɑ mɔk ninkuoni biɑnŋ nbɑ. U mɔk ninkuoni k tul bin nbɑ bɑɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn u wɑnn’ɑ u bulcint. Ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k ɑ biɑl u bulcint ni. Nnɑ i kɑɑ, u sɑɑ kɔnn’ɑ nɑn yiinu nɑ e.
Suifnbɑ i nyik bɑɑ k tien yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, Yennu sɑɑ jiin tukn’m siɑn k b din tuu be, k mɑɑn u sɑɑ fit k tun nnɑ.

Fin nbɑ k tie Suif nɑ tie nɑn muuk ni oliifie yiinu nɑ e, k Yennu kɔnn’l k tukn nɑn ŋɑɑk ni oliifie nɑ, ŋɑɑn b tuu k tie nnɑ. L k pɑɑl k wun jii yiini nbɑ k u kɔnn ŋɑɑk ni oliifie nɑ ni, k biɑ tukn nɑn l mɔnŋ oliifie nɑ biɑk.

N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon k yin bɑnn wuol ni lɑbɑɑl, ɑ i dɑɑ duki nɑn i tie yɑndɑnm e. L tie ɑ Suifnbɑ siɑb tie kɑngbɑtɑ e, k l sii be nnɑ e k tɑn bɑɑl yuo nbɑ k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ kul nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ, bin tɑn tien Yiesu yɑb.
Nnɑ e k Islɑɑel kul sɑɑ lɑ fielu, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ Yennu yet ɑ: «Fietuɑ sɑɑ nyi *Siiɔn duo ni e, k bɑɑl k tɑn nyinn mɔyetuk Sɑɑkɔb yɑɑbuonɑ sinsuuk ni.
Ŋɑnn e tie *lol nbɑ k n sɑɑ lol k tul’b, yuo nbɑ k n sɑɑ nyinn b biit.»

L i tie k t got Suifnbɑ nbɑ yet Yiesu lɑbɑmɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ, b tie Yennu dɑtɑi, ɑ lin bɑɑl nɑn bonŋɑnn k tul’i. Ŋɑɑn l i tie k t biɑ got Yennu nbɑ din lukt’b bɑnnu nbɑ, b tie bin nbɑ k Yennu luon’m, b yejɑnm pɑɑk e,
k mɑɑn Yennu k gɑɑn lin nbɑ k u tul k biɑ k lebtl u dudukt bin nbɑ k u yiin’m nɑ pɑɑk.
Siɑn-yuo ni, i din k cɔln Yennu, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i bɑnn Yennu ninbɑtinu k mɑɑn Suifnbɑ din k cɔln’mɔ.
Nnɑ e biɑk k mɔtɑɑnɑ k b k cɔln ɑ yin fit k lɑ Yennu ninbɑtinu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn bɑɑ k cɔln nɑ biɑ sɑɑ te k bin lɑ ninbɑtinu mɑnŋ.
K mɑɑn Yennu tien niib kul mɔyetuk dɑɑbɑ ɑ wun fit k wɑnn b kul u ninbɑtinu.
Yennu mɔktuk set k mɔk gbennu! K u yɑn nɑn u bɑnnu sumi hɑli! Ŋmee sɑɑ fit bɑnn Yennu nbɑ lol lin nbɑ? Ŋmee sɑɑ fit bɑnn u sɔni?
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Ŋmee mi Yennu dudukt i? Ŋmee sɑɑ kpɑɑn’ɔ?
Ŋmee mi k tul Yennu siɑl sinsinn ɑ, ŋɑɑn ji tɑn luon wun pɑ l pɑɑk i?»
Yennu e din nɑn bonsiɑl kul, k u pɑɑk e k l kul be k tie u yɑl. Yudɑnt tie Yennu yɑl e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.
L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, Yennu ninbɑtinu pɑɑk e te k n boi’i ɑ yin jii i gbɑnɑnt k tul’ɔ, k lii tie mɑnnu nbɑ fo, kii wɑɑ ŋuɑ kuukuɑ, k l sɑɑ mɑnŋ’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e tie Yenjiɑntu nɑn bɑlmɔni.

I dɑɑ te k i binbenŋ tie nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib binbenŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k Yennu n lebt i dudukt nɑn bɑlmɔni, kii ŋɑnm i binbenŋ fɑnu. Ŋɑnn e k i sɑɑ bɑnn Yennu yɑnbuɑt nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ, k ŋɑnn e tie lin nbɑ ŋɑn, lin nbɑ gbuot u nunm nɑn lin nbɑ tie dede.

Yennu nbɑ tin’n ninbɑɑɔk nɑ pɑɑk e, k n yien i kul, ɑ i dɑɑ duki i mɔnŋ po k l gɑl yɑɑ set tie bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋɑɑn ii duki i mɔnŋ po nɑn sikn-n-mɔnŋ, k i ni suɑ kul i duki u mɔnŋ po nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɔ yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
Tɔn, nilɔ gbɑnɑnt mɔk pɑɑk pɑɑk e, ŋɑɑn k bɔkl kul mɔk u tuonn, ŋɑɑn tɑɑn k tie gbɑnɑn-yent kuɑ.
L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e, nɑn tɑɑ yɑb bonciɑnn nɑ, t kul tɑɑn k tie gbɑnɑn-yent e tɑɑ be *Klistu ni nɑ, k t kul ɑ nɑ gbɑnɑnt tɑɑn tɑɑn k tukn k ji tien gbɑnɑn-yent ɑ.
T kul ɑ mɔk piini nɑn Yennu nbɑ tin’t ninbɑɑɔk bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e, k l k tɑɑ tɑɑ. Yenɔ piini i tie wuu sɔknt Yennu mɑɑn nɑ i e, l ŋɑn wun tun nɑn wɑɑ mɔk yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
Luɑ piini i tie wun sonm lieb i e, l ŋɑn wun sonm’b. Luɑ i tie wɑntuɑ, l ŋɑn wun wɑnn lieb tumiu.

Luɑ piini i tie wuu kpɑɑn u lieb kpɑɑni e, wuu kpɑɑn’m. Luɑ piini i tie wuu pi piini, wuu pi piini nɑn bulcint. Luɑ piini i tie wuu mɔk yiikuo, wuu tuun yiikuo tuonn mɑnŋ bonŋɑnn. Luɑ piini i tie wuu tiin niib ninbɑɑɔk u e, wuu tiin’m ninbɑɑɔk nɑn pɑlpienn.
Ŋɑɑnt k lonm i tie bɑlmɔni lonm. Ii nɑn biit mɑn, ŋɑɑn suol lin nbɑ ŋɑn.
Ii luon lieb mɑn bonŋɑnn nɑn nilɔ nɑn u nɑɑ bik nbɑ tuu luon lieb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k kot kii bɑɑkt lieb,
kii tie nikɑkti, k dɑɑ tiin gbɑn-nyɑkl, ŋɑɑn kii tuun Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuonɑ nɑn i pɑlɑ kul ɑ.
Ii mɔk pɑlpienn i dindɑnn pɑɑk mɑn, kii mɔk mintl i fɑldinu sinsuuk ni, ŋɑɑn kii mei Yennu yuo kul.
Pɑɑtl mɑn lin nbɑ k i mɔk nɑ k tul Yennu niib nbɑ k mɔk, kii gɑɑn sɑɑnm kii cɑntl’b i ŋei ni.
Bin nbɑ muks’i, yin jiin’m ɑ: «Yennu yetŋɑnm ii be i pɑɑk.» Mɔmɔnm, ii jiin’m nnɑ. I dɑɑ tien’m mɔpol gbɑɑ.
Wun nbɑ mɔk pɑlpienn, ii mun i mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn’ɔ mun, k wun nbɑ mun mɔk pɑlbiil, ii mun i mɔk pɑlbiil nɑn’ɔ mun.
Ii mɔk mɑn dudukyenn kuɑ k dɑɑ mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn kii sɑɑk tuonɑ nbɑ k mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ, k dɑɑ duki nɑn i mɔk nin-yentl.
I dɑɑ tuun biit k jiint biit pɑɑk. Kotl i mɔnŋ kii tuun lin nbɑ k niib kul sɑɑ lɑ k l ŋɑn.
I yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk mɑn l i tie k l sɑɑ fit kii be bɑnnu nbɑ k mɑnu sii be yinm nɑn niib sinsuuk ni.

N yɔnimɔni, i kpɑn dɑɑ tuun biit k jiint biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋɑɑnt k Yennu wutuol n tun, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, ɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet ɑ: «Min kuukuɑ e mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ dɑt niib tubɑ. Min e sɑɑ pɑ biit mɑnŋ pɑnn.»
L biɑ diɑn ɑ: «A dɑtɑɑk i mɔ kon, fɑn din’ɔ, nyun-nyuklu i suol’ɔ, fɑn tul’ɔ nyun wun nyu, k fi i tie nnɑ, ɑ dint’ɔ fei e.»
Dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k biit n nyɑnn’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn jii tuonŋɑnɑ k nyɑnn biit.
L tie k nilɔ kul n sɑk yudɑnm mɔi, k mɑɑn suɑ k mɔk u mɔnŋ yiikuo k l k nyii Yennu buol. Yennu e te k bin nbɑ mɔk yiikuo nɑ mɔk yiikuo.
Wun nbɑ k sɑɑk yudɑnm *senni nɑ, l wɑnt nɑn u biɑ k sɑɑk lin nbɑ k Yennu senn nɑ, bin nbɑ kul tuun nnɑ, b bɑɑt nɑn tubdɑtu e b mɔnŋ pɑɑk.
Bin nbɑ tuun tuonbiit nɑ e tiin yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, b k tiin yudɑnm jɑŋmɑɑni. Fi i kii luon fii tiin yudɑɑnɔ, l ŋɑn fii tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, k wun pɑk’ɑ,

K mɑɑn u tie Yennu tuontunnɔ e k tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k tien’ɑ. Ŋɑɑn fi i tuun bonbiil, fii tiin’ɔ, k mɑɑn u k mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k u sɑɑ dɑt ɑ tubl yɑnn. U tie Yennu tuontunnɔ e k sie Yennu pɑɑk k dɑɑl wun nbɑ tuun biit nɑ tubɑ.
L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k ɑ gɑɑl yudɑnm mɔi, k l k tie ɑ mɑntk tiin tubdɑtu nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ mi ɑ pɑl ni nɑn l tie lin nbɑ ŋɑn e.
L pɑɑk e te k t pɑ lɑnpo, k mɑɑn Yennu e senn yudɑnm nɑ, ɑ yuo kul bin jii’l k diɑ tingbounŋ nɑ bonŋɑnn.

L pɑɑk, tuln’m lin nbɑ tie b yɑl. L i jɑnŋ nɑn bin gɑɑl niib lɑnpo, ɑmi lin nbɑ k i mɔk pɑɑk lɑnpo, yin pɑ k tul’b. L i jɑnŋ nɑn k i bɑɑk nilɔ, yin bɑɑk’ɔ. L i biɑ kii jɑnŋ nɑn i cɔln nilɔ, yin cɔln’mɔ.
Dɑɑ mɔk suɑ pɑnn. Yɑɑ sii mɔk pɑnn nbɑ tie ii luon mɑn i lieb. Wun nbɑ luon u luɑ, l dɑɑnɔ gbien Yennu senni nɑ kul ɑ.
Yennu senni nɑ yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ conm. Dɑɑ kpi *ɑ luɑ. Dɑɑ jɑɑn. Dɑɑ mɔk niɑɔnŋ ɑ luɑ bont pɑɑk.» Senni nbɑ nɑ nɑn lin nbɑ biɑl nɑ kul tɑɑn k wɑnt nɑn: «I luon ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.»
K fi i luon ɑ luɑ, ɑ kɑn tun bonbiil k tul’ɔ. Ŋɑnn e niib lomu tie Yennu senni gbienu.
Ii tie nnɑ mɑn k mɑɑn yɑɑ mi yuo nɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Yuo nɑ bɑɑl ɑ, k i sɑɑ fiil i guɑn ni, k mɑɑn t fielu dɑɑl pel ɑ, k k fɔk nɑn lɑɑ din fɔk biɑnŋ nbɑ yuo nbɑ k t din sint tien yɑdɑ nɑ.
Nyiɑɔk gɑl ɑ, k yennu ni e bɑɑt. Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin lu tuonɑ nbɑ tuun bunbɔnn ni ŋɑɑn jii jɑtiɑt nbɑ k t sɑɑ fit kɔn nɑn’n yieonŋ ni.
L luon k tin diɑ t mɔnŋ fɑnu nɑn lɑɑ luon tii be yieonŋ ni yennu ni bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. T suol t mɔnŋ nɑn boncuncontuonɑ, nɑn dɑyibu, nɑn kunkɔnɑ nɑn *funfunn.
I jii Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu binbenŋ k lii tie i yɑl, k dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k gbɑnɑnt lonbiit n te k i tuun biit.
Gɑɑt mɑn yɑdɑ-kɑnpuɑnɑ dɑnm nɑ, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ noi nɑn’m mɔniɑɔk b dudukt po.
Suɑ yɑdɑ e te k u di jiet kul, ŋɑɑn k wun nbɑ yɑdɑ k pɑɑl nɑ mun kuɑ nɑnt ŋmɑmu.
Wun nbɑ di jiet kul ɑ nɑ dɑɑ goli wun nbɑ kuɑ jesiɑt nɑ yɑnn, k wun nbɑ mun kuɑ jesiɑt nɑ dɑɑ biil wun nbɑ di jiet kul nɑ sɑnn, k mɑɑn Yennu gɑɑl’ɔ wɑɑ.
A tie ŋmee k sɑɑ biil suɑ tuontunnɔ? U mɔnŋ yudɑɑnɔ nɑ e sɑɑ yet wɑɑ dii nɑn wɑɑ bɑɑ, k u set sɑɑ di wɑɑ k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɔk pɑnŋ nbɑ sɑɑ te k wun di.
Tɔn, nisiɑb mun duki ɑ dɑyenɑ cie dɑliɑ, k siɑb mun jii dɑɑ kul k l jɑn e. Suɑ kul yɑn ii pɑɑl nɑn wɑɑ tien lin nbɑ yɑdɑ.

Wun nbɑ duki ɑ dɑyenɑ cie dɑliɑ nɑ, u tie nnɑ k tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑkl e, k wun nbɑ mun di jiet kul nɑ, u tie nnɑ e k tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑkl mun, k mɑɑn u tien Yennu niipuouk jiet nɑ pɑɑk, k wun nbɑ mun kuɑ jesiɑt nɑ mun tie nnɑ e k tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑkl, k mun biɑ tien Yennu niipuouk.
Suɑ kɑɑ k be k fo u yul pɑɑk, ɑmi k kpenn u mɔnŋ lonm kuun.
T i fo, t fo k dont Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn e. T i mun i biɑ kii kpo, t kpo Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni e. Tɔn, t i fo ɑmi t i sɑɑ kpo i e, t tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yɑb e.
K mɑɑn *Klistu din kpo k biɑ fiil kuun ni ɑ wun tien fuotb nɑn kpienm Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
Fin, ɑ mun tie ŋmee k sɑɑ wɑnn ɑ nɑɑbik nɑn wɑɑ tien lin nbɑ ŋɑn kuo l k ŋɑn i? Bee tien k ɑ sɑlkt ɑ nɑɑ bik i? T kul tɑn sɑɑ set Yennu tuɑnn k wun bu t buut.
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Min, Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ fo nɑ, n yien’i nɑn buolu kul sɑɑ gbɑɑn n tuɑnn, k suɑ kul sɑɑ yet u mɔb ni, ɑ n set tie Yennu.»
L pɑɑk, suɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ fiit u mɔnŋ k tul Yennu.
L pɑɑk, t dɑɑ duki nɑn t sɑɑ fit yet nɑn lin nbɑ k t lieb tuun nɑ ŋɑn kuo l k ŋɑn. Lin nbɑ ŋɑn tie k i lol i mɔnŋ pɑl ni, nɑn i kɑn te k i nɑɑ bik n gbiɑt kuo k bɑɑ.
Mɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e te k n bɑnn nɑn jiet kɑɑ k kuɑ. Ŋɑɑn suɑ i dukn nɑn jesiɑt kuɑ l kuɑ u buol e.
Fi i te k ɑ nɑɑ bik pɑl biil jiet nbɑ k ɑ di nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑnn ŋɑnin ɑ ji k tuun lonm tuonɑ kɑɑ. Nilɔ nbɑ k Klistu din gɑɑl u pɑɑk k kpo nɑ, ɑ dɑɑ te k wun nyik Yennu sɔnu ɑ jiet dinu pɑɑk.
A dɑɑ te k niib n pɑk k biil lin nbɑ k ɑ duki nɑn l ŋɑn.
K mɑɑn Yennu nɑɑn lɑbɑɑl k tie jiet-dinu ɑmi nyunu lɑbɑɑl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie Yennu nbɑ luon k tii tuun bɑnnu nbɑ, nɑn mɑnu nɑn pɑlpienn nbɑ k Foŋɑnm tul’t nɑ lɑbɑɑl.
K mɑɑn wun nbɑ wɑɑ Klistu nnɑ, Yennu sii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn l dɑɑnɔ, k niib biɑ sii tie’u bɑɑkl.
L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin yɑbl k tun lin nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn mɑnu, nɑn lin nbɑ sɑɑ sonm t kul t yɑdɑ ni.
Ii mi k ɑ biil Yennu tuonɑ, jiet pɑɑk. Jiet kul ŋɑn e, ŋɑɑn l k ŋɑn k ɑ di jiet nbɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ nɑɑ bik yɑdɑ n bɑɑ.
Lin nbɑ ŋɑn tie k ɑ nyik lin nbɑ kul sɑɑ te k ɑ nɑɑ bik n bɑɑ, l i lek i tie nɑnt ŋmɑmu ɑmi dɑɑn nyunu.
Fɑɑ tien yɑdɑ k jikt sɑɑ jiet dinu po biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑnt k lii be fin nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni. Wun nbɑ tun lin nbɑ k u dukn nɑn l ŋɑn, k k mɔk bilsuk l pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e.
Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ mɔk bilsuk lin nbɑ k u di nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn dii, u mɔk biit, k mɑɑn u k di’l nɑn yɑdɑ. Nilɔ i kii tien yɑdɑ nɑn tuonsiɑl ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn tɑn tuun tuonn mɑnŋ, l tie biit e.
Tinm nbɑ k t yɑdɑ cie nɑ, l ŋɑn k tii mɔk suklu k sonm t lieb nbɑ yɑdɑ dɑɑ k cie nɑ, k dɑɑ tuun t mɔnŋ lonm kuukuɑ kɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k t kul n yɑbl kii tuun lin nbɑ sɑɑ penn t luɑ pɑl, k lii tie bonŋɑnn k tul’ɔ, k wun fit kii wɑɑ Yiesu *Klistu sɔnu fɑnu.
K mɑɑn ŋuɑ Klistu din k luon wun tun u mɔnŋ lonm kuukuɑ kɑɑ, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Bin nbɑ suki fin nɑ, b sukt mɑnŋ bɑɑ n pɑɑk e.»
Lin nbɑ kul diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ, l diɑn k tul’t ɑ tii tumi e. U mɑɑn mɑnŋ tien’t suklu, k biɑ kuɑnt’t pɑlɑ, ɑ tii mɔk dindɑnn.
Yennu, wun nbɑ k suklu nɑn pɑlcienn nyi u ni, n te k i fit kii be nɑn lieb nɑn mɑnu nɑn Yiesu Klistu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ,
k i kul ɑ sii mɔk dudukyenn kuɑ nɑn moyenm k dont Yennu nbɑ tie t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu Bɑɑ nɑ.
Ii gɑɑn lieb mɑn nɑn Klistu nbɑ gɑɑl’i nɑ, k Yennu sɑnn n lɑ pɑku.
K mɑɑn n yien’i ɑ Klistu din kpint u mɔnŋ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ tuontunnɔ e, ɑ wun gbien mɔsonɑ nbɑ k Yennu senn k tul b yejɑnm nbɑ din tie nijɑɑnɑ nɑ k nnɑ e k u wɑnn nɑn Yennu set tie mɔmɔnm dɑɑnɔ e,
k te k bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ ii dont Yennu sɑnn u ninbɑtinu pɑɑk, nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «N sɑɑ dont ɑ sɑnn bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ buol, k yin *yɑni k pɑk’ɑ.»
L biɑ diɑn k yet ɑ: «Yinm nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, ii mɔk mɑn pɑlpienn, yinm nɑn Yennu niib.»
L biɑ diɑn ɑ: «Yinm nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, pɑkn mɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu. Nibuolu kul, ii pɑk’ɔ mɑn.»
Esɑɑyi mun din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Jese yɑɑbuonn tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl, k u sii mɔk yiikuo, k tɑn sii tie bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ yudɑɑnɔ, k b dindɑnn sii be u ni.»
Yennu nbɑ tul’i dindɑnn nɑ, n tul’i mɑnu nɑn pɑlpienn bonciɑnn yɑɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk k Foŋɑnm n te k i dindɑnn nɑ n ŋɑnm yɑbt.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n mi n pɑl ni nɑn i pɑlɑ gbien nɑn dudukŋɑnt, k i mɔk minu k sɑɑ fit k kpɑɑn i lieb.
Mɑɑ dɑ bon-yenɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni nɑ, n dɑ nɑn pɑlcienn ɑ n tiɑl’i lin nbɑ k i ponŋ mi l po nɑ. N dɑ nnɑ k mɑɑn Yennu tin’n ninbɑɑɔk
