Ŋɑɑn t piɑk yuo kul nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e bikn’t k biɑ tien lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ t nii ni. T k luon k tin penn nisɑɑli pɑlɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t luon tin penn Yennu nbɑ goli t pɑlɑ ni dudukt nɑ pɑl e.
I mɔnŋ mi fɑnu nɑn Yennu tie t siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑn t din k bɑɑl i buol ni nɑn mɔmɑnt, ɑmi mɑɑn nbɑ dɔkn t niɑnciɑɔnŋ kɑɑ.
T din k kpɑɑn, ɑ suɑ n pɑk’t kɑɑ, yinm ɑmi i lieb buol.
Tɑɑ tie *Klistu tuomiinbɑ nɑ, t din mɔk yiikuo nbɑ k t din bo sɑɑ fit wɑnn’i yɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ. Ŋɑɑn t din be i sinsuuk ni suon nnɑ e nɑn puo nbɑ tuu diɑ u wɑɑs biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Tɑɑ din luon’i bonciɑnn nɑ, t din k tien siil ɑ t tul’i lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ nyii Yennu buol nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t biɑ din luon k tin tul’i t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɑnfuol e, k mɑɑn i mɑntk tien t nilonkɑb k l yɑbt ɑ.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, setk nɑn mɔni e, i tiɑn tɑɑ din tuun tuonɑ nbɑ pɑɑl k lɑɑt fɑlɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ. T din tuun tuonn yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk ɑ tin fit muɑnt Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn k tul’i, ɑ t dɑɑ tie jikl i pɑɑk.
Yinm nɑn Yennu e tie t siɑlɑɑdɑnm k jiin tɑɑ din be nɑn’i nɑn binbeyienŋ nɑn yentinu, k suɑ k fit tɑɑl’t.
I mi nɑn t din be nɑn i suɑ kul, nɑn bɑɑ nɑn u wɑɑs binbenŋ nɑ e,
k cien k biɑ mɑɑnt i pɑlɑ, k tun kpɑɑn’i ɑ ii mɔk binbensiɑk nbɑ sɑɑ gbuo Yennu nunm, wun nbɑ yiin’i ɑ yin kuɑ u tiɑɔnŋ nɑɑn ni k gɑɑl u dontl.

T biɑ tien Yennu niipuouk yuo kul ɑ, k mɑɑn tɑɑ din bɑɑl nɑn Yennu mɑɑn i buol ni, i din k gbɑt’l k gɑɑl’l nɑn nisɑɑlk yɑl nɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn i din gɑɑl’l nɑn l tie Yennu yɑl nɑ e. K l set tie ŋɑnn e nɑn bɑlmɔni, k tuun yinm nbɑ tie Klistuweilɑ nɑ pɑlɑ ni.

T nɑɑ wɑɑs, muksbuolu nbɑ bɑɑl’i nɑ, l muksbuolu mun din bɑɑl Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be Suude tinŋ ni, k tie Yennu yɑb k biɑ tien Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ nnɑ e. I mɔnŋ mɔnŋ niib nbɑ muks’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, *Suifnbɑ mun din muks Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib mɑnŋ nnɑ e.
Ŋɑnm Suifnbɑ e din kpii Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ, k biɑ muks tinm nɑ. B k penn Yennu pɑl ni, k biɑ tie niib kul dɑtɑi e.
B yɑbi b mɔnŋ pɑɑk, ɑ bin guɑl’t k t dɑɑ muɑntl Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn k tien bin nbɑ k tie Suifnbɑ nɑ, ɑ bin lɑ fielu. B ji tun b biit nbɑ k b tuu tuun nɑ gbenn ɑ, k mɔtɑɑnɑ Yennu wutuol bɑɑl b pɑɑk.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, t yɑt lieb k l wei wɑɑn ɑ. Setk nɑn mɔni, t k yɑt lieb dudukt ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t k lɑɑt lieb e, t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ siɑn k tin ŋɑnm lɑ’i. L pɑɑk t ŋɑnm yɑbl ɑ t fit bɑɑl i buol ni.
T set din luon tin bɑɑl i buol ni. Min Pɔul, n mɔnŋ dɑɑn yɑbl ɑ n bɑɑl i buol ni nɑn tɑɑl munŋɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn *Sɑɑtɑn guɑl’t sɔnu.
Ŋmee tie t dindɑnn nɑn t pɑlpienn nɑn t dontl i? Dɑɑl nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ, yinm kɑɑ sii be u tuɑnn ni ii?
Setk nɑn mɔni, i pɑɑk e k t mɔk dontl nɑn pɑlpienn.
L pɑɑk, lɑɑ ji dɑɑn tɑn pɑɑk t nii yuo nbɑ, t dɑɑn sɑk biɑl Atenn duo ni e t kuukuɑ,
k dɑɑn tun t nɑɑ bik Tiimuote, wun nbɑ k tinm nɑn ŋuɑ tɑɑn tuun k tien Yennu, k muɑntl *Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn ɑ wun cie i yɑdɑ k kuɑn’i pɑlɑ,
k lin te k i suɑ dɑɑ ŋmɑt puol muksuk nɑ pɑɑk. I mɔnŋ mi nɑn Yennu e din te k l muksuk bɑɑl’t,
k mɑɑn tɑɑ din dɑɑ be i buol ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, t din yet’i ɑ b tɑn sɑɑ muks’t, k mɔtɑɑnɑ i mɔnŋ mi fɑnu nɑn l set tɑn bɑɑl tie nnɑ e cib cib.
L pɑɑk, lɑɑ dɑɑn tɑn pɑɑk n nii yuo nbɑ, k n dɑɑn tun Tiimuote, ɑ wun sɑɑ lɑ i yɑdɑ nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ. N dɑɑn tiin nɑn pɑsiɑl *Sɑɑtɑn bikn’i k t tuonn nɑ n tien yɑnn e.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ Tiimuote ponŋ jen ɑ, k tul’t lɑbɑɑl nbɑ penn t pɑlɑ ni k jikt sɑɑ i yɑdɑ nɑn i lonm po. U yet’t ɑ i kpɑn tun tiɑn t po e fɑnu, k luon yin lɑ’t nɑn tɑɑ luon tin lɑ’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, t be fɑlɑ nɑn pɑlbiil kul ni, ŋɑɑn tɑɑ gbɑt i yɑdɑ po, l te k t lɑ pɑlcienn.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ, t ŋɑnm be t mɑnfuol ni nɑn yɑɑ set cib Yonmdɑɑnɔ ni nɑ pɑɑk.
Tɑɑ mɔk pɑlpienn Yennu tuɑnn i pɑɑk nɑ, nlee k t sɑɑ fit tul’ɔ niipuouk k lin jɑnŋ i?
Nyiɑɔk nɑn yennu kul t mei’ɔ nɑn t pɑlɑ kul ɑ, ɑ wun te k tin fit pukn’i lin nbɑ tenn i yɑdɑ ni.
T Bɑɑ Yennu tiɑɔnŋ nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu n ŋɑnm sɔnu tul’t k tin fit bɑɑl i buol ni.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ n te k yɑɑ luon i lieb nɑn suɑ kul biɑnŋ nbɑ n yɑbt bonciɑnn nɑn tɑɑ mun luon’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Nnɑ e k u sɑɑ cie i pɑlɑ k yii tie niŋɑnm, k suɑ kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit tɑɑl’i t Bɑɑ Yennu tuɑnn ni, yuo nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑn u yɑb kul ɑ nɑ.
Tɔn, t nɑɑ wɑɑs, i din tumi t penŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ k i sii tuun k pent Yennu pɑl ni, k nnɑ e k i ji tuun. Mɔtɑɑnɑ, t bɑln’mi e k kpɑɑn’i Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni, ɑ ii ŋɑnmt kii tuun nnɑ mɑn,
k mɑɑn i mi kpɑɑni nbɑ k t din tul’i Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn ni nɑ.
K mɑɑn Yennu luon k yii tie niŋɑnm k dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ.
I suɑ kul n bɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ kuɑn puo nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, k lii biɑ kii mɔk bɑɑkl,
k dɑɑ tuun nnɑ nɑn niɑnbiiuk binbenŋ nɑn bin nbɑ k mi Yennu nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Suɑ dɑɑ tuun biil u luɑ nbɑ wɑɑ *Klistu nɑn l biit buolu ni, ɑmi kii ŋmɑb u luɑ. T ponŋ din yet’i l po wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn biɑ kpɑɑn’i nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ Yennu tɑn sɑɑ dɑt bin nbɑ tuun l biit buolu nɑ tubɑ.
Yennu k yiin’t ɑ tii tie biitdɑnm kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u yɑɑ tii be bɑnnu nbɑ k u tiɑɔnŋ yɑb be nɑ e.
L pɑɑk, wun nbɑ yet wɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, l k tie nisɑɑlk yɑl kɑɑ k u yien, ŋɑɑn u yien Yennu nbɑ tien’i u Foŋɑnm nɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e.
L k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tin diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tiɑl’i yɑɑ sii luon i lieb biɑnŋ nbɑ. Yennu mɔnŋ e ponŋ wɑnn’i biɑnŋ nbɑ k i sii luon i lieb.
K i ponŋ set tuun l biɑnŋ e nɑ, k luon t nɑɑ wɑɑs kul nbɑ be Mɑɑseduɑnn tinŋ ni nɑ. Ŋɑɑn, t nɑɑ wɑɑs, t ŋɑnm k bɑln’mi e ɑ i ŋɑnm kot.
I yɑbl i mɔnŋ kii be suon nnɑ, k i bɑkɑ i be i mɔnŋ tuonɑ ni, kii tuun i tiɑɔnŋ tuonɑ kii di, nɑn tɑɑ ponŋ din yet’i biɑnŋ nbɑ sinsinn nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k bin nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɑ nɑ n tul’i nibɑɑkl, k l ji kii kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k yin juɑb i mɔnŋ k denn suɑ i bonlonkɑ pɑɑk.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, t luon k yin bɑnn bɑlmɔni e k jikt sɑɑ Klistuweilɑ nbɑ kpo nɑ po, k dɑɑ mɔk pɑlbiil nɑn bin nbɑ k mɔk dindɑnn nɑ.
T tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu din kpo ŋɑɑn biɑ fiil kuun ni wɑɑ, k t biɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yennu tɑn sɑɑ fiin Yiesu nɑn bin nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ ŋɑɑn kpo nɑ kuun ni wɑɑ.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, t wɑnn’i nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ jenu dɑɑl, tinm nbɑ tɑn sii be t mɑnfuol ni nɑ kɑn dɔnŋ bin nbɑ din kpo nɑ.
k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ tiɑɔnŋ tɑn sɑɑ nyi *Yendɔunŋ ni k sik nɑn tintiɑnpɑɑli, nɑn mɑlɑkɑ sɑɑkuɑ kunkɔl e, nɑn Yennu kɑtkɑɑk mɔni, k Klistuweilɑ nbɑ din kpo nɑ tɑn sɑɑ fiil sinsinn.
L puolpo k tinm nbɑ tɑn sii be t mɑnfuol ni nɑ nɑn ŋɑnm tɑn sɑɑ cet Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnpɑɑpo sɑnpɑgbɑnt ni k t kul tɑn sɑɑ tɑɑn nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ kii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
L pɑɑk, ii diɑ mɑɑn nɑ kii cien i lieb pɑlɑ mɑn.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, l k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tin diɑn wɑnn’i yuo nbɑ k lin nbɑ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun,
k mɑɑn i mɔnŋ ponŋ mi fɑnu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ jenu dɑɑl mɑnŋ tɑn sii tie nɑn nɑn-yukɔ nbɑ tuu bɑɑt nyiɑɔk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
Yuo nbɑ k niib tɑn sii yien ɑ: «Mɑnu nɑn lɑɑfiɑ be nɑ,» l yuo mɑnŋ e k biilu tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl’b yiɑn ɑ nɑn mɑtyiɑlu nbɑ bɑɑt puo biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn b tɑn kɑn fit fɑt b mɔnŋ l bɑlbiiuk ni.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, yinm k be bunbɔnn ni kɑɑ. L pɑɑk, l dɑɑl tɑn kii tie nɑn nɑn-yukɔ bɑɑlu nɑ kɑɑ i buol ni,
k mɑɑn i kul tie yentu wɑɑs e. T k tie nyiɑɔk yɑb kɑɑ, k biɑ k tie bunbɔnn yɑb kɑɑ.
L pɑɑk, t dɑɑ duɑ guɑnt nɑn nisiɑb nbɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn tii nyɔi kii diɑ t mɔnŋ,
k mɑɑn bin nbɑ guɑnt nɑ guɑnt nyiɑɔk o, k bin nbɑ nyu dɑɑn yib nɑ mun yib nyiɑɔk.
Ŋɑɑn tinm nbɑ tie yennu ni yɑb nɑ, tii diɑ t mɔnŋ, k jii yɑdɑ nɑn lonm liɑ nɑn *nɑɑgbɑnkɔnŋl nɑ, k biɑ jii fielu dindɑnn k yi’l nɑn kut-foklk nɑ.
K mɑɑn Yennu k gɑnn’t ɑ wun tɑn dɑt t tubɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u gɑnn’t ɑ tin lɑ fielu t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu pɑɑk e.
Ŋuɑ e din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo, ɑ t i lek i kpo ɑmi t i be u jenu yuo mɑnŋ, tinm nɑn ŋuɑ n tɑn tɑɑn kii be.
L pɑɑk, ii kuɑnt i lieb pɑlɑ k tul i lieb pɑlcienn nɑn yɑɑ tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, ii bɑɑkt bin nbɑ tuun tuonn i sinsuuk ni, bin nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ cɑb’b yiikuo, ɑ bii tie i yudɑnm u sɔnu ni, kii tien’i kpɑɑni nɑ.
Ii tien’m nibɑɑkl nɑn lonm nbɑ yɑb, k mɑɑn b tuonɑ nbɑ k b tuun nɑ pɑɑk. I mɔnŋ i be nɑn i lieb nɑn mɑnu mɑn.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, i kpɑɑn gbɑn-nyɑkdɑnm, kii cien jɑŋmɑɑndɑnm pɑlɑ, kii sonmt tɑli, kii di suklu nɑn suɑ kul ɑ.
I kpɑn dɑɑ tuun biit k jiint biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn i te k lii tie i lol yuo kul nɑn yin tun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k tul i lieb nɑn suɑ kul mɑn.
Ii mɔk pɑlpienn yuo kul mɑn,
kii mei Yennu yuo kul mɑn,
kii tien Yennu niipuouk bonsiɑl kul ni, k mɑɑn ŋɑnn e tie Yennu nbɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, yɑɑ be Yiesu Klistu ni nɑ.
I dɑɑ biil Foŋɑnm tuonn.
I dɑɑ sɑlkt *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn,
ŋɑɑn i tuu mint ɑ k bikn bonsiɑl kul, k gɑɑl lin nbɑ ŋɑn,
k lɔkt biit buolu kul ɑ.
Yennu nbɑ tien’t mɑnu nɑ tiɑɔnŋ n te k yii tie u yɑb cɑin, kii diɑ i sei nɑn i mɑnfuol nɑn i gbɑnɑnt mun, k l dɑɑ mɔk biit t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu jenu mɑnŋ po.
Wun nbɑ yiin’i nɑ sɑɑ sɑk tun nnɑ, k mɑɑn u tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ e.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, ii mei Yennu k tul’t mɑn.
I fuont Klistuweilɑ nɑ kul ɑ k kpɑmi nɑn nɑɑtɑɑnn.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn ni k n kpɑɑn’i, i lii kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ tul Klistuweilɑ kul.
T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i.
Min Pɔul nɑn Siilɑɑs nɑn Tiimuote dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ, k tien Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be Tesɑɑluoniik, k biɑ tie t Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistuyɑb nɑ.
Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i, k biɑ tul’i mɑnu.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn tii tien Yennu niipuouk yuo kul i pɑɑk. T i tuun nnɑ, l ŋɑn, k mɑɑn i yɑdɑ mɑntk puki bonciɑnn, k yɑɑ mɔk lonm nbɑ k tien i lieb nɑ puki.
L pɑɑk te k t mɔk yugontl i pɑɑk Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sinsuuk ni, nɑn yɑɑ lɑɑt muksuk nɑn fɑlɑ ŋɑɑn mɔk gbɑnkul nɑn yɑdɑ nɑ.
Nɑ kul wɑnt nɑn Yennu nbɑ din senn nɑn wɑɑ sɑɑ tun bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ ŋɑn, k l pɑɑk i sɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn yin kuɑ u nɑɑn nbɑ k i di fɑlɑ l pɑɑk nɑ ni.
Yennu e tuun lin nbɑ tuok, k tɑn sɑɑ te k bin nbɑ dint’i fɑlɑ mɑnŋ nɑ n mun di fɑlɑ nnɑ,
k fɑt yinm nbɑ di fɑlɑ nɑ k tul’i fuon, k mun biɑ fɑt’t k tul’t fuon. Nɑ kul sɑɑ tien yuo nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt nɑn u yɑbnt mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ.
U tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl muu nbɑ yɑb sinsuuk ni k dɑt bin nbɑ yet bin bɑnn Yennu nɑn bin nbɑ k sɑk t Yonmdɑɑnɔ lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ tubɑ.
U sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ k biil’b yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu k b sii fɔk nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn u yiikuo nbɑ yɑb,
dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k gɑɑl dontl nɑn pɑku u weilɑ kul nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ k tie u tiɑɔnŋ yɑb nɑ buol ni. I mun tɑn sii be b sinsuuk ni e, k mɑɑn i ponŋ tien mɑɑn nbɑ k t din tul’i nɑ yɑdɑ wɑɑ.

L pɑɑk e k t mei Yennu yuo kul k tien’i. T mei’ɔ, ɑ wun te k yin jɑnŋ nɑn binbenŋ nbɑ k u yiin’i, ɑ i be lenŋ nɑ ni e. T mei’ɔ, ɑ wun jii u yiikuo k te k yii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ kul nbɑ k i luon, ɑ yii tuun nɑ, k gbenn tuonɑ kul nbɑ k i tuun i yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ.
Ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu sɑnn nɑ n lɑ dontl i sinsuuk ni, k yin mun lɑ dontl u buol ni. Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ o nɑ.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, k jikt sɑɑ t Yonmdɑɑnɔ jenu mɑnŋ nɑn tinm nɑn ŋuɑ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ cet lieb k tɑɑn be nɑ po,

t bɑln’mi e, i dɑɑ mɔk jijiet i pɑlɑ ni ɑmi gbɑnɑnjijekt nɑn nisiɑb nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ Yomdɑɑnɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ ponŋ bɑɑl ɑ nɑ. L pɑsiɑl b yien’i ɑ tinm din yet nnɑ sɔkni mɑɑn wɑnnu ni, ɑmi muɑnti ni, ɑmi kɑdɑɑɔk ni.
I dɑɑ te k suɑ kpɑnn’i nɑn wɑɑn ɑ, k mɑɑn l dɑɑl kɑn bɑɑl sie k mɔyetuk yuo bɑɑl sinsinn, k *Klistu dɑtɑɑk nbɑ k Yennu sɑɑ biil’ɔ muu ni nɑ, n nyi pɑɑnu.
U tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn lin nbɑ kul k niib jiɑntl’l, nɑn lin nbɑ kul k niib duki nɑn l tie Yennu. U tɑn sɑɑ kɔn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ kuɑ Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni, k kɑl k pul u mɔnŋ Yennu.
Mɑɑ din be i buol ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, n din yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ. I k tiɑn ii?
Ŋɑɑn siɑl e lek dɑɑ diɑ’u, k i mi lɑɑ tie lin nbɑ, ŋɑɑn k u tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu yuo nbɑ k Yennu tiɑɔnŋ din senn nɑ e.
Bonbiil wuol ni yiikuo ponŋ tuun u tuonn, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien, dɑɑ kɑn tien, sie k wun nbɑ dɑɑ te k l k fit tie nɑ tɑn bot sinsinn.
L yuo mɑnŋ k Klistu dɑtɑɑk sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu ni, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu n kpi’u nɑn u mɔb ni wɑn, k biil’ɔ nɑn u bɑɑlu yentciɑɔnŋ.
Klistu dɑtɑɑk mɑnŋ tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn *Sɑɑtɑn yiikuo e k tun fɑɑk bɑktnɔunŋ tuonɑ nɑn yɑɑl-lituk tuonɑ,
nɑn tuonbiit buolu kul nbɑ kpɑnn bin nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ biil’b nɑ. B tɑn sɑɑ lɑ biilu, k mɑɑn b k gɑɑl, k biɑ k luon bɑlmɔni nbɑ bo sɑɑ fiel’b nɑ.
L pɑɑk e te k Yennu te k fɑɑk yiikuo tuun b ni, ɑ bin tien lin nbɑ tie fɑɑk nɑ yɑdɑ.
L pɑɑk, Yennu tɑn sɑɑ biil bin nbɑ kul k tien bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ yɑdɑ ŋɑɑn luon bonbiil tumu nɑ.

T nɑɑ wɑɑs, yinm nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ luon’i nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k t pɑk Yennu yuo kul i pɑɑk, k mɑɑn Yennu din lukt’i pinpiik ni e wɑɑ, ɑ yin lɑ fielu Foŋɑnm nbɑ tien’i Yennu tiɑɔnŋ yɑb nɑn yɑɑ tien lɑbɑmɑnn yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
Tɑɑ din muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k tul’i nɑ, Yennu din yiin’i, ɑ yin lɑ dontl nbɑ tie t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu tiɑɔnŋ yɑl e.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, l pɑɑk, setl mɑn cib, k diɑ wɑnnu nbɑ k t din wɑnn’i t mɑɑn ni, nɑn t kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ.
T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu tiɑɔnŋ nɑn t Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ luon’t, k tul’t pɑlcienn nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑn dindɑnn nbɑ ŋɑn, u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ,
n cie i pɑlɑ k tul’i pɑnŋ k yin fit tun lin nbɑ kul ŋɑn i bontitiet nɑn i mɑɑn ni.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, lin nbɑ juont tie nnɑ e, ii mei Yennu mɑn k Yonmdɑɑnɔ lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ n lin yiɑn yiɑn k niib n gɑɑl’l nɑn bɑɑkl, nɑn lɑɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ i buol ni nɑ.
Ii biɑ kii mei Yennu k wun nyinn’t nifobiit nɑn biitdɑnm nuu ni, k mɑɑn l k tie suɑ kul kɑɑ tien lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ yɑdɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ e, k sɑɑ tul’i pɑnŋ kii guu’i k *Klistu dɑtɑɑk kɑn fit tien’i siɑl.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑɑk, k t mi nɑn i tuun tɑɑ din yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ, kii biɑ sii tuun nnɑ yuo kul ɑ.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ n sonm’i k yin bɑnn Yennu nbɑ luon’t biɑnŋ nbɑ, k biɑ sonm’i k yin bɑnn suklu nbɑ k Klistu tien’t nɑ.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni e k t yien’i, i nyinn i mɔnŋ t nɑɑ wɑsiɑt nbɑ tie gbɑn-nyɑkdɑnm, k biɑ k wɑɑ wɑnnu nbɑ k t din tul’i nɑ sinsuuk ni.
I mɔnŋ ponŋ mi fɑnu nɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k yii tuun nɑn tɑɑ din tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Tɑɑ din be i buol ni nɑ, t din k tiin gbɑn-nyɑkl.
T din k mi dii suɑ jiet k k pɑ l pɑɑk. Ŋɑɑn t kpɑn din tuun e k nyi nɑɑɔk yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk, ɑ t dɑɑ tie jikl i pɑɑk.
Tɑɑ din tuun nnɑ mɑnŋ nɑ, l k wɑnt nɑn t k mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ boi sonml po kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t din tun nnɑ ɑ tin wɑnn’i lɑɑ mun sii ŋɑn k yin tun biɑnŋ nbɑ e.
Setk nɑn mɔni, tɑɑ din be i buol ni nɑ, t din tuu tun yien’i ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul k tuun tuonn, l dɑɑnɔ k jɑnŋ nɑn wun di jiet.»
T yien’i lin nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn t gbiɑ, ɑ nisiɑb be i sinsuuk ni k k luon tuonɑ, ŋɑɑn k lin kuɑ b lieb mɑɑn ni e.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑnn ni e k t yien niib mɑnŋ k kpɑɑn’m ɑ bii tuun tuonn yuo kul ɑ, k fit b mɔnŋ.
T nɑɑ wɑɑs, ii mi k i bɑk nɑn tuonŋɑnɑ tumu mɑn.
L i tie k suɑ k sɑɑk kpɑɑni nbɑ be kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, yin bɑnn l dɑɑnɔ k dɑɑ nɑki’ɔ k wun tɑn di fei.
I dɑɑ tie’u nɑn u tie i dɑtɑɑk e nɑ, ŋɑɑn i kpɑɑn’ɔ nɑn i nɑɑ bik nɑ.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ wun nbɑ tien’t mɑnu nɑ n tul’i mɑnu yuo kul, siɑl kul ɑ ni. Yonmdɑɑnɔ i be nɑn i kul.
Min Pɔul dɑ fuonti mɑnŋ nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ nuu e, k ŋɑnn e tie n kɑdɑɑt kul *siɑlɑ. Mɑɑ tuu dɑ bɑnnu nbɑ e nɑ.
T Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i kul.
Min Pɔul tie Yiesu *Klistu *tuomi, k mɑɑn t Fietuɑ Yennu nɑn Yiesu Klistu wun nbɑ tie t dindɑnn nɑ tul’n mɔb.
Min e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien fin Tiimuote, wun nbɑ tie n bimɔnŋ, yɑdɑ tienu ni nɑ. Yennu wun nbɑ tie Bɑɑ nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn nyikcɑbu nɑn’ɑ, k biɑ tul’ɑ mɑnu.
Ii be Efes nɑn mɑɑ ponŋ din yet’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ yuo nbɑ k n din sɑɑ Mɑɑseduɑnn nɑ, ɑ ɑ te k nisiɑb nbɑ wɑnt wɑnbuolgɑnu nɑ n nyik’l
k dɑɑ fiin b yejɑnm ni bɑlkpelɑ nbɑ tie fɑɑk nɑ po nɑn b yejɑnm sɑnɑ kɑnu po. Ŋɑnn e bɑɑt nɑn mɔniɑɔk k k sonmt nilɔ k u bɑnt Yennu nbɑ lol, ɑ niib n lɑ fielu bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. Yɑdɑ pɑɑk e te k b bɑnn’l.
N kpɑɑni mɑnŋ pɑɑk tie lin fiin nilɔ pɑl ni lonm nbɑ nyuɑn bon-yenn kuɑ, nɑn *dudukŋɑnt nɑn mɔmɔnm yɑdɑ.
Nisiɑb nyik lin nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn bot kuɑ jɑt-lɑbɑfɑɑnu ni.
B luon bii tie Yennu *senniwɑntieb e, ŋɑɑn k k mi b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mɔbonɑ pɑɑk, k biɑ k mi bɑɑ piɑk lin nbɑ po mɑnŋ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn b yien ɑ l tie bɑlmɔni e.
T mi nɑn *senni mɑnŋ ŋɑn, l i tie k nilɔ tuun nɑn’n Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.

I tiɑn nɑn senni k sie bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni nɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l sie bin nbɑ tie mɔyetdɑnm nɑ pɑɑk e, nɑn bin nbɑ k tiin Yennu, nɑn biitdɑnm pɑɑk, nɑn jɑknt dɑnm, nɑn bin nbɑ k tien Yennu nibɑɑkl pɑɑk, nɑn bin nbɑ kpi b bɑɑnbɑ nɑn b nɑɑnbɑ, nɑn nikpiilɑ,

nɑn boncunconɑ pɑɑk, nɑn bin nbɑ mɔk niɑɔnŋ k duɑ nɑn b jɑlieb, nɑn bin nbɑ tie dɑɑbɑ kpinkpounŋ, nɑn bin nbɑ tie fɑɑk dɑnm, nɑn bin nbɑ tuu senn mɔsonɑ ŋɑɑn tɑn kɑn gbien nɑ, nɑn lin nbɑ kul k wɑɑ bɑlmɔni wɑnnu pɑɑk.
Bɑlmɔni wɑnnu mɑnŋ nyii Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k Yennu din tul’n ɑ n muɑnt nɑ ni e, lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ piɑk Yennu nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn dontl kul, k tie wun nbɑ tul’t bonŋɑnɑ kul nɑ po.
N tien t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu wun nbɑ tul’n pɑnŋ, ɑ mɑn tun u tuonɑ niipuouk, k mɑɑn ŋuɑ e yet ɑ n jɑnŋ nɑn u tuonɑ mɑnŋ, k te k n tuun tien’ɔ,
mɑɑ lek din piɑk bonbiil k jiin u po k muks’ɔ k suki’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑɑn u din tin’n ninbɑɑɔk k mɑɑn n din k tien yɑdɑ k biɑ k mi mɑɑ din tuun lin nbɑ.
T Yonmdɑɑnɔ din tɑn tin’n ninbɑɑɔk nbɑ yɑb k kɑɑ biknu, k tul’n yɑdɑ nɑn lonm nbɑ k t mɔk Yiesu Klistu ni nɑ pɑɑk.
Gotl mɑn, lɑbɑɑl nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni k ŋɑn nɑn niib kul n gɑɑl’l e nɑ: Yiesu Klistu din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ wun tɑn fiel biitdɑnm e, k min e bi k gɑl b kul ɑ.
Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk k Yennu din tin’n ninbɑɑɔk, ɑ min nbɑ tie biitdɑnm yudɑɑnɔ nɑ ni, Yiesu Klistu n fit wɑnn u suklu nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk k tul bin nbɑ sii tie’u yɑdɑ bii mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Tɔn, k mɔtɑɑnɑ Kpɑnbɑl nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k kɑn mi kpo, k suɑ k lɑɑt’ɔ, k u kuukuɑ tie Yennu, ŋuɑ e ŋɑn nɑn sɑnn nɑn dontl nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.
N bik Tiimuote, n jikt kpɑɑni mɑnŋ k tie ɑ nuu ni, k l tɑɑ nɑn sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din pɑk ɑ po siɑn yuo nbɑ gɑl nɑ. Jiin mɑɑn mɑnŋ k tien’l ɑ jɑtiɑt k kɔn kunkɔnŋɑnn,
kii diɑ ɑ yɑdɑ nɑn tuntŋɑnn nbɑ k suɑ k fit tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk. Nisiɑb yet lin nbɑ nɑ, k ŋɑɑn k b yɑdɑ biil.
B siɑb e tie Hiimene nɑn Aleksɑndl, k n dɑɑn jii’b tien’m *Sɑɑtɑn nuu ni, ɑ bin bɑnn nɑn l ŋɑn bin nyik bɑɑ tuu piɑk biil bɑnnu nbɑ k jiin Yennu po.
L pɑɑk, sinsinn n wɑnn’ɑ nɑn l ŋɑn k niib ii mei Yennu, kii boi’ɔ bonɑ po, kii tien’ɔ niipuouk niib kul ɑ pɑɑk.
Ii mei Yennu kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑn bin nbɑ kul tie yiikuo dɑnm nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ tin fit kii be nɑn lɑɑfiɑ nɑn mɑnu, kii tie Yennu yɑb cɑin, kii mɔk binbenŋ nbɑ k niib k fit tɑɑl’t l pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn e ŋɑn k pent t Fietuɑ Yennu pɑl ni,
wun nbɑ luon k suɑ kul n lɑ fielu k tɑn bɑnn bɑlmɔni nbɑ tie lin nbɑ,
k mɑɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be, k sindɑntinnɔ tie yenɔ kuɑ k be Yennu nɑn nisɑɑlk sinsuuk ni. L dɑɑnɔ e tie juɑ nbɑ tie Yiesu *Klistu
wun nbɑ din jii u mɔnŋ k pɑ suɑ kul pɑɑk, ɑ wun nyinn’b dɑɑbs ni. Ŋɑnn e din tie *siɑlɑ yuo nbɑ k Yennu luon.
L pɑɑk k Yennu lukt’n k n tien Klistu tiɑɔnŋ *tuomi k wɑnn bin nbɑ k tie *Suifnbɑ lin nbɑ tie yɑdɑ nɑn lin nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni. N k fɑ fɑɑk kɑɑ. L tie bɑlmɔni e.
N luon k jɑb ii mei Yennu siɑn nbɑ kul k bin donn b nii kii mei Yennu k siɑl ɑ jɑknt dɑɑ be b pɑlɑ ni k mɔniɑɔk nɑn wutuol biɑ dɑɑ be b sinsuuk ni.

N biɑ luon k puob ii liɑ tiɑt nɑn sikn-n-mɔnŋ nɑn bɑnnu nbɑ k niib kɑn fit tɑɑl’b l pɑɑk nɑ. B dɑɑ loln yut nɑn jɑpɑɑt, k dɑɑ piil sɑlnbɑnɑ k biɑ dɑɑ tuu sɑlmɑ tuutuutɑ k biɑ dɑɑ liɑ liɑnt nbɑ dɑɑɔk pɑɑl,
ŋɑɑn kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ nɑn puob nbɑ wɑnn b mɔnŋ nɑn b cɔln Yennu nɑ.
Puob ii ŋmin kii gɑɑn wɑnnu nɑn cɔlnt kul ɑ.
N k cɑb puo ɑ wun jii wɑnnu k tul juɑ ɑmi wuu mɔk yiikuo juɑ pɑɑk. Sie k wuu ŋmin.
K mɑɑn Yennu din dɔnŋ nɑn Adɑn e sinsinn, k l puolpo wɑɑ, k u nɑn Ef.
L din k tie Adɑn kɑɑ k *Sɑɑtɑn kpɑnn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn u din kpɑnn puo e k u din biil Yennu *senni.
Ŋɑɑn puo sɑɑ lɑ fielu, wɑɑ mɑl wɑɑs bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ ni, l i tie k u tien Yiesu yɑdɑ, k luon niib, k be binbenŋ nbɑ k niib k fit tɑɑl’ɔ l pɑɑk nɑ ni.
Bɑli nbɑ nɑ tie bɑlmɔni e, k jɑsuɑ nbɑ luon k wun tien *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib yudɑɑnɔ, l tie tuonŋɑnn e k u luon.

L k ŋɑn k yudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ ii tuun lin nbɑ k niib sɑɑ fit tɑɑl’ɔ l pɑɑk. L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k wuu mɔk puo yenɔ kuɑ, kii tie wun nbɑ fit diɑ u mɔnŋ, kii tie wun nbɑ k niib tien’ɔ nibɑɑkl, kii gɑɑn sɑɑnm u ŋɑɑk ni kii cɑntl’b, kii tie wun nbɑ sɑɑ fit tumi niib fɑnu,
k dɑɑ yib dɑɑn, k dɑɑ tie kunkɔnkɔnnuk ŋɑɑn kii be suon nnɑ, k dɑɑ luon mɔniɑɔk, k biɑ dɑɑ mɔk niɑnciɑɔnŋ nɑn likli.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k wun fit kii diɑ u mɔnŋ ŋɑɑtieb fɑnu, k te k u wɑɑs n sɑk u mɔb nɑn cɔlnt.
Ŋɑɑdɑɑnɔ i kii mi wɑɑ sɑɑ diɑ u ŋɑɑk niib biɑnŋ nbɑ, nlee k u sɑɑ fit diɑ Yennu mɔtɑɑɔk niib i?
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k u dɑɑ tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ gɑɑl Klistu k l dɑɑ k wei. Nnɑ e i kɑɑ, u tɑn sii mɔk kɑlnbɑɑni k wɑnt u mɔnŋ k tɑn lɑ tubdɑtu nbɑ k *Sɑɑtɑn lɑ nɑ.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k wuu tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k bin nbɑ k wɑɑ Klistu nɑ n yet ɑ u binbenŋ ŋɑn, k u dɑɑ mi di fei k *Sɑɑtɑn bɑluk tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn k suol’ɔ.
L biɑ kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k jɑɑnti ni * sonmtieb ii mun ii tie jɑb nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn niib n bɑɑk’b e, kii tie mɔmɔnm dɑnm, k dɑɑ nyu dɑɑn bonciɑnn, k biɑ dɑɑ luon bin lɑ nyuɑt fɑɑk tuonɑ pɑɑk.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k bii diɑ bɑlmɔni nbɑ k t yɑdɑ wɑnn’t nɑ, k dɑɑ mɔk bilsuk.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib n bik’m, k b i kii lɑ lin nbɑ b sɑɑ fit tɑɑl’b l pɑɑk, b sɑɑ fit kii tuun nɑn jɑɑnti niib sonmtieb nɑ.
Nnɑ e mun, b puob sii tie bin nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn niib n bɑɑk’b, k dɑɑ tie bonbiil-pɑklɑ, ŋɑɑn kii be suon nnɑ kii tie bin nbɑ luon bɑlmɔni e.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k jɑɑnti niib * sonmtuɑ i mɔk puo yenɔ kuɑ, k biɑ fit diɑ u wɑɑs nɑn u ŋɑɑk niib fɑnu.
B i tuun b tuonɑ fɑnu b sii mɔk nibɑɑkl k biɑ k mɔk bilsuk yuo nbɑ k b wɑnt niib bɑɑ tien Yiesu yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
Mɑɑ dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ tien’ɑ nɑ, n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn mɑn bɑɑl mɔtɑɑnɑ k lɑ’ɑ,

ŋɑɑn l i wei k n k bɑɑl, kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ sii mi niib nbɑ sii diɑ b mɔnŋ bɑnnu nbɑ Yennu ŋɑɑtieb sinsuuk ni. N piɑk mɑnfodɑɑnɔ Yennu mɔtɑɑɔk niib po e. Ŋuɑ guu’b k biɑ tie fiɑkl nbɑ k bɑlmɔni set l pɑɑk nɑ.

Nn, l tie mɔni e, bɑktnɔunŋ minu nbɑ k yɑdɑ tien tinm nɑ yɑb: Klistu din bɑɑl k tie nisɑɑlk e, k tie bɑlmɔndɑɑnɔ, Foŋɑnm e din wɑnn nnɑ. Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ din lɑ’u wɑɑ, k niib din muɑnt u lɑbɑɑl k tul nibuolu kul, k b tien’ɔ yɑdɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k * *Yendɔunŋ ni k Yennu tul’ɔ *yudɑnt.
Tɔn, Foŋɑnm pɑk k yent’t ɑ: dɑjuonti dɑɑ ni, nisiɑb sɑɑ nyik b yɑdɑ nɑn *Klistu nɑ wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑk wɑɑ nɑlnbiit nbɑ kpɑnn’b nɑ, k biɑ wɑɑ nɑlnbiit wɑnnu.
L dɑnm bot kpinkpɑni dɑnm mɑnŋ pɑɑk ɑ. K kpinkpɑni dɑnm mɑnŋ yɑn ni ji kpo k kɑb nɑn bɑɑ tuu jii kut-tont k fiɑ bonn nɑ.

L nibuolu wɑnt, ɑ jɑkunt nɑn puokuɑnt k ŋɑn, ɑ k jesiɑt biɑ k ŋɑn nɑn dinu. Ŋɑɑn tinm nbɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ k biɑ mi l bɑlmɔni nɑ, mi nɑn Yennu din nɑn jebuolu kul ɑ, ɑ niib n tuu tul’ɔ niipuouk l pɑɑk e ŋɑɑn di.
Bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn nɑ ŋɑn. T tuu tul’ɔ niipuouk l pɑɑk ŋɑɑn gɑɑl’l, k dɑɑ yien siɑl,
k mɑɑn Yennu mɑɑn nɑn yenmiɑlu pɑɑk e te k l ŋɑn Yennu buol ni.
L i tie k ɑ jii wɑnnu nbɑ nɑ k tul t nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ, ɑ sii tie Klistu tuontunŋɑnɔ nbɑ dint u mɔnŋ nɑn Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn mɔbonɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni wɑnnu nbɑ k ɑ wɑɑ fɑnu nɑ e.
Ŋɑɑn yet fɑɑk lɑbɑɑl nbɑ sɑɑ te k ɑ yɑdɑ n bɑɑ. Yɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ pɑɑk kii be bɑnnu nbɑ sii gbuot Yennu nunm.
Lin nbɑ k nilɔ tuun k be lɑɑfiɑ ni mɔk nyuɑt wɑɑnm-nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ k u tuun k be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuo Yennu nunm nɑ mɔk nyuɑt bonɑ kul ni, k sonmt’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ.
Lin nbɑ nɑ tie bɑlmɔni e, k l ŋɑn nɑn niib kul n gɑɑl’l.
L pɑɑk e te k t gbɑɑ k tuun nɑn ninmɔnn k mɑɑn t mɔk dindɑnn Yennu nbɑ fo ni, wun nbɑ tie suɑ kul Fietuɑ, k u set sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ fielu wɑɑ.
Wɑnt’b k kpɑɑn’m lin nbɑ nɑ kul ɑ.
Dɑɑ te k suɑ n siɑn’ɑ k mɑɑn fɑɑ pɔ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn te k ɑ pinpɑɔk nɑn ɑ binbenŋɑnŋ, nɑn ɑ lonm, nɑn ɑ yɑdɑ, nɑn fɑɑ wei Yennu *senni bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, n wɑnn Klistuweilɑ bɑɑ bo sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Jiin ɑ yuo k lii Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’b k biɑ wɑnn’b l pɑɑk, kii muɑntl Klistu mɑɑn mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl.
Dɑɑ tɑnmt Foŋɑnm piini nbɑ be ɑ ni k ɑ din gɑɑl’l sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn pɑɑk yuo nbɑ k *sɑɑkɑb din yii b nii ɑ pɑɑk nɑ.
Ii tuun lin nbɑ nɑ nɑn ninmɔnn, k suɑ kul n lɑ ɑ puknu.
Ii mi ɑ mɔnŋ nɑn ɑ wɑnnu po. Ii wɑki l kul ni. Setk nɑn mɔni, ɑ i tuun nnɑ ɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu ɑ mɔnŋ k bin nbɑ gbiintl ɑ mɑɑn nɑ mun sɑɑ lɑ fielu wɑɑ.
L i tie k ɑ yɑɑ ɑ tɑɑl jɑkpelsuɑ, ɑ dɑɑ yɑki nɑn’ɔ, ŋɑɑn pɑk tul’ɔ nɑn ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ bɑɑ nɑ. Ii be nɑn nɑɑsinm nɑn ɑ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ,
kii be nɑn puokpelɑ nɑn b tie ɑ nɑɑnbɑ e nɑ, kii be nɑn puopɑɑni nɑn b tie ɑ niipuob e nɑ, kii be nɑn b kul ɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k suɑ kɑn fit tɑɑl’ɑ nɑn wɑɑn ɑ.
Ii tien pɑkɔi nbɑ be b kuukuɑ nɑ nibɑɑkl,

ŋɑɑn pɑkɔsuɑ nbɑ mɔk wɑɑs ɑmi yɑɑbuonɑ, u wɑɑs ɑmi u yɑɑbuonɑ n tun tuonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k b yɑdɑ nɑn *Klistu wɑnn’b nɑ sinsinn k tul b mɔnŋ ŋei ni. Nnɑ e k b dɑnm mun sɑɑ di b niwubt nyuɑt, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ k Yennu luon e nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn mɔmɔnm pɑkuɑk nbɑ kɑɑ suɑ nɑ, u dindɑnn be Yennu ni, k u mei Yennu sonml po yennu ni nɑn nyiɑɔk.
Ŋɑɑn pɑkuɑk nbɑ tuun gbɑnɑnt lonm, u ponŋ kpo e wɑɑ ŋɑɑn dɑɑ be mɑnŋ.
Tuln niib wɑnnu nɑ; k suɑ dɑɑ fit tɑɑl’b.
Wun nbɑ k goli u nikpiinm, ɑmi lin nbɑ mɑntk gɑl tie u kii fiin u mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ŋɑɑk niib po, l dɑɑnɔ ji yet u yɑdɑ wɑɑ, k wun nbɑ k tien Klistu yɑdɑ sɔ’u.
A dɑɑ kɑɑn pɑkuɑk nbɑ dɑɑ k kpet gɑl binɑ piinluob nɑ k kuɑnt pɑkɔi kɑnn ni. K biɑ jen ɑ, l ŋɑn k wuu tie puo nbɑ mi k kun jɑyenɔ kuɑ e,
kii mɔk sɑnŋɑnn u tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk, kii tie wun nbɑ wubl u wɑɑs fɑnu, k tuu gɑɑn sɑɑnm u ŋɑɑk ni, k tuu wu Klistuyɑb tɑɑ, k tuu sonmt tɑlɑs-dɑnm, k tuu tuun tuonŋɑnɑ buolu kul.
Ŋɑɑn ɑ dɑɑ puki puopɑɑni nbɑ tie pɑkɔi b kɑnn ni, k mɑɑn b gbɑnɑnt lonm i nyɑnn b Klistuweiu, b tuu luon bin kun jɑb e,
k ji pot b mɔsonn nbɑ k b din senn tul’ɔ sinsinn nɑ, k ji kuɑ biit ni l pɑɑk.
Lin nbɑ pukn, bɑɑ k mɔk tuonn nɑ, k b lin k luɑn ŋei, l k tie bɑɑ k mɔk tuonn kuukuɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn b biɑ lin k piɑk mɑyɑnɑ k kuɑ lin nbɑ k lɑ’b ni, k piɑk bɑlkpiennɑ.
L pɑɑk, min bo sii luon k puopɑɑni nbɑ tie pɑkɔi nɑ n kun jɑb e k mɑl wɑɑs, k got b ŋei fɑnu, k t dɑtɑi dɑɑ lɑɑt yɑɑk k piɑk biit jiint t po,
k mɑɑn pɑkɔsiɑb ponŋ tunn wɑɑ *Sɑɑtɑn e.
Ŋɑɑn puosuɑ nbɑ tie Klistuweilɔ k pɑkɔi be u ŋɑɑk ni, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn wun got’b fɑnu, k dɑɑ jikt’b k jint Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib, k Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib n fit got pɑkɔi nbɑ be k k mɔk dɑnm nɑ.
Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib *sɑɑkɑb nbɑ diɑ’b fɑnu nɑ ŋɑn nɑn nibɑɑkl bonciɑnn, k bin nbɑ muɑntl Klistu lɑbɑɑl k wɑnt’b l pɑɑk, ŋɑnm e mɑntk ŋɑn nɑn nibɑɑkl,
k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Nɑɑb i tuun dijɑɑn-yuo, fɑɑ dɑɑ bobnt u mɔb,» k biɑ diɑn ɑ: «Tuontunnɔ ŋɑn k wun gɑɑl u pɑɑɔk.»
A dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k b tɑɑl sɑɑkɑsuɑ, sie k b tie niib bɑnle ɑmi bɑntɑ.
Bin nbɑ tuun biit nɑ, ii yɑki nɑn’m, niib ni, k bin nbɑ biɑl nɑ n tin jɑŋmɑɑni.
Yennu tuɑnn nɑn Yiesu Klistu tuɑnn nɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tuɑnn po k n yien’ɑ nɑn ninmɔnn, ɑ fɑn sɑk wɑnnu nɑ k dɑɑ mɔk ningɑnsɑi ɑmi luktn k tien nisuɑ bonsiɑl kul ni.
A dɑɑ yiin ɑ nii suɑ pɑɑk yiɑn yiɑn, ɑ wuu tuun tuonsiɑl Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sinsuuk ni. A dɑɑ kuɑnt ɑ nuu niib tuonbiit tumu ni, ŋɑɑn i diɑ ɑ mɔnŋ bɑnnu nbɑ k b k fit tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk.
A lɑɑfiɑ nbɑ k jɑnŋt’ɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ nyu nyun kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ tuu nyu dɑmunŋ wɑɑn k lin sonm ɑ nuɑk ni.
Nisiɑb tuonbiit ponŋ duɑ pɑɑnu ni e yuo nbɑ k b dɑɑ k bu b buut, ŋɑɑn k nisiɑb tuonbiit mun sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu b buut bunu puolpo e.
Tuonŋɑnɑ mun biɑ tie nnɑ e, l yenn-nbɑ nyii pɑɑnu wɑɑ, k lin nbɑ lek k nyii pɑɑnu ni, ŋɑɑn l kɑn fit bɔl.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs ɑ bin nbɑ kul tie dɑɑbɑ nɑ ii tien b yonmdɑnm bɑɑkciɑɔnŋ, k suɑ dɑɑ piɑk biil Yennu sɑnn nɑn t tuntl.

Bin nbɑ k b yonmdɑnm tie Klistuweilɑ nɑ dɑɑ fiɑkt b yonmdɑnm mɑnŋ, bɑɑ yi’b b nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k ŋɑnm e n mɑntk tun fɑnu, k mɑɑn b yonmdɑnm nbɑ gɑɑn b tuonɑ nyuɑt nɑ tien *Klistu yɑdɑ, k Yennu luon’m. I wɑnt’b kii kpɑɑn’m lɑbɑɑl nɑ po.
Suɑ i wɑnt wɑngɑnu k k wei t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu mɔbonɑ nɑn Yennu sɔnu wɑnnu nɑ,
u mɔk jɑpɑɑt bonciɑnn e k k bɑn siɑl. K mɔniɑɔk nɑn kunkɔnɑ tie nɑn yiɑlu nɑ k wɑɑ’u, k l bɑɑt nɑn *funfunn, nɑn kunkɔnɑ, nɑn nisukt, nɑn mɑbiit,
nɑn mɔniɑɔk yuo kul, ɑ nibiit nbɑ k b dudukt k sonm fɑnu k b k mɔk bɑlmɔni nɑ sinsuuk ni nɑ. B duki nɑn Yennu sɔnu tie sɔnu nbɑ sɑɑ te k nilɔ n tien mɔktɔ e.
L i tie k nilɔ nunm gbuo wɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ, u yɑdɑ nɑn Yennu set tie mɔktuk k tul’ɔ.
T din k bɑɑl nɑn siɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k t biɑ tɑn kɑn nyi nɑn bonsiɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni,
ŋɑɑn t i mɔk jiet nɑn tiɑt, l ŋɑn k t nunm n gbuo’l.
Bin nbɑ luon b i tie mɔktɑ, ŋɑnm e bɑɑ jinjɑnmi ni, nɑn bɑlt ni, nɑn jɑti nɑn dudukbiit nbɑ biil niib k bɑɑnt’b yɑnn nɑ ni,
k mɑɑn likli lonm e tie bonbiil kul jiinn. Nisiɑb ponŋ jii b mɔnŋ k tien liklonbiiuk nɑ ni. L pɑɑk, k b ji k tien Klistu yɑdɑ. Ŋɑnn e te k b lɑɑt pɑlbibuolu buolu.

Ŋɑɑn fin nbɑ tie Yennu nilɔ nɑ, l ŋɑn k ɑ ciɑl nyi lin nbɑ nɑ nbɑ kul ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn kii luon fii tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol ni, kii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni, kii mɔk yɑdɑ nɑn lonm nɑn suklu, kii be suon nnɑ.
A yɑdɑ pɑɑk kɔnin kunkɔnŋɑnn, k suol mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’ɑ ɑ fɑn gɑɑl yuo nbɑ k ɑ din nyinn ɑ mɔnŋ siɑlŋɑnn niib bonciɑnn nunm ni nɑ.
Mɑɑ be Yennu nbɑ tien bonsiɑl kul mɑnfuol nɑ tuɑnn, k be Yiesu Klistu nbɑ din nyinn u mɔnŋ yɑdɑ siɑlŋɑnn, Pɔns *Piilɑɑt nunm ni nɑ tuɑnn, n kpɑɑn’ɑ
ɑ fii diɑ wɑnnu nɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k suɑ k fit tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt.
Yennu nbɑ k t piɑk’ɔ nɑ, wun nbɑ tie Yudɑɑnɔ, k biɑ tie kpɑnbɑlɑ kul Kpɑnbɑl, k biɑ tie yonmdɑnm kul Yonmdɑɑnɔ. Ŋuɑ e tɑn sɑɑ te k wun dɔkt yuo nbɑ jɑnŋ.
Ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e kɑn kpo. U be yentciɑɔnŋ nbɑ k nilɔ kɑn fit nɑkn ni. Ŋuɑ e k nisuɑ dɑɑ k mi lɑ’u ɑmi k sɑɑ fit lɑ’u. Ŋuɑ e yen bɑɑkl nɑn yiikuo yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.
A kpɑɑn tingbounŋ nɑ mɔktɑ nɑ, ɑ b dɑɑ mɔk dont-n-mɔnŋ ɑmi bin tien b dindɑnn mɔktuk nbɑ tie wounŋ nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn bin tien b dindɑnn kul Yennu ni, wun nbɑ tul’t bonsiɑl kul, ɑ t gɑɑl kii mɔk pɑlpienn.
A kpɑɑn’m, ɑ bii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, k b tuonŋɑnɑ mɑnŋ ii yɑb, k b nii i yɑɑ nɑn piini tulu.
Nnɑ e k b sii mɔk mɔktuk yuo nbɑ bɑɑt k sɑɑ fit lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni mɑnfuol.
Tiimuote, ii guu lin nbɑ k b tien ɑ nuu ni nɑ. A nyik lɑbɑfɑɑnu nbɑ k mɔk nyuɑt k biɑ k tɑɑ nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn wɑnnu nɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ gbiin lin nbɑ k b yi’l bɑnnu ŋɑɑn k l k tie bɑnnu kɑɑ.
Nisiɑb yet ɑ b mɔk bɑnnu mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k l pɑɑk k b nyik lɑbɑmɑnn wɑnnu. Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be nɑn’i.
Min Pɔul wun nbɑ tie Yiesu *Klistu *tuomi Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ n muɑnt mɑnfuol nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’t nɑ Yiesu Klistu ni,
n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien n bilonkɑk Tiimuote. Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’ɑ k biɑ tul’ɑ nyikcɑbu nɑn mɑnu.
N tien Yennu niipuouk nɑn mɑɑ tuun nɑn dudukŋɑnt nɑn n yejɑnm nbɑ din tuun bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ. N tien’ɔ niipuouk yuo kul nbɑ k n mei Yennu, yennu nɑn nyiɑɔk k biɑ tiɑn ɑ po.
N tiɑn ɑ nyin-nyuut po, k lek luon k n lɑ’ɑ kii mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
N tiɑn ɑ mɔmɔnm yɑdɑ po, yɑdɑ nbɑ din sint be ɑ yɑɑ Loiis nɑn ɑ nɑɑ Euniis pɑlɑ ni nɑ, k n mi nɑn l ji be ɑ pɑl ni mɔtɑɑnɑ.
L pɑɑk, k n tiɑtl’ɑ mɑɑ ɑ dɑɑ te k piini nbɑ k Yennu din tul’ɑ yuo nbɑ k n din yii n nii ɑ pɑɑk nɑ n kpo,
k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ k Yennu tul’t nɑ k tien’t jɑŋmɑɑndɑnm, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ tien’t pɑnŋ nɑn lonm, nɑn diɑ-n-mɔnŋ e.
L pɑɑk, din t Yonmdɑɑnɔ *siɑlɑ k dɑɑ tiin fei. A biɑ dɑɑ tiin fei nɑn mɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk u pɑɑk nɑ, ŋɑɑn sɑk fɑldinu nɑn’n u lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɑ pɑnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Ŋuɑ e fiel’t k yiin’t ɑ tii tie u yɑb, k l k tie t tuonɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ ŋɑɑn u din lol k fiel’t u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk e. U din tul’t ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ mɑnŋ Yiesu Klistu ni, yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din k nɑn *dulnyɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn t Fietuɑ Yiesu Klistu bɑɑlu ni e k u fiit wɑnn’t l po, k mɑɑn Yiesu Klistu din biil kuun yiikuo, ŋɑɑn biɑ wɑnn’t ɑ lɑbɑmɑnn ni, ɑ t sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Yennu ponŋ din yiin’n, ɑ n tien tuomi nɑn wɑntuɑ k muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ.
L pɑɑk e te k n di fɑlɑ mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k n k tiin fei, k mɑɑn n mi wun nbɑ k n tien’ɔ yɑdɑ, k n biɑ mi k bilsuk kɑɑ nɑn u sɑɑ fit diɑ lin nbɑ k n jii k tien u nuu ni nɑ fɑnu mɔkmɔk nɑn buut dɑɑl.
Jiin mɔmɔnm nbɑ k n din tul’ɑ nɑ, k fit bɑnn wɑnnu nbɑ ŋɑn k cie lin nbɑ nɑ, kii diɑ’l nɑn yɑdɑ nɑn lonm nbɑ k t mɔk Yiesu Klistu ni.
Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ nbɑ be t ni nɑ pɑɑk, ii diɑ lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k u jii k tien ɑ nuu ni nɑ.
A ponŋ mi nɑn suɑ kul nbɑ be Asii nɑ nyik’n ɑ, k b siɑb e tie Fiijel nɑn Helmojenn.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ n tin Onesiifuol ŋɑɑtieb ninbɑɑɔk, k mɑɑn u dɑɑn yuɑ cien n pɑl. U dɑɑn k tin fei nɑn mɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk nɑ pɑɑk,
ŋɑɑn wɑɑ dɑɑn tɑn bɑɑl Luonm yuo nbɑ, u dɑɑn piin luon mɑɑ be siɑn e nɑn ninmɔnn nɑn wɑɑ dɑɑn tɑn lɑ n buol.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ n tin’ɔ ninbɑɑɔk dɑɑl mɑnŋ dɑɑl. A mɔnŋ mi fɑnu wɑɑ din sonm’n bonciɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ Efes duo ni.
N bik, fin ŋɑnin n jii ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nbɑ k t lɑ Yiesu *Klistu buol ni nɑ kii cien ɑ pɑl.
Fɑɑ ponŋ din gbɑt wɑnnu nbɑ n penŋ niib bonciɑnn buol ni nɑ, ɑ jii’l k wɑnn nisiɑb nbɑ tie yɑdɑ dɑnm, bin nbɑ mun sɑɑ fit wɑnn nilieb mun.
A sɑk k gɑɑl fɑldinu nɑn Yiesu Klistu sejeŋɑnɔ nɑ.
Seje nbɑ luon wun penn u sɑɑkuɑ pɑl tuonn ni, ji k ŋmɑt u binbenŋ nɑn lin nbɑ k tie sejenm tuonɑ ni.
Wun nbɑ tiin puot nɑntɑɑl kɑn fit nyɑnn k gɑɑl l nyuɑt, sie k u sɑk wei puot *senni kul.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k kpɑɑlɔ nbɑ tun nɑn ninmɔnn n gɑɑl jiet sinsinn.
Ii duki lin nbɑ k n yien’ɑ nɑ po, k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ te k fɑn fit bɑnn l kul ɑ pɑɑk.
Ii tiɑn Yiesu Klistu po. U din fiil kuun ni, k din tie * Dɑɑfiid yɑɑbuonn, nɑn mɑɑ muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ.
Lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k n be nɑn jɑlt k di fɑlɑ nɑn biitdɑɑnɔ nɑ. Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ ŋɑnin k be jɑlt ni.
Ŋɑɑn Yennu nigɑnnkɑb nɑ pɑɑk k n lek di suklu fɑlɑ kul ɑ ni, ɑ bin mun lɑ fielu nbɑ be Yiesu Klistu ni, kii mɔk dontl nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ.
Bɑli nɑ e tie mɔmɔnm: «T i kpo nɑn’ɔ, t mun tɑn sii mɔk mɑnfuol nɑn’ɔ e.
T i ŋɑnmt yɑbi, t mun tɑn sɑɑ di nɑɑn nɑn’ɔ e, ŋɑɑn t i yɑɑ ɑ t k mi’u, u mun tɑn sii yɑɑ ɑ u k mi’t.
L i tie k t k cɔln u mɑɑn, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ k lebtl u mɑɑn, k mɑɑn u kɑn fit noi u mɔnŋ.»
A tiɑl ɑ niib lin nbɑ nɑ, k tul’b kpɑɑni Yennu tuɑnn ni ɑ b dɑɑ kɔn mɔbonɑ pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn k mɔk nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn l biil bin nbɑ gbiin nɑ e.
Yɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ pɑɑk k jɑnŋ nɑn Yennu n pɑk’ɑ, kii tie nɑn tuontunnɔ nbɑ k tiin fei u tuonn pɑɑk nɑ, k muɑnt bɑlmɔni mɑɑn dede.
A nyinn ɑ mɔnŋ lɑbɑfɑɑnu nbɑ k tɑɑ nɑn Yennu mɑɑn k biɑ k mɔk nyuɑt nɑ ni, k mɑɑn bin nbɑ tuun l buolu sii ŋɑnmt fɔknt b mɔnŋ nɑn Yennu e.
B wɑnnu nɑɑn nɑn nɑl-fiɑɔk nbɑ tuu di gbɑnɑnt nɑ e. B siɑb tie Hiimene nɑn Fiilet,
k b fɔknt b mɔnŋ nɑn bɑlmɔni k biɑ tuni nisiɑb yɑdɑ k yɑɑ ɑ t kuun fiilu nɑ ponŋ gɑl ɑ.
Ŋɑɑn fiɑkl nbɑ k Yennu tien dɑɑ be k biɑ k dɑnm i, k u tien dɑɔk l pɑɑk ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ mi bin nbɑ tie u yɑb,» k biɑ jen ɑ ɑ: «Wun nbɑ kul yet ɑ u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ yuɑ n nyik bonbiil tumu.»
Jetienbonɑ buolu bonciɑnn be ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni k l kul k tie kutsɔnt kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑnmɔni nɑn senni mun biɑ be. L yenn-nbɑ tie jɑɑnm yɑl k liel nbɑ k b tuun nɑn’n dɑɑ kul ɑ.

L i tie k suɑ ji nyik bonbiil tumu nbɑ k n piɑk l po nɑ, ŋɑɑn be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ, u ji nɑɑn nɑn ŋmɑnŋ nbɑ tie jɑɑnm yɑl nɑ e, k mɑɑn u tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ kuukuɑ yuɑ e k mɔk nyuɑt u buol ni, k ji ŋɑn nɑn tuonŋɑnɑ kul tumu.
Nyint ɑ mɔnŋ nipɑɑɔnŋ niɑnbiit ni, ŋɑɑn kii wɑɑ bin nbɑ k Yennu yet, ɑ b tie niŋɑnm u buol ni nɑ sɔnu, nɑn yɑdɑ sɔnu, nɑn lonm sɔnu, nɑn mɑnu. Ii tuun nnɑ nɑn bin nbɑ mei Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn pɑlpienn nɑ.
A lɔkt jɑtmɔniɑt, k mɑɑn ɑ mi nɑn l juontl nɑn kunkɔnɑ e.
L k ŋɑn k Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuontunnɔ ii kɔn nɑn niib. L ŋɑn k wuu tie bulcimɔ e suɑ kul buol ni, kii tie wun nbɑ sɑɑ fit k tumi,
kii tie suon nnɑ yuo nbɑ k u tumi bin nbɑ noi’ɔ nɑ, k mɑɑn pɑsiɑl Yennu n tɑn tul’b yɑɑk k bin mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k tɑn bɑnn bɑlmɔni,
k ŋɑnm jen bɑlmɔni sɔnu ni k lɔkt *Sɑɑtɑn bɑlt, k mɑɑn b ji tie u dɑɑbɑ k tuun wɑɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ.
A mi nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ dɑjuonti yuo tɑn sii pɑɑl.
Niib tɑn sii tie jɑwudɑnm e, nɑn liklonnɑ, k wɑnt b mɔnŋ, k tie jɑpɑdɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ suki Yennu, nɑn bin nbɑ k sɑɑk b dɑnm mɔi, nɑn bin nbɑ k tiɑn ŋɑnm po, nɑn bin nbɑ k tiin Yennu.
B tɑn kii mɔk lonm nɑn niib, b tɑn kii tiin niib ninbɑɑɔk, k piɑk mɑbiit k tien lieb, k b binbenŋ tie yɑnɑ yɑnɑ nnɑ, k b nɑɑn bonsusuot, k nɑn tuonŋɑnɑ.
B tɑn sii nyi lieb puoɑ e, k tie kɑɑtkɑɑtdɑnm, k dont b mɔnŋ. B tɑn sii luon bii tuun lin nbɑ mɑn k tul’b k kii mɔk lonm nɑn Yennu.
B tɑn sii diɑ Yenjiɑntu sɑnn e, ŋɑɑn k sɑɑk l yiikuo. Nyint ɑ mɔnŋ l nibuolu ni.
B siɑb e lin k doi ŋei k kpɑnn puoliini nbɑ tuu tuun tuonbiit bonciɑnn k wɑɑ b pɑlɑ niɑnbiit buolu buolu, k nyint b yɑn.
Yuo kul ɑ, l puob gbiintl niib kpɑɑni, ŋɑɑn b k mi k bɑnn bɑlmɔni.
Sɑɑnes nɑn Sɑnbles nbɑ din kɔn nɑn Muois biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l jɑbuolu mun tie nnɑ e. B kɔn nɑn bɑlmɔni, k b yɑn gbie nɑn dudukbiit, k b yɑdɑ k wɑ lɑn bɑɑ biknu ni.
Ŋɑɑn b kɑn fit kpɑnn niib k wei, k mɑɑn suɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ lɑ b jɑti nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn bɑɑ din lɑ Sɑnes nɑn Sɑnbles jɑti nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin ponŋ mi n wɑnnu po, nɑn n binbenŋ po, nɑn n dudukt po, nɑn n yɑdɑ po, nɑn n suklu po, nɑn n lonm nɑn niib po, nɑn n gbɑnkul po.
A mi niib nbɑ muks’n biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn n fɑldinu. A mi lin nbɑ kul nbɑ din tien’n Antiɑɔs, nɑn Ikoniunm nɑn Liistl. A mi mɑɑ din lɑ muksbiit biɑnŋ nbɑ, ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ e din fɑt’n l kul ni.
Bɑlmɔni e, niib kul nbɑ luon k bii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm Yiesu *Klistu ni nɑ, sɑɑ lɑ muksuk.
k nitont nɑn kpinkpɑnni dɑnm lek tɑn sii ŋɑnmt puki b biit e, k kpɑnn lieb, k b lieb mun sɑɑ kpɑnn’b.
Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin, fii diɑ mɑɑn nbɑ k ɑ din tumi k gɑɑl k tien’l yɑdɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn ɑ ponŋ mi bin nbɑ din tie ɑ wɑntieb nɑ nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
A bisn ni wɑɑ ɑ ponŋ mi Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk. L kɑdɑɑɔk sɑɑ fit tul’ɑ yɑn k wɑnn’ɑ fɑɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu ɑ yɑdɑ nɑn Klistu pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk munn tie mɑɑn nbɑ nyii Yennu mɔb ni, k l kul ɑ mɔk nyuɑt e, k wɑnt’t u po, k kpɑɑn’t, k ŋɑnmt t benu, k wɑnt’t binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ sɔnu,
ɑ nisuɑ kul nbɑ tie Yennu yuɑ nɑ binbenŋ ii ŋɑn, k wun tien siil kii fit kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ buolu kul ɑ.
Yiesu *Klistu nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ bu fuont’b nɑn kpienm buut, wun nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ jen k di nɑɑn nɑ, ŋuɑ nɑn Yennu tuɑnn po, k n yien’ɑ nɑn ninmɔnn,
ɑ fii muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn kii wɑnt niib l po, yuo ii ŋɑn kuo l kii ŋɑn i e. Fii muɑntl, kii piɑk niib b tuonbiit po, kii kpɑɑn’m, kii kuɑnt’b pɑlɑ, kii wɑnt’b mɑɑn mɑnŋ dede nɑn suklu yuo kul ɑ,
k mɑɑn yuo bɑɑt k nisiɑb tɑn kii luon bii gbiintl bɑlmɔni wɑnnu, ŋɑɑn b tɑn sii wɑɑ b tiɑɔnŋ lonm e, k tikl wɑntieb k b tɑn wɑnt’b lin nbɑ k b luon l gbiintu.
B tɑn kɑn gbiint bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn b tɑn sii luon bii gbiin lɑbɑgɑnɑ e.
Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin n yɑbl k suol ɑ mɔnŋ l kul ni. Sɑkn fɑldinu. Ii tuun ɑ tuonn nbɑ tie Yennu lɑbɑmɑnn muɑntu nɑ, k tun ɑ tuonn nbɑ tie Yennu tuontunnɔ yɑl nɑ fɑnu.
Ŋɑɑn min ŋɑnin, yuo bɑɑl nɑn bin jii’n k tien *mɑlunŋ ɑ. N kuun yuo bɑɑl ɑ.
N gbɑɑ gbigbɑɑŋɑnɑ wɑɑ. N tin n nɑntɑɑl nɑ k gbenn ɑ. N lek diɑ bɑlmɔni wɑnnu.

Yuo nbɑ bɑɑt, n tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl nyɑnnu nyuɑt ɑ. L nyuɑt tie fielu nɑɑn foklk nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ tie bɑlbuŋɑnɔ nɑ tɑn sɑɑ tul’n bɑlbudɑɑl, k u kɑn tul min kuukuɑ, ŋɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ kul nbɑ luon bin lɑ u jennu nɑ.
Yɑbt k bɑɑl n penŋ yiɑn yiɑn nɑ,
k mɑɑn Demɑɑs nyik’n ɑ. U mɔk lonm nɑn tingbounŋ bonɑ, k u sɑɑn Tesɑɑluoniik ɑ. Klesens sɑɑn Gɑɑlɑɑti wɑɑ, k Tiit mun sɑɑn Dɑɑlmɑɑti wɑɑ.
Luk kuukuɑ e ji be nɑn’n. Jiin Mɑɑlk k bɑɑl nɑn’ɔ nɑ, k mɑɑn u sɑɑ fit sonm’n bonciɑnn n tuonɑ ni.
N tun Tiikiik ɑ wun sɑɑn Efes.
Fi i bɑɑt yuo nbɑ, fɑn jii n liɑtfuouk nbɑ k n dɑɑn nyik Tloɑs, k l be Kɑlpus buol ni nɑ nɑ. A biɑ jii n kɑdɑpinkɑlɑ nɑn n kɑdɑgbɑnt nɑ.
Aleksɑndl wun nbɑ kul sɑɑɔk nɑ din tun’n lin nbɑ bi bonciɑnn. Yennu sɑɑ pɑ’u l pɑɑk.
Suot ɑ mɔnŋ nɑn’ɔ, k mɑɑn u kɔn nɑn lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k t muɑntl nɑ bonciɑnn.
Sinsinn mɑɑ dɑɑn kɔn n mɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑ, suɑ dɑɑn k set n puol. B kul dɑɑn nyik’n ɑ, Yennu dɑɑ jikt’b tɑɑli.
Ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑn be nɑn’n k tul’n pɑnŋ k n dɑɑn fit muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ kul k tul bin nbɑ k tie *Suifnbɑ nɑ kul ɑ, ɑ bin gbɑt. Ŋuɑ e dɑɑn fɑt’n yɑnbɔl mɔb ni.
ŋuɑ e biɑ sɑɑ nyinn’n bonbiit kul ɑ ni, k kunn’n k kuɑn’n u nɑɑn nbɑ be sɑnpɑɑpo nɑn lɑɑfiɑ. Ŋuɑ e yen dontl nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.
N jikt n fuonti k tien Pliisiil nɑn Akiilɑɑs, nɑn Onesiifuol ŋɑɑtieb.
Elɑst dɑɑn biɑl Kuolent. Tlofiinm dɑɑn kɑɑ lɑɑfiɑ k n dɑɑn nyik’ɔ Miile.
Yɑbt k bɑɑl nnɑ wɑɑ, k gbintɑnkɑɑnŋ n bɑɑl. Eobuuluus nɑn Pludɑns nɑn Liinus nɑn Kluodiɑ tien’ɑ b fuonti, k Klistuweilɑ kul ɑ biɑ fuont’ɑ.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ ii be nɑn’ɑ. Yennu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i.

Min Pɔul, wun nbɑ tie Yennu tuontunnɔ nɑn Yiesu *Klistu *tuomi nɑ, min e k Yennu lukt’n k tun’n u nigɑnnkɑb buol ɑ n cie b yɑdɑ, k te bin bɑnn u bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl nbɑ wɑnt’t bɑnnu nbɑ k t sii mɔk binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm.
Lin nbɑ nɑ nyii dindɑnn nbɑ k t mɔk nɑn t sii mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni e. Yuo nbɑ k u dɑɑ din k nɑn dulnyɑ nɑ, Yennu nbɑ k fɑɑ fɑɑk nɑ din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’t mɑnfuol mɑnŋ.
Yuo nbɑ k u din senn nɑ nbɑ tɑn bɑɑl, k Yennu t Fietuɑ te k n bɑnn u mɑɑn. L mɑɑn e tie mɑɑn nbɑ k u yɑɑ mii muɑntl nɑ.
N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien fin Tiit wun nbɑ tie n bimɔnŋ k t tɑɑ yɑdɑ yenn kuɑ nɑ. Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn t Fietuɑ Yiesu Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’ɑ k biɑ tul’ɑ mɑnu.
N din te k ɑ biɑl Klet tinŋ ni mɑɑ ɑ ŋɑnm bonsiɑl kul nbɑ dɑɑn tenn, k biɑ kɑɑn kɑɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib *sɑɑkɑb duo kul ni, nɑn mɑɑ din wɑnn’ɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e nɑn sɑɑkuɑ i tie wun nbɑ k b k fit tɑɑl’ɔ. L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn wuu mɔk puo yenɔ kuɑ. L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn u wɑɑs n tien Klistu yɑdɑ, k dɑɑ tie wɑɑbiit nɑn tubkɑngbɑtɑ,

k mɑɑn Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib yudɑɑnɔ sii tuun Yennu tuonɑ e. L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn u dɑɑ tie dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k b fit tɑɑl’ɔ, k dɑɑ mɔk jɑpɑɑt, ɑmi wun nbɑ dont wutuol yiɑn yiɑn, ɑmi wun nbɑ nyu dɑɑn k yib, ɑmi wun nbɑ luon kunkɔnɑ, ɑmi wun nbɑ luon likli fɑɑk sɔni ni.
Ŋɑɑn l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k wuu mi sɑɑnm gɑɑlu, kii luon lin nbɑ ŋɑn, kii mi u mɔnŋ diɑnu, kii be fɑnu, kii tie Yennu yuɑ, kii mi mɔnŋdiɑnu.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k wuu diɑ bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k t din wɑnn’i nɑ fɑnu. Ŋɑn e sɑɑ te k wun fit cie niib pɑlɑ nɑn wɑnnu nbɑ tuok, k biɑ te k wun fit k wɑnn bin nbɑ k sɑɑk u wɑnnu mɑnŋ nɑ bɑlmɔni.
K mɑɑn mɔyetdɑnm bonciɑnn be, k b mɑntk be *Suifnbɑ nbɑ lebt b binbenŋ nɑ sinsuuk ni e, k diɑ b jɑtmɑɑn k kpɑnn niib.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k fin guɑl b mɑɑn, k mɑɑn b liklonbiiuk pɑɑk k b lin wɑnt niib lin nbɑ k ŋɑn nɑn bii wɑnt, k ŋmɑt ŋɑsɑi niib kul dudukt.
Klet jɑsuɑ, wun nbɑ din tie b tiɑɔnŋ sɔkni din yet ɑ: «Klet-tieb fɑ fɑɑk yuo kul ɑ, k b nɑɑn nɑn bonkob-biit, k biɑ tie gbɑn-nyɑkdɑnm nbɑ luon diinɑ kuukuɑ.»
Wɑɑ din yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l tie bɑlmɔni e. L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn k ɑ yɑki nɑn’m fɑnu, k bii mɔk bɑlmɔni yɑdɑ,
k ji dɑɑ gbiintl Suifnbɑ fɑɑk lɑbɑɑl, k biɑ dɑɑ gbiintl niib nbɑ k sɑɑk bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl nɑ *senni.

Bonsiɑl kɑɑ k mɔk jɑknt bin nbɑ be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ buol ni, ŋɑɑn bonɑ kul mɔk jɑknt e k tul bin nbɑ tie jɑknt-dɑnm k k tien Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn b dudukt nɑn b yɑn ni kul tie jɑknt e.
B yi b mɔnŋ Yenmiilɑ e, ŋɑɑn k b tuonɑ wɑnt nɑn b k sɑk bɑnn Yennu. B tie mɔyetdɑnm nɑn nibiit e, k kɑn fit tun tuonŋɑnsiɑl.
Ŋɑɑn fin ii wɑnt lin nbɑ tɑɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni wɑnnu.
A kpɑɑn jɑkpelɑ, ɑ bii be suon nnɑ, kii be bɑnnu nbɑ k b jɑnŋ nɑn nibɑɑkl, kii diɑ b mɔnŋ, kii diɑ lɑbɑmɑnn wɑnnu fɑnu, kii mɔk lonm nɑn niib, kii mɔk gbɑnkul.
A biɑ kpɑɑn puokpelɑ, ɑ bii be bɑnnu nbɑ k niib ii mi nɑn b tie Yennu yɑb e, k dɑɑ tie sɑnjɑɑnjɑnnɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ nyu dɑɑn k yib, ŋɑɑn bii wɑnt kpɑɑni nbɑ ŋɑn.
Nnɑ e k b sɑɑ fit wɑnn puobis ɑ bii luon b sɔlb nɑn b wɑɑs,
kii piɑk bɑlmɔni, kii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni, kii tuun tuonn fɑnu ŋɑɑk ni, kii mɔk bulcint, kii sɑɑk b sɔlb mɔi, ɑ suɑ dɑɑ fit piɑk bonbiil k jiint Yennu mɑɑn po.
A biɑ kpɑɑn nɑɑsinm k bii diɑ b mɔnŋ fɑnu.
Bonsiɑl kul ni, fii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ nbɑ sii wɑnt niib bɑɑ sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ. Fii wɑnt niib *Klistu lɑbɑɑl nɑn ninmɔnn nɑn bɑlmɔni,
nɑn mɔbonɑ nbɑ k niib kɑn fit pɑk bonbiil k jiin l po, k bin nbɑ kɔn nɑn’ɑ nɑ ii di fei k mɑɑn b kɑn fit tɑɑl’t siɑl pɑɑk.
L ŋɑn k dɑɑbɑ ii sɑɑk b yonmdɑnm mɔi, kii pent b pɑlɑ bonsiɑl kul ni. B dɑɑ noi nɑn b yonmdɑnm mɔniɑt,
k dɑɑ jɑɑn b siɑl, ŋɑɑn kii tie dɑnm nbɑ sɑɑk b yonmdɑnm mɔi yuo kul k ŋɑn e sɑɑ te k niib n tul wɑnnu nbɑ piɑk t Fietuɑ Yennu po nɑ bɑɑkl.
K mɑɑn Yennu wɑnn u ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nbɑ k niib kul fielu nyii lenŋ nɑ wɑɑ.
L ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ e wɑnn’t nɑn tin nyik binbenŋ nbɑ k gbuot Yennu nunm nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ lonbiiuk, ŋɑɑn kii be binbenŋ nbɑ wɑnt nɑn t tie bɑlmɔnpɑklɑ, k biɑ tuɑk bɑlmɔni sɔnu, k biɑ tie Yennu yɑb e.
Nnɑ e k t sii guu mɑnu nbɑ k t dɑɑn nɑ, dɑɑl nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu, wun nbɑ tie t Yenjɑɑnn nɑn t Fietuɑ nɑ, tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt yentsɑɑkɑl ni nɑ.

Ŋuɑ e din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo, ɑ wun fɑt’t biit kul dɑɑbs ni, k te k tii tie niib nbɑ be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ ni, k biɑ kii tie u tiɑɔnŋ yɑb, k biɑ kii tie niib nbɑ nunm mɔn nɑn tuonŋɑnɑ tumu.
Lin nbɑ nɑ e tie lin nbɑ k ɑ sii wɑnt’b nɑ. Ii cien b pɑlɑ, kii biɑ kii kpɑɑn’m nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɑ yiikuo nɑ. A dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k b suɑ goli’ɑ yɑnn.
A tiɑl’b k bin tul b tinŋ yudɑnm nɑn yiikuo-dɑnm bɑɑkl, k sɑk b mɔi, k tien siil k tun tuonŋɑnɑ kul ɑ.
Yetl’b ɑ b dɑɑ piɑk bɑlbiit suɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kii luon pɑlmɑɑsl, kii mɔk bulcint, kii mɔk sikn-n-mɔnŋ niib sinsuuk ni.

K mɑɑn siɑn-yuo t mɔnŋ din k mɔk yɑn, t din tie mɔyetdɑnm e, k wɑɑ sɔnu nbɑ k tuok. T din tie niɑnbiit nɑn gbɑnɑnt lonm buolu buolu dɑɑbɑ e. T binbenŋ kul din tie bonbiil nɑn niɑnbiiuk o. T din nɑn t lieb k b mun biɑ nɑn’t.
Ŋɑɑn t Fietuɑ Yennu lonm nɑn u bulcint nbɑ din tɑn fiit nyii pɑɑnu yuo nbɑ,
k u din fiel’t. L din k tie t tiɑɔnŋ tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u mɔnŋ ninbɑtinu pɑɑk e. U din jii nyun e k wul’t, k l nyun pɑɑk, k Foŋɑnm te k b ŋɑnm k mɑl’t, k tul’t mɑnfopɑɑnn.
Yennu din yɑt Foŋɑnm t pɑɑk bonciɑnn Yiesu *Klistu ni.
Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk k u din tun nnɑ ɑ wun tien’t niŋɑnm u buol, k biɑ tien’t u wɑɑs nbɑ mɔk dindɑnn k t sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Bɑli nɑ tie bɑlmɔni e. N luon k ɑ jii ɑ dudukt kul kii wɑnt’b lin nbɑ nɑ, k bin nbɑ tien Yennu yɑdɑ nɑ n jii b yuo kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ nɑn ninmɔnn. Ŋɑnn e ŋɑn k mɔk nyuɑt k tul suɑ kul ɑ.
Ŋɑɑn nyik mɔnɔyɑnnɑ, nɑn yejɑnm sɑnɑ kɑnu, k dɑɑ kɔn nɑn lieb, k noi mɔniɑɔk *senni pɑɑk, k mɑɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul k mɔk nyuɑt k biɑ tie bon-yɑnɑ e.
Nilɔ i tie tuknɑ dɑɑnɔ, fɑn pɑk’ɔ yonm, k biɑ pɑk’ɔ munle pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l puolpo fɑn nyik’ɔ.
A mi nɑn l nibuolu nyik sɔnu nbɑ tuok ɑ, k wɑɑ kpɑɑ tubɑ nɑ pɑɑk, k u kuɑnt u mɔnŋ muu ni.
Mi i tun Altemɑɑs ɑmi Tiikiik ɑ buol ni yuo nbɑ, fɑn yɑbl k cet’n Niikopoliis duo ni, k mɑɑn n sii be lenŋ e gbintɑnkɑɑnŋ yuo.
Yɑbt ɑ mɔnŋ k sonm Senɑɑs, wun nbɑ tie bɑlbuulɔ nɑ, nɑn Apuoluos, k bin lɑ bɑɑ luon lin nbɑ kul k fit piin b sɔnu nɑ.
L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k t niib ii mi bɑɑ sii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ, kii sonmt niib b fɑlɑ ni, k dɑɑ be binbenŋ nbɑ kɑɑ nyuɑt.
Bin nbɑ be n buol ni nɑ kul ɑ fuont’ɑ. A fuont bin nbɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ k luon’t b yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ. Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be nɑn i kul ɑ.
Min Pɔul wun nbɑ be dɑnsɑlk Yiesu *Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk nɑ, nɑn t nɑɑ bik Tiimuote dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien t tuontunluɑ Fiilemɔn wun nbɑ k t luon’ɔ nɑ,
nɑn Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ lɑki lieb ɑ ŋɑɑk ni nɑ; k biɑ tien t niipuo Apiɑ nɑn t tuontunluɑ Alkiip nbɑ mun lɑɑt muksuk u tuonn nɑ pɑɑk.
T Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu n yɑt yetŋɑnm i pɑɑk k biɑ tul’i mɑnu.
N nɑɑ bik, yuo kul, n Yenmiɑlu kul ni n tiɑn ɑ po k tien Yennu niipuouk,
k mɑɑn n ponŋ gbiɑ fɑɑ tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu yɑdɑ k luon u yɑb kul biɑnŋ nbɑ.
N mei Yennu ɑ tinm nɑn fin nbɑ tɑɑn k tien Klistu yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk sɑɑ te k tin bɑnn fɑnu piisn nbɑ k t mɔk tɑɑ tɑɑ Klistu po nɑ pɑɑk.
N nɑɑ bik, ɑ lonm mɑnŋ tul’n pɑlpienn nɑn pɑlcienn k ŋɑnm cie n pɑl bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn ɑ cie Yennu niib kul pɑlɑ.
L pɑɑk, Klistu pɑɑk n bo kii mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn mɑn yet’ɑ fɑɑ sɑɑ tun lin nbɑ tuok,
ŋɑɑn lonm pɑɑk k n bɑln’mɑ, min Pɔul nbɑ tie sɑɑkuɑ k biɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni mɔtɑɑnɑ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk nɑ,
n bɑln’mɑ k jiin Onesiinm po. U ji kpɑnt k tie n bik Klistu ni tɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni nɑ.
Sinsinn nɑ, u dɑɑn tuu k mɔk nyuɑt k tul’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u ji mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k tien min nɑn fin kul ɑ.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ, n tuun’ɔ ɑ wun ŋmɑt ɑ buol ni; k n pɑl lonm kul ɑ be u ni.
N bo sii luon k mii diɑ’u n buol ni nnɑ nɑ k wuu tuun ɑ sienu ni kii sonmt’n mɑɑ be dɑnsɑlk ni Klistu lɑbɑmɑnn pɑɑk nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn n dɑɑn k luon k n tun siɑl k ɑ k tɑɑ n po. N k luon k n mɑb’ɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n luon k lin nbɑ kul k ɑ sɑɑ tun n nyi ɑ mɔnŋ lonm ni e.
Pɑsiɑl, Onesiinm siet ɑ buol yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑɑ lɑ’u k wuu be ɑ buol yuo kul.
K mɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u ji k tie dɑɑbl kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u gɑl dɑɑbl ɑ, u tie t nɑɑ bilonkɑk e. N luon’ɔ bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn ɑ sii luon’ɔ k gɑl nnɑ, k mɑɑn u tie nisɑɑlk e k biɑ tie Klistuyuɑ.
L pɑɑk, l i tie k ɑ duki ɑ n tie ɑ yuɑk i e, fɑn gɑɑl’ɔ nɑn fɑɑ bo sɑɑ gɑɑl’n biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
L i tie k u biil ɑ siɑl ɑmi u diɑ ɑ pɑnsiɑl i e, fɑn te k mɑn pɑ l pɑnn.
Nɑnn nɑ, n dɑ nɑn n mɔnŋ mɔnŋ nuu e; min Pɔul sɑɑ pɑ’ɑ. Ŋɑɑn min kɑɑ sɑɑ yet’ɑ, ɑ mɔnŋ mi nɑn ɑ diɑ n pɑnn ɑ mɑnfuol pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, n ninjɑ, tun nnɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑɑk, k duɑn n pɑl, k mɑɑn t set tie wei-nɑn-lieb e Klistu ni.
Mɑɑ dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ k tien’ɑ nɑ, n k mɔk bilsuk nɑn ɑ sɑɑ sɑk tun k lin gɑl mɑɑ bɑln’mɑ lin nbɑ nɑ kul nɑ.
A biɑ sɑɑ tien dieok siil k guun’n, k mɑɑn i Yenmiɑlu pɑɑk, n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn Yennu sɑɑ te k n bɑɑl fuont’i.
Epɑɑflɑɑs wun nbɑ k min nɑn ŋuɑ be dɑnsɑlk Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk nɑ tien’ɑ u fuonti,
k n tuontunlieb, Mɑɑlk, nɑn Aliistɑɑlk, nɑn Demɑɑs, nɑn Luk, mun biɑ tien’ɑ b fuonti.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu n yɑt yetŋɑnm i pɑɑk.
Siɑn-yuo, Yennu din jii sɔni bonciɑnn k te k sɔkniinbɑ pɑk tul t yejɑnm k l tien tɑɑl munŋɑ wɑɑ,
ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u jii mɑɑn k tul u Bijɑ e k u pɑk nɑn tinm. Yennu din lukt’ɔ ɑ wuu yen bonsiɑl kul k biɑ din te k u nɑn *dulnyɑ kul.

Bijɑ mɑnŋ ni e k t lɑ yentsɑɑkɑl nbɑ nyii Yennu *yudɑnt ni, k ŋuɑ mɑnŋ e tie Yennu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ninnɑɔnŋ, k diɑ dulnyɑ kul nɑn u mɑɑn nbɑ mɔk yiikuo nɑ. Wɑɑ din tun lin nbɑ te k niib mɔk nyikcɑbu b biit pɑɑk nɑ puolpo, k u ji kɑl Yɑbnt Yennu niidiitu po *Yendɔunŋ ni.
Bijɑ mɑnŋ nbɑ din cie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ, Yennu din pul’ɔ sɑnn nbɑ gbenŋ bonciɑnn k cie b yɑl.
Setk nɑn mɔni Yennu k mi yet mɑlɑksuɑ ɑ: «Fin e tie n Bijɑ, k lɑɑ nyii dinnɑ min e tie ɑ Bɑɑ.» Yennu biɑ k mi yet mɑlɑksuɑ po ɑ: «N tɑn sii tie ɑ Bɑɑ, k ɑ mun tie n Bijɑ.»
K Yennu nbɑ din tɑn yɑɑ wun tun u Bijɑkpel tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuo nbɑ, k u yet ɑ: «L kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k Yennu mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ kul ɑ n jiɑnt’ɔ.»
Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ po, Yennu din yet ɑ: «U te k u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tie wounŋ, k biɑ te k u tuontunnɑ tie mupienu.»
Ŋɑɑn l yet u Bijɑ nɑ po ŋɑnin ɑ: «Yennu, ɑ nɑɑn nɑ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. K ɑ nɑɑn dɑnml nɑ tie bɑlmɔni dɑnml e.
A luon lin nbɑ tuok, ŋɑɑn nɑn biit, l pɑɑk te k Yennu, wunbɑ tie ɑ Yennu, nɑ lukt’ɑ, k muɑn pɑlpienn kpɑn ɑ yul pɑɑk, k nyik ɑ tɔk-nɑn-lieb ŋɑɑn lukt’ɑ.»
U biɑ yet ɑ: «N Yonmdɑɑnɔ, fin e din nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ pinpiik ni wɑɑ, k nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn ɑ mɔnŋ nii.
Lin nbɑ nɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ gɑl ɑ, ŋɑɑn fin lek sii tun be e. Sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ tɑn sɑɑ kpet e k cɑt cɑt nɑn cincenn nɑ.
A tɑn sɑɑ pɔbn’m nɑn bɑɑɔnŋ nɑ e, k b tɑn sɑɑ lebt nɑɑn nɑn tiɑt nɑ. Ŋɑɑn fin ŋɑnin kpɑn sii tun tie yonm e k ɑ mɑnfuol nɑ kɑɑ juontu.»
Tɔn, Yennu dɑɑ k mi yet mɑlɑksuɑ ɑ: «Kɑln n niidiitu po nnɑ nɑ mɔkmɔk k mɑn tɑn jii ɑ dɑtɑi nɑ k tien’m ɑ tɑɑkpɑktɑ.»
L pɑɑk, mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tie bee? B kul tie sei nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu e, k ŋuɑ Yennu tuun’m ɑ bii sonmt niib nbɑ sɑɑ lɑ fielu nɑ.
L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k tin gbiint bɑlmɔni nbɑ k t din gbɑt nɑ fɑnu k tɑn dɑɑ buol.
Lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ din muɑnt k tul t yejɑnm nɑ din tie bɑlmɔni e, k wun nbɑ din tuu k sɑk k wei’l din tuu lɑ tubdɑtu nbɑ jɑnŋ’ɔ e.

L pɑɑk, t i kii sɑk k gbiint fieljɑɑnn mɑnŋ lɑbɑɑl fɑnu, t sɑɑ tien nlee k nyi tubdɑtu ni? Yonmdɑɑnɔ tiɑɔnŋ o din dɔnŋ muɑnt fielu mɑnŋ lɑbɑɑl nɑ po, k bin nbɑ din gbɑt nɑ din wɑnn’t ɑ l set tie bɑlmɔni e.
Yennu tiɑɔnŋ din wɑnn nɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni e, k din tuun bɑktnɔunŋ nɑn yɑɑl-lituk tuonɑ, k biɑ tien’m Foŋɑnm piini nɑn wɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
*Dulnyɑ nbɑ bɑɑt k t pɑk l po nɑ, Yennu din k yɑɑ ɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ e tie l yudɑnm.
L diɑn siɑl po Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu, nisɑɑlk tie bee k ɑ duki u po, k nilɔ bik tie bee k ɑ bɑkɑ be u ni?
A din sikn’ɔ yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ buol, k biɑ te k u lɑ dontl nɑn pɑku,

k ɑ te k u mɔk yiikuo bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk.» L i tie k b yet ɑ Yennu tul nilɔ yiikuo «bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk,» l wɑnt nɑn u set mɔk yiikuo bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk k siɑl k tenn. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ t dɑɑ k lɑ nɑn u mɔk yiikuo bonsiɑl kul pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn t lɑ nɑn Yennu din sikn Yiesu yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ buol, ɑ k Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ pɑɑk, wun kpo niib kul pɑɑk, k mɔtɑɑnɑ k t lɑ k u mɔk *yudɑnt nɑn sɑnn u kuun mɑnŋ pɑɑk.

K mɑɑn Yennu nbɑ din nɑn bonsiɑl kul k biɑ diɑ l kul nɑ, wɑɑ jii u wɑɑs bonciɑnn k kuɑn’m u nɑɑn ni nɑ, l din tokn u buol ni, ɑ wun te k b fielu dɑɑnɔ Yiesu n tien b Fietuɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni u fɑlɑ dinu ni.
Yiesu, wun nbɑ wu nisɑɑli biit nɑ, nɑn bin nbɑ kul k u wuul b biit nɑ tɑɑ Bɑɑ e. L pɑɑk e k Yiesu k tiin fei nɑn wun yiin’m u nɑɑ wɑɑs.
U yet Yennu ɑ: «N tɑn sɑɑ muɑnt ɑ sɑnn n nɑɑ wɑɑs buol ni; n tɑn sɑɑ pɑk’ɑ ɑ niib tintɑɑnu ni.»
U biɑ yet ɑ: «N tɑn sii duu Yennu pɑɑk,» k biɑ yet ɑ: «Min nɑn wɑɑs nbɑ k Yennu din tul’n nɑ e be nɑ.»
Tɔn, wɑɑs mɑnŋ nbɑ tie nisɑɑli nɑ pɑɑk, Yiesu mun din tie nisɑɑlk e nɑn ŋɑnm nɑ, ɑ u kuun ni wun tɑn biil *Sɑɑtɑn nbɑ diɑ kuun yiikuo nɑ,
k biɑ fɑt bin nbɑ be dɑɑbs ni b mɑnfuol kul ni, bɑɑ tiin kuun jɑŋmɑɑni nɑ pɑɑk nɑ.
Bɑlmɔni e, l k tie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ kɑɑ k u sonmt, ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e k u sonmt.

Ŋɑnn e l din kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn wuu tie wɑɑs mɑnŋ ninnɑɔnŋ dede, k fit tien b *mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nbɑ mɔk ninbɑtinu k biɑ tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ, k fit jii u mɔnŋ k tien *mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu, k wɑɑs nɑ n lɑ nyikcɑbu b biit pɑɑk.
K mɔtɑɑnɑ, u sɑɑ fit k sonm bin nbɑ lɑ jinjɑnmi, k mɑɑn u tiɑɔnŋ din lɑ jinjɑnmi k biɑ dii fɑlɑ wɑɑ.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tie Yennu yɑb k biɑ be bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b nɑ ni, ii goli mɑn Yiesu, wun nbɑ k Yennu din tun’ɔ ɑ wun tɑn tien *mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ t Yenjiɑntu sɔnu ni nɑ.
Muois nbɑ din tie kɑn ŋmɑt puol, k tul Yennu ŋɑɑtieb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nnɑ e mun k Yiesu din tie kɑn ŋmɑt puol k tul Yennu nbɑ din lukt’ɔ nɑ.
Setk nɑn mɔni, Yiesu jɑnŋ nɑn *yudɑnt k gɑl Muois nɑn ŋɑmɑɑlɔ nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn dontl k gɑl ŋɑɑk tiɑɔnŋ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑk i tɑnŋ i sie, suɑ e senn’l, k Yennu e mɑɑ bonsiɑl kul.
Muois din tie tuontunnɔ nbɑ kɑn ŋmɑt puol e Yennu ŋɑɑtieb sinsuuk ni, k din wɑnn lin nbɑ po k Yennu din yɑɑ wun tɑn pɑk siɑn-yuo nɑ.
*Klistu nbɑ tie Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, u tie wun nbɑ kɑn ŋmɑt puol e k yen Yennu ŋɑɑtieb. L i tie k t mɔk pɑlcienn nɑn yugontl t dindɑnn pɑɑk, l wɑnn nɑn tinm e tie Yennu ŋɑɑtieb mɑnŋ.
L pɑɑk, Foŋɑnm nbɑ yet biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ: «I i gbɑt Yennu kunkɔl dinnɑ,
i dɑɑ nyɑl i tubɑ nɑn yɑɑ din kɔn nɑn’ɔ dɑɑl nbɑ k i din bikn’ɔ pɑɑnpieonŋ ni nɑ.
Yennu yet ɑ: ‹B din lɑ mɑɑ din tun lin nbɑ kul k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ piinnɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn lenŋ e k b din bikn’n.
Ŋɑnn e te k n donn wutuol niib mɑnŋ pɑɑk,› k din yet ɑ: ‹B bot b dudukt ni wɑɑ, k k mi mɑɑ luon bii tuun lin nbɑ.›
‹N din donn wutuol k pol’b mɔb ɑ B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.› »
Tɔn, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, i mi k i suɑ n tien biitdɑɑnɔ k kɔnŋ yɑdɑ u pɑl ni k tɑn ŋmɑt puol k nyik Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn ii cien i lieb pɑlɑ dɑɑl n tuu dɑɑl, yuo kul nbɑ k Yennu mɑɑn be i sinsuuk ni k «dinnɑ» i suɑ dɑɑ nyɑl u tubɑ biit nbɑ tuu kpɑnn nilɔ nɑ pɑɑk.
K mɑɑn t tie Klistu tɔk-nɑn-lieb e, l i tie k t duu u pɑɑk nɑn tɑɑ din duu u pɑɑk sinsinn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Nnɑ e k b din diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «I i gbɑt Yennu kunkɔl dinnɑ, i dɑɑ nyɑl i tubɑ nɑn yɑɑ din yet u mɔb yuo nbɑ nɑ.
K lɑnm e din gbɑt u kunkɔl ŋɑɑn yet u mɔb i? Ŋɑnm kɑɑ din tie bin nbɑ nyii Ejipt k Muois din tie tuɑnndɑɑnɔ nɑ ɑɑ?
K lɑnm e biɑk k Yennu wutuol din duo b pɑɑk k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ piinnɑ nɑ? L k tie bin nbɑ din tun biit, k b gbɑnɑnt tɑn biɑl pɑɑnpieonŋ ni nɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ?
Yennu dɑɑ din pol lɑnm e mɔb ɑ: «B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.» L din tie bin nbɑ din kɔn nɑn’ɔ nɑ e.
Ŋɑnn t lɑ nɑn b din k fit kuɑ k mɑɑn b yɑdɑkɑɑln pɑɑk.
Yennu din senn mɔsonn k tul’t, ɑ t sɑɑ fit k kuɑ siɑn nbɑ k u tien t fuon siil nɑ wɑɑ. Ŋɑnn ii mi k i suɑ tɑn sɑɑ kɔnŋ fuon mɑnŋ.
K mɑɑn t gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑn bɑɑ mun din gbɑt’l biɑnŋ nbɑ pɑɑnpieonŋ ni, ŋɑɑn l din k tul’b nyuɑt, k mɑɑn bɑɑ din gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn mɑnŋ, b din k gɑɑl’l nɑn yɑdɑ.

L pɑɑk, tinm nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ, t sɑɑ lɑɑ fuon mɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu din pɑk l po k yet ɑ: «N wutuol e duo, k n pol mɔb ɑ: ‹B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.› » U din tɑn yet lin nbɑ nɑ nɑ, k suɑ k u ponŋ tun u nɑɑmi tuonɑ gbenn pinpiik ni wɑɑ.
K mɑɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni siɑl po l yet l dɑɑŋɑnlole dɑɑl mɑnŋ po ɑ: «K Yennu din nyik u tuonɑ kul ɑ k foi dɑɑŋɑnlole dɑɑl.»
U biɑ yet diɑni nbɑ gɑl nɑ ni ɑ: «B kɑn mi bɑɑl mɑɑ bo yɑɑ n tul’b fuon tinŋ nbɑ nɑ ni.»
Bin nbɑ din gbɑt lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ sinsinn nɑ din k lɑ l fuon mɑnŋ, k mɑɑn b din yet Yennu mɔb. L pɑɑk, nisiɑb be k tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fuon mɑnŋ.
L pɑɑk, k Yennu biɑ senn dɑliel k yi dɑɑl mɑnŋ «dinnɑ.» K binɑ bonciɑnn din gɑl, k Yennu din te k Dɑɑfiid yet l po nɑn tɑɑ ponŋ piɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑ: «I i gbɑt Yennu kunkɔl dinnɑ, i dɑɑ nyɑl i tubɑ.»
K mɑɑn Suosue i bo ii dinŋ ii tul’b fuon mɑnŋ, l puolpo Yennu ji din bo kɑn pɑk dɑliel po.
L pɑɑk, fuondɑsiɑl biɑ dɑɑ be k tie Yennu niib yɑl, k nɑɑn wɑɑ din foi dɑɑŋɑnlole dɑɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
K mɑɑn wun nbɑ lɑ Yennu fuon mɑnŋ nɑ, mun nyik u tuonɑ e k foi nɑn Yennu nbɑ din nyik u tuonɑ k foi biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin yɑbl t mɔnŋ k lɑ fuon mɑnŋ, k t suɑ tɑn dɑɑ bɑɑ nɑn bɑɑ din yet Yennu mɔb k tɑn bɑɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.

K mɑɑn Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie mɑɑn nbɑ fo e, k mɔk pɑnŋ k tuun tuonn, k biɑ di k gɑl juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ di mɔliemi nɑ. Yennu mɑɑn fit ŋmɑ k kuɑ bɑɑt nisɑɑlk siek nɑn u mɑnfuol buol ni, k kuɑ bɑɑt u tuktɑ nɑn u kpɑbɑ biesn ni, k kuɑ bɔktl u dudukt nɑn u pɑl ni bibikt.
Bonnɑnkɑl kul ni siɑl kɑɑ k Yennu k lɑɑt. Bonsiɑl kul duɑ yienin ni e Yennu tuɑnn k ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ k t tɑn sɑɑ wɑnn tɑɑ biil lin nbɑ.
L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tii diɑ t yɑdɑ nbɑ k t fiit wɑnn nɑ kenken, k mɑɑn t mɔk mɑnntɔ-yudɑɑn-jɑɑnn, k ŋuɑ e tie Yennu Bijɑ Yiesu, wun nbɑ ponŋ gɑl sɑɑn Yennu tiɑɔnŋ buol ni nɑ.
T mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ k tie wun nbɑ kɑn fit di fɑlɑ nɑn tinm t butunŋ ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u mɔnŋ din lɑ biknu sɔni buolu kul ni nɑn tɑɑ mun lɑɑt biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn u lek din k tun biit.
L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tii mɔk pɑlpɑɑll k bɑɑl Yennu nbɑ mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ nɑɑngbounŋ buol ni. Lenŋ e k t sɑɑ lɑ nyikcɑbu nɑn ninbɑtinu yuo nbɑ k l sɑɑ sonmt’t nɑ.
Tɔn, b lukt *mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ kul niib sinsuuk ni ɑ wuu tuun Yennu tuonn k sonm niib k biɑ gɑɑl b pɑɑk k mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu b biit pɑɑk.
Wɑɑ mun tie butmɔ nɑ, u fit gbiɑ bin nbɑ puɑl yɑn nɑn bin nbɑ kpet sɔnu ni nɑ dudukt pɑɑk,
k u mɔnŋ nbɑ tie butmɔ nɑ pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k wun mɑnn mɑlunŋ u mɔnŋ biit pɑɑk nɑn wɑɑ mɑnn mɑlunŋ niib nɑ biit pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Suɑ kɑn fit pɑk u mɔnŋ k yet, ɑ u tie mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ k k gɑɑl l nibɑɑkl, sie k Yennu n lukt’ɔ nɑn wɑɑ din lukt *Aɑlɔn k tien’ɔ mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Nnɑ e mun k *Klistu din k lukt u mɔnŋ k yet, ɑ u tie mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ k gɑɑl l nibɑɑkl, ŋɑɑn Yennu e din yet’ɔ ɑ: «A tie n Bijɑ e, k dinnɑ n tie ɑ Bɑɑ.»
K biɑ yet siɑl buol ɑ: «A sii tie mɑnntuɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, kii tie Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni mɑnntuɑ.»

Tɔn, Yiesu nbɑ din be tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuo nbɑ nɑ u din mei Yennu k bɑln’mɔ, k bui nɑn nyin-nyuut Yennu nbɑ sɑɑ fit fɑt’ɔ kuun ni nɑ buol ni. K wɑɑ din bɑɑkt Yennu nɑ pɑɑk k Yennu din gbɑt u miɑlu mɑnŋ.
Wɑɑ lek din tie Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn u tumi cɔlnt u fɑldinu ni.
Wɑɑ din tɑn dii fɑlɑ gbenn yuo nbɑ, bin nbɑ kul cɔln’mɔ ji din fit lɑ fielu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu u buol ni,
k Yennu yiin’ɔ mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ, Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni.
T bo sɑɑ pɑk bonciɑnn lin nbɑ nɑ po, ŋɑɑn l pɑɑl nɑn k t wɑnn’i, k mɑɑn i k bɑnt l pɑɑk yiɑn.
Nnɑ yuo l ji bo kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k yii tie wɑntieb, ŋɑɑn i biɑ luon k suɑ n wɑnn’i Yennu mɑɑn pinpiik ni sɔni nɑ. I luon biin e, k k luon jeŋmɑnkɑt.
Wun nbɑ dɑɑ muɑl biin tie bibunn e, k dɑɑ k mi fɑnu lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn lin nbɑ bi.
Ŋɑɑn jeŋmɑnkɑt tie sɑɑkɑb yɑl e, k ŋɑnm e fit bɑnt lin nbɑ tie bonbiil nɑn lin nbɑ tie bonŋɑnn, bɑɑ tuu dukn l po b pɑlɑ ni nɑ.

L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin tumi lin nbɑ tie sɑɑkɑb yɑl *Klistu ni k sɑɑn tuɑnn po. Ŋɑɑn t ji dɑɑ goli sinsinn tumiu nɑ kɑɑ. T ji k ŋɑnm fɔkn fiɑkl nbɑ sɑɑ te k nilɔ n nyik tuonɑ nbɑ sɑɑ biil’ɔ nɑ kɑɑ, kuo wɑɑ sɑɑ tien Yennu yɑdɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ kɑɑ.
L ji k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tin ŋɑnm tumi Yennu nyunwulu po, nɑn niiyiinu niib pɑɑk, nɑn kpienm fiilu po, nɑn tubdɑtu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ po kɑɑ.
Yennu i sɑk, t sɑɑ sɑɑn tuɑnn e.
Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin got bin nbɑ ŋmɑt bɑɑ binbenbiik ni nɑ: b din lɑ Yennu yentu nɑ wɑɑ. B din lenm **Yendɔunŋ ni piini k biɑ din gɑɑl Foŋɑnm ɑ.
B din luon Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ, k din mi *dulnyɑ nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ yiikuo buolu buolu po.

Ŋɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ nɑ kul, k b lek tɑn ŋmɑt bɑɑ binbenbiik ninŋ. L nibuolu, suɑ ji kɑn fit te k bin ŋɑnm k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ. Bɑlmɔni, b ŋɑnmt kpɑɑn Yennu Bijɑ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk e, k tien lieb yɑɑk nbɑ k b sii suki’ɔ.
Tɔn, tinŋ nbɑ k sɑɑk tuu bɑɑ l pɑɑk k l mɑɑkt k tie jiet k tien bin nbɑ ŋɑnmt’l nɑ, Yennu e yɑt yetŋɑnm tinŋ mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn tinŋ mɑnŋ i tie kunkoni nɑn mɔbiit, l k mɔk nyuɑt, l kɑn wei k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ pol’l mɔb. K juontu ni lin di muu.
T yɔnimɔni, tɑɑ lek piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn t k mɔk bilsuk i po. T mi nɑn i tɔk sɔnŋɑnu e, fielu sɔnu.
Yennu k tuun lin nbɑ k ŋɑn. U kɑn tɑnm i tuonn po, k biɑ kɑn tɑnm yɑɑ luon’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ tuonɑ nbɑ k i tun k tul’ɔ nɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k i tuun i nɑɑ wɑɑs Klistuyɑb nɑ ni.
T luon k i suɑ kul n yɑbl u mɔnŋ pɑɑk nɑn ninmɔnn e nɑn yɑɑ tuu tuun bɑnnu nbɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn l juontu, k yɑɑ mɔk dindɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l set sɑɑ tien mɔni k tul’i.
T k luon k yii tie gbɑn-nyɑkdɑnm kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t luon k yii wɑɑ bin nbɑ mɔk yɑdɑ nɑn suklu e. Ŋɑnm e gɑɑn bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn nɑ.

Yennu nbɑ din senn u mɔsonn tul Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yuo nbɑ nɑ, u din lol *lol, ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ tun wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ. Suɑ din k be k cie Yennu tiɑɔnŋ, k l pɑɑk, u din jii u mɔnŋ sɑnn e k lol u lol mɑnŋ.
U din yet’ɔ ɑ: «L tie bɑlmɔni e, n yɑt yetŋɑnm ɑ pɑɑk k biɑ sɑɑ tul’ɑ yɑɑbuonɑ bonciɑnn.»
K Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din mɔk suklu e, k tɑn gɑɑl lin nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ.
Nilɔ i lol lol, u tuu jii wun nbɑ gɑl’ɔ sɑnn e k lol, k lol mɑnŋ tie nyinn nbɑ kpi mɔniɑɔk kul ɑ.
Tɔn, bin nbɑ din yɑɑ bin gɑɑl Yennu nbɑ din senn mɔsonn nbɑ nɑ, u din luon wun wɑnn’b, ɑ u kɑn mi lebt u dudukt, k l pɑɑk k u din pukn u lol u mɔsonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.

L pɑɑk, bonɑ ŋɑnle be k kɑɑ lebtu k Yennu biɑ kɑn fit fɑɑl fɑɑk l pɑɑk. Ŋɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, tinm nbɑ lɑ gungulbuol u buol ni nɑ, t mɔk pɑlcienn nbɑ sɑɑ te k tin tin k suol dindɑnn nbɑ k Yennu din senn’t mɔsonn nɑ nɑn pɑnŋ.
Dindɑnn nbɑ k t mɔk nɑ tie nɑn mɑnfuol jɑɑntɑlk nbɑ diɑ t mɑnfuol fɑnu. L tie dindɑnn nbɑ gɑl Yendɔunŋ ni Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk cincenn nbɑ tuu juɑn k puun nɑ e, k kuɑ dieok mɑnŋ linn po.
Lenŋ e k Yiesu ponŋ din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k gɑl k tie t sɔnliitɔ, k tien t *mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni.
Melkiisedek mɑnŋ din tie Sɑɑlem tinŋ kpɑnbɑl e k biɑ din tie Yɑbnt Yennu mɑnntuɑ. Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din tɑn nyii tɔb nbɑ k u din kɔn nyɑnn kpɑnbɑlɑ nɑ, Melkiisedek din cet’ɔ k yɑt yetŋɑnm u pɑɑk,

k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din nyinn bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ wɑɑ din kɔn fɑt bont nbɑ nɑ kul ni k tul’ɔ. (Melkiisedek sɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk tie ɑ: «kpɑnbɑl nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn,» k biɑ jen ɑ u din tie Sɑɑlenm kpɑnbɑl e k l pɑɑk u mun tie «mɑnu kpɑnbɑl.»)

Lɑbɑsiɑl k be k wɑnt Melkiisedek bɑɑ po ɑmi u nɑɑ po ɑmi u yejɑnm po. Lɑbɑsiɑl kɑɑ k wɑnt u mɑlu po ɑmi u kuun po. U nɑɑn nɑn Yennu Bijɑ nɑ e. U lek biɑ tun tie Yennu mɑnntuɑ e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
L pɑɑk, i lɑ wɑɑ din tie nijɑɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ, k mɑɑn t yejɑsɑɑkuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm lek din tɑn nyinn wɑɑ din kɔn fɑt bont nbɑ tɔb ni nɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ k tul’ɔ.
Senni din wɑnn ɑ Liefi yɑɑbuonɑ nbɑ tie mɑnntieb nɑ, ɑ bin tuu gɑɑl b niib *Suifnbɑ nbɑ mɔk lin nbɑ l bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ, ŋɑɑn b niib mɑnŋ mun biɑ lek din tie Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑɑbuonɑ e.
Melkiisedek din k tie Liefi yɑɑbuonn kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din gɑɑl bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm buol, k biɑ yɑt yetŋɑnm Ablɑɑhɑɑnm pɑɑk, wun nbɑ din gɑɑl Yennu mɔsonŋɑnɑ nɑ.
Mɔniɑɔk kɑɑ nɑn nisuɑ nbɑ yɑt yetŋɑnm e tie nijɑɑnn k gɑl wun nbɑ gɑɑn yetŋɑnm mɑnŋ.

Mɑnntieb nbɑ din tuu gɑɑn niib nbɑ mɔk lin nbɑ l bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ nɑ din tie nisɑɑli k din tuu tɑn kpo, ŋɑɑn Melkiisedek wun nbɑ din gɑɑl Ablɑɑhɑɑnm bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ nɑ ŋɑnin be, nɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ wɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.

T sɑɑ fit yet ɑ yuo nbɑ k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din nyinn u bont ni bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ nɑ, u yɑɑbuonɑ *Liefiitnbɑ, bin nbɑ din tɑn gɑɑn bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ mɑnŋ, mun din tul b bonɑ bɔktu piik ni yenn kuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm ni,
k mɑɑn Melkiisedek nbɑ din cet Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yuo nbɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ Liefi din be Ablɑɑhɑɑnm gbɑnɑnt ni.

Yennu din tul *Suifnbɑ *senni k wɑnn Liefiitnbɑ b mɑnnu tuonɑ nbɑ sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ e. K Liefiitnbɑ mɑnntieb tuonɑ ii dinŋ ii fit te k nilɔ tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol ni, l din bo kɑn kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k mɑnntɔgɑnɔ wun nbɑ k set *Aɑlɔn setu ni, ŋɑɑn sie Melkiisedek setu ni nɑ n bɑɑl.
K mɑɑn mɑnntieb *yudɑnt lebtu i bɑɑl, l mun tie k senni n lebt e.
K t Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wun nbɑ k mɔbonɑ nɑ piɑk u po nɑ, nyii buolgɑnu nbɑ ni k b suɑ din k mi tun mɑnntuɑ tuonn binbintl buol ni e.
Suɑ kul ponŋ mi nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nyii Suudɑ nibuolu ni, nibuolu nbɑ k Muois din k mi pɑk siɑl b po k jikt sɑɑ mɑnntieb po.
Gotl lin nbɑ te k t mɑntk bɑnn mɑɑn mɑnŋ pɑɑk nbɑ tie lin nbɑ. Mɑnntɔgɑnɔ nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn Melkiisedek, din tɑn bɑɑl.
Ŋuɑ e tie mɑnntuɑ, k nisɑɑlk senni ni kɑɑ k u tien l mɑnntuɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ yiikuo ni e k u tien mɑnntuɑ.
K mɑɑn b din diɑn u po Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «A tɑn sii tie mɑnntuɑ e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, kii tie Melkiisedek pɑɑbu ni mɑnntuɑ.»
L pɑɑk, senkpelu nɑ ji din bɑkn e, k mɑɑn l din k mɔk pɑnŋ, k biɑ k mɔk nyuɑt,
k mɑɑn Muois senni mɑnŋ din k fit te k siɑl ŋɑn. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ t ji mɔk lin nbɑ tul’t dindɑnn nbɑ cie nɑ, k l ni e k t cɑt nɑkn Yennu buol ni.
K Yennu pol k set k pukn l pɑɑk. Yennu din tuu k puol k tien mɑnntɔlieb nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn Yiesu din tien mɑnntuɑ yuo nbɑ k Yennu din tɑn pol k yet’ɔ ɑ: «A Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu senn mɔsonn k ji kɑn lebt u dudukt, k yet ɑ: ‹Fin e sii tie mɑnntuɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.› »
L pɑɑk, nnɑ e te k Yiesu tie wun nbɑ wɑnn nɑn *lol nbɑ cie nɑ kɑɑ lotu.
Tɔn, yɑɑyuo ni mɑnntieb mɑnŋ din yɑb k mɑɑn b din tuu kpo e, k ji kii be b tuonn nɑ ni yuo kul.
Ŋɑɑn Yiesu ŋɑnin sii tun be k tie mɑnntuɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k u tuonɑ nɑ kɑn mi nyi u nuu ni k suɑ n gɑɑl’l.
L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ cɑt nɑkn Yennu, ŋuɑ Yiesu ni, u fit fiel’b mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k mɑɑn u lek be u mɑnfuol ni yuo kul, k mei Yennu k tien’m.

L pɑɑk, Yiesu e tie t mɑnntuɑ nbɑ jɑnŋ nɑn t sonml. Ŋuɑ e tie wun nbɑ penn Yennu pɑl ni, k u k mɔk biit, k suɑ k fit tɑɑl’ɔ siɑl pɑɑk. Biit dɑnm be b kuɑ k u mun biɑ be u kuɑ, k Yennu donn’ɔ k kuɑn’ɔ *Yendɔunŋ ni.

*Mɑnntɔyudɑnlieb nɑ din tuu mɑnn *mɑlunŋ dɑɑl n tuu dɑɑl b tiɑɔnŋ biit pɑɑk sinsinn, k biɑ mɑnn *mɑlunŋ niib biit pɑɑk. Ŋuɑ Yiesu k tie nnɑ kɑɑ. U din jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ e, k l jɑnŋ nɑn niib kul ɑ.

Muois senni nɑ lukt nisɑɑli k tien’m mɑnntɔyudɑnm nbɑ k tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni e. Ŋɑɑn, wɑɑ din tul senni mɑnŋ puolpo nɑ k Yennu din pol k yet, ɑ u Bijɑ sii tie mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Bɑli nɑ bɑlnuɑk wɑnt nɑn t mɔk *mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ nbɑ tie nnɑ mun, k kɑl Yennu nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ kul nɑ nɑɑngbounŋ niidiitu po *Yendɔunŋ ni,
k tuun mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ tuonɑ Yennu dieok ni, k dieok mɑnŋ tie bɑlmɔni jɑɑnti lɑnbounŋ nbɑ k b tien nɑn bonkobgbɑnt nɑ, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din tien k l k tie nisɑɑlk yɑl kɑɑ.
B lukt mɑnntuɑ kul, ɑ wun jii piini k biɑ mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu e. Nnɑ e k l mun kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k t mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ ii mɔk siɑl k tul.
L i bo i tie k u be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, u bo kii tie mɑnntuɑ fɑb ɑ, k mɑɑn mɑnntieb nbɑ tien Yennu piini, *Suifnbɑ *senni nbɑ senn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ponŋ be.

B tuun b tuonɑ jɑɑnti dieok nbɑ nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ ni e. Ŋɑnn e te k Yennu din kpɑɑn Muois yuo nbɑ k u din yɑɑ wun cɑɑn jɑɑnti lɑnbounŋ nɑ, ɑ: «A tun bonsiɑl kul k lii nɑɑn nɑn lin nbɑ k n wɑnn’ɑ juɑl pɑɑk.»
Yiesu mɑnnu tuonɑ nbɑ k Yennu tul’ɔ nɑ cie b mɑnnu tuonɑ k *lol nbɑ k u tuun nɑn’n nɑ cie lolkpel nɑ k u lol mɑnŋ gɑɑ nɑn mɔsonɑ nbɑ cie nɑ e.
K mɑɑn sinsinn *lol nɑ ii dinŋ ii tien dede, l ji din bo kii kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k Yennu n tul lol pukn tɑɑl munle.
Ŋɑɑn Yennu din lɑ nisɑɑli biit e, k u yet ɑ: «Min nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ e yien’i ɑ yuo bɑɑt, k n tɑn sɑɑ lol lolpɑɑnn k tul Islɑɑeltieb nɑn Suudɑ niib.

L tɑn kii tie nɑn lol nbɑ k n din senn k tul b yejɑnm dɑɑl nbɑ k n din kub b nii k nyinn’b Ejipt tinŋ ni nɑ. B din k wei lol nbɑ k n din tul’b nɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni, k l pɑɑk, k n bɑkɑ din kɑɑ b po. Min nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ e yien’i nɑ.
Lol nbɑ k n yɑɑ n senn k tul Islɑɑeltieb tie nɑ e. Dɑɑ nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ ni, n ji sɑɑ tɑbn n senni mɑnŋ b dudukt ni e, k diɑn tɑbn b pɑlɑ ni. N sii tie b Yennu e k b mun tie n niib.
L ji kii kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k b suɑ n wɑnn u luɑ ɑmi k yet u nɑɑ bik ɑ: ‹Fin, bɑnt Yonmdɑɑnɔ,› k mɑɑn b kul ɑ tɑn sii mi min e, lɑɑ jii bonbis k sɑɑ tuu sɑɑkɑb.
N tɑn sɑɑ nyik b biit k cɑb’b, k ji kii tiɑn b biit nɑ po.»
Yennu nbɑ piɑk lolpɑɑnn mɑnŋ po nɑ e, k sinsinn mɔlol nɑ tien lolkpel, k bonsiɑl nbɑ kpet k kokl, l k fɔk nɑn botu.
Tɔn, Yennu nbɑ din *lol sinsinn lol k tul’b nɑ, u biɑ din tul’b *senni nbɑ wɑnt’b bɑɑ sii jiɑntl’ɔ biɑnŋ nbɑ, nɑn bɑɑ sii jiɑntl’ɔ siɑn nbɑ tinŋ nɑ pɑɑk.

B din fɑɑ bonkobgbɑnt lɑnbounŋ o, k cincen juɑn k bɔkt’l munle. Sinsinn yɑl nbɑ k b din yi’l *siɑn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ, b din senn fitl e, k tiebul sie lenŋ, k pɑɑnu nbɑ k b tien k l tie Yennu yɑl nɑ tuɑ l pɑɑk.
K cincen nbɑ juɑn nɑ linn po mun, k b yi lenŋ siɑn nbɑ mɑntk ŋɑn.

Sɑlmɑ binbintl din be, k b jokt wubt l pɑɑk, k Yennu senni lɑkl din be k b tɑbn sɑlmɑ l kul po, k sɑlmɑ bobl din be lɑkl nɑ ni nɑn jiet nbɑ k b yi’l mɑɑnn nɑ. K *Aɑlɔn pɑtu nbɑ din yinn puuk nɑ kpie lɑkl mɑnŋ ni, k tɑnɑ ŋɑnle nbɑ k b din kuol k senni diɑn l pɑɑk nɑ kpie l ni.
Selubɑnnbɑ din tuɑ lɑkl mɑnŋ pɑɑk k mɔk *yudɑnt bonciɑnn k wɑnt nɑn Yennu be, k b kpinkpɑnt bɑkn siɑn nbɑ k b din mɑnn biit nyikcɑbu *mɑlunŋ nɑ. Ŋɑɑn l k tie mɔtɑɑnɑ kɑɑ k t sɑɑ pɑk l po.
Bɑɑ din senn bonɑ kul ɑ nnɑ nɑ e, k mɑnntieb din tuu kuɑ Yenjiɑntu lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ pɑk-luolu ni yuo kul k tuun Yenjiɑntu tuonɑ.
Ŋɑɑn mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ kuukuɑ e din tuu kuɑ lɑnbounŋ nɑ linn po yonm kuɑ binn nuɑk ni. U din tuu diɑ sɔn e k mɑnn mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu, u mɔnŋ biit pɑɑk, nɑn niib nbɑ din tuu kpet tun biit nɑ pɑɑk.
Nnɑ e k Foŋɑnm din wɑnt nɑn siɑn nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ dɑɑ k luot yuo nbɑ k sinsinn lɑnbounŋ mɑnŋ dɑɑ din sie nɑ.

Ŋɑnn e tie lin nbɑ wɑnn’t siɑl k jiin mɔtɑɑnɑ po. L wɑnt nɑn piini nbɑ k b din tuu tul Yennu, nɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ k b din tuu mɑnn k tul’ɔ nɑ kul din k fit te k nilɔ nbɑ jiɑntl Yennu nnɑ nɑ tie niŋɑnɔ u buol ni.
Ŋɑnn din tuu tie jiet nɑn bon-nyu-nyuut nɑn gbɑnɑnt ŋɑnmu kuukuɑ e. Lin nbɑ nɑ kul din tie gbɑnɑnt senni e, ɑ bii wɑɑ’l mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ senn u senpɑɑnu.

Ŋɑɑn *Klistu bɑɑl k tie bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ ponŋ be nɑ *mɑnntɔyudɑɑnɔ e. U din kuɑ lɑnbounŋ nbɑ tie lɑnbonjɑɑnn k biɑ sie fɑnu, k biɑ ŋɑn nɑ ni, k l k tie lin nbɑ k nisɑɑlk tien k biɑ k tie tingbounŋ nɑ ni yɑl.
Klistu nbɑ din kuɑ siɑn nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni yonm kuɑ nɑ, u din k kuɑ nɑn bujɑi nɑn nɑɑjɑi sɔn kɑɑ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ, ŋɑɑn u din jii u mɔnŋ sɔn e k pɑ k gɑɑl fielu nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu k tul’t.

B din tuu jii bujɑi nɑn nɑɑjɑi sɔn e, k biɑ jii nɑɑsɑl k mɑnn k juo muu, ŋɑɑn jii l tɑnpent nɑ nɑn sɔn mɑnŋ k mii mii niib nbɑ din tuu mɔk biit k jiin b jɑɑnti senni nɑ po, ɑ lin wuul b biit nbɑ k nilɔ sɑɑ fit lɑ nɑ.

L tie k l tie mɔni i e, Klistu sɔn biɑ sii mɔk yiikuo k gɑl bonkobt sɔn nɑ. Bɑlmɔni, Foŋɑnm pɑnŋ ni, Klistu din yit u mɔnŋ sɑlk k tul Yennu, k l tie mɑlunŋ nbɑ ŋɑn. Nnɑ e k u sɑɑ wuul t pɑl nbɑ gbie nɑn tuonbiit nbɑ sɑɑ nɑn’t kuun ni nɑ. Ŋɑnn e sɑɑ te k tin fit k tun Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ tuonɑ.

L pɑɑk, Klistu e tie wun nbɑ te k *lolpɑɑnn gbie, ɑ bin nbɑ k Yennu yiin’m nɑ n lɑ yetŋɑnm nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn k tul’b nɑ. Kuun nbɑ k Klistu din kpo nɑ fɑt niib biit nbɑ k b din tuun yuo nbɑ k b tuu wɑɑ lolkpel nɑ ni wɑɑ.
Tɔn, nilɔ ii diɑn u fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k bin wɑnn nɑn wun nbɑ diɑn fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ kpo wɑɑ.
Yuo nbɑ k wun nbɑ diɑn fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ dɑɑ be u mɑnfuol ni nɑ, fɑdinu kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ k mɔk nyuɑt. L nyuɑt be u kuun puolpo e wɑɑ.
L pɑɑk e te k sinsinn lol nɑ din mɔk nyuɑt sɔn mɑlunŋ puolpo nɑ kuukuɑ.

Yuo nbɑ k Muois din muɑnt Yennu senni kul nɑn lɑɑ diɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ k tul niib nɑ, u din jii dufɑtlɑi k lol nɑn pekobmɔnt k pɑk nɑɑjɑi nɑn bujɑi sɔn nbɑ ŋmɑt nɑn nyun nɑ, k mii mii’l senni kɑdɑɑɔk nɑn niib mɑnŋ kul pɑɑk,
k yien’m ɑ: «Lol nbɑ k Yennu senn tul’i ɑ yin sɑk’l nɑ sɔn e nɑ.»
Muois biɑ din tuu mii sɔn mɑnŋ Yenjiɑntu lɑnbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk e, nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ k b diɑ jiɑntl Yennu nɑ pɑɑk.
Bɑlmɔni e, Yennu senni wɑnnu ni, sɔn e din tuu ŋɑnm bont kul k l be fɑnu k k mɔk biit, k sɔn i kii nyii, Yennu kɑn nyik cɑb niib biit.
L pɑɑk, l din tuu kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k bin mɑnn mɑlunŋ k ŋɑnm bonɑ nbɑ tie *Yendɔunŋ ni bonɑ ninnɑɔnŋ nɑ, ŋɑɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ cie nisɑɑlk yɑl sɑɑ ŋɑnm Yendɔunŋ ni bonɑ tiɑɔnŋ.
Klistu din k kuɑ jɑɑnti buol nbɑ k nisɑɑlk ŋɑnm, k l tie Yendɔunŋ ni bont nbɑ tie l bɑlmɔni nɑ ninnɑɔnŋ nɑ ni kɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn u din sɑɑn kuɑ Yendɔunŋ mɔnŋ mɔnŋ ni e, siɑn nbɑ k u be Yennu tuɑnn t pɑɑk nɑ.

Suifnbɑ mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ nɑ tuu kuɑ nɑn bonkobt sɔn buol nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni yonm kuɑ e binn kul nuɑk ni, ŋɑɑn Klistu ŋɑnin din k kuɑ lenŋ tɑɑl fuunu munŋɑ kɑɑ wɑɑ, k jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ.

L ii dinŋ ii bo i tie nnɑ i e, ŋɑnn lɑɑ din nyii *dulnyɑ nɑmu pinpiik ni wɑɑ, u din bo sɑɑ di fɑlɑ tɑɑl bonciɑnn. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, yuo nbɑ ji tɑn pel juontu nɑ k u din dɔkt ɑ wun jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ k kpien biit.
Yennu senn ɑ sie k nilɔ kul n kpo yonm kuɑ, k l puolpo Yennu n bu u buut.
Nnɑ e mun, Klistu din jii u mɔnŋ k mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ k nyinn nifosɑɑli bonciɑnn biit nɑ. U tɑn sɑɑ jen ɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie u tɑn sɑɑ nyinn niib biit kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ guu’u nɑ fielu.

*Suifnbɑ *senni nɑ k wɑnn bonɑ nbɑ tie bɑnnu nbɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni, ŋɑɑn l tie bonŋɑnɑ nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ ninnɑɔnŋ o. L pɑɑk, lɑɑ wɑnt bɑɑ sii mɑnn *mɑlunŋ binn kul bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, l kɑn bɑn te k bin nbɑ nɑkn Yennu nɑ, ii tie niŋɑnm u buol ni.
L mɑlunŋ ii bo ii fit te k niib tie niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni e, b din bo sɑɑ mɑnn yonm kuɑ e ŋɑɑn ji nyik, k biit ji kii wɑɑ’b.
Ŋɑɑn binn n tuu binn mɑlunŋ tuonɑ nɑ kpɑn din tiɑn niib nɑ b biit po e.
K mɑɑn nɑɑjɑi nɑn bujɑi sɔn nɑ k fit nyinn biit.
L pɑɑk, *Klistu nbɑ din yɑɑ wun sik tingbounŋ nɑ ni yuo nbɑ nɑ, u din yet Yennu ɑ: «A k luon bin tul’ɑ mɑlunŋ nɑn piini kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ nɑn gbɑnɑnt e k tul’n,
k biɑ k mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ k b tie biit nyikcɑbu pɑɑk nɑ.
L pɑɑk e te k n din yet ɑ: ‹Yennu, min e nɑ, n sɑɑ tun ɑ lonm nɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu kɑdɑɑɔk ni k yet n po bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.› »

Sinsinn, u din yet ɑ: «A k luon bin tul’ɑ mɑlunŋ nɑn piini, nɑn bonkobt nbɑ k b jokt muu nɑ nɑn mɑlunŋ nbɑ k b tuu mɑnn biit pɑɑk, k ɑ biɑ k mɔk pɑlpienn l pɑɑk.» Ŋɑɑn b din mɑnn l mɑlunŋ nɑn senni nbɑ wɑnn bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
L puolpo k u biɑ yet ɑ: «Yennu, min e nɑ, n sɑɑ tun ɑ lonm ɑ.» L pɑɑk, k Klistu fɑɑ kpien mɑlnkpelɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn jii u mɑlunŋ nɑ k senn l setu ni.
Yiesu Klistu din tun lin nbɑ k Yennu luon wun tun nɑ, k jii u gbɑnɑnt k mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ k l jɑnŋ nɑn niib kul ɑ, k fɑt’t biit ni.
Mɑnntuɑ kul tuu sie e dɑɑl n tuu dɑɑl k tuun u tuonn, k tun k mɑnn mɑlnbuolyenŋ, ŋɑɑn k l kɑn fit k nyinn biit.
Ŋɑɑn Klistu ŋɑnin din mɑnn mɑlunŋ yonm kuɑ e, lin nbɑ mɔk yiikuo yuo kul biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn ŋmɑt duo *Yendɔunŋ ni k kɑl Yennu niidiitu po.
Lenŋ e k u be k guu mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ te k wun ŋmɑɑ u dɑtɑi.
Nnɑ e k ŋuɑ din mɑnn mɑln-yenml k te k bin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑb nɑ tien niŋɑnm Yennu buol ni nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
K Foŋɑnm mun biɑ tien’t u *siɑlɑ k yet sinsinn ɑ:
«I Yonmdɑɑnɔ yet ɑ: ‹Mɑɑ yɑɑ n tul’b *lol nbɑ e nɑ dɑɑl mɑnŋ puolpo. N tɑn sɑɑ tien n senni b pɑlɑ ni, k diɑn b dudukt ni.› »
L puolpo k u biɑ ŋɑnm yet ɑ: «N ji kɑn mi k tiɑl b biit nɑn b tuonbiit nɑ po jik.»
Ŋɑɑn nyikcɑbu nbɑ be nɑ, l ji k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn bin mɑnn mɑlnsiɑɔk biit pɑɑk.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, Yiesu sɔn pɑɑk k t mɔk pɑlcienn nɑn tin kuɑ buol nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni.
Yiesu e luot mɑnfuol sɔnpɑɑnu jɑɑnti dieok cincenn ni k tul’t, k ŋɑnn e tie u gbɑnɑnt.
T mɑnntɔjɑɑnn nbɑ yen Yennu ŋɑɑk mɑnŋ.

L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tin cɑt nɑkn Yennu nɑn pɑlɑ nbɑ gbie nɑn bɑlmɔni kuukuɑ nɑn bɑlmɔni yɑdɑ, k dɑɑ mɔk bilsuk, k dɑɑ mɔk *siɑl ɑ dudukbiit t pɑl ni, kii mɔk gbɑnɑnt nbɑ k b din wuul nɑn nyun nbɑ kɑɑ jɑknt nɑ.
Ŋɑɑnt k tii diɑ dindɑnn nbɑ k t fiit wɑnn nɑ fɑnu mɑn, k dɑɑ bils, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ din senn mɔsonn k tul’t nɑ k ŋmɑt puol.
Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k tii guu lieb, kii mɔk lonm nɑn lieb, kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ,
k dɑɑ nyikt lɑknɑ nɑn t lieb nɑn nisiɑb nbɑ nyikt lɑknu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn tii cien t lieb pɑlɑ, k dɑɑ mɑntk yɑɑ tɑɑ ji lɑɑt k Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ pel nɑ.
Tɑɑ bɑnn bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ nbɑ fiit wɑnn’t nɑ, t i biɑ kii luon k tii tuun biit i e, mɑlnsiɑɔk ji kɑɑ k sɑɑ wuul t biit mɑnŋ.
L i tie nnɑ i e, lin nbɑ ji biɑl tie tii tiin jɑŋmɑɑni e, kii guu lin nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl. Ŋɑnn e tie buut nɑn muciɑɔnŋ nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ biil Yennu dɑtɑi nɑ.
Wun nbɑ din tuu yet Muois senni nɑ weiu, k niib bɑnn k tien siɑlɑɑdɑnm bɑnle ɑmi bɑntɑ, b din tuu kpi’u, k ninbɑtinu kɑɑ.

L pɑɑk, nilɔ nbɑ fiɑk Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ k k bɑɑkt sɔn nbɑ te k Yennu *lol nɑ gbie, k biɑ te k u tie Yennu yuɑ nɑ, k suki Foŋɑnm nbɑ tien ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ, biknt l dɑɑnɔ k lɑɑn u tubdɑtbiiuk nbɑ sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
K mɑɑn t mi wun nbɑ din yet ɑ: «Min e sɑɑ pɑ pɑnn k jiin biit.» K u biɑ yet ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ e tɑn sɑɑ bu u niib buut.»
L tie bonbilɑnkɑnt e, k suɑ n tɑn kuɑ mɑnfodɑɑnɔ Yennu wutuol ni.
Ii tiɑn mɑn yuo nbɑ gɑl nɑ lɑbɑɑl. Yennu yentu nbɑ din yent i pɑɑk yuo nbɑ, i din di fɑlɑ bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn l fɑlsiɑl din k nyɑnn’i ni.
Yenn-yuo b din tuu suki’i, k dint’i fɑlɑ biɑk niib ni, k lielyuo mun, i din tien siil nɑn yin sonm bin nbɑ k b dint’b fɑlɑ nɑ.

I din mɔk ninbɑtinu nɑn bin nbɑ be dɑnsɑli ni, k siɑn-yuo bin din tɑn fɑt i fɑɑl, ŋɑɑn k i din gɑɑl l fɑlɑ nɑn pɑlpienn, k mɑɑn i din mi nɑn i mɔk mɔktuk nbɑ ŋɑn k cie tingbounŋ ni yɑl k biɑ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ nyikt l dindɑnn, k mɑɑn l bɑɑt nɑn nyɔciɑɔnŋ o.
L ŋɑn k yii mɔk suklu, k fit tun Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, k lɑ wɑɑ din senn mɔsonn ɑ u sɑɑ tul’t lin nbɑ nɑ.
K mɑɑn lɑɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ ɑ: «L tenn yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ e k wun nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl, k kɑn wei nɑn bɑɑlu.
Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tie niŋɑnɔ n buol ni nɑ sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol u yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn l i tie k u ŋmɑt puol, n tɑn kii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn’ɔ.»
Tinm k tie nɑn bin nbɑ ŋmɑt puol k bot nɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn t tie nɑn bin nbɑ tien Klistu yɑdɑ k lɑɑt fielu nɑ e.
Yɑdɑ tie, tɑɑ k mɔk bilsuk nɑn bont nbɑ k t mɔk dindɑnn l pɑɑk nɑ set be, ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k lɑ’l nɑn t ninbinn nɑ e.
Yennu din pɑk yɑɑyuo ni niib nɑ b yɑdɑ pɑɑk e.
T yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k t bɑnn nɑn Yennu din tul mɔb k *dulnyɑ tien, k tɑɑ lɑɑt bonɑ nbɑ nɑ u din k jii bonsiɑl nbɑ k t lɑɑt nɑ kɑɑ k nɑn.

Abel yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din mɑnn mɑnnu tul Yennu k l mɑnnu ŋɑn k gɑl Kɑɑen yɑl. U yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu din yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ ŋuɑ Yennu buol ni, k mɑɑn Yennu tiɑɔnŋ din gɑɑl u piini nɑ wɑɑ. Abel din kpo wɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u biɑ lek dɑɑ piɑk.

Enɔk yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din tɑn k kpo, ŋɑɑn k Yennu din jii’u k duo nɑn’ɔ *Yendɔunŋ ni, k suɑ ji k lɑ’u, k mɑɑn Yennu e ponŋ din jii’u. K l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, ɑ yuo nbɑ k Yennu dɑɑ din k jii’u nɑ, u din penn Yennu pɑl ni wɑɑ.
Nilɔ i kii tien Yennu yɑdɑ, l dɑɑnɔ kɑn fit penn ŋuɑ Yennu pɑl ni, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ kul bɑɑt Yennu buol ni, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k l dɑɑnɔ n tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yennu set be k tien bin nbɑ kpɑɑn’ɔ nɑ nyuɑt.

Noe yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u gbɑt Yennu kpɑɑni nbɑ piɑk lin nbɑ k Noe dɑɑ din k fit lɑ’l nɑn u ninbinn nɑ po. U din sɑk Yennu mɔb k kpɑɑ ŋɑlngbenŋl, k ŋuɑ nɑn u ŋɑɑtieb kuɑ lenŋ k lɑ fielu wɑɑ. Ŋɑnn e din wɑnn nɑn tingbounŋ nɑ niib mɔk biit Yennu buol ni, ŋɑɑn k Noe yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk k Yennu din yet, ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol ni.
Yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm sɑk Yennu yiini, k sɑɑn tinŋ nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn k yɑɑ ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ ni. U din nyik u mɔnŋ duo e, ŋɑɑn k k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn.

U yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din dɑɑ tie sɑɑmɔ tinŋ nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn k yɑɑ ɑ u sɑɑ tul’ɔ nɑ ni. U din be bonkobgbɑnt lɑnbont ni e. U wɑɑs Isɑɑk nɑn Sɑɑkɔb nbɑ mun din tɑn gɑɑl Yennu mɔsonn nɑ din be l biɑnŋ e.
K mɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din guu, ɑ wun tɑn kuɑ duo nbɑ k Yennu din buɑn k mɑɑ k l fiɑkl wɑki hei nɑ ni e.
Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din gɑl nɑn mɑtuk ɑ, k Sɑɑlɑ mun din tie puokɑnmɑtl e, ŋɑɑn k Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑdɑ pɑɑk k u din fit lɑ bik, k mɑɑn u din mi nɑn wun nbɑ din senn mɔsonn mɑnŋ nɑ k ŋmɑt puol.

L pɑɑk, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din tie nilɔ nbɑ ji tɑn k fɔk nɑn kuun nɑ, ŋɑɑn u kuukuɑ yɑɑbuonɑ e tɑn yɑb nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ nbɑ yɑb biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k biɑ yɑb nɑn mɔkgbenŋl gbingbɑnn pɑɑk tɑnbiini nbɑ yɑb k kɑɑ kɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.

Niib nbɑ nɑ kul din tuu tɑn kpo nɑn b yɑdɑ ŋɑɑn dɑɑ k gɑɑl lin nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul u niib nɑ, ŋɑɑn b yɑdɑ mɑnŋ pɑɑk, b din dɔnŋ lɑ’l bɑnfɔkl e wɑɑ k biɑ gɑɑl nɑn l tie bonŋɑnn e. B din bɑnn k sɑk nɑn b tie sɑɑnm e k tie kunsɑnnɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
Niib nbɑ yien lin nbɑ nɑ, fiit k wɑnt nɑn b lek dɑɑ kpɑɑn b tiɑɔnŋ duo siɑl po e.
Niib mɑnŋ ii dinŋ ii pɑbi bɑɑ ponŋ nyii duo nbɑ nɑ po i e, b din bo sɑɑ fit ŋmɑt ɑ.
