Ŋɑɑn b bɑkɑ din be Yendɔunŋ ni duo nbɑ cie nɑ po e. K l pɑɑk Yennu k tiin fei nɑn bin yiin’ɔ b Yennu, k mɑɑn u ponŋ din ŋɑnm dosɑu e k guun’m.

Yuo nbɑ k Yennu din bikn’ɔ nɑ, Ablɑɑhɑɑnm yɑdɑ pɑɑk e biɑk, k u din jii u bijɑ Isɑɑk, ɑ wun mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu. Ŋuɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm e k Yennu din senn’ɔ mɔsonɑ, ŋɑɑn k u biɑ wɑnn Yennu nɑn u tien siil k sɑɑ jii u bijɑyenml k tien mɑlunŋ k tul’ɔ.
Ŋɑɑn Yennu din ponŋ yet’ɔ ɑ: «Isɑɑk ni e k ɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ yɑɑbuonɑ nbɑ k n din senn mɔsonn, ɑ n sɑɑ tul’ɑ nɑ.»
Ŋɑɑn Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din dukn nɑn Yennu mɔk yiikuo nbɑ sɑɑ fiin nilɔ kuun ni e. L pɑɑk e k Yennu din jiin u bik k tul’ɔ, k l nɑɑn nɑn u fiil kuun ni nɑ e.
Isɑɑk yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u yɑt yetŋɑnm Sɑɑkɔb nɑn Esɑɑu pɑɑk k jiin lin nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
Yuo nbɑ k Sɑɑkɔb din yɑɑ wun kpo nɑ, u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u yɑt yetŋɑnm Suosiɑf bonjɑi nɑ pɑɑk, k din tɑn diin u pɑtu k jiɑnt Yennu.
Suosiɑf mɑnfuol nbɑ din tɑn yɑɑ lin gbenn yuo nbɑ nɑ, u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din pɑk Islɑɑeltieb nyinu po Ejipt tinŋ ni, k biɑ din wɑnn’b bɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ tien u kpɑbɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ.
B yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Muois bɑɑ nɑn u nɑɑ nbɑ din mɑl’ɔ yuo nbɑ nɑ, b din bɔl’ɔ k tɑn jɑnŋ ŋmɑɑli ŋɑntɑ, k mɑɑn b din lɑ k u fɑn, k b k tiin kpɑnbɑl *senni nɑ jɑŋmɑɑni.
Muois nbɑ din tɑn kpɑɑt yuo nbɑ, u yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k u din k sɑk bii yi’u Fɑɑlɑɑɔn nɑ bipuo nɑ bijɑ.
U din sɑk nɑn wun di fɑlɑ nɑn Yennu niib e, ŋɑɑn k k sɑk biit pɑlpienn nbɑ tuu be yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ nɑ.
U din dukn ɑ b i suki’ɔ *Klistu pɑɑk, l mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k cie Ejipt tinŋ ni mɔktuk kul ɑ, k mɑɑn u ninbinn din kpɑɑ nyuɑt nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ pɑɑk e.
Ŋuɑ Muois yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u nyii Ejipt, k k jie kpɑnbɑl nɑ wutuol jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn lek sɑɑ tuɑnn k mɑɑn l nɑɑn nɑn u lɑɑt Yennu nbɑ k suɑ k lɑɑt’ɔ nɑn ninbinn nɑ.
U yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k u din piin *yuktgɑltiɑlu jɑɑnm, k din senn senni, ɑ bin mii sɔn b ŋei tɑnmɔi pɑɑk, ɑ k kuun mɑlɑkɑ nɑ tɑn dɑɑ kpi Islɑɑeltieb bijɑkpelɑ.
Islɑɑeltieb yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k mɔkmunŋ nɑ din bɔkt k tien tinkuonŋ k tul’b k b puot, ŋɑɑn k Ejipt-tieb mun din bikn ɑ bin puot, k mɔkl mɑnŋ nyun nɑ jiin mubn k dii’b.
Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din tɑn bɑɑl Seliiko yuo nbɑ, b yɑdɑ pɑɑk e, k b din sonm lint l juonɑ dɑɑ ŋɑnlole, k l bɑɑ.

Puocunconn nbɑ k b yi’u Lɑɑhɑɑb nɑ yɑdɑ pɑɑk e din te k Islɑɑeltieb din k kpii’u, ŋɑɑn kpii bin nbɑ din k sɑk Yennu mɔb nɑ, k mɑɑn Lɑɑhɑɑb din gɑɑl Islɑɑeltieb niib nbɑ din bɑɑl, ɑ bin diit duo mɑnŋ ni nɑ sɑɑɔnŋ.
N sɑɑ pɑk bee k pukn i? Yuo sɑɑ pɔt’n nɑn k n wɑnn’i Sedeɔn lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Bɑɑlɑɑk lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Sɑnmsɔn lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Sefte lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Dɑɑfiid lɑbɑɑl, nɑn Sɑɑmuel lɑbɑɑl, nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ lɑbɑɑl.
B yɑdɑ pɑɑk k b siɑb din kɔn k nyɑnn tini, k siɑb tun lin nbɑ k Yennu luon k lɑ lin nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn nɑn u sɑɑ tul’b nɑ. K siɑb suol yɑnbɔlɑ mɔi,
k siɑb mun kpien mupieunŋ, k siɑb tin nyii juk-bɑnjɑi kuun ni. K siɑb mun din tie tɑli e ŋɑɑn din tɑn kpɑnt pɑɑlb, k siɑb mun din tuok tɑb nɑn pɑnŋ k kɔn nyɑnn dɑtɑi.

K puosiɑb din lɑ b nikpiinm nbɑ din kpo nɑ fiil kuun ni. K siɑb din be k niib buo’b k kpii’b, k b k yet Yennu weiu ɑ bin nyi kuun mɑnŋ ni, k mɑɑn b luon bin fiil kuun ni k lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ cie tingbounŋ nɑ yɑl.
K niib din dɑɑn siɑb nyɑtuk, k biɑ buo’b gbɑnn, k b bɑɑn b siɑb jɑlt, k jii’b sɑɑn kuɑn’m dɑnsɑli ni.

B din jɑɑt b siɑb tɑnɑ e, k ŋmɑ b siɑb nɑn kɑnpintɑnbɑ juki k poli’b, k b jikt juk-bɑnjɑi k kpi b siɑb, k lieb din liɑ pegbɑnt, k lieb biɑ liɑ bugbɑnt k lin nɑn nɑmu, k niib muks’b k dint’b fɑlɑ biɑk.
Tingbounŋ nɑ tieb din k jɑnŋ nɑn bii be nɑn’m. K b din lin yiek kunkuot pɑɑk nɑn juɑt ni, k lin duɑ tɑnfiɑt nɑn fɔli ni.
Bin nbɑ nɑ kul yɑdɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu din yet ɑ b tie niŋɑnm, ŋɑɑn k b din k gɑɑl lin nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul u niib nɑ,
k mɑɑn t pɑɑk e k u din mɑntk duki bonsiɑl nbɑ cie nɑ po, ŋɑnn e tie ɑ u sɑɑ te k tinm nɑn ŋɑnm n tɑn lɑkn kii be binbenŋ nbɑ k b mɔk nɑ ni.
Nibul nɑ kul tie siɑlɑɑdɑnm e k lint’t. L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k tin yɑbl k fok lu lin nbɑ kul sɑɑ guɑl’t *Klistu sɔnu ni, nɑn biit nbɑ sɑɑ suol’t. Ŋɑɑnt k tin di suklu k gbɑɑ gbɑɑl nbɑ yɑɑ lin bɑɑl’t nɑ.

Ŋɑɑnt k tin kpɑn kpɑɑ t ninbinɑ Yiesu pɑɑk. Ŋuɑ e k t yɑdɑ gɑɑ u pɑɑk l pinpiik ni wɑɑ nɑn l juontu ni nɑ. U din dii fɑlɑ dɑpunpunn pɑɑk nɑn suklu k k tin fei, k mɑɑn u din mi pɑlpienn nbɑ guu’u nɑ po, k mɔtɑɑnɑ u ji kɑl Yennu nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ niidiitu po. Nɑ din k te k u nyik u yɑblu, k mɑɑn pɑlpienn nbɑ din bɑɑt u pɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk, u din k dukn k l mɔk’ɔ fei nɑn wun kpo l dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, ŋɑnn e te k u ji kɑl Yennu nɑɑngbounŋ pɑɑk u niidiitu po mɔtɑɑnɑ.
Nn, ii duki mɑn Yiesu po, biitdɑnm din nɑn’ɔ e, ŋɑɑn u din sɑk k gɑɑl l kul nɑn suklu. L pɑɑk, i dɑɑ te k i pɑlɑ wɑt k i bɑɑ.
L i tie k i kɔn nɑn biit, i dɑɑ k kɔn tieee k l sɑɑ jɑnŋ nɑn kuun.
I k tiɑn Yennu nbɑ kpɑɑn’i nɑn bɑɑ nbɑ tuu kpɑɑn u wɑɑs biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ɑɑ? L diɑn ɑ: «N bijɑ, Yonmdɑɑnɔ ii ŋmɑnn ɑ tubl, fɑn gɑɑl’l nɑn pɑlpienn. L i tie k u yɑki nɑn’ɑ, ɑ dɑɑ te k ɑ pɑl ni n biil,
k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋmɑni wun nbɑ k u luon’ɔ nɑ tubl, k buo dɑɑnsuɑ kul nbɑ, k u mi nɑn u tie u bijɑ.»
Yɑbt i fɑldinu pɑɑk mɑn, nɑn bɑɑ nbɑ tuu dɑt u bijɑ tubl nɑ. Tubdɑtu mɑnŋ e wɑnn nɑn Yennu set gɑɑl’i k tien’i u wɑɑs. Bijɑsuɑ be k u bɑɑ k ŋmɑni u tubl ii?
L i tie k u k dɑt i tubɑ nɑn wɑɑ tie u wɑɑs kul biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn l wɑnt nɑn i tie kpen-k-ŋmiɑ e, i k tie u wɑɑs kɑɑ.
T bɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, b tuu dɑɑl t tubɑ, k t tien’m nibɑɑkl. L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn k t mɑntk sikn t mɔnŋ k tul Yennu, wun nbɑ tie t *Yendɔunŋ ni Bɑɑ nɑ, k fit kii mɔk mɑnfuol.
T bɑɑnbɑ nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni din jii yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ k dɑɑl t tubɑ bɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu ŋɑnin dɑɑl t tubɑ t mɔnŋ sonml pɑɑk e, ɑ t binbenŋ n ŋɑnm kii yien nɑn ŋuɑ Yennu binbenŋ nɑ.
Tubdɑtu yuo ton e, l k mɔk pɑlpienn, ŋɑɑn l puolpo e wɑɑ, k bin nbɑ dii tubdɑtu fɑlɑ nɑ, ji tuu lɑ l nyuɑt nbɑ tie mɑnu nɑn binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm.
L pɑɑk, i ŋɑnm donn i nii nbɑ bɑk nɑ, k ŋɑnm wɑkl i dunɑ ni,
kii tuɑk sɔnu nbɑ tuok, ɑ k wun nbɑ k u tɑɑ wɔb n lɑ lɑɑfiɑ ŋɑɑn dɑɑ kpet.
I yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk kii mɔk mɑnu yinm nɑn niib kul sinsuuk ni, kii biɑ kii mɔk binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm, k mɑɑn suɑ i kii mɔk ŋɑnn, l dɑɑnɔ tɑn kɑn lɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ.
Guut i mɔnŋ mɑn k tɑn dɑɑ kɔnŋt Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑ. I suɑ dɑɑ tie nɑn penn nbɑ tuu piɑ k u suun tie lɑbt nbɑ sɑɑ fit biil niib bonciɑnn nɑ.
I suɑ dɑɑ tuun boncuncontuonɑ ɑmi k k bɑɑkt lin nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn Esɑɑu, wun nbɑ din jii u sɑɑkɑt k dɑɑ jiet k dii tɑɑl yonm nɑ.
I mi nɑn l puolpo u din tɑn luon wun gɑɑl u bɑɑ yetŋɑnm k mɔ nɑn nyin-nyuut ŋɑɑn k u bɑɑ yet, k mɑɑn Esɑɑu din k lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ tien k lebt wɑɑ ponŋ din biil lin nbɑ nɑ.
Tɔn, yinm k bɑɑl juɑl nbɑ k i fit sii’l nɑn Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din bɑɑl Siinɑi juɑl buol nɑ kɑɑ, siɑn nbɑ k mupieunŋ din di k bunbɔnn bɔnn, k wonpɑɑluk dɑ,
k kɑtkɑɑk bui, k kunkɔl pɑk lɑbɑɑl, k bɑɑ din gbɑt l kunkɔl mɑnŋ yuo nbɑ, b din jɑk bɑlunŋ o, k ji k luon l kunkɔl n pɑk pukn.
K mɑɑn *senni nbɑ k b gbɑt nɑ, pɑɑk b nii wɑɑ. L din yet ɑ; «Nilɔ kuo bonkobsiɑɔk ii lek i sii juɑl mɑnŋ, bin jɑɑt’ɔ tɑnɑ k kpi’u.»
L buol ni din mɔk jɑŋmɑɑni bonciɑnn, k Muois din yet ɑ: «Jɑŋmɑɑni mɔk’n, k n gbɑnu jekl.»
Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin bɑɑl juɑl nbɑ yɑɑ sɑnn yi *Siiɔn, lin nbɑ tie Yennu nbɑ fo nɑ duo nbɑ tie Yendɔunŋ ni Selusɑɑlenm, siɑn nbɑ k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ tusɑ tusɑ lɑkn nɑn pɑlpienn.

I bɑɑl tintɑɑnu buol nbɑ k l mɔtɑɑɔk niib tie Yennu wɑɑkpeli e k b sɑnɑ diɑn Yendɔunŋ ni. I bɑɑl Yennu nbɑ tie nisɑɑlk kul bɑlbuulɔ nɑ buol ni, nɑn bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm Yennu tuɑnn k u te k b be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot u nunm nɑ sei buol ni e.
I bɑɑl Yiesu, wun nbɑ tie sindɑntinnɔ k bɑɑl nɑn Yennu lolpɑɑnn nɑ buol e. I bɑɑl Yiesu buol, k u sɔn nbɑ din nyii u ni nɑ wɑnt mɑɑn nbɑ ŋɑn k gɑl Abel sɔn.

L pɑɑk, ii mi mɑn k i yet wun nbɑ kpɑɑn’i nɑ mɔb, k mɑɑn Islɑɑeltieb nbɑ din yet wun nbɑ din kpɑɑn’m tingbounŋ nɑ ni mɔb nɑ, k u din tɑn k nyik b tubdɑtu, k t i yet wun nbɑ nyii Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ kpɑɑni nɑ, t tɑn sɑɑ tien nlee k nyi tubdɑtu ni?
L yuo nɑ, u kunkɔl din nik tingbounŋ nɑ e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u senn mɔsonn k yet ɑ: «N ji kɑn nik tingbounŋ nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn n ji tɑn sɑɑ nik tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo e wɑɑ tɑɑl yonm kuɑ biɑk.»
Mɔbonɑ nbɑ yet ɑ: «Tɑɑl yonm kuɑ biɑk,» nɑ wɑnt nɑn bonnɑnkɑɑ kul tɑn sɑɑ nik k yɑt bot l binbebuol e, ŋɑɑn k lin nbɑ tɑn kɑn fit nik nɑ ŋɑnin n tɑn biɑl.
L pɑɑk, tɑɑ gɑɑl jiɑɔnŋ nbɑ kɑn mi k nik nɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k tii tien Yennu niipuouk mɑn, k jiɑnt’ɔ nɑn bɑɑkl nɑn jɑŋmɑɑni wɑɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ,
k mɑɑn t Yennu mɑnŋ tie nɑn mudikɑu nɑ e.
Yɑɑ tie *Klistu niib nɑ pɑɑk, ii luon i lieb mɑn yuo kul.
I dɑɑ tɑnmt sɑɑnm gɑɑlu po, k mɑɑn nisiɑb din tɑn gɑɑl mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ sɑɑɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn k mi ɑ b tie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ e.
Ii tiɑn bin nbɑ be dɑnsɑli ni nɑ po nɑn yinm nɑn ŋɑnm e lɑkn be l ni, kii tiɑn bin nbɑ lɑɑt muksuk nɑ po nɑn yinm nɑn ŋɑnm e lɑkn lɑɑt muksuk mɑnŋ nɑ.
Ii bɑɑkt i puokuɑnt nɑn i jɑkunt k dɑɑ conm, k mɑɑn Yennu tɑn sɑɑ dɑt boncunconɑ tubɑ.
Ii nyinn i niɑɔnŋ nɑn liklonm, ŋɑɑn te k i nunm n gbuo nɑn yɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ, k mɑɑn Yennu yet ɑ: «N kɑn mi k nyik’ɑ ni; n biɑ kɑn mi k ŋɑɑn’ɑ ni.»
L pɑɑk, k t mɔk pɑlcienn k yet ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ tie n sonmtuɑ, n kɑn tin jɑŋmɑɑni, nisɑɑlk sɑɑ tien’n bee?»
Ii tiɑn mɑn i yudɑnm nbɑ din piɑk Yennu mɑɑn k tien’i nɑ po, kii duki b mɑnfuol nbɑ din tɑn juont bɑnnu nbɑ kii toki b yɑdɑ.
Yiesu Klistu nbɑ won tie biɑnŋ nbɑ wonn nɑ, u biɑ tie nnɑ e dinnɑ nɑ, k u biɑ sii tie nnɑ e nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.

I dɑɑ ŋɑɑnt k wɑnnsɑɑnɑ buolu buolu n te k i bot, k i tɑn sɑɑ mɑnn tut sɔnŋɑnu mɑnŋ. L ŋɑn k Yennu ninbɑtinu n tul nilɔ pɑnŋ u pɑl ni. Jiet *senni weiu kɑn tul’ɔ pɑnŋ. Nisiɑb nbɑ diɑ jiet *senni nɑ k lɑɑt somsiɑl l ni.
Tɔn, bin nbɑ mɑnn mɑnnu *Suifnbɑ Yenjiɑntu buol ni nɑ k mɔk yiikuo ɑ bii di lin nbɑ be t *mɑnnu binbintl nɑ pɑɑk.
Suifnbɑ mɑnntieb yudɑɑnɔ tuu kuɑ nɑn bonkobt sɔn Yennu dieok ni, buol nbɑ tie Yennu yɑl nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ ni, k mɑnn *mɑlunŋ biit pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn juo bonkobt mɑnŋ nɑnt muu b duo nɑ kpinŋ po.
L pɑɑk, k Yiesu mun din kpo duo nɑ kpinŋ po, ɑ wun nyinn niib biit ni, u mɔnŋ sɔn pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, ŋɑɑnt k tin nyi k sɑɑn u buol ni mɑn, k sɑk fedinu nɑn wɑɑ din dii fei biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
K mɑɑn duo nbɑ sɑɑ biɑl kɑɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni, dosɑu nbɑ bɑɑt nɑ e k t guu’l.
Ŋɑɑnt k tii dontl Yennu sɑnn yuo kul Yiesu sɑnn ni, k lii nɑɑn nɑn mɑlunŋ nɑ k tul’ɔ, k pɑku nbɑ nyi t mɔi ni nɑ dɑɑ mɔk gbennu.
I dɑɑ nyikt tuonŋɑnɑ tumu, kii centl yɑɑ mɔk lin nbɑ nɑn i lieb, k mɑɑn l mɑnbuolu e pent Yennu pɑl ni.

Ii sɑɑk i yudɑnm mɔi k sikn i mɔnŋ k tul’b. B bɑkɑ be i benu ni, k mɑɑn b tɑn sɑɑ wɑnn Yennu b tuonɑ nbɑ k b din tuun nɑ. Ii sɑɑk b mɔi k bii fit kii tuun b tuonn nɑn pɑlpienn k pɑlbiil dɑɑ be lenŋ k mɑɑn nnɑ k mɔk nyuɑt k tul’i ni.
Ii mei Yennu mɑn t pɑɑk. T k mɔk dudukbisiɑt t tuonɑ ni, k mɑɑn t luon k tii tuun lin nbɑ tuok e yuo kul.
Ŋɑɑn n mɑntk bɑln’mi e bonciɑnn, ii mei Yennu mɑn k tul’n k wun te k n jen i buol ni mɔtɑɑnɑ.
Yennu nbɑ tien mɑnu nɑ din fiin t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu kuun ni. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e tie Pekpɑɑjɑɑnn nbɑ kpɑɑl pei k mɑɑn u din kpo, k u sɔn ŋɑnm Yennu *lol nbɑ sii sie yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ.
Yennu nbɑ tien’t mɑnu nɑ n te k i fit kii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ kul, k fit tun lin nbɑ k u luon. K Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk, wun tun t ni lin nbɑ pent u pɑl. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e mɔk *yudɑnt nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n bɑln’mi e, i di suklu k gbiint kpɑɑni nɑ, k mɑɑn mɑɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ tul’i nɑ k fɔk.
N luon k i bɑnn nɑn b nyinn t nɑɑ bik Tiimuote dɑnsɑlk ni wɑɑ. L i tie k u sɑɑ bɑɑl n buol ni mɔtɑɑnɑ, min nɑn ŋuɑ sɑɑ tɔk bɑɑl i buol ni.
I fuont i yudɑnm kul ɑ nɑn Yennu niib nɑ kul ɑ k tul’t. T nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ nyii Itɑɑli tinŋ ni nɑ fuont’i.
Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be nɑn i kul.
Min Sɑɑk, wun nbɑ tie Yennu tuontunnɔ k biɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu tuontunnɔ, n fuont Islɑɑel nibuolu piik nɑn bɑnle nbɑ yɑt k be tingbounŋ nɑ kul ni.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, ii mɔk mɑn pɑlpienn yuo nbɑ k i di fɑlɑ buolu buolu nɑ,
k mɑɑn i mi nɑn l i tie k biknu bɑɑl ŋɑɑn k i lek be i yɑdɑ ni, l bɑɑt nɑn suklu e.
Ŋɑɑnt mɑn k i suklu i be fɑnu k yin fit kii tie niŋɑnm k siɑl dɑɑ puɑl’i.
L i tie k i suɑ pɔt yɑn, wun miɑl Yennu, wun nbɑ pi suɑ kul piini nɑn bulcint, k k dint suɑ fei nɑ, k u sɑɑ tul’ɔ wɑɑ.
Fii mei Yennu, fɑn tien yɑdɑ k dɑɑ mɔk bilsuk, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ mei’ɔ nɑn bilsuk nɑ, tie nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nyunpɑnɑ nbɑ k wounŋ dɑ k l fi k bɑɑ nɑ e.
L nibuolu dɑɑ duki nɑn u sɑɑ lɑ siɑl Yennu buol,
k mɑɑn u k mɔk dudukcincibl, lin nbɑ kul k u tuun nɑ ni.
L ŋɑn k t nɑɑ bik nbɑ tie tɑlk ii mɔk yugontl Yennu nbɑ donn’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk,
k t nɑɑ bik nbɑ mun tie mɔktɔ ii mun ii mɔk yugontl Yennu nbɑ sikn’ɔ nɑ pɑɑk, k mɑɑn l kɑn wei k u sɑɑ gɑl nɑn tipuuk nbɑ tuu kuol k bɑɑ nɑ.
Yennu i nyii k yekt tipuuk pɑɑk, puuk nɑ tuu kuol e k bɑɑ, k l ŋɑnt n ji biil. L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e k tul mɔktɔ. Yuo nbɑ k u duki u tuonɑ nbɑ sɑɑ sɑɑn tuɑnn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l yuo e wun kpo.
Bin nbɑ nyɑnn jɑnmi nɑ, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e, k mɑɑn wuu nyɑnn jɑnmi gbenn yuo nbɑ, u sɑɑ lɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ k Yennu din senn mɔsonn, mɑnfuol nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ luon’ɔ nɑ.
Suɑ i lɑ jɑnmi, u dɑɑ yɑɑ ɑ Yennu e jɑnm’ɔ. Siɑl kɑɑ k sɑɑ fit jɑnm Yennu wun tun bonbiil, k Yennu mun k jɑnmt suɑ.
Ŋɑɑn nilɔ lɑɑt jɑnmi yuo nbɑ k u mɔnŋ niɑnbiiuk dɑɑl’ɔ k so’u e.
Niɑnbiiuk i suol nilɔ, l tuu tie puol k tɑn mɑl biit, k biit mun n suol puol k mɑl kuun.
N nɑɑ wɑlonkɑi, i dɑɑ te k siɑl kpɑnn’i ni.
Bonŋɑnn kul nyii sɑnpɑɑpo e Bɑɑ buol, wun nbɑ din nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo yentu kul ɑ. Ŋuɑ ŋɑnin k lebtl nɑn sɑnpɑɑpo yentu nbɑ tuu lebtl biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. U biɑ dɑɑ tie ŋuɑ Yennu e.
U mɔnŋ lonm ni e k u tul’t mɑnfuol, u mɑɑn nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ tii cie u bonninnɑnt kul ɑ.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, n luon yin bɑnn nɑ e. Ii gbiintl yiɑn, ŋɑɑn kii mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k i piɑk, k biɑ dɑɑ dont wutuol yiɑn yiɑn,
k mɑɑn nifosɑɑlk wutuol k bɑɑt nɑn binbenŋɑnŋ nbɑ k Yennu luon.
L pɑɑk, ii nyik i yɑnbɔnm nɑn biit kul nbɑ be i pɑlɑ ni nɑ, ŋɑɑn sikn i mɔnŋ Yennu tuɑnn, k gɑɑl u mɑɑn nbɑ k u bul i pɑlɑ ni nɑ, k mɑɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ e sɑɑ fit fiel’i.
I dɑɑ gbiintl mɑɑn mɑnŋ kuukuɑ k kpɑnn i mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn kii tuun mɑɑn nbɑ wɑnn’i biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Wun nbɑ kul gbɑt mɑɑn mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn k k tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ k l wɑnn, u tie nɑn nilɔ nbɑ tuu got k lɑ u mɔnŋ miɑnu ni nɑ e,
k mɑɑn u got k lɑ u mɔnŋ miɑnu nɑ ni, ŋɑɑn siet, k ji tuu tɑnm wɑɑ bo got k lɑ u mɔnŋ k u tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ goli sennŋɑnn nbɑ sɑɑ fit nyinn niib biit dɑɑbs ni, k k tɑnm’l, ŋɑɑn mɔk gbɑnkul k tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ k l wɑnn nɑ, pɑlpienn sii tie l dɑɑnɔ yɑl e, u tuonɑ nɑ pɑɑk.
Wun nbɑ mi nɑn u tie Yenweilɔ ŋɑɑn k k so u jeln, l dɑɑnɔ kpɑnn u mɔnŋ e, k u wɑɑnu nɑ tie yɑnn e.
Gotl lin nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu yet ɑ l tie Yenweiu nɑn bɑlmɔni k jɑknt kɑɑ lenŋ, wun nbɑ sonmt kpiebi nɑn pɑkɔi b fɑlɑ ni, k so u mɔnŋ, ɑ tingbounŋ nɑ bonbiil dɑɑ fit kuɑnt’ɔ biit ni.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, yɑɑ tien Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu, wun nbɑ yen *yudɑnt nɑ, yɑdɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, i dɑɑ mɔk luktn.
L i tie k mɔktɔ wun nbɑ liɑ tɑŋɑnt k pil sɑlnbɑnn kuɑ i tintɑɑnu ni, k nɑndɑɑnɔ nbɑ liɑ tɑciɑt mun kuɑ,
k i tul mɔktɔ nɑ nibɑɑkl, k yet’ɔ ɑ wun kɑl tuɑnn po, ŋɑɑn yet nɑndɑɑnɔ nɑ, ɑ u sie ɑmi wun kɑl tinŋ ni,
n nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie k i tuun nnɑ, i tie niib nbɑ mɔk luktn nɑn i lieb, k biɑ tie nɑn bubuulɑ nbɑ mɔk dudukbiit nɑ e.
N nɑɑ wɑlonkɑi, gbiintl mɑn, Yennu e lukt bin nbɑ tie nɑndɑnm tingbounŋ nɑ niib buol, ɑ bin tien mɔktɑ b yɑdɑ ni, k tien u wɑɑs nbɑ sɑɑ di nɑɑn nbɑ k u din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u sɑɑ tul bin nbɑ luon’ɔ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn yinm e sɑlkt nɑndɑnm. Bin nbɑ ŋmɑb’i k so’i, k sɑɑ nɑn’i buut buol nɑ, b k tie mɔktɑ kɑɑ ɑɑ?
Ŋɑnm e biɑ piɑk biil sɑnŋɑnn nbɑ k Yennu tul’i nɑ.
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Ii luon *ɑ luɑ nɑn fɑɑ luon ɑ mɔnŋ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.» L i tie k i wɑɑ Yennu nɑɑn sennu mɑnŋ, l ŋɑn,
ŋɑɑn l i tie k i mɔk ningɑnni nɑn lieb, l tie biit e, k sennu mɑnŋ fiitl wɑnt nɑn i set tie sennu biiltieb e.
Wun nbɑ sɑk k wei *senni nɑ kul, ŋɑɑn tɑn biil senni mɑnŋ yenn, l wɑnt nɑn u biil senni nɑ kul e.
Wun nbɑ yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ conm nɑ,» ŋuɑ e biɑ yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ kpi nilɔ.» L pɑɑk, l i tie k ɑ k conm, ŋɑɑn kpi, ɑ tie senni biiltuɑ e.
Ii piɑk ŋɑɑn kii tuun nɑn niib nbɑ k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ jii senni nbɑ nyint niib biit dɑɑbs ni nɑ e, k bu b buut,
k mɑɑn bin nbɑ k tin b lieb ninbɑɑɔk, Yennu sɑɑ bu b buut k kɑn tin’m ninbɑɑɔk u, ŋɑɑn k ninbɑɑɔk e nyɑni tubdɑtu.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ, ɑ u mɔk yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn ji k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, l mɔk nyuɑt ii? U yɑdɑ mɑnŋ buolu sɑɑ fit fiel’ɔ wɑɑ ɑɑ?
L i tie k ɑ nɑɑ bik be k k lɑɑt gbɑb, k biɑ k lɑɑt di,
k ɑ ji yien’ɔ ɑ: «N nɑɑ bik, ɑ kun mɑnu wɑɑ, kii gbɑb, kii biɑ kii di,» ŋɑɑn kɑn sonm’ɔ nɑn siɑl, l mɔk nyuɑt ii?
Yɑdɑ kuukuɑ i be, ŋɑɑn tuonŋɑnɑ kɑɑ, yɑdɑ mɑnŋ tie yɑdɑkpieonŋ o.
Ŋɑɑn suɑ sɑɑ yet ɑ: «A mɔk yɑdɑ, k n tuun tuonŋɑnɑ.» N mun sɑɑ jiin ɑ: «L i tie k ɑ k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, lɑnn po e wɑnt nɑn ɑ set mɔk yɑdɑ? Ŋɑɑn n tuonŋɑnɑ nɑ e wɑnt’ɑ nɑn min set mɔk yɑdɑ.»
A tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be ee? L ŋɑn. Nɑlnbiit mun tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yen-yenɔ kuɑ e be, k biɑ jekl nɑn jɑŋmɑɑni.
Fin jɑtuk nɑ. A luon k n wɑnn’ɑ bɑnnu nbɑ k ɑ sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn yɑdɑ nbɑ k mɔk tuonɑ nɑ tie yɑnn ee?
T yejɑ Ablɑɑhɑɑnm nbɑ din jii u bik Isɑɑk k pɑɑn’ɔ binbintl pɑɑk ɑ wun kpi’u k mɑnn *mɑlunŋ k tul Yennu nɑ, tuonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk, kɑɑ te k Yennu din yet ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol ii?
A lɑ nɑn u yɑdɑ nɑn u tuonɑ din tɑɑn k tuun k u tuonɑ ni, yɑdɑ mɑnŋ din wɑnn l mɔnŋ ɑ l tie bɑlmɔni yɑdɑ e.
Nnɑ e k lin nbɑ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni din tɑn tien mɔni ɑ: «Ablɑɑhɑɑnm din tien Yennu yɑdɑ, k l pɑɑk, k Yennu yɑɑ ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol,» k b din yi’u Yennu yuɑk.
I ji lɑ nɑn nilɔ tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk e k Yennu sɑɑ yet ɑ l dɑɑnɔ tie niŋɑnɔ u buol, k l k tie u yɑdɑ kuukuɑ pɑɑk.

L din tie nnɑ e mun k tul puocunconn nbɑ sɑnn din yi Lɑɑhɑɑb nɑ. Wɑɑ din gɑɑl tuomiinbɑ nbɑ k Islɑɑeltieb din tun’m, k biɑ wɑnn’b sɔngɑnu nbɑ k b tɔkn ŋmɑt kun nɑ, u tuonn mɑnŋ pɑɑk e k Yennu din yet, ɑ u tie niŋɑnɔ u buol.
L pɑɑk, gbɑnɑnt nbɑ kɑɑ siek nɑ, tie gbɑnɑnkpieonŋ o, k yɑdɑ i mun i be k tuonŋɑnɑ kɑɑ, l mun tie yɑdɑkpieonŋ o.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i nisiɑb bonciɑnn dɑɑ luon bin tien wɑntieb, k mɑɑn i ponŋ mi nɑn bin nbɑ tie wɑntieb nɑ, b buut tɑn sii pɑɑl k gɑl bin nbɑ k tie wɑntieb.
T kul tuun lin nbɑ k tuok bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k piɑk mɑbiit, l dɑɑnɔ set tie niŋɑnɔ e k sɑɑ fit suol u gbɑnɑnt kul ɑ.
T i jii gɑlkɑ k wukn tɑɑni, ɑ bii tuun tɑɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, b gbɑnɑnt pɑnŋ kul be t nuu ni e.
Biɑ duknt ŋɑlint lɑbɑɑl po. B gbenŋ bonciɑnn, ŋɑɑn wonpɑɑluk u dɑ, b sɑɑ e, ŋɑɑn dɑbik nnɑ e k kɑntuɑ nɑ diɑ k kɑn k b sɑɑ wɑɑ luon siɑn nbɑ.
Jeln mun tie bonbik nnɑ e, ŋɑɑn l mɔk yiikuo bonciɑnn. Gotl, musɑnpuɑlk nnɑ e tuu di fɔgbenŋl.
Jeln tie nɑn muu nɑ e. L be t gbɑnɑnt ni k mɔk biit buolu buolu kul ɑ, k sɑɑ fit biil nilɔ munn. L biɑ di nifosɑɑlk binbenŋ nɑn muu nɑ, k l muu nyii *Sɑɑtɑn buol e.
Nisɑɑlk e mɔk bonkobt nɑn nuɑni nɑn wɑi nɑn nyun ni bonɑ kul yiikuo,
ŋɑɑn nisɑɑlk kɑn fit suol jeln. L tie bonbiil, k lintl yuo kul k k foi, k gbie nɑn lɔbi nbɑ bɑɑt nɑn kuun e.
Jeln nbɑ k t diɑ k piɑk dont t Bɑɑ Yennu nbɑ tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ, l jeln e k t biɑ diɑ k puol nifosɑɑli mɔi, bin nbɑ k Yennu din nɑn’m u nɑɑɔnŋ ni.
Mɔb nbɑ k pɑku nyi l ni, mɔb mɑnŋ ni e k mɔpol mun nyi. N nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie nnɑ i e, l k ŋɑn.
Bunbunyenn kuɑ sɑɑ fit buni nyunmɑnm nɑn nyuntonm ii?
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, tiik nbɑ k b yi *fiigie nɑ sɑɑ fit lon luɑnɑ nbɑ k b yi oliifnbɑ nɑ wɑɑ? Ami *fiinyɑ sɑɑ fit lon fiignbɑ wɑɑ? Nnɑ e mun, bunbunn nbɑ k nyuntonm nyi lenŋ nɑ, kɑn fit tul nyunmɑnm.
Ŋmee mɔk yɑn nɑn bɑnnu i sinsuuk ni? Ŋɑɑnt wun wɑnn nɑn u mɔk yɑn nɑn bɑnnu, u binbenŋɑnŋ ni nɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k u tuun, nɑn sikn-n-mɔnŋ nɑn yɑn ni.
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k i mɔk funfunbiiuk nɑn dont-n-mɔnŋ i pɑlɑ ni, i dɑɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ, k dɑɑ fɑ fɑɑk, k dɑɑ noi bɑlmɔni.
L yɑn k nyi Yennu buol ni kɑɑ. L tie tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn gbɑnɑnt lonm nɑn Sɑɑtɑn yɑl e,
k mɑɑn *funfunn nɑn dont-n-mɔnŋ nbɑ be siɑn, dɑɑmuk nɑn biit buolu buolu kul be lenŋ e.

Ŋɑɑn yɑn nbɑ nyi sɑnpɑɑpo, l k mɔk biit. Wun nbɑ mɔk yɑn mɑnŋ, u mɔk pɑlmɑɑsl k be suon nnɑ, k gbiɑ u lieb mɑɑn pɑɑk. U mɔk ninbɑtinu bonciɑnn, k biɑ tuun tuonŋɑnɑ bonciɑnn. U k mɔk luktn, k biɑ k mɔk niilɑbndinu.
Bin nbɑ tie mɑnu dɑnm nɑ tuu bul mɑnu e niib sinsuuk ni, k tɑn jɑɑn binbenŋɑnŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm.
Bee te k i kɔn k noi nɑn lieb i? L tie i niɑnbiiuk nbɑ be i pɑlɑ ni k kɔn nɑ e.

I luon bonsiɑ, ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ, k ji tie siil nɑn nikpinu. I mɔk *funfunn i lieb bonɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn kɑn lɑ’l. L pɑɑk, k kunkɔnɑ nɑn mɔniɑt be i sinsuuk ni. I k mɔk yɑɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn i k mei Yennu l po.
I mei Yennu k k lɑɑt k mɑɑn i mei’ɔ nɑn dudukbiit k luon i mɔnŋ niɑnbiiuk yɑl.
I nyik Yennu wɑɑ, k wɑɑ bonliɑ. I k mi nɑn l i tie k i suol tingbounŋ yuɑs i e, i tie Yennu dɑtɑi ee? Wun nbɑ luon wuu tie tingbounŋ nɑ yuɑk, l dɑɑnɔ tien u mɔnŋ Yennu dɑtɑɑk e.
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «U luon Siek nbɑ k u tien t ni nɑ bonciɑnn.»
Ŋɑɑn u biɑ mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ bonciɑnn. L pɑɑk, l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu kɔn nɑn kɑlnbɑɑni dɑnm e, ŋɑɑn tiin sikn-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm nɑ ninbɑɑɔk.»
L pɑɑk, ii sɑɑk Yennu mɔmɑɑn, ŋɑɑn yet *Sɑɑtɑn, k u sɑɑ ciɑl ŋɑɑn nyik’i.
Cɑtl nɑkn Yennu buol mɑn, k u mun sɑɑ nɑkn’i. Yinm biitdɑnm, wuut i nii mɑn, k yinm dudukt ŋɑnlele dɑnm, ŋɑnmt i pɑlɑ mɑn.
Ii mɔk pɑlbiil k bui nɑn nyin-nyuut i biit pɑɑk. I dɑɑ ji lɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ii mɔ mɑn, k ŋɑɑn k i pɑlpienn n kpint k tien pɑlbiil.
Siknt i mɔnŋ Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn, k u sɑɑ donn’i.

N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i dɑɑ piɑk mɑbiit lieb pɑɑk. Wun nbɑ piɑk mɑbiit u nɑɑ bik pɑɑk ɑmi bu u buut nɑ, l tie *senni e k u piɑk mɑbiit l pɑɑk k bu l buut. K mɑɑn l i tie k ɑ bu senni nɑ buut i e, ɑ k tie wun nbɑ sɑɑk’l kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ tie l bɑlbuulɔ e.
Yennu kuukuɑ e mɔk yiikuo k sɑɑ fit senn senni, k biɑ sɑɑ fit bu nifosɑɑli buut. Ŋuɑ kuukuɑ e sɑɑ fit fiel nifosɑɑli ɑmi k biil’b. A mun tie ŋmee k bu *ɑ luɑ buut i?
Gbiintl mɑn, yinm nbɑ tuu yien ɑ: «Dinnɑ ɑmi wonn, t sɑɑ sɑɑn digbɑnn nɑ wɑɑ, k sɑɑ di binn kii kpentl kpinkpounŋ k lɑ nyuɑt bonciɑnn.»
I k mi lin nbɑ sɑɑ bɑɑl wonn. I mɑnfuol tie bee? L tie nɑn wunn nbɑ tuu bɑɑ sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni, ŋɑɑn l i yɑnn lin yɑnt nɑ e.
L pɑɑk, l ŋɑn yin tuu yet ɑ: «L i tie k Yennu luon, t sii mɔk mɑnfuol, k tun nnɑ nɑn nnɑ.»
Ŋɑɑn i mɔk kɑlnbɑɑni k fuɑ bɑlɑ. Yɑɑ fuɑ bɑlɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l tie bonbiil e.
L pɑɑk, wun nbɑ mi tuonŋɑnɑ nbɑ k l ŋɑn nɑn wun tun, ŋɑɑn k tuun, l dɑɑnɔ mɔk biit.
Yinm goldɑnm, gbiintl mɑn. Ii mɔ mɑn kii fɑbn fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt i pɑɑk nɑ pɑɑk.
I mɔktuk nɑ kul bɑt, k wobi muɑ i tiɑt ɑ.
I sɑlmɑ nɑn i likli nɑ kuɑ tintɑni wɑɑ, k tintɑni mɑnŋ wɑnt nɑn i tie biitdɑnm k l sɑɑ di i gbɑnɑnt nɑn muu nbɑ di biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. I tikl i mɔktuk mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑɑn k tingbounŋ nɑ gbennu ji k fɔk.
I k pɑ bin nbɑ jɑɑn i dii i kpɑɑnt ni nɑ. Gbiintl mɑn b fɑbni. B mɔni mɑnŋ kuɑ Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ yen bonsiɑl kul nɑ tubɑ ni wɑɑ.
Yɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ii be i yɑmɑ ni, k wɑɑ i gbɑnɑnt niɑɔnŋ. I dint i mɔnŋ e, ŋɑɑn i lek be nɑn nɑɑjɑkpɑnmɑ nbɑ k b sɑɑ kpi’b nɑ.
I din biil bin nbɑ k mɔk biit k kpi’b, ŋɑɑn b k kɔn nɑn’i.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, ii di suklu mɑn kii guu Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu dɑɑl mɑnŋ. Gotl mɑn kpɑɑlɔ nbɑ tuu di suklu k guu kpɑfusɑɑk mɔkmɔk nɑn sɑjuontk k u jiet n ji tɑn nɑn bonŋɑnn.
L pɑɑk, ii mun ii di suklu, k cie i pɑlɑ k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ bɑɑlu dɑɑl pel nɑ.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i dɑɑ mɔk bunbulmi i lieb pɑɑk, ɑ k Yennu dɑɑ bu i buut. Gotl mɑn, bɑlbuulɔ nɑ nɑkn k sie i tɑnmɔi ni.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, Yonmdɑɑnɔ *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din pɑk u sɑnn ni nɑ, gotl mɑn bɑɑ din lɑɑt fɑlɑ k mɔk suklu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k lii tie wɑnnu k tul’i.

L nibuolu nbɑ mɔk gbɑnkul nɑ, t yi’b pɑlpienn dɑnm e. I ponŋ gbɑt Job nbɑ din tɑn mɔk gbɑnkul biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k i mi lin nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ din tun k tul’ɔ l puolpo, k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ gbie nɑn ninbɑtinu k biɑ goli nisɑɑli fɑnu.

N nɑɑ wɑɑs, lin nbɑ kpɑɑ tɑlɑs tie nɑ e: i dɑɑ puol mɔpolɑ. I dɑɑ yi sɑnpɑɑpo ɑmi tingbounŋ ɑmi bonsiɑl kul sɑnn k puol mɔpolɑ. Ŋɑɑnt k i nnn i tie i nnn, k i ɑɑi i tie ɑɑi, k Yennu tɑn dɑɑ dɑɑl i tubɑ.
Suɑ i be i ni k lɑɑt fɑlɑ, wun miɑl Yennu. Wun nbɑ mun mɔk pɑlpienn, wun yin *yɑni kii piɑk Yennu.
Suɑ i be i buol k yiɑl, wun yiin *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib *sɑɑkɑb k bin tɑn miɑl Yennu k suɑl’ɔ kpɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ Klistu sɑnn ni k tul’ɔ.
B i mei Yennu nɑn yɑdɑ i e, k l dɑɑnɔ sɑɑ lɑ lɑɑfiɑ, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ te k wun pɑɑk. L i tie k u tun biit i e, Yennu sɑɑ nyik u biit mɑnŋ k cɑb’ɔ.
L pɑɑk, fiitl i biit k wɑnn lieb, k miɑl Yennu k tul lieb, ɑ yin lɑ lɑɑfiɑ. Wun nbɑ tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu tuɑnn nɑ miɑlu sii mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn.
*Elii din tie nifosɑɑlk e nɑn tinm nɑ. U din miɑl Yennu nɑn ninmɔnn ɑ sɑɑk dɑɑ bɑɑ, k sɑɑk set din k bɑɑ tinŋ mɑnŋ ni k sɑɑ jɑnŋ binɑ ŋɑntɑ nɑn ŋmɑɑli ŋɑnluob.
L puolpo k u biɑ miɑl Yennu, k sɑɑk nyi sɑnpɑɑpo k ji bɑɑ, k tinŋ nɑn jiet fɑnu.
N nɑɑ wɑɑs, i yenɔ i kpet k nyii mɔmɔnm wɑnnu sɔnu ni, k suɑ jenn’ɔ sɔnu mɑnŋ ni,
ii tiɑn mɑn nɑn dɑɑnɔ nbɑ nyinn biitdɑɑnɔ u sɔnbiiuk nɑ ni, u fɑt’ɔ kuun ni e k te k u lɑ nyikcɑbu biit buolu buolu pɑɑk.
Min Piɑl nbɑ tie Yiesu *Klistu *tuomi nɑ e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien bin nbɑ k Yennu lukt’b k b yɑt k be Pɔn nɑn Gɑɑlɑɑti nɑn Kɑpɑdos nɑn Asii nɑn Biitiini tini ni k tie sɑɑnm nɑ.
Yennu, Bɑɑ nɑ, din dɔnŋ lol k lukt’i, ɑ yii tie u yɑb Foŋɑnm yiikuo pɑɑk kii sɑɑk Yiesu Klistu mɔb k u sɔn n wuul i pɑl ni. Yennu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i k biɑ tul’i mɑnu nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk.
Pɑkn mɑn Yennu nbɑ tie t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu Bɑɑ nɑ, k mɑɑn u tin’t ninbɑɑɔk bonciɑnn k tul’t mɑnfopɑɑnn Yiesu Klistu kuun fiilu pɑɑk. Lin nbɑ nɑ e te k t mɔk dindɑnn nɑn t tɑn sii mɔk mɑnfuol,
k lɑ lin nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs yɑl, k l sii be yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k kɑn biil, k l fɑnt biɑ kɑn siil, k l be *Yendɔunŋ ni
k guu yinm nbɑ k Yennu yiikuo diɑ’i i yɑdɑ pɑɑk, ɑ yin lɑ i fielu nbɑ tien siil k sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu dɑɑjuonti nɑ.
L pɑɑk, i ji mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn. L i lek i tie ɑ i mɔk pɑlbiil yuo wɑɑnm-nnɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ k mɑɑn yɑɑ lɑ fɑlbuolu buolu nɑ pɑɑk, i mɔk pɑlpienn e.

Fɑlɑ mɑnŋ biki’i, ɑ lin lɑɑn i tien Klistu yɑdɑ fɑnu ɑmi ii? Sɑlmɑ sɑɑ fit k biil, ŋɑɑn b tuu jii’l k tien muu ni e, ɑ bin lɑɑn l ŋɑn ɑmi l k ŋɑn. L mun biɑ tie nnɑ e nɑn i yɑdɑ. I yɑdɑ ŋɑn k cie sɑlmɑ, ŋɑɑn k Yennu biki i yɑdɑ mɑnŋ. L pɑɑk, Yiesu Klistu nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɔkt, i sɑɑ lɑ sɑnn nɑn dontl nɑn *yudɑnt, i yɑdɑ ŋɑnt pɑɑk.
I k mi lɑ Yiesu ŋɑɑn luon’ɔ, i biɑ k lɑɑt’ɔ mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑɑn k biɑ lek tien’ɔ yɑdɑ. L pɑɑk e k i gbie nɑn pɑlpienn nbɑ yɑb k kɑɑ pɑɑk k nilɔ kɑn fit k bign.
K mɑɑn i lɑɑt lin nbɑ k i yɑdɑ tien’i k ŋɑnn e tie i sei fielu.
Fielu nɑ e k sɔkniinbɑ din luon bin bɑnn l pɑɑk nɑn ninmɔnn, k din sɔknt ɑ l tɑn sii tie yinm e k Yennu sii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn’i.

Klistu Siek nbɑ din be b ni din wɑnn’b ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ lɑ fɑlɑ, k l puolpo k u biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ dontl bonciɑnn, k b kol k luon bin bɑnn yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ tun, k biɑ luon bin bɑnn lɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ.

K Yennu fiit wɑnn’b, ɑ b k sɔknt b mɔnŋ po kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn yinm po e k b sɔknt. Foŋɑnm nbɑ k u din tun’ɔ ɑ wun nyi Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ e mun te k bin nbɑ muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ yien’i mɑɑn mɑnŋ. Lin nbɑ nɑ e k mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ mun luon bin bɑnn l pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, i tien i dudukt siil, k suol i mɔnŋ, kii mɔk dindɑnn nɑn bɑlmɔni, ɑ i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ ninbɑtinu nɑ yuo nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu nɑ.
Ii tie mɑn nɑn wɑɑs nbɑ sɑɑk b bɑɑ mɔb nɑ, k dɑɑ wɑɑ lonbiit nbɑ k i din wɑɑ yuo nbɑ k i din k mi Yiesu Klistu nɑ.
Yennu nbɑ yiin’i nɑ tie *Ŋɑnɔ e, l pɑɑk, ii mun i tie niŋɑnm mɑn,
k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Ii tie niŋɑnm mɑn, k mɑɑn n tie Ŋɑnɔ e.»
L i tie k i mei Yennu, i yi’u Bɑɑ e, k ŋuɑ e bu niib kul buut nɑn bɑɑ tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k ningɑnni kɑɑ. L pɑɑk, yɑɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ii tiin’ɔ mɑn yuo kul.
K mɑɑn i mi nɑn Yennu nbɑ nyinn’i binbenbiiuk nbɑ kɑɑ nyuɑt nbɑ k i din gɑɑl i yejɑnm buol nɑ, u k jii bont nbɑ sɑɑ biil nɑn sɑlmɑ kuo likli nɑ kɑɑ k pɑ,
ŋɑɑn u din jii Klistu sɔn nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ e k dɑɑ’i, Yiesu nbɑ tie nɑn mɑnnu pebik nbɑ k mɔk dɑnŋ k biɑ k mɔk jɑknt nɑ.
Yennu nbɑ dɑɑ din k nɑn *dulnyɑ yuo nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn k u ponŋ din lukt Klistu, k tɑn nyinn’ɔ pɑɑnu dɑɑjuonti ni k tul’i.
Klistu ni e k i tien Yennu yɑdɑ, k Yennu tie wun nbɑ din fiin’ɔ kuun ni k tul’ɔ yudɑnt. L pɑɑk, k i yɑdɑ nɑn i dindɑnn be Yennu ni.
Mɔtɑɑnɑ yɑɑ sɑɑk bɑlmɔni lɑbɑɑl k i ji nyii biit sɔnu ni, ɑ yin fit kii luon i nɑɑ wɑɑs nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ, ii luon i lieb mɑn nɑn i pɑlɑ kul ɑ.

I lɑ mɑnfopɑɑnn ɑ, k l mɑnfuol k nyii bonbuolk nbɑ kpenn ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l nyii bonbuolk nbɑ k kpenn nɑ buol e. Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ tien’t mɑnfuol k sii be mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ e, tul’i mɑnfopɑɑnn mɑnŋ.
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Nisɑɑli kul tie nɑn muɑt nɑ e, k b fɑnt tie nɑn tipuuk nɑ. Muɑt juɑkt k l puut suul bɑɑ,
ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ mɑɑn nɑ ŋɑnin kɑɑ gbennu.» Mɑɑn mɑnŋ e tie lɑbɑmɑnn nbɑ k b din muɑntl k tien’i nɑ.
L pɑɑk, i nyik bonbiil kul tumu mɑn, nɑn fɑɑk kul, nɑn kpinkpɑnni, nɑn *funfunn, nɑn sɑnjɑɑɔnŋ.
Ii tie nɑn sɑnpɑnti nɑ mɑn, kii tun kii luon mɑnfuol biin nbɑ be Foŋɑnm buol ni nɑ, k l i tie k i nyu’l yii kpɑɑtl k tɑn lɑ fielu.
Tɔn, l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «I mi bɑnnu nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ ŋɑn.»
Bɑɑt Yonmdɑɑnɔ buol ni mɑn. Ŋuɑ e tie tɑnn nbɑ fo, wun nbɑ k niib yet, ɑ u k mɔk nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn k Yennu lukt’ɔ k yet, ɑ u ŋɑn k tul’ɔ nɑ.
Ii mun i tie nɑn tɑnɑ nbɑ fo k bin jii’i k mɑɑ Foŋɑnm ŋɑɑk. K yii tie Yennu tiɑɔnŋ mɑnntieb, kii mɑnn *mɑlunŋ nɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ, k Yiesu *Klistu pɑɑk, Yennu sɑɑ gɑɑl i mɑlunŋ ɑ.
K mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni, ɑ u yet ɑ: «Gotl, n lukt tɑnn k bil *Siiɔn duo ni, k l tie tɑnn nbɑ tien fiɑkl pɑnŋ, k l biɑ ŋɑn bonciɑnn, k wun nbɑ kul tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, u kɑn di fei.»
Tɑnn mɑnŋ mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn k tul yinm nbɑ tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ, ŋɑɑn l k tie nnɑ kɑɑ k tul bin nbɑ k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ. «Tɑnn nbɑ k tɑnmɑɑlɑ yet’ɔ nɑ, ŋɑnn e set tie tɑnn nbɑ tien fiɑkl pɑnŋ.»
L biɑ diɑn ɑ: «Tɑnn mɑnŋ e k niib gbiɑtl, tɑnpiiuk mɑnŋ e lubn niib.» Bɑɑ k sɑk Yennu mɑɑn pɑɑk e k b gbiɑtl nɑn wɑɑ din senn’b biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.

Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin tie nigɑnnkɑb e, k biɑ tie mɑnntieb nbɑ tuun k tien kpɑnbɑl, k biɑ tie nibuolu nbɑ tie Yennu yɑb, k biɑ tie u tiɑɔnŋ niib, ɑ yii muɑntl u bulcint po, ŋuɑ nbɑ nyinn’i bunbɔnn ni, k bɑɑl nɑn’i u bɑktnɔunŋ yentu ni.
Siɑn-yuo i din k tie niib, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i tie Yennu niib e. Siɑn-yuo u din k tin’i ninbɑɑɔk, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ u tin’i ninbɑɑɔk ɑ.
N yuɑsnbɑ, yɑɑ tie sɑɑnm k biɑ tie kunsɑnnɑ tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑ, n kpɑɑn’i e ɑ yi nyik gbɑnɑnt lonbiit nbɑ kɔn nɑn i sei nɑ,
ŋɑɑn kii be bɑnnu nbɑ k tingbounŋ niib i lek i tɑɑl’i e, ŋɑɑn b sɑɑ lɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ k dont Yennu sɑnn, dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ.
Yonmdɑɑnɔ pɑɑk, ii sɑɑk mɑn yiikuo-dɑnm mɔi kii sɑɑk kpɑnbɑl nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul mɔb,
nɑn *senni dɑnm nbɑ k u tun’m, ɑ bin dɑt bin nbɑ tuun bonbiil nɑ tubɑ, ŋɑɑn kii pɑk bin nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnn nɑ.
K mɑɑn lin nbɑ k Yennu luon tie, ɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ n guɑl jɑtt mɑɑn nbɑ k mɔk nyuɑt nɑ e.
Ii be nɑn yent-n-mɔnŋ dɑnm nɑ mɑn, ŋɑɑn i dɑɑ diɑ i yent-n-mɔnŋ binbenŋ mɑnŋ k l tien’i yɑɑk nbɑ k i sii tuun bonbiil. Ii mɔk mɑn Yennu tuontunnɑ binbenŋ mɑn.
Ii tien suɑ kul nibɑɑkl, kii luon bin nbɑ tie i nɑɑ wɑɑs Klistu ni nɑ, kii tiin Yennu, kii tien kpɑnbɑl nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul nɑ nibɑɑkl.
Yinm nbɑ tie dɑɑbɑ, ii sɑɑk i yudɑnm mɔi ŋɑɑn biɑ kii tien’m nibɑɑkl, k l k tie bin nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnɑ k biɑ mɔk bulcint nɑ kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn i mun biɑ sii tuun nnɑ e kii tien tondɑnm.
L i tie k ɑ tuun bonŋɑnn ŋɑɑn k b biɑ dint’ɑ fɑlɑ, k ɑ lɑ fɑlɑ mɑnŋ nɑn suklu fɑɑ duki Yennu po nɑ, l wɑnn nɑn ɑ tuun l nbɑ ŋɑn e nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn fi i tun biit k b dɑt ɑ tubl, k ɑ gɑɑl tubdɑtu nɑ suon nnɑ, nlee k b sɑɑ pɑk’ɑ ni? Ŋɑɑn fi i tuun bonŋɑnn, ŋɑɑn di fɑlɑ l pɑɑk suon nnɑ, l tie bonŋɑnn e Yennu tuɑnn.
Ŋɑnn e tie binbenŋ nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’i, ɑ yii be lenŋ, k mɑɑn Klistu tiɑɔnŋ din dii fɑlɑ i pɑɑk, ɑ yii goli u binbenŋ kii wɑɑ u tɑɑ.
U k tun biit. Suɑ biɑ k mi gbɑt k fɑɑk nyii u mɔb ni.
Bɑɑ din suki’ɔ nɑ, u din k sukl jiin. Wɑɑ biɑ din be fɑlɑ ni, u k jiin suɑ, ŋɑɑn din jii u mɔnŋ k tien Yennu nbɑ bu niib buut fɑnu nɑ nuu ni.
Ŋuɑ Klistu mɔnŋ mɔnŋ e din jii t biit u gbɑnɑnt ni, k b kpɑɑ’u dɑpunpunn pɑɑk, ɑ t dɑɑ tie biit tuontunnɑ ŋɑɑn kii be Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ. U dɑni pɑɑk e k i lɑ lɑɑfiɑ.
I din tuu tie nɑn pebotkɑi nɑ e, ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ i jen i kpɑɑltuɑ nbɑ guu i sei nɑ buol ɑ.
Puob, sɑkn mɑn i sɔlb mɔi, k b siɑb i kii tien Yennu mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn pɑsiɑl b puob binbenŋɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk, b sɑɑ tien yɑdɑ wɑɑ, l k kpɑɑ tɑlɑs nɑn puo n yet siɑl,
k mɑɑn b sɑɑ lɑ i binbenŋ nbɑ ŋɑn, k biɑ mɔk cɔlnt bɑnnu nbɑ.
Puob, dɑɑ luon i gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk fɑnt nɑn yulolu, nɑn sɑlmɑ lɑɑni, nɑn sɑlmɑ tutuutɑ, nɑn sɑlmɑ bɑni, ɑmi nɑn tɑŋɑnt liɑnu.
Ŋɑɑn l ŋɑn k i fɑnt i be i pɑlɑ ni, k lii tie sikn-n-mɔnŋ nɑn ŋminŋminn binbenŋ nbɑ k l fɑnt kɑn biil, k biɑ mɔk nyuɑt bonciɑnn Yennu buol ni.
Nnɑ e k yɑɑyuo ni puob nbɑ din tie Yennu yɑb k b dindɑnn din be u ni nɑ, din ŋɑnmt b mɔnŋ. B din sɑɑk b sɔlb mɔi,
nɑn Sɑɑlɑ nbɑ din sɑk Ablɑɑhɑɑnm mɔb k din yi’u u Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ. Mɔtɑɑnɑ i ji tie u bonpoi e, l i tie k i tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, k k tiin siɑl jɑŋmɑɑni.

Puosɔlb, yinm nɑn i puob binbenŋ ni, ii diɑ i puob fɑnu kii mi nɑn b tie tɑli e i buol, kii tien’m nibɑɑkl, k mɑɑn yinm nɑn ŋɑnm kul tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl Yennu piinŋɑnn nbɑ tie mɑnfuol. Ii tuun nnɑ mɑn k siɑl dɑɑ jeni i Yenmiɑlu.
Lin nbɑ biɑl nɑ tie nnɑ e: i kul ii mɔk mɑn dudukyenn, k i bɑkɑ ii be i lieb ni, kii mɔk lonm nɑn i nɑɑ wɑɑs *Klistu ni, kii tiin i lieb ninbɑɑɔk, kii siknt i mɔnŋ.
I dɑɑ tuun biit k jiint biit pɑɑk. I biɑ dɑɑ suki k jiint suɑ, ŋɑɑn jiin sukt mɑnŋ nɑn yetŋɑnm, k mɑɑn Yennu din yiin’i, ɑ yin gɑɑl u yetŋɑnm e.
K mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Wun nbɑ luon k wuu be u mɑnfuol ni nɑn pɑlpienn, k biɑ luon wun tɑn lɑ dɑɑ nbɑ mɑn, sie k u nyik bonbiil pɑku, k biɑ dɑɑ fɑ fɑɑk.
L ŋɑn wun nyik bonbiil, ŋɑɑn kii tuun bonŋɑnn. L ŋɑn wun lon mɑnu sɔnu kii wɑɑ’l,
k mɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ kpɑɑ u ninbinɑ bin nbɑ tie niŋɑnm u buol nɑ pɑɑk e, k biɑ gbiɑ b miɑlu yuo kul ɑ, ŋɑɑn kɔn nɑn bin nbɑ tuun bonbiil.»
I nunm i mɔn nɑn bonŋɑnn tumu, suɑ be k sɑɑ tien’i bonbiil ii?
Ŋɑɑn l i lek i tie k i di fɑlɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk, pɑlpienn sii mɑntk tie i yɑl e. I dɑɑ tiin nisɑɑlk jɑŋmɑɑni, i biɑ dɑɑ te k siɑl dɑɑm’i ni.
Ii cɔln Yonmdɑɑnɔ Klistu i pɑlɑ ni. Yuo kul, ii tien siil k jiin wun nbɑ boi’i lin nbɑ te k i mɔk dindɑnn nɑ po.
I jiin’ɔ suon nnɑ nɑn cɔlnt k dɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit tɑɑl i mɔnŋ l pɑɑk, ɑ k bin nbɑ tɑɑl’i i binbenŋɑnŋ Klistu ni nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, n di fei b sukt pɑɑk.
L i tie Yennu ŋɑɑn k i lɑ fɑlɑ i tuonŋɑnɑ pɑɑk, ŋɑnn e sɔ nɑn k i lɑ fɑlɑ bonbiil tumu pɑɑk.
K mɑɑn Klistu din gɑɑl biitdɑnm kul pɑɑk k kpo yonm kuɑ e, k ŋuɑ nbɑ din tie niŋɑnɔ nɑ e din gɑɑl biitdɑnm pɑɑk k kpo, ɑ wun te yin sɑɑn Yennu buol. B din kpi’u, ŋɑɑn Foŋɑnm din te k u fiil kuun ni.
Foŋɑnm ni e k u biɑ lek din sɑɑn sei nbɑ be sɑlk nɑ buol, k sɑɑ muɑnt mɑɑn k tul’b.
Ŋɑnm e din tie niib nbɑ din k sɑk Yennu mɔb yuo nbɑ k u din guu nɑn suklu k Noe ŋɑnmt ŋɑlngbenŋl nɑ. Niib bɑnniin kuukuɑ din tɑn kuɑ ŋɑlunŋ mɑnŋ ni, k nyun te k b lɑ fielu.

Nyun mɑnŋ tie Yennu nyunwulu ninnɑɔnŋ nbɑ fiel’i mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ e. L k tie bɑɑ tuu wuul gbɑnɑnt jɑknt nɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie mɔsonn nbɑ k i senn Yennu nbɑ wuul i pɑlɑ ni nɑ pɑɑk e. I lɑɑt fielu l ni Yiesu Klistu kuun fiilu nɑ pɑɑk e.
U din sɑɑn *Yendɔunŋ ni e k be Yennu niidiitu po, k ji yen mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑn bin nbɑ kul mɔk yiikuo Yendɔunŋ ni nɑ.
L pɑɑk, *Klistu nbɑ din dii fɑlɑ u gbɑnɑnt ni nɑ, ii mun ii mɔk l dudukt, k mɑɑn wun nbɑ di fɑlɑ u gbɑnɑnt ni ji k duki wɑɑ sɑɑ tun biit bɑnnu nbɑ.
L pɑɑk, lɑɑ jii mɔtɑɑnɑ k ji sɑɑ, l ŋɑn k i jii yuo nbɑ tenn tingbounŋ ni kii tuun Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ, ŋɑɑn nyik nisɑɑlk lonbiit.

Yuo nbɑ gɑl, i din jii i yuo k tuun lin nbɑ k bin nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɑ luon bii tuun nɑ. I din tuun boncuncontuonɑ, k mɔk lonbiit, k nyu dɑɑn k yib, k mɔk jedicɑɑɔnŋ nɑn dɑnyucɑɑɔnŋ, k mɑnn pɑtɑ bonciɑnn.
Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, yɑɑ ji k wɑɑ bin nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɑ k k tuun l bonbiil nɑ, l bɑkt’b e, k b ji suki’i.
Ŋɑɑn b sɑɑ nyinn b tuonɑ pɑɑnu ni k tul Yennu nbɑ tien siil k sɑɑ bu fuotb nɑn kpienm buut nɑ.

Ŋɑnn e te k b din muɑnt lɑbɑmɑnn k tul bin nbɑ kpo nɑ. K b bu b buut suɑ kul nɑn wɑɑ tun lin nbɑ, nɑn nisɑɑli kul nɑ. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ k Foŋɑnm te k b sei fit k be nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon k bii be bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
Bont kul ɑ gbennu ji k fɔk. L pɑɑk, i suol i mɔnŋ kii sub k fit kii mei Yennu.
Lin nbɑ gɑl bont kul tie, ɑ ii luon i lieb mɑn fɑnu, k mɑɑn lonm dɔknt biit bonciɑnn.
Ii gɑɑn lieb sɑɑɔnŋ mɑn k dɑɑ buln.
Yennu tul u niib piini buolu buolu, k suɑ kul n jii piini nbɑ k u lɑ Yennu buol nɑ, kii diɑ’l fɑnu kii tuun nɑn’n kii sonmt lieb.

Wun nbɑ yɑɑ piini tie wuu muɑntl lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ, wuu muɑntl lin nbɑ k Yennu tien’ɔ nɑ e, k wun nbɑ yɑɑ piini tie wuu sonmt niib, wuu sonmt’b nɑn u pɑnŋ kul nbɑ k Yennu tien’ɔ nɑ, ɑ Yennu n lɑ pɑku bonsiɑl kul ni Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk. Ŋuɑ Yiesu yen pɑku nɑn pɑnŋ kul yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.
N yuɑsnbɑ, yɑɑ di fɑlgbenŋɑ nbɑ biki’i nɑ, i dɑɑ te k l bɑktl’i k l tie nɑn bonsɑɑnn nɑ i buol.
Yɑɑ di fɑlɑ nɑn Klistu nbɑ din dii fɑlɑ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, ii mɔk pɑlpienn mɑn, k yuo nbɑ k u *yudɑnt tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu nɑ, i tɑn sɑɑ lɑ pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk.
B i suki’i Klistu sɑnn pɑɑk, pɑlpienn tie i yɑl e, k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ bonciɑnn k biɑ tie Yennu Siek nɑ be i pɑɑk.
Ŋɑɑn suɑ fɑldinu i be nikpinu ɑmi nɑn-yuk ɑmi biit tumu ɑmi kpikpiluk tuonɑ pɑɑk, l k ŋɑn.
Ŋɑɑn fi i di fɑlɑ fɑɑ tie Klistuyuɑ nɑ pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ tiin fei, ŋɑɑn dont Yennu, bɑɑ pul’ɑ Klistu sɑnn nɑ pɑɑk.
Yuo bɑɑl ɑ k Yennu sɑɑ piin k bu niib buut, k u sɑɑ bu u tiɑɔnŋ niib buut e sinsinn, k l i tie k u bu tinm nbɑ tie u niib nɑ buut sinsinn nɑ, bin nbɑ k sɑk u lɑbɑmɑnn nɑ sɑɑ juont nlee?
L diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «L i pɑɑl k niŋɑnm n lɑ fielu, k biitdɑnm nɑn bin nbɑ k tiin Yennu ji sɑɑ tien nlee k lɑ fielu?»
L pɑɑk, bin nbɑ di fɑlɑ Yennu nbɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk nɑ, bii tuun tuonŋɑnɑ, k jii b mɔnŋ k pet tul b nɑntuɑ Yennu nbɑ tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ nɑ.
*Sɑɑkɑb nbɑ be i sinsuuk ni, n kpɑɑn’i e, min nbɑ mun tie sɑɑkuɑ nɑ, k n ninbinn din lɑ *Klistu nbɑ din dii fɑlɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑkn k lɑ *yudɑnt nɑn’ɔ yuo nbɑ k l tɑn sɑɑ nyi pɑɑnu nɑ.

N kpɑɑn’i e, i tie Yennu niib nbɑ be i nuu ni nɑ pekpɑɑli, kii guu’b fɑnu, k l dɑɑ tie miɑl kɑɑ. Ŋɑɑn k lii tie i yɑnbuɑt e, nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon biɑnŋ nbɑ, k l biɑ dɑɑ tie likli pɑɑk kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn ii kpɑnŋ i kol kii tuun.
Dɑɑ mɑntk diɑ niib nbɑ k Yennu tul’i k i guu’b nɑ nɑn ninmɔnn, ŋɑɑn te k i binbenŋɑnŋ n wɑnn’b bɑɑ sii be biɑnŋ nbɑ.
K Klistu wun nbɑ tie pekpɑɑbɑt nɑ i tɑnŋ i jen, i sɑɑ lɑ bɑktnɔunŋ nɑɑn foklk nbɑ sii tun nyili.

Nnɑ e mun, yinm nbɑ tie nɑɑsinm nɑn sɑpɑɑnm, ii sɑɑk sɑɑkɑb mɔi, k i kul ɑ n liɑ liɑtl nbɑ tie sikn-n-mɔnŋ, k mɑɑn l diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni ɑ: «Yennu kɔn nɑn kɑlnbɑɑndɑnm e, ŋɑɑn goli bin nbɑ sikn b mɔnŋ nɑn bulcint.»
L pɑɑk, siknt i mɔnŋ mɑn Yennu nuu nbɑ mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ tinŋ po, k mɑɑn u tɑn sɑɑ donn’i yuo nbɑ k u luon.
Jiin mɑn lin nbɑ kul muks’i k tul’ɔ, k mɑɑn u bɑkɑ be i ni.
Ii diɑ i mɔnŋ mɑn kii guu fɑnu, k mɑɑn i dɑtɑɑk *Sɑɑtɑn lin k biet nɑn yɑnbɔl nɑ e, k luon wun lɑ suɑ k suol ŋmɑn.
Yetl’ɔ mɑn, ŋɑɑn kii diɑ i yɑdɑ fɑnu, k mɑɑn i mi nɑn i nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ be tingbounŋ lɔkl kul po mun di fɑlɑ nɑn yɑɑ di biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.
I fɑlɑ nɑ dinu kɑn wei, k Yennu nbɑ tin’i ninbɑɑɔk k biɑ yiin’i ɑ yin lɑ dontl nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu Klistu ni nɑ, sɑɑ ŋɑnm i binbenŋ, k cie i yɑdɑ, k pukn’i pɑnŋ, k senn’i fiɑkl nbɑ wɑki nɑ pɑɑk.
Ŋuɑ e yen yiikuo kul nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.

Siilɑɑs wun nbɑ k n mi nɑn u tie t nɑɑ bik nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ, ŋuɑ e sonm’n k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ k fɔk nɑ, ɑ n cie i pɑlɑ, k kpɑɑn’i, ɑ ŋɑnn e tie Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn bɑlmɔni. L pɑɑk, ii diɑ’l fɑnu mɑn.
Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be Bɑbiilonn k Yennu din lukt’b nɑn wɑɑ din lukt’i bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ, fuont’i. Mɑɑlk, wun nbɑ tie n bijɑ yɑdɑ pɑɑk nɑ, mun fuont’i.
Ii fuont i lieb kii kpɑnmi mɑn. Mɑnu ii be yinm nbɑ kul tie Klistuyɑb nɑ pɑɑk.

Min Siimɔn Piɑl, wun nbɑ tie Yiesu *Klistu tuontunnɔ nɑn u *tuomi nɑ e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien bin nbɑ lɑ yɑdɑ Yennu nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑn t Fietuɑ Yiesu Klistu nɑ buol nɑ, k b yɑdɑ mɑnŋ mun ŋɑn k tul Yennu nɑn t yɑl nbɑ ŋɑn bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ.
Yɑɑ bɑnn Yennu nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu nɑ pɑɑk, ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn mɑnu ii yɑb kii be i pɑɑk.

Yennu yiikuo e tul’t lin nbɑ kul kpɑɑ tɑlɑs ɑ tii mɔk’l kii fit kii be mɑnfuol ni nɑn binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ. T lɑ l kul, Yennu nbɑ te k t bɑnn wun nbɑ yiin’t ɑ t mun ii mɔk u dontl nɑn u bulcint nɑ pɑɑk e.
Nnɑ e mun, k u din senn mɔsonjɑɑnɑ k tul’t ɑ t i lɑɑt lin nbɑ k u senn mɔsonn nɑn u sɑɑ tul’t nɑ, k fit nyi lonbiiuk nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni nɑn l kuun ni, ŋɑɑn kii mɔk u tiɑɔnŋ binbenŋ.
Lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk, i yɑbl i mɔnŋ k pukn binbenŋɑnŋ i yɑdɑ pɑɑk mɑn, k biɑ pukn Yennu bɑnnu i binbenŋɑnŋ mɑnŋ pɑɑk,
k biɑ pukn mɔnŋdiɑnu i bɑnnu mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k biɑ pukn suklu i mɔnŋdiɑnu mɑnŋ pɑɑk, k biɑ pukn binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm i suklu pɑɑk,
k biɑ pukn nɑɑtɑɑnn i binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm nɑ pɑɑk, k biɑ pukn lonm i nɑɑtɑɑnn mɑnŋ pɑɑk.
Ŋɑnn tie lin nbɑ k i bo sii mɔk, k l i tie k i mɔk’l k l yɑbt, i sɑɑ fit tun Yennu tuonn fɑnu k biɑ bɑnn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu k pukn.
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ k mɔk’l, u k nyuɑn bɑnfɔkl nɑn juɑnŋ nɑ e, k tɑnm nɑn Klistu din wuul u yɑɑyuo ni biit ɑ.
L pɑɑk, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, i yɑbl kii be binbenŋ nbɑ k Yennu din yiin’i k biɑ lukt’i ɑ i be lenŋ nɑ. K mɑɑn l i tie k i tuun nnɑ i e, i kɑn mi bɑɑ biit ni.
Nnɑ e k Yennu tɑn sɑɑ gɑɑl’i nɑn pɑlpienn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu jiɑɔnŋ nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ ni.
L pɑɑk, n sii tun k tiɑn’i lɑbɑɑl nɑ po e yuo kul, mɑɑ lek mi nɑn i ponŋ gbɑt’l ɑ, k mi’l fɑnu, k diɑ’l cinm nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn n dukn nɑn l ŋɑn k n ŋɑnm tiɑl’i k fiin i dudukt mɑɑ dɑɑ be n mɑnfuol ni nɑ.
K mɑɑn n mi nɑn l kɑn wei k n sɑɑ nyi n gbɑnɑnt ni nɑn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nbɑ din yet’n nɑ.
L pɑɑk e te k n yɑɑ n yɑbl n mɔnŋ k lɑ sɔnu nbɑ k i sii tiɑn lɑbɑɑl nɑ po yuo kul ɑ n kuun puolpo.
Setk nɑn mɔni, t din k jii fɑɑk sɔnu ɑmi nisɑɑlk tiɑɔnŋ yɑn ni lɑbɑɑl kɑɑ, k wɑnn’i bɑnnu nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑn yiikuo nɑ, ŋɑɑn t din lɑ u yɑbnt nɑn t ninbinɑ e.

T din be nɑn’ɔ e, yuo nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu din tul’ɔ sɑnn nɑn dontl. L yuo mɑnŋ e k kunkɔl nyii Yennu nɑ yentsɑɑkɑl nbɑ gɑl yentsɑɑkɑlɑ kul nɑ buol ni k yet ɑ: «N Bilonkɑk e nɑ, wun nbɑ k n nunm gbuo’u nɑ e nɑ.»
T mɔnŋ mɔnŋ din gbɑt kunkɔl mɑnŋ k l nyii *Yendɔunŋ ni, yuo nbɑ k t din be nɑn’ɔ Yennu tiɑɔnŋ juɑl pɑɑk.

Ŋɑnn e mɑntk kɑt wɑnt’t nɑn *Yennu sɔkniinbɑ nbɑ din pɑk Yiesu lɑbɑɑl nɑ po din tie bɑlmɔni e, k l ŋɑn k yin gbiint bɑɑ din yet lin nbɑ nɑ fɑnu. K mɑɑn mɑɑn mɑnŋ tie nɑn fitl nbɑ tien yentu bunbɔnn ni nɑ e, mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k sɑn-nyiɑɔk sɑɑ piin yentl k sɑn-nyiɑɔk ni ŋmɑɑbil n yent i pɑlɑ ni.
Ŋɑɑn lin nbɑ gɑl l kul tie nɑ e: nisɑɑlk kɑɑ k fit wɑnn Yennu sɔkniinbɑ mɑɑn nbɑ be Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni nɑ pɑɑk nɑn u tiɑɔnŋ pɑnŋ,
k mɑɑn sɔkniinbɑ suɑ kɑɑ k mi dukn u mɔnŋ yɑn ni k pɑk, ŋɑɑn b din piɑk Yennu tiɑɔnŋ mɑɑn e, Foŋɑnm nbɑ din wɑnt’b bɑɑ sii piɑk lin nbɑ nɑ pɑɑk.

Ŋɑɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ din be *Suifnbɑ sinsuuk ni siɑn-yuo k fɑɑk wɑntieb mun biɑ sii be i sinsuuk ni. B sɑɑ lon wuol ni sɔnu k fit bɑɑl nɑn fɑɑk wɑnnu nbɑ sɑɑ buon’i. B set sɑɑ yet wɑntuɑ Yiesu, wun nbɑ din fiel’b nɑ, k b sɑɑ te k Yennu n biil’b yiɑn ɑ.
Niib bonciɑnn sɑɑ wei b binbenŋ nbɑ mɔk fei nɑ. B pɑɑk k niib sɑɑ tien mɔniɑɔk nɑn bɑlmɔni sɔnu nɑ.
B sii mɔk niɑnciɑɔnŋ, k sii kpɑnn’i k ŋmɑb’i nɑn lɑbɑɑl nbɑ nyi b tiɑɔnŋ dudukt ni nɑ. L pɑɑk, l ponŋ wei wɑɑ, k b Bɑlbuulɔ tien siil, ɑ wun bu b buut k l ji kɑn wei k b biilu sɑɑ bɑɑl.

K mɑɑn Yennu din k nyik mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ din tun biit nɑ tubdɑtu. Ŋɑɑn u din lol’b jɑlt k lu’b buotuk nbɑ sumi bonciɑnn k biɑ mɔk muu nbɑ kɑn mi kpien nɑ ni, k b sii be l ni mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ bu b buut.

Nnɑ e biɑk, u din k nyik yɑɑyuo ni *dulnyɑ niib nɑ. Ŋɑɑn u din te k nyungbiebiiuk o dii dulnyɑ mɑnŋ, k kpii bin nbɑ kul k tiin’ɔ nɑ. U din fiel Noe, wun nbɑ din muɑntl Yenweiu po, k din fiel u ŋɑɑtieb bɑnlole k pukn u pɑɑk.
Ŋuɑ Yennu biɑ din biil doi nbɑ yi Suodonm nɑn Guomuɔl, k te k b dii muu k kɑb kpɑnt tɑnpent. Lin nbɑ nɑ e tie *siɑlɑ k wɑnt biitdɑnm wɑɑ tɑn sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ.
U biɑ din tɑn fiel Lɔt, wun nbɑ din tie niŋɑnɔ nɑ. Biit dɑnm nbɑ din tuun b gbɑnɑnt lonbiit biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l din biil ŋuɑ Lɔt pɑl ni bonciɑnn.
Lɔt, jɑŋɑnɔ mɑnŋ, din be b duo ni e, k lɑɑt b biit, k gbiɑ bɑɑ piɑk b mɔbonbiit biɑnŋ nbɑ dɑɑ kul, k l din dɑmi’ɔ u pɑl ni bonciɑnn, k mɑɑn u din tie niŋɑnɔ e.
Ŋɑnn e k Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu mi biɑnŋ nbɑ k u sɑɑ fɑt niib nbɑ tiin’ɔ, k nyinn’b muksuk ni, ŋɑɑn dɑt biitdɑnm tubɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn dɑɑl nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ bu b buut nɑ.

Bin nbɑ wɑɑ lonbiiuk nbɑ nyii b binbenbiiuk nɑ ni nɑ, k siɑn Yennu yiikuo nɑ, Yennu set sɑɑ dɑt b tubɑ. Fɑɑk wɑntieb nbɑ k n ponŋ piɑk b po nɑ, tie tubkɑngbɑtɑ dɑnm e, k b k tiin suɑ. B k cɔln bin nbɑ be *Yendɔunŋ ni k mɔk *yudɑnt nɑ, ŋɑɑn b suki’b e.
Mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ set mɔk pɑnŋ k gɑl fɑɑk wɑntieb mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn b k tɑɑl bin nbɑ be Yendɔunŋ ni, k biɑ k suki’b Yonmdɑɑnɔ tuɑnn.

Ŋɑɑn jɑb nɑ k mɔk dudukt; b nɑɑn nɑn muuk ni bonkob-biit nbɑ be, k niib tɑn sɑɑ suol’b k kpi’b nɑ e. B tuu suki lin nbɑ k b k gbiɑ l pɑɑk e. B tɑn sɑɑ kpi’b nɑn bɑɑ tuu kpi muuk ni bonkob-biit bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.

Bɑɑ tuu te k niib n lɑ fɑlɑ nɑ, b nyuɑt mun sii tie fɑlɑ e. Lin nbɑ pent b pɑlɑ ni tie bii tuun b gbɑnɑnt lonbiit yennu ni. Bɑɑ tuu be i sinsuuk ni nɑ, l mɔk fei k biɑ tie bonbiil, k mɑɑn bɑɑ di jiet nɑn’i nɑ, b tuu wɑnt b mɔnŋ b biit pɑɑk.
B goli puob e k duki * boncuncontuonn po kuukuɑ. B k fit tuun biit k l jɑnŋt’b, k dɑɑk bin nbɑ k b yɑdɑ k mɔk pɑnŋ nɑ. Yuo kul b luon nyuɑt e. Setk nɑn mɔni, Yennu mɔpol be b pɑɑk.
B nyik sɔnu nbɑ tuok, ŋɑɑn bot ɑ. B wɑɑ Buosol bijɑ Bɑɑlɑɑnm nbɑ din wɑɑ sɔnu nbɑ nɑ e. U din luon biit nyuɑt e,
ŋɑɑn Yennu din kpil’ɔ u mɔyetu nɑ pɑɑk. U bonŋ set din pɑk nɑn’ɔ nɑn nisɑɑlk kunkɔl k kpil’ɔ k te k sɔkni nɑ nyik u jɑti tuonn mɑnŋ.
Niib mɑnŋ buolu tie nɑn bunbunn nbɑ kɑɑ nyun nɑ e, k b tie nɑn sɑyunŋ nbɑ k wounŋ tuu gɑɑn’ɔ nɑ e. Yennu tɑn sɑɑ jii’b k lu’b bunbɔnciɑɔnŋ ni.
B piɑk kɑlnbɑɑni mɑɑn nbɑ k mɔk nyuɑt e, k tuun nɑn b tiɑɔnŋ lonbiiuk k pii bɑlt ɑ bin suol bin nbɑ fɑt b mɔnŋ niib nbɑ tuun biit nɑ buol ni k l dɑɑ k wei nɑ.
B tuu senn mɔsonn k yet, ɑ b sii mɔk yent-n-mɔnŋ, ŋɑɑn b mɔnŋ tie b gbɑnɑnt lonm nbɑ biil’b nɑ dɑɑbɑ e k be sɔnu nbɑ sɑɑ juont nɑn kuun nɑ ni. Suɑ kul tie lin nbɑ yen’ɔ nɑ dɑɑbl.

Bin nbɑ din fit fɑt b mɔnŋ tingbounŋ nɑ biit nɑ ni, k mɑɑn b din bɑnn t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu *Klistu nbɑ tie t Fietuɑ nɑ e, l biit i ŋɑnm suol’b k nyɑnn’b, b juontu tɑn sii bi k gɑl b pinpiik nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ wɑɑ.
B i bo i kii mi binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm, l bo sii sɔ nɑn bɑɑ bɑnn’l ŋɑɑn ji k sɑk Yennu sennu nbɑ k b din gbɑt nɑ.
Bɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ wɑnt nɑn bɑljokt tie mɔni e ɑ: «Bɔk e tuu ŋmɑt k di u mɔnŋ siit,» k: «Duolk i wul nyun ŋɑɑn u tuu ŋmɑt k gbɑl u mɔnŋ nɑn bɑkl e.»
N yuɑsnbɑ, mɑɑ dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nbɑ k tien’i nɑ ji puki kɑdɑɑt ŋɑnle e nɑ. N diɑn l kɑdɑɑt ŋɑnle kul k tiɑl’i lɑbɑɑl nbɑ k i din gbɑt nɑ po, ɑ yii mɔk dudukŋɑnt.
N luon k yii tiɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k sɔknŋɑnm din pɑk yɑɑyuo ni nɑ, kii biɑ kii tiɑn sennu nbɑ k Yonmdɑɑnɔ, wun nbɑ tie t Fietuɑ nɑ din pɑk, k tinm nbɑ tie u tuomiinbɑ din yet’i nɑ po.
Sinsinn, n luon k yii mi nɑn nisiɑb nbɑ wɑɑ b pɑlɑ lonbiit tɑn sii be dɑɑjuonti ni, k tɑn sii sɑlkt’i,
k yien ɑ: «Yiesu *Klistu nbɑ din senn mɔsonn, ɑ u tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ, ŋuɑ liɑ ɑɑ? T bɑɑnbɑ nbɑ ponŋ din kpo wɑɑ nɑn dinnɑ, bonsiɑl kul kpɑn tie nɑn lɑɑ ponŋ tuu tie biɑnŋ nbɑ *dulnyɑ pinpiik ni nɑ e.»
L niib k sɑɑk bin tiɑl nɑn Yennu din yet mɑɑn e k nɑn sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ, k u din nyinn tinŋ nɑ nyun ni k te k l be nyun nɑ sinsuuk ni,
k biɑ din te k nyungbiebiiuk din dii dulnyɑ kpel mɑnŋ k l biil.
Ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ Yennu mɑɑn mɑnŋ e biɑ lek sii diɑ sɑnpɑɑk nɑn tinŋ nbɑ be mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑ mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ te k l kul ɑ n di muu, k l dɑɑl u sɑɑ bu nitont buut k biil’b.
Bon-yenn be. I dɑɑ tɑnmt l po. Yonmdɑɑnɔ buol ni ŋɑnin, dɑyenn kuɑ tie nɑn binɑ tusl nɑ e, k binɑ tusl mun tie nɑn dɑyenn nɑ.

L kɑn wei, k Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑɑ tun k gbien u mɔsonn nɑ. Ŋɑɑn nisiɑb duki nɑn u tɑɑntl e. Ŋɑɑn u mɔk suklu nɑn’i e. U k luon k nisiɑb n kpo kuun nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, ŋɑɑn u luon k suɑ kul n mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ e.

Ŋɑɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑl mɑnŋ bɑɑlu tɑn sii tie nɑn nɑn-yukɔ bɑɑlu nɑ e. L dɑɑl mɑnŋ, k sɑnpɑɑk sɑɑ bot nɑn fujɑɑnn, k muu nbɑ di bonciɑnn tɑn sɑɑ di sɑnpɑɑpo bonsiɑl kul, k tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn bonsiɑl kul nbɑ be lenŋ tɑn sɑɑ di muu e k gbenn.
K bont nɑ kul nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ di muu nnɑ nɑ, i dukn suɑ l ŋɑn k yii tie nibuol bee mɑn i? L ŋɑn k yii be binbenŋ nbɑ gbuot Yennu nunm kii biɑ kii tiin’ɔ,
kii guu Yennu dɑɑl mɑnŋ, k yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk k dɑɑl mɑnŋ n bɑɑl yiɑn. L dɑɑl e k sɑnpɑɑpo tɑn sɑɑ kɑb k biil, k muu nɑ tonu tɑn sɑɑ nɑnn sɑnpɑɑpo bonnɑnkɑɑ.
Ŋɑɑn t guu yuo nbɑ k sɑnpɑpɑɑnn nɑn tinpɑɑnn tɑn sii be nɑn Yennu nbɑ din senn mɔsonn nbɑ nɑ, k lin nbɑ kul tuun lenŋ sii tie nɑn Yennu nbɑ luon bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ e.
N yuɑsnbɑ, yɑɑ guu bonɑ mɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk, i yɑbl i mɔnŋ pɑɑk kii be binbenŋ nbɑ k Yennu luon, k dɑɑ mɔk biit u buol, k mɑnu i be yinm nɑn ŋuɑ sinsuuk ni.
T Yonmdɑɑnɔ nbɑ di suklu nɑ, u tien niib e yɑɑk, ɑ bin lɑ fielu, nɑn t nɑɑ bilonkɑk Pɔul nbɑ mun dɑɑn diɑn kɑdɑsiɑɔk k tul’i k yet’i nɑn Yennu nbɑ tul’ɔ yɑn biɑnŋ nbɑ.

U kɑdɑɑt kul ni, u tuu diɑn k piɑk l lɑbɑɑl po e. Lɑbɑsiɑ be u kɑdɑɑt nɑ ni k pɑɑl nɑn nilɔ n bɑnn l pɑɑk, k nisiɑb nbɑ k mɔk yɑn k biɑ k mɔk yɑdɑ nbɑ wɑki nɑ, biɑ be. B jikt’l k kpint’l fɑɑk e, nɑn bɑɑ tuu kpint’l Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk mɑnŋ pɑɑk boliɑ ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Nnɑ e k b bɑɑt nɑn b tiɑɔnŋ biilu.
N yuɑsnbɑ, i ji mi b po. L pɑɑk, i guu i mɔnŋ, k dɑɑ wɑɑ biitdɑnm fɑɑk sɔni mɑnŋ, k yɑbl k dɑɑ bɑɑ.

I ŋɑɑn k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu nbɑ tie t Fietuɑ nɑ, ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ ii be i binbenŋ ni kii puki, k yin mun ŋɑɑn k yɑɑ bɑnn’ɔ bɑnnu nbɑ nɑ n pukn. Ŋuɑ e yen dontl mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.

N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien’i, ɑ n wɑnn’i wun nbɑ k b yi’u Yennu mɑɑn nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol nɑ po e. Mɑɑn mɑnŋ ponŋ din be *dulnyɑ pinpiik ni e wɑɑ. T din gbɑt u mɑɑn, k lɑ’u nɑn t ninbinɑ, k got’ɔ nyik nyik k biɑ sii’u nɑn t nii.
Yuo nbɑ k mɑnfuol mɑnŋ din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, t din lɑ’u, k l pɑɑk e te k t muɑntl l *siɑlɑ k tien’i, ɑ mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nbɑ din be Bɑɑ buol ni nɑ, u ji fiit’l k wɑnn’t ɑ.
Lin nbɑ k t lɑ k biɑ gbɑt nɑ, t mun muɑntl k tien’i, ɑ yin ji fit tɑɑn nɑn’t mɔtɑɑɔk ni. Bɑlmɔni e setk, t mɔtɑɑɔk ni, t tɑɑnt nɑn Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn u Bijɑ Yiesu *Klistu.
T dɑ lɑbɑɑl mɑnŋ, ɑ tii mɔk pɑlpienn nbɑ kɑɑ pɑɑk e.
Tɔn, mɑɑn nbɑ k t din gbɑt ŋuɑ Yiesu Klistu buol ni k muɑntl k tien’i nɑ, l tie nnɑ e: Yennu tie yentu e, k bunbɔnn kɑɑ u ni.
K t i yɑɑ, ɑ tinm nɑn Yennu mɔk mɔtɑɑɔk, ŋɑɑn be bunbɔnn ni, ŋɑnn t fɑ fɑɑk e, t k tuun Yennu lonm.
Ŋɑɑn l i tie k t wɑɑ yentu sɔnu yuo kul, nɑn Yennu nbɑ be yentu ni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ŋɑnn t mɔk mɔtɑɑɔk nɑn t lieb, k u Bijɑ Yiesu sɔn e wu t pɑlɑ ni k t ji k mɔk biit.
Tɔn, t i yɑɑ ɑ t k mɔk biit i e, ŋɑnn t kpɑnn t mɔnŋ e, k bɑlmɔni kɑɑ t ni.
Ŋɑɑn t i fiit t biit k tul Yennu, t sɑɑ fit bɑnn nɑn u tie bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ k tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k sɑɑ nyik t biit k cɑb’t k biɑ sɑɑ nyinn biit buolu kul t ni.
T i yɑɑ ɑ t k tuun biit i e, ŋɑnn nnɑ t tien’ɔ fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e nɑ, k u mɑɑn mɑnŋ kɑɑ t ni.
N wɑɑs, n k luon k yii tuun biit. L pɑɑk e te k n dɑ k tien’i nɑ, ŋɑɑn l i tie k suɑ tun biit, t mɔk sindɑntinnɔ Bɑɑ Yennu buol ni, k ŋuɑ e tie Yiesu *Klistu, wun nbɑ tie niŋɑnɔ nɑ.
Ŋuɑ e ji din tien *mɑlunŋ Yennu buol ni, ɑ Yennu n nyikcɑb t biit. L pɑɑk, Yennu k nyiktcɑbt t biit kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u nyiktcɑbt *dulnyɑ munn biit e.
T i diɑ Yennu *senni, ŋɑnn e wɑnn nɑn t set mi’u.
L i tie k suɑ yet ɑ: «N mi’u,» ŋɑɑn biɑ k diɑ u senni, l dɑɑnɔ tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e, k bɑlmɔni kɑɑ u ni.

K biɑ jen ɑ, wun nbɑ cɔln u mɑɑn, ŋuɑ e set luon Yennu nɑn u yɑn kul. K biɑ jen ɑ, dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ u gɑɑ u pɑɑk, sie k u binbenŋ i tie nɑn Yiesu binbenŋ nbɑ din tie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Ŋɑnn e k u sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn u gɑɑ Yennu pɑɑk.
N nɑɑ wɑɑlonkɑi, n k dɑ senpɑɑnu kɑɑ k tien’i ni, ŋɑɑn l tie senkpel nbɑ k i din mɔk’l sinsinn nɑ e. Senkpel mɑnŋ tie mɑɑn nbɑ k i ponŋ mi k gbɑt nɑ e.
Ŋɑɑn n set dɑ sennpɑɑnu e k tien’i, l set sennpɑɑnu Klistu ni, k biɑ sii tie sennpɑɑnu i ni. L pɑɑk nyiɑɔk gɑɑl e, k bɑlmɔni yentu ji be.
Wun nbɑ yet, ɑ u be yentu ni, ŋɑɑn mɔk nɑnŋ nɑn u nɑɑ bik nɑ, l dɑɑnɔ set be bunbɔnn ni e.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon u nɑɑ bik nɑ be yentu ni, k siɑl kɑɑ u ni k sɑɑ te k nilɔ n bɑɑ biit ni.
Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bik nɑ be bunbɔnn ni e, k u biɑ sonm lintl bunbɔnn ni e k k mi wɑɑ sɑɑ siɑn nbɑ k mɑɑn bunbɔnn nɑ e te k u juɑn.
N wɑɑs, n dɑ tien’i k mɑɑn Yennu nyik cɑb i biit Yiesu sɑnn pɑɑk ɑ.
N dɑ k tien yinm nbɑ tie wɑdɑnm k mɑɑn i mi wun nbɑ ponŋ din be pinpiik ni wɑɑ. Nipɑɑɔnŋ, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i nyɑnn Klistu dɑtɑɑk nɑ wɑɑ.

Wɑɑs, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i mi Bɑɑ. Yinm nbɑ tie wɑdɑnm, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i mi wun nbɑ ponŋ din be pinpiik ni wɑɑ. Nɑɑsinm, n dɑ k tien’i k mɑɑn i mɔk pɑnŋ k Yennu mɑɑn be i ni, k i nyɑnn Klistu dɑtɑɑk nɑ wɑɑ.
I dɑɑ luon tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb sɔnu ɑmi lin nbɑ be tingbounŋ nɑ ni. L i tie k nilɔ luon tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb sɔni i e, u k luon Bɑɑ Yennu.

Lin nbɑ k b lɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ ni e nɑ: lonbiiuk nbɑ be suɑ kul ni, nɑn niɑn nbɑ k niib mɔk bonɑ nbɑ k b lɑɑt nɑ pɑɑk, nɑn wɑnt-n-mɔnŋ nbɑ nyi mɔktuk ni. Lin nbɑ nɑ kul k nyii Bɑɑ buol ni kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie tingbounŋ yɑl e.
Tingbounŋ nɑ nɑn l lonbiit gbent e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ k Yennu luon nɑ sii tun fo e.
N wɑɑs, dulnyɑ gbennu pel nɑ. I ponŋ mi gbɑt ɑ Klistu Dɑtɑɑk bɑɑt, k mɔtɑɑnɑ, u dɑtɑi bonciɑnn ponŋ bɑɑl nɑ. Ŋɑnn e te k t set mi nɑn dulnyɑ gbennu pel nɑ.
Klistu dɑtɑi mɑnŋ e nyii t ni, ŋɑɑn b k tie t yɑb. B i bo i tie t yɑb i e, tinm nɑn ŋɑnm bo sii lɑkn be, ŋɑɑn b nyik’t ɑ, k l wɑnt nɑn b din k tie t yɑb.
Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, i mɔk Foŋɑnm nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu din muɑn i pɑɑk nɑ, k ŋɑnn e te k i kul ɑ mi bɑlmɔni.
Tɔn, l k tie ɑ i k mi bɑlmɔni kɑɑ te k n dɑ k tien’i nɑ, ŋɑɑn l tie yɑɑ ponŋ mi bɑlmɔni mɑnŋ nɑ pɑɑk, k i mi nɑn fɑɑk k nyi l ni.
K ŋmee tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ? L tie wun nbɑ yɑɑ, ɑ Yiesu k tie Klistu e. Ŋuɑ e tie Klistu dɑtɑɑk mɑnŋ, k yien Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn u Bijɑ.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yet Bijɑ mɑnŋ, biɑ yet Bɑɑ Yennu e nɑ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ piɑk k yien, ɑ u tien Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ wɑɑ, Bɑɑ mun be nɑn’ɔ.
Yɑɑ din sint gbɑt mɑɑn nbɑ pinpiik ni nɑ, ii diɑ nnɑ mɑn fɑnu. L i tie k i diɑ’l, i sii be Bijɑ mɑnŋ ni nɑn Bɑɑ ni.
k mɔsonn nbɑ k u senn k tul’t nɑ tie ɑ, t sii be nɑn Yennu e yuo kul.
N dɑ lin nbɑ nɑ k tien’i k ceknt’i k jikt sɑɑ niib nbɑ yɑɑ bin kpɑnn’i nɑ po e.

Ŋɑɑn yinm ŋɑnin, Yiesu sikn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ i pɑɑk ɑ. Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ nbɑ biɑl be i ni nɑ, i ji kii luon k suɑ n wɑnn’i. K mɑɑn Foŋɑnm mɑnŋ mɔnŋ e wɑnt’i bont kul ɑ, k u wɑnnu mɑnŋ e tie bɑlmɔni wɑnnu, k fɑɑk kɑɑ lenŋ. L pɑɑk, ii sɑɑk Foŋɑnm wɑnnu nɑ kii be Klistu ni.
Tɔn, n wɑɑs, ii biɑl Klistu ni mɑn k tii mɔk pɑlcienn yuo nbɑ k u sɑɑ dɔkt t pɑɑk, k t dɑɑ di fei u buol yuo nbɑ k u tɑn sɑɑ jen nɑ.
I mi nɑn Klistu tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn, ŋɑɑn l mun biɑ ŋɑn k i bɑnn nɑn dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn nɑ tie Yennu bik e.
Lek gotl mɑn lonbuolu nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu mɑntk luon’t nɑ. U lonm mɑnŋ mɑntk ji sɑɑ yɑbt e, k u yi’t u wɑɑs, k t set tie u wɑɑs e. Tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb k mi’t, k mɑɑn b k mi ŋuɑ Yennu.
N yuɑsnbɑ, mɔtɑɑnɑ t tie Yennu wɑɑs e, ŋɑɑn tɑɑ tɑn sii tie biɑnŋ nbɑ dɑɑ bɔl e. Ŋɑɑn tɑɑ mi lin nbɑ e nɑ: *Klistu i tɑnŋ i dɔkt, t tɑn sii tie nɑn ŋuɑ nɑ e, k mɑɑn t sɑɑ lɑ wɑɑ set tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
Nilɔ kul nbɑ mɔk dindɑnn nɑn u jenu nɑ, k mɔk biit nɑn Yiesu nbɑ k mɔk biit biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Dɑɑnsuɑ kul nbɑ tuun biit biil Yennu *senni e. Setk nɑn mɔni, biit tie Yennu senni biilu e.
I mi nɑn Yiesu Klistu din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ wun nyinn t biit e, k biit kɑɑ u ni.
Wun nbɑ be u ni nɑ k tuun biit. Wun nbɑ tuun biit, k mi lɑ Yiesu k biɑ k mi’u.
N wɑɑs, i dɑɑ sɑɑk k suɑ n kpɑnn’i ni. Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn Yennu buol ni nɑ, mun tie niŋɑnɔ Yennu buol e nɑn Yiesu nbɑ tie Ŋɑnɔ u buol nɑ.
Wun nbɑ tuun biit, ŋuɑ e tie *Sɑɑtɑn yuɑ k mɑɑn Sɑɑtɑn din piin k tuun biit tingbounŋ pinpiik ninŋ e. Yennu Bijɑ Yiesu set din bɑɑl ɑ wun biil Sɑɑtɑn tuonɑ e.
Wun nbɑ tie Yennu bik, u ji k tuun biit, k mɑɑn yiikuo nbɑ nyii Yennu buol nɑ be u ni, k mɑɑn Yennu tie u Bɑɑ. L pɑɑk k u ji kɑn fit kii tuun biit.
Dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ k tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn k tie Yennu bik, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ k luon u nɑɑ bik biɑ k tie Yennu bik kɑɑ. Nnɑ e k t mi bin nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs nɑn bin nbɑ tie Sɑɑtɑn wɑɑs.
L ŋɑn k tii mɔk lonm nɑn t lieb. Ŋɑnn e tie mɑɑn nbɑ k i din gbɑt pinpiik ni nɑ.
L k ŋɑn k tii tuun nɑn Kɑɑen nbɑ din tuun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. Ŋuɑ din tie pol yuɑ e, k din kpii u wɑɑlɔ. Biɑ pɑɑk e te k u din kpii’u? U tiɑɔnŋ tuonɑ din bi ŋɑɑn k u wɑɑlɔ yɑl ŋɑn.
Tɔn, n nɑɑ wɑɑs, l i tie k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb nɑn’i, i dɑɑ te k l tie’i bɑktnɔunŋ.
T mi nɑn t nyii kuun ni ŋɑɑn kuɑ mɑnfuol ni e, k mɑɑn t luon t nɑɑ wɑɑs. Wun nbɑ k mɔk lonm u pɑl ni nɑ be kuun ni e.
Wun nbɑ mun nɑn u nɑɑ bik nɑ, tie nikpiiluk o, k i mi nɑn mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu kɑɑ u ni.
Gotl mɑn, Yiesu nbɑ din gɑɑl t pɑɑk k kpo nɑ e wɑnt’t lonm nbɑ tie lin nbɑ, k l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tii gɑɑn t nɑɑ wɑɑs pɑɑk kii kpenn.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ mɔk, ŋɑɑn lɑ u nɑɑ bik k u k mɔk siɑl, k u bɑkɑ kɑɑ u ni, nlee k u sɑɑ yet ɑ, Yennu lonm be u ni?
N wɑɑs, l k ŋɑn k t lonm i be t mɔi ni nɑn t mɔbonɑ ni kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn k lii tie bɑlmɔni lonm nbɑ k nilɔ sɑɑ fit lɑ t tuonɑ ni.
Gotl bɑnnu nbɑ k t sɑɑ bɑnn nɑn t wɑɑ bɑlmɔni, nɑn bɑnnu nbɑ k t mɔk pɑlmɑnn Yennu buol.
L i tie k t dudukt tɑl’t, t mi nɑn Yennu cie t dudukt k biɑ mi bonsiɑl kul.
Tɔn, n yuɑsnbɑ, t dudukt i kii wɑnn’t nɑn t mɔk biit, t mɔk pɑlmɑnn Yennu buol,
k t lɑɑt lin nbɑ kul k t mei’ɔ l po k mɑɑn t sɑɑk u senni k tuun lin nbɑ pent u pɑl.
Yennu nbɑ senn lin nbɑ e nɑ: ɑ t tien u Bijɑ Yiesu Klistu yɑdɑ kii luon t lieb nɑn wɑɑ din senn’t senni biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
Wun nbɑ sɑɑk Yennu senni nɑ be u ni k Yennu mun biɑ be u ni. Wɑɑ din tul’t Foŋɑnm nɑ pɑɑk k t mi nɑn u be t ni.
N yuɑsnbɑ, i dɑɑ tie nisiɑb kul nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ b mɔk Foŋɑnm nɑ mɑɑn yɑdɑ, ŋɑɑn biknt’b mɑn, k got lɑɑn sei mɑnŋ nyii Yennu buol ni ɑmi siɑl buol e? K mɑɑn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ yɑt gbie tingbounŋ nɑ wɑɑ.
Gotl mɑn bɑnnu nbɑ k i sɑɑ fit bɑnn nɑn nilɔ mɔk Foŋɑnm. Wun nbɑ kul yet, ɑ Yiesu Klistu din kpɑnt nisɑɑlk e, ŋuɑ e mɔk Siek nbɑ nyii Yennu penŋ.

Ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ kul yet ɑ lin nbɑ nɑ k tie mɔni k jiin Yiesu po nɑ, k mɔk Siek nbɑ nyii Yennu penŋ. L dɑɑnɔ siek tie *Klistu Dɑtɑɑk yɑl e. I ponŋ din gbɑt nɑn Klistu Dɑtɑɑk bɑɑt, k mɔtɑɑnɑ u ponŋ set be tingbounŋ nɑ ni.
N wɑɑs, yinm tie Yennu yɑb e. I kɔn k nyɑnn fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ wɑɑ. K mɑɑn siek nbɑ be i ni nɑ mɔk pɑnŋ k gɑl siek nbɑ be niib nbɑ tie *dulnyɑ nɑ yɑb ni nɑ.
Fɑɑk sɔkniinbɑ nɑ e tie tingbounŋ nɑ yɑb. L pɑɑk e te k b piɑk tingbounŋ nnɑ mɑɑn, k tingbounŋ nɑ yɑb fiin b po.
Ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin tie Yennu yɑb e, k bin nbɑ mi Yennu, ŋɑnm e fiin t mɑɑn po. Ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ k tie Yennu yɑb, b k fiin t mɑɑn po. Ŋɑnn e te k t bɑnt bɑlmɔni Siek nɑn fɑɑk Siek.
N yuɑsnbɑ, tii luon t lieb mɑn, k mɑɑn lonm nyii Yennu penŋ e, k wun nbɑ mɔk lonm nɑ, tie Yennu bik e k biɑ mi’u.
Wun nbɑ k mɔk lonm u k mi Yennu, k mɑɑn Yennu tie lonm e.
Gotl bɑnnu nbɑ k Yennu wɑnn’t u lonm. U din tun u Bijɑyenml tingbounŋ nɑ ni, ɑ tin lɑ mɑnfuol u pɑɑk.
Lonm nbɑ tie lonm nɑn bɑlmɔni tie nnɑ e: l k tie ɑ tinm kɑɑ din luon Yennu, ŋɑɑn ŋuɑ e din luon tinm, k tun u Bijɑ, ɑ u *mɑlunŋ pɑɑk tin lɑ t biit nyikcɑbu.
N yuɑsnbɑ, Yennu nbɑ luon’t biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k tii mun ii luon t lieb nnɑ.
Suɑ k mi lɑ Yennu, ŋɑɑn t i luon lieb i e, Yennu be t ni, k u lonm tuun t ni nɑn bɑlmɔni.
Gotl bɑnnu nbɑ k t mi nɑn t be Yennu ni k u biɑ be t ni. U din tul’t Foŋɑnm e.
K t din lɑ k biɑ muɑntl, ɑ Bɑɑ din tun u Bijɑ, ɑ Bijɑ mɑnŋ ii tie tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb Fietuɑ.
L i tie k suɑ yet, ɑ Yiesu tie Yennu Bijɑ, Yennu be u ni, k u mun biɑ be Yennu ni.
K t mɔnŋ mɔnŋ mun bɑnn Yennu nbɑ luon’t biɑnŋ nbɑ, k biɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn u set luon’t. Yennu tie lonm e, k dɑɑnɔ nbɑ be lonm nɑ ni, ŋuɑ e be Yennu ni, k Yennu mun biɑ be u ni.
L i tie k lonm be t ni nɑn bɑlmɔni, t sii mɔk pɑlcienn buut dɑɑl, k mɑɑn t binbenŋ dulnyɑ ni tie nɑn Yiesu yɑl nɑ e.
T i mɔk lonm, jijiet sii kɑɑ. L i tie k lonm mɑntk be nɑn mɔni mɔni, jijiet kɑn lɑ yɑɑk kii be t ni. L i tie k nilɔ mɔk jijiet, u k mɔk lonm nɑn bɑlmɔni, k mɑɑn tubdɑtu pɑɑk e k t tuu jie.
Ŋɑɑn tinm ŋɑnin, t mɔk lonm k mɑɑn Yennu e din sint mɔk lonm nɑn tinm.
Dɑɑnɔ nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ u luon Yennu, ŋɑɑn biɑ nɑn u nɑɑ bik, u tie fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e. L i tie k u k luon u nɑɑ bik nbɑ k u lɑɑt’ɔ nɑ, nlee k u sii luon Yennu nbɑ k u k lɑɑt’ɔ nɑ?
Sennu nbɑ k Klistu senn e nɑ: wun nbɑ luon Yennu, sie k u luon u nɑɑ bik.
Wun nbɑ kul tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu tie *Klistu nɑ, l dɑɑnɔ tie Yennu bik e. K dɑɑnɔ nbɑ luon nisuɑ, u biɑ sii luon nilɔ mɑnŋ wɑɑs e.
L i tie k t luon Yennu k tuun u *senni nbɑ wɑnt bɑnnu nbɑ, ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn t luon u wɑɑs,
k l ii biɑ kii tie k t diɑ u senni, ŋɑnn e wɑnt nɑn t luon’ɔ, k u senni mɑnŋ k pɑɑl,
k mɑɑn Yennu wɑɑs kul sɑɑ fit nyɑnn *dulnyɑ wɑɑ. Tɑɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑ pɑɑk e, k t nyɑnn dulnyɑ.
K ŋmee sɑɑ fit nyɑnn dulnyɑ? Wun nbɑ tien yɑdɑ nɑn Yiesu tie Yennu Bijɑ kuukuɑ.
Ŋuɑ Yiesu Klistu e tie wun nbɑ din bɑɑl nɑn nyun nɑn sɔn. U din k bɑɑl nɑn nyun kuukuɑ kɑɑ, ŋɑɑn u din bɑɑl nɑn sɔn mun biɑk. K Foŋɑnm tie siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ, k mɑɑn Foŋɑnm tie bɑlmɔni e.
Tɔn, bonɑ ŋɑntɑ e be k tie *siɑlɑ,
Foŋɑnm nɑn nyun nɑn sɔn, k l bonɑ ŋɑntɑ mɑnŋ kul tɑɑn tie *siɑlɑ mɑnŋ.
T gɑɑn niib *siɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn Yennu siɑlɑ e ŋɑn k cie niib yɑl k mɑɑn l tie siɑlɑ nbɑ k Yennu tien k jiin u Bijɑ mɑnŋ po.

Wun nbɑ tien Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ, ŋuɑ e mɔk Yennu siɑlɑ mɑnŋ u pɑl ni, k wun nbɑ k tien u siɑlɑ mɑnŋ yɑdɑ, u tien’ɔ fɑɑk dɑɑnɔ e nɑ, k mɑɑn u k tien yɑdɑ nɑn siɑlɑ nbɑ k Yennu tien u Bijɑ po nɑ tie mɔni.
Yennu siɑlɑ mɑnŋ tie nnɑ e, u tul’t mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k mɑnfuol mɑnŋ nyi u Bijɑ Yiesu ni e.
Wun nbɑ mɔk Yennu Bijɑ nɑ, ŋuɑ e mun mɔk mɑnfuol mɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ k mɔk Yennu Bijɑ mɑnŋ, u k mɔk l mɑnfuol.
N dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien yinm nbɑ tien Yennu Bijɑ sɑnn yɑdɑ, k mɑɑn n luon k i bɑnn nɑn i mɔk mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Gotl lin nbɑ te k t mɔk pɑlcienn Yennu tuɑnn. T mi nɑn t i miɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ tɑɑ nɑn wɑɑ luon lin nbɑ nɑ po, u gɑɑn t miɑlu.
K t i mi nɑn u gɑɑn t miɑlu, tɑɑ miɑl’ɔ lin nbɑ kul po nɑ, t mi nɑn t ponŋ gɑɑl lin nbɑ k t mei’ɔ l po nɑ wɑɑ.

Suɑ i lɑɑt u nɑɑ bik k u tuun biit nbɑ kɑn bɑɑl nɑn kuun, l dɑɑnɔ ii mei Yennu u pɑɑk, k Yennu sɑɑ tul biitdɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ mɑnfuol. Nɑ tie mɔni k tul bin nbɑ yɑɑ biit k bɑɑt nɑn kuun. Ŋɑɑn bisiɑt be, k bɑɑt nɑn kuun, k n k yɑɑ yii mei Yennu kii tien bin nbɑ tuun l biit buolu kɑɑ.
Tuonɑ kul nbɑ k ŋɑn lek tie biit e, ŋɑɑn bisiɑt be k kɑn bɑɑl nɑn kuun.
T mi nɑn bin nbɑ tie Yennu wɑɑs ji k tuun biit, k mɑɑn Yennu Bijɑ Yiesu guu’b, k Klistu dɑtɑɑk kɑn tien’m siɑl.
K t mi nɑn tinm tie Yennu yɑb e, k tingbounŋ nɑ ŋɑɑtieb kul nɑ be Klistu dɑtɑɑk yiikuo ni.
T mi nɑn Yennu Bijɑ din bɑɑl tingbounŋ nɑ ni, k tɑn tul’t yɑn, ɑ tii bɑnt bɑlmɔni Yennu. T be u ni u Bijɑ Yiesu Klistu nɑ pɑɑk e, k ŋuɑ e tie bɑlmɔni Yennu k biɑ tie mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
N wɑɑs, I dɑɑ mɑnn pɑtɑ.

Min nbɑ tie jɑɑnti sɑɑkuɑ nɑ e, dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien puo nbɑ k Yennu lukt’ɔ nɑ, nɑn u wɑɑs. N luon’i nɑn bɑlmɔni, k l k tie min kuukuɑ kɑɑ luon’i ni, ŋɑɑn bin nbɑ kul nbɑ mi bɑlmɔni nɑ, b mun biɑ luon’i,
k mɑɑn bɑlmɔni be t ni k biɑ sii tun be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu.
Bɑɑ Yennu nɑn u Bijɑ Yiesu *Klistu ii mɔk ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ nɑn nyikcɑbu nɑn’t, k biɑ tul’t mɑnu, ɑ tii mɔk lin nbɑ nɑ kul, bɑlmɔni nɑn lonm sɔnu ni.
N dɑɑn mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn nɑn mɑɑ dɑɑn lɑ ɑ wɑsiɑt nbɑ k b wɑɑ bɑlmɔni nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu senn’t nɑ.
Cɑnnɑɑ, n mei’ɑ, ŋɑɑnt k t kul i luon t lieb. Lin nbɑ nɑ k tie sennpɑɑnu kɑɑ k n diɑn’ɑ ni, ŋɑɑn l tie sennu nbɑ k t din dɔnŋ gbiɑ l po pinpiik ni.
Lonm tie tii sɑɑk Yennu *senni e, k sennu nbɑ k i din dɔnŋ gbiɑ l po pinpiik ni nɑ wɑɑ, tie k i wɑɑ lonm sɔnu.

Kpinkpɑnni dɑnm bonciɑnn ponŋ bɑɑl k yɑt sɑɑn siɑl po kul tingbounŋ nɑ ni wɑɑ, bin nbɑ yɑɑ, ɑ ŋɑnm k tien yɑdɑ, ɑ b mɑl Yiesu nisɑɑlk e. Wun nbɑ tuun l buolu tie kpinkpɑnni dɑɑnɔ, k biɑ tie Yiesu dɑtɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, ii cek mɑn, k tɑn dɑɑ kɔnŋt t tuonn nyuɑt, ŋɑɑn tɑn lɑ nyuɑt nbɑ yɑb.
Dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ k gɑɑn Yiesu Klistu wɑnnu bonŋɑnn ŋɑɑn puki u mɔnŋ yɑl, u k gɑɑl Yennu, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ sɑɑk wɑnnu mɑnŋ k k nyikt, Bɑɑ nɑn Bijɑ kul be u ni.
L i tie k dɑɑnsuɑ nbɑ bɑɑl i buol ni, k k wɑnt wɑnnu mɑnŋ, i dɑɑ gɑɑn’ɔ i ŋei ni, k biɑ tɑɑn dɑɑ yien’ɔ, ɑ u nyinu po
k mɑɑn wun nbɑ fuont’ɔ, u mɔnŋ tɑɑnt dɑɑnɔ mɑnŋ biit po e nɑ.
N mɔk mɔbonɑ bonciɑnn k luon k n diɑn k tul’i, ŋɑɑn n k luon k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk ni kɑɑ k tul’i ni, ŋɑɑn n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn n sɑɑ bɑɑl k gɔn’i, k tin pɑk nɑn lieb mɔi ni, k tii mɔk pɑlpienn nɑn mɔni.
A niipuo wun nbɑ k Yennu gɑnn’ɔ nɑ, u wɑɑs fuont’ɑ.
Min nbɑ tie jɑɑnti sɑɑkuɑ nɑ e, dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien n yuɑk Gɑius nbɑ k n luon’ɔ bonciɑnn nɑ.
N yɔmɔnŋ, n bo luon nɑn fii be lɑɑfiɑ ni, k ɑ bonɑ kul i ŋɑn nɑn lɑɑ ŋɑn bɑnnu nbɑ fin nɑn Yennu sinsuuk ni nɑ.
N dɑɑn lɑ pɑlpienn bonciɑnn nɑn t nɑɑ wɑsiɑt nbɑ dɑɑn bɑɑl nnɑ, k tɑn yet’n fɑɑ wɑɑ bɑlmɔni fɑnu biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, nɑn fɑɑ tuu wɑɑ’l fɑnu nɑ.
Siɑl k penn n pɑl ni k mɑntk bɑɑl mɑɑ gbɑt ɑ n wɑɑs wɑɑ bɑlmɔni nɑ.
N yuɑk, fɑɑ sonmt t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tie sɑɑnm biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, ɑ tuun lin nbɑ k bɑlmɔni sɔnu wɑnt’ɑ.
B dɑɑn pɑk ɑ bulcint mɑnŋ po *Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sinsuuk ni. N bɑln’mɑ e, fii sonmt’b kii ŋɑnmt b sɔnu bɑnnu nbɑ sɑɑ penn Yennu pɑl.
Setk nɑn mɔni, b dɑɑn sɑɑn sɔnu Yonmdɑɑnɔ sɑnn pɑɑk k k gɑɑl sonmsiɑl bin nbɑ k tie Klistuweilɑ nɑ buol ni.
L pɑɑk, l kpɑɑ tɑlɑs e k tinm Klistuweilɑ ii gɑɑn l nibuolu sɑɑɔnŋ. Nnɑ e k t nuu sii be tuonn nbɑ k b tuun k tien bɑlmɔni muɑntu nɑ ni.
N ponŋ mi diɑn bɑlsɑi nnɑ k tul Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be ɑ buol ni nɑ, ŋɑɑn k Diotlef nbɑ luon wun pul u mɔnŋ nijɑɑnn nɑ yien n mɔb.

L pɑɑk, mi i tɑnŋ i bɑɑl, n sɑɑ fiit lin nbɑ kul k u tun, nɑn bonbisiɑl nɑn fɑɑk nbɑ k u pɑk k jiin t po nɑ. Ŋɑɑn biit mɑnŋ nbɑ k u tun nɑ, l lek k jɑnŋ’ɔ. U biɑ tuu yet wun gɑɑl t nɑɑ wɑɑs nbɑ tuu tɑn bɑɑl u buol ni, k biɑ k luon k u lieb ii gɑɑn’m, k tuu bel nyinn bin nbɑ gɑɑl sɑɑnm mɑnŋ sɑɑɔnŋ nɑ Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib sinsuuk ni.
N yuɑk, dɑɑ toki suɑ biit, ŋɑɑn kii tuun lin nbɑ ŋɑn. Wun nbɑ tuun bonŋɑnn, u tie Yennu yuɑ e, ŋɑɑn wun nbɑ tuun biit, u k mi Yennu.
Suɑ kul piɑk Demetlius, k u benu nɑ e biɑ wɑnt nɑn u wɑɑ bɑlmɔni, k t mɔnŋ mun piɑk’ɔ, k ɑ mun mi nɑn t set tie bɑlmɔni dɑnm e.
N biɑ mɔk mɑɑn bonciɑnn k luon k n pɑk k tul’ɑ, ŋɑɑn n k luon k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk ni kɑɑ k tul’ɑ ni.
Ŋɑɑn n mɔk dindɑnn nɑn l kɑn wei k n tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl k lɑ’ɑ, k tin tɑn pɑk nɑn lieb mɔi ni.
Mɑnu ii be ɑ pɑɑk. T yuɑsnbɑ fuont’ɑ. T yuɑsnbɑ nbɑ mun biɑ be ɑ buol ni nɑ, ɑ fuont b suɑ kul.
Min Suud wun nbɑ tie Yiesu *Klistu tuontunnɔ, k biɑ tie Sɑɑk ninjɑ nɑ e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ k tien niib nbɑ k Bɑɑ Yennu yiin’m k luon’m, k Yiesu Klistu guu’b nɑ.
Yennu n tin’i ninbɑɑɔk k tul’i mɑnu nɑn lonm bonciɑnn.

N yuɑsnbɑ, n ninbinn dɑɑn mɔn nɑn k n diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk k tul’i k sɑɑn gɑɑn fielu nbɑ tie t kul yɑl nɑ po. Ŋɑɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ l ji kpɑɑ tɑlɑs k n diɑn k cie i pɑlɑ. I yɑbl i mɔnŋ kii diɑ yɑdɑ nbɑ k Yennu din tul u niib kul tɑɑl yonm kuɑ nɑ.

K mɑɑn nibiit din kuɑ i sinsuuk ni wuol ni e, k lebtl Yennu ninkpɑbɑɔnŋ lɑbɑɑl, ɑ bin bɔl b gbɑnɑnt lonbiiuk tuonɑ nɑ. B yet bin wei Yiesu Klistu, wun nbɑ kuukuɑ tie t yudɑɑnɔ nɑn Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑ. L wei wɑɑ, k b tubdɑtu ponŋ diɑn Yennu lolkpel kɑdɑɑɔk ni.

Mɑɑ yɑɑ n yet’i lin nbɑ nɑ, i ponŋ gbɑt l kul ɑ, k mi’l fɑnu, ŋɑɑn n luon k n tiɑl’i l po e. Yonmdɑɑnɔ din fɑt u niib k nyinn’b dɑɑbs ni Ejipt tinŋ ni, ŋɑɑn l puolpo u din kpii bin nbɑ din k tien’ɔ yɑdɑ nɑ wɑɑ.

Ii tiɑn mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nbɑ din k diɑ yiikuo nbɑ k Yennu din tul’b nɑn l sɔnu, k biɑ din yɑɑt k nyik b binbebuol nɑ po. Yennu bɑɑn’m bɑnt nbɑ sii be nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ k lu’b sɑlk buotsunsunŋ nbɑ bɔn ni, k guu dɑgbenŋl nbɑ k u sɑɑ bu b buut nɑ.

Ii biɑk kii tiɑn doi nbɑ k b yi Suodonm nɑn Guomuɔl nɑ nɑn digbɑnɑ nbɑ kpiɑ l doi nɑ po mɑn. L doi niib din tuun tuonbiit nnɑ e. B din be yɑnɑ yɑnɑ nnɑ e, k duɑ nɑn lin nbɑ kuɑ. B tubdɑtu tie muu nbɑ di yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu e mɔtɑɑnɑ, ŋɑnm e tie nyinn k tul’i.
L nibuolu mun biɑ be i sinsuuk ni k tuun nɑn l doi ni niib nɑ. B duki fɑɑk bont po e, k wɑɑ b gbɑnɑnt niɑnbiit. B k cɔln Yomdɑɑnɔ yiikuo, k biɑ suki yɑbnt mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ.

Miisiɑl nbɑ din tie mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ sɑɑkuɑ nɑ, din k tun nnɑ. Ŋɑɑn u din kɔn nɑn *Sɑɑtɑn e Muois gbɑnɑnt pɑɑk. Ŋɑɑn kɔnn mɑnŋ ni, u din k sukl’ɔ k pɑk k biil’ɔ, ŋɑɑn u din yet ɑ: «Yonmdɑɑnɔ n ŋmɑnn ɑ tubl.»
Ŋɑɑn l nibiit ŋɑnin suki lin nbɑ k b k bɑn e. Bɑɑ mi lin nbɑ, nɑn muuk ni bonkobt nbɑ k mɔk dudukt nɑ, sɑɑ nɑn’m biilu e.
Pɑlbiil be b pɑɑk. K mɑɑn b wei Kɑɑen sɔnu nɑ wɑɑ. Likli pɑɑk e k b k tɔkn sɔnu nbɑ tuok nɑ nɑn Bɑɑlɑɑnm nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. B biɑ yet Yennu mɔb nɑn Kole nbɑ din tun biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e k l biil’b.

Ŋɑnm e jɑkn jiet nbɑ k yinm Klistuweilɑ di nɑ. B bɑkɑ be b ni kuukuɑ e, k b k tiin fei. B tie nɑn sɑnpɑgbɑnt nbɑ k wounŋ gɑɑn’n k l k bɑɑt nɑn sɑɑk nɑ e. B tie nɑn tiini nbɑ k luon luɑnɑ l lonm yuo nɑ e, b kpo e k sɑɑ tɔl, k mɑɑn b jiinɑ kul fikt, k b kuol ɑ.
B tie nɑn mɔkgbenŋl nyunpɑnɑ nbɑ fi k pukl nɑn jɑknt nɑ e. B biɑ tie nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ nbɑ tuu ŋɑbl k lin nɑ e, k bunbɔnciɑɔnŋ nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu be k guu’b.
Enɔk, wun nbɑ wɑɑ Adɑn yɑɑbuonɑ bɑnlole ni nɑ din sɔkn k yet b po ɑ: «T Yonmdɑɑnɔ nɑn u mɑlɑkŋɑnm tusɑ tusɑ bɑɑt,
ɑ wun bu nifosɑɑlk kul buut, k biil bin nbɑ k tiin’ɔ nɑ b biit pɑɑk, nɑn b mɔyetu pɑɑk, nɑn bɑɑ piɑk biil Yennu nɑ pɑɑk.»
B tie bunbulmi dɑnm e, k b nunm k mi gbuo. B tuun b mɔnŋ lonbiit nbɑ wɑnt’b bɑnnu nbɑ e, k piɑk nɑn pɑlbifɑɑnt, k koln niib ɑ bin lɑ siɑl.
N yuɑsnbɑ, i tiɑn mɑn mɑɑn nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu tuomiinbɑ din yet nɑ.
B din yet ɑ: «Dɑɑjuonti dɑɑ mɑnŋ ni, niib tɑn sii lɑɑ’i, k wɑɑ b mɔnŋ mɔnŋ gbɑnɑnt lonbiit.»
L nibuolu e bɑɑt nɑn bɔktu i sinsuuk ni. B gbɑnɑnt lonm kuukuɑ e diɑ’b, k Foŋɑnm kɑɑ b ni.
Ŋɑɑn n yuɑsnbɑ, i cie i pɑlɑ mɑn, i yɑdɑ nbɑ nyii Yennu tiɑɔnŋ buol ni nɑ pɑɑk, kii mei Yennu Foŋɑnm yiikuo ni,
kii tie niib nbɑ be Yennu lonm ni, kii guu yuo nbɑ k t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu sɑɑ tul’i mɑnfuol nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, u ninbɑtinu pɑɑk nɑ.
I tin bin nbɑ k b dudukt lɑnŋ nɑ ninbɑɑɔk,
k suol’b k nyinn’b muu ni. Lieb mun, i tin’m ninbɑɑɔk, k biɑ kii tiin’m jɑŋmɑɑni, ŋɑɑn kii nɑn b biit binbenŋ, kii sɑɑ kii nɑn, nɑn b tiɑt nbɑ mɔk b lonbiit dɔuk nɑ.
Yennu ii guu’i k i dɑɑ bɑɑ, k bɑɑl nɑn’i u tuɑnn yentsɑɑkɑl ni, k i dɑɑ mɔk biit, ŋɑɑn kii mɔk pɑlpienn bonciɑnn.
Ŋuɑ nbɑ tie Yen-yenɔ kuɑ k fiel’t t Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yiesu Klistu pɑɑk nɑ, u yen dontl nɑn yɑbnt nɑn yiikuo nɑn *yudɑnt, yuo nbɑ din gɑl nɑ, nɑn mɔtɑɑnɑ, nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu. * Amenn.

Mɑɑn nbɑ k Yiesu *Klistu din fiit nɑ diɑn kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni e. Yennu din tul’ɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ ɑ wun wɑnn u tuontunnɑ lin nbɑ sɑɑ tien l i yɑnn wɑɑn. Klistu din tun u *mɑlɑkɑ u tuontunnɔ Sɑn buol ni, ɑ wun yet’ɔ mɑɑn mɑnŋ kul.
Sɑn din muɑnt lin nbɑ k u din lɑ nɑ kul k l tie mɑɑn nbɑ nyii Yennu buol ni, nɑn bɑlmɔni nbɑ k Yiesu Klistu din fiit k wɑnn’ɔ nɑ.
Wun nbɑ lii mɑɑn nbɑ nyii Yennu buol ni, k be kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, pɑlpienn tie u yɑl e, k bin nbɑ gbiɑ mɑɑn mɑnŋ k sɑɑk’l, pɑlpienn tie b yɑl e mun, k mɑɑn yuo pel, ɑ k lin nbɑ sɑɑ tun nɑ n tun.
Min Sɑn, min e dɑ kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ, k tien jiɑnti ŋɑnlole nbɑ be Asii tinŋ ni nɑ. Yennu n tul’i yetŋɑnm k biɑ tul’i mɑnu, ŋuɑ nbɑ be, k din be, k biɑ bɑɑt nɑ. U sei ŋɑnlole nbɑ be u nɑɑngbounŋ tuɑnn nɑ,

nɑn Yiesu Klistu n tul’i l bonɑ. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e tie siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑn mɔni. U tie bikpelk e, k biɑ din fiil kpienm sinsuuk ni. U biɑ tie tingbounŋ kpɑnbɑlɑ Kpɑnbɑl e. Yiesu Klistu luon’t k biɑ din nyinn tinm t biit ni nɑn u sɔn.
U din te k t tie Yennu nɑɑn ni niib, k biɑ te k t tie mɑnntieb ɑ tii tuun kii tien u Bɑɑ Yennu. Ŋuɑ Yiesu e yen *yudɑnt nɑn yiikuo yuo kul ɑ. * Amenn.
Gotl mɑn, ŋuɑ e be sɑnpɑgbɑnt ni k bɑɑt nɑ. Suɑ kul ninbinɑ tɑn sɑɑ lɑ’u nɑn bin nbɑ din ŋmuu’u nɑ, k tingbounŋ nɑ nibuolu kul tɑn sɑɑ bui u pɑɑk. L sɑɑ tien nnɑ wɑɑ. Amenn
Yonmdɑɑnɔ Yennu, nbɑ mɔk yiikuo kul, k be, k din be, k biɑ tɑn sii be yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu nɑ, ŋuɑ e yien ɑ: «Min e tie Alfɑ nɑn Omeegɑ.»

Min e tie Sɑn, i nɑɑ bik nɑ, k mɑɑ be Klistu ni nɑ, n tɑɑ nɑn’i k di fɑlɑ, k biɑ be Yennu nɑɑn ni, k guu nɑn suklu. Mɑɑ din lin k muɑntl Yennu mɑɑn nɑn Yiesu *siɑlɑ nɑ, k b din jii’n k sɑɑn nɑn’n Pɑɑtmuos tinŋ nbɑ k nyun lint’l nɑ ni.
L din tie Yonmdɑɑnɔ dɑɑl k Foŋɑnm fiil n ni, k n gbɑt kunkɔpɑɑll n puolpo k l bui nɑn kɑtkɑɑk nɑ.

Kunkɔl mɑnŋ yet ɑ: «Diɑnt lin nbɑ k ɑ lɑɑt nɑ k tien kɑdɑɑɔk ni, k nɑkn k tul Klistu mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be digbɑnɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ ni. Bin nbɑ be Efes nɑn Simiilinn nɑn Pelgɑnm nɑn Tiɑtiil nɑn Sɑɑlt nɑn Fiilɑdelfi nɑn Lɑodiise nɑ.»
K n ŋmɑnt k yɑɑ n got wun nbɑ piɑk k tien’n nɑ. Ŋɑnn e k n lɑ sɑlmɑ fitɑ ŋɑnlole k l sie.
K suɑ be l sinsuuk ni k nɑɑn nɑn nisɑɑlk nɑ, k liɑ liɑtfuouk k l tɑn siit u tɑɑbilɑ, k sɑlmɑ gbɑnn buob u nyɑɑɔk ni,

k u yut pien nɑn gungunt nɑ, k u ninbinɑ nɑɑn nɑn mupienu nɑ. K u tɑɑ nyili nɑn kut nbɑ k b tuu yɑkn muu pɑɑk k lin nɑnn k nyili biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ. K kunkɔl guɑl nɑn kpenu ni nyunmɔnn nbɑ tuu kuon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
K u tɑɑ nyili nɑn kut nbɑ k b yi’l blɔns nɑ, k u kunkɔl guɑl nɑn kpenu ni nyunmɔnn nbɑ tuu kuon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
K u kub ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole u niidiitu ni, k juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ di mɔliemi tɑnt nyii u mɔb ni, k u nunpo yien nɑn yennu nbɑ tuu yien yensuuk ni nɑ.
Mɑɑ lɑ’u yuo nbɑ k n bɑɑ duɑl u tuɑnn nɑn kpiemɔ nɑ. K u jii u niidiitu k yii n pɑɑk, ŋɑɑn yet ɑ: «Dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni. Min e tie bont kul ɑ pinpiik nɑn l gbennu.
N tie Fuotɔ nɑ e. N din kpo wɑɑ, k n ji fo k sii fo nɑn yuo nbɑ kɑɑ gbennu, k n mɔk yiikuo kuun nɑn kpientinŋ pɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, diɑnt lin nbɑ k ɑ lɑ mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn lin nbɑ tun mɔtɑɑnɑ nɑn lin nbɑ tɑn sɑɑ tun yuo nbɑ wɑɑ.

Ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole nbɑ k ɑ lɑ n niidiitu ni nɑ nɑn sɑlmɑ fitɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ wuol ni pɑɑk tie nnɑ e: ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ e tie n mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be digbɑnɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ, k fitɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ mun tie n mɔtɑɑɔk niib nbɑ be digbɑnɑ ŋɑnlole mɑnŋ nɑ.»
«Diɑnt k tul Efes jɑɑnti *mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ diɑ ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole u niidiitu ni k biɑ sonm fitɑ ŋɑnlole sinsuuk ni nɑ lɑbɑɑl e nɑ:

N mi ɑ tuonɑ po nɑn fɑɑ yɑbl k tuun tuonŋɑnɑ biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ, k mi ɑ suklu po. N biɑ mi nɑn ɑ k luon nibiit nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ. A din bikn bin nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ b tie tuomiinbɑ ŋɑɑn k k tie nɑ, k mi nɑn b tie fɑidɑnm e.
A mɔk suklu k biɑ dii fɑlɑ, ŋɑɑn ɑ k nyik’n.
Ŋɑɑn gotl lin nbɑ k n tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk: ɑ ji k luon’n nɑn fɑɑ din dɔnŋ luon’n sinsinn biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.

Tiɑt fɑɑ din tuu be biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ ŋɑɑn ji tɑn lebt k nyik’l nɑ. Mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ ŋɑɑn kii tuun tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ din tuun sinsinn nɑ. L i tie k ɑ k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ, n sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ buol ni k nyinn ɑ fitl lɑɑ tuu be siɑn nbɑ nɑ.
Ŋɑɑn fɑɑ tuun lin nbɑ k l ŋɑn e nɑ. A k luon Niikolɑiitnbɑ nbɑ tuun lin nbɑ nɑ, nɑn mɑɑ mun k luon biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e.›
«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ. «Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, ŋuɑ e k n sɑɑ cɑb’ɔ wun di tiik nbɑ tien niib mɑnfuol k be Yennu gɔktuk ni nɑ luɑnɑ.»
«Diɑnt k tul Simiilinn jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Wun nbɑ din sint, k biɑ tɑn sɑɑ juont, k din kpo k biɑ fiil kuun ni nɑ lɑbɑɑl e nɑ:
N mi ɑ fɑlɑ po, k biɑ mi nɑn ɑ tie nɑndɑɑnɔ e, ŋɑɑn mɔmɔnm, ɑ tie mɔktɔ e, k n mi nɑn nisiɑb piɑk k biil ɑ sɑnn, k biɑ yɑɑ ɑ b tie *Suifnbɑ e, ŋɑɑn k k tie nnɑ. B tie *Sɑɑtɑn mɔtɑɑɔk niib e.

A dɑɑ tiin jɑŋmɑɑni nɑn fɑlɑ nbɑ bɑɑt ɑ pɑɑk nɑ. Sɑɑtɑn sɑɑ kuɑn i siɑb dɑnsɑlk ni k bikn’m. I tɑn sɑɑ lɑ muksuk fɑlɑ k sɑɑ diɑn dɑɑ piik. Ii wɑɑ n mɔb, k l i lek i tie kuun i e, k n tɑn sɑɑ pi’ɑ mɑnfuol foklk.›
«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ. «Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu mɑnŋ, u kɑn lɑ kuun nbɑ pukn munle nɑ.»
«Diɑnt k tul Pelgɑnm jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Gotl lɑbɑɑl nbɑ nyii wun nbɑ mɔk juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ di mɔliemi nɑ buol ni e nɑ:

N mi nɑn siɑn nbɑ k ɑ kɑl nɑ tie siɑn nbɑ k Sɑɑtɑn nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ be. A set wɑɑ n mɑɑn. B din tɑn kpii Antiipɑɑs nbɑ din tie n siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ nɑn bɑlmɔni nɑ, ɑ mɔnŋ duo nbɑ k Sɑɑtɑn be nɑ ni e. L yuo, ɑ din k nyik yɑdɑ nbɑ k ɑ tien’n nɑ.

Ŋɑɑn ɑ mɔk biit ŋɑnle nnɑ e k n sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɑ: ɑ mɔk nisiɑb nbɑ wɑɑ Bɑɑlɑɑnm wɑnnu. Ŋuɑ e din wɑnn Bɑlɑk bɑnnu nbɑ k u sɑɑ jɑnm Islɑɑeltieb ɑ bin biil Yennu *senni k di pɑtɑ nɑnt k biɑ tun boncuncontuonɑ.
Nnɑ e biɑk ɑ mɔk nisiɑb nbɑ wɑɑ Niikolɑiitnbɑ wɑnnu.
L pɑɑk, mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ. Nnɑ i kɑɑ, l i yɑnn wɑɑn, n sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑn juk-bɑnjiɑk nbɑ tɑntl k nyi n mɔb ni nɑ, k kɔn nɑn niib nɑ.›

«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ. «Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, ŋuɑ e k n sɑɑ tul’ɔ jiet nbɑ k b bɔl ɑ k l sɑnn yi mɑnn nɑ, k n biɑ sɑɑ tul’ɔ tɑnpienn nbɑ k sɑnpɑɑnn diɑn l pɑɑk k suɑ k mi’l nɑ, sie fin nbɑ gɑɑl’l nɑ kuukuɑ.»
«Diɑnt k tul Tiɑtiil jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii Yennu Bijɑ nbɑ k u ninbinɑ nɑɑn nɑn mupienu nɑ, k u tɑɑ nyili nɑn kut nbɑ k b yi’l blɔns nɑ.
N mi ɑ tuonɑ po, k biɑ mi ɑ lonm nɑn ɑ yɑdɑ nɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun k tien Yennu niib, nɑn fɑɑ mɔk suklu biɑnŋ nbɑ, k biɑ mi nɑn ɑ tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun k tien lieb nɑ po.

Ŋɑɑn ɑ biit nbɑ k n sɑɑ tɑɑl’ɑ l pɑɑk tie nnɑ e: fɑɑ sɑk k puo nbɑ k b yi’u Sesɑɑbel k u yi u mɔnŋ Yennu sɔkni nɑ i be i buol ni. U wɑnnu ni e k u kpɑnn n tuontunnɑ, ɑ bii tuun boncuncontuonɑ kii di jiet nbɑ tie pɑtɑ yɑl.
N tul’ɔ yuo ɑ wun mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k nyik u cunconsn, ŋɑɑn u k sɑɑk.
L pɑɑk, n sɑɑ jii’u k lu’u fɑlɑ gɑdo pɑɑk, k l i tie k bin nbɑ conm nɑn’ɔ nɑ k mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ k nyi biit mɑnŋ ni, n sɑɑ kuɑn’m fɑlgbenŋl ni,
k n biɑ sɑɑ kpi u wɑɑs, k nnɑ e k Yiesu mɔtɑɑɔk niib kul sii mi nɑn n tie wun nbɑ mi nisɑɑli dudukt, k biɑ mi lin nbɑ be b pɑlɑ ni, k n tɑn sɑɑ pɑ suɑ kul u tuonɑ nyuɑt nbɑ tie biɑnŋ nbɑ.
‹Ŋɑɑn yinm nbɑ be Tiɑtiil k k wɑɑ puo mɑnŋ wɑnnu, k biɑ k wɑɑ lin nbɑ k siɑb yi’l Sɑɑtɑn wuol ni lɑbɑɑl nɑ, n yien yinm e, ɑ n kɑn jinn’i jik-kpiɑtliɑ.
Ŋɑɑn ii diɑ mɑn lin nbɑ k i mɔk nɑ fɑnu mɔkmɔk nɑn yuo nbɑ k n tɑn sɑɑ bɑɑl nɑ.

Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, k tuun mɑɑ luon lin nbɑ k kɑn nyik, n sɑɑ tul’ɔ yiikuo nbɑ k n gɑɑl n Bɑɑ buol ni nɑ buolu, u sii mɔk tingbounŋ nɑ tini kul yiikuo. U yiikuo sii tie nɑn kut pɑtu nɑ e, k u sɑɑ fɑɑ’b k bil’b nɑn bɑɑ fɑɑ bobɑ k yie biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.
N biɑ sɑɑ cɑb l dɑɑnɔ sɑn-nyɑfɑɑl ŋmɑɑbil.› »
«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»
«Diɑnt k tul Sɑɑlt jɑɑnti *mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii wun nbɑ mɔk Yennu Sei ŋɑnlole nɑn ŋmɑɑbilɑ ŋɑnlole nɑ buol e. N mi ɑ tuonɑ po, k biɑ mi nɑn niib duki ɑ ɑ fo, ŋɑɑn k ɑ kpo wɑɑ.
Fiit k yɑbl k lin nbɑ tenn ɑ buol ni dɑɑ kpenn k gbent, k mɑɑn tuonɑ nbɑ k ɑ tuun nɑ k gbuot Yennu nunm.

Ii tiɑn tumiu nbɑ k ɑ din gbɑt k biɑ din gɑɑl nɑ. Ii diɑ’l kii biɑ kii mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn kii lebtl binbenŋ. L i tie k ɑ k fiil, n sɑɑ bɑɑl ɑ buol ni nɑn nɑn-yukɔ nbɑ tuu bɑɑl biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ e, k ɑ kɑn bɑnn n bɑɑlu yuo.
Ŋɑɑn nisiɑb be Sɑɑld k b tiɑt k kuɑ jɑknt. Ŋɑnm e sɑɑ liɑ tɑpieni k ŋɑnm nɑn min ii sonm, k mɑɑn bɑɑ ŋɑn nɑn’n nɑ pɑɑk.
Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu mɑnŋ nɑ, u tɑn sɑɑ liɑ tɑpieni nɑ, k n tɑn kɑn piin u sɑnn mɑnfopɑɑnn dɑnm kɑdɑɑɔk nɑ ni, k n tɑn sɑɑ yet n Bɑɑ nɑn u mɑlɑkɑɑnbɑ nɑ pɑɑnu ni ɑ l dɑɑnɔ tie n yuɑ e.›
«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»

«Diɑnt k tul Fiilɑdelfi jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Gotl, lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii wun nbɑ tie Ŋɑnɔ, k biɑ tie Bɑlmɔni dɑɑnɔ nɑ buol e, k u diɑ kpɑnbɑl Dɑɑfiid pienu k lin nbɑ k u luot nɑ, suɑ kɑn fit luon, k lin nbɑ kul k u luon nɑ, suɑ kɑn fit luot.
N mi ɑ tuonɑ po. Gotl, n senn gɑnn nbɑ yɑɑ e, ɑ tuɑnn k suɑ kɑn fit luon. N mi nɑn ɑ k mɔk pɑnŋ, ŋɑɑn ɑ sɑk n mɑɑn nɑ k dɑɑ kpet nɑn mɔbonn ɑ.
Gotl, bin nbɑ tie *Sɑɑtɑn mɔtɑɑɔk niib, fɑidɑnm nbɑ yɑɑ ɑ b tie *Suifnbɑ ŋɑɑn k k tie nɑ, n sɑɑ te k bin bɑɑl k tɑn gbɑɑn ɑ tuɑnn po, k bɑnn nɑn n set luon’ɑ.
K mɑɑn fɑɑ sɑk n mɑɑn k mɔk mintl nɑ pɑɑk, n sɑɑ diɑ’ɑ bonŋɑnn k ɑ tɑn kɑn kuɑ bonbiil nbɑ bɑɑt tingbounŋ nɑ kul pɑɑk, ɑ lin bikn tingbounŋ nɑ niib nɑ ni.
N sɑɑ bɑɑl mɔtɑɑnɑ. I diɑ lin nbɑ k ɑ mɔk nɑ fɑnu k suɑ tɑn dɑɑ fiɑl ɑ nɑɑn foklk.

Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, n sɑɑ tien’ɔ n Yennu jɑɑnti ŋɑsɑɑkɑk ni jɑɑntɑlk, k u ji kɑn nyi lenŋ. K n biɑ sɑɑ diɑn n Yennu sɑnn u pɑɑk, k diɑn n Yennu duo sɑnn u pɑɑk, k biɑ diɑn n mɔnŋ sɑnpɑɑnn nɑ u pɑɑk. Yennu duo mɑnŋ e tie Selusɑɑlenm pɑɑnn nbɑ sɑɑ nyi *Yendɔunŋ ni Yennu buol ni nɑ, k tɑn sik tinŋ nɑ ni.› »
«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»
«Diɑnt k tul Lɑodiise jɑɑnti mɑlɑkɑ ɑ: ‹Lɑbɑɑl nɑ nyii wun nbɑ sɑnn yi * Amenn nɑ buol e, k u tie bɑlmɔni siɑlɑɑdɑɑnɔ k ɑ fit tien u mɑɑn nɑ yɑdɑ. Ŋuɑ e tie Yennu nɑɑmi nɑ kul ɑ yudɑɑnɔ:
N mi ɑ tuonɑ po. A k mei, k biɑ k ton. N bo sii luon k fii tie l yenn e.
L pɑɑk, fɑɑ k ton k biɑ k mei nɑ, n sɑɑ siil’ɑ n mɔb ni.
A yien ɑ, ɑ tie mɔktɔ e k mɔk lin nbɑ kul k ɑ luon, ɑ k siɑl kɑn pɔt’ɑ ni. Ŋɑɑn ɑ k mi fɑɑ mɔk pɑlbiil nɑn ninbɑɑɔk biɑnŋ nbɑ. A tie nɑndɑɑnɔ e, k sonm yɑnn, k tie juɑnŋ.
L pɑɑk, n kpɑɑn’ɑ e, bɑɑt n buol k dɑɑ sɑlmɑ nbɑ k b kuɑn muu ni k nyinn l jɑknt nɑ k set lɑ mɔktuk, k biɑ dɑɑ tɑpieni k dɔkn ɑ fei nɑ, k biɑ dɑɑ kpɑn k bɑnŋ ɑ ninbinɑ nɑ kii lɑɑt.
Bin nbɑ kul k n luon’m nɑ, n kpɑɑn’m kpɑɑni k dɑɑl b tubɑ. L pɑɑk, ɑ dɑɑ jeln, ŋɑɑn mɔ kuɑŋɑɑn k lebt binbenŋ.
Nnɑlɑ, n sie tɑnmɔb nɑ ni k kpɑɑn gɑnn. Wun nbɑ gbɑt n kunkɔl k luot gɑnn mɑnŋ, n sɑɑ kuɑ, k min nɑn ŋuɑ sɑɑ lɑkn di.
Wun nbɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu nɑ, n sɑɑ tul’ɔ yiikuo k wun tɑn lɑkn kɑl nɑn’n n nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk nɑn mɑɑ nyɑnn nyɑnnu kul k lɑkn kɑl nɑn n Bɑɑ u nɑɑngbounŋ nɑ pɑɑk biɑnŋ nbɑ nɑ.’»
«Wun nbɑ mɔk tubɑ, wun gbiint lin nbɑ k Foŋɑnm nɑ yien k tien jiɑnti nɑ.»
